Ato lafa suni keesati turtani ilmaanifi akhakhotale d'altani waan boch'ani kad'atani mid'aafattani inch'ubbamiina. wonti akanatiifi fuula AABBO Waaqa durati wonti kunini waan hamtu, ammalle isa dallansiifti.
Lafafi gubbaleeni arra d'uga tiyya aka, hojja isani na d'ugefachu diddani, lafa ira hobaatani. Lafa Yordanini gama, ta isani diquma iti inqubatini taanile guddo keesa inteetani keesa isani balleesani.
AABBO Waaqi gosa ch'ufa keesa gargari isani firfirse, aka fiigi keesani nama tatake tahu.
Achiti isani waaqoota heddu harki namaa mid'aase, waaqa mukhatifi ka d'akha, ka wo arge yokhaani ind'ageenne ka wo nyaate yokhaani insuumne kad'attani hojattani.
Achiti isani AABBO Waaqa keesani barbaaddani duuba yo isani garaa tokooni barbaaddani, inuma gartani.
Yo wonti hedduuni isaniti buute, gaargali isani qabate, isani eege AABBO Waaqa keesaniti deebitani d'ugeefatani.
Inni Waaqa naasuti, isani lakise imballeesu, ammalle wold'aqisa inni abbooti teesani woliini tolfate kaani inded'u.
Waan dabre, ka gaafa isani ind'alatini, ka haga gaafa Waaqi nama lafati uume asi, lafa ch'ufa ke yaa, barbaada, laala. Wonti guddooni akana taka yayu taate? Nami tokoleeni taka waan akana kana yayu d'agaye?
Nami tokoleeni, ka Waaqa ibida keesa dubbate, aka isani d'ageetani kana d'agaye lubbu bulle injira?
Waaqi tokoleeni, ka taka deeme nama lafa d'ibi keesaa fuud'e nama ufii tolfate, aka AABBO Waaqi keesani isani lafa Misiri keesaa fuud'e injira? Ila teesani durati inni irre isaatiifi jabeenna isaatini gaargala lolaatiini d'ufe, waan taka nami arge ind'agayinifi waan mama tolche, waan nama sodaachisa heddu tolche.
Wonti AABBO Waaqi waan kana ch'ufa isani garsiisefi, aka, isa male, waaqi d'ibiini injirre, isani garsiisa.
Inni qonqo isaa gubbaa isani d'ageesise, aka akasiini woi isaniti himu, lafa tana iraleti ibida isaa qulqullo isani garsiise ammalle ibida suni keesaa isaniini dubbate.
Waan ababoota teesani jaalateefi inni isani fohate jabeenna isa guddaani lafa Misiri keesaa isani baase.
Ato isani ga d'uftanu inni gosa jabdu irre qabdu taani jabeenna isaatini lafa tana keesaa isani duraa gusse, lafa isaani arrale teetani tana.
Tanaafi arra inded'ina qaabad'a AABBO Waaqi Waaqa gubbatiifi lafale, isa male kad'ibini injiru.
Aadaafi seera isaa, ka anini arra isanii kenne kana ch'ufa d'ugeefad'a, duuba isanifi ilmaani teesanileeni nagayaani teetani. Ammalle isani lafa AABBO Waaqi keesani isani kennu tana haga jiru jireenna keesa teetani.
aka nami nama nyaapa isaa intahini danu ijeese iti baqate nagayaani achi tau. Nami sunini dandae dira kana tokoti baaqata, aka inijeemne.
Gosa Reubeni, dira Bizeri ka gooro lafa aloo gubba jiru, kennaniifi; gosa Gadi, dira Ramothi, ka lafa Gileadi keesa jiru, kennaniifi gosa Manasele, dira Golani, ka lafa Bashani keesa jiru, kennaniifi.
Musani Seera Waaqatifi barsiisa isaa gumi Israeliti kenne.
Gaafi inni seera kana kenneefi sunileeni eegi worri lafa Misiri keesaa bahe, bale galaana Yordanitini ilaboru jirtu, ta dira Beth-Peoritini gama jiru. Fullaani suni lafa hayyu Sioni, jed'ani ka gosa Amori ka dira Heshboni ke jirti. Hayyuuni suni ka duri Musafi gumiini Israeli, gaafa lafa Misiriti d'ufte dabsate.
Worri lafa isatifi lafa Ogu, hayyu Bashani, ka gosa Amori ta Yordanini ilaboru jirtu fud'ate.
Lafti tunini haga dira Aroeri, ka afaani galaana Arnoni iraa baate, mirga, gaara Sirioni ka maqaani d'ibiini Amoriti ejite.
Ammalle lafti galaana Yordanitini ilaboru haga bitaa galaana sooda, ammalle ilaboru gula, haga hunda gaara Pisga ch'ufti, lafa sunini takaa.

Musani gosa Israeli ch'ufa wolti yaame waan jed'eeni, gosa Israeli, Seera anini arra isani kennu ch'ufa d'agaya, barad'a, aka dansaa jabeesa, guuta.
Gaara Sinai irati AABBO Waaqi kenna wold'aqisa,
ababoota teenna ch'allaniti, nuu ch'ufa ka haga arrale jiru woliini tolfate.
Achi gaara irati AABBO Waaqi akuma isani isa agartani ibida keesaa isaniini dubbate.
Anini gaafasi jiddu teesanifi ta AABBO Waaqa eje, aka waan inni jed'u isaniti himu, waan isani ibida sodaatani gaara olkoru diddanifi.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'e,
Anini AABBO Waaqa kanke ka lafa Misiri fulla atini tisse iti taate keesaa si baase.
Na male waan d'ibi inkad'atiini.
Akheekha waan tokole, ka lafafi gubbaafi, bisaani lafa jala jirale boch'ite imid'afatiini.
Waan boch'ani mid'aasani kana tokole dura gajette inkad'atiini: wonti akanatiifi Anini, AABBO Waaqi kanke, waan d'ibi na biraani kad'attani inoobsu. Anini ammalle nama na jibbufi d'aloota worra ka sadeesotifi ka afreesole gaargala itiini d'ufa.
Ammo anini d'aloota kunki kunki ka na jaalate seera kiyya guutu jaalad'e nahaafi.
Guyya jaa huji tante ch'ufa tolfad'u,
ammo guyyaani torbeeso guyya Sabato, ka AABBO Waaqa kanketiti, guyya kana huji inhojatiini, si taanaani, ijoolle tante taanaani, tissele tante taanaani hori kanke taanaani yokhaani keessuma tantele taanaani, guyya suni ha oolaani, tisseeni teetileeni akuma atini ooltu ha ooltuti.
Qaabad'i, aka atini duri lafa Misiri keesati tisse taate ammalle anini AABBO Waaqi kanke jabeenna kiyyafi humna tiyyaani si baase. Tanaafi anini guyya Sabato jabeesi siini jed'a.
Ammalle gaafa isani qonqo dukana keesa d'ageetani, ka gaara suni ibidi ira bobau, isani nami gugurdaani mata gosa teesani d'uftani nati d'iaattani
waan jettani, me ilaala, AABBO Waaqi keenna ya guddinnaafi jabeenna ufi nu agarsiise, qonqo isale ya ibida keesaa d'ageenne: Nu arra Waaqa namaani dubbate nami ira hafe jiraate la agarre.
Duuba amma nu maafi doona? Ibida jabaani kunini nu balleesa. Yo nu qonqo AABBO Waaqa keenna maro d'ibi d'ageenne, nu indoona.
Nami lubbu qabu tokoleeni ka eegi Waaqa jireenna ka ibida keesaa dubbate d'agaye jiraate injira?
Musa, atini beeni deebii waan AABBO Waaqi keenna siini jed'u ch'ufa ch'aqasi. Duuba waan inni siini jed'e deebii nuti himi. Nu duuba ch'aqamne guunna.
AABBO Waaqi dubbi taana d'agaye, jennaani waan naani jed'e, Anini waan worri kunini jed'e ya d'agaye, wonti worri jed'e ch'ufti d'uga.
Ato sila worri yo ch'ufa akana arge! Ato sila worri naa saalfate, seera kiyya ch'ufa jabeese guute, wonti ch'ufti worraafi ilmaani isaanile haga jiru jireenna nagaya taati.
Beeni, waaro teesaniti dachaa jed'iini.
Ammo atini, Musa, arma na woliini tai, duuba anini aadaafi seera kiyya ch'ufa sii kenna. Biyya barsiisi, aka worri lafa amma anini kennuufi tana keesati jabeese guutu.
Worra Israeli eegad'a, aka waan ch'ufa ka AABBO Waaqi keesani isaniini jed'e kana tolchitani. Aada isaa tokole indidina
ch'ufa guuta, aka wonti ch'ufa nagaya isanii taate, isani lafa amma iti qubachu geetani tana keesa teetani.

Tunini aadaafi seera AABBO Waaqi keesani worra kana barsiisi, gorsi naani jed'e. Lafa isani amma tana fud'atani iti qubachuu geettani tana keesati jabeesa guuta.
Haga jirtani isanifi ilmaani teesanifi d'alooti keesanileeni ch'ufti. AABBO Waaqa keesani guddiftani aadaafi, seera isaa, ka anini isanii kennu kana, guutuu maltani, aka lubbuuni teesani lafa suni irati d'eerattu.
Tanaafi isani worri Israeli seera kana d'agaya, guuta! Yo akasi taatani, wonti ch'ufti isaanii tolte nagaya isanii taati, duuba isani lafa aananifi dammi, aka lola yau keesati hortani daraartani, akuma AABBO Waaqi, Waaqi abbooti teesani isaniti kakhate kaani.
AABBO Waaqa keesani garaafi onne teesani ch'ufaani aka jaba jaalad'a.
Dubbini anini arra isaniini jed'e tunini garaa keesani keesaa imbahini.
Ilmaani teesani aka dansaa dubbi tana barsiisa. Worra keesa taanaani, ala taanaani, yo raftanifi yo kaatanile qaabsisa.
Aka beesisa harkaafi addaleti hid'ad'a.
Mikhikha balbalaa manatifi ka fullole irati t'aafa.
Maneeni dira suni waan dadansa isani keesa inaqiiniini guutamte, ammalle arti, eellani isaani inqotiinifi mukha zabibutifi ka ejersa ka isaani inoobriniti jira. Hojja AABBO Waaqi lafa taanatiini isaani d'ufe waan feetani ch'ufa nyaattani quuftani,
eegad'a aka AABBO Waaqa, ka lafa Misiri fulla isani tisse iti tatani, keesa isaani baase, indeene.
AABBO Waaqa keesani sodaad'a isa ch'alla hojad'a, maqa isaa ch'allaani kakhad'a.
Waaqoota d'ibi, worra d'aatu teesani jiru, gula iyyaaiina.
Yo gula yaatani AABBO Waaqi aka jaba isaniti dallane, d'ufe isani gube lafa ira isani balleesa; wonti akanatiifi AABBO Waaqa keesani, ka isani woliini jiru kunini, nama isa biraani Waaqa d'ibi kad'atu inoobsu.
Aadaafi seerafi dubbi inni isani barsiisele jabeesa guuta.
Waan dansaafi qajeeltu AABBO Waaqi tolcha jed'u, tolcha, duuba wonti ch'ufti isanii tolti. Ammalle lafa gabbo AABBO Waaqi ababoota teesani kakhate dandeetani fud'atani iti qubattani,
nyaapa keesanile akuma inni khakhate ufi duraa baaftani.
Yo taka tana ijoolleeni teesani isani gaafate, maanifi AABBO Waaqi keenna seera kana ch'ufa guuta nuni jed'e? jette.
Waan isani jettaniini, Nu duri lafa Misiri keesati tisse Faraoti, jennaani AABBO Waaqi jabeenna isaa guddaani lafa suni keesaa nu baase.
Nu iluma teennaani waan mamatiifi waan nama sodaachisa ka inni worra Misiritiifi Faraofi worra isaa ch'ufati tolche, argine.
Inni lafa suni keesaa nu baase, armaani nu d'ufe, lafa tana nuu kenne, akuma inni ababoota teennati khakhate.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi keenna seera kana ch'ufa guuta na sodaad'a jed'e nu barsiise. Yo akasi taane, inni nu tisse, nu qorqorate, badi nu d'owe nu duroomsa.
Guddo ira nuu jirti, yo nu waan Waaqi jed'e kana aka dansaa garaa tokooni jabeesine guunne; innileeni nuraa gammada.

Ammalle hojja AABBO Waaqi keesani worra kana harka keesaniti kenne isani worra dabsattani. Worra ch'ufa haguma worri gahunu balleesuu maltani. Wold'at'ani golli woli intahina, diqole worraa innahina.
Woli infuud'ina, ilmaani teesani dubra worraa infuud'iini, ilmaani worraleeni dubra teesani infuud'iini;
wonti akanatiifi yo akasi taatani worri ilmaani teesani AABBO Waaqa iraa gorse waaqa d'ibi kad'achiisa. Yo wonti sunini taate, AABBO Waaqi isaniti dallane maro tokotu isaani balleesa.
Duuba waan isani taatani, fulla worra ta woyyu ch'ufa balleesa, d'akha woyyu ka worri old'ad'aabe ch'ufa ch'ach'absa, akheekha waaqa worra ka Asheri jed'ani ch'iraa balleesa, waan worri boch'e aka waaqa yaamatu ch'ufa gubba balleesa.
Wonti isani akasi tahu maltanifi waan isani worra qulqullo AABBO Waaqa keesaniitifi. Gosa lafa ch'ufa keesa jirtu keesaa AABBO Waaqi isani fohate, gumi ufi isani tolfate.
Waan isani heddatani gosa d'ibi ira jiraattanifi AABBO Waaqi isani jaalate isani infohanne; isani qarale gosa ch'ufa ira diqo.
Ammo AABBO Waaqi isani jaalate kakhu inni ababoota teesani kakhate guute. Tanaafi inni jabeenna isaa guddaani isani baase, harka Farao, hayyu Misiri, ka isani tisse isaa taatani keesaa isani baase.
Beekha, AABBO Waaqa keesani ch'allati Waaqa, ka dubbi ufi guutu. Inni wold'aqisa ufi guute, jaalala ufile d'aloota kunki ka nama isaa jaalate seera isaa guutu agarsiisa;
ammo nama isaa jibbu maruma tokotu balleesa.
Duuba tanaafi waan isani barsiisani kana guuta, gula yaa: aadaafi seera anini arra, isanii kenne kana jabeesa guuta.
Inni isani jaalate isani eebisa, aka isani daraartani ilmaani heddu d'alttani; inni oobru teesani eebise, duuba isani mid'aani, daad'i, d'ad'ale keesa argattani ammalle inni isani eebise loonifi reele horattani. inni waan kana ch'ufa lafa inni ababoota teesani kakhate keesati isanii kenna.
Gochiti tokoleeni ta aka keesani eeba akana tana argatu injirtu. Isani keesa nami namafi horiini isa maseenu injiru.
AABBO Waaqi fayyad'aba ch'ufa isani iraa d'owa. D'ukubi hamaani isani lafa Misiri keesati argattani kaani deebie isanitini ind'ufu, ammo nyaapa keesani ch'ufa itiini d'ufa.
Gosa ch'ufa ka AABBO Waaqi keesani harka keesaniti kennu balleesa diqole inahiinaafi. Waaqa worraa inkad'atiina, yo kad'attani ya t'urura keesa buutani.
Isani hegeri, gochiti tunini nura guddo, nu akami dandeenne lafa tana keesa baamna? injed'ina.
Insodaatina; waan AABBO Waaqi keesani Faraofi worra Misiri ch'ufa tolche qaabad'a.
Gaargala hama isani ila teesaniini gartanifi waan jabdu ka mamatiifi irreefi harka jaba AABBO Waaqi isaaniini baase qaabad'a. Akuma inni worra Misiri gaafasi balleese, akasuma worra isani sodaattani kana ch'ufale balleesa.
Inni worra mudamsiise, worra baqate d'okhatule balleesa.
Tanaafi worra kana insodaatina. AABBO Waaqi keesani isani woliini jira; inninu Waaqa gudda ka sodaatani.
Tokuma tokooni gosa tana ch'ufa, ato isani d'uftanu, isani duraa balleesa. Dandeetani maruma tokooni imballeesitani, wonti akanatiifi, yo isani akana tolchitani, bineensi ala lafa ira dabre isani dabsatafa.
AABBO Waaqi keesani worra harka keesaniti kenne, haga worri badduti, worra mudamsiisa.
Inni hayyoota worra harka keesaniti kenne, isaani worra ijeeftani, maqa worra lafa keesaa balleesitani. Nami tokoleeni dandae isani ind'owu, haga isani worra ch'ufa balleesitaniti.
Waan worri boch'e aka waaqa kad'atu ch'ufa guba balleesa. Qarsifi worqi waan suniti jirtu d'araatani infud'atina. Yo akasi taatani ya t'urura keesa ufi buuftani wonti akanatiifi wonti suni waan AABBO Waaqi guddo jibbu.
Waan Waaqi jibbu kana tokole mana keesani keesa inkayina: hegeri abaarsi waan suni isaniti deebia. Waan aka waaqa kad'attani kana ch'ufa jibba, tufad'a, wonti akanatiifi AABBO Waaqi ya waan suni ch'ufa abaare.

Seera anini arra isani kenne kana jabeesa guuta, aka isani jiraattani, hortani lafa AABBO Waaqi ababoota teesani kakhate fud'attani.
Aka AABBO Waaqi keesani ganna afurtama kana, lafa aloo ta gamooji tana keesa isaaniini deeme, qaabad'a; inni aka isani ilaalatu gaargala isaniti erge, aka waan garaa keesani keesa jirafi aka isani seera isaa guuttani beekhu.
Inni sagale isani d'owe isani agabse, eege sagale manna jed'ani ta taka isanifi abbootini teesani inyaatini isanii kenne. Wonti inni akasi tolcheefi aka nami qit'a ch'allaani injiranne ammo dubbi afaani AABBO Waaqa keesa baatuni jiraatu isani barsiisu fed'a.
Ganna afurtama suni keesa woyaani teesani taka jaarte inch'ich'inne, yokhaani miili keesanileeni taka inuranne.
Garaa keesani keesa beekha, akuma abbaani ilma ufi ka jallatu d'aane qajeelchu AABBO Waaqileeni akasuma d'aane isani qajeelcha.
Tanaafi akuma AABBO Waaqi isaniini jed'e tolcha: aada isaa gula fidama, isa sodaad'a.
AABBO Waaqi keesani lafa gabbotini isani d'ufa — lafa galaanafi maddaafi bisaani lafa jala oliyaani, baleefi gaareeniti baafatani, qabdu;
lafa dargaye, garbu, zabibu, oda, okhoku, ejersafi damma qabdu.
Achiti isani imbeeloftani, yokhaani womafu ingaabitani. Lafa suni d'akhayeeni isii sibiila baafte, gaareeni isiile keesa sibiila diima qotani.
Isani nyaattani quuftani, maro lafa gabbo inni isanii kenneefi AABBO Waaqa keesani galata deebiftani.
Hojja nyaatani quuftani maneeni dadansa jaarratani keesa teetani,
ka loonifi reeni teesanifi qarsifi worqi teesanifi wonti isani qabdani ch'ufti lafa ira dabarte.
Eegad'a aka kiyyibdani ufi saaddani, AABBO Waaqa keesani ka lafa Misiri, ta tisse iti taatani, keesa isani baase indeene.
Inni lafa aloo ta gamooji ballo hamtu, fulla bofi had'aa qabuufi qaanjibbuni jirtu keesa isaniini deeme. Lafa goddu d'eebicha ta bisaani inqamne suni keesa inni ch'alalaqa d'akha keesaa bisaani isanii yaase.
Lafa gamooji ta aloo suni keesati sagale manna jed'ani, ta ababooti teesani taka inyaatini, isanii kenne. Inni aka isani ilaalatu gaargala isaniti buuse, aka eegi tana isani eebise, waan dansa isaanii kennu.
Eegad'a, aka garaa keesa, Nu irre teennafi jabeenna keennaani duuroomne injenne.
Qaabad'a, nami irre duroomtanini isanii kennu AABBO Waaqa keesani. Wonti inni akasi tolchufi, waan inni wold'aqisa inni ababoota teesani woliini tolfate, haga arrale gula deemuufi.
Deebitani AABBO Waaqa keesani inded'ina, yokhaani Waaqa d'ibiti garagaltani kad'attani inhojatina. Yo isani akasi taatani, anini arra Inuma dootani jed'e isani gorsa.
Yo isani AABBO Waaqa d'agayu diddani, akuma gosa taani ta inni isani dura balleese isanile balleesa.

Worra Israeli d'agaya! Isani arra galaana Yordani taakitani lafa gosa isani ira guddotifi isani ira jajabdu fud'achu d'at'ani. Diri worraa gudda, old'eeresani, d'akhaani marsani jaarani.
Nami worraleeni jajaba d'ed'eera, ilmaani Anaki, ka, aka isani d'ageetani, nami tokoleeni dandae worra dura inejine.
Ammo amma tana beekha, nami isani dura deeme aka ibida woi gubu AABBO Waaqa keesani. Inni isani dura deeme, worra dabsate balleesa, duuba isani worra gussitani, akuma inni kakhate, yoosu balleesitani.
Eegi AABBO Waaqi keesani worra isani duraa gusse, garaa keesani keesati maruma dansuma teennatifi AABBO Waaqi lafa tanaani nu d'ufe, fud'ad'a nuni jed'e injed'ina. Wonti akanatiifi AABBO Waaqi maro hameenna worra kanatifi worra isani duraa gussa.
Maro dansumafi qajeeluma teesanitifi AABBO Waaqi lafa suni isanii inkennu, ammo maro hameenna worraatifi maro inni kakhu duri ababoota teesani Abrahamufi. Isaaqofi Yakobooti kakhate guutu fed'uufi, inni worra lafa keesaa isaani duraa gussa.
Tanaafi beekha, AABBO Waaqi lafa gabbo tana maro dansuma teesanitifi isani kennuti injiru. Isani worra mata jajabaati.
Deebitani inded'ina, aka isani AABBO Waaqa keesani lafa aloo ta gamooji keesati dallansiiftani. Haguma gaafa duri lafa Misiriti kaatani armaani baatani isani dubbi isaa diddani.
Gaafa fulla gaara Sinai jirtanile isani AABBO Waaqa dallansiiftani, inni isani hobaasu gahe.
Anini gaara kore d'akha hahafalicha ka wold'aqisa AABBO Waaqi isani woliini tolfate fuud'uu d'aqe, gaafasi anini guyya afurtamatiifi halkani afurtama achi tae, ka woma tokole nyaad'e ind'ugini.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi d'akha hahafalicha lamaani inni harka ufiitini dubbi inni ibida keesa, guyya isani fulla gaarati woli woldeetani jed'e, irati t'aafe.
Ammalle eegi guyya afurtamatiifi bulti afurtama suni AABBO waaqi d'akha hahafalicha lamaani kaani, ka wold'aqisa irati t'aafani, naa kenne.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi waan naani jed'e, Beeni, hurrisi gadibui; wonti akanatiifi worri kanke, ka atini lafa Misiri keesaa d'ufteeni, ya hammate waan daba tolche. Worri arra kale dubbi anini jed'eeni taani iraa deebie, sibiila basse mid'aase, aka waaqa inkad'atiini.
AABBO Waaqi ammalle waan nani jed'e, Anini worra kana yayu arge aka mataani worraa jajaba.
Na lakisi, aka anini maqa worra balleese, nami deebie inqaabanne. Duuba anini si fuud'e, abba gosa guddo worra ira jabduu si tolcha.
Jennaani anini ka d'akha hahafalicha lamaani kaani ka wold'aqisa irati t'aafani harkaa qabu gargale, gaara iraa gabue. Hojja suni gaari sunini gubachu jira.
Anini aka isani seera AABBO Waaqi keesani isanii kenne ch'absitani, Waaqa sibiila ka aka korma looni mid'aafattani akasiini Waaqa keesaniti daba tolchitani, arge.
Duuba anini d'akha hahafalicha kaani lamaani fuud'e, isani durati lafaani d'ae ch'ach'abse.
Jennaani anini lafa d'ae guyya afurtamatiifi halkani afurtama, AABBO Waaqa dura, ka woma nyaad'e ind'ugini ch'iise. Wonti anini akasi taheefi, waan isani AABBO Waaqati daba tolchitani isaa dallansiiftanifi.
Anini dallansu hamtu AABBO Waaqaa, ka inni diquma isani imballeesini guddo sodaad'e, ammo AABBO Waaqi ammalle na d'agaye.
AABBO Waaqi Harunileti dallane, diquma isa imballeesini, tanaafi anini yoomi suni Harunilee kad'ad'e.
Anini waan daba suni ka isani mid'aasitani — korma sibiila kaani — fuud'e, ibida keesa buuse, ch'ach'abse, bulleese d'uke tolche, d'uke suni bisaani gaara ira yaati jisse.
Gaafa inni Kadesh-Barnea isani godaansise, Beena, lafa anini isani kenne fud'ad'a isaniini jed'e, isani isa ch'aqasu diddani d'ugefachule diddani ammalle saalfachuufi diddani.
Haguma anini isani arge isani dubbi AABBO Waaqa diddani.
Tanaafi anini lafa d'ae, AABBO Waaqa dura guyya afurtamatiifi halkani afurtama ch'iise; wonti akanatiifi anini yayu aka inni isani balleesu fed'u arge.
Duuba anini waan jed'e, Ee AABBO Waaqa gudda, gumi taante tana, ta atini jabeenna harka keetitiini fuute, lafa Misiri keesaa baafte, imballeesini.
Hojattu tante Abrahamufi, Isaaqofi Yakobo qaabad'u: mata jabeennaafi hameennaafi ch'ubbu worra kana ilaalte gula indeemini.
Yo hegeri atini akasi taate, worri Misiri waan jed'u me ilaala, AABBO Waaqi lafa inni worra kakhate geesu dad'abe worra jibbe amatana lafa aloo tanatini d'ufe hobaasu fed'a.
Ammo taatule worri kunini worra atini fohate gumi tante tolfate lafa Misiri jabeennaafi irre tanteetiini keesa baafte.

Jennaani AABBO Waaqi waan naani jed'e, D'akha hahafalicha lamaani aka ka qara kaani boch'i sanduqa keesa nat'ule mukhaani mid'aasiifi, gaara gubbati natiini kooti,
anini dubbuma d'akha hahafalicha atini ch'absite ka qara kaani irati t'aafe kanale irati t'aafa; duuba atini maro tana sanduqa keesa kayu malte.
Jennaani anini sanduqa mukha d'adachatiini mid'aase, d'akha hahafalicha lama, ka akuma d'akha qara kaani jiru boch'e, gaarani kore.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi d'akha hahafalicha kaani irati dubbuma duri inni d'akha qara kaani irati t'aafe, Seera kud'annaani ka inni gaafa ibida keesa isaniini dubbate, guyya isani fulla gaarati woltibaatani isani kenne, irati t'aafe. AABBO Waaqi d'akha hahafalicha suni naa kenne,
anini gargale gaara iraa gabue. Jennaani akuma AABBO Waaqi naani jed'e, sanduqa anini mid'aase kaani keesa kaye arti asile artuma keesa jira.
Artilee kaani Gudgoda qubatani achii kaani Yorbatha lafa madda guddo qabdu qubatani.
Gaafasi AABBO Waaqi worra gosa Lawi fohate, aka worri Sanduqa Wold'aqisa baate, huji qaallu isaa hojatte maqa isaatini namaa eebisu. Arrale hujiini worraa sunuma.
Wonti gochiti Lawi qooda lafa aka gosa taani, inargatiinifi waan kana: Akuma AABBO Waaqi worraa kakhate, qoodi worraa huji qaallu.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi waan nami jed'e, Beeni, worra kana dura deemi, aka worri lafa anini ababoota worraati kenne fud'atu.
Amma worra Israeli AABBO Waaqi maani isani iraa fed'a? Wonti inni isani iraa fed'u, aka isani AABBO Waaqa keesani sodaatani, kara isaa ch'ufa gula yaatani, isa jaalatani, AABBO Waaqa keesani garaafi onne teesani ch'ufaani hojattani,
ammalle aadaafi seera, ka anini AABBO Waaqi ara isanii kenne, guutani akanaani eeba argattani.
Gubbaleeni haguma geetunu ta AABBO Waaqa keesaniti: lafafi wonti isii keesa jiraleeni ch'ufti ka isaati,
Ammo jaalalti AABBO Waaqa, ta inni ababoota teesani jaalate, guddo jabdu, tanaafi inni gosa d'ibi keesaa isani fohate haga arrale gumi ufi isani tolfate.
Tanaafi deebitani mata injabaatiina armaa achi AABBO Waaqa d'agaya.
AABBO Waaqi keesani Waaqa Waaqa ch'ufa ira jirufi jabeenna, jabeenna ch'ufa ira jiru. Inni gudda jaba ka nami sodaatu: ka nama gargari infillee yokhaani ka gumbo inyaanne.
Inni haad'a hiyyeesatifi hiyyeeyile qorqorate dubbataafi: Inni keessuma teennale jaalate beelafi daara baasa.
Tanaafi keessuma jaalad'a, isanileeni duri lafa Misiriti keessuma.
AABBO Waaqa keesani sodaad'a, isuma ch'alla kad'ad'a. Isa biraa indeemina, maqa isaa ch'allaani kakhad'a.
Isaa faarsa, inni Waaqa keesani, isanileeni waan mama jabdu inni isani tolche ya iluma teesaniini agartani.
Gaafa ababooti teesani lafa Misiriti godaante, worri nama torbatama ch'alla, ammo amma AABBO Waaqi keesaani ya isani daraarse, aka urji garaa waaqa isani tolche.

AABBO Waaqa keesani jaalad'a, guyya ch'ufa dubbifi gorsaafi aadaafi seera isaa guuta.
Guyya kana waan AABBO Waaqa ka isani barattani qaabad'a nami waan suni barate ilmaani teesaniniti, isanuma isani guddinnaafi jabeennaafi irreefi
waan mama ka inni tolche ya agartani waan inni hayyu Misiritiifi lafa isaa ch'ufa tolche ya agartani.
Ammalle aka AABBO Waaqi askarti Misiri ch'ufa, fardooleefi gaari fardi hirkisule Galaana Diima keesati hobaase gaafa worri isani reebe, la agartani.
Ammalle waan inni lafa aloo ta gamooji taaniti ka isani arma ind'ufini, isanii tolche imbeetani.
Ammalle waan inni Dathanifi Abiramu, ilmaani Eliabu, ka gosa Reubeni tolche, inqaabattani. Nama ch'ufa durati aka lafti ch'iiteeni worraafi waarofi waan lubbu qaba, ka worri qabu ch'ufa, liqimsite.
Nami gaafasi waan jabdu AABBO Waaqi tolche suni arge isanumaaniti?
Seera anini, ara isanii kenne kana ch'ufa guuta. Yo akasi taatani, dandeetani galaana taakitani lafa, amma iti qubachu geetani tana fud'atani.
Duuba ganna heddu lafa aananifi dammi aka lola yau keesa teetani lafa AABBO Waaqi ababoota teesanifi ilmaani isaaniti kakhate.
Lafti isani amma iti qubachu geetani suni, lafa Misiri ta qara isani keesa teetanini woliinfakaatu. Lafa suniti duri hojja mid'aani oobrattani isani huji jabdu lafa fafalansani bisaani oobrutini naqani hojattani;
ammo lafti isani amma iti qubachu geetani tunini lafa gaareenifi bale isi Waaqi bokaya iti buuse.
AABBO Waaqi keesani lafa tana qorqorate, gannaafi hagayya ch'ufa tissa.
inni hojja wogaani bokaya geetu, hagayyafi gannale isani roobe isani mid'aanifi daad'ifi d'ad'ale argattani,
horiini keesaanileeni marra argate, isanileeni nyaattani quuftani.
Eegad'a, sobamtani, AABBO Waaqa keesani ira gortani, waaqa d'ibi inkad'atiina.
Yo isani akasi taatani, AABBO Waaqi isaniti dallane bokaya roobu dide lafti teesani aka male godde woma baasu dad'abdi! Duuba isani achiti hurre dootani, ato lafti inni isanii kenne sunini dansa taatele.
Tanaafi dubbi tiyya tana garaafi onne teesani keesa keeyad'a aka beesisa harkaafi addaleti hid'ad'a.
Ilmaani teesanile barsiisa worra keesa taanaani ala taanaani, hojja raftanifi hojja kaatanile taanaani, qaabsisa.
Mikhikila balbala manatifi ka fullole irati t'aafa.
Duuba isanifi ilmaani teesanileeni lafa AABBO Waaqi ababoota teesani kakhate keesati lubbuuni bultani. Haga lafafi gubbaani, jirtu isani achi teetani.
Garaa tokooni seera anini isanii kenne ch'ufa guuta: AABBO Waaqa keesani jaalad'a, waan inni taha jed'e ch'ufa tolcha, isa biraa indeemina.
Duuba inni gosa taani ch'ufa isani dura gusse; isani lafa gosa isani ira guddo ta ammalle isani ira jabdu, fud'attani iti qubattani.
Fullaani miili keesani bahu ch'ufti teesani taati. Lafti teesani haguma lafa aloo ta gamooji bitaa ejite haga gaareeni Lebanoniti ejiti, ammalle galaana Frati ilaboruti ejite Baariini Gudda ila adu jiruti ejiti.
Lafa suni keesa fulla isani baatani ch'ufa AABBO Waaqi keesani biyya ch'ufa isani sodaachisa, akuma inni kakhate, nami tokoleeni dandae isani dura ineju.
Arraa anini eebaafi abaarsa isani dura kaya, toko gula baha:
Yo isani seera AABBO Waaqa keesani ka anini arra isanii keennu guutani, eeba argattani;
ammo yo seera kana guutu diddani iraa gortani, waaqa d'ibi ka taka inkad'atiini kad'attani, abaarsa argattani.
Hojja AABBO Waaqi lafa isani fud'attani iti qubachu geetanini isani gahe, gaara Gerizimu irati wo eebiftani ammalle gaara Ebali irati wo abaartani.
Gaareeni lamaani sunini galaana Yordani, gama suni, kara lafa gosa Kanaani ka lafa Araba keesa tau, d'aatu dira Gilgali, fulla mukha gudda woyyu ka more, gama ila adu injirtu?
Isani amma yayu galaana Yordani taaku geetani, aka lafa AABBO Waaqi keesani isanii kennu fud'attani iti qubattani. Hojja fud'attani iti qubattani,
seera anini ara isanii kennu kana ch'ufa jabeesa guuta.

Tunini aadaafi seera, ta isani haga lafa AABBO Waaqi ababoota teesaniini isanii kennu keesa teetani, guutu maltani. Seera kana ch'aqasa!
Lafa isani fud'attani suni keesati, fulla worri lafa suni waaqa worraa iti kad'atu ch'ufa, gaara d'ed'eerafi kubile gubba taanaani, mukeeni dodoti jala taanaani, balleesa.
Fulla worra ta woyyu ch'ufa balleesa, d'akha woyyu, aka worri old'ad'aabe ch'ufa, ch'ach'absa. Akheekha waaqa worra ka Ashera jed'ani gubaa waan worri boch'e aka waaqa kad'atu gargari ch'ira, aka deebiani fulla suniti inkad'anne.
Kara worri waaqa ufiitini kad'atu, isani AABBO Waaqa keesani inkad'atiina.
Lafa gosa teesani ch'ufa keesaa, AABBO Waaqi fulla toko, ta gumiini isa dura d'ufte isa kad'atu, fohata.
Achiti isani sorio teesani ta gubanifi sorio d'ibile ammalle qooda Waaqaa baaftanifi waan d'ibi isaa baaftanile, waan isani kakhatani Waaqa baaftanifi waan fed'i gula waaqa baaftanile waan loonifi reeni teesani goroomuma d'altu Waaqaa baasa.
Achiti, AABBO Waaqa keesani ka isani eebise durati, isanifi worri keesani sagale nyaattani waan dansa isani hojattani iraa gammaddani.
Hojja guyyaani suni gahe, aka amma tolchitani kana tolchu himmalle. Haga ara isaniini ch'ufti waan feetani tolchitani;
wonti akanatiifi isani qara lafa AABBO Waaqi keesani isanii kennu ta isani nagayaani keesa teetani, ingeenne.
Hojja galaana Yordani taakitani AABBO Waaqi lafa suni isani kenne isani keesa teetani. Inni nyaapa keesani ch'ufa isani iraa d'owe, isani nagayaani teetani.
AABBO Waaqa fulla toko ch'alla ta iti kad'atani fohata, achiti waan anini kootani isaaniini jed'e, d'ufuuni maltani: sorio gubanifi sorio d'ibile, qooda Waaqa baasanifi waan d'ibi ka baasanile, ammalle waan isani Waaqa kennina jettani kakhatanile.
Achiti isa durati, isanifi ilmaani teesanifi hojattu teesanifi worri Lawi ka dira keesani keesa tauleeni gammada; qaabad'a aka worri Lawi qooda lafa inqamne.
Fulla feetaniti sorio teesani imbaasina.
Fulla AABBO Waaqi, lafa gosa teesani toko keesaa fohatu, ch'allati baasa. Arti ch'allati sorio teesani ta gubani baaftani waan d'ibi ch'ufa ka anini isaniini jed'e tolchitani.
Ammo fulla isani qubattani ch'ufati dandeetani hori keesani qalatani nyaattani. Hori haga AABBO Waaqi isanii kenne nyaad'a. Isaniini ch'ufti yo qulqullo taatanifi yo qulqullo intahinile dandeetani nyaatani akuma isani fooni hidditifi ka saala nyaattani.
Ammo d'iiga isaani insooratina aka bisaani lafati jissa.
Waan Waaqaa baaftani tokole fulla iti galtaniti inyaatina: qooda mid'aani taanaani, ka daad'i taanaani, ka d'ad'a taanaani, waan loonifi reeni teesani goroomuma d'alte taanaani, waan isani Waaqaa baamna jettani ka katanile taanaani, waan fed'iini baaftanile taanaani, yokhaani waan d'ibile, ka isani Waaqaa baaftani tokole insooratina.
Isanifi ilmaani teesanifi hojattu teesanifi worri Lawi ka dira keesani keesa tauleeni waan Waaqaa baasani kana AABBO Waaqa keesani ch'alla durati soorad'a fulla kad'acha ta AABBO Waaqi keesani fohate suni ch'alla keesati soorad'a. Ammalle waan tolchitani ch'ufa ira gammadu maltani.
Ammalle eegad'a aka haga lafa teesani keesa teetani worra Lawi indeene.
Hojja AABBO Waaqi keesani akuma inni kakhate lafa teesani iti isanii dare ballise, fooni hojja feetani ch'ufa inyaattani.
Yo fullaani AABBO Waaqi keesani fohate iti na kad'ad'a jed'e isani iraa guddo fago taate, hojja feetani dandeetani loonifi ree, ka AABBO Waaqi isanii kenne, qalattani worrati nyaatani, akuma anini isaniini jed'e kaani.
Nami ch'ufti, qulqulloofi ka qulqullo intahinile dandae fooni suni nyaata, akuma inni fooni hidditifi ka saala nyaatu.
Eegad'a, d'iiga ch'alla insooratina; wonti akanatiifi jireenni d'iiga keesa jira, tanaafi jireenna sunifi fooni ka woliini jira insooratina.
D'iiga insooratina, ammo aka bisaani lafati jissa.
Yo isani seera kana guutani, AABBO Waaqi gammade, wonti ch'ufti isanifi ilmaani teesani tolti.
Ammo waan qulqullo ka baasu maltanifi waan isani, Imbaamna jettani kakhatani fuud'a, fulla AABBO Waaqi fohate geesa,
fulla sorio AABBO Waaqaa irati baasaniti sorio gubani baasa. Ammalle d'iiga sorio fulla sorio irati baasani suniti jissa, ammo fooni isii nyaad'a.
Dubbi anini isaniti hime tana ch'ufa jabeesa, aka wonti ch'ufti isanifi ilmaani teesani toltu haga jiru jireenna, yo akasi taatani isani waan dansa, ka d'uga fuula AABBO Waaqa keesani durati tolchitani. Akasiini isa gammachiiftani.
Hojja AABBO Waaqi keesani gosa isani lafa iraa fud'attani, isaani duraa balleese isanileeni lafa ira fud'attani keesa teetani,
ufi eegad'a aka finna worra gula yaatani t'urura keesa inseenne. Ammalle gochiti tunini akami waaqa worraa kad'ati? — nuleeni sila akasi kad'achu feena injed'ina.
Aka worri waaqa worraa kad'atu AABBO Waaqa keesani inkad'atiina: Wonti akanatiifi worri hojja waaqa worra kad'atu, waan hamtu ch'ufa ka AABBO Waaqi jibbu tolcha. Worri hojja sorio waaqa worrati baasu ilmaani isaanile gube baasa.

Yo raagafi yokhaani nami waan oobju himu d'ufe akheekhafi waan mama tolche,
ammalle akheekhafi wonti mama ka inni himu yo guutamte, ammalle yo inni, waaqa d'ibi ka isani imbeenne gula nu yaasa inhojanna jed'e,
isani dubbi raaga sunitifi, ka nama waan oobju himu suni, inch'aqasina. AABBO Waaqi keesani nama akasi suniini isani laalata, aka isani AABBO Waaqa garaa tokofi onne tokooni jaalattani argu fed'a.
AABBO Waaqa sodaad'a, gula deema, dubbi isaa ch'aqasa, seera isaa guuta; isa hojad'a, biraa indeemina.
Ammo raagafi nama waan oobju himu ka akasi suni ijeesa; wonti akanatiifi inni AABBO Waaqa, ka lafa Misiri fulla isani tisse iti taatani keesaa isani baase, iraa gora jed'e isani barsiisa. Nami akasi suni hama, kara AABBO Waaqi keesani keesati bulla isaniini jed'e iraa isani gorsu fed'a. Tanaafi isaa ijeesuu maltani, aka waan hamtu akasi ufi keesaa baaftani.
Hegeri oboleesafi ilmaafi intalafi niiti atini jaalatufi jaali kanke jabaani si sobe, koota waaqa d'ibi kad'anna (ka isanifi ababooti teesani imbeenne) sini jed'a.
Worra suni keesa nami toko waaqa worra d'aatu teesani jiru, yokhaani ka sira fago jiru, sosobe sii kad'achiisa.
Ammo insobamini, yokhaani inch'aqasinile, isaa naate d'ossite illakisini.
Ijeesi firfirsi d'akhaani d'ai, duuba nami d'ibileeni ha d'akhaani d'auti.
D'akhaani d'ai, ijeesi! Wonti akanatiifi inni AABBO Waaqa kanke, ka lafa Misiri, fulla isani tisse iti taatani, keesaa isaani baase, iraa si gorsu fed'a.
Duuba worri Israeli ch'ufti waan tahe d'agaye sodaate, nami tokoleeni deebie waan hamtu akana kana intolchu.
Hojja dira AABBO Waaqi keesani isani kennu keesa teetani,
aka nami keesani ka gari, seseegi woma keesa injirre, worra dira suni sobe waaqa isani taka inkad'atiini kad'achiisu hegeri d'ageetani.
Yo waan akasi fa d'ageetani, aka dansaa dubbi suni jabeesa qorqorad'a; yo d'uguma wonti hamtuni akasi sunini taate,
nama dira suni keesa jirufi looni worrale hobaasa, woma illakisina. Dira worrale ch'ufa balleesa.
Waan nami dira suni qabu ch'ufa woltiguura, jiddu dira, fulla nami iti wolwoldauti, tuula. Duuba dirafi waan keesa jira ch'ufa guba, akuma sorio gubani AABBO Waaqa keesani baaftani. Diri sunini ha haguma jiru akasuma tahuti, deebitani injaarina.
Waan balleesu malani oli inkeyaatina, aka AABBO Waaqi dallansu ufii hamtu taani galfate isanii nahu. Inni isanii nahe isani daraarsa, akuma inni ababoota teesaniti kakhate,
hojja isani qonqo isaa d'ageetani, seera anini arra isanii kenne guutani, waan isaa durati qajeeltu tolchitani.

Isani worra qulqullo ka AABBO Waaqa keesani; inni ya gosa ch'ufa ta lafa gubba jirtu keesaa isani fohate, gumi ufii isani tolfate.
Waan AABBO Waaqi infeene tokole inyaatina.
Bineensi isani nyaachu maltani kana: looni hoolafi laleesa,
hiddi, saala, gadamsa, gugufto, bushaa ch'ufa —
bineensa qeench'i kaarru qabuufi ka alala deefatu.
Ammo bineensa tokole inyaatina, ka qeench'i kaarru qabuufi ka alala deefatu male. Gaala, hillensafi bineensa d'ibi aka isaale inyaatina. Bineensa akasi suni aka waan qulqullo intahiniti herega; wonti akanatiifi bineensi kunini alala deefata, ammo qeench'i isaani kaarru inqabu.
Booyye inyaatina, isiile aka waan qulqullo intahiniti herega; wonti akanatiifi qeench'i isii kaarru qaba, ammo alala indeefatu. Bineensa akana kana tokole inyaatina, yokhaani reefa isaanile intuqina.
Qurt'umi gosa ch'ufa ta bisaani keesa galtu nyaad'a.
Ammo waan bisaani keesa gala, ka qurt'umi intahini, inyaatina. Aka waan qulqullo intahiniti herega.
Simpirre qulqullo ch'ufa nyaad'a.
Wonti koola qaba ka isani nyaachu himmaliini tana: risafa, urungufa, qorefa, rumichafa, akko abeerafa, haranqeesafa, rand'ufa, guchifa, simpirre bisaani ch'ufa, baabo alloonafa ammalle raarefa inyaatina.
Bineensi didiqani koola qabu ch'ufti qulqullooniti inyaatina.
Ammo bineensi didiqani d'ibiini qulqullo, nyaad'a.
Duuba fulla AABBO Waaqi keesani fohate isa iti kad'attani d'aqa, achiti isa duraa mid'aani, daad'i, d'ad'a, waan horiini goroomuma d'ale, ka loonitifi ka reele, kud'ani keesa toko nyaad'a. Waan kana tolcha, aka hojja ch'ufa AABBO Waaqa keesani sodaatani.
Hojja karaani d'eerate, fullaani sunini isaani ira fago taate, qooda waan AABBO Waaqi isanii kenne sunini d'ufu dad'abdani, waan kana tolcha:
Qooda suni gurgura, beeseti deebisa, beese suni fud'ad'a, fulla AABBO Waaqi keesani fohate taani d'aqa,
waan feetanini bitad'a — looni taanaani, ree taanaani, daad'ifi farsole taanaani — achiti AABBO Waaqa keesani dura, worra keesani woliini, nyaad'a quufa gammada.
Worra gosa Lawi ka dira keesani keesa tau inded'ina; wonti akanatiifi worri qooda lafa tokole inqabu.
Yo ganni sadi hobae ch'ufa qooda mid'aani keesani ch'ufa gabaasa, dira keesani keesati olnaqa.
Sagaleeni tunini ta worra gosa Lawiti wonti akanatiifi worri qooda lafa inqabu: ammalle sagaleeni suni ta keessumatifi ta hiyyeeyitifi ta nad'eeni d'iirsi ira due ta dira keesaani keesa teetuti. Worri ha d'ufe nyaate quufuti. Waan kana tolcha, duuba AABBO Waaqi keesani waan isani tolchitani ch'ufa keesa isani eebisa.

Yo ganni torbeeso hobau ch'ufa, nama gati teesani qabu gati suni lakisaafi.
Aki isani lakiftani akana: Nami gosa ufi gati kenneefi ha gati suni lakisufi inni beese suni ira infud'atini; AABBO Waaqati gati suni lakisise.
Nama gosa teesani intahini iraa fud'ad'a, gosa teesani iraa infud'atina.
AABBO Waaqi keesani lafa inni isani kennu keesati isani eebisa.
Yo isani dubbi isaa gula deemtani, waan anini arra isaniini jed'u kana ch'ufa aka dansa guuttani, worra keesani keesa deegi injiru.
AABBO Waaqi akuma inni isaniti kakhate isanii eebisa. Isani gosa heddu gati kennitani ammo gosa tokole gati iraa infud'atani; isani gosa heddu mohatani, ammo isani gochiti tokoleeni isani imohatu.
Ammo arja taha, haga inni fed'u gati kennaafi.
Ganni gati nama lakisani ya d'aate jettani, waan hamtu hereddani, gati ind'owatiina. Heregi akasi hamaani suni qalbi teesani inseeniini. Yo isani gati d'owattani, inni AABBO Waaqati bohe, isani ch'ubbu keesa seentani.
Dubbi male garaa tokooni isaa kenna, duuba AABBO Waaqi waan isani tolchitani ch'ufa keesa isani eebisa.
Deega haguma jirani lafa teesani keesa ind'abani; tanaafi anini amma qarqaara wo kennaafi isaniini jed'a.
Hojja isa galakiftani suni harka duwa gadi ind'iisiina,
waan AABBO Waaqi eebani isanii kenne keesa, ree taanaani, mid'aani taanaani, daad'i taanaani guddisa kennaafi.
Qaabad'a, isanileeni duri, lafa Misiri keesati, tisse, ka AABBO Waaqi keesani keesaa isani baase: Tanaafi anini arra seera kana isanii keenna.
Ammo yo tisseeni teesani isanifi worra keesani ch'ufale jaalatte, anini isani biraa indeemu jette.
Gurra isaa qabaa, fulla balbala geesa, uraafi; duuba inni haga jiru jireenna tisse teesani taha. Akasuma tissele teesani ta uwale tolcha.
Hojja tisse galakiftani hamtu iraa inargina; wonti akanatiifi isiini ganna jaa hori male isanii hojatte. Wonti isani kennitaniifi liqimsa ch'alla. Waan kana tolcha duuba AABBO Waaqi keesani waan isani tolchitani ch'ufa keesa isani eebisa.
Ganna ch'ufa, isanifi worri keesani, fulla AABBO Waaqi fohate, isa durati nyaad'a.
Ammo yo horiini sunini aabo qabaate, yo naafafi balla taate, yokhaani aabo hamtu d'ibi inni qabaate, AABBO Waaqa keesani sorio imbaasina.
Hori akana kana worrumati nyaad'a. Nami qulqulloofi ka qulqullo intahininleeni, akuma hiddifi saala nyaattani ha nyaatuti.
Ammo d'iiga hori suni insooratina. Fulla sooratani, aka bisaani lafati jissa.

Fulla AABBO Waaqi aka isa iti kad'attani fohate d'aqa, loonifi ree teesani toko jila Pasakati qala, aka akasiini AABBO Waaqa guddiftani.
Hojja sagale jila suni nyaattani, qit'a bukho qabu inyaatina. Haga guyya torba qit'a bukho inqamne nyaad'a akuma gaafa lafa Misiri keesaa baqatani tolchitani. Qit'a kana, ka qit'a gaargala jed'ani, nyaad'a, aka isani haga jirtani guyya lafa Misiri, ta isani keesati gaargaltani, keesaa baatani qaabattani.
Haga guyya torba, mana keesani keesa, nama tokole bukho irati inargini, ammalle fooni hori halkani qara suni qalani imbulchina, halkanuma suni fit'a.
Hori jila Pasaka fulla AABBO Waaqi keesani fohatu, ka isa iti kad'attaniti qala, fulla d'ibi tokoleti inqaliina. Isani duri hojja aduuni d'iite lafa Misiri keesaa baatani, tanaafi hojja aduuni d'iitu qalad'a.
Fooni suni d'aaba, fulla AABBO Waaqi keesani fohatuti nyaad'a: boriyyaate worrati dachaa.
Haga guyya jaa qit'a bukho inqamne nyaad'a; ammalle guyya torbeeso wolwoldaa, AABBO Waaqa keesani kad'ad'a; guyya suni huji tokole inhojatina.
duuba jila gaafa mid'aani murani tolfad'a AABBO Waaqa keesani guddisa; aka inni isani eebise gula waan fed'i teesaniini isaa baaftani baasaafi.
AABBO Waaqa keesani durati gammada, isani, ilmaani teesani, hojattu teesani, worra gosa Lawiti, keessuma teesani, hiyyeeyifi nad'eeni hiyyeeyi ta dira keesani keesa teetu. Jila suni fulla AABBO Waaqi fohateeti tolfad'a.
Isani aka gaafa duri lafa Misiriti tisse taatani qaabattani, seera kana guutu maltani.
Jila suni keesa isanifi ilmaani teesani, hojattu teesani, worra gosa Lawiti, keessuma teesani, hiyyeeyefi nad'eeni hiyyeeyi ta dira keesani suni keesa jirtu woliini gammada.
Haga guyya torba fulla AABBO Waaqi keesani fohateeti jila tana tolfad'a AABBO Waaqa keesani guddisa. Gammada, waan AABBO Waaqi keesani huji teesanifi mid'aani keesanile eebiseefi.
Ganna keesa maro sadi nami keesani ka d'iira ha AABBO Waaqa fulla inni fohateeti dura d'ufuti: Jila Pasaka taanaani, jila gaafa mid'aani murani taanaani, ammalle jila Hoosa taanaani, worri d'iira suni tokoleeni harka duwa ind'ufini;
ammo nami ch'ufti, haga dandau, waan AABBO Waaqi isaa kenne gula, ha wo baasuti.
Dira AABBO Waaqi keesani isani kenne ch'ufa keesati, jaallabafi jaarole dubbi qortu tolfad'a. Worri kunini ha d'uga gula dubbi qore muruti.
Worri d'ara gula dubbi qore, yokhaani nama ira inch'iisini. Ammalle gumbole inyaatini, wonti akanatiifi, gumbooni ila nama qalbi qabule duuchite, nama d'ugale kiyyibsifti.
Waan d'ibi lakisa, d'uga ch'alla gula deema, aka lafa AABBO Waaqi keesani isanii kennu fud'attani iti qubattani.
D'akha woyyuma olind'aad'abiina, AABBO Waaqii waan suni guddo jibba.

AABBO Waaqa keesani loonifi ree ka aabo qabu qaltani sorio imbaasinafi AABBO Waaqi hori akasi suni guddo jibba.
Yo dubbi akasi suni d'ageetani, aka dansaa qorad'a. Yo dubbini hamtuni akasi sunini, ka Israeli keesati taate, mirkama taate,
duuba nama waan hamtu suniini d'ufe dira keesaa baasa, d'akhaani d'aana ijeesa.
Ammo hojja nami lamafi sadi aka inni hameenna suni keesa jiru hime yo suni ch'alla isaa ijeesu malani; ammo dubbi nama toko gula isaa ijeesu himmalle.
Worri qara isa hime sunini ha qara d'akhaani d'aanuti. Duuba akanaani hameenna akasi suni ufi keesaa baatfani.
Yo hegeri dubbini gari jajabaatte jaarole dabsatte, dubbini aka hori irati woli mormanifa, yokhaani ta nafa woli madeesanifa, yokhaani danufi beekha woli ijeesanifa yo dubbini sunini dubbi akasi suni taate, fulla AABBO Waaqi fohate, ta isa iti kad'atani, d'aqa,
dubbi suni qaalole gosa Lawitifi jaallaba hojja suni dubbi muruti himad'a, ha worri laale muruti.
Yo worri artiti dubbi laale mure, Waan worri isaniini jed'e tolcha.
Dubbi worra fud'ad'a, gula deema, diqole mirgaafi bita iraa ingorina.
Nama dubbi iti murani fud'achu didi mata ufiti deeme, qaallu huji AABBO Waaqa harka qabuufi jaallabale ch'aqasu didu ha ijeesani; duuba akanaani hameenna akasi suni worra Israeli keesaa baaftani.
Duuba nami ch'ufti akasi d'agaye sodaate, deebie mataa ufiti indeemne.
Nama AABBO Waaqi keesani fohate fohattani hayyu tolfattani, nami sunini ha nama gosa teesani tahuti: keessuma hayyu intolfatina.
Inni farda heddu inqabaatiini, yokhaani namale lafa Misiriti erge farda imbitatiini; wonti akanatiifi AABBO Waaqi qara, deebitani, achi ind'aqina ya isaniini jed'e.
Ammalle hayyuuni nad'eeni heddu infuud'iini, wonti akanatiifi yo inni akasi tahe ya AABBO Waaqa iraa gore: ammalle inni qarsifi worqiini ufi induroomsiini.
Hojja inni hayyu tahe, inni ha seera AABBO Waaqa, ka kitaaba qaaloleeni Lawi harkaa qabdu, keesa jiru, kitaaba d'ibiti t'aafuti.
Inni ha kitaaba suni ufi bira kaye haga jiru ch'ufa soomuti, aka akasiini inni aka AABBO Waaqa sodaatu barate, waan keesati t'aafani ch'ufa garaa tokooni guutu.
Tunini herega hegeri inni waan nama d'ibi iraani jiru ufi sehu keesati ijeefte ammalle seera Waaqale ch'absu d'owarti. Duuba inni ganna heddu huji suni keesa tae, ilmaani isaaleeni haga d'aloota hedduu worra Israeli fiddi.

Gochiti Lawi, ta qaalole, qooda lafa tokole worra Israeli keesa inargaatiini, ammo sorio gubani AABBO Waaqa baasanifi sorioni d'ibileeni ha jiraatuuti.
Worri d'aala d'ibi oboleyaani Isaani keesa inargatiini. D'aalti worra AABBO Waaqa, akuma inni kakhate.
Hojja loonifi ree sorio qalani, qaaloleeni balleensufi d'amnafi garaachale ha fud'aatuti.
Ammalle qooda qara ka mid'aanifiti ka daad'itiifi ka dabassa hooliye ha fud'ataniti.
AABBO Waaqi keesani gosa teesani ch'ufa keesa gosa Lawi fohate, aka haga jiru jireenna qaallu tahani isaa hojattani.
Nami gosa Lawi ka fed'u, ha dira Israeli ka taatefu keesaa bahe, fulla AABBO Waaqi fohateeti d'ufe,
achiti qaallu tahe AABBO Waaqa ufiti hojattu, akuma worra gosa Lawi ka qara achiti AABBO Waaqa hojattu kaani.
Inni sagale haga qaaloleeni taani fud'attu ha fud'atuti sagale worri isaa isaa ergu male.
Hojja isani lafa AABBO Waaqi keesani isanii kennuti d'uftani, aada hamtu, gochiti qara achi jirtu sunini tolfatu, barattani gula indeemina.
Ijoolle teesani waan sorio irati baasani irati gubdani sorio imbaasina, ammalle worra keesani yuuba, nama daayyani wohimu, nama wofagu, nama murma baafatu,
falfaltu, nama ayyaana kad'atu, nama ekhera kad'atu tahu d'owa.
Wonti akanatiifi AABBO Waaqi keesani nama waan hamtu akana kana tolchu ch'ufa injibba; maro waan sunitifi gosa suni ch'ufa lafa isaani keesa isani duraa gussa.
AABBO Waaqa keesani dura wollaala male yaa.
Jennaani Musani waan jed'e, Lafa isani amma tana fud'attani iti qubachu geetani tana keesa worri duri achi tau worra waan yuubatifi nama daayyani wohimu gula yau, ammo AABBO Waaqi ya waan akana kana ch'ufa ira isani seere.
Fulla suni, inni raaga aka kiyya kana isanuma keesaa isanii, baasa; isaa ch'aqasu maltani.
Gaafa isani fulla gaara Sinaiti wolti baatani Waaqa kad'attani, waan jettani, Nu qonqo AABBO Waaqa keenna deebine ind'agayiini, yokhaani ibida gudda akana kana deebine inargini; wonti isani akasi jettanifi, duu sodaattani.
Duuba AABBO Waaqi waan naani jed'e, wonti worri jed'e d'uga.
Tanaafi anini raaga aka kanketi worruma keesaa worraa baasa: anini waan inni jed'u ch'ufa iti hime, duuba inni waan anini isani jed'e biyyati hima.
Inni maqa kiyyaani dubbata, aninileeni nama isa ch'aqasu didu dubbi iraa qaba.
Ammo hojja raagi tokoleeni waan anini himi injed'ini, Waaqati jed'e jed'e, maqa kiyyaani hime, ha duuti; ammalle raagi maqa waaqa d'ibiini wohimuleeni ha duuti.
Yo isani garaa keesani keesa dubbi AABBO Waaqi injed'ini, Nu akamiini beenna jettani, aki isani beettanini kana:
Yo raagi maqa AABBO Waaqatini dubbate, dubbini isaa d'ugaa intahini, dubbini sunini ta AABBO Waaqatiiniti raagi sunini matuma ufiitini dubbate, tanaafi isa insodaatina.

Eegi AABBO Waaqi keesani worra isaani lafa isani iraa fud'attani balleese, ka isani dirafi mana worraa ira fud'attani keesa teetani,
lafa suni fulla saditi gargari baasa ka kamu dira ufi qabu. Duuba nami nama ijeesu dandae dira suni tokoti baqata, aka lubbu ufii baasu.
Yo nami nama nyaapa isaa intahini, danu ijeese, inni dandae dira kana tokoti baqate lubbu ufii baasa.
Fakeenna, yo nami lama woliini badda seene mukha mure ato nami toko mukha muru d'agaraani isaa sukka keesaa bahe, nama wahela isaa kaani ijeese, inni dandae dira suni sadeeni tokoti baaqate lubbu ufii baasa.
Yo diri suni toko ch'alla taate, takachi suni nama ira fagaata duuba fiit'aani nama ijeesani suni ka haalo baasufi, nama kaani ka woma keesa injirre hegeri d'aqabe ijeesa. Ka ufuftu nami sunini namuma nyaapa isaa intahini danu ijeese.
Tanaafi anini Dira sadi huji tana koba baasa isaniini jed'a.
Hojja Waaqi keesani, akuma inni ababoota teesaniti kakhate, lafa teesani ballise, lafa inni isanii kakhate ch'ufa isanii keenne,
dira kana saadeeniti dira d'ibi saadi dara. (Yo isani waan anini arra isaniini jed'e ch'ufa guutani AABBO Waaqa keesani jaalattani kara isaa gula yaatani inni lafa tana isanii kenna.)
Waan kana tolcha, aka nami woma keesa injirre indoone, isanileeni lafa AABBO Waaqi isanii kennu keesati worra suni ijeeftani wollaala inarganne.
Ammo yo nami nyaapa ufii gaade beekha ijeese dira suni tokoti baqate,
duuba jaaroleeni dira inni keesati d'alate suni ha nama ergite, isa qabani, harka fiit'a namicha inni ijeese suniti kennani; akanaani nami suni isa ijeese haalo baafatu. Nama akasi suni diqole
inahina nama nama ijeese kana Israeli keesaa balleesa, aka wonti ch'ufti isanii toltu.
Yo nami d'araani nama himate, Nami sunini ya woyake jed'e,
Worri sunini lachu ha AABBO Waaqa dura d'ufuti, aka qaaloleefi jaallabi, ka gaafasi huji harkaa qabu, dubbi worra ilaaltu.
Jaallabooti dubbi ha aka dansaa qorqoratte ilaaltuti, hojja nami nama himu kaani nama waan d'araatiini hime dubbini suni isa ira deebite,
Waan sila inni nama kaani tolchu fed'e ha isa tolchaniti. Akanaani waan hamtu akana kana ufi keesaa baaftani.
Duuba nami ch'ufti d'agaye sodaate deebie waan hamtu akana kana intolchu.
Nama akasi sunii inahina: ka lubbu ijeese, ijeesa, ka ila basse ila bassa, ka ilkaani buqise, ilkaani buqisa, ka harka kute, harka kuta, ka miila kute, miila kuta.

Hojja isani nyaapa keesanini wolhad'u d'at'ani, gaari fardi hirkisufi fardoole askarti heddu ta teesani ira jirtu argitani, worra insodaatina. AABBO Waaqi keesani, ka lafa Misiri keesaa isani baase, isani woliini jira.
Hojja isani fulla had'iisati d'iaattani, qaallichi toko ha gabahe askartiini waan jed'u,
Worra Israeli ch'aqasa! Arra isani nyaapa keesanini woli haatani, garaa ilaafiina, worra sodaatani imudamiina.
AABBO Waaqi keesani isani wolindeeme, isani nyaapa keesani dabsattani.
Duuba worri gugurdaani askarti ha askartiti dubbate waan jed'uuni, Nami mana jaarate qara ineebisini isani keesa jira? Yo jiraate, ha worra ufiti deebiuti. Yo ka inni indeebiini isa lola keesati ijeesani, nama d'ibiti mana isaa eebisa.
Ammalle nami zabibu oobrate mid'aani qara inyaatini isani keesa jira? Yo jiraate, ha worra ufiti deebiuti. Yo ka inni indeebiini isa lola keesati ijeesani nama d'ibiti mid'aani isaa suni nyaata.
Nami dubra kad'ate fuud'u gahe isani keesa jira? Yo jiraate, ha worra ufiti deebiuti. Yo ka inni indeebiini isa lola keesati ijeesani, nama d'ibiti intala inni kad'ate suni fuud'a.
Ammalle worri gugurdaani askarti ha dubbate waan jed'uuni, Nami daafanaani wosodaatu isani keesa jira? Yo jiraate ha worra ufiti deebiuti. Yo inni deebiu baate, inni worra d'ibile garaa laafisa sodaachisa.
Eegi worri gugurdaani askarti dubbi suni buufate, nama gugurda askarti dura deemu ha tolfataniti.
Hojja dira had'u d'at'ani, qaraa fit'e worra suni iti lakisa, haga worri harka keennatuti.
Yo worri fullo banate harka kennate, worri ch'ufti ha tisse isanii tahuti, irreeni hojachifad'a.
Ammo yo worri dira suni harka kennachu dide isani had'e, dira suni marsa, had'a.
Duuba hojja AABBO Waaqi keesani dira suni harka keesaniti keenne, nama d'iira ka dira suni ch'ufa ijeesa.
Ammo nad'eeni, ijoolle, hori waan dira suni keesa jira ch'ufa boojia. Waan nyaapa keesani ira boojitani suni ch'ufa fud'ad'a, horad'a, AABBO Waaqi ya isanii kenne.
Aki isani dira lafa isani iti qubattani iraa fago tolchitani akana.
Ammo yo dira lafa AABBO Waaqi isanii kenne, haatani qabdani waan maqa nama fakaata tokole inhambisina ch'ufa fit'a.
Worra Hititi, ka Amoriti, ka Kanaaniti, ka Periziti, ka Hiviti, ka Yebusile, akuma AABBO Waaqi tolcha isaniini jed'e kaani,
worra suni ch'ufa fit'a, aka worri waan hamtu, hojja worri waaqa ufi kad'atu tolfatu, isani barsiise ch'ubbu hamtu keesa isani imbumne.
Hojja isani dira haga guyya heddu had'iisa marsitanile, mukha mid'aani tokole imurina. Mid'aani suni nyaad'a, ammo mukha imurina; mukhi isanii nyaapaniti.
Ammo mukha nami mid'aani isa inyaanne, yo feetani mura, aka boota tolfad'a, dira suni had'a, haga dabsattani qabdaniti.

Yo lafa AABBO Waaqi isanii kennu keesati reefa namaa ka diiduma keesa ch'iisu, ka nama isa ijeese imbeenne argitani,
jaaroleefi jaallabooti teesani ha d'ufte, fulla reefa iti argani sunifi haga dira d'aatu suni jira ch'ufa fageenna isaa ha biimituti.
Duuba jaaroleeni diri isaani dira kaani ch'ufa ira reefa suniti d'iaatu ha goromsa looni, ka taka ileenjisini, fuute,
bale bisaani keesaa yaani, ta taka nami qote infach'aasinitini d'ufte, achiti ha lume ch'absituti.
Qaaloleeni gosa Lawileeni ha achi d'at'uti; wonti akanatiifi nami dubbi hamtu, hojja nami harkaani wolgahu, qoru worra. AABBO Waaqi keesani worra fohate aka worri isaa hojatte, maqa isaatini namaa eebisu.
Duuba jaaroleeni diri isaani dira kaani ch'ufa ira fulla reefa suni iti arganiti d'iaatu ha goromsa looni suni irati harka d'iqatte,
waan jettu, Harki kenna d'iiga isaa imbumne yokhaani ilti teennaleeni nama d'iiga isaa buusa ingarre.
Ee AABBO Waaqa, worra kanke ka Israeli ka atini lafa Misiri keesaa baafte, araarami. Nu araarami, d'iiga nama woma intahini, ka due kana, nura inkayini.
Duuba akanaani waan isani waan AABBO Waaqi isani iraa fed'u guutanifi, inni d'iiga nama suni isani ira inkayu.
Hojja isani nyaapa keesani had'u d'at'ani AABBO Waaqi keesani harka keesaniti worra kenne isani worra qabdani,
ka isani nad'eeni mimid'aadu worra boojitani keesati agartani fuud'u feetani,
worra keesanitini galla, mata ira haada, qeench'a qoraafi.
Nad'eeni sunini ha woya ufi baafate ta d'ibi keeyate mana keesani keesati galte, jia toko worra isaaniiti bootuti; eegi suni dandeetani fuutani.
Yo eegi suni jibbitani yalabaatani ha fulla feetu yaatuti. Maro isani worra irreeni fuutanifi, isani worra tisse tolfatani yokhaani namaleti ingurgurina.
Yo nami nad'eeni lama qabu, ka ta inni jaalatufi taaleeni ilma d'aalteefi, ammo ka ilmi angafa sunini ka niiti inni ira jaalatu intahini,
guyya inni ilmaani isaati d'aala qoodu, inni ilma niiti inni ira jaalatu taani ira ch'iise, qooda angafa kennuufi himmalle.
Inni ilma angafa waan inni sila argatu ira ha maro lama kennuu, ato inni ilma niiti inni ira jaalatu taani tahu baatele. Nami ilma angafa angaftiti isaa jabeese d'aala isaa ch'ufa kennuufi male, waan inni qara d'alateefi.
Yo nami ilma mataa jaba, ka dubbi nama ind'ageenne yokhaani ka haad'afi abba ufi ato d'aananile insaalfaneefi qaabate,
abbaafi haati isaa ha fuute, jaarole dira isaani duraani d'ufte himatuti.
Duuba waan jaarole dira sunitini jed'ani, ilma keenna kana mataani isaa jaba, nama ind'agayu, nule insaalfatu. Inni saabdi, ammalle aka hama farso d'uge machaa.
Duuba nami d'iira ka dira suni ch'ufti, ha woltibahe d'akhaani isa d'aane ijeesuti; akanaani hameenni akasi duraa baatani. Nami gosa Israeli ch'ufti, yo waan akana kana d'agaye, insodaata.
Yo nami waan guddo hamtu ka isaa ijeesa tolche isa fannisani ijeesani,
reefi isaa mukha suni gubba bullu himmalle. Guyyuma suni ha awaalaniti, wonti akanatiifi reefi mukha irati fannisani abaarsa Waaqa lafatini d'ufa. Reefa suni awaala, aka lafa AABBO Waaqi keesani isanii kennu int'ureesine.

Ammo hojja abbaani isii fago jiraate yokhaani isani abba isii beekhu baatani, worra keesanitini galla jabeesa hojja abbaani fed'achu d'ufe, kennaafi.
Waan d'ibile harre taanaani, woya taanaani, ka gochiti teesani ta Israeli balleesite, yo agartani, akasuma tolcha, illakisina.
Yo hori oboleesa keesani harre taanaani looni taanaani ka jige kara d'aatu ch'iisu agartani bira indabriina qarqaara kaasafi.
Nad'eeni woya d'iiraa inkeyaatini, d'iirtileeni woya nad'eeni inkeyaatini; wonti akanatiifi AABBO Waaqi keesani nama waan akana kana tolchu injibba.
Yo isani ato yaatanu mana simpirre mukha ira yokhaani lafati agartani, ka haati okhokaani ira teetu, yokhaani ilmaani bira teetu, had'aafi ilmaani woliini infud'atina.
Ilmaani fud'ad'a ammo haad'a gad'iisa, aka wonti ch'ufti isanii tolte guyyaani keesani d'eeratu.
Hojja isani mana hareesa jaarratani gubba isaa woini marsa. Duuba yo nami iraa d'aqate duele isani inhaalatu.
Harreefi looni, hojja lafa qotani, wolti inhid'ina.
Woya dabassafi booftani wolkeesa mid'aasani inkeyaatina.
Yo nami dubra fuud'e niiti tolfate, eegi suni isi jibbe,
ammalle d'araani himate maqa isii yake, Intalti tuni gaafa anini fuud'ele dubraaniti jed'e,
duuba abbaafi haati intalaa ha woya worri ira rafe, ta d'iiga qabdu, fuute jaarole dira garsiiftu.
Duuba abbaani intala waan jaaroleeni jed'u, Anini qara intala tiyya tana fuud'aa nama kanaa kenne, ammo inni amma ya isi jibbe.
Ammalle inni ya waan d'araatiini himate, gaafa anini fuud'ele isiini dubraaniti jed'e. Ammo wonti aka intalti tiyya dubra garsiiftu d'ugaani woya tana, me d'iiga isi laala!
Duuba jaaroleeni dira suni ha nama intala fuud'e suni fuute d'aantuti.
Ammalle ha gati qarsi d'ibba toko ira fuud'ani abba intalati kennaniti. Waan inni intala gosa Israeli gurra balleesefi. Ammalle isiini niituma isaa taati, dandae haguma jiru illakisu.
Ammo yo wonti inni himateeni sunini d'uga taate, ka wonti aka intalti dubra garsiiftu tokoleeni injirre,
duuba worri ha intala ch'icha abbaa durati gabaase, achiti d'iirti dira suni d'akhaani d'aante ijeeftuti. Isiini, ta ato infuud'iini, ka mana abba d'ale keesa jirtu, d'iiraani woliini rafte ya waan taka inargini gosa teenna ta Israeli keesati taate. Akanaani hameenna akasi duraa baatani.
Yo nami niiti nama d'ibitini rafe, isaafi isiile ha ijeesaniti. Akanaani hameenna akasi duraa baatani.
Yo nami intala qaraa nama d'ibi fuud'aa kennani dira keesati arge buufate,
worra lachu ha dira keesaa alati baasani, d'akhaani d'aanani ijeesaniti. Wonti intala ijeesaniifi, waan isiini, ato dira keesa jirtu, ka nami d'aatu miju, iyyu diddefi. Ammalle wonti namicha ijeesaniifi, waan inni intala qaraa nami d'ibi fuud'aa kennani buufatefi. Akanaani hameenna akasi duraa baatani.
Ammo yo ballinna lafati nami intala fuud'a nama d'ibi kennani arge qabe buufate, namicha buufate ch'alla ijeesani.
Ammo intala woma intolchani, wonti akanatiifi isiini wollaala isii ijeesu intolchine. Dubbini tunini dubbi nama gosa ufi had'e ijeeseni wolfakaati.
Inni ballinnuma lafati intala fuud'a namaa kennani arge qabe buufate ato isiini iyyitele qarqaarsa inarganne.
duuba inni ha abba intala suniti qarsi shantama baasuti isiileeni ha niiti isaa taatuti, waan inni isi buufatefi. Haga jiru inni isi illakisini.

Nami kolaasaniifi ka nafa saala muratani ch'ufa ha gumi AABBO Waaqa keesaa kutaniiti.
Ch'abanafi ilmaani inni d'alu, haga d'aloota kud'anneeso, ha gumi AABBO Waaqa keesaa kutaniiti.
Wonti akanatiifi gaafa isani lafa Misiri keesaa baatani, worri sagaleefi bisaani isani d'owate, Baalamu ilma Boeri, ka dira Pethori, lafa Mesopotamia keesa, sobani beese kennaniifi, aka inni isani abaaru.
Ammo AABBO Waaqi keesani Baalamu ch'aqasu dide, abaarsa isaa suni garagalche eeba isanii tolche, waan inni isani jaalateefi.
Haga isani jirtani nagayafi hormaata worra imbarbaadina.
Worra gosa Edomu injibbina, worri fiit'a teesani. Worra Misirile injibbina duri isani lafa isaani teetani.
D'aloota sadeesoti asi ha gumi AABBO Waaqati daraniti.
Hojja isani nyaapa keesaniti duultani, ka isani fulla iti qubattani jirtani, t'uri ch'ufa ufi ira d'owa.
Hojja nami halkani ufiti oobjate ufi t'ureese, inni ha fulla iti qubatani suni bahe, alati hafuti.
Yo lafti galgaloofte, ha bisaani d'iqate, ammalle yo lafti dukanoofte ha deebiuti.
Fulla iti gadi baatani mid'aafad'a.
Miha keesani ka lolaale keesa waan lafaani qotani qabaachu maltani, aka hojja gadi teetani lafa qotaani udaani keesani biyye ira deebiftani.
Waan AABBO Waaqi keesani fulla isani bultani suni isani woliini jiraate, isani qorqorate, nyaapa keesani harka keesaniti kenneefi. Fullaani isani bultani suni ha qulqullo taatuti. Waan hamtu ka infakaanne, ka AABBO Waaqa isaniti garagalcha tokole intolfatina.
Yo tisseeni abba ufii ira baqate isaniti d'eete, abbaati indeebisiina.
Inni ha dira keesani ka fed'u ke tauti, isa indabsina.
Ammalle beese kara sharmut'oma kanaani argatani Mana AABBO Waaqa keesani d'uftani, waan kakhatani Waaqaa baaftani tolchitani imbaasina. AABBO Waaqi sharmut'oma akana kana guddo jibba.
Nama gosa teesani intahini, yo iraa fud'attani womaaniti, ammo gosa teesani ta Israeli woma iraa infud'atina. Yo isani aada tana jabeesitani, AABBO Waaqi keesani, lafa isani fud'atani iti qubachu geetani keesati, waan isani tolchitani ch'ufa keesa isani eebisa.
Ammo yo AABBO Waaqati kakhachu baattani wollaala inqabdani.
Ammo yo fed'i teesani gula kakhattani, jabeesa guuta.
Hojja oobru zabibu, ta nama d'iibi, keesa yaatani, mid'aani haguma feetani nyaad'a, quufa, ammo tokoleeni ingalatina.
Ammalle hojja oobru biilaa ta nama d'ibii, keesa yaatani, mid'aani haga feetani harkaani t'ururad'a nyaad'a ammo tokole hamtuni inhaamiina.

ammalle yo isiini deemte niiti nama d'ibi taate,
ka ammalle nami sunileeni isi jibbe, tatabe lakisuni iti keenne, ufi jala baase, yokhaani yo nami isii fuud'e sunini due,
duuba d'iirsi isii ka qara kaani, ka isi ufi jalaa baase isiini akasi taate, deebie maro lameeso niiti intolfatini. Wonti akanatiifi, yo inni maro lameeso deebie fuud'e ya AABBO Waaqa durati waan hamtu tolche. Isani waan hamtu akana kana lafa AABBO Waaqi isanii kennu keesati tolchu himmalle.
Hojja nami d'io nad'eeni fuud'e, huji askarti yokhaani huji ala d'ibi, ta worra ira isa fageesitu, intolchini; isa ganna toko huji iti inkennina, ha worra keesa tae niiti isaa woliini gammadani.
Nama woergiftani, d'akha daakhu qabdo ira infud'atina. Yo iraa fuutani ya worra suni waan worri sagaleeni mid'aafatu d'owaitani ijeeftani.
waan AABBO Waaqi keesani, gaafa isani lafa Misiri keesaa baatani, karaati Miriamu tolche qaabad'a.
alati eega, ha inuumani isaanii d'ufuuni.
Yo inni hiyyeesa tahe, woya suni imbulchina halkanuma suni deebisaafi;
galgala ch'ufa akasuma tolcha, aka inni woya sunini rafu duuba inni sii eebise, AABBO Waaqileeni sii eebisa.
Guyya ch'ufa, ato aduuni ind'iine, beese guyya suni inni hojatteefi kennaafi; wonti akanatiifi inni hiyyeesa, beese suni male woma inqabu, guddo heregata. Hojja isani kennuufi baatani, inni maro teesaniifi AABBO Waaqati bohe, isanileeni wollaala argattani.
Qaabad'a, aka isani duri lafa Misiriti tisse taatani, ammalle aka AABBO Waaqi achii isani baase: Tanaafi anini arra seera kana isanii kenna.
Hojja oobru teesani ta ejersa mid'aani isii guurattani, mid'aani isani iraa hafe iti dachaatani inguuratina: ka hafe sunini sagale keessumatifi, ilmaani hiyyeeyitifi nad'eeni hiyyeeyiti.
Hojja mid'aani zabibu guurattani, ka hafe iti dachaatani inguuratina; sagale keessumatifi ilmaani hiyyeeyitifi, nad'eeni hiyyeeyiti.
Haguma jirtani aka isani duri lafa Misiriti tisse taatani inded'ina; tanaafi anini arra seera kana isanii kenna.

Hojja nami lama jaaroleti woli himate jaaroleeni dubbi qorte, toko d'ugaa murte, kaani wollaala iti murte,
duuba namicha wollaala iti murani, yo inni ule male, jaarsi dubbi mure kaani ufi durati gadi ch'ibsise garaa lafati gombise nama d'iibiini, D'aana jed'a. Haguma wollaala isaa gula isa d'aanu malani.
Dandaani maro afurtama d'aanani, ammo hagasi iraa indabarsina; yo hagasi ira d'aantani, nama keesani ya nama ch'ufa durati ch'eersitani.
Qotiyo hojja mid'aaniini d'aantani afaani inhid'ina.
Ilmi qara isiini d'altu ka d'iirsa isii ka due taha, aka gosa Israeli keesa maqa isaa badu d'owani.
Ammo yo oboleesi nama due sunini niiti suni fuud'u infeene, isiini ha gaara jaarole d'at'e, oboleesi d'iirsa kiyya ya na fuud'e maqa d'iirsa kiyya gosa Israeli keesa badu d'owu didde jette himattu.
Duuba jaaroleeni dira suni ha isa yaamte gaafatu. Yo inni jaarolele irati anini isi infuud'u jed'e dide,
niitiini oboleesi isaa ira due sunini ha jaarole dura d'ufte, kobe isaa toko faana baafte, hanch'ufa fuulati tufte waan jettuuni, Wonti namicha niiti oboleesa isaa d'aalu dide tolchani tana.
Duuba gosa Israeli keesa, worra isaa worra namicha kobe ira baasani kaani jed'ani yaamani.
Yo ato nami lama ka d'iira woldidu, niitiini toko d'iirsa kalchaa d'ufte namicha kaani nafa saala qabde,
inahiinaafi harka iraa kuta.
Mana keesani keesale d'akha woini biimani, ka haga haga, ka toko gudda, ka kaani diqa, inqabaatiina.
Waan biimitani ch'ufa d'uga gula biima aka lafa AABBO Waaqi keesani isanii kennu keesati guyyaani keesani d'eeratu.
AABBO Waaqi nama waan hamtu tolche nama dabsu ch'ufa injibba.
Worri sunini Waaqa insodaanne, tanaafi worri dudda duubani, ka isani dad'abi injirre, isani had'e, nama yau dad'abe isani jalaa hafe fit'e.
Tanaafi duuba eegi AABBO Waaqi keesani lafa ch'ufa isanii kenne, nyaapa isaani d'aatu jiru ch'ufa isani dura baase, lafa nagaya tolche, jabaad'a, worra gosa Amaleki ch'ufa hobaasa, aka deebiani maqa worra nami lafa irati inqaabanne. Dubbi tana inded'ina.

Eegi lafa AABBO Waaqi keesani isanii kennu fud'attani iti qubattani,
nami keesani ch'ufti mid'aani qara inni muratu dadu keesa kaye, fulla AABBO Waaqi keesani fohate, ta iti kad'atani taani, ha geesuti.
Duuba qaallicha guyya suni huji harkaa qabu gara isaa d'aqa waan jettani, Nu arra AABBO Waaqa keennati himna, aka lafa inni ababoota teennati kakhate fud'anne iti qubanne.
Duuba qaallichi kaani dadu isani iraa fuud'e fulla sorio AABBO Waaqa iti baasani taani dura kaya.
Duuba AABBO Waaqa durati isani dubbi tana jettani: Ababooni keenna nama gogodaanu, ka gosa Arami, ka worra ufii fud'ate lafa Misiri keesa qubate tae. Worri gaafa achii d'aqe nama diqa, ammo eege gosa guddo irre qabdu tahe.
Worri Misiri waan hamtu nu tolche nu dabse tisse nu tolche.
Duuba nu AABBO Waaqa ababoota teennati bone, inni boha teenna d'agaye gaargalafi d'ibafi d'ipu teenna arge.
Inni harka isaa jabaani lafa Misiri keesaa nuu baase, waan mamatiifi ka mamisa tolche, nama sodaachise mudamsiise.
Inni arma lafa aananifi dammi aka lola yauni nu d'ufe nuu keenne.
Tanaafi amma nu AABBO Waaqa mid'aani qara muranne bamanaafi.
Duuba dadu suni AABBO Waaqa dura kaya, isa kad'ad'a.
Waan dansa AABBO Waaqi keesani isanifi worra keesaniti kenne jed'a galata deebisaafi: ammalle isanifi worra Lawitifi keessuma isaani keesa jirtuleeni woliini gammada.
waan AABBO Waaqaani jettani, Qoodi qulqullooni Waaqaa baasani mana keenna keesati inhamne, nu yayu worra gosa Lawifa, worra gosa teenna intahini fa, ilmaani hiyyeeyifa, ammalle nad'eeni hiyyeeyile akuma atini nuuni jette kennine. Nu seera kanke tokole inch'absine, yokhaani indeene.
Nu gaafa bone taka qooda suni inyaanne yokhaani mana keenna keesaale taka infuune, gaafa qulqullo intahini; ammalle nu taka nama due jenne qooda suni keesa fuune d'ibaayu imbaamne. Nu ya dubbi AABBO Waaqa keenna ch'aqamne. Nu waan atini tolchi nuuni jette ch'ufa ya tolchine.
Fulla tante qulqullo ta gubbati gadi laali, worra kanke ka Israeliti eebisi; ammalle lafa atini ababoota teenna kakhate nuu kennite, ta aananifi dammi aka lola yau jed'ani eebisi.
Arra AABBO Waaqi keesani seerafi aada tana ch'ufa guuta isaaniini jed'a: tanaafi garaa keesani ch'ufaani jabeesa guuta.
Arra ya AABBO Waaqa keenna jettani himattani; ammalle nu ya AABBO Waaqa gula yaane, seerafi aada isaa guunne, dubbi isa gula yaane jettani.
Arra AABBO Waaqi ya gumi ufii isani tolfate, akuma inni duri kakhate; ammalle inni, seera kiyya ch'ufa guuta isaniini jed'a.
Inni gosa d'ibi ch'ufa, ta inni uume ira isani guddisa, isanileeni isa faarsitani maqa isaa guddiftani. Ammalle, akuma inni kakhate, isani gumi qulqullo AABBO Waaqa keesani taatani.

Jennaani Musafi jaaroleeni Israeli waan biyyaani jette, Dubbi nu arra isaniti himnu tana ch'ufa ch'aqasa.
Guyya galaana Yordani taakitani lafa AABBO Waaqi keesani isanii kennu seentani, d'akhaye gugurdo old'ad'aaba, d'ooba, lumut'a,
duuba dubbi seera kana ch'ufa irati t'aafa. Hojja isani lafa AABBO Waaqi keesani ababoota teesani kakhate ta aananifi dammi aka lola yau seentani,
ammalle ka isani galaana Yordani taakitani gama jirtani, d'akhaye taani gaara Ebali ira old'ad'aaba, akuma anini arra isaniini jed'e gula, ammalle d'ooba, lumut'a.
Artiti waan sorio AABBO Waaqa keesani irati baasani d'akha taka nami sibiilani imboch'iniini jaara.
Wonti akanatiifi waan sorio irati AABBO Waaqa keesani baaftani d'akha boch'aniini mid'aasu himmalle. Achiti sorio gubani baasa,
ammalle sorio wold'ageeti qala nyaad'a, AABBO Waaqa keesani durati gammada.
D'akhaye lumut'ani suni irati aka dansaa dubbi seera AABBO Waaqa ch'ufa t'aafa.
Jennaani Musafi qaaloleeni gosa Lawi waan gumi Israeli ch'ufaani jette, gumi Israeli, ch'allisa, ch'aqasa. Arra isani ya gumi AABBO Waaqa keesani taatani.
Tanaafi dubbi isaa ch'aqasa, seerafi aada isaa, ta anini arra isanii kennu, guuta.
Jennaani Musani waan worra Israelitini jed'e,
Eegi isani galaana Yordani taakitani, gochiti tunini ha gaara Gerizimu gubba ejajiti, hojja guma Israeliti eebisani: Simeoni, Lawi, Yuda, Isakari, Yusufu, Benjamini,
ammalle gochiti tunini d'ibiini ha gaara Ebali ira ejajitu. Hojja gumi Israeli abaarani, Reubeni, Gadi, Asheri, Zabuloni, Dani, Naftali,
worri gosa Lawi ha qonqo olfud'ate dubbi tana gumiti lalabu.
Duuba gumiini ch'ufti ha Amini! jettu.

Duuba gumiini ch'ufti ha Amini! jettu.
Duuba gumiini ch'ufti ha Amini! jettu.
Duuba gumiini ch'ufti ha Amini! jettu.
Duuba gumiini ch'ufti ha Amini! jettu.
Duuba gumiini ch'ufti ha Amini! jettu.
Waaqi nama d'ossani nama ijeese ha abaaruti.
Duuba gumiini ch'ufti ha Amini! jettu.
Waaqi nama gumbo fud'ate, nama woma keesa injirre ijeese, ha abaaruti.
Duuba gumiini ch'ufti ha Amini! jettu.
Duuba gumiini ch'ufti ha Amini! jettu.

Yo isani AABBO Waaqa keesani saalfattani, eebiti tunini ch'ufti isani d'aqabde teesanii taati.
AABBO Waaqi dirafi oobru teesani eebisa.
AABBO Waaqi isani eebise, nama taanaani mid'aani oobru taanaani, loonifi ree taanaani isanii horsiisa.
AABBO Waaqi mid'aani isani muratanifi sagale isani mid'aani suniini d'aabdani isanii eebisa.
AABBO Waaqi fulla isani baatanifi ta isani seentanile isanii eebisa.
AABBO Waaqi nyaapa keesani, yo inni isani had'u, isani qarqaare isani dabsachiisa. Worri gama toko d'ufe isani had'e, ammo gamuma ch'ufa fulla deefate isani baqata.
AABBO Waaqi keesani huji teesani eebise kod'o teesani mid'aaniini guuta. Lafa inni isanii kennule keesati isani eebisa.
Yo isani AABBO Waaqa keesani saalfattani seera isaa guuttani, akuma inni kakhate inni gumi isaa qulqullo isani tolcha.
Duuba gochiti lafaa ch'ufti aka AABBO Waaqi, worri kunini kiyya jed'e isani fohate argite isani sodaatti.
AABBO Waaqi isani horsiise, isani daraarse, ilmaani heddu, isanii kenne, loonifi mid'aani heddu lafa inni ababoota teesaniti kakhateti isanii kenna.
Inni bokaya gannaafi hagayya gubbaa isani bane, isani bad'aase, huji teesani ch'ufa eebisa. Duuba isani gosa heddu woi liqeesitani ammo namu iraa iliqefattani.
AABBO Waaqi gosa ch'ufa keesa eege isani intolchu ammo mata isani tolcha. Isani guyya tokole oldeemtani male gadi indeemtani, yo isani seera anini arra isani kennu kana jabeesitani guuttani,
ammalle dubbi tana tokole mirgaafi bita iraa goru diddani yokhaani waaqa d'ibi inkad'anne.
Ammo yo isani AABBO Waaqa keesani saalfachu diddani, seerafi aada isaa, ta anini arra isanii kennule jabeesitani guutuu diddani, abaarsi kunini ch'ufti isani d'aqabe isani qabata.
AABBO Waaqi dirafi oobru teesani abaara.
AABBO Waaqi mid'aani isani muratanifi sagale isani mid'aani suniini d'aabdani inabaara.
AABBO Waaqi isani abaare hormaata isani d'owa, nama taanaani, mid'aani oobru taanaani, loonifi ree taanaani waan ch'ufa isaniti diqeesa.
AABBO Waaqi fulla isani seetaniifi ta isani baatanile inabaara.
Yo isani waan hamtu tolchitani AABBO Waaqa diddani inni abaarsafi d'ibafi, d'ipu isanitini d'ufa, haga isani balleesani Yoosu fit'aniti.
Inni d'ukuba isaniti buuse, d'ukubi sunini isani ira bahuu dide, lafa amma isani fud'attani iti qubachu geetani tana nama tokole hafu d'owe, ira isani balleesa.
AABBO Waaqi d'ukuba akana kana isaniti buusa: d'ukuba aka hiiqafa, nafa nama iitaufi qand'o fa, ammalle d'ulla; inni oolafi bubbe hamtu, ta mid'aani keesani gubde balleesitule, isaaniiti buusa, gaargali kunini isani iraa imbahu, haga isani hobaataniti.
Bokaya isanii irroobu, biyyeeni teesanileeni godde aka d'akha taati.
Fulla bokaya AABBO Waaqi awaarafi hobombolati isaniti buusa, haga isani hobaataniti.
AABBO Waaqi harka nyaapa keesaniti isani kenne, nyaapi keesani isani dabsata. Isani qajeela toko d'uftani worra haatani, qajeela torba duraa baqattani, ammalle gochiti lafa ch'ufti, yo waan isani tolchani kana agarte, mudamte isani ira naati.
Yo isani dootani, reefa keesani allaatifi bineensa alati nyaata, nami isani ira d'owu injiru.
AABBO Waaqi d'ulla isaniti buusa, akuma inni worra Misiri tolche, isani ch'itoftani, gillindooftani mimiyo guurtani fayyu dad'abdani.
AABBO Waaqi maraache, ila isani d'owe, woi isani wollaalchisa.
Guyya gudda aka balla jaanjurtani, duuba kara gula yaatanile wollaaltani, wonti keesani tokoleeni eeba inqabdu. Yo ch'ufa isani gaargalchani, isani saamani, ammo nami isani qarqaaru injiru.
Isani dubra kad'attani, ammo nama d'ibiiti isani dura buta. Isani mana jaarratani, ammo keesa inteetani, isani zabibu oobritani ammo mid'aani isii inyaatani.
Looni keesani isani durati qalani, ammo fooni isaani inyaatani. Harre teesani, ato isani agartanu, isani duraa fud'atani, ammalle isanii indeebisani. Hooliye teesani nyaapa keesanii kennani nami isanii deebisu injiru.
Ato isani gartanu ilmaani teesani d'iirafi dubrale nyaapati gurgurani. Isani guyya ch'ufa ila baaftani aka ilmaani teesani isanii galtu eeddani, ammo inagartani.
Gosa isani imbeenneti mid'aani isanii iti gaargaltani qotattani isani iraa saame nyaata, ka nami hojja ch'ufa isani dabse aka hama isani gaargalchu.
Gaargali kunini qalbi isani d'owe isani maraacha.
AABBO Waaqi d'ullaa isani haguma jirtani infayyine jilbaafi miila keesaniti buusa, d'ullaani sunini miilaafi gubbee matale isani qabata.
AABBO Waaqi isanifi hayyu keesani lafa nyaapa, ta isanifi ababooti teesani taka inargini, isani geesa; achiti isani waaqa mukhaafi d'akha iraa mid'aasani kad'attani.
Lafa AABBO Waaqi iti isani geesuti, biyyiti isani ira rifate, isani goyeesite, isani tufati.
Isani mid'aani guddo lafati fach'aaftani ammo diqo murattani, wonti akanatiifi mid'aani keesani ch'ufa awaanisati balleesa.
Isani zabibu oobritani aka dansaa qorqorattani, ammo mid'aani ira inguuratani yokhaani daad'i ira ind'uddani, wonti akanatiifi raamoti balleesa.
Ejersi lafa teesani ch'ufati baha, ammo d'ad'a ejersa tokole ira inargani, wonti akanatiifi mid'aani ch'ufti iraa jigani.
Isani ilmaani dubrafi d'iira d'altani, ammo teesani intaatu, wonti akanatiifi imboojiani.
Mukhaafi mid'aani keesani ch'ufa awaanisati balleesa.
Keessumani lafa teesani keesa teetu hormaata gula oldeemti, ammo isani gadi deemtani.
Worri waan isani liqeesu qaba, ammo isaani waan liqeesitani inqabdani. Worri mata keesani tahe, isani eege worra taatani.
Abaarsi kunini ch'ufti isani d'aqabe isani qabate isani balleesa, waan isani AABBO Waaqa keesani saalfachu diddani, seerafi aada isaa, ta inni isanii kenne guutu diddaniifi.
Abaarsi kunini akheekhafi qaabacha isanifi d'aloota keesani haga jiru jireenna taha.
Waan isani AABBO Waaqa keesani gammadafi qilit'amani hojachu diddaniifi, ka inni waan ch'ufa keesa isanii eebise.
Isani nyaapa keesani ka AABBO Waaqi isaniti ergu, qullafi beelafi d'eebuuni hojattani, waan ch'ufa d'abdani. Ammalle qaampara sibiila isaniti kayani, isani balleesani.
AABBO Waaqi gosa isani afaani isii ind'ageenne muumme lafati isaniti erge, worri aka risa isani ira bua.
Worri sunini worra fuula hamama, ka naasu inqamne, ka, nami kunini diqa yokhaani gudda injenne.
Worri kunini loonifi mid'aani keesani nyaate, hormaata isaani d'owe isani hobaasa. Worri mid'aani, daad'i, d'ad'a, loonifi reele tokole isanii inhambisu, haga isani hobaataniti.
Worri dira lafa AABBO Waaqi isanii kennu kana marse had'e, d'akha jaba dira sunini marsani jaarani, ka isani abdattani, jissa.
Hojja nyaapi keesani dira keesani marse had'e isani beeloftani waan nyaatani d'abdani gaargaltani, ilmaani AABBO Waaqi keesani isanii kennele nyaatani.
Nami dureesi, ka bulti dansa qabu ka t'uri ch'ufa lagatuleeni gaafa dira keesani marsani isaani had'ani ufi jibbaate, ilmaani ufii nyaata, maro inni sagale inqamneefi. Inni oboleesafi niiti isaa ta inni jaalatufi ilmaani isaa ta haftule ingahuuni.
Niitiini dureetiini, ta bulti dansa qabdu, ta t'uri ch'ufa lagatu, ta taka miilaani garu indeeminileeni, akasuma taati. Hojja nyaapi dira isii marse had'e, isiini beelofte, ufii jibbaate, d'ossani ilmaani isii ta d'alteefi aka ufile nyaati. Isiini d'iirsa isii ka jaalatufi ilmaani isiileeni ingeetu.
Yo isani dubbi seera, ta kitaaba kana keesati t'aafani, jabeesitani guutu diddani, ammalle maqa jaba ka AABBO Waaqa keesani ka guddisani ulfeesani sodaachu diddani,
inni isanifi d'aloota keesani d'ukuba nami haguma jiru infayyinefi gaargala nami haguma jiru keesaa imbaane, isaniti buusa.
Inni ammalle d'ukuba hama isani lafa Misiriti agartani, ka isani sodaatani, isaniti buuse fayyu dad'abdani.
Ammalle d'ukubafi gaargala, ka kitaaba seera kana keesati int'aafinile, isaniti buusa, haga isani balleesaniti.
Ato isani lafa ira dabartani urji gubba fakaatanile isani namuma diqaati hafa, waan isani dubbi AABBO Waaqa keesani ch'aqasu diddaniifi.
Akuma AABBO Waaqi qara isani jaalate isani horsiise daraarse, akasuma inni isani jibbe, isani balleese daara isani baasa. Lafa isani fud'attani iti qubachu geetanile ira isani godaansisani.
AABBO Waaqi lafa ch'ufa keesa haga muumme lafaa gargari isani firfirse, achiti waaqa d'ibi, ka mukhafa d'akha iraa mid'aasani kad'attani, ka isanifi ababooti teesani taka inkad'atiini.
Fulla isani baatani tokoleti nagaya ingargattani, fullaani tunini tiyya dandeetani injettani. Ammo Waaqi achiti onne wosodaatufi ila woma ingarrefi garra sagale infeene isanii kenna.
Guyya keesani imbeetani; halkani guyya wosodaatani, haguma jirtani bulti inargattani.
Waan isani agartani ch'ufa sodaattani, onneeni isani hargufamti. Diirama ch'ufa, galgali yoomi gaha jettani, galgalale, diirami yomi gaha jettani.
AABBO Waaqi hobolooni lafa Misiriti isani deebisa, ato qara inni, Deebie achiti isani indeebisu jed'ele. Achiti isani tissooma ufi gurgurtani, ammo nami tokoleeni ka isani bitatu injiru.

Tunini dubbi wold'aqisa ta AABBO Waaqi Musani, lafa Moabu keesati, worra Israeliti himi jed'e; dubbini wold'aqisa tunini dubbi AABBO Waaqi gaara Sinaiti dubbateniti ta d'ibi.
Musani worra Israeli ch'ufa wolti yaame waan jed'eeni, Isani ila teesaniini waan AABBO Waaqi hayyu Misiritiifi hojattu isaatiifi lafa isaa ch'ufu tolche ya agartani.
Ammalle gaargala hamafi akheekhafi waan mama jabdu AABBO Waaqi tolche, ya agartani.
Ammo haga arrale AABBO Waaqi qalbi wo hubattufi, ila waagartuufi, gurra wo d'agauule isanii inkennine.
Haga ganna afurtama AABBO Waaqi lafa aloo ta gamooji keesa isani dura deeme, woya teesanifi kobeeni teesanileeni taka inch'ich'inne.
Isani taka qit'a nyaatani daad'ifi yokhaani farso ind'unne, ammo AABBO Waaqi liqimsa isanii kenne, aka inni Waaqa keesani ufi isani beesise.
Ammalle gaafa nu armaani baane, hayyu Sioni ka lafa Heshbonitifi hayyu Ogu ka lafa Bashani d'ufani nu had'ani. Ammo nu worra dabsanne,
lafa worraa fud'anne, gosa Reubenitifi Gaditiifi ta Manase ta haga garitini gargari qoodanne.
Tanaafi dubbi wold'aqisa tana jabeesa guuta, aka wonti isani tolchitani ch'ufti isanii toltu.
Isaniini ch'ufti arra AABBO Waaqa keesani dura ejitani — worra gugurda mata gosatifi jaarole, d'iira,
nad'eeni, ijoolle, worra gosa d'ibi, ka isani keesa tae qoraani isani ch'abse bisaani isanii d'aqu.
Wonti arra asi d'uftaniifi, aka wold'aqisa AABBO Waaqi keesani isanii woliini tolfatu fud'attani,
aka AABBO Waaqi amma tana gumi ufii isani tolche, Waaqa keesani isani tahu, akuma inni isanifi ababoota teesani, Abrahamu, Isaaqofi Yakobooti kakhate.
Nami AABBO Waaqi wold'aqisa kana woliini tolfate isani ch'allaniti.
Inni nu ka arra arma fuula isaa dura d'umneefi, ilmaani teenna ta qara ind'alatini wold'aqisa woliini tolfata.
Finna keenna ka lafa Misiritiifi ka lafa biyya, ta nu keesa godaanne d'umne, inqaabatani.
Isani waan hamtu, ka worri mukhaafi d'akhaafi qarsiini boch'e mid'aase aka waaqa kad'atu, ya agartani.
