inni nama isati d'iaatu wonte tahafi!
AABBO male Waaqi d'ibiini injira? Isa male siida jalati d'okhannu d'ibi inqamna?
Nami irre na tahu Waaquma kana, isumati kara naa hara.
Inni harka kiyya huji woraana barsiise, aka anini guube t'iya jabduuni wohad'u.
Ee, AABBO Waaqa, atini wonte naa taate na baafte, qarqaarsi kankeleeni ya guddinna naa kenne.
Atini kara naa ballifte, miila kiyya gufachu d'owarte.
Anini nyaapa kiyya reebe dabsad'e, haga balleesuti yaala imbahu.
Anini worra d'ae buuse lafaa kau d'owe, worri miila kiyyati jige jala ch'iisa.
Atini humna woraana naa kennite, nyaapa kiyya na dabsachiifta.
Atini nyaapa kiyya na dura baqachifte, aninileeni nama na jibbu balleesa.
Worri qarqaarsa barbaade, ammo nama worra baasu d'abe.
Worri AABBO Waaqa yaamate, ammo inni worra jalaa dida.
Anini worra daakhe aka biyye d'ukeese,
aka d'oqe kara keesati ira sirba.
Atini worra kiyya ka nati gamu, dura na baafte,
finna anini nama fidu jabeesite.
Worri duri anini imbeneleeni amma na jalati bulla.
Sidiini d'ibileeni na durati jilbifate, qonqo tiyya d'ageennaani na ch'aqafte.
Worri nahe hollate fulla keesati d'okhate gayae.
AABBOONI Waaqa jiru! Siida kiyya ha faarsani!
Waaqa jaba ka na baasu guddinna isaa odeesa.
Inni nyaapa kiyya na dabsachiise, sidi d'ibi na jalati bulche,
nyaapa kiyya jala na baase.
Ee AABBO Waaqa, atini nyaapa kiyya
na dabsachiifte worra hamama jala na baafta.
Waaqi dabsacha guddo hayyu isaati kenna, ammalle nama fohate muude
haga jiru ch'ufa jaalata, Daudifi d'aloota isaa ch'ufa, haga jiru jireenna.

Daudini, ilmi Yese, nama Waaqi guddo guddise toko, ka Waaqi Yakobo hayyu fohate. Ammalle inni nama faaru heddu Israelii baase. Dubbini isaa ta eege tana:
Lubbuuni AABBO Waaqa afaani kiyyaani dubbate,
inni arraba kiyyaani wod'aamate.
Waaqi Israeli dubbate, siidani Israeli waan nani jed'e:
Hayyuuni d'ugani lafa fidde seera Waaqa gula deemu,
adu ganama duumansa male baatu,
ta fit'eesa ganama bibilisitu, fakaata.
AABBO Waaqi d'aloota kiyya akasuma eebisa.
Waan anaafi inni wold'aqisa hegeri woliini tolfanne,
wold'ageeti haguma jirtu imbannefi
kakhu injijiramne wolti kakhanneefi.
Woni anini fed'u tanuma, tanumati dabsacha na taha, Waaqileeni tana inuma guuta.
Nami Waaqa imbeenne akuma qorati alati gadigargatani jira,
nami torkoleeni dandae harkani inqabatu.
Nami qorati suni qabachu fed'u sibiilafi yokhaani woraana male dandae inqabatu.
Qorati suni fulluma isiini jirtuti gubani balleesani.
Kunini maqa askarti Daudi ta gurra qabdu; nami qara Yasheb-Bashebethi ka lafa Hakemoniti bahe, inni worra sadeeni gugurda kaaniti mata; inni woraana isatini nama d'ibba saddeeti had'iisa guyya toko keesati hobaase.
Worra sadeeni suni keesa nami nama matati aanu Eleazari ilma Dodai, ka balbala Ahohi. Guyya toko isaafi Daudini duula worra Filisti ka had'iisa wolti baheeti, qoma d'aatani fokorani iti ga d'ufani. Worri Israeli iraa d'eete.
Ammo inni chochou dide worra Filisti suni had'uma had'e ato ituma jiru, harki isaa goraadeti gogoge gad'iisu dad'abe. Guyya suni AABBO Waaqi worra Israeli dabsacha guddo kenneefi, duuba eegi had'iisi hobae, worri fulla Eleazarini jiruti dachae, worra fit'ani kaani miha lola iraa hikhate.
Worra sadeeni kaani keesa nami sadeeso shama, ilma Age, ka lafa Harariti d'ufe, gaafasi worri Filisti oobru d'engo guddo keesa Lahiti wolti bahe. Worri Israeli worra Filisti baqate,
ammo Shamani oobru suni keesa chochou dide worra Filisti had'e fit'e. AABBO Waaqi guyya sunile worra dabsacha guddo kenneefi.
Gaafa mid'aani murani, askarti sodoma keesa jari sadeeni jajanni kaani goda adulamu, fulla Daudini jiru, ka gaafasi worri Filisti bale Refaimu keesa jiru, d'ufe.
Gaafasi Daudini gaara jabeesani jarani kaani gubba jira duuba askartini Filisti d'ufte, dira Bethlehemu keesa qubatte.
Daudi oodooni worraa qabate jennaani waan jed'e, Ato nami bisaani anini d'ugu eela fullo Bethlehemu d'aatu jiru keesaa na fuud'e akami dansa!
Worri askarti ka gurra qabu kaani sadeeni olla Filisti duude eela kaani keesaa bisaani woraabe Dauditini gale. Ammo inni d'ugu dide fulla d'ugu AABBO Waaqaa d'ibaayu baase.
Waan jed'e, AABBO Waaqa, anini bisaani kana dandae ind'ugu! Yo d'uge nama d'iiga worra lubbu ufi jibbaate kana d'uga fakaad'a jed'e, d'ugu dide.
Wonti jabduuni worri askarti sadeeni gurra qabdu suni tolchite tana.
Abishaini, oboleesi Yoabu, ka ilma Seruya, gudda askarti nama sodoma suni. Inni woraana ufitini nama d'ibba sadii had'e fit'e akanaani worra sodoma kaani keesa gurra baafate.
Inni worra sodoma kaani ch'ufa iraa jabaate, gudda worraa tahe, ammo hataatuti gurri isaa haga worra kaani sadeeni ind'umne.
Benaiyani, ilmi Yehoyada ka lafa Kabseeliti d'ufeleeni, nama askarti toko ka guddo gurra qabu; inni waan jannooma heddu tolche, askarti Moabu jajannale nama lama ijeese guyya toko, ka lafti aka hama d'aamotu, inni boola toko seene keesati nyeench'a ijeese.
Ammalle inni namicha Misiri gudda toko ka woraana bode gudda qabu, bokuuni d'ae qabe, woraana iraa fud'ate, woraanuma isaa sunini ijeese.
Sunini ch'ufti waan Benaiyani, ka askarti nama sodoma taani keesa jiru, jannoomaani tolche.
Inni askarti suni keesa guddo maqa qaba, ammo haga jara kaani sadeeni ingahu. Daudini isa fuud'e, gudda jara isa eegu tolche.
Jari askarti sodomani kaani kana:
Asaheli, oboleesa Yoabu,
Elhanani ilma Dodo ka Bethlehemu d'ufe,
Shamafi Elika, ka Harodi d'ufani,
Helesisi ka Peloni d'ufe,
Ira ilma Ikeshi, ka Tekoa d'ufe,
Abiezeri ka Anathothi d'ufe,
Nebunai ka Husha d'ufe,
Salmoni ka Hahohi d'ufe,
Maharai ka Netofathi d'ufe,
Helebu ilma Baana ka Netofathi d'ufe,
Itai, ilma Ribai, ka Gibea lafa Benjamini keesa d'ufe,
Benaiya ka Pirathoni d'ufe,
Hid'ai, ka bale lafa Gaashiti d'ufe,
Abialboni ka lafa Arabati d'ufe,
Azmawethi ka Bahurimu d'ufe,
Eliaba ka Saalboni d'ufe,
ilmaani Yoashemti
Yonathani
Shama ka Harani d'ufe,
Ahiamu, ilma Sharari, ka Harari d'ufe,
Elifelethi, ilma Ahasbai, ka lafa Makati d'ufe,
Eliamu, ilma Ahithofeli, ka Gilo d'ufe,
Hezro ka Karmeli d'ufe,
Paarai ka Arabi d'ufe,
Igali, ilma Nathani, ka Soba d'ufe,
Bani ka Gadi d'ufe,
Seleki ka Amoni d'ufe,
Naharai ka Beerothi d'ufe, ka miha lola ka Yoabu baatu,
Irafi Garebu, worra Yatiri d'ufe,
Uria ka gosa Hiti.
Worri kunini ch'ufti wolti nama sodomi torba.

AABBO Waaqi ammalle worra Israeliti dallane duuba Daudi worrati kaase waan jed'eeni, Beeni, worra Israelitiifi ka Yuda hedi,
jennaani Daudini Yoabu gudda askarti isaa yaame waan jed'eeni, Beeni askarti tante fud'ad'i, gosa Israeli ch'ufa haga Dani iti keeyate Beershebati d'aabi, hedi, anini henna worraa haga beekhu fed'a.
Yoabuni waan hayyichaani jed'e, Ee hayyicha, AABBO Waaqi kanke gosa Israeli harka d'ibba haga amma ira dabarse sile lubbu d'eerese si argisisina. Ammo Ee hayyicha atini maanifi aka henna akana tolchani feeta?
Ammo hayyichi Yoabufi askarti isaa dubbi guuchisiise worri kae isa biraa yae worra Israeli heddu d'aqe.
Duuba worri galaana Yordani taake Aroeri, dira bale Gadi keesa jiru, qubate. Arti mirga kaani Yaseriti qajeelani.
Gileadi ira bahani, Kadeshi ta lafa Hititi iti d'aabatani. Ammalle arti kaani Daniti iti d'aabatani, artiti kaani Sidoni lafa Danini ila adu qajeelani.
Achile bitaa iti d'aabatani, dira Tiro ka aka jajaba jaajaaraniti qajeelani, achile dira heddu worra Hivitifi ka Kanaaniti dabrani, duuba eege qit'isu Beersheba, ta lafa Yudatini bitaa, d'ufani.
Akanaani eegi jia sagalifi bulti diddama lafa ch'ufa keesa marani Yerusalemuni bahani.
Worri henna nama woraana guutu hayyichatini d'ufe waan jed'eeni, Nami Israeli 800,000, nami Yuda 500,000.
Ammo Daudini Eegi henna namaa hobaase, heregi hamaani isa qatabe jennaani inni waan AABBO Waaqaani jed'e, Anini ka waan akana kana tolche ya guddo daallae waan hamtu tahe, biraa naa deemi.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi waan raaga Daudi ka Gadi jed'aniini jed'e, Beeni d'aqi, Daudini waan jettu, AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, waan sadi woli bira qabad'u ka feetu gula bahi kama tateefu siumaa tolcha. Boriyyaate Daudini lafaa kaanaani
Gadini isati gad'ufe waan jed'eeni, Waan AABBO Waaqi siini jed'u kana kami fohata? Oola ganna sadi ta lafa tanteeti d'uftu mo? Jia sadi ka nyaapa kanke baqatu mo? Guyya sadi ka ch'iisi d'ukuba lafa teeti d'ufu? Duuba amma heregi, toko gula bahi qonqo anini AABBO Waaqatini deebiu nati himi.
Daudini waan Gadini jed'e, Anini ya ufi jibbaadd'e, lubbuuni na d'ufte harka namaatiini duu imfed'u tanaafi AABBO Waaqumani, ka naasu qabu, ha waan fed'u nu tolchu.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi ch'iisa d'ukuba hama, ka haga diirama suni worra qabate guyya inni fohate kaaniti muumme bahe, worra Israeliti buuse, Danifi Beersheba jiddu nami kuma torbatama hobae.
Malaikaani Waaqaa Yerusalemu balleesiti kurfefate, jennaani, AABBO Waaqa herega badi ka namaani balleesu suni jijirate, waan malaika worra hobaasu jirtuuni jed'e, Laki! ta qaraatu ya geete, yaalabai! Yo suni malaikaani oobdi Arauna, ka gosa Yebusi, d'aatu ejiti.
Daudini malaika biyya fit'u jirtu arginaani waan AABBO Waaqaani jed'e, Nami wollaala qabu, ka wo balleese anuma, worri woma keesa injirre kunini maani yake? Atini sila anaafi worra kiyya balleesu malte.
Guyyuma suni Gadini gara Daudi d'aqe waan jed'eeni, Beeni, oobdi Arauna d'aqi, achiti fulla sorio iti qalani AABBO Waaqa jaari
Daudini jecha AABBO Waaqaa guute, akuma Gadini jed'eeni kaani kae tolche.
Araunani millate, hayyichafi jara isaa gugurda, ka gara isaa gad'ufu arge, jennaani Daudi durati gajed'e.
Waan jed'eeni, Ee hayyicha, naguma arma d'ufte?
Daudini waan jed'eeni, Naguma d'umne, oobdi tante tana bite, fulla sorio AABBO Waaqa iti qalani jaaru fed'a, aka ch'iisa d'ukuba hama kana balleesani.
Araunani waan jed'eeni, Fud'ad'u, AABBO Waaqa waan feetu ch'ufa irati baasiifi, ee hayyicha sangoleeni qotiyo ta atini gubde sorio baaftuleeni tana; qaamparafi mukhi mid'aani irati d'aanani ka atini aka qoraani bobosituleeni kanuma.
Waan akana ch'ufa Araunani hayyuti kenne waan jed'eeni, AABBO Waaqi waan atini baaftu kana ch'ufa ha sira fud'atu.
Ammo hayyichi waan jed'eeni, Laki, anini hori sii baasa; anini sorio woma iti imbaasini AABBO Waaqa kiyya baasu infed'u, duuba hayyichi oobdifi sangoota taani qarsi shantamatini iraa bite.
Jennaani fulla sorio iti qalani AABBO Waaqaa jaare, sorio gubanifi sorio wold'ageeti Waaqaa baase. Akanaani AABBO Waaqi kad'acha isaa d'agae ch'iisa d'ukuba hama suni worra iraa balleese.

Hayyu Daudini jaare hobae jennaani jari isaa woya iti uyise, ammo woyaani sunileeni d'aamocha isa ind'owarre.
Duuba jari isaa waan isaani jed'e, Ee hayyicha, eegi, dubra si barbaanna, ta sii wahelchite si qorqorattu. Isiini ha si d'aatu ch'iifte nafa si owiftu.
Jennaani Israeli ch'ufa keesa nama ergani, dubra mimid'aadu barbaadani, lafa Shunami keesati intala toko ta Abishagi jed'ani argani hayyuutini d'ufani.
Isiini guddo mid'aadu, hayyichaa hojatte guddo isaa qorqorate, ammo inni taka bira imbulle.
(Abbaani isaa taka, atini maanifi akana tata jed'e isaa indalansimne. Inni guddo fuula mid'aaga, d'alootale Absalomuti aana.)
Inni Yoabu ilma Seruyatifi qaallicha Abiatharini wolhaasaani, worrileeni dubbi isaa gula gale qarqaare.
Ammo qaallichi Sadoki jed'anifi, Benaiya ilma Yehoiaditifi raaga Nathani jed'anifi Shimeifi, Reifi askartini Daudi eedduleeni, goli Adonia tau didde.
Guyya toko Adoniani holafi loonifi yabbiye gagabbo qale, fulla d'akha Bofa jed'ani, ta d'aatu maddo Enrogeliti, sorio baase. Inni ilmaani hayyu Dauditifi hojattu hayyu ta gosa Yuda jila suniti yaame,
ammo oboleesa isaa Solomonifi raaga Nathani jed'anifi Benaiyafi askarti Daudi eeddu taani tokole iyyaamne.
Hojja atini lubbu tanteetifi ta gurba kanke Solomoni baasu feete, gorsa kiyya kana d'agayi,
hayyu Daudi d'aqi, waan jettuuni, ee hayyichi, atini duri nati kakhatte, ilmi kanke Solomonini fulla tiyya hayyu taha nani injenne? Adoniani akami amma hayyu tahe re?
Duuba ato atini teete dubbi suni isati himtu anileeni d'ufe dubbi tante d'ugeesa.
Jennaani Bathshebani gara hayyu d'at'e, fulla inni ch'iisuti iti d'ufte. Inni waan jaare hobae, Abishagi intala lafa Shunamiti d'ufte taaniti isa qorqorachu jira.
Bathshebani d'ufte isa durati gadi jette jennaani inni waan jed'eeni, Atini maani feeta?
Isiini waan jetteeni, Atini duri maqa AABBO Waaqa kanketini nati kakhate, ilmi kanke Solomonini eegi tiyya hayyu taha nani jette, ee hayyicha.
Ammo Adoniani yayu hayyu tahe, ka atini quba inqamne.
Inni ya loonifi yabbiye gagabboofi hooliye heddu qale, qaallicha Abiathari jed'anifi, Yoabu gudda askarti teeti jila sorio suniti yaame, ammo ilma kanke Solomoni iyyaamne.
Amma tana, ee hayyicha gurri nama Israeli ch'ufti sii ch'aqasa, aka atini nama hayyuma siraa fuud'u lalabdu.
Yo atini akasi tolchu didde, guyyuma atini dootu naafi ilma kiyya Solomonile aka nama hamama woi balleeseti nu heregani.
Ato isiini teete dubbatu, raagi Nathani jed'ani kaani iti olseene.
Jennaani aka Nathanini arti jiru hayyuti himani, Nathanini d'ufe isa durati gadi jed'e,
Waan jed'eeni, Ee hayyicha, atini aka Adoniani hayyuma siraa fuud'u ya lalabde.
Inni arra yayu d'aqe loonifi hooliyeefi yabbiye gagabbo heddu qale, ilmaani tanteetifi Yoabu gudda askarti tanteetifi qaallicha Abiatharile jila suniti yaame, amuma worri tae hayyu Adonia lubbuuni tante ha d'eeratu! jed'e eebisufi jira.
Ammo inni anaafi qaallicha Sadoki jed'anifi Benaiyafi yokhaani Solomoni tokole iyyaamne.
Ee hayyichi, waan kana ch'ufa d'uguma siti tolche, ka nama hayyuma siraa fuud'u hojattu tante tokoleti inhimini?
Jennaani hayyu Daudini waan jed'eeni, Beeni, Bathsheba gayyaami, duuba isiini d'ufte isa dura ejite.
Jennaani inni waan isiini jed'e, Anini maqa AABBO Waaqa, ka gaargala ch'ufa keesaa na baaseni kakhad'a,
aka arra kakhu anini duri maqa AABBO Waaqa Israelitini si kakhad'e, ta anini ilmi kanke Solomonini hayyuma nara fuud'a sini jed'e guutu.
Jennaani Bathshebani durati jilbifate waan jetteeni, Gudda kiyya, hayyu Daudi, lubbuuni tante ha d'eeratu!
Jennaani hayyu Daudini Sadokifi Nathanifi Benaiya nama iti erge yaame. Worri d'ufe,
jennaani waan jed'eeni, Jara na hojatu; yaama woliini yaa, ilma kiyya Solomoni gaange tiyya yaabachisaa, maddo Gohini geesa,
achiti Sadokifi Nathanini ha isa muudani, hayyu Israeli tolchani. Duuba magalata d'aa, hayyu Solomoni lubbuuni isaa ha d'eeratu jed'a lalaba!
Ammalle hojja inni barch'uma kiyya ka hayyuma ira teesuma gadeebule gula yaa. Inni fulla tiyya hayyu taha, wonti akanatiifi inni nama anini fohad'e ka Yudafi Israeli fidu.
Benaiyani waan jed'eeni, Hayye ha tatuuti, AABBO Waaqi kanke guutinna.
Akuma AABBO Waaqi si eebise, ee hayyicha, inni ha Solomonile eebise hayyuma isaa tantele ira jabeesu.
Duuba Sadokifi Nathanifi Benaiyafi askartini hayyu eeddu Solomoni gaange hayyu Daudi yaabachisani maddo Gihoniti geesani.
Achiti Sadokini d'ad'a buuda keesa jiru, ka inni Waaro Woyyuma keesa d'ufeenini muude. Jennaani magalata d'aani, nami ch'ufti, lubbuuni hayyu Solomoni ha d'eeratu jed'e lalabe,
duuba isa gula yaani fulludo d'aani, lalabani gammadani, lafa chochoosani.
Adoniafi worri inni yaame kaani, ato gololfachu jiranu lalaba kaani d'agayani Yoabuni lalaba suni d'agaye jennaani waan jed'e, Iyyanti dira keesa d'ufti tunini maani?
Ato inni dubbachu jiru, Yonathanini, ilmi qaallicha Abiathari, gad'ufe jennaani Adoniani waan jed'eeni, Kooti olseeni, nami dansaani aka keeti kunini silaaftu odu dansa ind'abu.
Yonathanini waan jed'eeni, Hiyo akasiiniti, hayyichi Daudini yayu Solomoni hayyu tolche.
Inni yayu Sadokifi Nathanifi Benaiyafi askarti hayyu eeddu isa gula erge worri gaange hayyuu isa yaabachiise,
duuba qaallichi Sadoki jed'anifi Nathanini fulla maddo Gihoniti isa muudani. Jennaani worri gammade, iyye lalabe dira duude, tanaafi amma diri ch'ufti ya chochoe. Lalabi isani reefu d'ageetani suni,
hayyuuni amma Solomoni.
Tana malele jari hayyu hojatu, hayyicha Dauditi olduude, nagaya fuud'e eebiseefi waan jed'e, Waaqi kanke ha Solomoni sira gurra baafachise hayyuma isaale tante iraa guddisuti. Jennaani hayyu Daudini sire isaa irati gajed'e,
Waaqa kad'ate waan jed'e, Koota, AABBO Waaqa keenna ka Israeli faarsina, ka arra ilmaani tiyya keesa nama toko fulla tiyya hayyu tolche, nale lubbu bulche, waan kana na garsiise.
Jennaani nami Adoniani yaame kaani ch'ufti aka hama mudame, kae gargari namu kara ufi baqate.
Adoniani, ka guddo Solomoni sodaate, kae gara Waaro Woyyuma d'aqe, gaafa waan mesa fakaata kaani qabate.
Jennaani waan Solomonini jed'ani, Adoniani si sodaate gaafa waan mesa fakaata kaani qabate waan jed'e, Hayyu Solomonini ha qara nati kakhatu aka goraadeeni na inijeemne.
Solomonini waan jed'e, Yo inni d'eete wollaala ufi iraa deebie, wonti tokoleeni ta isa tolchani injirtu; ammo yo wollaala irati argani inni kauma duu.
Jennaani hayyu Solomonini nama erge Adonia yaame, gaafa inni qabatu kaani biraa fuud'ani. Adoniani gara hayyu d'aqe durati gajed'e jennaani hayyuuni, Beeni gali jed'eeni.

Daudini guyyaani isa alaa hobae jennaani ilma isa Solomoni yaame dubbi tana iti d'aamate:
Guyyaani kiyya ya alaa hobae, jabaad'u aka d'iira tahi,
waan AABBO Waaqi tolchi sinjed'e tolchi kara isaa gula deemi, aadaafi seera isa, ta Seera Musa keesati t'aafani guuti, aka waan tolchitufi fulla atini deemtu ch'ufa keesa, eeba argattu.
Yo atini Seera isaa guute, AABBO Waaqi kakhu inni naa kakhate, ta gaafa inni, d'alooti kanke worra Israeli mohate haga worri Seera kiyya garaa tokooni jabeese guutu, nani jed'e, sii guuta.
Amma waan isa tolchu malani qalbi tante gula tolchi, ammo ato inni jaarsale taate inni ufiini induiini ijeesi.
Ammo atini isa ka woi intolchini illakisini. Waan tolchu malani atu imbeeta, illakisini ijeesi.
Daudini due jennaani isa diruma isaa keesati awaalani.
Inni ganna afurtama gosa Israeli mohate, ganna torba Hebroni keesa tae, ganna sodomi sadi Yerusalemu keesa tae.
Solomoni hayyuma abbaa isaa iraa fuud'e, aka dansaa jabeese lafa fide.
Jennaani Adoniani, ilmi Hagithi, gara Bathsheba haad'a Solomoni d'aqe. Isiini waan jetteeni, Naguma d'ufte? Inni waan jed'eeni, Ee, naguma d'ufe,
ammo waan siini jed'u qaba. Isiini waan jetteeni waan jechu feetu jed'i.
Inni waan jed'eeni, Atini imbeeta aka hayyumti sila tiyya ammalle nami Israeli ch'ufti ya aka hayyu na heregate. Ammo dubbini suni akasi intaane, oboleesa kiyyati, fed'i Waaqa gula, hayyu tahe.
Anini amma waan toko si kad'ad'a, na ind'owatini naa kenni.
Isiini waan jetteeni hayye dansa, ya d'agaye, hayyuti sii hima.
Jennaani Bathshebani kaate gara hayyu d'at'e aka dubbi Adonia taani iti haasaftu. Hayyichi olkae, haad'a isaa durati gajed'e, nagaya fuud'e barch'uma ufi ira gadi tae, ammalle barch'uma d'ibi isii fuud'e isiini d'aatu isaa moga mirgaa teete.
Isiini waan jetteeni, waan diqo toko si kad'ad'a, na ind'owatini, naa kenni. Ayyo, waan feetu kad'ad'i, sii kenna jed'eeni.
Isiini, Abishagi oboleesa kanke, Adoniaa kenni, ha fuud'uti jetteeni.
Hayyichi waan jed'eeni, Maanifi Abishagi isaa kenni nani jetta, Hayyumale kad'ateefi ho? Qarale inni oboleesuma kiyya gudda ammalle qaallicha Abiatharifi Yoabuleeni gama isaa jirani!
Jennaani Solomonini maqa AABBO Waaqatini kakhate waan jed'e, Waaqi na ijeesinna, hojja anini Adonia inijeesiini, waan inni akasi kad'ateefi.
AABBO Waaqi yayu barch'uma hayyuma ka abba kiyya Daudi naa kenne aka dansaa narati jabeese; inni yayu kakhu ufi guute anaafi d'aloota kiyyaa kenne. Anini maqa AABBO Waaqatini kakhad'a, aka Adoniani arruma duu.
Duuba hayyu Solomonini Benaiya erge, inni d'aqe Adonia ijeese.
Jennaani Solomonini Abiathari huji qaallu AABBO Waaqa keesaa baase, akanaani dubbi AABBO Waaqi duri Shiloti dubbate waan qaallu Eliifi d'alooti isaa tahu hime guute.
Jennaani Yoabuni dubbi suni d'agaye; inni duri goli Absalomu tau dide, ammo eege goli Adonia tahe. Tanaafi inni Waaro Woyyumati d'eete gaafa waan mesa fakaata kaani qabate.
Solomonini aka Yoabuni Waaro Woyyumati d'eete d'aatu waan mesa fakaata kaani eju d'agaye jennaani, Benaiya ilma Yohaida iti erge waan jed'eeni Beeni Yoabu ijeesi.
Inni gara Waaro Woyyuma d'aqe waan Yoabuni jed'e, Hayyichi, gadi bahi siini jed'a. Ammo Yoabuni waan jed'eeni, Anini ind'ufu, armumati dua. Jennaani Benaiyani hayyuuti deebie waan Yoabuni isaani jed'e iti hime.
Solomonini waan jed'eeni, Waan inni fed'u tolchi, artumati ijeesi awaali. Aka akanaani anaafi worri keenna nama tokole d'iiga nama woma iyyakini ka Yoabuni fit'e ingaafanne.
AABBO Waaqi Yoabu ingaargalcha, waan inni, ka abbaani kiyya Daudini quba inqamne, worra suni fit'eefi. Inni nama lama ka woma iyyakini, ka isa ira jiru, ijeese: Abineri gudda askarti Israelitiifi Amasa gudda askarti Yuda.
D'iigi worraa gubba Yoabutifi d'aloota isaa haga jiru jireenna taha. Ammo AABBO Waaqi ha hojja ch'ufa Daudifi d'aloota barch'uma isaa ka hayyuma ira tau eebise nagaya kennufi.
Jennaani Benaiyani kae Waaro Woyyuma d'aqe Yoabu ijeese, worra isaa ka diida jiruti isaa awaalani.
Hayyichi fulla Yoabu Benaiya gudda askarti tolche, fulla Abiathari Sadoki qaallu tolche.
Jennaani hayyichi Shimei yaame waan jed'eeni, Yerusalemu keesati mana jaarad'i, dira suni keesaa imbahini keesuma tai.
Yo atini guyya tokole armaa baate galaana Kidroni taakite, atini inuma doota. D'iigi kanketileeni gubbuma teeti.
Shemeini waan jed'eeni, Hayye, ha taatu, Ee hayyichi, waan atini jettu inuma guuta. Duuba akanaani inni bara heddu Yerusalemu keesa tae.
Duuba eege, eegi inni ganna Sadi tae, tisseleeni Shemei lama baqate hayyu Gathi, ka Akishi ilma Maaka jed'aniini baate. Shemeini aka tisseleeni isaa lafa Gathi jirtu d'agaye jennaani,
harre ufi faate, gara Akishi hayyu Gathi d'aqe, tissele suni barbaade. Inni worra arge jennaani fuud'e galeeni.
Solomonini waan Shemeini tahe d'agaye jennaani,
isa yaame waan jed'eeni, Anini maqa AABBO Waaqatini si kakhachiise aka atini dira kana keesa garu ind'anne. Ammalle anini si gorse yo atini armaa baate indoota jed'e siti hime atinileeni, Hayye, dansa inguuta nani jette.
Atini maanifi duuba kakhu suni ch'absite dubbi tiyya gula deemu didde?
Ammalle hayyichi waan Shemeini jed'e, Waan hamtu atini abba kiyya Daudi tolchite aka dansaa beeta maro ch'ubbu sunitifi AABBO Waaqi si gaargalcha.
Ammo inni na eebise hayyuma Daudi haga jiru jireenna jabeesa.
Jennaani hayyichi Benaiya yaame, Beeni, Shemei ijeesi jed'eeni; jennaani inni kae ijeese. Akanaani Solomonini aka jaba lafa suni ch'ufa fide.

Solomonini dubra hayyicha Misiri fuud'e akasiini isaani wold'aqani. Inni isii dira Dauditini d'ufe achi teesise, haga inni mana ufitifi Mana AABBO Waaqatifi Yerusalemule d'akhaani marse jaaruuti.
Gaafasi Mana AABBO Waaqa taka injaare, tanaafi nami fulla heduti sorio Waaqaa baasa.
Solomonini AABBO Waaqa jaalate, dubbi abba isaa Daudi gula deeme, ammo innileeni fulla heduti sorio Waaqaa baase hit'aanale aarsefi.
Gaafa toko inni Gibeoni d'aqe sorio baase, wonti akanatiifi fullaani suni fulla fulla ch'ufa ira jabdu ta sorio iti baasani. Inni qara sorio kuma gube fulla suniti baase.
Halkani suni AABBO Waaqi oobju keesa isati d'ufe waan jed'eeni, Ana maani sii kennu feeta?
Solomonini waan jed'eeni, Atini duri hojattu tante abba kiyya Daudi guddo jaalate, innileeni guddo sii saalfate d'ugaafi qajeelumani si jala deeme. Atinileeni akasuma isaa naate, ilma arra fulla isaa lafa mohatu isaa kennite.
Ee AABBO Waaqa, atini yayu fulla abba kiyya hayyu na tolchite, ato anini daima aka nama fidu imbeenne taatele.
Anini amma jiddu gumi atini fohate jira, gumi heddu muumme inqamne.
Tanaafi amma qalbi anini gumi tante tanaani d'uga gula fidu naa kenni, aka anini waan dansaafi hamtu gargari beekhu. Yo atini qalbi naa inkennini, anini akami dandae gumi tana fida?
AABBO Waaqi waan Solomonini kad'ate suni iraa gammade.
Waan jed'eeni, Waan atini jireenna kanke d'eera, yokhaani hormaata, yokhaani badi nyaapa keeti kad'achu didde, qalbi kara d'uga gula namaani fiddu na kad'ateefi,
anini waan atini kad'ate suni amma sii tolcha. Anini qalbiifi hubacha ta nami haguma d'alate inargatini, yokhaani ta nami tokoleeni haguma jiru inarganne sii kenna.
Ammalle waan atini inkad'atinile sii kenna: Atini hormaatafi, guddinna, ka hayyuuni d'ibiini taka inargatini, jireenna kanke keesa argata.
Ammalle yo atini dubbi tiyya ch'aqafte aadaafi seera kiyya guute, akuma Abba kanke Daudi anini lubbu sii d'eereesa.
Jennaani Solomonini damaqe oljed'e tae, aka dubbini suni oobju hubate. Inni Yerusalemu d'aqe, Sanduqa Wold'aqisa AABBO Waaqa dura eje, sorio gubanifi sorio wold'ageeti AABBO Waaqaa baase. Eegi suni hojattu isaa ch'ufa wolti yaame jila tolcheefi.
Guyya toko sharmut'i lama wolhimacha hayyu dura d'ufe.
Toko waan jetteeni, Ee hayyicha, anaafi niitiini tunini mana tokoti woliini galla; ato isiini artuma jirtu anini ilma d'iira d'ale.
Anini haga d'ale lama bule jennaani isiileeni ilma d'iira d'alte. Anaafi isii male nami tokoleeni mana suni keesa injiru.
Jennaani halkani toko isiini danu daima isii ira ch'iifte ijeefte.
Duuba lafaa kaate gama kiyya dabarte na duuba daima kiyya fud'atte, ka isii ka due kaani na jala keete.
Boriyyaate anini lafaa kae daima hosifad'a jennaani reefuma ch'alla arge. Anini aka dansaa ilale aka daimi sunini kiyya intahini hubad'e.
Ammo niitiini taani waan jette, Hiyo akasiiniti, daimi jiru kunini kiyyuma ka dueti kanketi! Niitiini qara taani waan jette, Akasiiniti, daimi due keeti ka jiru kiyya, duuba worri akasi hayyu durati wolmorme.
Jennaani hayyichi waan jed'e, isani lachu daimi jiru kunini kiyya, ka dueti kanke jettani irati wolmormitani.
Duuba hayyichi, goraadeeni na koota jed'e, jennaani d'ufaninifi.
Duuba inni waan jed'e, Daima jiru kana wod'akati gargari kuta, nad'eeni tana lachu gama gama kennaafi.
Jennaani niitiini haad'a daima suni aka male daima sunii naate, waan hayyuuni jette, Ee hayyicha, daima kana inijeesiini, isii kenni. Ammo niitiini taani waan jetteeni, Nuu tokole inkennini, gargari kuti.
Jennaani hayyichi waan jed'e, Daima inijeesiina, niiti qaraa sunii kenna, haati isaa suni.
Worri Israeli aka hayyuuni dubbi suni mure d'agaye jennaani, guddo isaa sodaatani saalfatanifi, wonti akanatiifi worri yayu aka Waaqi qalbi d'uga gula woini murani suni isaa kenne hubate.

Solomonini hayyu worra Israeli ch'ufa tahe,
worri gugurdaani gaafasi isa jala hojatuleeni kana: Azariani, ilmi Zadoki, qaallu isaati;
Elihorefufi Ahiyaani ilmaani Shisha jara isaa wo t'aafu; Yehoshefathini, ilmi Ahiludi, gudda worra wo t'aafe olkayuti.
Benaiyani, ilmi Yehoiada, gudda askarti isaati; Sadokifi Abiatharini qaalole isaati;
Asariani, ilmi Nathani, nama arda ka nama fidu ch'ufa isati iti mata; qaallichi Zabudini, ilmi Nathani nama hayyu mala d'au;
Ahisharini nama mana hayyu hojattu isati iti mata; Adoramuni ilmi Abda jara irreeni nama hojachiisu isati iti mata.
Solomonini nama kud'ani lama ka arda lafa Israeli fidu, tolche. Worri suni namu arda ufi keesa ganna ch'ufa keesa jia toko sagale barbaade hayyufi worra isaati geesa.
Maqaani worra kud'ani lamaani sunitifi ardaani worri fiduleeni kana: Benhuri: Lafa gareeni Efraimu.
Bendakari: dira makasi, Shaalbimu, Beth-Shemeshi Eloni, Beth-Haanania,
Benhesedi: Dira Arubothifi Sokofi ammalle lafa Hejeri ch'ufa.
Benabinadabu, ka intala Solomoni ta Tafathi jed'ani fuud'e: lafa Dori ch'ufa.
Baana ilma Ahiludi: dira Taanaki, Megido, ammalle lafa d'aatu Bethsheani ch'ufa ta d'aatu dira Sarethani, ka Yezreelini bita, haga dira Abel-Meholatifi dira Yokmeamu.
Bengiberi: dira Ramothi ka Gileadi keesatifi, ollowaani balbala Yaeri ka gosa Manase ta Gileadi keesatifi Arda Argobu ka Bashani keesa; ardaani kunini ch'ufti dira jaatama qaba. Ka kamu d'akhaani Marsani jaarani, ka balbala iti mid'aasani danqarro sibiila diimaatini ch'ufaani.
Ahinadabu ilma Ido: lafa Mahanaimu;
Ahimaasi ka intala Solomoni ta Baemathi jed'ani fuud'e lafa Naftali;
Baana ilma Hushai: arda Asheritifi dira Bealothi;
Yehoshefathi ilma Parua: lafa Isakari;
Shemei ilma Ela: lafa Benjamini.
Geberi ilma Uri: arda Gileadi, ka duri Sioni hayyu Amoritifi Ogu hayyu Bashani fidani, worra kud'ani lama kana male nama d'ibi toko jira ka arda suni ch'ufati mata.
Worri Yudatifi ka Israeli heddate, lafa ira dabre Maansa afaani galaana fakaate, quufafi gammada, bad'aad'a keesa taani.
Solomonini nama lafa suni ta haga galaana Efratiti ejite lafa Filistitifi seera lafa Misiriti ejitu fide. Worri damoosa isaa baase haga inni jiru ch'ufa isa jalati bule.
Wonti worri Solomoni guyyaati sooratu tana: dargaye daakhaani ta kintaala shantamatifi boshe kintaala d'ibba toko;
looni kud'ani ka manati okhayani gagabbisanifi looni diddama ka ala oolaatifi ree d'ibba tokole; hori kana malele bineensa aka hiddifa gadamsafa saalafa ammalle lukufa.
Solomonini lafa galaana Efratini ila adu ch'ufa fide, haga Tipsa fuud'e Gazati d'aabe. Hayyooti galaana Efratini ila adu ch'ufti isa jalati bulte, ammalle inni lafa d'aatu isale ch'ufa nagayaani woliini tae.
Haga inni jiru ch'ufa worri Israelitiifi ka Yudaleeni, ka haga Dani eje Beershebati eju, nagayaani tae, nami ch'ufti oobru ufi ta zabibutifi ta oda keesa nagayaani tae.
Worri kud'ani lama ka arda lafa Israeliti mata, ka worri namu jia iti heregani gula Solomonifi nama worra isaa keesati golofatu ch'ufa sagale kennufi, waan sooratani ch'ufa worrumati hojja ch'ufa d'ufani.
Ammalle worri kunini garbuufi okhayale farda gaari hirkisefi fardoole d'ibile d'ufaani, hojja fed'ani ch'ufa.
Ammalle Waaqi qalbiifi heregafi hubacha guddo muumme inqamne Solomonini kenne.
Solomonini worra qaroota ilaborutifi worra Misiri ch'ufa qarooma ira qaba.
Inni nama ch'ufa ira qalbi qaba Ethani ka gosa Esrahi, Hemani, Kalkoli, Darda, ilmaani Maholi, inni worra kana ch'ufa ira qalbi qaba, gurri isaa lafa d'aatu jirtu ch'ufa gahe.
Inni mammaasa kumsadi baase, faaru kumtokofi shanile baase.
Inni mukha haguma hind'eesa Lebanoniti iti keeyate mukeeni didiqo mana ira baatu ch'ufa muumme baase ch'ufa waan isaa dubbate: Ammalle bineensafi simpireefi waan lafa ira loatifi qurt'umile ch'ufa waan isii dubbate.
Hayyooti lafa ch'ufa aka inni qalbi qabu d'ageete, nama iti ergite aka worri suni dubbi isaa ch'aqasu.

Hayyu Hiramuni, ka lafa Tiro, haguma duriti jaala Daudi; inni aka Solomonini fulla abba isaa hayyu tahe d'agaye jennaani nama iti erge
Solomonileeni d'aamsa kana Hiramuti erge:
Atini imbeeta, aka maro woraana nyaapa isaatiifi abbaani kiyya Daudini Mana AABBO Waaqa isaa keesati kad'atani jaaru dad'abe, haga AABBO Waaqi nyaapa isaa ch'ufa isa dabsachiisuti.
Ammo amma tana AABBO Waaqi kiyya lafa tiyya ya gama ch'ufa nagaya tolche. Anini nyaapa yokhaani waan hamtu tokole woma inqabu.
AABBO Waaqi waan abba kiyyaani jed'e, Ilma kanke ka anini fulla tante hayyu tolchuti Mana naa jaara. Duuba anini amma Mana suni, ka AABBO Waaqa kiyya iti kad'atani, jaaru fed'a.
Duuba amma hojattu tante Lebanoniti naa ergi, ha hind'eesa na gadi ch'irtuti hojattuni tiyyaleeni hojattu tante woliini hojati, ammalle hori waan atini baasi jettu ch'ufa anini imbaasafi. Atini imbeeta, nami keenna tokoleeni aka worra keesani ka Sidoni mukha ch'iru imbeekhu.
Hiramuni d'aamsa Solomoni d'ageennaani aka male gammade waan jed'e, Arra maqa AABBO Waaqa ha faarsani, waan inni ilma qaro akana kana Daudii kenne, ka hayyuma isa iraa fuud'e gosa guddo akana tana fidu!
Jennaani Hiramuni dubbi tana Solomoniti erge waan jed'e, Anini qoonqo tante ya d'agaye, waan atini feetu sii tolcha, hind'eesafi mukha jajaba d'ibi ch'ufa sii ch'ira.
Jari kiyya mukha Lebanoni ch'ire baariiniti gajisse, achiti wolti hid'ani aka bisaani galaana suni fuud'ani fulla atini feetuni d'ufani. Duuba achiti jari kiyya gargari hiikhe, jari kanke guurata. Atini gama kanketini sagale jara kiyya kennu malte.
Duuba Hiramuni hind'eesafi mukha jajaba d'ibi ka Solomonini fed'u kenneefi,
Solomonileeni dargaye kintaala kuma diddamatifi d'ad'a d'ebbe kuma diddama ganna ch'ufa kenneefi, aka inni jara isaatini gololchu.
AABBO Waaqi Solomoni qalbi kenne kakhu ufi guute. Hiramufi Solomonini wold'aqani nagayaani woliini taani.
Hayyu Solomonini nama kuma sodoma irreeni Israeli keesaa wolti guure hojachiise,
Adoramu gudda worraa tolche. Inni worra suni fulla saditi gargari qoode, nama kuma kud'ani jia ch'ufa Lebanoniti erge, ka ira hafe worrati lakisa.
Ammalle Solomonini nama kuma saddeetama ka d'akha boch'u gareeniti erge, ammalle nama kuma torbatama ka d'akha baatule faana worra erge.
Ammalle nama kuma sadiifi d'ibba sadii mata worra suni tolche.
Jecha hayyu gula worri d'akha gugurda dadansa boch'eni yayaba Mana Waaqaa tolchani.
Worri hogeyi ka Solomonitifi ka Hiramutifi ka dira Bibilosi d'akhaafi mukha Mana Waaqa sunini jaarani kurfeese.

Ganna d'ibba afurifi saddeetama eegi worri Israeli lafa Misiri keesaa bahe, ganna afreeso ka Solomonini worra Israeli fide, jia lameeso ka Zifu jed'ani Solomonini huji ijaarsa Mana Waaqa suni iti keeyate.
Mani Solomonini AABBO Waaqa jaare d'eerinni isaa d'und'uma jaatama, ballinni d'und'uma sodoma, old'eerinnileeni d'und'uma sodoma.
Ammalle mana suni fuula isaa dura mana d'ibi iraa jaarani, ka d'eerinni isaa d'und'uma kud'ani ka ballinni d'und'uma diddama, ka ballinni isa haguma ballinna mana kaani.
Dereshani mana suni garaa keesani ballate alaani d'ipata.
Ammalle Mana suni gama ala fuula dura male moga ch'ufa marsani, waan aka manatini jaarani, fulla heduti gargari kukutani.
Kutaani ch'ufti ta mana jala aanu ballinni isii d'und'uma shani, ka mana jiddu keesa d'und'uma jaa, ka mana gubba aanu d'und'uma torba. Girgidaani mana suni fulla maneeni wolgubbati jaarani taanini akuma wolti aanuni qaqalata aka kutaani maneeni suni girgida mana guddati ejaanjite, utuba taateefi, duuba mani suni utuba d'ibi imbarbaanne.
D'akhaaye Mana sunini jaarani qara fulla keesaa qotaniti boch'ani mid'aasani, aka hojja mana suni jaaru jirani nami kokeesa burisa yokhaani d'agara yokhaani sibiila taatefu tokole ind'ageenne.
Balbalti kuta mana jala aanutini seenani mana gudda sunini gama bitaa jirti, nami yo gubba koru fed'u faano gula olkore mana jiddutifi ka gubba aanu seena.
Duuba akanaani Solomonini Mana Waaqa jaare hobaase gubba isaale mukha hind'eesatini kabe duuche.
Maneeni sadeeni wolgubbati jaarani taani, ka mani, ch'ufti d'und'uma shani old'eeratule ch'ufa isumati jaare. Maneeni sunile mukha hind'eesatini Mana guddaani woltid'aabani.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi waan Solomonini jed'e waan mana kanale ch'aqasi,
hojja atini dubbifi seera kiyya ch'ufa guute, anini waan duri abba kanke Daudii kakhad'e sii guuta.
Anini mana atini jaartu kana keesa worra kiyya ka Israeli woliini tae, deebie worra illakisu.
Akanaani Solomonini Mana suni jaare hobaase.
Girgida garaa keesa mukha hind'eesatini mid'aasani haguma jala fuud'ani gubbati d'aabani garaa Mana keesa lafale mukha jajaba d'ibiini mid'aasani.
Kuta garaa keesa, ta Fulla Fulla Ch'ufa Ira Qulqullo jed'ani gama dinqa mana suniti jaarani. Kuta suni d'eerinni isii d'und'uma diddama, ammalle isi mukha hind'eesatini bada mana kaani iraa kutani haguma jala fuud'ani gubbati d'aabani.
Badaani suni, ta Fulla Fulla Ch'ufa Ira Qulqullooti aantu, d'eerinni isii d'und'uma afurtamati.
Mana suni, garaa isaa ch'ufa keesa hind'eesani mid'aasani d'akha mullachu d'owani ammalle hind'eesa suni gubbati buqefi daraara fakeesani boch'ani ch'okhani.
Inni dinqa Mana suni mid'aase, aka Sanduqa Wold'aqisa AABBO Waaqa achi kayani.
Dinqi suni d'eerinnafi ballinafi old'eerinni isaaleeni d'und'uma diddama, ammalle ch'ufa worqi ch'allaani ch'okhani mid'aasani. Waan sorio irati baasanile mukha hind'eesatini mid'aasani.
Mana suni garaa isaa ch'ufa worqiini mid'aasani ch'okhani, ammalle sansalata worqi balbala dinqa ka worqiini mid'aasaniti kayani.
Mana suni, keesa isaa ch'ufafi waan sorio irati baasani, ka Fulla Fulla Ch'ufa Ira Qulqullo keesa jirule worqiini mid'aasani.
Akheekhi sunini lachu waan ch'ufaani akuma takaa jira. Lachu koola lama qaba, koola ch'ufa d'eerinni isaa d'und'uma shani; duuba akanaani kooli suni d'und'uma kud'ani wolhanqata gara fit'etini.
Akheekha suni lamaani wold'aatu Fulla Fulla Ch'ufa Ira Qulqullo naqani, aka kooli isaani lamaani jiddu dinqa suniti woltuqe, kooli lamaani kaani girgida mana tuqu.
Ammalle akheekha waan koola suni lachu worqiini mid'aasani ch'okhani.
Girgida badatifi ka dinqale ch'ufa akheekha waan koola qaba ka boch'anifi meet'ifi daraaraani ch'okhani.
Lafale ch'ufa worqiini ch'okhani mid'aasani.
Fulla Fulla Ch'ufa Ira Qulqullooni olseenani balbala lama ta mukha ejersatini mid'aasani iti mid'aasani, fiit'eeni balbala suni jiddu keesani gaafa fakaati.
Balbala sunile akheekha waan koola qabaati ka boch'anifi meet'ifi daraaraani ch'okhani mid'aasani, ammalle balbalafi waan koola qabaafi meet'ile worqiini mid'aasani.
Ammalle balbala bada mikhikila mukha ejersatini gama afraaniti mid'aasani.
Ammalle balbala wolti ch'abdu mukha jajabaani mid'aasani.
Akheekha waan koola qabati ka boch'anifi meet'ifi daraaraani ch'okhani mid'aasani, ka ch'ufa worqiini mid'aasani.
Ammalle Mana suni dura naabo jaarani, ta mukha ejersatifi d'akhaani woli ke makhani jaarani, d'akha sadi ka wolgubbaa naqani ch'ufa gula mukha toko dagalchani kayani.
Mana suni jia lameeso ka Zifu jed'ani, ganna afreeso ka haga Solomonini hayyu tahe, yayabani.
Jia saddeeteeso ka Buli jed'ani, ka haga Solomonini, hayyu tahe ganna kud'ani tokeeso, Mani suni akuma qara heregani jaarame hobae. Ijaarsi mana suni ganna torba fud'ate.

Solomonini mana ufile jaarate; ijaarsi mana sunileeni ganna kud'ani sadi fud'ate.
Mana isaa suni, ka Mana Badda Lebanoni jed'ani, d'eerinni isaa d'und'uma d'ibba toko, ballinni shantama, old'eerinni sodoma. Utubani mana suni afurtami shani ka fulla sadi ch'ororsani, kud'ani shanishanini d'ad'abani, isaafi dareerani isaaleeni ch'ufti mukha hind'eesa. Mana sunile hind'eesani kabani duuchani, ammalle kabani suni kuta keesati hind'eesani kabani duuchani, ammalle kabani suni kuta keesati woi olnaqani ta utubani jabeesanile geeti.
Ammalle mana suni gama lachu deresha fulla sadi ch'ororsani wolgubbati jaarani.
Balbalafi dereshani mikhikila qabdi, ammalle dereshani fulla sadi ch'ororsani wolgubbaa jaarani gama lachuunu woli ilaala.
Ammalle Solomonini galma d'eera ka utuba heddu qabu jaare, d'eerinni isaa d'und'uma shantama, ballinni d'und'uma sodoma. Ammalle galma suni ch'icha isaa gaadisa iti jaarani, ka gubba duuchani utuba jala d'ad'abani.
Ammalle mana d'ibi jaarani, ka barch'uma Solomoni ka hayyuma keesa kayani, inni artiti dubbi mura. Mana sunini, mana dubbi iti qorani jed'ani, ammalle jalafi gubbale mukha hind'eesatini keesa mid'aasani.
Maneeni tana ch'ufafi naabo guddole d'akhaaye dadansaani jaarani, haga jala fuud'ani gubbati d'aabani. D'akhaaye suni ch'ufa lafa keesa qotani, biima taka gula boch'ani, keesafi ala isii sibiilani qajeelchani.
Yayaba waan suni ch'ufa d'akhaaye gugurdo lafa keesaa qotani achumati mid'aasanini jaarani; d'akhaayeeni suni hagi toko d'und'uma saddeeti hagi tokoleeni d'und'uma kud'ani.
D'akhaaye yayaba suni guba d'akhaaye d'ibi naqani, ka biima gula boch'ani, ammalle dareera hind'eesale gubba naqani.
Naaboni mana hayyuutifi naaboni Mana Waaqa ta garaa keesatifi mani mana gudda iraa jaarani ka qara olseenanileeni girgida mukha hind'eesatifi d'akhaani wolkemakhani jaarani qaba — d'akha sadi ka wolgubbaa naqani ch'ufa gula mukha toko dagalchani kayani.
Hayyu Solomonini namicha hogeesa toko, ka guddo sibiila diima tumu beekhu, ka maqaani isaa Huramu, ka worri isaa Tiro, yaame.
Abbaani isaleeni gaafa jiru, nama Tiro, innileeni duri hogeesa sibiila diima tumu; haati isaleeni gosa Naftaliti. Huramuni nama qalbi qabu, ka guddo hogeesati. Inni yaamicha Solomoni d'ageennaani d'ufe huji isaa kennani suni ch'ufa guute.
Huramuni sibiila didiima lama, ka aka utuba old'ad'aabani tume mid'aase, ka kamu d'und'uma kud'ani saddeeti, ballinni mata isaaleeni d'und'uma kud'ani lama. Duuba fuud'e balbala Mana Waaqa dura d'ad'abe.
Inni ammalle waan aka sure lama sibiila diima iraa mid'aase, ka kamu d'eerinni isi d'und'uma shani, duuba mata waan aka utuba kaani guba kaye.
Mata utuba suni lachu waan aka lootitifi
waan aka okhoku, ka sibiila diima iraa mid'aasani fulla lama ch'ororsani barreesani ch'okhani.
Waan aka sure kaani, ka d'eerinni isii d'und'uma afuri, aka daraara hooma mid'aasani;
duuba waan aka looti ka barreesanini kaani keesaa olbahu, mata qunquma gubba kayani. Ammalle okhoku d'ibba lama, ta fulla lama ch'ororsani, waan sure fakaata lamaani sunini marsani.
Huramuni utuba sibiila diima suni lamaani balbala Mana Waaqa dura d'ad'abe: ka bita aanuni Yakini jed'ani, ka mirga aanuni Boazi jed'ani.
Wonti hooma fakaata, ka aka sure, ka sibiila diimani mid'aasani, utuba kaani gubba jirti. Duuba akanaani huji utuba suni hobaasani.
Huramuni haro gingiti ta sibiila diimani mid'aasani jaare, ta ballinni afaani isii d'und'uma sodoma ta qilumani isii d'und'uma shani, ta d'eerinni jiddu isii d'und'uma kud'ani.
Afaani haro suni ka ala waan aka buqe, ka sibiila diimani mid'aasani, fulla lama ch'ororsani naqani. Buqefi haro suni sibiiluma taka iraa tumani mid'aasani, ka wolti eju.
Haro suni koromi kud'ani lama, ta sibiila diimani mid'aasani, gubba kayani, ka koromini suni sadi sadiini gama afraanu fuula gama gama deefate ejaanjitu.
Furdinni sibiila haro sunini mid'aasani, haguma ballinna gana harka namaa, afaani isiileeni aka daraara hooma qoqonyatani. Harooni suni bisaani d'ebbe haga kuma lamafa fuuti.
Huramuni ammalle waan aka gaari kud'ani, ka sibiila diimani mid'aasani mid'aase, ka kamu d'eerinni isaa d'und'uma afuri, ballinnileeni d'und'uma afuri, old'eerinni d'und'uma sadi.
Aki waan suni mid'aasani akana: Mikhikila sibiila mimid'aasani sibiila balla d'ibi dirirsani jiddu kayani,
Ammalle sibiila suni irati akheekha nyeench'atifi korma loonitifi ammalle waan koola qaba mid'aasani; ammalle mikhikila ch'ufa ira nyeench'afi korma looni, gubbafi jalale, waan mimich'irani raraasani naqaniti jira.
Wonti aka gaari suni ch'ufti miila afuri, qabdi; miila suni jiddu sibiila dadagalchani naqaniti jira ka sibiila diimani mid'aasani gama gaari suni afraanu waan qorini ira ejituti jira; wonti isiini ira ejitu suni ch'ufti waan mimich'irani raraasani iti naqanini ch'okhani.
Gaari suni gubba marsani mid'aasani jaarani waan aka qori suni gubba d'aabani. Wonti marsani jaaranini suni gaari suni ira d'und'uma toko olbaati. Ammalle d'und'uma tokofi taaku toko gaari suni ira gadi buuti. Ammalle d'aatu isaa tana ch'ufa boch'ani barreesani mid'aasani.
Miili gaari suni, d'eerinni isaa d'und'uma tokofi taaku toko; miili suni sibiila balla dirirsani kaani jala jira, ammalle sibiili dadagalchani ka miila suni jiddu jiruleeni gaarini wolti taka.
Miili isaa aka miila gaari fardi hirkisu jira. Wonti isaani mid'aasani suni ch'ufti haguma geetuuni sibiila diima.
Ammalle gaari suni ch'ufa jala sibiila isa jabeesu ka isuma iraa mid'aasaniti jira.
Gaari suni ch'ufa gubbaa sibiila furdinni isaa taaku tokotini marsani mid'aasani; waan gaari suni jabeesatifi sibiila balla diriira ka garaa keesale, sibiila taka iraa mid'aasani.
Waan gaari suni jabeesafi sibiila balla diriira kaanile yo fullaani fuutu jirate; akheekha waan koola qabatifi nyeench'afi, meet'ini barreesani, ammalle fulla ch'ufa marsani waan mimich'irani raraasani iti naqani.
Duuba aki waan aka gaari suni mid'aasani akasi; gaarini sunini ch'ufti akuma taka jira, waan ch'ufaani wolfakaata.
Huramuni ammalle qori kud'ani mid'aase, aka gaarini ch'ufti toko toko argatu. Qori suni ch'ufa, ballinni isii d'und'uma afuri, ammalle ch'ufti bisaani d'ebbe afurtama fuuti.
Inni gaari shani gama bitaa ka Mana Waaqa naqe, shanile gama mirga naqe; ammalle. Haro taanile moga Mana, ta bitafi ila boru jiddu lamaani jirtu, kaye.
Huramuni ammalle okoteefi baofi, qori mid'aase, duuba inni huji Mana Waaqa, ta hayyu Solomoni jed'e hojate ch'ufa hobaase. Wonti inni mid'aase tana: Utuba lama, waan aka sure lama ta mata utuba suni ira kayani, waan aka okhoku d'ibba afuri ka sibiila diima iraa mid'aasani, fulla lama ch'ororsani waan aka sure lamaani suniti naqani ka fullaani ch'ufti d'ibba toko toko qabdu, gaari kud'ani; qori kud'ani; haroni gingiti; koromi kud'ani lama ta haroni gingitini suni ira ejitu, okoteefi, baofi qori. Miha Mana Waaqa kana ch'ufa, ka Huramuni hayyu Solomoni jed'e mid'aase, inni sibiila diima qulqulleesani iraa mid'aase.
Hayyichi waan akana ch'ufa bale Yordani keesa, jiddu Sukothifi Sarethani, ta biyye faara qabduti, mid'aasa jed'e.
Waan sibiila suni guddo hedutifi Solomonini ulfinna isa inilaale, tanaafi ulfinna isaa nami haga beekhu injiru.
waan ifseeni ira ejaanjitu kud'ani, ta Fulla Fulla Ch'ufa Ira Qulqullo dura ejaanjitu, ta shani gama mirga ejite shanileeni gama bitaa ejitu: Daraara, ifse, qad'abe;
muduunu, waan ifseeni d'aanfani, qori, waan hit'aana keesati aarsani, daboola ch'ile ibidatini fuud'ani; ammalle sibiila mikhikila balbala Fulla Fulla Ch'ufa Ira Qulqullootifi balbala alalle. Miha kana ch'ufa worqiini mid'aasani.

Worri ch'ufti guyya jila Hoosa, jia torbeeso ka Ethanimu jed'ani keesa, wolti d'ufe.
Jaaroleeni sunini ch'ufti wolgeete jennaani, qaaloleeni Sanduqa kaani olfuute,
Mana Waaqati geesite. Jennaani worri Lawitifi qaaloleeni Waaro Woyyumatiifi miha isii guurte Mana Waaqati geesite.
Jennaani hayyu Solomonifi worri Israeli ch'ufti Sanduqa Wold'aqisa durati wolti bahani, loonifi ree heddu muumme inqamne sorio baasani.
Duuba qaaloleeni Sanduqa Wold'aqisa AABBO Waaqa Mana Waaqa olnat'e, Fulla Fulla Ch'ufa Ira Qulqullo akheekha waan koola ka lubbu qaba kaani jala keete.
Kooli isaa ka ballisani gubba Sanduqafi kalcho baataniini d'osse.
Nama Fulla Fulla Ch'ufa Ira Qulqullo dura eju male, nami d'ibiini dandae fiit'e kalcho inargu. (Kalchooni suni arrale achuma jirti.)
Sanduqa Wold'aqisa suni keesa, d'akha hahafalicha lamaani ka Musani gaara Sinaiti keesa kaye, gaafa AABBO Waaqi worra Israeli lafa Misiriti baase wold'aqisa woliini tolfate male, wonti d'ibiini keesa injirtu.
dumansi guddinni AABBO Waaqa keesaa bibiliqu d'ufe, Mana suni duuche, duuba qaaloleeni waan sunifi deebite huji ufi hojachu dad'abde.
Jennaani Solomonini Waaqa kad'ate waan jed'e, Ee AABBO Waaqa, atini adu guba keete, ammo dumansaafi dukana fohate keesati galta.
Amma tana anini yayu mana gudda dansa sii jaare, ka atini haga jiru jireenna keesati galtu.
Ato biyyiti achi ejaanjitu Solomonini fuula worrati deefate worra eebise
waan jed'e, AABBO Waaqa Israeli ha guddisani! Inni yayu kakhu duri abba kiyya Dauditi kakhate guute, ta inni.
Haguma anini gumi tiyya lafa Misiri keesaa baase anini dira tokole lafa Israeli keesati fulla mana kiyya iti jaarani na kad'atani infohanne. Ammo Daudi, anini ya si fohad'e, aka atini gumi tiyya fidu jed'e.
Ammo AABBO Waaqa waan isaani jed'e, Heregi kanke suni dansa,
ammo atini Mana suni na inijaartu, nami Mana suni naa jaaru ilmuma kanke.
Amma tana AABBO Waaqi yayu kakhu ufi guute. Anini huji hayyuma abba kiyya iraa fuud'e, Mana AABBO Waaqa Israeli iti kad'atani yayu jaare.
Ammalle Mana suni keesa anini yayu fulla mid'aase, ta Sanduqa Wold'aqisa kayani Sanduqi, suni d'akha hahafalicha wold'aqisa AABBO Waaqi duri ababoota teennaani woliini tolfate, gaafa inni worra lafa Misiri keesaa baase, qaba.
Jennaani Solomonini gumi ch'ufa dura d'ufe fulla sorio iti qalani eje, harka olfud'ate,
Waaqa kad'ate waan jed'e, Ee AABBO Waaqa Israeli, Waaqi aka kanketi tokoleeni lafafi gubbale injiru! Atini wold'aqisa gumi tanteetiini woliini tolfatani jabeesite, jaalala tante worra garsiifta, hojja worri garaa tokooni si gula yau.
Atini kakhu abba kiyya Dauditi kakhate yayu jabeesite, dubbini sunini ch'ufti arra yayu guutamte.
Tanaafi amma tana, Ee Waaqa Israeli, waan atini abba kiyya Daudi hojattu tanteeti kakhate ch'ufa guuti.
Ee AABBO Waaqa kiyya, anini hojattu tanteeti, kad'acha tiyya na d'agayi, waan anini arra si kad'ad'ule naa kenni.
Halkani guyya Mana kana ka atini fohatte, iti na kad'ad'a jette tissi. Hojja anini fuula Mana kanati deefad'e si kad'ad'u na ch'aqasi.
Kad'acha tiyyafi ta gumi tetile, hojja nu fuula armati deefanne si kad'annu, nuu d'agayi, nuu araarami.
Hojja namaani, wo yakite jed'ani himatani, fulla sorio iti qalani ta Mana kanke kana keesa jirtuuni d'ufani kakhachiisani,
Ee AABBO Waaqa gubbati ch'aqasi, hojattu tante dubbi worraa d'uga gula muri. Nama wollaala qabu wollaala iti muri, ka inqamne galakisi.
Hojja worra kanke ka Israeli maro worri siti dabeefi nyaapi dabsate, ammo duuba eege worri siti deebie, Mana kanati d'ufe, garaa laafe araarsa si kad'ate,
gubba worra ch'aqasi. Daba gumi tanteeti araaramifi, lafa atini ababoota worraati kennite worraa deebisi.
Hojja atini maro worri kanke si durati wollaalefi bokaya worra roobu didde, ammo duuba hojja worri wollaala suni iraa deebie, Mana kanati fuula deefate, garaa laafeni si kad'atu,
gubbati worra ch'aqasi. Daba hayyuutifi ka worra Israelile ch'ufa biraa deemifi waan d'uga worra barsiisi. Duuba, Ee AABBO Waaqa, lafa tante tana, ta atini d'aala worra kanketi kennite, bokaya roobifi.
Hojja oolaani jabduuni yokhaani ch'iisi hamani lafati bue, yokhaani qilleensa hamafi raamofi awaanisafi buqatani mid'aanti buute balleesite, yokhaani hojja nyaapi gumi tante had'e, yokhaani hojja d'ukubafi fayyad'abi worrati bue,
kad'acha worraa d'agayifi. Hojja worri kanke ka Israeli nami tokoleeni gaargala ufi arge, harka ufi gara Mana Waaqa kana qabe Waaqa kad'ate,
kad'acha isaa d'agayifi. Mana kanke ka gubbati worra ch'aqasi, araaramifi, qarqaari. Si ch'allaati herega nama ch'ufa beekha, tanaafi nama ch'ufa waan isaa male tolchiifi,
aka worri kanke, hojja lafa atini ababoota worraati kennite keesa tau, si ch'aqasu.
Hojja nami gosa d'ibi, ka lafa fago tau, gurra kanke jabaafi waan jabdu atini worra kanketi tolchite d'agaye, aka si kad'atu Mana kanati gad'ufe,
kad'acha isaa d'agayifi. Gubba fulla worra keetiti isaa ch'aqasi, waan inni fed'u guutiifi aka gochiti lafa keesa jirtu ch'ufti si beete sii saalfatu, akuma worra kanke ka Israeli. Duuba akanaani worrileeni imbeekha, aka Mani anini jaare kunini fulla iti si kad'atani.
Hojja atini worra kanke, nyaapa had'a jette ergite, worrileeni fulla jiruti dira atini fohate kanaafi Mana anini si jaare kanaleti fuula deefate si kad'ate,
kad'acha worraa d'agayifi, gubbati worra ch'aqasi, dabsacha kennifi.
Hojja worri kanke siti ch'ubbame — qarale nami ch'ubbu intolchine injiru — duuba atini dallansu keesa harka nyaapati worra kennite, nyaapi suni worra boojie lafa d'ibiti geese, ato lafti suni fagole taate,
kad'acha worra kanketi d'agayifi. Yo lafa suni keesati worri ch'ubbu iraa deebie si kad'ate, dabafi ch'ubbu ufi siti himate, Ee AABBO Waaqa, kad'acha worraa d'agayifi.
Yo lafa suni keesati worri d'uguma daba ufi iraa deebie, lafa atini ababoota teenna kenniteefi dira atini fohate kanaafi Mana anini si jaare kanati fuula deefate si kad'ate,
kad'acha worraa d'agayifi. Mana kanke ka gubbati worra ch'aqasi, nahiifi.
Dabafi ch'ubbu worri siti tolche araaramifi, nyaapa worrale naasisifi.
Worri worruma keeti, ka atini fulla boola ibida ta lafa Misiri keesaa baafte.
Ee AABBO Waaqa gudda, hojja ch'ufa worra kanke ka Israelitiifi hayyu worrale nahiifi eebisi, hojja worri qarqaarsa si kad'ate ch'ufa d'agayifi.
Atini worra suni gosa ch'ufa keesaa fohate, gumi tante tolfate, aka atini gaafa ababoota teenna lafa Misiri keesa baafte Musati d'aamate, worrati himi jetteeni kaani.
Solomonini kad'acha AABBO Waaqa kad'ate ira deebie jennaani, fulla sorio irati baasani, ta qara inni durati jilbifate, harka olqabate taani dura oleje
qoonqo olfud'ate, gumi achiti wolti baate ch'ufa, dubbi taanaani eebise:
AABBO Waaqa, ka akuma inni kakhate gumi ufiti nagaya kenne maqa isaa ha faarsani. Inni waan Musati kakhate ch'ufa yayu guute
AABBO Waaqi keenna nu woliini jiraatinna, akuma inni duri ababoota teenna woliini jiraate: Inni haguma jiru nu lakise nu bira indeemini:
Inni saala nu kenne, aka nu hojja ch'ufa waan inni fed'u taane aadaafi seera isaa ka inni ababoota teennaa kenne guunnu nu tolchinna.
AABBO Waaqi keenna halkani guyya kad'acha anini isa kad'ad'e tana qaabatinna. Inni hojja ch'ufa worra Israelitiifi hayyu worrati waan worri hojja ch'ufa fed'atu kennina.
Duuba akanaani gochiti lafa keesa jirtu ch'ufti, aka waaqi d'ibiini, AABBO male injirre, beeti.
Isanileeni, worri isaa, garaa tokooni AABBO Waaqa keenna d'ugeefada, aadaafi seera isaa akuma arra tolchitani kana gula deema.
Jennaanini hayyufi worri ch'ufti sorio AABBO Waaqaa baase.
Solomonini looni kuma diddami lamatiifi hooliye kuma d'ibbafi diddama sorio wold'ageeti qale. Duuba akanaani hayyufi gumileeni Mana Waaqa suni eebifte.
Guyyuma suni inni ballinna ch'icha Mana Waaqa wod'aka isaa eebise qulqulleese, achiti sorio gubanifi mid'aani Waaqaa baasanifi gabbinna hori sorio wold'ageetiti qalani Waaqaa baase, wonti mesa fakaata ka sibiila diimani mid'aasani sorio irati baasani kaani sorio tana ch'ufa infuud'u tanaafi inni fulla suni eebise sorio irati baase.
Duuba achiti, fulla Mana Waaqa suniti, Solomonifi worri Israeli ch'ufti guyya torba jila hoosa tolfatani. Nami kaarra Hamathi ta mirgale ch'ufa d'ufe, ammalle bitaa gara seera lafa Misirile ch'ufa d'ufe, artiti nami ch'ufti wolti d'ufe lafa ira dabre.
Guyya saddeeteeso Solomonini nama ch'ufa galche, waan AABBO Waaqi hojattu isaa Daudifi gumi Israeli ch'ufa eebiseefi, nami ch'ufti Solomoni eebise kae gammadani gale.

Solomonini Mana AABBO Waaqatifi mana hayyuutifi maneeni inni jaaru fed'u ch'ufa hobaase jennaani
AABBO Waaqi ammalle isati mullate, akuma inni duri Gibeoniti isati millate kaani.
AABBO Waaqi waan isaani jed'e, Anini kad'acha atini na kad'ate ya d'agaye. Anini Mana atini naa jaarte kana la eebise, aka inni fulla keesati na kad'atani tahu haga jiru jireenna. Anini isa haga jiru jireenna jabeesa eega.
Yo atini akuma abba kanke Daudi d'ugaafi qajeelumani naa hojatte aadaafi seera kiyya jabeesite dubbi tiyya ch'ufa guute,
anini kakhu duri abba kanke Dauditi kakhad'e ta d'alooti kanke nami toko haga jiru jireenna worra Israeli fida jed'e, inguuta.
Ammo yo sifi d'alooti kanke na lakiftani aadaafi seera anini isanii keenne diddani Waaqa d'ibi kad'atani,
anini gumi tiyya ta Israeli lafa duri worraa kenne keesaa balleese, Mana iti na kad'atani ka anini eebise kana lakise biraa deema. Ammalle fulla ch'ufati Israeli goyeesani tufatani.
Mani kunileeni ch'ach'abe ona tahe, nami d'aatu bahu ch'ufti iraa rifate maadefate waan jed'u, AABBO Waaqi maanifi lafa tanaafi Mana kana akana tolche?
Duuba biyyiti waan jettu, Wonti Waaqi akana tolcheefi, waan worri AABBO Waaqa isaani, ka lafa Misiri keesaa ababoota isaani baase, lakiseefi. Worri Waaqa d'ibi gula bahe Waaqa suni yaamate hojateefi. Duuba tanaafi AABBO Waaqi gaargala kana ch'ufa worratiini d'ufe.
Hujiini Mana Waaqatifi ka Solomoni, woltuma ganna diddama fud'atte.
Hayyichi Tiro, ka Hiramu jed'aniti mukha hind'eesatifi mukha jajaba d'ibifi worqi inni huji sunini tolche ch'ufa kenneefi: Mana suni jaarani hobaasani jennaani, hayyu Solomonini dira diddama, ka lafa Galilaya, Hiramuu kenne.
Hiramuni dira suni ch'ufa laalachu d'ufe arge jennaani diqole iraa ingammanne.
Jennaani waan Solomonini jed'e, Oboleesa kiyya, diri atini na kennite kana? Taanafi arda suni ch'ufaani arrale Kabuli jed'ani, akasi jechaani waan woma keesa injirre jecha.
Hiramuni qara worqi kilo kuma afuri Solomoni erge.
Hayyu Solomonini irreeni nama Mana Waaqatifi mana hayyu jaarsise, ammalle boola duuchisise naabo dira sunile d'akhaani jaarsise. Inni ammalle dira Hazoritifi Megido irreeni worra jaarsise.
(Hayyuuni Misiri qara dira Gezeri had'e gube balleese, nama isaa ch'ufa fit'e. Duuba eege, inni dira suni intala isaati kenne, gaafa Solomonini isii fuud'e. Jennaani Solomoni eege jaare.)
Ammalle Solomonini irreeni dira Beth-Horoni ka golbaatifi,
Baalathi, Tamari, ka lafa gamooji ta Yuda keesati,
dira inni sagale keesati olkeyatu, dira fardaafi, gaarini fardi hirkisu ka isaa iti galu, ammalle waan d'ibi ka inni Yerusalemu keesafi, Lebanoni keesafi waan d'ibi ch'ufa ka lafa inni mohatu keesati jaarani, jaarsise.
Worri inni irreeni hojachiise sunini worra d'aloota gosa Kanaani, ka duri worri Israeli boojie, gaafa worri lafa isaani fud'ate. Worri suni, ka haga arrale tisse, worra gosa Amoritifi Hititifi Perezitifi. Hivitiifi ammalle ka Yebusi.
Solomonini worra Israeli tisse intolchine: Worri Israeli huji d'ibi isaa hojate — huji askartifa worra gugurda askartifa, ta gaari fardi hirkisu ooftufa ammalle worra huji askartiti mata.
Nami worra irreeni hojachiisani, ka maneeni Solomoni suni ch'ufa jaareti mata, nama d'ibba shanifi shantama.
Niitiini Solomoni, ta dubra hayyu Misiri, dira Daudi keesaa baate mana Solomonini jaareefi kaaniti qubate jennaani Solomonini boola diraani ilaboru namaani duucha jed'e.
Hayyu Solomonini ammalle hobolo heddu Ezion-Geberi, ta d'aatu dira Eliothi, afaani galaana Diima, lafa Edomu keesa, jaare.
Hiramuni nama gari, ka huji hobolo beekhu, Solomonii, erge aka worri hojattu isaa woliini hojatu.
Worri suni gara lafa Ofiri hojattu Solomoni woliini hobolooni d'aqe, worqi kilo kuma kud'ani afuri Solomonii geese.

Isiini namafi geejiba gaala hedu, ka qumbifi d'akhaaye ch'uch'ulut'ufi worqi muumme inqamne baatu woliini d'ufte. Isiini Solomonini woli arginaani waan garaa qabdu ch'ufa gaafate.
Inni waan isiini gaafate ch'ufa himeefi; wonti tokoleeni ka jajabaatte inni himu d'ad'abe injirtu.
Hayyitiini Sheba qarooma Solomonitifi mana inni jaarelle ch'ufa agarte.
Isiini ammalle sagale isaani gololchanifi. Fulla hojattuuni isaa iti galtufi aka hojattuuni isaa hojattufi woya worri naqatufi hojattu guyya jila isa gololchitufi sorio inni Mana Waaqa keesati baasule ch'ufa agarte jennaani aka male mamte afaani qabate.
Jennaani isiini waan hayyuuni jette, wonti kanke ka anini lafa tiyyati d'agaye, ka nafa keetitifi qaroomileeni ch'ufti waan jiraati! Amma tana d'ufe arge jennaani d'ugeefad'e male qara ind'ugeefanne.
Ammalle wonti anini d'agaye diqo, qaroomafi duroomi kanke haga anini d'agaye ch'ufa guddo ira jira.
Nad'eeni tante akami milki qabdi, ta guyya ch'ufa sibira ejite qarooma kanke ch'aqaftu!
AABBO Waaqa kanke ha faarsani! Inni si maache hayyu Israeli si tolche. Waan inni haga jiru jireenna Israeli jaalateefi inni hayyu worraa si tolche, aka atini d'ugaani worra fide seerale jabeesitu.
Isiini waan d'ufteeni ch'ufa Solomonii kennite: Worqi haga kilo kuma afurifa, ammalle qumbifi d'akhaaye ch'uch'ulut'u muumme inqamne. Taka nami haga qumbi isiini kenniteefi suni inkennineefi.
Hobolooni Hiramu, ta lafa Ofiriti worqiini d'ufte, mukha woddeesa fakaatu tokofi d'akhaaye ch'ulut'uleeni d'ufte.
Solomonini mukha suni dongora mana isaatiifi ka Waaqa tolche, ammalle kiraarifi waan sirbanini d'ibile tolche. Mukhi sunini guddo mimid'aaga, taka lafa sunini ind'umne yokhaani eegi sunile taka ingarre.
Hayyu Solomonini waan hayyitiini Sheba isa kad'ate ch'ufa kenneefi, waan inni fed'i ufitiini kenneefi male. Jennaani isiifi hojattuuni isii lafa isaaniti galani.
Ganna ch'ufa Solomonini worqi kilo kuma diddami sadi argate. Tana malele inni damoosa worri bunat'u isaa baasufi Tirfi bunaqatifi gibira hayyooti lafa
Araftitifi worri gugurdaani lafa Israeli arda arda mohatu isa baasele argate.
Solomonini wonte gugurdo d'ibba lama mid'aase, nafa isii ch'ufa worqi kilo torbatini duuche.
Ammalle inni wonte didiqo d'ibi d'ibba sadi mid'aase, nafa isii ch'ufa worqi kilo lamatini duuche. Duuba wonte tana ch'ufa mana inni jaare, ka Mana Badda Lebanoni jed'ani kaani, keesa naqe.
Inni ammalle barch'uma hayyu gudda toko mid'aase. Nafa isaa haga toko ilka arbaatini mid'aasani, kaani worqi dansaani mid'aasani.
Barch'uma suni faano jaa ta oliini korani qaba, ammalle faano suni ch'ufa gama lachu akheekha nyeench'a irati mid'aasani, duuba akheekhi nyeench'a suni ch'ufti wolti kud'ani lama. Barch'uma gama isaa ka duuba mata korma looni irati mid'aasani, ammalle barch'uma suni fulla d'aatu looni irati mid'aasani, ammalle barch'uma suni fulla d'aatu, ta harka ira keeyatani, gama lachu nyeench'a irati mid'aasani. Barch'uma hayyu ka akasi suni taka lafa d'ibi keesati imid'aasine.
Muduununi Solomoni ch'ufti ta worqiti, ammalle mihi woini sooratani ka Mana Badda Lebanoni jed'ani kaani ke jiru ch'ufa worqi ch'allaani mid'aasani. Mihi suni tokole qarsiini imid'aasine, wonti akanatiifi bara Solomoni suni qarsi womatu indarani.
Inni hobolo heddu, ta lafa fago hobolo Hiramu woliini yaatu, qaba. Duuba hobolooni suni, hojja ganni sadi dabru, dachaate, worqifi qarsifi ilka arbaatifi jaldeesa gaaratifi qamaleeni d'ufti.
Hayyu Solomoni hayyu ch'ufa ira qalbiifi hori qaba,
duuba nami lafa keesa jiru ch'ufti guddo d'ufe qarooma Waaqi isaa kenne suni argu fed'a.
Nami fulla ch'ufa d'ufe ch'ufti woini d'ufeefi — waan qarsifi worqiini mid'aasanifa, woya fa, miha lola fa, qumbifa fardaafi gaangele. Waan kana ganna ch'ufa akasuma d'ufaniini.
Gaafasi Yerusalemu keesa qarsiini lafa ira dabarte akuma d'akhati heregani, hind'eesale akuma mukha dambiti heregani, ka fulla ch'ufa jiru.
Gati bunaqa farda, ka Misirifi Kilikia d'ufu ch'ufa, hojattu hayyuuti harka qaba.
Ammalle gati gaari fardi hirkisu ka Misiri d'ufule worrati harka qaba. Ammalle worri hayyoota Hitifi Shamu gaari fardi hirkisu iti gurgure; gaari fardi hirkisu toko qarsi d'ibba jaatiini gurgurani, farda toko qarsi d'ibbafi shantama.

Solomonini nad'eeni heddu gosa d'ibi jaalate. Niiti dubra hayyu Misiri male inni nad'eeni gosa Hitifa ta Moabufa ta Amonifa ta Edomufa ta Sidoni fa fuud'e.
Inni ato AABBO Waaqi worra Israelitini, nad'eeni gosa d'ibi infuud'ina, isiini hegeri qalbi teesani garagalchite Waaqa d'ibi gula isani deebifti jed'u, nad'eeni suni fuud'e.
Solomonini dubra d'ibba torba fuud'e ammalle nad'eeni d'ibba sadi d'ibi barate worraati galfate. Duuba nad'eeni suni Waaqa iraa isa gorsite.
Inni jaare jennaani waaqa d'ibi isa kad'achiifte inni, aka abba isaa Daudi, AABBO Waaqa isaa jaalate garaa tokooni gula indeemne.
Inni Ashtorethi waaqa worra Sidonitifi waaqa hama Milkomu jed'ani ka worra Amoni kad'ate.
Inni aka abba isaa Daudi garaa tokooni AABBO Waaqa gula deemu dide, isa durati ch'ubbu tolche.
Gaara Yerusalemuni ilaboru irati inni fulla Kemoshi waaqa hama Moabutifi Moleki waaqa hama Amoni iti kad'atani jaare.
Ammalle inni fulla waaqa iti kad'atani, ta nad'eeni isaa ta gosa d'ibi ch'ufti hit'aana iti aarsite waaqa ufiti sorio baaftu, jaare.
Ato AABBO Waaqi Israeli Solomoniti maro lama mullate waaqa gosa d'ibi inkad'atiini jed'eenile, inni isa ch'aqasu dide iraa gore. Tanaafi AABBO Waaqi iti dallane
waan jed'eeni, Waan atini beekha wold'aqisa nu woliini tolfanne ch'absite seera kiyya guutu dideefi anini hayyuma siraa fuud'e hojattu tante nama toko kenna.
Ammo taatule anini haga atini jirtu woma si intolchu, maro abba kanke Dauditifi; ammo gaafa ilmi kanke hayyu tahu wo si tolcha.
Ammalle anini finna lafa ch'ufa isa iraa infuud'u; ammo gosa toko illakisafi, maro hojattu tiyya Dauditifi maro Yerusalemu ka anini dira kiyya tolfad'eefi.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi Hadadi ka gosa Edomu, ka worri isaani hayyu, nyaapa Solomoniti tolche.
Duri gaafa Daudini lafa Edomu had'e dabsate, namichi gudda askarti isaa ka Yoabu jed'ani achi nama awaalu d'aqe, isaafi jari isaa lafa Edomu keesa jia jaa taani. Duuba worri gaafasi nama d'iira ka Edomu keesa jiru,
Hadadifi hojattu abba isaa, ta gosa worra ta gari, ta lafa Misiriti baqate male, ch'ufa fit'e. (Gaafasi Hadadini ijoolle.)
Worri baqate sunini Midiani bahe, Parani d'ufe, achiti nami d'ibiini worrati d'ufe woliini taani. Jennaani lafa Misiri d'aqani, fulla hayyu d'ufani, hayyuuni suni lafafi manafi sagalele Hadadii kenne.
Faraoni Hadadi maache, intala isaa soddaa, ta oboleeti niiti isaa hayyiti Tapenesi, fuusise.
Intalti suni ilma toko isaa d'alte, ka Genubathi jed'ani; ilma suni hayyititi mana ufi keesati ilma hayyuutini woliini guddise.
Hadadini aka Daudifi, namichi gudda askarti ka Yoabu jed'ani kaani duani d'agaye jennaani, waan hayyuuni jed'e, lafa tiyyati galu fed'a, na gad'iisi.
Hayyichi waan jed'eeni, Maanifi galu feeta? Waan atini arma d'abde jira? Hadadini waan jed'eeni, Woma ind'amne, na gad'iisi jed'e, kae iti d'aabate.
Ammalle Waaqi Rezoni ilma Eliada nyaapa Solomoniti tolche. Rezonini sunini duri abba Hadadezeri hayyu Soba duraa baqate,
gudda goli shifta tahe. (Wonti kunini gaafa Daudini Hadadezeri dabsate goli isaa ta lafa Shamu ch'ufa fit'e taate.) Rezonifi jari isaa yaani dira Damaski qubatani, achiti jari isaa suni hayyu shamu isa tolche.
Inni bara Solomonini lafa fide suni nyaapa Israeliti.
Nami d'ibiini ka garagale Solomoniti nyaapa tahe Yeroboamu ilma Nebati, ka qara isaa hojatu; inni nama dira Sereda lafa Efraimu keesa. Haati isaa hiyyeeti d'iirsa inqamne, ta Serua jed'ani.
Wonti inni garagale hayyuti nyaapa taheefi tana:
Solomonini boola dira Yerusalemu ilaboru duuche naabo dira sunile mid'aasu jira.
Yeroboamuni nama jajaba toko, ka guddo huji mid'aasu; Solomonini akasi arge jennaani, huji irreeni nama hojachiisani ta Manasetifi ta Efraimu ch'ufa gudda iti tolche.
Guyya toko, ka Yeroboamuni Yerusalemu deemu, raagi Ahiya jed'ani ka worra Shilo, lafa aloo keesati, ka inni koba deemu, iti d'ufe.
Ahiyaani woya haareeti ufi iraa qabu fulla kud'ani lama tatarsaase,
waan jed'e, Tatarsaa woya tana kud'ani fud'ad'i, wonti akanatiifi AABBO Waaqi Israeli waan siini jed'u, Anini hayyuma Solomoni iraa fuud'e, gosa kud'ani sii kenna,
Solomoni gosa toko ch'alla fud'ata, maro hojatu kiyya Dauditifi Yerusalemu dira anini lafa Israeli ch'ufa keesaa fohad'e kiyya tolfad'eefi.
Wonti anini waan kana tolchufi Solomoniti na dide waaqa gosa d'ibi kad'ate: Ashtorethi waaqa Sidoni, Kemoshi waaqa Moabu, Milkomu waaqa Amoni. Solomonini ya waan hamtu tahe na dide, aadaafi seera kiyya ka abbaani isaa Daudini guute, iraa gore.
Ammo anini hayyuma ch'ufa Solomoni iraa infuud'u, haga inni jirule woma intolchu, wonti anini akasi tolchufi maro hojattu tiyya Daudi ka anini fohad'e innileeni aadaafi seera kiyya guutefi.
Anini hayyuma ilma Solomoni iraa fuud'e, gosa kud'ani sii keenna.
Ammo gosa toko ilma Solomoniti lakisa, aka anini hojja ch'ufa nama d'aloota Daudi ka dira Yerusalemu, ka anini fohad'e, iti na kad'atani mohatu, keesa ind'amne,
ammo anini si fuud'e hayyu Israeli si tolche, lafa atini feetu ch'ufa fidda.
Yo atini dubbi tiyya ch'aqafte seera kiyya guute waan anini fed'u ch'ufa akuma hojattu tiyya Daudi tolchite na gammachiifte anini hojja ch'ufa si woliini jiraad'e, hayyu Israeli si tolche, akuma Daudi tolche d'aloota kankele hayyu lafa tana tolcha.
Maro ch'ubbu Solomonitifi anini d'aloota Daudi ingaargalcha, ammo guyya ch'ufaniti.
Tanaafi Solomonini Yeroboamu ijeesu fed'e, ammo inni hayyu Misiri ka Shishaki jed'aniti baqate, haga Solomonini duuti achuma tae.
Waan Solomonini tolche ch'ufa, waan inni taheefi qarooma isaa ch'ufa, kitaaba huji Solomoni jed'ani keesati t'aafani.
Inni ganna afurtama Yerusalemu keesa worra Israeli ch'ufa mohate.
Duuba eege inni due jennaani dira Daudi keesati isa awaalani, ilmi isaa Rehoboamuuni fulla isaa hayyu tahe.

Rehoboamuuni Shekemu fulla worri Israeli ch'ufti aka isa hayyu tolchu wolti bahe d'aqe.
Yeroboamuni, ilmi Nebati, ka qara lafa Misiriti hayyu Solomoni baqate, dubbi tana d'agaye jennaani Misiri ga deebie.
Jennaani worri Israeli sunini isa yaame, gara Rehoboamu woliini d'aqani waan jed'aniini,
Abbaani kanke nu dabse ulfinna jaba nura kaye. Hojja atini ulfinna suni nuraa Sablifte finna dansaani nuu d'ufte, nu aka dansaa si gula yaana.
Inni waan jed'eeni, Sadi bula, gadi dachaa. Jennaani worri kae yae.
Jennaani hayyu Rehoboamuuni jaarole abba isaati mala d'ooftu dubbi suni gaafate waan jed'eeni, Mala d'aa, dubbi anini worra kanaani jechu male nati hima.
Worri waan jed'eeni, Yo atini arra aka dansaa worra kana hojachu feete, worra dubbi dansa iti dubbad'i, duuba worri haga jiru jireenna aka dansaa sii hojata.
Ammo inni mala jaarole suni dide, dubbi suni hariya isaatini gahe, mala na d'aa waan anini worra,
ulfinna nuraa fuud'i nani jed'u kana jed'uuni nati hima jed'e.
Worri hariya isaa sunini waan jed'eeni, Wonti atini worraani jechu malte tana: qubi kiyya diqani hid'aana abba kiyya ira furda!
Waan atini worraani jettu, Abbaani kiyya ulfinna gudda isani ira kaye, ammo anini hagasi irale isaniti guddisa. Inni lichooni isani d'aane ammo anini ogoraani isani d'aana!
Bultiini sadeeni taani hobaate jennaani Yeroboamufi gumiini taani ch'ufti akuma Rehoboamuuni jed'eeni kaani isati d'ufte.
Hayyichi mala jaarole taani dide,
mala hariya isaa kaani gula bahe, dubbi jajabdu worrati dubbate waan jed'eeni, Abbaani kiyya ulfinna gudda isani ira kaye, ammo anini hagasi irale isaniti guddisa. Inni lichooni isani d'aane, ammo anini ogoraani isani d'aana!
AABBUMA Waaqati hayyicha biyya ch'aqasu d'owe, aka akasiini dubbini inni raaga Ahiya jed'aniini Yeroboamu ilma Nebatiti himi jed'e guutamtu. (Raagi suni nama Shiloti.)
Isa worra Yudati lakise kae biraa yae.
Jennaani hayyu Rehoboamuni Adoniramu ka worra huji irreeni hojachiisaniti mataa, worra Israeliti erge, ammo worri d'akhaani d'aane ijeese. Jennaani Rehoboamuuni hurrise gaari ufi yaabate Yerusalemuti baqate.
Tanaafi arti asi worri Israeli nama d'aloota Daudi ch'ufa iti garagale dida.
Worri Israeli aka Yeroboamuni Misirii d'ufe d'agaye jennaani, kora gumi Israeliti isa yaame hayyu tolfate. Gosa Yuda male nami tokoleeni d'aloota Daudi gula imbaane.
Rehoboamuuni Yerusalemu gahe jennaani askarti jajanna nama filani ch'alla, ta gosa Yudatifi ka gosa Benjamini nama kuma d'ibba tokofi saddeetama wolti yaame, aka worra Israeli had'e mootuma ufi deefatu.
Ammo Waaqi raaga Shemaya yaame waan jed'eeni,
waan atini worra Yudatifi ka Benjaminitini jettu:
Oboleyaani teesani worra Israeli inhad'ina, isani ch'ufti kaa, gala waan tahe suni ch'ufa anumati tolche. Duuba worri dubbi AABBO Waaqa ch'aqase, kae worra ufiti gale.
Jennaani Yeroboamuni dira Shekemu, ka lafa gaareeni Efraimu keesa jiru, jabeese jaare diqo achi tae. Jennaani achi kae, dira Panueli jabeese jaare.
Inni waan ufiini jed'e, Yo gumiini tiyya tunini Yerusalemu d'at'e achiti Mana Waaqa keesati sorio baafte, worri Rehoboamu hayyu Yudati deebie, na ijeesa.
Jennaani hayyichi dubbi suni herege, korma looni lama worqiini mid'aase, waan biyyaani jed'e, Imaltuni guyya ch'ufa Yerusalemu yaatani ya isanii geete, worra Israeli, Waaqi keesani ka lafa Misiri keesa isani baase kuno kana!
Duuba korma suni toko Betheli kaye, kaani Dani kaye.
Akanaani biyyiti ch'ubbu seente Bethelifi Dani d'at'e kad'ate.
Ammalle Yeroboamuni fulla waaqa iti kad'atani gaareeni gubbati jaare nama gosa Lawi intahini qaalole tolfate.
Ammalle guyya kud'ani shaneeso ka jia saddeeteeso, guyya inumaani fohate kaani, inni Betheli d'aqe, fulla sorio irati baasani taaniti sorio baase jila inni worra Israeliti jed'e tolche taani tolfate.

Dubbi AABBO Waaqa gula raagi toko Yudaa bahe, Betheli d'aqe, ka Yeroboamuni fulla sorio iti qalaniti sorio baasu jiru baheeni.
Dubbi AABBO Waaqa suni gula raagi kaani waan aka mesa ka sorio irati baasani kaani waan isaa dubbate, waan jed'e, Ee mesa, mesa, AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u; ilma maqaani Yosiati worra Daudi keesaa d'alata, ilma suniti qaalole fulla infakaanneti d'ufte, sirati wo baaftu qaqale, lafele namaa sirati guba,
raagi ammalle waan jed'e, Wonti aka mesa jirtu kunini gargari ch'ach'abt'e, daaraani isa gubba lafati firfirfamti duuba isani akanaani, aka AABBO Waaqi naani dubbate, beetani.
Hayyichi Yeroboamu jed'ani kaani dubbi tana d'agaye jennaani raaga kaaniti quba qabe waan jed'e, Namicha kana qaba! Jennaani hojuma suni hayyicha harki kokotae gach'absachu dad'abe.
Jennaani hojuma suni wonti aka mesa kaani gargari ch'ach'abt'e daaraani lafati jidde, akuma raagi kaani maqa AABBO Waaqatini fage.
Duuba hayyichi waan raaga sunini jed'e, AABBO Waaqa kanke yaamad'u, aka inni harka kiyya na fayyisu na kad'ad'u!
Duuba raagi AABBO Waaqa kad'ateefi, inni harka hayyu fayyise.
Jennaani hayyichi waan raagani jed'e gara worraa na gula kooti, waan atini sooratu sii keenne ammalle maro waan atini naa tolchite kanatifi waan d'ibile sii keenna.
Ammo raagi waan jed'eeni, Ato atini waan qabdu ch'ufu qoodde wod'akati naa kennitele, anini si woliini deeme nyaad'e woma si woliini ind'ugu.
Wonti akanatiifi AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e, Woma nyaate ind'ugini, ammalle kara d'ufte kaaniini worrati indeebiini.
Duuba inni karaa d'ufe kaani lakise karaa d'ibi gula gale.
Gaafasi jaarsa toko ka raagati Betheli jira. Ilmaani isaa d'ufte waan raagi Yuda bahe kaani d'ufe guyya suni Betheliti tolche iti himte, ammalle waan raagi suni hayyu Yeroboamuni jed'e iti himte.
Jaarsi, raagi suni kara kami deebie? jed'e, Ilmaani isaa gaafate. Worri karaa inni deebie iti hime jennaani,
inni waan worraani jed'e, Harree koora ira naa kaya. Worri koora ira kaye jennaani, inni
yaabate faana raaga Yuda kaani iti d'aabate, ato inni mukha gudda toko jala tau baheeni, waan jed'eeni, raagi Yudaa d'ufe sii? Jennaani inni Ee, anuma jed'eeni.
Jennaani jaarsi waan jed'eeni, Worra kiyya nu yaasi, sagale sii keenna.
Ammo raagi kaani waan jed'eeni, Anini dandae si gula deeme mana kanke inseenu. Yokhaani armaleeti dandae nyaad'e si woliini ind'ugu,
wonti akanatiifi AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e, waan tokole nyaate ind'ugini, yokhaani kara atini d'uftele indeebiini.
Jennaani jaarsi kaani waan jed'eeni, anileeni raaguma aka keetiti malaikaani AABBO Waaqaleeni waan nani jette, Beeni, raaga suni yaami, mana kanke geesi, sagale kennifi, bisaani obaasi. Ammo jaarsi suni dubbi suni inkiyyibe.
Jennaani raagi Yuda kaani jaarsa kaani gula gale sagale woliini soorate.
Ato worri sagale nyaachuti jiru dubbini AABBO Waaqa jaarsa raaga kaaniti d'ufte,
jennaani inni raaga Yudaa d'ufe kaaniti iyye waan jed'e, AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, waan atini dubbi AABBO Waaqa lakifte waan inni tolchi sini jed'e dideefi,
d'ufte sagale AABBO Waaqi inyaatini sini jed'e nyaateefi, amma si ijeesani, awaala worra keesani d'abda.
Eegi worri gololfate, jaarsi kaani harre raaga Yuda kaani koora ira kayeefi,
inni yaabate iti d'aabate. Ato deemu nyeench'aani bahe, nyeench'i sunini nyaate isa ijeese. Reefa isaa ka harreefi nyeench'i bira ejaanjani karaa ke ch'iisa.
Jennaani nami karaa yau reefa nama ka karaa keesa ch'iisu, ka nyeench'i bira eju arge, dira Betheli d'aqani waan argani suni himani.
Jaarsi raaga kaani dubbi suni d'agaye jennaani waan jed'e, Sunini raaga dubbi AABBO Waaqa dide! Tanaafi AABBO Waaqi akuma jed'e kaani nyeench'a iti erge, nyeench'i isa nyaate ijeese.
Jennaani inni waan ilmaani isaatini jed'e, harree tiyya koora ira na kaya
worri koora ira kayeefi jennaani yaabate, kae iti d'aabate, reefa raaga kaani ka karaa keesa ch'iisu, ka harreefi nyeench'i kaani ufuma bira ejaanjani arge, nyeench'i reefa suni inyaanne harreele woma intolchine.
Jaarsi raaga kaani reefa suni fuud'e, harree gubba kaye, Betheli geese, aka achiti iti bohani awaalani.
Inni isa awaala worra isaanii keesati awaale, isaafi ilmaani isaaleeni bohani waan jed'ani, Oboleesa kiyya, oboleesa kiyya, nu ya gargari baane!
Eegi isa irreesani raagi waan ilmaani isaatini jed'e, Gaafa anini duu irreesuma kana keesati na awaala, d'aatu isaa na ch'iifsisa.
Dubbini AABBO Waaqi isaani jed'e, ta inni waan sorio irati baasani, ta Betheli keesatifi fulla Waaqa iti kad'atani ta dira Samaria ch'ufa keesale dubbate ch'ufti inuma guutamti.
Eegi dubbi taanile Yeroboamuni kara hama kaani iraa indeebine, inni qaalole fulla infakaanne ta sorio irati baasani ta inni jaare hojattu ta namuma arge inni filate taani, filachu illakimne. Inni nama qaallu taha jed'e ufi gabaase ch'ufa qaallu tolche.
Dabi Yeroboamuni tolche sunini worra isaatiifi d'aloota isaa ch'ufa balleese hobaase.

Gaafasi ilmi Yeroboamu, ka Abiya jed'ani, fayyad'abe,
Jennaani Yeroboamuni waan niiti isaatini jed'e, Kai, ufi jijiri, nama d'ibi ufi tolchi, aka nami fuula si wollaalu, duuba Shilo fulla raagi Ahiyaani, ka siti hayyu Israeli taha nani jed'e jiru, d'aqi.
Qit'a kud'anifi daabofi dammale fuud'i geesifi; duuba inni waan gurbaani keenna kunini tahu siti hima.
Jennaani isiini Shailoti iti d'aabate, mana Ahiyatini baate. Ahiyaani waan jaare ila d'abe.
AABBO Waaqi aka niitiini Yeroboamu waan gurba isii ka faaya d'abe isa gaafacha gad'uftufi ammalle waan inni isiini jechu malele ch'ufa qara iti hime.
Niitiini sunini artini baate jennaani nama d'ibi ufi tolchite.
Ammo Ahiyaani isi mana olseentu d'agaye jennaani waan jed'eeni, Olseeni, niiti Yeroboamu, nama d'ibi ufi intolchini, anini odu hamtu siti himu qaba.
Beeni, waan atini Yeroboamuni jettu, AABBO Waaqi Israeli waan siini jed'u; Anini nama ch'ufa keesa si fohad'e gudda worra kiyya ka Israeli si tolche.
Ammalle anini mootuma worra Daudi iraa fuud'e sii kenna. Ammo atini aka hojatu kiyya Daudi intaane, ka seera kiyya guute garaa tokooni na gula deeme waan anini fed'u ch'alla tolche.
Atini worra si durati lafa mohatele ch'ufa ira ya hameenna tolchite, atini na didde, waaqoota d'ibifi akheekha isaani mid'aafate, waaqoota suni kad'atte, akasiini na dallansiifte.
Tanaafi amma anini worra kanke badi itiini d'ufe, ilmaani tante ta d'iira gugurdofi didiqole ch'ufa balleesa. Ammalle worra kanke ch'ufa qabe aka kosi gube balleesa.
Nama worra keeti ka dira keesati duu ch'ufa sareeti nyaata, ka alati duule ch'ufa allaatiti nyaata. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Duuba Ahiyaani waan niiti Yeroboamutini jed'e, Atini amma kai gali. Akuma atini dira olseentuni ilmi kanke dua,
worri Israeli ch'ufti wolti bahe isaa bohe isa awaala, nami worra Yeroboamu ka aka dansaa awaala argatu isuma ch'alla, wonti akanatiifi nami AABBO Waaqi Israeli iraa gammade isuma ch'alla.
AABBO Waaqi hayyu d'ibi worra Israeliti tolcha, ka mootuma worra Yeroboamu ch'ufa balleesu.
AABBO Waaqi worra Israeli d'ae worri aka ilaadu galaana keesati baatu daaqa. Inni worra lafa dansa ababoota isaaniti kenne tana keesaa fuud'e galaana Efrati gama suniti firfirsa, waan worri akheekha waaqa d'ara ka Ashera jed'ani mid'aafate isa dallansiisefi.
Waan Yeroboamuni daba tolche worra Israeli daba keesa buusefi, AABBO Waaqi worra Israeli lakise biraa deema.
Jennaani niitiini Yeroboamu kaate gara dira Tirsa deebite, akuma isiini mana olseenteni gurbaani isii due.
Worri Israeli isaa bohe isa awaale akuma AABBO Waaqi hojattu isaa raaga Ahiyaani jed'e.
Waan Yeroboamuni tolcheefi had'iisa inni nama had'eefi aka inni lafa mohatele ch'ufa kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Israeli ch'ufa keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Yeroboamuni ganna diddami lama lafa mohannaani due awaalani, duuba ilmi isaa Nadabuni fulla isaa hayyu tahe.
Ilmi Solomoni, ka Rehoboamu jed'ani, gaafa hayyu Yuda tahe ganni isaa afurtami toko, duuba ganna kud'ani torba dira Yerusalemu, ka AABBO Waaqi lafa Israeli ch'ufa keesa fohate, Armati na kad'ad'a jed'e keesa, lafa mohate. Haati Rehoboamu Naama, ta gosa Amoni.
Worri Yuda AABBO Waaqa durati waan hamtu tolche, ababoota isaanile ch'ufa ira isa dallansiise.
Worri fulla Waaqa iti kad'atani waaqoota d'araati jaare. Ammalle d'akha old'ad'aabe akheekha waaqa Ashera jed'ani mid'aafatani, gaareeni ch'ufafi mukeeni gaadisa ch'ufa jalati kad'atani.
Waan suni ch'ufa ira hamtu nami d'iiratifi ka uwaleeni fulla waaqoota d'ara iti kad'atani suni huji sharmut'a hojatani, worri Yuda waan fafa hamtu, ka worri AABBO Waaqi duri worra Israeli duraa gusse tolfatu ch'ufa tolfate.
faaya Mana Waaqatifi waan inni mana isaa keesa olkeyate ch'ufa, wonte worqi ta Solomonile, fud'ate.
Jennaani hayyu Rehoboamuuni wonte d'ibi fulla wonte taani sibiila diimani mid'aase, jara askarti ka balbala hayyu eeguti kenne.
Hojja hayyuuni Mana AABBO Waaqa d'aqu ch'ufa, askartini wonte suni baate yaatini, duuba eege mana keesati woi eeganiti deebifti.
Waan hayyu Rehoboamuuni tolche ch'ufa kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Yuda ch'ufa keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Bara suni ch'ufa Rehoboamufi Yeroboamu woraanati jiddu jira.
Rehoboamuuni due jennaani fulla hayyoota iti awaalani dira Daudi keesati isa awaalani, jennaani ilmi isaa Abiyaani fulla isaa hayyu tahe.

Ganna kud'ani saddeeteeso ka hayyu Rehoboamuuni, ilmi Yebati, worra Israeli mohate, Abiyaani hayyu Yuda tahe,
ganna sadi Yerusalemu keesa lafa mohate, haad'a isaa maqaani Maaka, isiini dubra Absalomu.
Inni akuma abba isaa daba tolche, AABBO Waaqa isaa garaa tokooni aka ababo isaa Daudi gula indeemne.
