Ilmaani hayyu tana isaniti harkaa qaba; ammalle gaariifi fardaafi miha lolaatifi diri jajabaaleeni harka keesani keesa jira. Tanaafi hojja tatabe tana argattani,
ilmaani suni keesa nama jaba fakaatu, ka worra ch'ufa ira jiru, fohad'a, hayyu tolfad'a, jabeesa kalchaafi.
Ammo worri guddo sodaate waan jed'e, Eegi hayyooti lama isa dad'abde, nu eesa isa dandeenna?
Jennaani namichi gudda diratifi jaaroleefi nami ilmaani hayyu gugurdise qonqo tana Yehuti ergani, Nu hojattuuni tante waan atini tolcha jette ch'ufa inuma tolchina. Ammo nu nama tokole hayyu intolchinu, atumaani waan dansaa seetu tolchi.
Yehuni tatabe d'ibi worrati t'aafe waan jed'e, Hojja isaani gara kiyya jiraatani dubbi tiyya ch'aqaftani, mata ilmaani Ahabu bori hojja tana Yezreeliti natiini koota.
Ilmaani torbatama ta Ahabu harka worra gugurda dira suni ka worra gugurdise jirti.
Tatabeeni Yehu artini baate jennaani, jari Samaria kaani ilmaani torbatama ta Ahabu taani, fit'e, mata worraa daduti guure, Yehu ka Yezreeli jiruti geesani.
Yehuni aka mata ilmaani Ahabu achini d'ufani d'agaye jennaani waan jed'e, Fullo keesati fulla lamati woli irati tuula, haga bori diirama achiti lakisa.
Lafti bariite jennaani inni gara fullo suni d'aqe waan biyyaani jed'e, Nami Yoramu mala iti d'aate ijeese anuma, isani keesa injirtani. Ammo eenuti worra kama ch'ufa fit'e?
Duuba akanaani beekha aka wonti AABBO Waaqi waan ilmaani Ahabu dubbate tokoleeni inhanqanne. AABBO Waaqi yayu waan raaga isaa Eliyaati kakhate guute.
Jennaani Yehuni fiit'a Ahabu ta Yezreeli jirtu ch'ufafi jara isaa gugurda ch'ufafi jaalani isaa ch'ufafi qaalole isale ch'ufa hobaase; inni nama tokole inhambimne.
Jennaani Yehuni Yezreeli kae Samaria d'aqe. Karaati fulla toko ta Bulto Tissitu jed'aniti,
jara fiit'a Ahazia, hayyu Yuda, arge waan jed'eeni, Isani eenu?
Worri waan jed'eeni, Nu fiit'a Ahazia, nu worra hayyutifi worra Yezebeli nagaya fuud'a yaana.
Yehuni waan jara isaatini jed'e, Worra kana inijeesina qaqaba! Worri worra qaqabe, inni artumati fulla boola tokoti hobaase. Worri sunini ch'ufti nama afurtami lamaati, tokoleeni imbaane.
Yehuni arti bahe jennaani Yehonadabu, ilma Rekabutini, fuula keesa wold'ufani, Yehuni nagaya fuud'e waan jed'eeni, Anaafi sii dandeenne wold'anne, woliini inhojanna? Yehonadabuni waan jed'eeni, Dansa, indandeenna. Yehuni waan jed'eeni, Harka kanke kenni yoosi, worri harka wolfuud'e, Yehuni gaari ufi isa yaabachiise.
Waan jed'eeni, Na gula kooti, aka anini guddo AABBO Waaqa jaalad'u argi. Duuba worri kae, Samaria woliini d'aqe.
Worri artini bahe jennaani Yehuni fiit'a Ahabu ch'ufa hobaase, tokole inhambimne. Wonti AABBO Waaqi Eliyaani, Intaati jed'e sunuma.
Yehuni worra Samaria wolti yaame waan jed'eeni, Ahabuni duri Baali haguma diqa hojate, ammo anini hagasi ira hojad'a
raagoota Baalitifi nama isaa kad'atuufi qaalole ch'ufa wolti yaama, tokole inhambisina; inni anini sorio guddo Baali baasa nama achi injirre ch'ufa inijeesani jed'e. (Wonti Yehuni akasi taheefi aka worra Baali kad'atu ch'ufa malani hobaasu.)
Jennaani Yehuni waan jed'e, Guyya Baali kad'atani tolcha, biyya ch'ufati hima, qonqooni biyya ch'ufa geete jennaani
Yehuni lafa Israelile ch'ufa qonqo suni iti erge. Duuba nami Baali kad'atu ch'ufti, tokoleeni inhamne, d'ufe. Worri ch'ufti mana Baaliti wolti bahe mana suni guute.
Jennaani inni qaallu woya Baalini kad'atani olnaqu yaame, jara Baali kana ch'ufa woya kennaafi jed'e.
Jennaani eegi suni Yehuni mana Baali suni Yehonadabu, ilma Rekabu, woliini seene waan biyyaani jed'e, Qorqorad'a, aka nami arma jiru kunini nama Baali kad'atu ch'allaa, ammalle aka nami AABBO Waaqa kad'atu tokoleeni keesa injirre qorqorad'a.
Jennaani isaafi Yehonadabuni olseenani soriofi waan gubani baasani Baalii baasani. Duuba inni qara nama saddeetama d'aatu mana suni d'osse waan jed'eeni, Worra kana ch'ufa hobaasa nama worra kana, nama tokole lakise inijeesani!
Yehuni akuma sorio baaseni jara isaa kaani yaame waan jed'eeni, Olduuda, nama ch'ufa hobaasa, tokoleeni infiigini. Worri goraadeeni olduude, ch'ufa hobaase reefa alati guure. Jennaani worri fulla qulqullo mana suni olduude,
utuba mana Baali ch'ufa guure alati gube.
Duuba akanaani utuba qulqulloofi mana Baali suni balleesani, fulla iti udaanifi ta iti finch'aani tolchani, haga arrale akasuma.
Aki Yehuni Baali lafa Israeli keesa balleese akasi.
Ammo inni faana Yeroboamu bahe ch'ubbu inni worra Israeli keesa buuse, gaafa korma worqi mid'aase Bethelifi Dani keesa kaye tolche, ufile tolche.
AABBO Waaqi waan Yehuni jed'e, Atini waan anini tolchi sini jed'e ch'ufa yayu d'aloota Ahabu tolchite, tanaafi anini siti kakhad'a, aka d'alooti kanke haga d'aloota afreeso hayyu Israeli, tahu.
Ammo Yehuni Seera AABBO Waaqa Israeli guddo jabeese gula indeemne, fulla suni inni faana Yeroboamu, ka worra Israeli ch'ubbu keesa buuse, gula bahe.
Gaafasi AABBO Waaqi aka lafa Israeli iraa kute diqeesu iti kae. Hazaelini, hayyuuni Shamu, lafa Israeli ch'ufa
ta galaana Yordanitini ilaboru, haga dira Aroeni ka d'aatu galaana Arnoni bitaa dabsate. Lafti sunini lafa Gileaditifi ta Bashani, fulla gochiti Gaditifi Reubenitifi ta Manase ta ilaboru teetu.
Waan Yehuni tolche ch'ufafi jannooma isaale kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Israeli keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Inni due jennaani Samaria keesati awaalani, ilmi isaa Yehoazini fulla isaa hayyu tahe.
Yehuni ganna diddami saddeeti Samaria keesa worra Israeli mohate.

Haati Ahazia akuma lubbu ilma isii d'ageeteni, kaate nama fiit'a hayyu ch'ufa, fit'a jette.
Nama ch'ufa fit'ani, Yoashi ilmi Ahazia ch'allaani bahe. Isale sila worruma kaani woliini fit'ani, ammo adaada isaa Yehosheba, ta dubra hayyu Yehoramu, oboleeti Ahaziati, isa baase. Isiini isaafi qabdu isaa fuute Mana Waaqa, fulla keesa bulaniti Athalia duraa d'ossite, akasiini lubbu baafte.
Ganna jaa Yehoshebani gurba suni qorqorate Mana Waaqa keesati d'ossite, ka Athaliani lafa mohattu.
Ammo ganna torbeeso qaallichi Yehoyadani, worra gugurda askarti hayyu eeddu matatifi worra mana isaa tissuleeti mataa yaame Mana Waaqati koota jed'eeni, kakhachiise, waan inni tolchu fed'u iti hime. Duuba inni Yoashi ilma Ahazia worra garsiise.
Waan jed'eeni, Hojja guyya Sabato huji d'uftani, isani nami hagi toko mana hayyu eega;
hagi tokoleeni balbala suni eega, ammalle hagi tokoleeni askarti taani duuba ejaanja, balbala eega.
Jari sila guyya Sabato oolu ha fulla lamati gargari bahe Mana Waaqa eegu, aka hayyu qorqoratu.
Isani nami ch'ufti, ka namu goraade ufi harkaa qabu, hayyu bira indeemina, fulla inni deemu ch'ufa gula yaa, tissa. Nama isaniti d'iaatu ch'ufa ijeesa.
Jari gugurdaani kaani jecha Yehoyada guute, jara ufi ch'ufa isatini d'ufe, jara guyya Sabato oolufi ka hojatule.
Inni worra gugurda suni woraanafi wonte duri hayyu Daudini qabu, ta Mana Waaqa keesati olnaqani kenneefi,
ammalle jara suni ch'ufa ka goraade ufi harka qabu Mana Waaqa duraani d'ufe, Hayyu eega jed'eeni.
Jennaani Yehoyadani Yoashi gabaase, sure hayyuma mata isaa ira kaaye, kitaaba seera hayyuuni lafaani fidu keesati t'aafani iti kenne. Duuba Yoashi, muudani akasiini hayyu tolchani biyyiti harka d'oofte, lalabde waan jette, Lubbuuni hayyu ha d'eeratuti!
Hayyiti Athaliani aka askartifi biyyiti lalabdu d'ageete jennaani, utaalte, Mana Waaqa fulla biyyiti wolti baatu d'ufte,
hayyu ka utuba balbala Mana Waaqa fulla aada gula hayyuuni eju, eju agarte. Isa jara gugurdafi worra magalata d'auti marse bira ejaanja, biyyitileeni gammadde lalabde magalata d'oofti. Jennaani Athaliani woya ufi tatarsaafte, iyyite waan jette, ya mala nati d'aatani na balleesani! Ya na balleesani!
Yehoyadani aka Athalia Mana Waaqa keesati ijeesani infed'u, tanaafi waan worra gugurda askartitini jed'e, Jiddu askarti tana keesa alati baasa, nama lubbu isii baasu fed'u ijeesa.
Duuba isii qabani, mana hayyu, geesani, fulla Fullo Fardati isii ijeesani.
Yehoyadani hayyufi biyyale ch'ufa wolti yaame, aka worri nama AABBO Waaqa tahe, isaani wold'aqani woliini taani tolche; inni ammalle akasuma hayyuufi biyyale wold'ageesise.
Jennaani biyyiti ch'ufti mana Baali d'at'e ch'ach'absite; worri fulla sorio irati baasanifi waan boch'ani kad'atanile ch'ufa ch'ach'absani balleesani qaallicha Baali ka Maatani jed'anile waan sorio irati baasani durati ijeesani.
Jennaani Yehoyadani nama Mana Waaqa eegu tolche,
isaafi worri gugurda askartitifi jara hayyu eegufi jari mana hayyu eeguleeni, hayyu fulla Mana Waaqati fuud'e, mana hayyuuti geese, ka biyyiti ch'ufti gula yaatu. Yoashini balbala eedotini olseene, barch'uma hayyu ira tae.
Jennaani nami ch'ufti gammade, dirileeni nagaya argate, haguma Athalia mana hayyu keesati ijeesani.
Yoashini, gaafa hayyu Yuda tahe, ganni isaa torba.

Ganna torbeeso ka Yehuni hayyu Israeli tahe, Yoashini hayyu Yuda tahe, ganna afurtama Yerusalemu keesa lafa mohate. Haad'a isaa maqaani Sibia isiini dira Beersheba keesati d'alate.
Jireenna isaa ch'ufa keesa inni waan AABBO Waaqa gammachiisa tolche, waan qaallichi Yehoyadani isa barsiisefi.
Ammo tatule fulla gaareeni gubaa ta waaqa d'ara iti yaamatani tokole imballeesine; biyyiti achiti sorio baafte, hit'aana aarsu illakimne.
Qaalluuni ch'ufti ha nama inni fuula beekhu beese iraa fuud'e olkayu, duuba beese sunini ha Mana Waaqa fulla inni ch'abeni ch'ufa mid'aasaniti.
Ammo ganna diddami sadii ka Yoashini hayyu tahe suni ch'ufa qaaloleeni sunini Mana Waaqa taka imid'aasine.
Duuba inni Yehoyadafi qaalole taani yaame waan jed'eeni, Isani maanifi Mana Waaqa mid'aasu diddani? Armaa achi beese guurtani suni oliinkayina, nama Mana Waaqa mid'aasuti kenna ha worri manani mid'aasuti.
Qaaloleeni aka deebite beese nama iraa guurte, Mana Waaqa ufiini imid'aasine ee jette.
Jennaani Yehoyadani sanduqa fuud'e qadaada isaa ure, sanduqa suni waan sorio irati baasani gama mirga fulla Mana Waaqa oliini seenani d'aatu kaaye qaaloleeni balbala eeddu beese Mana Waaqatini d'ufani ch'ufa sanduqa suni keesa buufte.
Hojja beeseeni suni sanduqa keesati guddatu ch'ufa, nami hayyu wot'aafufi qaallichi guddaani d'ufani, qarsi suni hedani, subba keesati naqani hod'ani olkayani.
Eegi beese suni hedani t'aafani, fuud'aniti harka worra Mana Waaqa ijaaruti kennani, duuba worra suniti hogeeyi mukhaatifi, ijaartufi
ka d'akhaani wojaarufi ka boch'ule beese baasafi. Ammalle worri mukhaafi d'akha manani mid'aasani bite, waan fed'ani d'ibile ch'ufa baasa.
Ammo beeseeni sunini huji muduunu qarsifa ta qorifa magalata fa yokhaani miha ifse fa yokhaani miha d'ibi qarsiini mid'aasani tokole inhojanne.
Beese suni damoosa. Worra hujitifi miha manani jaarani ch'allaa baasani.
Worri huji suni hojatu ch'ufti nama d'ugaati, tanaafi wonti worra waan beese suni gaafatanifi injirtu.
Beese sorio gati baasanitifi ta sorio dabaani ufi iraa baasani Mana AABBO Waaqatini ind'umne, beeseeni sunini ta qaaloleeti.
Gaafasi Hazaelini hayyuuni Shamu, d'aqe dira Gathi had'e dabsate; eegi sunile Yerusalemu had'u fed'e.
Yoashini, hayyuuni Yuda, waan jari duri isa durati hayyu tahe, Yehoshefathifi Yehoramufi Ahaziani AABBO Waaqa baase, fuud'e, waan inni baaseefi worqi Mana AABBO Waaqatifi ka hayyu keesa jirtu ch'ufa iti dare Ahazeli hayyu Shamuti erge, jennaani Ahazelini askarti isaa Yerusalemu biraa galche.
Waan Yoashini tolche ch'ufa kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Yuda keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Hojattuuni Yoashi mala isati d'aate, worri nami lama, ka Yosakari ilma Shimeathitifi Yehozabadi ilma Shomeri jed'ani, fulla lafa duuchani mana irati jaarani ta Yerusalemuni ilaboru, ta qajeela kara Sillati gabuu kaaniti isa ijeese. Duuba irreesa hayyoota ka dira Daudi keesati isa awaalani; jennaani ilmi isa Amaziani fulla isa hayyu tahe.

Ganna diddami sadeeso ka Yoashini, ilma Ahazia, hayyu Yuda tahe, Yehoahazini, ilmi Yehu, hayyu Israeli tahe, ganna kud'ani torba Samaria keesa lafa mohate.
Akuma Yeroboamu, ka isa durati hayyu tahe, inni AABBO Waaqa durati ch'ubbu tolche, worra Israelile ch'ubbu keesa buuse. Inni haga jiru kara isaa hama suni lakisu dide.
Duuba sunifi AABBO Waaqi worra Israeliti dallane, aka Hazaelini hayyu Shamutifi ilmi isaa Benhadadi worra Israeli dabsatu, maro heddu iti lakise.
Jennaani Yehoahazini AABBO Waaqa kad'ate, AABBO Waaqileeni aka hayyuuni Shamu guddo worra Israeli dabsate arginaani kad'a isaa d'agaye,
AABBO Waaqi qarqaarsa worra Israelitini harka worra Shamu keesaa baasu ergeefi, duuba akasiini worri Israeli akuma duri kaani nagaya horate.
Ammo worri Israeli ammalle ch'ubbu Yeroboamuni worraatini d'ufe iraa deebiu dide, guyya ch'ufa tolchuma tolche; akheekhi waaqa Ashera jed'anileeni Samariuma keesati hafe.
Yehoahazini askarti shantama ta fardatifi gaari kud'anifi askarti miilaani yaatu ta kuma kud'ani male askarti d'ibi inqabu; wonti akanatiifi askarti taani ch'ufa worra Shamuti hobaase d'ukeese ira ejaanjate.
Waan Yehoahazini tolche ch'ufafi jannooma isale kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Israeli keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Inni due jennaani Samaria keesati isa awaalani, ilmi isa Yehoashini fulla isaa hayyu tahe.
Ganna sodomi torba ka Yoashini hayyu Yuda tahe, Yehoashini, ilmi Yehoahazi, hayyu Israeli tahe, ganna kud'ani jaa Samaria keesa lafa mohate.
Innileeni faanuma Yeroboamu ka worra Israeli ch'ubbu keesa buuse bahe AABBO Waaqa durati ch'ubbu tolche.
Waan Yehoashini tolche ch'ufa, jannooma inni hayyu Yuda Amazia lola keesati dabsatenile kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Israeli keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Yehoashini due jennaani irreesa hayyoota Samaria keesati isa awaalani, jennaani ilmi isaa, ka Yeroboamu jed'ani fulla isaa hayyu tahe.
Elishani waan jed'eeni, Guubefi t'iya fud'adi. Inni fud'ate jennaani Elishani harka ufi harka hayyu ira keeyate.
Elishani, aka darbattu kurfefad'i jed'eeni.
Jennaani dubbi raaga gula hayyichi deresha gara lafa Shamuti aanu bane. Elishani waan jed'eeni, T'iya darbad'u. Akuma hayyichi t'iya darbateeni raagi waan jed'eeni, T'iyiti AABBO Waaqa ta inni Shamuni dabsatu sii, atini worra Shamu haga dabsatuuti Afeki keesati haata.
Jennaani Elishani waan hayyuuni jed'e, T'iya hafte fuud'i, lafaani woraani. Hayyichi maro sadi lafaani woworaane eege yaala bahe.
Jennaani Elishani iti dallane waan jed'eeni, Atini sila maro shani jaa lafaani woraanu malte, duuba ato sila akasi tolchite worra Shamu ch'ufa inhobaafta; ammo amma tana maro sadi ch'alla worra dabsatta.
Duuba eege Elishani due awaalani. Ganna ch'ufa duuli Moabu lafa Israeli had'u d'ufe.
Gaafa toko ka nama toko awaalu jirani duula worra suni argani jennaani, biyyiti reefa suni awaala Elisha keesa buufte, kaate biraa baqate. Reefi sunini akuma lafe Elisha tuqeeni jiraate, namichi kaani kae oli eje.
Hayyuuni Shamu Hazaelini haga Yehoahazini lafa mohate ch'ufa worra Israeli aka hama dabse,
ammo AABBO Waaqi worra jaalate naheefi, worra balleesu dide qarqaare, maro inni duri wold'aqisa Abrahamufi Isaaqofi Yakobo woliini tolfateefi. Inni takuma haga arrale worra isaa indeene.
Hazaelini, hayyuuni Shamu, due jennaani ilmi isaa Benhadadini fulla isa hayyu tahe.
Jennaani Yehoashini, hayyuuni Israeli, maro sadi Benhadadi dabsate, dira duri Benhadadini, gaafa Yehoahazini abbaani Yehoashi, lafa mohate iraa fud'ate kaani, iraa deefate.

Ganna lameeso ka Yehoashini, ilmi Yehoahazi, hayyu Israeli tahe Amaziani ilmi Yoashi, hayyu Yuda tahe.
Gaafasi ganni isaa diddami shani, duuba inni ganna diddami sagali Yerusalemu keesa lafa mohate. Haad'a isa maqaani Yehoadani, ta worra Yerusalemu.
Inni waan dansaa tolche, AABBO Waaqa gammachiise, ammo tatule haga ababo isa Daudi ingeenne; waan ch'ufa inni akuma abba isa Yoashi tolche.
Inni fulla Waaqa d'ara iti kad'atani, ta gaareeni gubbaa tokole inch'absine; ammalle biyyiti artiti sorio baafte hit'aana aarsu illakimne.
Amaziani akuma hayyu tahe irre horateeni, jara abba isaa ijeese kaani fit'e.
Ammo tatule inni ijoolle worraa inhobaamne, akuma AABBO Waaqi Seera Musa keesati biyyati hime: Wollaala ijoolleeti jed'ani abba inijeesani ka abbaale jed'ani ijoolle inijeesani; nama wollaaluma inni tolche ch'allaani ijeesani.
Amaziani askarti Edomu, ta kuma kud'ani, Bale Sooda keesati fit'e. Ammalle dira Sela had'e dabsate, maqa Yoktheli baaseefi, diri sunini arrale maqa suni inuma qaba.
Jennaani Amaziani nama gara Yehoashi, hayyu Israeli, erge, kooti, woli haana jed'eeni.
Ammo Yehoashini qonqo iti deebise waan jed'e, Gaafa toko mukhi qoraati toko, ka gaara Lebanoni, qonqo mukha hind'eesa tokoti erge waan jed'e: Intala tante gurba kiyya kenni, ha fuud'uti. Jennaani bineensi toko mukha qoraati suni d'aatu bahe iti riiqate ch'ach'abse ira ejaanjate.
Amma tana Amazia, atini waan worra Edomu dabsateefi akana kiyyibda. Gurri sunini ya sii gahe, ufiraa tai; atini maanifi gaargala barbaadda, ka sifi worra kanke balleesu?
Ammo Amaziani isa ch'aqasu dide, tanaafi Yehoashi, hayyuuni Israeli, askarti ufi fud'ate, Beth-Shemasi lafa Yuda keesati isa had'e.
Askarti worra Yuda ch'ufa dabsatani, worri ch'ufti worra ufiti baqate.
Yehohashini Amazia boojie, Yerusalemu d'ufe, d'akhaa marsani dira sunini jaarani haga, fullo Efraimuti fuud'e fullo mogati d'aabe, haga d'eerinna d'und'uma d'ibba afuri ch'ach'abse.
Inni worqifi qarsi ch'ufa guurate, ammalle miha Mana Waaqatifi ka mana hayyule ch'ufa guurate, Samariatini galate. Inni ammalle namale boojie galateeni.
Waan Yehoashini tolche, jannooma inni Amazia hayyu Yudatini dabsatele ch'ufa kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Yuda keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Yehoashini due jennaani irreesa hayyoota Samaria keesati isa awaalani, duuba ilmi isa Yeroboamuni fulla isaa hayyu tahe.
Amaziani, hayyuuni Yuda, eegi Yehoashini hayyuuni Israeli due, ganna kud'ani shani tae.
Waan Amaziani tolche ch'ufa kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Yuda keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Biyyiti Yerusalemu keesati mala ijeecha iti d'aate jennaani inni kae Lakishiti baqate, ammo nyaapi isaa kaani faana d'ae achiti isa ijeese.
Jennaani reefa isa fardaani Yerusalemuti geesani, irreesa hayyoota, ka dira Daudi keesati, isa awaalani.
Jennaani worri Yuda ilma isa Uzia, ka ganni isaa kud'ani jaa, hayyu tolche.
Duuba eegi abbaani due inni dira Elathi had'e, deefate jaare.
Ganna kud'ani shaneeso ka Amaziani, ilmi Yoashi, hayyu Yuda tahe, Yeroboamuni, ilmi Yehoashi, hayyu Israeli tahe, ganna afurtami toko Samaria keesa lafa mohate,
inni AABBO Waaqa durati ch'ubbu tolche, akuma Yeroboamuni, ilmi Nabathi, ka isa durati hayyu tahe worra Israeli ch'ubbu keesa, buuse innileeni akasuma tahe.
Inni lafa worra Israeli ta duri nyaapi fud'ate ch'ufa nyaapa suni dabsate iraa deebise, kaarra Hamathi ta mirgati fuud'e galaana Sooda ka bitaati d'aabe lafa ch'ufa deefate. Tunini waan AABBO Waaqi Israeli duri raaga Yona, ilma Amitai, ka worra Gath-Heferitini biyyati hime.
AABBO Waaqi aka worri Israeli gaargala gudda qabu, ka nami worra qarqaaru tokoleeni injirre arge.
Ammo AABBO Waaqi worra suni ch'ufa haga jiru jireenna balleesu infeene, tanaafi harka hayyu Yeroboamutini worra baase.
Waan Yeroboamuni tolche ch'ufa, jannooma inni nyaapani had'eefi aka inni dira Damaskitifi Hamathi worra Israeliti deebise, kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Israeli keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Yeroboamuni due jennaani irreesa hayyoota keesati isa awaalani, ilma isaa Zekariani fulla isaa hayyu tahe.

Ganna diddami torbeeso ka Yeroboamuni hayyu Israeli tahe, Uziani ilma Amazia hayyu Yuda tahe.
Gaafasi ganni isa kud'ani jaa, duuba inni ganna shantami lama Yerusalemu keesa lafa mohate. Haad'a isaa maqaani Yekolia, isiini worra Yerusalemuti.
Inni akuma abba isaa Amazia waan AABBO Waaqa gammachiisa tolche.
Ammo fulla waaqa d'ara iti kad'atani, ta gaareeni gubbaa, imballeesine, biyyiti achiti sorio baafte hit'aana aarsu illakimne.
AABBO Waaqi d'ukuba hama aka qomaat'a Uziati buuse, d'ukubi sunini haga inni jiru ch'ufa isa lakisu dide. Inni ka huji inhojanne manumati gale ufi iraa tae, ilmi isa Yothamu lafa mohate.
Waan Uziani tolche ch'ufa kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Yuda keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Uziani due jennaani irreesa hayyoota ka, dira Daudi keesati, isa awaalani. Jennaani ilmi isa Yothamuni fulla isa hayyu tahe.
Ganna sodomi saddeeteeso ka Uziani hayyu Yuda tahe Zekariani, ilmi Yeroboamu, hayyu Israeli tahe, jia jaa Samaria keesa lafa mohate.
Inni akuma nama isa durati hayyu tahe kaani ch'ubbu AABBO Waaqa durati tolche. Inni faani Yeroboamu, ilma Nabathi, ka worra Israeli ch'ubbu keesa buuse, bahe.
Shalumuni, ilmi Yabeshi, hayyu Zekariati malate, dira Ibleamuti isa ijeese, fulla isa hayyu tahe!
Waan Zekariani tolche ch'ufa kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Israeli keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Ganna sodomi sagaleeso ka Uziani lafa Yuda mohate, Shalumuni, ilmi Yabeshi, hayyu Israeli tahe, duuba jia toko Samaria keesa lafa mohate.
Menahemuni, ilmi Gadi, Tirsa bahe, Samaria d'aqe, Shalumu ijeese, fulla isaa hayyu tahe.
Waan Shalumuni tolche ch'ufafi mala inni hayyu kaaniini ijeesele ch'ufa kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Israeli keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Ato Menahemuni Tirsa d'ufu jiru, inni dira Tapuatifi nama keesa jirufi lafa d'aatu isaa ch'ufa had'e balleese waan nami dira suni isati harka kennachu dideefi. Inni nad'eeni garaachale ch'ufa garaa babaqase.
Ganna sodomi sagaleeso ka Uziani hayyu Yuda tahe, Menahemuni, ilmi Gadi, hayyu Israeli tahe, ganna kud'ani Samaria keesa lafa mohate.
Inni faana Yeroboamu, ilma Nabathi, ka haga ufi jiru ch'ufa worra Israeli ch'ubbu keesa buuse, gula bahe, AABBO Waaqa durati ch'ubbu tolche.
Tiglath-Pilesari, hayyuuni Ashuru, lafa Israeli had'e, duuba Menahemuni, qarsi kilo kuma sodomi afuri isaa kenne, aka akasiini qarqaarsa isaa argate irre ufi, ta lafaani mohatu, jabeesu.
Menahemuni beese suni ch'ufa worra dureeyyi irreeni iraa fud'ate, nama ch'ufa qarsi shantama. Jennaani hayyuuni Ashuru kae lafa isati gale.
Waan Menahemuni tolche ch'ufa kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Israeli keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Inni due awaalani, ilmi isa Pekahiani fulla isa hayyu tahe.
Ganna shantameeso ka Uziani hayyu Yuda tahe, Pekahiani, ilmi Menahemuni hayyu Israeli tahe, ganna lama Samaria keesa lafa mohate.
Inni faana Yeroboamu, ilma Nabathi, ka worra Israeli ch'ubbu keesa buuse, gula bahe, AABBO Waaqa durati ch'ubbu tolche.
Namichi gudda askarti Pekahia toko, ka maqaani isa Peka, ilma Remalia, nama shantama ka Gileaditini wolti malatani, fulla jajabdu mana hayyu ka Samaria keesati Pekahia ijeese, fulla isa Hayyu tahe.
Waan Pekahiani tolche ch'ufa Kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Israeli keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Ganna shantami lameeso ka Uziani hayyu Yuda tahe, Pekani, ilmi Remalia, hayyu Israeli tahe, ganna diddama Samaria keesa lafa mohate.
Inni faana Yeroboamu, ilma Nabathi, ka worra Israeli ch'ubbu keesa buuse gula bahe AABBO Waaqa durati ch'ubbu tolche.
Gaafa Pekani lafa Israeli mohate, Tiglath-Pilesarini, hayyuuni Ashuru, dira Iyoni fa, ka Abel-Bethi Maakafa, Yanoafa, Kedeshifa, Hazurifa ammalle lafa Gileaditifi ta Galilayatifi ta Naftalile had'e dabsate, worra lafa suni ch'ufa boojie, lafa Ashuruti galche.
Ganna diddameeso ka Yothamuni, ilmi Uzia hayyu Yuda tahe, Hosheani, ilmi Ela, hayyu Pekati malate ijeese, fulla isa hayyu tahe.
Waan Pekani tolche ch'ufa Kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Israeli keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Ganna lameeso ka Pekani, ilmi Remalia hayyu Israeli tahe, Yothamuni, ilmi Uzia, hayyu Yuda tahe.
Gaafasi ganni isaa diddami shani, inni ganna kud'ani jaa Yerusalemu keesa lafa mohate. Haad'a isa maqaani Yerusha, isiini dubra Sadoki.
Inni akuma abba isa Uzia waan AABBO Waaqa gammachiisa tolche.
Ammo tatule fulla waaqa d'ara iti kad'atani, ta gaareeni gubba, tokole imballeesine, biyyitileeni sorio baafte hit'aana aarsu illakimne. Nami balbala fullo Mana Waaqa ta mirga jaare Yothamu.
Waan Yothamuni tolche ch'ufa, kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Yuda keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Gaafi Yothamuni lafa Yuda mohate suni, gaafa AABBO Waaqi qara hayyu Resini ka Shamutifi hayyu Peka ka Israeli, lafa Yuda had'iisaa erge.
Yothamuni due jennaani irreesa hayyoota, ka dira Daudi keesati, awaalani, ilmi isa Ahaziani fulla isaa hayyu tahe.

Ganna kud'ani torbeeso ka Pekani, ilmi Remalia, hayyu Israeli tahe, Ahazini, ilmi Yothamu, hayyu Yuda tahe.
Gaafasi ganni isaa diddama, inni ganna kud'ani jaa Yerusalemu keesa lafa mohate. Inni faana ababo isaa Daudi gula bahu dide, waan AABBO Waaqa isaa ingammachiimne tolche.
Ammalle faana hayyoota Israeli gula bahe, aada hamtu worra AABBO Waaqi worra Israeli dura lafa keesa baase gula ilma ufile gube Waaqa d'araati sorio baase.
Fulla waaqa d'ara iti kad'atanifi gaareeni gubbafi mukeeni gaadisa gugurdo jalaleeti, Ahazini sorio baase hit'aana aarse.
(Gaafasi hayyuuni Edomu dira Elathi had'e dabsate, worra Yudea ka keesa tau keesaa baase. Duuba worri Edomu Elathi qubate, haga arrale achuma taa.)
Ahazini gara Tiglath-Pilesari, hayyu Ashuru nama erge waan jed'eeni: Anini hojatu tante ta guddo sii saalfatu. Kooti, hayyooti Shamutifi ka Israeli, ta na had'u jirtu, duraa na baasi.
Ahazini qarsifi worqi Mana Waaqatifi ka hayyu keesaa fuud'e, hayyu Ashuruti erge.
Tiglath-Pilesarini waan inni kad'ate suni ee jed'e fud'ate, askarti isa fud'ate Damaski had'u d'aqe, dabsate, hayyu Resini ijeese, worra dira suni boojie, Kiriti geese.
Gaafa hayyu Ahazini hayyu Tiglath-Pilesari dira Damaskiti argu d'aqe, inni waan sorio irati baasani achiti arge, akheekha isi ka fulla tokole illakisini ch'ufa t'aafe qaallicha Uriati erge.
Jennaani Uriani waan sorio irati baasani kama akasi suni jaare, ato Ahazini ingaliini, hobaase.
Damaski gale jennaani, Ahazini aka wonti sorio irati baasani suni jaaramte hobaate arge,
duuba inni horifi mid'aani sorio baase irati gube, daad'ifi d'iiga sorio wold'ageeti gubbati jisse.
Wonti mesa fakaata, ka sibiila diimani mid'aasani maqa AABBO Waaqatini eebisani waan sorio irati baasani hareeti taanifi Mana Waaqa jiddu jirti. Tanaafi Ahazini arti fuud'e waan inni jaare sorio irati baasani kaani mirga kaye.
Jennaani inni waan qaallicha Uriani jed'e: fulla harreeti tana irati sorio diirama ta gubanifi sorio galgala ta mid'aani gubi baasi, ammalle sorio gubanifi mid'aani Waaqaa baasani, ka hayyuufi biyyiti baaftu, ammalle daad'i biyyiti baaftule, fulla suni irati baasi. D'iiga hori sorio qalani ch'ufa arti irati jissi. Ammo waan sorio irati baasani, ka sibiila diimani mid'aasani kiyyuma anumati tolchaani waan suni irati Waaqa wo gaafata.
Qaallichi Uriani, waan ch'ufa akuma hayyuuni jed'eeni tolche.
Ammalle aka hayyu Ashuru gammachiisu Ahazini waan barch'umani hayyu ira eju Mana Waaqaa keesaa baase, balbala Mana Waaqa ta hayyuuni ch'allaani olseenuni ch'ufe.
Waan hayyu Ahazini tolche ch'ufa kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Yuda keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Ahazini due jennaani irreesa hayyoota, ka dira Daudi keesati, awaalani, ilmi isaa Hezekiani fulla isa hayyu tahe.

Ganna kud'ani lameeso ka Ahazini hayyu Yuda tahe, Hosheani ilmi Eela hayyu Israeli tahe, ganna sagali Samaria keesa lafa mohate.
Inni AABBO Waaqa durati ch'ubbu tolche, ammo tatule haga hayyoota isa durati Israeli mohate intolchine.
Hayyuuni Ashuru, ka Shalmanesa jed'ani d'ufe isa had'e; jennaani Hosheani isati harka kennate, ganna ch'ufa damoosa baaseefi.
Ammo ganna toko Hosheani qonqo gara hayyu Misiri, ka So jed'ani, erge, qarqaarsa kad'ate, damoosa duri gannati Ashuru baasu kaani baasu dide. Shalmanesani waan suni d'agaye jennaani Hoshea qabe, mana hid'aansa keesa buuse.
Jennaani Shalmanesani lafa Israeli d'ufe had'e, dira Samaria marse. Ganna sadeeso ka dira suni marsani,
ka ammalle haga Hosheani lafa mohate ganna sagali, hayyuuni Ashuru dira Samaria dabsate, worra Israeli boojie, lafa Ashuru geese, ka gari dira Hala geese, ka gari d'aatu galaana Habori, ka lafa Gozani, geese, ka gari dira worra Medi geese achiti qubsise.
Wonti dira Samaria akasi taheefi waan worri Israeli AABBO Waaqa isaani, ka worra harka hayyu Misiritiifi lafa Misiri keesa baase durati, ch'ubbu tolcheefi. Worri waaqoota d'ibi kad'ate,
aada gosa AABBO Waaqi gumi ufi duraa gusse gula yae, aada hayyooti Israeli d'uftenile tolfate.
Worri Israeli waan hamtu AABBO Waaqi infane tolfate, fulla Waaqa d'ara iti kad'atu dira ch'ufa keesati jaarate, dira didiqafi gugurda ch'ufa keesale.
Gaareeni gubbafi mukeeni gaadisa gugurdo jalale ch'ufa, d'akhaa old'ad'aabani, akheekha Ashera mid'aafatani.
Ammalle fulla waaqa d'ara iti kad'atani ch'ufati hit'aana aarsani, aada gosa AABBO Waaqi lafa keesaa gusse, gula yaani. Worri waan hamtu tolfate, waan sunini AABBO Waaqa dallansiise,
seera AABBO Waaqa ka Waaqa harkaani boch'ani inkad'atiina jed'u, ch'abse.
AABBO Waaqi raaga erge, worra Israelitiifi ka Yuda gorse waan jed'e, Kara keesani hama kana iraa deebia, aada tiyya ta seera anini duri ababoota teesani kenne, eegi sunile raagoota tiyyaani isani barsiise, jabeesa guuta.
Ammo worri guutu dide, akuma ababooti worra ta duri mata jabaate AABBO Waaqa d'ugefachu didde taani.
Worri aada isaa gula yau dide, wold'aqisa inni ababoota worra woliini tolfate guutu dide, gorsa isale ch'aqasu dide. Worri waan woma imbaane, ka harkaani boch'ani, kad'ate ufile woma bahu dad'abe. Ammalle worri aada gosa d'aatu worra jirtu gula yae, dubbi AABBO Waaqi worra seere, aada suni gula iyyaaiina jed'eeni ch'abse.
Worri seera AABBO Waaqa isaani ch'ufa ch'abse, sibiila tume akheekha koromi lama mid'aafate; ammalle akheekha waaqa Ashera jed'ani mid'aafatani, urji kad'atani, waaqa Baali jed'ani hojatani.
Worri ilmaani ufi, ta d'iirafi dubra waaqa d'araati gube sorio baase falfatuufi nama wo himu wo gaafate, kara ch'ufaani waan hamtu Waaqi infeene tolfatani, duuba akasiini isa dallansiisani.
AABBO Waaqi aka hama worra Israeliti dallane, fuula ufi dura worra gusse, gosa Yuda ch'alla hambise.
Ammo worri Yudaleeni seera AABBO Waaqa isaani inguunne, ammo aada worri Israeli d'ufeeni gula yaani.
AABBO Waaqi worra Israeli ch'ufa dide, worra gaargalche, harka nyaapa worraati worra kenne duuba eege akasiini fuula ufi dura worra balleese.
Eegi AABBO Waaqi worra Israelitiifi ka Yuda gargari baase, worri Israeli Yeroboamu ilma Nabathi hayyu tolfate. Yeroboamuni worra kara Waaqa iraa gorse ch'ubbu hamtu keesa buuse.
Worri faana Yeroboamu bahe, ch'ubbu inni tolche ch'ufa tolche.
Duuba eege AABBO Waaqi fuula ufi duraa worra balleese akuma inni duri raagoota isatini jed'e. Duuba akanaani worra Israeli boojiani lafa Ashuru geesani haga arrale worri achuma jira.
Hayyuuni Ashuru worra dira Babilonitifi Kuthatifi Avatifi Hamathifiti Sefarvaimu fuud'e, dira Samaria keesati qubsise, fulla qara worri Israeli ka boojiani jiru. Worri dira suni ch'ufa fud'ate keesa tae.
Worri gaafa qara achi qubatani AABBO Waaqa insodaanne; tanaafi inni nyeench'a worra hobaasu iti erge.
Jennaani waan hayyu Ashurutini jed'ani, Biyyiti dira Samaria keesa qubatu seera waaqa lafa suni imbeetu, tanaafi waaqi suni nyeench'a worra balleesa iti erge.
Jennaani hayyuuni Ashuru waan jed'e, Qaalole nu boojine taani nama toko gadi deebisa; inni ha gale, achi tae, seera waaqa lafa suni biyya barsiisuti.
Duuba akasiini qaallichi Israeli toko, ka qara Samaria keesaa boojiani, kae, Betheliti deebie, achi tae, aka AABBO Waaqa kad'atani biyya barsiise.
Ammo worri dira Samaria sunini akuma kaani waan boch'ani waaqa tolfatani maneeni worri Israeli duri jaare keesa kayani, kad'atani. Gochiti ch'ufti, dira keesa teetu keesati, waan harkaani boch'ani waaqa tolfatte kad'atte:
Worri Babiloni akheekha waaqa Sukoth-Benothi mid'aafate; worri Kutha ka Nergali mid'aafate; worri Hamathi ka Ashima mid'aafate;
worri Ari ka Nebhazitifi Tartaki mid'aafate; ammalle worri Safarvaimu ijoolle ufi waaqa Adrameleki jed'anifi Anameleki sorio gube baase.
Worri kunini ch'ufti AABBO Waaqale inuma kad'ata. Ammalle gosa ufi keesa namuma argani fohatani qaalole tolfatani, worri sunini fulla Waaqa d'araa suni iti kad'atani hojate, gumi ch'ufa jed'e sorio baase.
Duuba worri AABBO Waaqale kad'ate, ammalle waaqa ufile kad'ate, aada lafa worri keesaa bahe gula.
AABBO Waaqi duri wold'aqisa worra woliini tolfate waan jed'eeni; ana male waaqoota d'ibi inkad'atiina. Waaqoota suni durati gajettani inguddisina, yokhaani sorio imbaasinafi.
Isani ana, AABBO Waaqa ka jabeennaafi irre ufitini lafa Misiri keesaa isani baase ch'aqasu maltani. Isani na durati gajettani, sorio naa baasu maltani.
Isani hojja ch'ufa aadaafi seera anini isanii kenne guutu maltani. Isani waaqa d'ibi kad'achu himmalle,
ammalle wold'aqisa anini isani woliini tolfad'e inded'ina.
Isani ana, AABBO Waaqa keesani, ch'aqasu maltani, duuba anini harka nyaapa keesani keesaa isani baasa.
Ammo tatule worri dubbi suni ch'aqasu dide, aada ufi ta duri taana iraa ingore, guluma yae.
Duuba akasiini worri sunini AABBO Waaqa kad'ate, ammalle waan harkaani boch'anile waaqa jed'e kad'ate; haga arrale d'alooti worraa akasuma tolcha.

Ganna sadeeso ka Hosheani, ilmi Eela, hayyu Israeli tahe, Hezekiani, ilmi Ahazi hayyu Yuda tahe.
Gaafasi ganni isaa diddami shani, duuba inni ganna diddami sagali Yerusalemu keesa lafa mohate. Had'a isaa maqaani Abiya, isiini dubra Zekaria.
Inni faana ababo isaa Daudi gula bahe, waan AABBO Waaqa gammachiisa tolche.
Inni fulla Waaqa d'ara iti kad'atani ta gaareeni balleese, d'akhaye old'ad'aabani ch'ach'abse, akheekha waaqa Asherale ch'ach'abse. Inni ammalle bofa Musani sibiila diimani mid'aase, ka Nehushtani jed'ani, ch'ach'abse. Worri Israeli duri bofa suni hit'aana aarsefi guddise, haga guyya ch'ach'absani suni.
Hezekiani AABBO Waaqa Israeli d'ugeefate; worri Yuda, haguma d'alate, taka isa duraafi eegi isaale hayyu akasi inhoranne.
Inni taka AABBO Waaqa lakise seera isaa inch'absine. Ammo seera AABBO Waaqi Musaa kenne ch'ufa akuma dansaa guute.
Tanaafi AABBO Waaqi isa woliini jiraate, waan inni tolche ch'ufa keesati isa qarqaare, huji isaa eebiseefi. Inni hayyu Ashuruti garagale, hojachuufi dide.
Inni worra Filisti dabsate, qutuma worrale balleese, dira didiqafi gugurdale, dira Gazatifi lafa d'aatu jirtule.
Ganna afreeso ka Hezekiani lafa mohate, ka ammalle ganna ganna torbeeso Hosheani lafa Israeli mohate, hayyuuni Shalmanesani lafa Ashuru d'ufe, lafa Israeli had'e, dira Samaria marse.
Ganna sadi Samaria marsani, eege dabsatani; gaafasi ganna jaeeso ka Hezekiani lafa mohate, ammalle ganna sagaleeso ka Hosheani lafa mohate.
Hayyuuni Ashuru worra Israeli boojie, ka gari Hala geese, ka gari galaana Habori, ka lafa Gozani, geese, ka gaari dira worra Medi geese achi qubsise.
Wonti dira Samaria nyaapi dabsateefi waan worri Israeli AABBO Waaqa isaani lakise, wold'aqisa duri woliini tolfatani ch'abse, seera Musani hojattuuni AABBO Waaqa worraa kenne guutu dideefi. Worri waan suni inch'aqamne yokhaani diqole inguunne.
Ganna kud'ani ka Hezekiani lafa mohate, Senakeribuni, hayyuuni Ashuru, dira Yuda ka jabeesani jaarani had'e dabsate.
Jennaani Hezekiani qonqo gara Senakeribu, ka Lakishi jiru, erge waan jed'eeni, Anini ya woyake, na inhad'ini, naraa deebii, duuba waan atini feetu ch'ufa sii baasa. Hayyuuni Ashuru qonqo gara Hezekia deebise waan jed'eeni, Qarsi kilo kud'anitifi worqi kilo kuma toko naa baasi.
Hezekiani qarsi Mana Waaqatifi mana hayyu keesa jirtu ch'ufa iti erge.
Ammalle inni worqi balbala mana Waaqati dad'abaniifi ta inni mikhikila balbalati naqele ch'ufa guure ergeefi.
Jennaani hayyuuni Ashuru duula muumme inqamne dira Lakishiti kaase, Yerusalemuti erge, aka Hezekia had'u abbotiini duula suni worra gugurda sadi, ka qara askarti isaa ch'ufa harkaa qabu. Worri Yerusalemuni bahe, kara worri woya mid'aasu keesa tau, ka d'aatu fulla bisaani haro keesa diratini yaaniti naanae.
Jennaani worri hayyu Hezekia yaame, hojattuuni isaa, nami sadi, worrati gadi bahe: Worri sunini, Eliakimu, ilma Hilkia, ka mana hayyuuti gudda; Shebna, ka tatabe hayyu t'aafufi; Yoa, ilma Asafu, ka waan t'aafani olkayani ch'ufa harkaa qabu.
Namichi jara Ashuru guddaani toko waan jed'eeni, Waan isani Hezekiani jettani, Hayyuuni Ashuru waan jed'e, Maaniti akana garaa si jabeese ufi si d'ugefachise?
Atini waan dubbi tanteetiini oguma woraana dabsatu seeta? Amma eentu si qarqaara, mala keeti ka atini hayyu Ashuru didde iti gargalte?
Atini mala keeti waan worri Misiri si qarqaaru seeta, ammo mali sunini nama ilaadu ule sehe, ta yo inni lafati d'aabu ch'abt'e harka woraantu fakaata. Aki hayyuuni Misiri nama isa d'abatu tolchu akasi.
Ammo yo atini, AABBO Waaqa keenna d'aabanna nani jette nami fulla waaqa iti kad'atani sorio irati baasani balleese Hezekianiti? Ka ammalle garagale worra Yerusalemutifi ka Yudatini, Fulla sorio irati baasani ta Yerusalemu ch'allaati Waaqa kad'ad'a jed'e.
Amma kooti hayyu kenna ka Ashurutini waan takaa woliini taha: Anini fardoole kuma lama sii kenna, yo atini dandeete nama hagasi ka yaabatu naa kennite!
Atini akami dandeete hojattu abba kiyya ta guddinna womaatu inqamne d'owarta, ka ufiftu waan worri Misiri gaariifi askarti farda sii kennu seeta?
Atini waan anini qarqaarsa AABBO Waaqa male lafa teesani had'e balleese seeta? AABBO Waaqati, Beeni, lafa suni had'i balleesi nani jed'e.
Jennaani Eliakimufi Shebnafi Yoani waan namicha gudda kaaniini jed'ani, AABBO, afaani Aramutini nuti dubbad'i, ind'ageenna, afaani Ebrania nuti indubbatini nami d'aatu teenna ch'iisu kunini ch'ufti nu d'agaya.
Inni waan jed'eeni, Isani waan hayyichi Ashuru isanifi hayyu keesani ch'alla qonqo tana iti erge seetani? Hiyo akasiniti, anini gumi arma teteetu tana, ta eegi tana finch'aanifi udaani ufi akuma keesani sooratuti dubbachuni jira.
Jennaani namichi guddaani sunini afaani Ebraniatini lalabe waan jed'e, Dubbi hayyuuni Ashuru isaniini jed'u ch'aqasa!
Inni waan jed'u, Hezekiani isani insobini. Inni dandae harka kiyya keesaa isani imbaasu.
Inni AABBO Waaqa abdad'a jed'e isani insobini. Waan AABBO Waaqa isani baase askarti Ashuru dira keesani iraa deebisu insehina.
Dubbi Hezekia inch'aqasina. Hayyuuni Ashuru waan isaniini jed'u, Nati koota, booju kad'ad'a. Duuba yo booju kad'attani isaniini ch'ufti daad'i zabibu teesani d'uddani, mid'aani keesani ka oda nyaattani, madda teesani keesaa bisaani d'uddani,
haga anini lafa, lafa teesani fakaatu, ta mid'aanifi daad'i qabdu, ta qit'afi zabibu qabdu, ta d'ad'afi damma qabdu keesati isani qubsisuti. Yo waan inni fed'u tolchitani, isani indootani, injiratani. Dubbi Hezekia, ta inni, AABBO Waaqati nu baasa jed'e isani sobe suni ind'ugeefatina.
Gochiti d'ibiini ta, waaqa keennati harka hayyu Ashuru jalaa nu baase jette injirti?
Waaqi Hamathitifi ka Arpadi me re? Waaqi Sefarvaimutifi ka Henatifi ka Iva me? Waaqi suni tokoleeni ya Samaria harka kiyya jalaa baase?
Waaqi lafa suni tokoleeni yoomi lafa ufi harka kiyya keesaa baase? Isani akami, ka waan suni ch'ufa quba qabdani, Waaqi Yerusalemu nu baasa jettani re?
Ammo biyyiti akuma hayyuuni Hezekiani worraani jed'e ch'ach'alifte, akanumati teteete.
Jennaani Eliakimufi Shebnafi Yoani lalefatani, woya ufi tatarsaasani, deemani waan namichi Ashuru kaani jed'e hayyu Hezekiati himani.

Hayyu Hezekiani, akuma qonqo worra kaani d'agayeeni laalefate woya ufi tatarsaase, ch'arqi naqate, Mana AABBO Waaqa d'aqe.
Inni Eliakimu, ka mana hayyuuti guddatifi Shebna ka tatabe hayyu t'aafufi qaalole gugurdole gara raaga Isaya, ilma Amozi, erge. Worrileeni ch'ufti woya ch'arqi naqate.
D'aamsi inni, Isayati hima jed'e kana: Arriti guyya gaargalati, ka nu gaargalchani nu ch'eersani, nu niiti d'au jirtu, ta ilme irre d'iibatuni d'abde fakaanna.
Hayyuuni Ashuru yayu namicha gudda hojattu isaa, Waaqa gudda arabsi jed'e erge. AABBO Waaqi kanke ha araba kana d'agaye worra isa arabsu kana gaargalchuti. Tanaafi atini amma worra keenna ka hafu Waaqa kad'ad'i.
Isayaani d'aamsa hayyu Hezekia d'agaye jennaani, qonqo deebiseefi waan jed'e,
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, maro dubbi hojattu hayyu Ashuru, ta worri na arabse, tana jettani insodaatina.
Anini hayyicha odu lafa isaati isa deebiftu d'ageesise, duuba achiti isa ijeesa.
Namichi Ashuru guddaani kaani, aka hayyichi isaani Lakishi bahe dira Libna, ka d'aatu suni jiru, had'u jiru d'agaye, tanaafi inni achiti isa argu d'aqe.
Jennaani qonqooni worra Ashuruti d'ufte waan jette, Duuli lafa Misiri ka hayyu Tirhakani ka worra Kushi iti abba, had'iisa keesani d'ufu jira. Hayyuuni Ashuru dubbi suni d'agaye jennaani qonqo gara hayyu Yuda, ka Hezekia jed'ani, erge
waan jed'eeni, Waaqi isani d'ugeefattani, diri Yerusalemu harka hayyu Ashuru keesa inseenu jed'e isani insobini.
Waan hayyuuni Ashuru lafa inni balleesu fed'u ch'ufa tolchu ya d'ageetani. Isani mala keesani waan jalaa baatani seetani?
Ababooti tiyya dira Gozanifa, ka Haranifa, ammalle ka Resefufa balleesite, worra Beth-Edeni ka lafa Telasari keesa keesa jiru hobaafte, waaqi worra tokoleeni worra baasu dad'abe.
Hayyooti Hamathi, ta Arpadi, ta Sefarvaimu, ta Henatifi ta Ivaleeni ama me?
Hezekiani tatabe worra suni iraa fuud'e soome, Mana AABBO Waaqa d'aqe tatabe suni AABBO Waaqa dura kaye,
Waaqa kad'ate waan jed'e, Ee AABBO Waaqa, Waaqa Israeli, ka barch'uma kanke akheekha waan lubbu qaba ka koola gubbaa teetu, siuma ch'allaati lafafi gubba uume, ammalle lafafi nama ch'ufa fidda.
Ama, Ee AABBO Waaqa, waan harkaa na qaba kana argi, araba Senakeribuni si Waaqa gudda arabsu kana ch'ufa d'agayi.
D'uguma AABBO, hayyooti Ashuru yayu gosa heddu hobaafte lafa worrale balleesite
waaqoota worrale ch'ufa gubde — waaqoota woma keesa injirre, ka nami mukhaafi d'akha boch'e harkaani mid'aafatu.
Amma tana ee AABBO Waaqa keenna, harka worra Ashuru kana keesaa nu baasi, duuba akasiini gochiti lafa keesa jirtu ch'ufti, aka atini ch'allaani AABBO Waaqa beetu.
Jennaani Isayaani, ilmi Amozi, qonqo gara Hezekia erge waan jed'e, AABBO Waaqi Israeli waan jed'u. Anini kad'acha atini waan Senakeribu hayyu Ashuru na kad'ate ya d'aagae.
Wonti isaa ka AABBO Waaqi dubbate tana: Ee Senakeribu, diri Yerusalemu si koble si goyeese si tufata.
Nama atini arabsite goyeesite kana eenu seeta? Nami atini tufate sunini anuma, Waaqa Israeli qulqullo.
Atini qonqo namaani ergite d'aadde waan nani jette, Anini gaari kiyyaani fit'e gaareeni Lebanoni ch'ufa kore dabsad'e. Ammalle anini yayu hind'eesa d'ed'eerafi mukeeni jajabdu ch'ufa ch'irad'e badda keesa lit'e fulla ch'ufa gahe.
Ammalle anini yayu lafa nyaapa ch'ufa d'aqe eela qotad'e, bisaani keesaa d'uge, miili askarti tiyya yayu galaana Misiri gosse.
Atini aka anini waan suni ch'ufa herege si tolchisise ind'ageenne? Anini amma waan suni ch'ufa ya tolche guute. Nami irre atini dira jajabaani ch'ach'absite bulleesite sii kenne anuma.
Worri dira suni keesa tauleeni mudame sodaate. Worri suni buuyo diida yokhaani raafu mana gubbati baatu, ta qilleensi oowani ilaboru d'ufe balleesu fakaata.
Ammo anini waan kanke ch'ufa imbeekha, waan atini tolchitufi fulla atini deemtule. Ammalle aka atini dallante naati roqomtule anini imbeekha.
Anini yayu dallansufi kiyyiba kanke suni d'agaye, tanaafi amma tana kiyyoofi lugama Siti kaye kara atini d'ufte kaani si deebisa.
Jennaani Isayaani waan hayyuuni jed'e, Waan kanati akheekha sii taha. Ganna kanafi ganna d'ufu, mid'aanuma ufumaani baha nyaata, ammo ganna sadeeso atini mid'aani fach'aafate murate, zabibu oobrate mid'aani isii nyaatta.
Worri Yuda ka hafu akuma mukha hiddi isaa aka dansaa lafa keesa seene late mid'aani baasu taha.
Yerusalemufi gaara Sioni gubbati nami inuma hafa, wonti akanatiifi AABBO Waaqi waan suni tolchu male intau.
Wonti hayyu Ashuru, ka AABBO Waaqi jed'e, tana: Inni dira kana seene t'iya tokole indarbatu. Askartini wonte qabdu tokoleeni dira suniti ind'iaatu, ammalle booliti qotani dira sunini marsani injirtu.
Inni, ka dira inseenne, karuma d'ufe deebia. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana AABBO Waaqa.
Anini dira kana nyaapa iraa d'owe baasa, maro guddinna kiyyatifi ammalle maro kakhu ta anini hojattu tiyya Dauditi kakhad'eefi.
Halkani suni malaikaani AABBO Waaqa fulla duuli Ashuru jiru d'at'e, askarti nama kuma d'ibbafi saddeetami shani hobaafte. Boriyyaate lafti bariinaani reefa ufuma ch'iisu argani!
Jennaani hayyuuni Ashuru ka Senakeribu jed'ani kaani, kae Ninawiti gale.
Guyya toko, ato inni mana waaqa isaa, ka Nisroki jed'ani keesa tae waaqa kad'atu, ilmaani isaa lama, Adramelekifi Sharezani goraade ufitini isaa ijeefte, lafa Araratiti baqatte. Duuba ilmi isaa, ka Esar-Hadoni jed'ani, fulla isa hayyu tahe.

Bara suni Hezekiani faaya d'abe duud'ame. Raagi Isayaani, ilmi Amozi, isa argu d'aqe waan jed'eeni, AABBO Waaqi waan siini jed'u, Waan kanke ch'ufa mid'aafad'u, d'aamad'u, atini d'ukuba kana iraa inhaftu, inuma doota.
Jennaani Hezekiani fuula manati deefate, Waaqa kad'ate waan jed'e:
Ee AABBO, aka anini garaa tokooni si hojad'e sii saalfad'e woma atini feetu ch'alla tolche qaabad'i; akasi jed'e aka hama bohe.
Isayaani kae biraa deeme, Jennaani ato inni olla hayyu keesaa imbahinu AABBO Waaqi waan jed'eeni,
Deebii, waan Hezekia gudda gumi tiyyaatini jettu, Anini, AABBO Waaqi, Waaqi ababo kanke Daudi, yayu kad'acha tante d'agaye imimaani kanke arge. Anini si fayyise guyya sadeeso atini Mana Waaqa d'at'a.
Anini amma ganna kud'ani shani guyya kanke ira sii dara. Anini ammalle siifi dira Yerusalemu kana harka hayyu Ashuru keesaa baase, dira sunile jabeese nyaapa iraa d'owa, maro guddinna kiyyatifi maro kakhu anini hojattu kiyya Dauditi kakhad'eefi.
Jennaani Isayaani haanch'a oda d'ulla isati mat'anse, duuba akanaani fayye.
Hezekiani waan Isayaani jed'e, Akheekhi aka AABBO Waaqi na fayyise guyya sadeeso Mana Waaqa d'aqu inni na garsiisu kami?
Isayaani waan jed'eeni, AABBO Waaqi akheekha kana sii kenne akanaani kakhu isaa guuta. Gaandiduni faano gubbaa ta ejata kud'ani dura deemtu mo ta duuba deebitu feeta?
Hezekiani waan jed'eeni, Aki gaandidu ejata kud'ani dura deemsisani laafa! gaandiduni ha dudda duuba deebituuti.
Isayaani AABBO Waaqa kad'ate jennaani AABBO Waaqi gaandidu taani faano hayyu Ahazini jaare ira ejata kud'ani dudda duuba deebise.
Bara suni hayyuuni Babiloni, ka Merodaka Baladani, ilma Baladani, jed'ani, aka Hezekiani fayya d'abe d'agaye tatabeefi waan d'ibi ergeefi.
Hezekiani worra ergaani d'ufe suni olseena jed'e durooma qabu ch'ufa worra garsiise — qarsi, worqi, qumbiifi qayya, ammalle miha isaa ka lola ch'ufa. Wonti inni olkaye, ka mana isaa keesa jiraatiifi ka fulla d'ibi jiraaleni ka inni worra ingarsiisini tokoleeni injirtu.
Jennaani raagi Isayaani gara hayyu Hezekia d'aqe waan jed'eeni, Worri kunini eesaa d'ufe? Worri maani sini jed'e?
Hezekiani waan jed'eeni, Worri lafa tanaa ind'umne, Babilonii d'ufe, lafa ind'iaanne Isayaani waan jed'eeni,
Worri maani mana kanke keesati arge? Inni waan jed'e, Worri waan ch'ufa arge, wonti anini worra ingarsiisini injirtu.
Jennaani Isayaani waan hayyuuni jed'e, AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u,
Guyyaani ind'ufa, ka waan mana kanke keesa jira ch'ufafi waan ababooti tante olkeetele ch'ufa fuud'ani lafa Babiloni geesani; wonti tokoleeni inhaftu.
Ilmaani atini d'altele haga toko boojiani sasangisiisani mana hayyu Babiloni keesa hojachiisani.
Jennaani Hezekiani waan Isayaani jed'e, Dubbini AABBO Waaqa, atini nati himte tunini, waan dansa. Wonti Hezekiani akasi jed'eefi, inni waan sehe, waan haga inni lafa fidu lafti nagaya taatu seha.
Waan Hezekiani tolche ch'ufa, jannoomafi aka inni haro qote jaare, fulla bisaani haro suni keesaa diratini yaani mid'aasele ch'ufa Kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Yuda keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Hezekiani due jennaani ilmi isaa Manaseeni fulla isaa hayyu tahe.

Ganni Manase kud'ani lama gaafa inni hayyu Yuda tahe ammalle Yerusalemu keesa haga ganna shantami shani lafa mohate. Maqaani had'a isaa Hefziba.
Akuma gosa AABBO Waaqi duri worra duraa gusse ta waan hamtu taate isa durati ch'ubbu hamtu tolchite taani Manaseleeni AABBO Waaqa durati ch'ubbu tolche.
Fulla waaqa d'ara iti kad'atani ta gaara ira, ta qara abbaani isaa Hezekiani ch'ach'abse, jaare ammalle fulla Baali iti kad'atani sorio baasanifi mid'aase, fakeenna waaqa Ashera jed'anile boch'e, akuma hayyuuni Israeli ka Ahabu jed'ani kaani tolche. Ammalle inni urjile ch'ufa gajed'e kad'ate.
Inni Mana AABBO Waaqa ka Waaqi, na ch'alla keesati yaamad'a jed'e, keesati, fulla sorio waaqa d'ara irati baasani, jaare.
Inni naabo lamaani ch'icha Mana Waaqa garaa keesati waan sorio irati baasani urji kad'atani jaare.
Inni ilma isaa sorio gubani baase ammalle nama wohime, murma baafate, worra ayyaanatifi falfaltu d'ugeefate gula deeme. Inni ch'ubbu guddo hamtu tolche akasiini AABBO Waaqa dallansiise.
Inni akheekha waaqa Ashera jed'ani mid'aase fuud'e Mana AABBO Waaqa ke kaye, Mana Waaqi duri Daudifi ilma isaa Solomonini; Yerusalemu keesa mana kana keesati fulla anini lafa gosa Israeli kud'ani lamaani taani keesaa fohad'e iti na kad'ad'a jed'e.
Yo gumiini Israeli Seera kiyya guute Seera hojattuuni tiyya Musani kenneefi ch'ufa gula yaate, anini aka worra lafa anini ababoota worrati kenne taani keesaa baasani ee injed'u.
Ammo gumiini Yuda AABBO Waaqa ch'aqasu didde, ammalle Manaseeni ch'ubbu guddo hamtu, ta ch'ubbu gosa worra AABBO Waaqi gumi isa ta Israeli duraa gusse taale iraa jirtu, tolchisise.
AABBO Waaqi hojattu isaa raagootaani dubbate waan jed'e,
Hayyu Manaseeni yayu waan hamtu, ka waan worri Kanaani tolche kaanile ira hamtu tolche akasiini gosa Yuda ch'ubbu keesa buuse.
Tanaafi, Anini AABBO Waaqi Israeli, gaargala guddaani Yerusalemufi Yudatini d'ufa, aka nami ch'ufti ka waan kana d'agau rifate bakhakhu.
Akuma anini Samaria gaargalche kaani Yerusalemule tolcha, akuma duri hayyu Ahabu Israelitiifi d'aloota isale tolche. Gumi Yerusalemu ch'ufa lafa iraa hare balleese, akuma qori d'iqani lafati gombisani tolcha.
Nama fiige bahe balleese harka nyaapa isati kenna, aka worra dabsatani lafa isaani ch'ufa keesaa boojiani.
Wonti anini waan suni tolchufi waan worri nati ch'ubbame, haguma duri ababooti worraa lafa Misiriti baate haga arra na dallansiisefi.
Manaseeni nama heddu ka wollaala womaatu inqamne hobaase, d'iigi aka galaana dibbise Yerusalemu keesa yae; tana malele inni worra Yuda waan boch'ani kad'atani kaani gula deebise AABBO Waaqa durati akanaani ch'ubbu keesa buuse.
Waan Manaseeni tolche ch'ubbu inni tolche ch'ufale kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Yuda keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Manaseeni due jennaani oobru mana hayyu d'aatu, ta Uza jed'ani, keesati awaalani, ilmi isa, ka Amoni jed'ani, fulla isaa hayyu tahe.
Ganni Amoni diddami lama gaafa inni hayyu Yuda tahe, ammalle inni ganna lama Yerusalemu keesa lafa Yuda mohate. Haati isaa Meshulemethi, ta dubra Haruzi, ta worra dira Yotba.
Akuma abba isaa Manase, innileeni AABBO Waaqa durati ch'ubbu tolche;
wanuma abbaani isaa tolche kaani gula deeme waaqoota d'ara, ka abbaani kad'ate kaani, innileeni kad'ate.
Inni AABBO Waaqa ababooti isaa dide Seera AABBO Waaqa iraa gore.
Hojattuuni Amoni, isati malate mana hayyu keesati isa ijeefte.
Jennaani worri Yuda jara isaa ijeese kaani hobaase, ilma isaa ka Yosia jed'ani hayyu tolche.
Waan Amonini tolche ch'ufa kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Yuda keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Amoni oobru Uza keesati awaalani, duuba ilma isa Yosiani fulla isaa hayyu tahe.

Yosiani waan AABBO Waaqi fed'u tolche, faanuma ababo isaa Daudi, ka diqole iraa ingorini bahe, Seera Waaqa ch'ufa jabeese guute.
Yosiani ganna kud'ani saddeeteeso ka lafa mohate keesa nama isaa tatabe t'aafu ka maqaani Shefani, ilma Azalia ka akhaakhu Meshulamu, Mana Waaqati erge waan jed'eeni,
Beeni, gara Hilkia Qaallu gudda d'aqi, haga beeseeni qaaloleeni fullo Mana Waaqa keesati nama iraa guurte geetu hubad'i.
Waan atini jettuuni, Beese suni worra Mana Waaqa mid'aasuu kenni. Duuba worri ha
ogeeyifi ijaartufi worra d'akha boch'u baase ammalle mukhaafi d'akha manani mid'aasanile bituti.
Worri hujiti mata ch'ufti nama d'uga, ka hori ch'ubbu inyaanne, tanaafi wonti isani beese suni maanini hojattani jettani gaafatanifi injirtu.
Shafanini d'aamsa hayyu Hilkiati hime jennaani, Hilkiani waan jed'eeni, Anini yayu kitaaba Seera Mana Waaqa keesati arge. Duuba Hilkiani kitaaba fuud'e iti kenne jennaani Shefanini fuud'e soome.
Duuba hayyuuti deebie waan jed'eeni, Hojattuuni tante yayu beese Mana Waaqa keesa jirtu taani fuute worra Mana Waaqa mid'aasuu kennite.
Ammalle wonti inni jed'e, Anini kuno kitaaba Hilkiani nati kenne harka qaba, jed'e, duuba hayyu soome.
Hayyuuni kitaaba soomu jirani d'agaye jennaani laalefate woya ufiraa qabu tatarsaase,
duuba seera baase, waan qaallicha Hilkiafi, Ahikamu ilma Shafanitifi Akbori ilma Mikatifi Shafani ka tatabe hayyu t'aafufi Asaya ka hayyu hojattuuni jed'e,
Bena, anaafi gumi Yuda ch'ufaa waan kitaaba kana keesati t'aafani AABBO Waaqa nuu gaafad'a. AABBO Waaqi yayu nuti dallane, maro ababooti teenna waan kitaaba kanati t'aafani gula yau dideefi.
Jennaani Hilkia, Ahikamu, Akbori, Shafani ammalle Asayani yaani niiti Hulda jed'ani ta raaga ta dira yerusalemu moga hareetiti galtu d'aqani wogaafatani. (D'iirsi isii shalumuni ka ilma Tikra, ka akhaakhu Harhasi, inni nama woya Mana Waaqa qorqoratu.) Worri waan tahe kana ch'ufa iti hime,
jennaani isiini waan jetteeni, AABBO Waaqi Israeli waan jed'u: waan isani nama nati isani ergeeni jettani,
AABBO Waaqi Israeli waan jed'u, Anini Yerusalemu nama isa ch'ufa ingaargalcha, akuma kitaaba hayyu soomani keesati t'aafani.
Worri ya na dide sorio waaqa d'ibi baase, akanaani worri huji sunini na dallansiise, tanaafi dallansuuni sunini ta anini Yerusalemuti dallane deebite amma nara ingaltu.
Ammo gama hayyu. Anini AABBO Waaqi Israeli waan jed'u: Atini waan kitaaba keesati t'aafani ch'aqafte,
aka anini Yerusalemufi nama isi ch'ufa, imballeesa jed'e sodaachise d'ageete, ch'ubbu iraa deebite, na durati ufi diqeesite, woya tante tatarsaafte boote. Anini dira suni waan nama rifachiisa tolcha, aka nami maqa isaatini nama abaaru. Ammo anini kad'acha tante yayu d'agaye.
Tanaafi haga atini dootuti anini Yerusalemu gaargalche woma intolchu. Atini ato nagayi jiru doota. Jari deebie d'aamsa kana hayyu Yosiati hime.

Hayyu Yosiani jaarole gugurdo Yudatifi ta Yerusalemutifi
qaaloleefi raaga, ammalle nama d'ibi dureesafi hiyyeesale ch'ufa wolti yaame, worri ch'ufti woliini gara Mana Waaqa d'aqe, duuba hayyuuni gumi ch'ufa dura eje, lalabe, kitaaba wold'aqisa ka Mana Waaqa keesati argani soomeefi.
Inni d'aatu utuba hayyu eje, wold'aqisa AABBO Waaqa woliini tolfate, aka Waaqa gula deeme, seerafi aadaafi waan inni fed'u ch'ufa garaafi qalbi isaatini tolchu, aka taka tana dubbi kitaaba wold'aqisa keesati t'aafani guutu. Duuba nami ch'ufti aka wold'aqisa kana jabeese guutu kakhate.
Inni qaalole duri hayyuuni Yuda muude huji sorio waaqa d'araati hojattani dira Yudatifi lafa d'aatu Yerusalemule iti kenne ch'ufa huji suni keesaa yaase — qaalole ta Baalifi aduufi jiaafi urjiifi Bakalchale sorio baafte.
Inni akheekha waaqa Ashera jed'anile Mana Waaqa keesa fuud'e, dira keesa alati baase, laga Kidroni keesati gube, d'ukeese d'uke sunile lafa nama iti awaalaniti firfirse.
Ammalle mana nad'eeni sharmut'i iti galtu ka d'aatu Mana Waaqa balleese. (Artiti nad'eeni woya waaqa Ashera jed'aniini kad'atani hod'ite mid'aasiti.)
Inni qaalole dira Yuda keesa jirtu ch'ufa Yerusalemutini d'ufe, duuba fulla sorio Waaqa d'ara iti baasani ta lafa suni ch'ufa keesa jirtu yake t'ureese, ammalle fulla waaqa d'ara iti kad'atani ta harka bita, d'aatu fullo Yoshuani guddaani dira suni jaarellee ch'ach'abse.
Qaalole suni Mana Waaqa keesa hojachu d'owani, ammo akuma qaalole taani d'ibi qit'a bukho inqamne nyaati.
Ammalle fardoole hayyooti Yuda huji kad'acha aduti jette baafte achi balleese, gaari huji suni baasanile ch'ufa gube. (Wonti kuni Manuma Waaqa d'aatu fulla fullo ta d'aatu mana Nathan-Meleki jaallabi guddaani iti galu, jirti.)
Fulla waaqa d'araati sorio irati baasani, ta gubbaa mana Ahazi, ta hayyooti Yuda mid'aasiteefi ammalle fulla waaqa d'araati sorio irati baasani ta Manaseeni ballinna Mana Waaqa gama lachutu jaare ch'ufa, gadi hirkise ch'ach'abse bulleese, bulla haftele bale Kidroni keesati jisse.
Hayyu Yosiani fulla sorio irati baasani, ta hayyu Solomonini gaara ejersaatini bitaa Yerusalemu ilaboruti jaare aka waaqa d'ara ka Ashtorethifi waaqa Sidonitifi Kemoshi waaqa Moabutifi Milkomu waaqa Amoni iti kad'attani t'ureese balleese.
Hayyu Yosiani d'akha aka utuba old'ad'aabani kaani ch'ach'abse bulleese, akheekha waaqa Ashtorethi jed'ani kaani ch'ire duuba fulla akheekhi kunini qara jiru kaani lafele namaatiini guute.
Yosiani ammalle fulla waaqa d'ara iti kad'atani, ta hayyu Yeroboamu, ilmi Nabathi, Betheliti jaare akasiini worra Israeli ch'ubbu keesa buuse kaani ch'ach'abse. Yosiani ammalle fulla suni buqise, d'akha jaaranini ch'ach'abse bulleese, tume d'ukeese; ammalle akheekha Asherale fuud'e gube.
Eege Yosiani ufi d'aatu laale, awaala kubi gubaati arge. Jennaani nama yaame, lafe keesaa guura jed'eeni, lafele suni fulla sorio irati baasani gubbati gube. Akanaani fulla suni yake t'ureese. Duuba inni fulla suni t'ureese, akasiini dubbi raagi duri, gaafa jila, ka hayyu Yeroboamuni fulla suni d'aatu eju jed'e taani guute.
Jennaani hayyuuni Irreesa sunini ka eenu jed'e gaafate? Worri Betheli waan jed'eeni Irreesi sunini ka raaga Yudea d'ufe, waan atini fulla sorio irati baasani tana tolchite kana fage.
Hayyu Yosiani waan jed'e, Akasumati lakisa lafe isaa tokole intuqina. Tanaafi lafe isaatiifi ta raaga Samaria d'ufele tokole awaala keesaa infuud'ini.
Dira Israeli ch'ufa keesa hayyu Yosiani fulla sorio iti baasani waaqa dara iti kad'atani ch'ufa, ta hayyooti Israeli jaarte akanaani AABBO Waaqa dallansiifte, ch'ach'abse. Fulla sorio iti baasani tana ch'ufa, akuma Betheliti tolche kaani, tolche.
Inni qaalole waaqa d'ara taani ch'ufa fulla sorio iti baasani, ta isiini hojattu irati fit'e, duuba lafele nama fulla sorio irati baasani suni ch'ufa gubbati gube; eege Yerusalemuti deebie.
Hayyu Yosiani seera baase aka nami ch'ufti jila Pasaka tana jabeese, AABBO Waaqa guddisu, akuma kitaaba wold'aqisa keesati t'aafani kaani.
Takuma hayyuuni tokoleeni ka Israeli yokhaani ka Yudaleeni jila Pasaka ta akasi intolchine haga jaallabooti lafa mohate asi.
Ammo amma eege ganna kud'ani saddeeteeso ka hayyu Yosiani lafa mohate keesa, biyyiti jila Pasaka Yerusalemu keesa gammadaani tolfate.
Ammalle Yosiani falfaltuufi worra ayyaanatifi ammalle akheekha waan aka Mana Waaqa keesati kad'attani ch'ufa Yudafi Yerusalemu keesa balleese, aka akanaani t'aafi kitaaba qaallicha Hilkia jed'ani, Mana Waaqa keesati arge kaani keesa jirtu guutufi tolche.
Isa durati yokhaani eegi isaale hayyuuni aka Yosia AABBO Waaqa garaafi qalbiifi irreeni hojate Seera Musa ch'ufa guute, tokoleeni injiru.
Ammo AABBO Waaqa dallansuuni inni waan Manaseeni tolche gula worra Yudati dallane taani diqole iraa ingalle.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi waan jed'e, Akuma qara Israeli gusse Yudale fuula kiyya duraa gussa. Ammalle Yerusalemu dira anini fohad'eefi mana kiyya ka anini maqaani kiyya ha keesa jiraatu jed'elle imballeesa.
Waan eege Yosiani tolche ch'ufa kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Yuda keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Gaafa Yosiani hayyuma harkaa qabu suni, hayyuuni Neko jed'ani, ka lafa Misiri, askarti isaa fud'ate galaana Frati taake hayyu Ashuru qarqaaru d'aqe. Jennaani hayyu Yosiani askarti Misiri fuula keesa deeme Megidoti had'e, had'iisa suni keesati due.
Hojattuuni isaa reefa isaa gaari keesa keete Yerusalemu geesite, awaala qara isaa qotani keesati awaalte. Duuba worri Yuda Yoahazi, ilma Yosia, fohate muude fulla abba isaa hayyu tolfate.
Ganni Yoahazi diddami sadi gaafa inni hayyu Yuda tahe ammalle inni Yerusalemu keesa jia sadi lafa mohate. Maqaani haad'a isaa Hamutali, ta dubra Yeremia, ka dira Libna.
Inni faani ababoota isaa gula bahe AABBO Waaqa durati ch'ubbame.
Jennaani hayyuuni Misiri ka Neko jed'ani kaani isa qabe hid'e Ribla ta lafa Hamathiti geese akasiini inni hayyuma ufi d'abe. Ammalle inni worra Yuda qarsi kilo kuma saditifi d'ibba afuritiifi worqi kilo sodomi afuri baasisise.
Hayyu Nekoni ilma Yosia, ka Eliakimu jed'ani fulla abba isaa hayyu Yuda tolche, maqa isaa Yehoiakimuti jijire. Hayyu Nekoni Yoahazi lafa Misiri geese, inni achiti due.
Hayyu Yehoiakimuni qabeenna nama gula damoosa nama iraa guure, aka hori hayyuuni Misiri fed'u kaani qit'eesu.
Ganna Yehoiakimu diddami shani gaafi inni hayyu Yuda tahe, ammalle inni Yerusalemu keesa ganna kud'ani toko lafa mohate. Maqaani haad'a isaa Zebida isiini dubra Pedaya ka dira Ruma.
Yehoiakimuni faana ababoota isa gula bahe, AABBO Waaqa durati ch'ubbu tolche.

AABBO Waaqi duula heddu worra Babilonifa ka Shamufa ka Moabufa ka Amonifa lafa Yuda balleesiti iti erge, akuma AABBO Waaqa hojattu isaa ta raagatini jed'e kaani.
Wonti jecha Waaqa gula wonti kunini ch'ufti taateefi, aka AABBO Waaqi worra Yuda ufi dura balleesu, maro ch'ubbu heddu Manaseeni duri tolcheefi;
ammo keessuma waan inni nama woma iyyakini fit'eefi. Waan kanaafi AABBO Waaqi Manasee araaramu dide.
Waan Yehoiakimuni tolche ch'ufa kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Yuda keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Yehoiakimunu donaani ilmi isaa Yekoniani fulla isaa hayyu tahe.
Hayyu Misiritiifi askartini isaa ituma deebite lafa isaani keesaa imbaane, wonti akanatiifi hayyu Babiloniti lafa duri Misiriini mohatu ch'ufa mohate; lafti sunini galaana Fratiti ejite haga muumme seera lafa Misiri moga mirgati ejiti.
Yekonia ganni isaa kud'ani saddeeti gaafa inni hayyu Yuda tahe ammalle inni Yerusalemu keesa jia sadi lafa mohate. Maqaani haad'a isaa Nehushta, ta dubra Elnathani, ka dira Yerusalemu.
Inni akuma abba isaa AABBO Waaqa durati ch'ubbu tolche.
Gaafasi duuli Nebukadreza ka hayyu Babiloni d'ufe Yerusalemu marse had'e.
Gaafa lola suni hayyu Nebukadrezani Yerusalemu d'ufe jennaani,
hayyu Yekoniafi haad'a isaatiifi ilmaani isaatiifi askarti isaale, ammalle worri mana hayyu keesa hojattuleeni ch'ufti woligalani, booju worra Babiloni kad'attani. Ganna saddeeteeso ka inni lafa mohate keesa, Nebukadrezani hayyu Yekonia qabe,
isaafi hori mana hayyu keesa jiru ch'ufa Babiloni geese. Akuma qara AABBO Waaqi duraani hime kaani, hayyu Nebukadrezani miha worqi ka hayyu Solomoni Mana Waaqa keesati mid'aase, ch'ufa ch'ach'abse.
Hayyu Nebukadrezani worra Yerusalemu ch'ufa qabe. Ammalle worra woliini ilmaani hayyuutifi worra gugurda lafa suni, ka wolti nama kuma kud'ani, boojie. Inni hogeeyiifi tumtu ch'ufa boojie, hiyyeeyi ch'alla lafa suniti lakise.
Nebukadrezani Yekoniafi haad'a isaatiifi nad'eeni isaatiifi jaallaboota isaatiifi ammalle jaarole lafa Yuda ch'ufa qaqabe boojie lafa Babiloni geese.
Nebukadrezani nama d'iira ch'alla jajaba kuma torba, ammalle hogeeyiifi tumtu nama kuma toko, ka kamu nama jajaba huji askarti guutu Babiloniti godaansise.
Nebukadrezani abuyya Yekonia, ka Mattania jed'ani, hayyu tolche, maqa jijire Sedekia baaseefi.
Hayyu Sedekiani akuma hayyu Yekoniani tahe kaani AABBO Waaqa durati ch'ubbu tolche.
AABBO Waaqi guddo worra Yerusalemutifi ka Yudaleti dallane, fuula ufi duraa balleese.

haga ganna kud'ani tokeeso ka Sedekiani lafa mohate artuma tae had'e.
Guyya sagaleeso, ka jia afreeso ka ganna suni, beelti dira suni keesati guddatte,
nami sagale nyaatule d'abe, naabo dira sunile ch'absani. Ato worri Babiloni dira suni marsele askartini ch'ufti halkaniini fullo naabo lamaani jiddu jirtu, ta d'aatu oobru hayyuutini baqatte gara bale Yordani iti d'aabatte.
Ammo askartini Babiloni hayyu Sedekia reebde diida Yerikoti d'aqabde jennaani askartini isaa ch'ufti biraa baqatte.
Duuba isa qabani hayyu Babiloni ka Ribla jiruti geesani, achiti hayyu Nebukadrezani ijeecha iti mure.
Ilmaani isaa ila isaa durati fit'ani isale ila keesa guurani sansalatani hid'ani Babiloni geesani.
Guyya torbeeso ka jia shaneeso, ganna kud'ani sagaleeso ka Nebukadrezani hayyu Babiloni lafa mohate Nebuzaradanini ka makala hayyu, ka ammalle inni gudda askarti isaa, Yerusalemu d'ufe.
Inni Mana Waaqatifi mana hayyuutifi maneeni nama gugurda ka Yerusalemu ch'ufa gube,
askartini isaleeni naabo diraani marsani jaarani ch'ufa ch'ach'absite.
Duuba Nebuzaradani worra dira Yerusalemu keesati hafefi hogeeyiifi nama worra isaani lakise hayyu Babiloniti baqate fuud'e Babilonitini gale.
Ammo inni hiyyeeyi woma inqamne lafa Yudati lakise, aka worri zabibu tisse oobrule qotu.
Worri Babiloni utuba sibiila diimani mid'aasanifi waan gaari fakaata ka Mana Waaqa keesa jiru ch'ufafi haro gingiti sibiila diimani mid'aasanile ch'ufa ch'abse, sibiila diima ch'ufa lafa Babiloniti geese.
Ammalle worri daboolafi eele daara iti haranifi miha ifseeni qorqoratanifi qori d'iiga sorio iti naqanifi qori hit'aana iti aarsanifi miha Mana Waaqatini hojattani, ka sibiila diimani mid'aasani ch'ufa, itiini d'aabatani.
Ammalle worri waan worqifi qarsiini mid'aasanifi qori didiqofi daboolaa ch'ile ibidatini fuud'anile, ch'ufa fuud'ani itiini d'aabatani.
Miha Solomonini sibiila diimani Mana Waaqaati mid'aase utuba lamaanifi waan aka gaari kaanifi haro gingitini taanile dandaani ulfinna isii imbiimani.
Utubaani lamaani haguma taka: old'eerinni isaa d'und'uma kud'ani saddeeti, ka kamu waan aka sure ta d'und'uma sadii sibiila diimani mid'aasani mata gubba kayani. Waan aka sure suni ch'ufa looti sibiila diimani mid'aasani marsani, waan aka okhoku ka sibiila diimani mid'aasanini ch'okhaani.
Tana male Nebuzaradanini ka gudda askarti, qaallicha gudda Seraya jed'anifi, Sefania ka isati aanufi ammalle jara gugurda Mana Waaqa keesa hojattu, nama sadi qaqabe Babiloni geese.
Dira keesa, inni nama askarti ch'ufaa matatifi, nama shani ka makala hayyu, ka dira keesati hafefi namicha nama askartii matati aanu, ka waan askarti lafa suni ch'ufa t'aafufi ammalle nama jaatama d'ibi ka gurra qabu ch'ufa woliini qabe geese.
Nebuzaradanini, ka gudda askarti, worra kana ch'ufa guure, hayyu Babiloni, ka Ribla jiruti, geese.
Achiti lafa Hamathiti hayyicha worra d'aane lubbule fit'e. Duuba akanaani worra Yuda lafa worra keesaa boojiani lafa d'ibi geesani.
Worri askarti Yudati matatifi askartini worra, ta harka inkennatini, waan kana d'ageete jennaani, Mispati goli Gedaliati daramani. Maqaani worra gugurda suni kana: Ishmaeli ilma Nethania, Yohana ilma Karea, Seraya ilma Tanhumethi, ka dira Netafa, ammalle Yezania ilma Maaka.
Gedaliani worrati kakhate waan jed'e, Wonti isani worra Babiloni iraa d'eetani injirtu, lafa tanati qubad'a, hayyu Babiloniti hojad'a, akanaani bulti argattani.
Ammo jia torbeeso, ganna suni keesa, Ishmaeli ilmi Nethania, ka akhaakhu Elishana, ka fiit'a hayyu nama kud'ani fud'ate Mispa d'aqe, Gedaliafi worra Israelitiifi ka Babiloni ka isa woliini jirule had'e ijeese.
Jennaani worri Israeli, dureeyyiifi, hiyyeeyifi worri askartiti mataa woliini kaani; maro worra Babiloni sodaatanifi lafa Misiri d'aqani.
Ganna sodomi torbeeso ka Yekoniani hayyu Yuda boojiani, guyya diddami torbeeso ka jia kud'ani lameeso, Evil-Merodakini hayyu Babiloni tahe, Yekonia hayyu Yudati nahe hid'aansa keesa baase.
Inni Yekonia dubbi dansa iti dubbate, hayyoota isa woliini boojiani taani ch'ufa iraa ulfeese.
Tanaafi Yekoniani woya gaafa isa hid'ani keeyachiisani taani jijirate haga jiru ch'ufa mana hayyu keesa hayyu woliini sagale nyaate.
Haga inni jiru guyya ch'ufa beese waan isaa male kennaniifi.

Adamuuni abba Sethi, Sethini abba Enoshi, Enoshiini abba Kenani,
Kenani abba Mahalaleli, Mahalaleliini, abba Yaredi.
Yaredeni abba Henoko, Henokoni abba Methuselahi, Methuselahini abba Lameki,
Lamekini abba Nuhu, Nuhuuni ilmaani sadi qaba: Shemu, Hamu, Yafethi.
Ilmaani Yafethi: Gomeri, Magogu, Madai, Yarani, Tubali, Mesheki, Tirasi, ilmaani tana tamu gosa maqa worraa qabduti iraa bahe.
Gochiti Gomeri iraa baate, Askanazi, Rifathi ammalle Togama.
Gochiti Yovani iraa baate, Elisha, Tarshishi, Kitimu, Rodani.
Ilmaani Hamu: Kushi, Misiri, Putu, Kanaani. Ilmaani tana tamu gosa maqa worraa qabduti iraa bahe.
Gochiti Kushi ira baate Seba, Havila, Sabta, Raama, Sabteka, gochiti Raama ira baate, Shebafi Dedani.
(Ilmi Kushi toko ka Nimrodi jed'ani lafa ch'ufa keesa waan woraana iti jabaate abba iti tahe.)
Gochiti Misiri iraa baate, Ludi, Anami, Lehabi, Naftuli,
Pathrusi, Kasluhi ammalle Kaftori (ka gochiti Filisti iraa baate).
Ilmaani Kanaani, angafi Sidoni, kaani Hethi. Ilmaani tana tamu gosa maqa worraa qabduti iraa bahe.
Gochiti Yebusi, ta Amori, ta Girgashi, ta
Hivi ta Arki, ta Sini,
ta Arvadi, ta Semari, ta Hamathi, gochiti tunini ch'ufti kanaani iraa baate.
Ilmaani Shemu: Ilamu, Ashuru, Arfaksadi, Ludi, Aramu, Usi, Huli, Getheri, Mashi. Ilmaani tana tamu gosa maqa worraa qabduti iraa bahe.
Arfaksadiini abba Sala, Salani, abba Eberi.
Eberini ilmaani d'iira lama d'ale; toko maqaani Pelegi, wonti maqa suni baasanifi bara suni nami ch'ufti gargari bahe; gurba kaani d'ibi maqaani Yoktani.
Worri Yoktani iraa hore kana: Almodadi, Shelefi, Hazarmavethi, Yera,
Hadoramu, Uzali, Dikla,
Obali, Abimaeli, Sheba,
Ofiri, Havila, Yobabu.
Kunini maqa worra Shemufi Abramu jiddu jiru: Shemu, Arfaksadi, Sala,
Eberi, Pelegi, Rehu,
Serugi, Nahori, Tera,
Abramu (ka eege Abrahamu jed'ani).
Abrahamuuni ilmaani d'iira lama qaba Isaaqofi Ishmaeli.
Ilmaani Ishmaeli gosa kud'ani lamati iraa bahe: Nebayothi (maqa ilma isaa ka angafa), Kedari, Adbeli, Mibsamu,
Mishma, Duma, Masa, Hadadi, Tema,
Yeturi, Nafishi, Kedema.
Niitiini gaarayu Abrahamu toko ta Ketura jed'ani ilmaani d'iira jaa d'alteefi: Zimrani, Yokshani, Medani, Midiani, Ishbaki, Shua. Yokshanini ilmaani lama qaba; Shebafi Dedani.
Midianini ilmaani shani qaba: Efa, Eferi, Hanoki, Abida, Eldaa.
Ilmi Abrahamu Isaaqooni ilmaani d'iira lama qaba, Esaufi Yakobo.
Ilmaani Esau tana: Elifazi, Reueli, Yeushi, Yalamu, Kora,
gochiti Elifazi iraa baate tana: Teemani, Omari, Sefo, Tatamu, Kenazi, Timna, Amaleki.
Gochiti Reueli iraa baateleeni tana: Nahathi, Zera, Shama, Miza.
Worri duri lafa Edomu keesa qubate ilmaani Seiri tana iraa bahe:
Lotani, ka balbalti gosa Horitifi Hemamu iraa baate. (Lotanini oboleeti qaba, ta Timna jed'ani.)
Shobali, ka balbalti gosa Alvanitifi Manahathitifi Ebalitifi Shefotifi Onamuni iraa baate.
Sibeoni, ka ilmaani lama qabu, ta Ayafi Ana jed'ani. Anani abba Dishoni, Dishonini nama balbalti gosa Hamranitifi Eshbanitifi Ethranitifi Kerani iraa baate. Eseri, ka balbalti gosa Bilhanitifi Zaawamtifi Yakani iraa baate. Dishaanini nama balbalti gosa Usifi Arani iraa baate.
Hayyooti tunini ch'ufti woli gula lafa Edomu mohate, bara lafti Israeli hayyu inqamne:
Bela ilma Beori ka dira Dinhaba.
Yobabu ilma Zera ka dira Bozra.
Hushamu ilma Bedadi ka dira Arithi (inni worra Midiani lafa Moabu keesa had'e balleese).
Samla ka dira Masreka Shauli ka dira
Rehobothi ka d'aatu galaana.
Baal-Hanani ilma Akbori Hadadi dira Pau (niiti isaa maqaani Mehetabeli dubra Matredi akko Mesahabu.)
Worri Edomu gosa tanati gargari bahe: Timna, Alva, Yehtethi,
Oholibama, Ela, Pinoni,
Kenazi, Temani, Mibsari,
Magdieli, Iramu.

Yakobooni ilmaani d'iira kud'ani lama qaba: Reubeni, Simeoni, Lawi, Yuda, Isakari, Zabuloni,
Dani, Yusufu, Benjamini, Naftali, Gadi, Asheri.
Yudaani ilmaani d'iira shani qaba. Niitiini isaa ta gosa Kanaani, ta Bathshua jed'ani, ilmaani sadi d'alteefi: Eri Onani, Shela. Ilmi isaa angafa ka Eri jed'ani, waan hamtu tahe jennaani AABBO Waaqi ijeese.
Niiti ilma isaa ta Tamari jed'ani, Yudaani ilmaani lama iraa d'ale Peresifi Zera.
Peresini ilmaani lama qaba, Hesronifi Hamuli.
Oboleesi isaa Seerani ilmaani shani qaba: Zimri, Ethani, Hemani, Kalkoli, Darda.
Aanini, ilmi Karmi, ka d'aloota Zera waan boojiani Waaqa olkayani fud'ate akasiini baddi worra Israelitini d'ufe.
Ethanini ilma toko qaba, ka Asaria jed'ani.
Hesronini ilmaani d'iira sadi qaba: Yerameeli, Ramu, Kalebu.
Kunini maqa worra Ramufi Yese jiddu jiru: Ramu, Aminadabu, Naashoni (inni nama gudda gosa Yuda keesa),
Salmoni, Boazi,
Obedi, Yese.
Yeseni ilmaani d'iira torba qaba. Maqaani worra aka worri wolti aane d'alateeni kana: Eliabu, Abinadabu, Shama,
Nethaneli, Raadai,
Ozemu, Daudi.
Ammalle inni ilmaani dubra lama qaba, Seruyafi, Abigaili.
Intalti Yese ta Seruya jed'ani ilmaani d'iira sadi qabdi: Abishai, Yoabufi Asaheli.
Intalti isaa ta Abigaili jed'ani, ta Yetherini nami d'aloota Ishmaeli fuud'e, gurba toko ka Amasa jed'ani d'alte.
Ilmi Kalebu, ka Hesroni jed'ani, Azubu fuud'e, intala Yeriothi jed'ani iraa d'ale. Isiini ilma sadi d'alte: Yesheri, Shobabu, Ardooni.
Azubuni doonaani Kalebuni Efrathi fuud'e, gurba Huri jed'ani iraa d'ale.
Huriini Uri d'ale, Urileeni Besaleli d'ale.
Hesronini ganna jaatama gahe jennaani dubra Makiri, oboleeti Gileadi fuud'e, isiini Segubu d'alteefi,
Segubuleeni Yaeri d'ale. Yaerini dira diddami sadi lafa Gileadi keesaa qaba.
Ammo worri Geshuritifi Aramu dira jaatama ka lafa sunitifi olla Yaeritifi ka Kenathitiifi dira d'aatu jirule ch'ufa woliini had'e dabsate nami achi tau ch'ufti d'aloota Makiri, ka abba Gileadi.
Hesronini doonaani ilmi isa ka Kalebu jed'ani, Efrathi, niiti abbaani isaa iraa due, fuud'e. Isiini gurba Ashuru jed'ani ka dira Takoa jaare, d'alteefi.
Yerameelini, ka angafa Hesroni ilmaani d'iira shani qaba: Angafi isaa Ramla, taani d'ibiini, Buna, Oreni, Ozemu, Ahiya.
Ramuuni ilmaani d'iira sadi qaba: Maasi, Yaamini, Ekheri, Yerameelini niiti d'ibi Ataara jed'ani fuud'e, ilma Onamu jed'ani iraa d'ale.
Onamuni ilmaani d'iira lama qaba, Shamaifi Yaada; Shamaileeni ilmaani d'iira lama qaba, Nadabufi Abishuri.
Abishurini niiti Abihaili jed'ani fuud'e, ilmaani d'iira tana lamaani iraa d'ale; Abanifi Molidi.
Oboleesi Abishuri Nadabuni, ilmaani d'iira lama qaba, Seledifi Apaimu, ammo Seledini ato woma ind'aliini due.
Apaimuni Ishi d'ale, Ishini Sheshani d'ale Sheshanini Alai d'ale.
Yadaani, oboleesi Shamai, ilmaani d'iira lama qaba, Yetherifi Yonathani, ammo Yetherini ka woma ind'aliini due.
Yonathanini ilmaani d'iira lama qaba, Pelethifi Zaza. Worri kunini ch'ufti nama Yerameelini d'ale.
Sheshanini ilma tokole ind'alle, dubra male hojattuuni isaa namicha Misiri toko ka Yavha jed'ani;
inni intala isaa toko isa fuusise isiini Atai d'alteefi.
Kunini maqa worra Ataifi Elishama jiddu jiru: Atai, Nathani, Zabadi,
Eflali, Obedi,
Yehu, Azari,
Helesi, Eleasa,
Sismai, Shaluma,
Yekamia, Elishama.
Kalebu oboleesa Yerameeli, ilma isaa ka angafa maqaani Mesha. Meshani abba Zifu, ka abba Maresha, ka abba Hebroni;
Hebroni ilmaani d'iira afuri qaba: kora Tapua, Rekemu, Shema.
Shemani abba Rahamu, Rahamuni abba Yorkeamu. Rekemuni, ka oboleesa Shema, abba Shamai;
Shamaini abba Maoni Maonini abba Beth-Suri.
Kelebuni gaarayu qaba ta Efa jed'ani, inni ilmaani d'iira sadi iraa d'ale: Harani, Mosa, Gazeezi. Haraninileeni ilma Gazeezi jed'ani qaba.
(Namichi Yadai jed'ani toko ilmaani d'iira jaa qaba: Regemu, Yothamu, Geshani, Peleto, Efa, Shaafu.)
Kalebuni gaarayu d'ibi qaba, ta Maaka jed'ani, isiini ilmaani d'iira lama d'alteefi: Sheberifi Terhana.
Eegi suni isiini ijoolle d'iira lama d'alteefi: Shaafu, ka dira Madmana jaareefi Sheva ka dira Makbenaafi Gibea jaare. Ilmaani tana male Kalebuni intala Aksa jed'ani toko qaba.
Jari kunileeni nama Kalebuni d'ale, Huriini ilma Angafa, ka Kalebuni Efrathi iraa d'ale. Ilmi Huri, ka Shobali jed'ani, dira Kiriath-Yearimu jaare;
ilmi isaa ka lameeso, ka Salma jed'ani, Bethlehemu jaare; ammalle ilmi isaa ka sadeeso, ka Harefu jed'ani, Beth-Gaderi jaare.
Shobalini, ka Kiriath-Yearimu jaare, abba gosa Haroe, ammalle nami dira Menuhothi ke tau gami toko d'aloota isaati.
Ammalle inni abba balbala gosa Kiriath-Yearimu keesa teetu; gochiti sunini tana: Ethri, Puthi, Shumathi, Mishrai. (Worri dira Surathitifi Eshtaoli worra balbala suniti.)
Salmani, ka Bethlehemu jaare, abba worra Netofathi ammalle abba Atroth-Beth-Yoabu, ammalle abba worra Sori gochiti lamaani dira Manahattu keesa teetu toko gosa Sori.
(Balbalti gosa worra woi t'aafu dira Yabeesi keesa teeti: gochiti sunini tana: Tirathi, Shimeathi, Sukathi. Worri kunini worra gosa Kenniti, ka worra Rekabutini wolfuud'e.)

Tunini ilmaani Daudi, ta gaafa inni Hebroni jiru d'alateefi maqaani worraa, aka worri woli gula d'alate gula, kana: Amnoni, ka haati isa Ahinoamu, ta dira Yezreeli.
Danieli, ka haati isaa Abigaili, ta dira Karmeli.
Absalomu, ka haati isaa Maaka, ta dubra hayyu Talmai ka Geshuri.
Adonia, ka haati isaa Hagithi.
Shefatia, ka haati isaa Abitali.
Ethreamu, ka haati isaa Egla.
Yerusalemu keesa inni ganna sodomi sadi lafa mohate,
achiti ilmaani heduni d'alateefi.
Niitiini isaa Bathsheba, ta dubra Amieli, ilmaani d'iira afuri d'alteefi. Shamua, Shobabu, Nathani, Solomoni.
Ammalle inni ilmaani d'iira sagali d'ibi qaba, Ibahari, Elishua, Elipeleti,
Noga, Nefegi, Yafia,
Elishama, Eliada, Elifeleti,
ilmaani tana male, Daudini ilmaani d'ibi gaarayoota isaa iraa d'ale. Inni ammalle intala Tamari jed'ani toko qaba.
Kunini nama Solomonifi ilmaani isaa iraa hore: Solomoni, Rehoboamu, Abiya, Asa, Yehoshefathi,
Yehoramu, Ahazi, Yoashi,
Amazia, Uzia, Yothamu,
Ahazi, Hezekia, Manase,
Amoni, Yosia.
Yosiani ilmaani d'iira afuri qaba: Yohana, Yehoiakimu, Sedekia, Yoahazi,
Yehoiakimuni ilmaani d'iira lama qaba Yekobiafi Sedekia.
Kunini nama Yekoniani nami boojiani Babiloni geesani, d'ale. Yekoniani ilmaani d'iira torba qaba: Shealtieli,
Malkiramu, Pedaya, Shenazari, Yekamia, Hoshama, Nedabia.
Pedayaani ilmaani d'iira lama qaba, Zerubabelifi Shimei. Zerubabelini ilmaani d'iira lama qaba, Meshulamufi Hanania, ammalle inni intala dubra toko qaba, ta Shelomithi jed'ani.
Inni ilmaani d'iira shani d'ibi qaba: Hashuba, Oheli, Berekia, Hasadia, Yushab-Hesedi.
Hananiani ilmaani d'iira lama qaba, Pelatiafi Yeshaya. Yeshayaani abba Refaya, Refayaani abba Arnani, Arnanini abba Obadia, Obadiani abba Shekania.
Shekaniani ilma d'iira toko qaba, ka Shemaya jed'ani, ammalle akhakhowani shani qaba: Hatushi, Igali, Bariam, Beara, Shafathi:
Nearini ilmaani d'iira sadi qaba: Elioenai, Hezekia, Asirikamu.
Elioenaini ilmaani d'iira torba qaba: Hodavia, Eliashibu, Pelaya, Akubu, Yohana, Delaya, Anani.

Kunini nama haga gari ka Yudaani d'ale: Peresi, Hesroni, Karni, Huri, Shobali,
Shobalini abba Reaya, Reayaani abba Yahathi, Yahathini abba Ahumaitifi Lahadi, Ahumaitifi Lahadiini abbooti gosa lafa Sorathi keesa teetu.
Huriini ilma angafa, ka niitiini Kalebu, ta Efrathi jed'ani d'alte; ammalle ilmaani isaati dira Bethlehemu jaare. Huriini ilmaani d'iira sadi qaba: Etamu, Penueli, Ezeri. Etamuni ilmaani d'iira sadi qaba: Yezreeli, Ishma, Idibashi, ammalle inni intala toko ta maqaani Hasleliponi qaba. Penuelini nama dira Gedori jaare, ammalle Ezerini nama dira Husha jaare.
Ashuruni, ka dira Tekoani jaare nad'eeni lama qaba, ta Helafi Naara jed'ani.
Naarani ilmaani d'iira afuri isaa dalte: Ahusamu, Heferi, Temeni, Ashitari.
Helani ilmaani d'iira sadi isaa d'alte: Sethi, Ishari, Ithnani.
Hakosini abba Anubutifi Sobeba, inni ammalle abba balbala gosa ta Ahareli ilma Harumu iraa baate.
Namicha toko, ka Yabeesi jed'ani, oboleyaani isaa ch'ufa ira guddo ulfeesani. Wonti haati maqa Yabeesi baafteefi, waan inni guyya d'alate guddo isi gaargalcheefi.
Ammo Yabeesini Waaqa Israeli yaamate waan jed'e, Ee Waaqa, na eebisi, lafa guddo ballo naa kenni, waan hamtu na gaargalcha ch'ufa naraa d'owi. Waaqileeni akasuma waan inni kad'ate suni ch'ufa guutefi.
Kalebuni, oboleesi Shua, ilma Mehiri jed'ani d'ale Mehirini abba Eshtoni,
Eshtonini ilmaani d'iira sadi qaba: Beth-Rafa, Pasea, Tehina. Tehinani nama dira Nahashi jaare. D'alooti worra kana dira Reka keesa taa.
Kenazini ilmaani d'iira lama qaba, Othnielifi Seraya. Othnielileni ilmaani d'iira lama qaba, Hathathifi
Meonothai. Meonothaini abba Ofra.
Serayaani abba Yoabu, ka abba bale hogeeyi, ka nami achi tau ch'ufti hogeesa.
Kalebuni ilmi Yefuni ilmaani d'iira sadi qaba. Iru, Ela, Naamu. Elaleeni abba Kenazi.
Yehalelini ilmaani d'iira afuri qaba Zifu, Zifa, Tiria, Asareli
Ezrahini ilmaani d'iira afuri qaba: Yetheri, Meredi, Eferi, Yalooni, Meredini, intala hayyu Misiri, ta Bithiya jed'ani fuud'e, isiini intala Miriamu jed'anifi ilmaani d'iira, ta Shamafi Ishba jed'ani, d'alteefi. Ishbaani nama dira Eshtemoa jaare. Meredileeni dubra gosa Yuda fuud'e, isiini ilmaani d'iira sadi d'alteefi: Yeredi, ka dira Gedori jaare; Heberi ka dira Soko jaare; ammalle Yekuthieli, ka dira Zanoa jaare.
Hodiani oboleeti Nahamu fuud'e, ilmaani worraa abbooti balbala gosa Garmi ta dira Keila teetu; ammalle balbalti Maaka, ta dira Eshtemoa keesa teetu, worra iraa baate.
Shimoni ilmaani d'iira afuri qaba: Amnoni, Rina, Ben-Hanani, Tiloni, Ishini ilmaani d'iira lama qaba: Zohethifi Ben-Zohethi.
Shelani ilma Yuda, nami inni d'ale Eri, ka dira Lekea jaare; Laada, ka dira Maresha jaare; ammalle balbala worra woya boofta mid'aasu, dira Asbea keesa tau;
