Qaaloleefi worra Lawi yayu huji Mana Waaqa iti kenani. Nami hujitifi hogeeyini waan ch'ufa mid'aasitu kurfo jirti, aka si qarqaartu, ammalle gumifi jaaroleeni worraleeni ch'ufti dubbi tante d'ageete gula yaati.

Anini haga dandau yayu miha Mana Waaqatini jaarani kurfeese — worqi, qarsi, sibiila diima, sibiila, guraacha, mukha, d'akhaaye ch'uch'ulut'ufi, d'akhaaye mimid'aadu d'ibi, d'akhaaye daakhaani barreesanifi ch'abbi ch'uch'ulut'u hedule.
Waan anini kurfeese kana malele, anini yayu qarsifi worqi tiyya, ta anini olkeyad'e keesa, maro anini Mana Waaqa jaalad'eefi, baase.
Worqi anini baase suni ulfinni isii kilo kuma d'ibba tokoti, ta lafa ofiriti d'ufte; ammalle anini yayu qarsi dansa, ulfinni isii kilo kuma d'iba lamatiifi afurtama, aka naabo Mana sunitini barreesanifi.
Miha hogeeyini mid'aasitu ch'ufaleeni mid'aasani, baase. Amma isani keesa eenuti garaa tokooni, fed'i ufiitini, AABBO Waaqa jed'e woi baasaa?
Jennaani worri balbala gosaati matatifi jaaroleeni gosatifi worri gugurda askartitifi worri hori hayyu qorqoratuleeni, garaa tokooni, fed'i ufi gula,
waan kana baase: worqi kilo kuma d'ibbafi torbatama, qarsi kilo kuma d'ibba saadiifi afurtama, sibiila diima kilo kuma d'ibba jaatiifi diddama, ammalle sibiila guraacha kilo kuma maro kuma saditifi kuma d'ibba afuri.
Nami d'akhaaye ch'uch'ulut'u qabuleeni Mana Waaqatii baase, duuba nami waan suni olkaye, Yehieli, ka gosa Lawi, balbala Gershoni.
Biyyiti waan heddu garaa tokooni AABBO Waaqa baafte kana ch'ufa guddo iraa gammade, hayyu Daudileni waan suni ch'ufa guddo iraa gammade.
Jennaani hayyu Daudini gumi suni ch'ufa durati AABBO Waaqa akana jed'e faarse: Ee AABBO, Waaqa ababo keenna Yakobo, haga jiru jireenna ha si faarsani!
Irreefi humnaafi, guddinnaafi mid'aagumafi jabeenni keetuma. Wonti gubbafi lafa keesa jiraleeni ch'ufti keetuma, atini hayyu hayyu ch'ufa mohatu.
Duroomafi qabeeni ch'ufti gara kanketi d'ufa; atini jabeennaafi irreeni waan ch'ufa mohata; atini dandeete nama feetu guddifte, jabeenna kennitaafi.
Amma, Waaqa keenna, nu galata si deebifne maqa kanke gudda faarsina.
Ammo anaafi worri lafa tiyya eenu qara, ka nu dandeenne waan kana ch'ufa akana si baamnu? Wonti ch'ufti garuma keeti baati, nuleeni woma qara atini nu kennite sii kennina.
Atini imbeeta, ee AABBO Waaqa, aka nu si durati akuma abbooti teenna keessumafi nama lafa inqamne fakaannu. Guyyaani keenna lafa tana irati gabaaba, dandeenne lubbu duraa imbaanu.
Ee AABBO Waaqa keenna, wonti nu hori kana ch'ufa baamneefi, aka mana maqa kanke keesati guddisani jaarru, ammo wonti kunini ch'ufti siuma iraa d'ufte, keetuma.
Anini imbeekha, aka atini onne nama ch'ufa ilaalte nama d'uga iraa gammaddu. Fed'ifi garaa tokooni anini waan kana ch'ufa sii baase, ammalle anini aka gumiini tante tunini gammadani waan kana ch'ufa sii baaftu ya arge.
Ee AABBO Waaqa ababoota teenna Abrahamutifi Isaaqotifi ka Israeli, herega akana kana qalbi gumi teeti keesa kayi, guyya ch'ufa qalbilbi sii saalfatu worraa kenni.
Ilma kiyya Solomoni qarqaari, aka inni hojja ch'ufa aadaafi seera kanke guute, Mana anini waan isaa kurfeese kana jaaru.
Jennaani Daudini waan gumi ch'ufaani jed'e, AABBO Waaqa keesani faarsa! Jennaani gumiini ch'ufti AABBO, Waaqa ababoota isaani faarsite, AABBO Waaqafi hayyu durati gajejete guddifte.
Boriyyaate hori qalani, gubani sorio AABBO Waaqaa baasani, duuba eege biyyaa kennani nyaachisani. Suni malele koromi kuma tokotifi elemiye kuma tokotifi imoole holla ta kuma tokole gubani sorio baasani. Ammalle worri daad'ile Waaqaa baase.
Akanaani guyya suni, AABBO Waaqa durati, nyaatani d'ugaani gammadani. Jennaani maro lameeso Solomoni ilma Daudi hayyu Lalabani, maqa AABBO Waaqatini isa muudani, hayyu tolchani, Sadokile qaallu tolchani.
Duuba akasiini Solomonini fulla abba isaa Daudi hayyu tahe, barch'uma isaa ka hayyuma ira tae. Inni hayyu gurra qabu tahe, gumiini Israelileni ch'ufti isaa saalfate.
Hojatufi askartifi ilmaani Daudi d'ibileeni aka isaa saalfatu kakhate.
AABBO Waaqi gosa Israeli ch'ufa durati Solomoni guddise maqa jaba kenneefi, ammalle hayyu duraani Israeli mohate ch'ufa ira guddinna kenneefi.
Ilmi Yese, Daudini, worra Israeli
ganna afurtama mohate. Inni Hebroni keesa ganna torba mohate, Yerusalemu keesa ganna sodomi sadi mohate.
Inni jaare fulla gahe, ka duroomafi ulfinna gudda qabu due, ilmi isaa Solomonini fulla isaa hayyu tahe.
Waan Daudini tolche ch'ufa, haguma geetunu, kitaaba raagoota tana sadeeni keesati t'aafani: Samueli, Nathani, Gadi.
Woniti isaa ka t'aafani suni aka inni lafa mohatefi jabeenna isaatiifi ammalle waan isaafi worra Israelitiifi gochiti d'aatu worraa jirtuleeni taate garsiifti.

Solomonini, ilmi Daudi, hayyu Israeli tahe jabaate biyya fide, AABBO Waaqi isaaleeni isaa eebise jabeese.
Solomonini gumi Israeli ch'ufa — worra askarti nama kuma tokotifi ammalle nama d'ibba tokoleti matatifi worra gugurda dubbi qoru ch'ufafi ammalle nama worra ufiti abba — worra ch'ufati dubbate waan jed'eeni,
Koota, nu yaasa, fulla Waaqa iti kad'atini ta Gibeoni d'anna. Wonti worri achi d'aqeefi, waan Waaroni Woyyuma ta hojatuni AABBO Waaqa Musani duri lafa gamooji keesati jaare achi jirtuufi.
(Ammo Sanduqi Wold'aqisa Waaqa Yerusalemu jira, waaro hayyu Daudini gaafa Sanduqa suni Kiriath-Yearimu fuud'ani, mid'aaseefi taani keesa.)
Wonti mesa fakaata, ka sibiila diimani mid'aasani, ka Bezelelini, ilmi Uri, ka ilma Huri, mid'aaseleeni Gibeoni keesa ch'icha Waaro Woyyuma jirti. Achiti Solomonifi gumiini ch'ufti AABBO Waaqa kad'ate.
Waaro suni durati hayyichi AABBO Waaqa kad'ate, waan mesa fakaata, ka sibiila diimani mid'aasani, irati sorio baase; inni hori kuma toko qale, gube, waan suni irati sorio baase.
Halkani suni Waaqi Solomoniti mullate waan jed'eeni, Ana maani sii kennu feeta?
Solomonini waan jed'eeni, Atini duri hojattu kanke, abba kiyya Daudi, guddo jaalate, atini amma yayu fulla isaa hayyu naa tolchite.
Ee AABBO Waaqa, waan atini abba kiyya kakhate guuti. Atini yayu hayyu, gumi hedu muumme inqamne tana, na tolchite,
tanaafi amma qalbiifi beekha anini gumi tante tanaani fidu naa kenni. Yo atini qalbi naa inkenini anini akami dandae gumi tana fida?
Waaqi waan Solomonini jed'e, Atini yayu waan dansa fohate. Fulla atini hormaata yokhaani beese. Yokhaani gurra dansa yokhaani badi nyaapa keeti yokhaani bultuma keetile kad'atu, atini beekhaafi qalbi gumi tiyyaa ta anini hayyu iti si tolcheeni fidu kad'atte.
Anini beekhaafi qalbi sii kenna. Tana malele, hormaatafi beesefi gurra dansa hayyooti d'ibiini taka inargatini, ka yokhaani nami d'ibileeni deebie inarganne, sii kenna.
Jennaani Solomonini fulla Waaqa iti kad'atani ta Gibeoni, ta Waaroni Woyyuma jirtu, deeme Yerusalemuti gale achiti worra Israeli mohate.
Inni gaari fardi hirkisu, ka kuma tokofi d'ibba afuritiifi fardoole askartini yaabatu, ta kuma kud'ani lama, wolti guure, haga toko Yerusalemuti galche, kaani dira d'ibiti gargari qoode.
Gaafasi Yerusalemu keesa qarsifi worqiini lafa ira dabarte, akuma d'akhaati heregani, hind'eesale akuma mukha dambiti heregani, ka fulla ch'ufa jiru.
Gati bunaqa farda ka Musirifi Kilikia d'ufu ch'ufa hojattu hayyuti harkaa qaba.
Ammalle gati gaari fardi hirkisu, ka Misiri d'ufule, worrati harkaa qaba. Ammalle worri hayyoota Hititifi ta Shamule gaari fardi hirkisu iti gurgure; gaari fardi hirkisu toko qarsi d'ibba jaatini gurgurani, farda toko qarsi d'ibbafi shantamatini gurgurani.

Solomonini aka Mana AABBO Waaqa keesati kad'atanifi mana ufi iti galu jaaru herege buufate.
Inni nama kuma torbatama, ka wobaatu, baase, ammalle nama kuma saddeetama ka d'akha boch'ule baase. Ammalle nama kuma sadiifi d'ibba jaa, ka huji suniti mataa, fohate.
Solomonini qonqo gara hayyu Tiro, ka Hiramu jed'ani, erge waan jed'eeni, Akuma duri abba kiyya hind'eesa inni manani jaaratu gurgurte, nale gurguri.
Anini Mana AABBO Waaqa kiyya keesati kad'atani jaara. Mana qulqullo suni keesa anaafi gochiti tiyya isa kad'anne, hit'aana urgaa aarsine, qit'a qulqullo guyya ch'ufa baamneefi, ammalle diiramafi galgala ch'ufafi guyya Sabatotifi guyya baatitifi guyya jila ch'ufa hori gumne sorio baamna. Duuba akasiini AABBO Waaqa keenna guddimna. Waan kana inni ya, haga jiru jireenna tolfad'a Israeliini jed'e.
Mani anini jaaru fed'u kunini maneeni ch'ufa ira gudda taha, wonti akanatiifi Waaqi keenna Waaqa d'ibi ch'ufa ira jira.
Ammo qarale eenuti dandae Mana Waaqaa jaara, ka ufiftu gubbaleeni, ta akasi ballo, dandeete isa imfuune? Anini eenu re, ka fulla hit'aana iti aarsani male dandae mana isaa jaaru?
Amma nama hogeesa, ka worqifi qarsifi sibiila diimafi sibiila guraachaani wo mid'aasu beekhu, ka ammalle woya bulefi bule diimtufi diimtuleeni wo mid'aasu beekhu na ergi. Inni hogeeyi Yudatifi ta Yerusalemu, ta duri abbaani kiyya fohate, woliini hojata.
Anini aka jari kanke, ka huji mukha hojattu, hogeeyi imbeekha, tanaafi mukha hind'eesatifi mukeeni ejersa jajabdu Lebanoni na gadi ergi. Anini kurfo jira, aka nama kiyya erge, worri jara kanke qarqaaru,
aka akasiini worri mukha heddu woliini ch'iru; wonti akanatiifi mana anini jaaru fed'u kunini mana gudda, mid'aaga.
Sagaleeni woreega ta anini hojattu tanteeti ergu, dargaye kintaala kuma diddamatifi garbu kintaala kuma diddamatifi, daad'i d'ebbe kuma diddamatifi d'ad'a d'ebbe kuma diddama.
Jennaani Hiramuni, hayyuuni Tiro, tatabe gara Solomoni t'aafe waan jed'eeni, AABBO Waaqi waan gumi ufi jaalatufi ya hayyu si tolche.
AABBO Waaqa Israeli, ka lafafi gubba uume, maqa isaa ha faarsani! Inni yayu hayyu Daudi ilma qaro kenne, ka qaroomafi hubacha guddo qabu, ka amma Mana AABBO Waaqatifi ka ufile jaaru fed'u.
Anini amma namicha qaro hogeesa Huramu jed'ani sii erga.
Haati isaa gosa Daniti, ammo abbaani isaa nama Tiroti. Inni worqifi qarsifi sibiila diimafi sibiila guraachafi d'akhaafi mukha iraa wo mid'aasu beekha. Ammalle inni woya bulefi bule diimtufi diimtufi booftaleeni wo mid'aasu beekha. Inni waan heddu barreesu beekha, ammalle yo, waan akana kana na barreesi jed'ani iti kennani, guddo mid'aasu beekha. Inni ka hogeeyi tanteetifi hogeeyi duri abba kanke Daudi hojatte woliini hojattu.
Tanaafi amma tana dargayefi garbufi daad'ifi d'ad'a atini inerga jette nuu ergi.
Nu gaareeni Lebanoni ira hind'eesa atini feetu ch'ufa ch'irre wolti hiine, baariiniti jissina, aka bisaani baariini suni fuud'ani, dira Yafatini d'ufani. Duuba arti atini dandeete Yerusalemuti geefata.
Jennaani Solomonini nama gosa Israeli intahini, ka lafa Israeli keesa jiru, hede, akuma duri abbaani isaa Daudini nama hede kaani. Henni worra suni nama kuma d'iba tokotifi shantami saditifi d'ibba jaa tahe.
Inni nama kuma torbatama ka wo baatu baase, ammalle nama kuma saddeetama ka gaareeni irati d'akha boch'ule baase, ammalle nama kuma sadiifi d'ibba jaa, ka huji suniti mataa, fohate.

jia lameeso ganna afreeso ka hayyuma isaa iti keeyate.
Mana Solomonini AABBO Waaqaa jaaru d'eerinni isaa d'und'uma jaatama, ballinni d'und'uma sodoma.
Ammalle Mana suni fuula isa dura mana d'ibi iraa jaarani, ka ballinni isaa d'und'uma diddama, old'eerinni isaa d'und'uma d'ibbafi diddama. Mana suni keesa fulla ch'ufa worqiini ch'okhani.
Mana gudda kaani bada isaa garaa keesa mukha hind'eesa naqani worqiini ch'okhani, worqi sunile waan aka meet'itifi lootitini barreesani ch'okhani.
Hayyichi Mana suni ch'ufa d'akhaaye mimid'aadu ch'uch'ulut'ufi worqi lafa Parvaimu d'ufaniini ch'okhe.
Inni girgida mana suni ch'ufa worqiini ch'okhe, dareerafi Mikhikilafi balbalale ch'ufa akasuma worqiini ch'okhe, girgidale gubbati hogeeyini akheekha waan lubbu qaba ka koola mid'aasite.
Dinqa ka Fulla Fulla Ch'ufa Ira Qulqullo jed'ani, d'eerinni isaa d'und'uma diddama, ballinnileeni diddama, ballinni isaa haguma ballinna Mana gudda kaani. Worqiini girgida dinqa sunitini ch'okhani, ulfinni isii kilo kuma diddamati;
ammalle musubaara worqiini mid'aasanile ulfinni isaa diqo nusa kilo ira jira. Girgida mana gubbale worqiini ch'okhani.
fuula balbalati deebise moga moga d'ad'abe. Wonti suni lachu koola lama qabdi, koola ch'ufa d'eerinni isaa d'und'uma shani; koola suni ballisani mid'aasani, aka inni wod'aka mana suni keesati wolituqe mana suni girgida gama gamaleti eju, akanaani kooli suni ballinna mana suni ka d'und'uma diddama guuta.
Golla woya booftatifi woya d'ibiini mid'aasani, waan bulefi bule diimtufi diimtuni barreesani, ammalle akheekha waan lubbu qaba ka koolatiini ch'okhani.
Hayyichi sibiila didiima lama, ka aka utuba old'ad'aabani tume mid'aase, ka kamu d'und'uma sodomi shani. Duuba fuud'e, balbala Mana Waaqa dura d'ad'abe.
Mata utuba suni lachu, waan aka lootitifi waan aka okhoku, ka sibiila diima iraa mid'aasani ka d'ibba tokotini barreesani ch'okhani.
Utuba suni balbala Mana Waaqa dura moga moga d'ad'aabani: ka bita aanuni Yakini jed'ani, ka mirga aanuni Boazi jed'ani.

Inni ammalle haro gingiti sibiila diimani mid'aasani jaare, ta ballinni afaani isii d'und'uma sodoma, ta qilumani isii d'und'uma shani ta d'eerinni jiddu isii d'und'uma kud'ani.
Afaani haro suni, ka ala woini wolgubbati ch'ororsani barreesani. Woni barreesanini sunini waan aka akheekha koromi jira, ta isiifi haro suni sibiila taka iraa tumani mid'aasani.
Haro suni koromi kud'ani lama, ta sibiila diimani mid'aasani gubba kayani; koromini sunini sadi sadiini moga moga gama gama fuula deefate ejaanjiti.
Furdinni sibiila haro sunini mid'aasani haguma ballinna gana harka namaati, afaani isiileeni aka daraara hooma qoqonyatani. Harooni suni bisaani d'ebbe haga kuma sadii fa fuuti.
Inni ammalle qori kud'ani mid'aase, shani moga bitaa ta Mana Waaqa kaye, shanile moga mirga kaye. Hujiini qori suni aka fooni hori gubani sorio baasani iti d'iqani. Ammo bisaani haro gingiti keesa jirani ka qaaloleeni d'iqattu.
Ammalle naabo qaaloleeni keesa ooltu jaarani, naabo alaale d'ibi jaarani. Balbala naabo suni ch'ufa sibiila diimani ch'okhani.
Haro gingiti taani gama ilaborutiini bitaa kayani.
Huramuni ammalle okoteefi baofi qori mid'aase. Duuba inni miha Mana Waaqa ka inni hayyu Solomonini si mid'aasa jed'e, ch'ufa hobaase: Utuba lama, waan aka sure lama ta mata utuba suni ira kayani; waan aka looti ka barreesani sure sunini ch'okhani; waan aka okhoku d'ibba afuri, ka sibiila diima iraa mid'aasani, fulla lama ch'ororsani waan aka sure lamaani suniti naqani; gaari kud'ani; qori kud'ani; haro gingiti; koromi kud'ani lama, ta harooni suni ira ejitu; okoteefi, baofi, moqa filfilicha. Huramuni, hogeesi guddaani, miha kana ch'ufa sibiila diima qulqulleesani iraa mid'aase, akuma hayyuuni Solomoni isaani jed'e, aka Mana Waaqa keesani hojatani.
Hayyichi waan kana ch'ufa bale Yordani keesa, jiddu Sukothifi Sarethani, ta biyye faara qabduti mid'aasa jed'e.
Mihi mid'aasani gudda, muumme inqamne, tanaafi nami ulfinna sibiila diima isaani mid'aasani haga beekhu injiru.
Solomonini ammalle miha Mana Waaqa ka worqiini mid'aasani mid'aase: Waan sorio irati baasani, mesa qit'a Waaqaa baasani ira kayani;
waan ifseeni ira ejaanjitufi ifse worqi qulqullooni mid'aasani ta Fulla Fulla Ch'ufa Ira Qulqullo durati bobeetu, akuma mid'aasa jed'ani gula;
daraarafi ifseefi qad'abe;
waan ifseeni d'aamfani, qori, waan hit'aana keesati aarsani, daboola ch'ile ibidatini fuud'ani. Miha kana ch'ufa worqi qulqullooni mid'aasani. Balbala Mana Waaqa ta alaatifi balbala Fulla Fulla Ch'ufa Ira Qulqulloole worqiini ch'okhani.

Worri ch'ufti guyya jila Hoosa wolti d'ufe.
Jaaroleeni sunini ch'ufti wolgeete jennaani worri Lawi Sanduqa kaani olfuud'e
Mana Waaqati geese. Jennaani qaaloleefi worri Lawileeni Waaro Woyyumatiifi miha isii guure, Mana Waaqati geese.
Duuba hayyu Solomonifi worri Israeli ch'ufti Sanduqa Wold'aqisa durati wolti bahani, loonifi ree hedu muumme inqamne sorio baasani.
Duuba qaaloleeni Sanduqa Wold'aqisa AABBO Waaqa Mana Waaqa olnat'e, Fulla Fulla Ch'ufa Ira Qulqullootiini d'ufte, akheekha waan koola ka lubbu qaba kaani jala keete.
Kooli isii ka ballisani gubba Sanduqafi kalcho baataniini d'osse.
Nama Fulla Fulla Ch'ufa Ira Qulqullo dura eju male, nami d'ibiini dandae fiit'e kalcho inargu. (Kalchooni sunini arrale achuma jirti.)
Sanduqa Wold'aqisa suni keesa d'akha hahafalicha lamaani Musani gaara Sinaiti keesa kaye, gaafa AABBO Waaqi worra Israeli lafa Misiriti baase, wold'aqisa woliini tolfate male wonti d'ibiini keesa injirtu.

Jennaani Solomonini Waaqa kad'ate waan jed'e, Ee AABBO Waaqa, atini dumansaafi dukana fohate keesati galta.
Amma tana anini yayu mana gudda dansa sii jaare, ka atini haga jiru jireenna keesati galtu.
Ato biyyiti achi ejaanjitu Solomonini fuula worrati deefate, worra eebise.
Duuba inni waan jed'e, AABBO Waaqa Israeli ha guddisani. Inni yayu kakhu duri abba kiyya Dauditi kakhate guute. Gaafasi inni waan jed'e,
Haguma gumi tiyya lafa Misiri keesaa baase, anini dira tokole lafa Israeli keesati fulla mana kiyya iti jaarani na kad'atani infohanne; ammalle anini nama worra kiyya ka Israelitini deemu infohanne.
Ammo amma tana yayu dira Yerusalemu fohad'e, aka isa keesati na kad'atani, ammalle anini ya si fohad'e, Daudi, aka atini gumi tiyya fiddu jed'e.
Ammalle Solomonini waan worraani jed'e, Abbaani kiyya, Daudini, duri herege, aka Mana AABBO, Waaqa Israeli, iti kad'atani jaaru;
ammo AABBO Waaqi waan isaani jed'e, Heregi kanke sunini dansa,
ammo atini mana suni na injaartu, nami mana suni na jaaru ilmuma kanke.
Amma tana AABBO Waaqi yayu kakhu ufi guute anini huji hayyuma abba kiyya iraa fuud'e, Mana AABBO Waaqa Israeli iti kad'atani yayu jaare.
Ammalle Mana suni keesa anini yayu Sanduqa Wold'aqisa, ka d'akha hahafalicha wold'aqisa AABBO Waaqi duri ababoota teennaani woliini tolfate, qabu, kaye.
Jennaani Solomonini gumi ch'ufa dura d'ufe, fulla sorio iti qalani eje, harka olfud'ate, Waaqa kad'ate.
(Solomonini qara fulla ira ejani gumiti haasani sibiila diimani mid'aase, ballinna d'aatu Mana Waaqa kaye. Woni suni d'eerinni isii d'und'uma shani, ballinnileeni d'und'uma shani, old'eerinni d'und'uma sadi. Inni woni suni kore. Fulla nami ch'ufti dandae isa argu jilbifate, harka ufi olqabate.)
Inni Waaqa kad'ate waan jed'e, Ee AABBO, Waaqa Israeli, Waaqi aka kanketi tokoleeni lafafi gubba injiru! Atini wold'aqisa gumi tante woliini tolfatte jabeesite. Jaalala tante worra garsiifta, hojja worri garaa tokooni si gula yau.
Atini kakhu abba kiyya Dauditi kakhate yayu jabeesite; dubbini sunini ch'ufti arra yayu guutamte.
Amma tana, Ee AABBO Waaqa Israeli, kakhu d'ibi atini abba kiyyati kakhate guuti, ta atini, haguma jiru jireenna, d'aloota kanke keesa, nami toko Israeli mohata, jette hojja gumiini tante aka inni Seera kanke guute, guutu.
Tanaafi amma tana, ee Waaqa Israeli, waan atini abba kiyya Daudi hojattu tanteeti kakhatte ch'ufa guuti.
Ee AABBO Waaqa kiyya, anini hojattu tanteeti, kad'acha tiyya na d'agayi, waan anini arra si kad'ad'ule naa kenni.
Halkani guyya Mana kana tissi. Atini ya kakhate aka armati si kad'atani, tanaafi hojja anini Mana kanati fuula deefad'e sii kad'ad'u na ch'aqasi.
Kad'acha tiyyaafi ta gumi tante ta Israeli, hojja nu fuula armati deefanne si kad'annu nuu d'agayi, worra kanke ka gubbati nu d'agayi nuu araarami.
Hojja namaani, ya wo yakite jed'ani himatani, fulla sorio iti qalani, ta Mana kanke kana keesa jirtuuni d'ufani kakhachiisani,
Ee AABBO Waaqa, gubbati ch'aqasi, hojattu tante dubbi worraa d'uga gula muri. Nama wollaala qabu wollaala iti muri, ka inqamne galakisi.
Hojja worri kanke ka Israeli maro worri siti dabeefi nyaapi dabsate, ammo duuba eege worri siti deebie, Mana kanati d'ufe garaa laafe araarsa si kad'ate,
gubbaa worra ch'aqasi. Daba gumi tanteeti araaramifi, lafa atini ababoota worraati kennite worraa deebisi.
Hojja atini maro worri kanke si durati wollaaleefi bokaya worra roobu didde, ammo duuba hojja worri wollaala suni iraa deebie, Mana kanati fuula deefate, garaa laafe si kad'atu,
Ee AABBO Waaqa, gubbati worra ch'aqasi, daba hojattu tante worra Israeli biraa deemifi, waan d'uga worra barsiisi. Duuba, Ee AABBO Waaqa, lafa tante tana, ta atini d'aala worra kanketi kennite, bokaya roobifi.
Hojja oolaani jabduuni yokhaani ch'iisi hamani lafati bue, yokhaani qilleensa hamafi raamofi, awaanisafi buqatani mid'aanti buute balleesitu, yokhaani hojja nyaapi worra kanke had'e, yokhaani hojja d'ukubafi fayyad'abi worrati bue,
kad'acha worraa d'agayifi. Hojja worri kanke ka Israeli nami toko gargala ufi arge, harka ufi gara Mana Waaqa kana qabe Waaqa kad'ate,
kad'acha isaa d'agayifi. Mana kanke ka gubbati worra ch'aqasi, araaramifi. Si ch'allati herega nama ch'ufa beekha, tanaafi nama ch'ufa waan isaa male tolchita,
aka worri kanke, hojja lafa atini ababoota worraati kennite keesa tau, si sodaate si ch'aqasu.
Hojja nami gosa d'ibi, ka lafa fago tau, guddinnaafi jabeenna kanke d'agaye, waan atini namaa tolchitu hubate, aka si kad'atu Mana kanati gadi d'ufe,
kad'acha isa d'agayifi. Gubbaa, fulla worra keetiti, isa ch'aqasi, waan inni fed'u guutiifi, aka gochiti lafa keesa jirtu ch'ufti si beete sii saalfatu, akuma worra kanke ka Israeli. Duuba akanaani worrileeni imbeekha, aka Mani anini jaare kunini fulla iti si kad'atani.
Hojja atini worra kanke, nyaapa haad'a jette ergite, worrileeni fulla jiruti dira atini fohate kanafi Mana anini si jaare kanaleti fuula deefate si kad'ate,
kad'acha worraa d'agayifi, gubbati worra ch'aqasi, dabsacha kennifi.
Hojja worri kanke siti ch'ubbame — qarale nami ch'ubbu intolchine injiru — duuba atini dallansu keesa harka nyaapa worraati kennite, nyaapi sunini worra boojie lafa d'ibiti geese, ato lafti sunini fagole taate,
kad'acha worra kanketi d'agayifi. Yo lafa suni keesati worri ch'ubbu iraa deebie, si kad'ate, dabaafi ch'ubbu ufi siti himate, Ee AABBO Waaqa, kad'acha worraa d'agayifi.
Yo lafa suni keesati worri d'uguma daba ufi iraa deebie, fuula lafa atini ababoota teenna kenniteefi dira atini fohate kanafi Mana anini si jaare kanati daefate si kad'ate,
kad'acha worraa d'agayifi. Mana kanke ka gubbati ch'aqasi, worraa nahi, ch'ubbu worraa ch'ufa araaramifi.
Amma, Ee Waaqa kiyya, nu ilaali, kad'acha fulla tanati kad'atani nuu ch'aqasi.
Ee AABBO Waaqa, amma kai, Sanduqa Wold'aqisa ka akheekha irre teeti garsiisu woliini Mana Waaqa seeni, haga jiru jireenna achi tai. Qaalole tante huji worra ch'ufa keesati eebisi, gumiini tante ch'uftileeni maro dansuma tanteetifi ha gammadu.
Ee AABBO Waaqa, hayyu atini fohate muude indidini, jaalala atini hojattu tante Daudi jaalate qaabad'i.

Waan Mana Waaqa suni guddinni bibiliqu sunini guuteefi, qaaloleleeni seenu dad'abde.
Worri Israeli aka ibidi gubbaa gadi buefi guddinna AABBO Waaqa ka bibiliqe Mana guute arginaani, ballinna ch'icha Mana Waaqati gadi jejed'ani, Waaqa kad'atani, galata deebisanifi waan jed'ani, AABBO Waaqi dansa, jaalalti isaaleeni haga jiru jireenna jirti.
Jennaani hayyufi worri ch'ufti sorio AABBO Waaqaa baase.
Inni looni kuma diddami lamatiifi hooliye kuma d'ibbafi diddama sorio wold'ageeti qale, duuba akanaani hayyuufi gumiini Mana Waaqa suni eebifte.
Qaaloleeni fulluma isii mid'aasani ejaanjite, worri Lawileeni fuula worrati deefate, miha sirba ka, Daudini worraa kenne d'ae AABBO Waaqa faarse, jaalalti isaa haga jiru jireenna jirti jed'ani sirbani, akuma Daudini worrati hime kaani. Qaaloleeni magalata d'oofte, ka biyyiti oli ejaanjitu.
Solomonini ballinna ch'icha Mana Waaqa wod'aka isaa eebise qulqulleese, achiti sorio gubanifi mid'aani Waaqaa baasanifi gabbinna hori sorio wold'ageetiti qalani Waaqaa baase. Wonti mesa fakaata, ka sibiila diimani mid'aasani sorio irati baasani kaani, sorio tana ch'ufa infuutu, tanaafi inni ch'icha suni eebise sorio irati baase.
Solomonifi worri Israeli ch'ufti guyya torba jila Hoosa tolfatani. Nami kaarra Hamathi ta mirgale ch'ufa d'ufe, ammalle bitaa gara seera lafa Misirile ch'ufaa d'ufe, artiti nami ch'ufti wolti d'ufe lafa ira dabre.
Worri bulti torba huji waan mesa fakaata kaanini eebisani keesa oole, bulti torba d'ibile jila tolfate. Guyya eege worri woldeenna guddo toko tolche,
duuba boriyyaate, guyya diddami sadeeso ka jia torbeeso, Solomonini biyya galche. Waan AABBO Waaqi gumi Israelitiifi Daudifi Solomonile eebiseefi biyyiti guddo gammadde.
Solomonini Mana AABBO Waaqatifi mana, hayyu jaare, waan qara herege ch'ufa aka dansaa hobaase jennaani,
AABBO Waaqi halkani isati d'ufe waan jed'eeni, Anini kad'acha atini na kad'atte ya d'agaye, ammalle Mana kana ya fohad'e, aka sorio keesati na qalani.
Hojja anini bokaya oolche, awaanisa mid'aani keesani nyaatufi ch'iisa d'ukuba hama gumi tiyyati buuse,
ammo yo worri ufi diqeese na kad'ate waan hamtu qara tolche iraa deebie, anini gubbati worra ch'aqase ch'ubbu worraa araaramefi lafa worrale daraarsa.
Anini ilaafi gurra kiyya banad'e, kad'acha fulla tanati na kad'atani d'agaya;
wonti akanatiifi anini ya Mana kana fohad'e eebise fulla haga jiru jireenna keesati na kad'atani tolche. Tanaafi anini guyya ch'ufa Mana kana tisse qorqorad'a.
Yo atini akuma abba kanke Daudi garaa tokooni na hojatte aadaafi seera kiyya jabeesite dubbi tiyya ch'ufa guute,
anini kakhu duri abba kanke Dauditi kakhad'e, ta d'alooti kanke nami toko haga jiru jireenna, worra Israeli imfida jed'e, inguuta.
Ammo yo siifi gumiini tante aadaafi seera anini isanii kenne didani Waaqa d'ibi kad'atani,
anini lafa duri isanii kenne keesaa isani balleese, Mana iti na kad'atani, ka anini eebise kana, lakise biraa deema. Ammalle fulla ch'ufati mana kana goyeesani tufatani.
Mani kunini amma tana guddo gurra qaba, ammo gaafasi nami d'aatu bahu iraa rifate maadefate waan jed'u, AABBO Waaqi maanifi lafa teennafi Mana kana akana tolche?
Duuba biyyiti waan jettu, Wonti Waaqi akana tolcheefi waan worri AABBO Waaqa isaani, ka lafa Misiri keesaa ababoota isaani baase, lakiseefi. Worri Waaqa d'ibi gula bahe, Waaqa suni yaamate hojateefi. Duuba tanaafi AABBO Waaqi gaargala kana ch'ufa worraatini d'ufe jetti.

Hujiini, Mana Waaqatifi ka hayyu, ka Solomonini jaare, woltuma ganna diddama fud'ate.
Ammalle inni dira ch'ufa ka hayyu Hiramuni isaa kenne mid'aase jaare, worra Israeli keesa qubsise.
Inni lafa Hamathitifi ta Soba dabsate fud'ate,
dira Tadmori, ka lafa gamooji, jabeese jaare. Ammalle inni dira lafa Hamathi keesa jiru ch'ufa, ka keesati woi olkeyatani, deebie jaare.
Solomonini ammalle dira kana mid'aase jaare: Beth-Horoni gubbatiifi Beth-Horoni golba (dira jabeesani jaarani ka fullo isaa naqatooni ch'ufani),
Baalathi, dira inni sagale keesati olkeyatu, dira fardaafi gaarini fardi hirkisu ka isaa, iti galu. Ammalle inni waan ijaarsa ka Yerusalemu keesafi Lebanoni keesafi lafa d'ibi inni mohatu ch'ufa keesati jaarani, ka qara inni herege ch'ufa, jaare hobaase.
Worri Solomonini irreeni hojachiise sunini worra d'aloota, gosa Kanaani, ka duri worri Israeli gaafa lafa isaani ira fud'ate boojie. Worri sunini ka haga arrale tisse, worra gosa Amoritifi Hititiifi Perezitifi Hivitiifi ka Yebusi.
Inni worra Israeli tisse intolchine, ammo hujiini worri tolche tana: Askarti, worra gugurda askartiti, worra askarti gaari fardi hirkisuti mata, yaabatu farda.
Nami worra irreeni hojachiisani, ka maneeni Solomoni suni ch'ufa jaareti mataa, nama d'ibba laamatifi shantama.
Solomonini niiti isaa, ta dubra hayyu Misiri, dira Daudi keesaa godaansise, mana inni jaarefiti qubsise. Inni waan jed'e, Isiini mana Daudi hayyu Israeliti galu himmalle, wonti akanatiifi fullaani Sanduqi Wold'aqisa duri tae ch'ufti qulqullo.
Solomonini sorio waan mesa fakaata ka inni Mana Waaqa durati jaare irati AABBO Waaqaa baase.
Inni ammalle sorio gubani, ta aada Seera Musa gula guyya jila ch'ufa baasu malani, baase. Guyya Sabatotifi guyya jila baatitifi guyya jila sadeeni woga ganna tanale — jila Qit'a bukho inqamne, jila gaafa mid'aani murani, ammalle jila Hoosa.
Seera abbaani isaa Daudini kaye gula, inni qaaloleefi worra Lawi, ka qaalole sirbaafi huji keesa qarqaaru, huji worra ta guyya ch'ufa iti qoode. Inni ammalle worra Mana Waaqa eegu huji gargari qoodeefi, huji guyya ch'ufa ta balbala eegani iti kenne, seera Daudi namicha Waaqa kaani gula.
Worri seera Daudini qaaloleefi worra Lawiti kenne, ka waan maneeni keesati wolkayanitifi waan d'ibilee tokole iraa ingorre aka dansaa jabeese guute.
Akanaani hujiini Solomoni ch'ufti haguma gaafa guyya inni Mana Waaqa yayabeti asi, haga gaafa Mani suni jaarame, guutamte eebifamte.
Jennaani Solomonini Esion-Geberifi Eliothi, ka afaani galaana Shamu lafa Edomu keesa, d'aqe.
Hayyu Hiramuni hobolofi nama isaa gugurda waan baariini beekhule woliini ergeefi. Worri sunini gara lafa Ofiri, hojattu Solomoni woliini, hobolooni d'aqe, worqi kilo kuma kud'ani shani Solomoni d'ufeeni.

Inni waan isiini gaafatu himeefi, wonti tokoleeni ta jajabatte inni himu dad'abe injirtu.
Hayyitiini Sheba qarooma Solomonitifi mana inni jaarelle agarte,
sagale isaani gololchanifi fulla hojattuuni isaa iti galtufi ammalle kara hojattuuni isaa hujiini hojatufi, woya worri naqatufi, hojattu guyya jila isa gololchitufi sorio inni Mana Waaqa keesati baasule ch'ufa agarte jennaani aka male mamte, afaani qabatte.
Jannaani isiini waan hayyu Solomonini jette, wonti kanke ka anini lafa tiyyati d'agaye, ka nafa keetitifi qaroomileeni ch'ufti waan jirati!
Anini waan kanke ka d'agaye taka ind'ugeefanne, haga d'ufe ila tiyyaani argeti. Wonti anini d'agaye diqo, atini haga nami sini jed'ule ira qaro.
Hojattuuni tante akami milki qabdi, ta guyya ch'ufa si bira ejite qarooma kanke ch'aqaftu!
AABBO Waaqa kanke ha faarsaniti! Inni si maache, hayyu si tolche, aka atini maqa isaatini worra Israeli mohatu. Waan inni haga jiru jireenna worra isaa ka Israeli jaalate jabeesu fed'uufi, inni hayyu worra si tolche, aka atini d'ugaani worra fidde seerale jabeesitu.
Isiini waan d'ufteeni ch'ufa Solomonii kennite: Worqi haga kilo kuma afurifa, ammalle qumbifi d'akhaaye ch'uch'ulut'u muumme inqamne. Qumbiini haga qumbi hayyitiini Sheba hayyu Solomoni d'ufteeni dansa taka nami lafa keesati inagarre.
(Jari Hiramutifi ka Solomoni, ka lafa Ofiriti worqiini d'ufe kaani, mukha ejersa fakaatu tokofi d'akhaaye ch'uch'ulut'uleeni d'ufe.
Solomonini mukha suni faano Mana isaatiifi ka Waaqa tolche. Waan akasi suni taka lafa Yuda keesati inagarre.)
Hayyu Solomonini waan hayyitiini Sheba isa kad'atte ch'ufa kenneefi, ammalle waan isiini kenniteefi kaanile ira waan d'ibi kenneefi. Jennaani isiifii hojattuuni isii lafa isaniti galani.
Ganna ch'ufa Solomonini worqi kilo kuma diddami sadi argata;
tana malele inni damosa bunat'ufi daldaltuni isaa baaftu argata. Hayyooti Araftitifi worri gugurdaani lafa Israeli arda arda mohatuleeni qarsifi worqi d'ufeeni.
Solomonini wonte gugurdo d'ibba lama mid'aase, nafa isii ch'ufa worqi kilo torbatini duuche.
Ammalle inni wonte didiqo d'ibi d'ibba sadi mid'aase, nafa isii ch'ufa worqi kilo saditini duuche. Duuba wonte tana ch'ufa mana inni jaare, ka Badda Lebanoni jed'ani kaani, keesa naqe.
Hayyichi ammalle barch'uma hayyu gudda toko mid'aase. Nafa isaa haga toko ilka arbaatini mid'aasani ch'okhani, kaani worqi dansaani ch'okhani.
Barch'umani suni faano jaa ta yaabatanini qaba, ammalle fulla miila ira d'aabatani ta worqiini ch'okhani iti tolchani. Ammalle barch'uma suni fulla harka ira keyataniti gama lachu jira. Akheekha nyeench'ale gama lachuti mid'aasani.
Faano suni guba akheekha nyeench'a ka kud'ani lamati jira, ka faanoni ch'ufti gama lamaani qabdu. Barch'uma hayyu ka akasi suni taka lafa d'ibi keesati imid'aasine.
Muduunini Solomoni ch'ufti ta worqiti, ammalle mihi woini sooratani, ka Mana Badda Lebanoni jed'ani kaani ch'ufa, worqi ch'allaani mid'aasani. Bara Solomoni suni qarsi womatu indarani.
Inni hobolo heddu, ta lafa fago hobolo Hiramu woliini yaatu, qaba. Duuba hobolooni suni, hojja ganni sadi dabru ch'ufa dachaate worqifi qarsifi — ilka arbaatifi jaldeesa gaaratifi qamaleeni d'ufti.
Hayyu Solomonini hayyu lafa keesa jiru ch'ufa ira qalbiifi hori qaba.
Hayyooti ch'ufti d'ufte isa wo gaafate qarooma Waaqi kenneefi suni iraa wobarate.
Hayyooti sunini ch'ufti woini isaa d'ufti — waan qarsifi worqiini mid'aasani fa, woya fa, miha lola fa, qumbifa, fardaafi gaangele. Waan kana ganna ch'ufa akasuma d'ufaniini.
Inni hayyoota lafa haga galaana Efrati ejite lafa Filistitifi seera lafa Misiriti ejitu ch'ufa mohata.
Gaafasi Yerusalemu keesa qarsiini lafa ira dabarte akuma d'akhaati heregani, hind'eesale akuma mukha dambiti heregani, ka fulla ch'ufa jiru.
Solomonini fardoole lafa Musiritifi lafa d'ibile ch'ufa iraa bitate.
Waan Solomoni tolche ch'ufa, haguma geetunu, kitaaba huji raaga Nathani jed'anifi, fagisa Ahiya lafa Shilotifi daayya raaga Ido ka waan hayyu Rehoboamule keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Solomonini ganna afurtama Yerusalemu keesa worra Israeli ch'ufa mohate.
Duuba eege due, dira Daudi keesati isa awaalani, ilmi isaa Rehoboamuni fulla isaa hayyu tahe.

Rehoboamuni Shekemu, fulla worri Israeli ch'ufti aka isa hayyu tolchu wolti bahe, d'aqe.
Yeroboamuni, ilmi Nebati, ka qara lafa Misiriti hayyu Solomoni baqate, dubbi tana d'agaye jennaani worra ufiti deebie.
Jennaani worri Israeli sunini isa yaame, gara Rehoboamu woliini d'aqani waan jed'aniini.
Abbaani kanke nu dabse, ulfinna jaba nura kaye. Hojja atini nuraa sablifte, finna dansaani nu d'ufte, nu aka dansaa si gula yaana.
Inni waan jed'eeni, Dubbi teesani ya d'agaye, inherega, sadi bula, gadi dachaa. Jennaani worri kae yae.
Duuba hayyu Rehoboamuni jaarole abba isaati mala d'ooftu dubbi suni gaafate waan jed'eeni, Mala naa d'aa, dubbi anini worra kanani jechu male nati hima.
Worri waan jed'eeni, Yo atini worra kana naate dubbi dansa worra gammachiiftu jetteeni, worri haga jiru jireenna aka dansaa si hojata.
Ammo inni mala jaarole suni dide, dubbi suni hariya isaatini gahe,
mala na d'aa, waan anini worra ulfinna nura fuud'i naani jed'u kana jed'uuni nati hima jed'e.
Worri hariya isaa sunini waan jed'eeni, Wonti atini worraani jechu malte tana: qubi kiyya diqaani hid'aana abba kiyya ira furda!
Waan atini worraani jettu, Abbaani kiyya ulfinna gudda isani ira kaye, ammo anini hagasi irale isaniti guddisa. Inni lichooni isani d'aane ammo anini goraani isani d'aana.
Bultiini sadeeni taani hobaate jennaani, Yeroboamufi gumiini taani ch'ufti Rehoboamuti d'ufte, akuma inni jed'eeni kaani.
Hayyichi mala jaarole taani dide,
mala hariya isaa kaani gula bahe, dubbi jajabdu worrati dubbate waan jed'eeni, Abbaani kiyya ulfinna gudda isani ira kaye, ammo anini hagasi irale isaniti guddisa. Inni lichooni isani d'aane, ammo anini goraani isani d'aana!
AABBUMA Waaqati hayyicha biyya ch'aqasu d'owe, aka akasiini dubbini inni raaga Ahiya jed'ani, ka Shilo bahe, Yeroboamu ilma Nebatiti himi jed'e, guutamtu.
Duuba akanaani worri Israeli Rehoboamuti garagale,
worra Yudati isa lakise, kae bira yae.
Jennaani hayyu Rehoboamuni Adoniramu ka worra huji irreeni hojachiisaniti mataa, worra Israeliti erge, ammo worri d'akhaani d'aane ijeese. Jennaani Rehoboamuni arifate gaari ufi yaabate Yerusalemuti baqate.
Tanaafi arti asi worri Israeli nama d'aloota Daudi ch'ufa iti garagale dide.

Rehoboamuni Yerusalemu gahe jennaani, askarti jajanna nama filani ch'alla, ta gosa Yudatifi ta gosa Benjamini, nama kuma d'ibba tokotifi saddeetama, wolti yaame worra Israeli had'e, aka sila mootuma ufi deefatu.
Ammo AABBO Waaqi raaga Shemaya yaame waan jed'eeni,
waan atini worra Yudatifi ka Benjaminitini jettu;
oboleyaani teesani ta Israeli inhad'ina, isani ch'ufti kaa gala, waan tahe suni ch'ufa anumati tolche. Duuba worri dubbi AABBO Waaqa ch'aqase kae worra ufiti gale.
Rehoboamuni Yerusalemuti hafe, dira kana ch'ufa jabeese jaare, lafa Yudatifi ta Benjamini keesa:
Bethlehemu, Etamu, Tekoa,
Beth-Suri, Soko, Adulamu,
Gathi, Manesha, Zifu,
Adaraimu, Lakishi, Azeka,
Sora, Ayaloni, Hebroni.
Inni dira suni ch'ufa jabeese jaare, dira ch'ufa nama gudda askarti iti tolche, ammalle dira ch'ufa keesa sagale, d'ad'a, daad'i,
wonteefi woraanale olkaye. Akanaani worra Yudatifi ka Benjamini harka ufi keesaa bahu d'owe.
Qaaloleefi worri Lawi, ka lafa Israeli keesa jiru ch'ufti, lafa Yudati d'ufani.
Wonti worri Lawi lafafi arda horini worraa oolu ch'ufa lakise Yudafi Yerusalemuti godaneefi, hayyu Yeroboamufi ilmaani isati waan jed'eeni, isani qaalole AABBO Waaqa intaatani.
Yeroboamuni qaalole ufi ta fulla Waaqa d'ara iti kad'atanifi jinnifi akheekha looni ka inni mid'aase hojattu, fohate.
Gosa Israeli ch'ufa keesa nami garaa tokooni AABBO Waaqa Israeli kad'achu fed'e, worra Lawi haga Yerusalemu gula yae, achiti sorio AABBO Waaqa ababoota isaniti baase.
Akanaani worri hayyuma Yuda jabeese, ganna sadi Rehoboamu, ilma Solomoni, jalati bule, akuma duri Daudifi Solomoni jalati bulani, akasuma tahani.
Rehoboamuni intala toko, ta Mahalattu jed'ani fuud'e. Isiini intala Yeromoti, ilma Daudi. Haati isii Abihaili, isiini dubra Eliabu, ka ilma Yese.
Worri ilmaani sadi qaba: Yeushi, Shamaria, Zahamu,
inni intala Basalomu, ta Maaka jed'ani, fuud'e. Worri ilmaani afuri d'ale: Abiya, Atai, Ziza, Shelomithi.
Nad'eeni inni fuud'e kud'ani saddeeti, ammo ta inni barate ilmaani iraa d'ale jaatama. Nad'eeni tunini ch'ufti ilmaani d'iira diddami saddeetifi dubra jaatama d'alteefi. Nad'eeni tana ch'ufa ira inni Maaka jaalate,
ilma isii Abiyale ijoolle taani ch'ufa ira jaalate nama fulla isaa hayyu tahu isa fohate.
Rehoboamuni mala dansa d'aate, ilmaani isaa dira jajaba lafa Yudatifi ta Benjaminiti qubsise waan guddo kenneefi nad'eenile heddu fuusise.

Rehoboamuni akuma hayyu tahe irre horateeni isaafi worri isaa ch'ufti Seera AABBO Waaqaa lakisani.
Ganna shaneeso ka inni lafa mohate, waan worri AABBO Waaqa lakiseefi, hayyuuni Misiri, ka Shishaki jed'ani, d'ufe Yerusalemu had'e.
Inni askarti gaarini yaatu, nama kuma tokotifi d'ibba lama qaba, ammalle ta fardaani yaatule nama kuma jaatama qaba, ammalle askarti heddu, muumme inqamne d'ibi, ta gosa Lubitifi Sukiitifi Kushi qaba.
Inni dira jabeesani jaarani ka lafa Yuda dabsate Yerusalemuni bahe.
Raagi Shemaini gara Rehoboamutifi jaarole Yuda ta Shishaki baqate Yerusalemuti wolti baate, d'aqe waan jed'eeni, AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Waan isani qara na lakiftanifi, anini amma harka Shishakiti isani lakisa.
Hayyufi jaaroleeni taani wollaala ufi agarte waan jette, AABBO Waaqi d'uga qaba, ka waan kana nu tolchu.
AABBO Waaqi herega worra suni arge jennaani ammalle Shemaini dubbate waan jed'eeni, Maro worri wollaala ufi fud'ateefi anini amma worra imballeesu. Hojja Shishakini worra had'ele, anini isa worra hobaasu d'owe, dallansu tiyya ch'ufa Yerusalemu hanqisa.
Ammo hataatuti, inni inuma worra dabsata, aka akasiini worri finna kiyyafi ka nama lafa gargari hubatu.
Jennaani hayyu Rehoboamuni wonte d'ibi, fulla wonte taani, sibiila diimani mid'aase jara askarti ka balbala hayyu eeguti kenne.
Hojja hayyuuni Mana AABBO Waaqa d'aqu ch'ufa, askartini wonte suni baate yaatini, duuba eege mana keesati lafa eeganiti deebifti.
Waan inni wollaala ufi fud'ateefi AABBO Waaqi dallansu qara iti dallane taani lakise isa balleesu dide; lafti Yuda nagaya taate bulti argatani.
Akanaani Rehoboamuni Yerusalemu keesa jabaate lafa mohate. Gaafa inni hayyu tahe, ganni isaa afurtami toko. Ammalle inni ganna kud'ani torba dira Yerusalemu, ka AABBO Waaqi lafa Israeli ch'ufa keesaa fohate fulla isa iti kad'atani tolche, keesa lafa mohate. Haad'a isaa maqaani Naama, isiini gosa Amoniti.
Inni waan fed'i Waaqa barbaadu dideefi wollaala tolche.
Waan Rehoboamuni tolche haguma geetunu ch'ufa kitaaba odu raaga Shemaitifi raaga Ido keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani. Rehoboamufi Yeroboamuni bara ch'ufa woluma had'ani
Rehoboamuni due jennaani fulla hayyoota iti awaalani, dira Daudi keesati, awaalani; jennaani ilmi isaa Abiyaani fulla isaa hayyu tahe.

Ganna kud'ani saddeeteeso ka hayyu Rehoboamuni worra Israeli mohate, Abiyaani hayyu Yuda tahe,
ganna sadi Yerusalemu keesa lafa mohate. Haad'a isaa maqaani Maaka, isiini dubra Urieli, ka dira Gibea bahe.
Jennaani woraani jiddu Rehoboamufi Abiya bahe, worri wolhad'e.
Abiyaani duula nama kuma d'ibba afuri baase, jennaani Yeroboamuleni nama kuma d'ibba saddeeti baase fuula keesaani d'ufe.
Duuli suni lafa gaareeni ta Efraimuti fuula keesa wold'ufe. Abiyaani gaara Seemaraimu jed'ani kore, Yeroboamufi worra Israeliti lalabe waan jed'eeni, Me, na ch'aqasa.
Isani aka AABBO Waaqi Israeli wold'aqisa haguma jiru inch'amne Daudini tolfate, haga jiru jireenna isaafi d'aloota isaa hayyuma kenneefi imbeetani?
Ka amma atini Yeroboamuni, ilmi Nebati, hayyu kanke Solomoni didu.
Duuba eege worri seseegi woma keesa injirre toko isati mataqe goli isaa tahe. Worri sunini Rehoboamu, ilma Solomoni, kaima arga d'ageeti womatu inqamne, dabse mala ufi hama gula deebise.
Amma tana isani irree AABBO Waaqi ilmaani Dauditi kenneeni morku feetani. Isani duula muumme inqamneefi koromi worqi, Waaqa Yeroboamuni isanii mid'aase, qabdani.
Isani qaalole AABBO Waaqa, ta d'aloota Harunitifi worra Lawi, gussitani, fulla worra qaalole d'ibi, akuma gochiti d'ibiini fohatte, fohattani. Isani nama kormafi yokhaani hooliye torba baasu eebiftani muudani, qaallu waan isani Waaqa seetani suni tolchitani.
Ammo nu AABBO Waaqa keenna hojanne taka isa illakimne. Qaaloleeni teennaleeni ch'ufti nama d'aloota Haruniti, ta qarqaarsa worra Lawi woliini huji ufi hojattu.
Diiramafi galgala ch'ufa worri hit'aana aarse, hori gube, sorio baasa. Worri qit'a Waaqaa baasani mesa qulqullo irati baase, galgala ch'ufale ifse waan ifseeni ira ejitu, ta worqiini mid'aasani, irati bobeesa. Nu fed'i isaa gula yaane, ammo isani ya isa lakiftani.
Waaqumati nuni deema, qaaloleeni isaleeni ta magalata d'ooftu nu woliini jirti, aka hojja worri magalata d'au nu isani haanu. Isani worra Israeli, AABBO, Waaqa ababoota teesani inhad'ina! Dandeetani indabsatani!
Jennaani ato inni tae akasi dubbatu, Yeroboamuni askarti isaa nama haga toko dudda duubani duula Yudati had'iisa erge, ka askartini isaa taani fuula duraani worrati fuula deefatu.
Worri Yuda ufi d'aatu millate jennaani, aka marsani ufi arge. Duuba qarqaarsa AABBO Waaqati bohani, qaaloleeni worraleeni magalata d'oofte.
Jennaani worri Yuda lola hirba iti kaachise worra Israeli had'e, Waaqi Yeroboamufi askarti isale harka Abiyaatifi, worra Yudati kenne.
Worri Israeli worra Yuda duraa baqate, Waaqi worra Yuda worra dabsachiise.
Abiyaafi duuli isaa guddo worra Israeli dabsate, askarti Israeli nama kuma d'ibba shani fit'e.
Duuba akanaani worri Yuda maro AABBO, Waaqa ababoota isani gula baheefi, worra Israeli dabsate.
Abiyaani duula Yeroboamu reebe, dira isaa haga tokole iraa boojie: Betheli, Yeshana, Efronifi ollowaani d'aatu dira kana jirtu ch'ufa.
Yeroboamu ituma deebie, haga Abiyaani hayyu, taka irre inhoranne. Duuba eege AABBO Waaqi isa ijeese.
Ammo Abiyaani guddo irre horate, nad'eeni kud'ani afuri fuud'e, ilmaani d'iira diddami lamafi dubra kud'ani jaa d'ale.
Waan Abiyaani tahe, jecha, isaatiifi waan inni tolche ch'ufa, kitaaba odu raaga Ido keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.

Abiyaani due jennaani fulla hayyoota iti awaalani dira Daudi keesati isa awaalani. Ilmi isaa Asani fulla isaa hayyu tahe, bara suni lafti haga ganna kud'ani nagaya horate.
Asani waan d'uga dansa tolche AABBO Waaqa gammachiise.
Inni waan Waaqa d'araati irati sorio baasani guure, d'akhaaye aka utuba d'ad'aabani ch'ach'abse, akheekha Waaqa Ashera jed'ani ch'ire balleese.
Worra Yudatini, fed'i AABBO Waaqa ababoota teesani gula yaa, seerafi aada isaa gula yaa jed'eeni.
Waan inni fulla Waaqa d'ara iti kad'atanifi fulla hit'aani iti aarsani, dira Yuda ch'ufa keesa, balleesefi isaa jalati lafti nagaya horate.
Inni bara suni dira Yuda ch'ufa jabeese jaare, ammalle waan AABBO Waaqi lafa nagaya tolcheefi bara heddu woraani lafa keesaa bade.
Inni waan worra Yudatini jed'e, Koota, dira keenna jabeesine naabofi doofifi balbala naqatooni ch'ufani jaara. Waan nu fed'i AABBO Waaqa gula yaanefi lafti teennuma, Waaqi yayu gama ch'ufa nu tisse nu qorqorate. Akanaani worri dira suni jaare, keesati hore deebane.
Asani askarti kuma d'ibba sadi, ta gosa Yuda, ta woraanafi wonte qabdufi askarti kuma d'ibba lamafi saddeetama gosa Benjamini, ta wonteefi t'iya qabdu, qaba. Worri kunini ch'ufti nama jajanna, waan woraana beekhu.
Namichi gosa Kushi toko, ka Zera jed'ani, duula nama kuma maro kuma tokotifi gaari d'ibba saditini lafa Yuda had'e dira Maneshatini bahe.
Asaleni isaa had'u d'ufe, duuli lachu bale Sefatha keesa d'aatu Maneshati ch'ibra keeyate.
Asani AABBO, Waaqa isa kad'ate waan jed'e, Ee AABBO Waaqa, atini dandeete jabaafi laafale qarqaarta, amma nu qarqari, ee AABBO Waaqa keenna, nu si abdanne, maqa kanketini duula muumme inqamne kana had'u d'ufne. Ee AABBO, atini Waaqa keenna; nami si dabsatu tokoleeni injiru jed'e.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi duula worra Kushi suni dabsate, gaafa Asafi askartini Yuda worra haate. Worri baqate, jennaani,
Asafi askartini isaa haga Gerari worra Reebde. Akasiini duula gosa Kushi suni nama heddu, fit'ani, tanaafi worri garagale nyaapa ufira d'owu dad'abe. AABBO Waaqafi askartini isaa worra dabsate askartini sunileeni waan heddu boojite.
Jennaani dira d'aatu Gerari ch'ufa had'ani balleesani, wonti akanatiifi nami achi tau aka male AABBO Waaqa d'eete. Askartini sunini dira suni ch'ufa saamte waan heddu boojite.
Ammalle worri arjaala ree toko had'e, ree muumme inqamneefi gaala boojie, duuba eege Yerusalemuti dachae.

Lubbuuni Waaqaa Asaria, ilma odedi, ira buute,
duuba inni kae gara Asa d'aqe waan jed'eeni, Asafi worra Yudatifi ka Benjamini, na ch'aqasa. AABBO Waaqi isani woliini jira, yo isani isa woliini jiraattani. Yo isani isa barbaaddani, isa ind'abdani, ammo yo isani isa lakiftani innileeni isani lakisa.
Bara heddu worri Israeli d'uga iraa gore Waaqafi, qaalole worra barsiiftufi seerale lakise akasumati tae.
Ammo gaargali d'umnaani AABBO Waaqa Israeliti deebiani isa barbaadani argani.
Bara suni nami imaltu d'aqufi ka galuleeni nagayaani indeemu, wonti akanatiifi lafa suni ch'ufa keesa gaargala woraana hammaati jira.
Gochiti gosani woli dabsite, dirileeni diraani woldabse, wonti akanatiifi Waaqati gaargalafi d'iba hama worrati buuse.
Ammo isani ilaafina, garaa jabaad'a, hujiini isani hojatani lafati hafte imbaddu.
Asani waan Azariani, ilmi odedi, fage d'agaye jennaani garaa jabaate. Inni Waaqa d'ara, ka harkaani mid'aasani, lafa Yudatifi ta Benjamini keesati kad'atanifi Waaqa d'ibi, dira inni boojie, ka lafa Efraimu ta gaareenile ch'ufa, balleese. Ammalle inni waan sorio irati baasani, ka d'aatu Mana Waaqa, ka qara ch'ach'abe, mid'aase.
Nami hedduuni qara lafa Efraimutifi ta Manasetifi ta Simeoni keesaa bahe, lafa hayyu Asani fiduti d'ufe. Worri aka AABBO Waaqi isa woliini jiru arginaani iti d'ufe. Asani worra kanafi worra Yudatifi ka Benjaminile ch'ufa wolti yaame.
Worri jia sadeeso ka ganna kud'ani shaneeso ka Asani lafa mohate dira Yerusalemu keesati wolti bahe.
Guyya suni worri hori boojie keesa looni d'ibba torbatiifi hooliye kuma torba sorio AABBO Waaqaa baase.
Ammalle wold'aqisa woliini tolfatani, aka AABBO, Waaqa ababoota isaani ch'alla garaa tokofi qalbi tokooni kad'atani.
Ammalle aka nama ch'ufa, diqaafi gudda yokhaani d'iirafi uwa, ka isa inkad'anne, fit'ani,
lalabani, Waaqa durati kakhatani, iyyaani, magalata d'aani waan jed'ani, Nu wold'aqisa kana inguunna.
Worri Yuda ch'ufti, maro wold'aqisa kana garaa tokooni tolfateefi, gammade. Duuba aka dansaa jabatani, AABBO Waaqa kad'atani, innileeni kad'acha worraa d'agayeefi, lafa worra ganna ch'ufa nagaya tolche.
Hayyu Asani akko isaa, Maaka, waan isiini akheekha Waaqa hama Ashera jed'ani mid'aafatefi, guddinna hayyuma, ka isiini qabdu, iraa fuud'e. Inni akheekha suni ch'ach'abse, gargari ch'ire, laga Kidroni keesati gube.
Ato inni fulla Waaqa iti kad'atani ch'ufa ta lafa keesa jirtu, balleesu baatele, inni haga jiru ch'ufa garaa tokooni AABBO Waaqa hojate.
Inni waan abbaani isaa Abiyaani Waaqaa baase ch'ufafi waan worqifi qarsiini mid'aasani ka inni baase woliini, Mana Waaqa keesa kaye.
Haga inni waan kana ch'ufa tolche asi haga ganna sodomi shaneeso ka inni lafa mohate, lafa suni woraani keesaa bade.

Ganna sodomi jaeeso ka Asani lafa mohate, Baashani, hayyuuni Israeli, lafa Yuda had'e, dira Rama jabeese jaare, aka nami tokoleeni dira suni keesaa bahe yokhaani inseene.
Duuba hayyu Asani qarsifi worqi Mana Waaqatifi ka mana hayyu keesaa guure, Damaskiti gara Benhadadi hayyu Shamuti erge waan jed'eeni;
kooti, aka abbooti teenna goli woli taana qarsifi worqiini tunini waan anini sii ergu. Amma tana wold'aqisa siifi Baashani hayyuuni Israeli woliini qabdani ch'absi, aka inni askarti isaa lafa tiyya keesaa baasu.
Benhadadini dubbi Asa d'agaye, askarti isaatiifi worra gugurda askarti isaa dira Israeliti had'iisaa erge. Jennaani worri dira Iyonitifi Danitifi Abel-Beth-Maakatifi dira Naftali ka sagale keesati olkayani ch'ufa dabsate fud'ate.
Hayyu Baashani waan tahe suni ch'ufa d'agaye jennaani dira Rama, ka jabeesani jaaru jirani kaani, lakise biraa deeme.
Jennaani hayyichi Asani qonqo lafa Yuda ch'ufati erge nama ch'ufa wolti yaame, aka nami ch'ufti haguma gaunu d'ufe, d'akhaafi mukha Baashani dira Ramatini jaare guure, dira Gebaatifi ka Mispa sunumaani jabeesani jaarani.
Gaafasi raagi Hanani jed'ani toko gara Asa d'aqe waan jed'eeni, Waan atini AABBO Waaqa kanke lakifte hayyu Shamu qarqaarsa heregateefi, duuli hayyu Israeli ya baqate si duraa bahe.
Worri gosa Kushitifi ka Lubi, askarti heddufi gaari heddufi yaabatu fardale heddu inqabu? Ammo maro atini AABBO Waaqa qarqaarsa heregateefi inni si dabsachiise.
AABBO Waaqi lafa ch'ufa ilaale tisse nama isa d'ugeefatu jabeesa. Waan atini aka daale tateefi, armaa achi worraani lafa tante keesaa imbahu.
Dubbini tunini aka male Asa dallansifte jennaani inni raaga suni fuud'e sansalatani hid'e. Duuba bara suni Asa garaani hammate, nama gari, naasu male, aka hama gaargalche.
Waan hayyu Asani tolche ch'ufa, haguma geetunu, kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Yudatifi ta Israeli keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Ganna sodomi sagaleeso ka Asani lafa mohate inni, d'ukuba hama fuud'e miilaa naafate; ammo tatule inni qarqaarsa AABBO Waaqa ira infed'anne, ch'ireeyyi iraa fed'ate.
Inni ganna lama teennaani due
awaala goda d'akha ka inni mid'aafate, dira Daudi keesati, isa awaalani. Inni doonaani qumbifi d'ad'a urgaa nafa isaa ibsani, ibida gudda goolani isaa bohani.

Yehoshefathini fulla abba isaa Asa hayyu tahe jabaate worra Israeli ufira d'owe.
Inni dira Yuda jajaba kaanifi lafa Yudatifi dira Asani lafa Efraimu keesaa boojiele askarti keesa kaye.
Waan Yehoshefathini faana abba isaa ta qara gula bahe Waaqa Baali jed'ani kad'achu dideefi, Waaqi isaa eebise.
Inni Waaqa abba isaa gula bahe, Seera Waaqale guute, hayyoota Israeli taani gula deemu dide.
AABBO Waaqi mootuma Yehoshefathi jabeese, nami ch'ufti gibira baaseefi, duuba akanaani inni dureesa tahe gurra baafate.
Garaani isaa guddo gara AABBO Waaqa jira, tanaafi inni fulla Waaqa d'ara iti kad'atanifi akheekha Waaqa Ashera jed'ani ka Yuda keesa jirule lafa keesaa balleese.
Ganna sadeeso ka inni lafa mohate inni worra gugurda kana aka lafa dira Yuda keesati wobarsiisani erge: Benhaili, Obadia, Zekaria, Nethaneli, Mikaya.
Worra woliini nama worra Lawile sagalifi qaalole lama erge. Worri Lawi ka ergani kana: Shemaya, Nethania, Zabadia, Asaheli, Semiramothi, Yehonathani, Adoniya, Tobia, Tobadonia: qaaloleeni, Elishanefi Yehoramu.
Worri sunini kitaaba Seera AABBO Waaqa fuud'e, lafa Yuda keesa yae biyya barsiise.
AABBO Waaqi hayyoota d'aatu Yehoshefathi jirtu ch'ufa isa sodaachise, duuba akanaani worri lafa Yuda had'u sodaate.
Worri gosa Filisti ka gari qarsifi waan d'ibileeni d'ufeeniifi, ammalle worri Arafti hagi toko Elemiye kuma torbatiifi d'ibba torbatiifi korbeeyyi kuma torbatiifi d'ibba torba d'ufteeni.
Duuba Yehoshefathini haga qara ira jabaate, maneeni jajabduufi dirale ch'ufa lafa Yuda keesati jaare,
achiti waan heddu olkaye. Ammalle askarti jajanna,
balbala balbalaani Yerusalemu kaye. Guddaani askarti balbala gosa Yuda Adna, askartini isaa nama kuma d'ibba sadii.
Nami isati aanu Yehohanani, innileeni askarti kuma d'ibba lamafi saddeetama qaba;
nami isati aanu Amasia, ilma Zikri, innileeni askarti kuma d'ibba lama qaba. (Amasiani nama ufi baase AABBO Waaqa hojate.)
Guddaani askarti balbala gosa Benjamini namicha janna Eliada jed'ani toko, askartini isaaleeni nama kuma d'ibba lama ka wonteefi t'iya qabdu.
Nami isati aanu Yehosabadi, askarti isaaleeni nama kuma d'ibba tokotifi saddeetama ta miha woraana ka aka ch'ufaa qabdu.
Jari kuni ch'ufti Yerusalemu keesa hayyu hojate. Jara kana malele inni askarti d'ibi dira Yuda ka jabeesani jaarani kaani keesa kaye.

Yehoshefathini, hayyuuni Yuda, dureesa tahe gurra baafate jennaani, nama worra isaatiifi ka Ahabu, hayyu Israeli, woli fuusise.
Eegi ganni hedduuni dabre Yehoshefathini Ahabu, ka Samaria jiru, argu d'aqe. Inni artini bahe jennaani Ahabuni hooliyeefi looni heddu qale, isaafi jara isaa woliini d'ufe jila tolche. Duuba inni Yehoshefathi sosobe, aka inni goli isaa tahe dira Ramothi ka Gileadi woliini had'ani.
Tanaafi inni waan jed'eeni, Dira Ramothi deemne woliini haane ho?
Yehoshefathini waan jed'eeni, Haye, anaafi askartini tiyyaleeni ch'ufti kurfo jira, woliini iyyaana.
Ammo qara eegi ato, iyaane, Waaqa kad'anne gorsa iraa fud'anna.
Jennaani Ahabuni raagoota nama d'ibba afuri wolti yaame waan jed'eeni, Dira Ramothi inhad'a mo, inhad'u? Worri waan jed'eeni, Ee, beeni had'i, Waaqi harka kanketiti worra keenna.
Ammo Yehoshefathini waan jed'eeni, Raagi d'ibiini injiru, ka nu gorsa AABBO Waaqa iraa fud'anuuni?
Ahabuni waan jed'eeni, Ee, toko d'ibiti jira, ka Mikaya ilma, Imla jed'ani, ammo anini isa injiba; wonti akanatiifi inni waan hamtu male waan dansa naa infagu. Yehoshefathini waan jed'e, akasi injed'ini.
Jennaani Ahabuni namicha hojattu toko Mikayati erge, Hurrisi, kooti jed'eeni.
Hayyooti lamaani taani miha hayyu naqatte, barch'uma ufi ka hayyuma ira, fulla oobdi ta fulla fullo dira Samaria, teteete, raagooti ch'ufti worra dura ejaanjite wo fadde. Raagi
toko ka Zedekia, ilma Kenaana jed'ani, sibiila aka gaafa mid'aase waan Ahabuni jed'e, AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u; gaafa kanani worra gosa Shamu haatani dabsattani.
Raagooti taani ch'ufti afaani taka dubbate waan jette, Ramothi d'aqi, AABBO Waaqi worra dira suni harka kanketiti keenna.
Namichi Mikaya yaamu d'aqe kaani waan jed'eeni, Raagooti taani ch'ufti yayu afaani taka dubbate waan dansa hayyu fadde, atinileeni akasuma waan dansa dubbate hayyu fagu malte.
Ammo Mikayaani waan jed'eeni, Anini maqa AABBO Waaqatini kakhad'a, aka waan Waaqi kiyya, jed'i naani jed'u ch'alla jed'u!
Inni fulla hayyu Ahabu d'ufe jennaani hayyuuni waan jed'eeni, Mikaya, nu Ramothi haana mo inhaanu?
Mikayaani waan jed'eeni, Beena, had'a, AABBO Waaqi inuma isani dabsachiisa.
Ammo hayyichi waan jed'eeni, Hojja maqa AABBO Waaqatini naani dubbatu d'uga dubbad'u! Maro hagami siti himu male?
Ahabuni waan Yehoshefathini jed'e, Anini, inni waan hamtu male, dansa naa infagu sini injenne? Me, ilaali!
Ammalle Mikayaani waan jed'e, Amma waan AABBO Waaqi jed'e ch'aqasi! Anini AABBO Waaqa, ka barch'uma ufi ira tau, gubbati arge, ka malaikaani isaa mirgaafi bita isaa ejaanjitu.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Eenuti Ahabu soba, aka inni deeme Ramothiti duu? Malaikaani gari waan toko jette, ammo ta gari waan d'ibi jette.
Jennaani jinnini toko AABBO Waaqa dura d'ufte waan jetteeni, Anati isaa soba. AABBO Waaqi, Akami sobda? jed'e gaafate.
Jinnini waan jetteeni, Anini deeme raagoota Ahabu ch'ufa kiyyibsiisa. AABBO Waaqi waan jed'eeni, Beeni, isa sobi, inni inuma sobama.
Duuba Mikayaani waan jed'e, AABBO Waaqi yayu raagoota tante tana ch'ufa kiyyibsiise, ammo isumati si balleesu fed'a.
Jennaani raagi Sedekiani Mikaya d'abanaase waan jed'eeni, Lubbuuni Waaqa yoomi na biraa deemte sini dubbate?
Mikayaani waan jed'eeni, Gaafa atini mana kanke seente keesati d'okhatu waan suni garta.
Jennaani Ahabuni waan jed'e, Mikaya qaba, gudda dira kana ka Amoni jed'anifi Yoashi ilma kiyyati geesa,
waan jettaniini, Hayyichi waan jed'u, Nama kana mana hid'aansa keesa buusa, qit'aa gogafi bisaani ch'allaani gololcha, haga anini nagayaani galuti.
Mikayaani waan jed'eeni, Yo atini d'uguma nagayaani galte, AABBO Waaqi naani indubbanne. Ammalle inni waan jed'e, D'iiro, isani nami ch'ufti d'uga naa taha.
Jennaani hayyuuni Israelitiifi Yehoshefathini hayyu Yuda dira Ramothi ka Gileadi woliini had'u d'aqani.
Ahabuni waan Yehoshefathini jed'e, Anini woya tiyya jijirad'e nama d'ibi ufi tolche had'u d'aqa, ammo atini woya tante ta hayyutini had'u d'aqi. Duuba hayyichi Israeli woya jijirate nama d'ibi ufi tolche had'iisa d'aqe.
Hayyichi Shamu qara waan askarti isaa ta gaari fardi hirkisuti matatiini jed'e, Hayyu Israeli male, nama d'ibi tokole inhad'ina.
Duuba worri Yehoshefathi arge jennaani hayyu Israeli sehani iti gorani isa had'ani. Ammo inni iyye jennaani AABBO Waaqi isa baase worra isa had'u jiru kaani iraa deebise.
Worri kaani aka inni hayyu Israeli intahini arge jennaani iraa deebie.
Ammo askartichi Shamu toko akanumati t'iya darbe, hayyu Israeli fulla miha isaa ka lola woltiini ejuuni woraane. Jennaani hayyichi waan nama gaari isaa oofuni jed'e, Anini ya madae, had'iisa ira nu deebisi!
Ka had'iisi aka male jabaachu jiru, hayyu Ahabu gaari isaa keesati, fuula worra Shamuti deebisani jabeesani qabani. Aduuni d'iinaani ch'iche.

Hayyuuni Yuda, ka Yehoshefathi jed'ani, nagayaani mana ufi ka Yerusalemuti gale.
Jennaani raagi toko, ka Yehu ilma Hanani jed'ani, gara hayyu d'aqe waan jed'eeni, Atini nama, nama ch'ubbicha qarqaare, nama AABBO Waaqi jibbe jaalatu waan inni waan dansa tolche seeta? Waan atini akasi tateefi, dallansuuni AABBO Waaqa ya si qabate.
Ammo ato atini akasile taate, dansumti diqooni toko siuma keesa jirti. Atini Waaqa d'ara, ka Ashera jed'ani, ya lafa keesaa balleesite haga dandeetu Waaqa d'ugaa barbaadde.
Yehoshefathini, ato worri isaa Yerusalemu tateele, hojja ch'ufa lafa keesa guddo imaltu deema, haguma Beersheba ta bita jirtu iti keeyate lafa Efraimu ta mirga ta gaareenitini bahe, biyya kara AABBO Waaqa ababoota isaani gula deebise.
Inni dira Yuda ka jabeesani jaarani ch'ufa jaallaboota iti tolche
waan jed'eeni, Hojja dubbi qortani, d'uga gula qora, wonti akanatiifi jabeenni isani woini qortani keesaniniti, ka AABBO Waaqati; ammalle hojja isani dubbi murtani, inni isani woliini jira.
AABBO Waaqa sodaad'a, yo wo tolchi taanile ufi qorqorad'a; wonti akanatiifi AABBO Waaqi keenna nama d'uga gula indeemne, ka nama gargari file yokhaani gumbo nyaatu inoobsu.
Yerusalemu keesale Yehoshefathini worra Lawitifi qaaloleefi jaarole Israeli jaallaboota tolche; aka worri nama Seera Waaqa ch'absu laale nama wold'abele dubbi qoruufi.
Inni waan worra sunini jed'e: Isani AABBO Waaqa sodaatani, huji teesani aka dansaa hojja ch'ufa garaa tokooni hojachu maltani.
Hojja nami dira keesani toko dubbi nama woli ijeesefa isanitini d'ufe yokhaani dubbi seerafi aada ch'absiitifa isanitini d'ufe, nama suni aka dansaa gorsa, aka hojja dubbi isaa qorani inni wollaale AABBO Waaqa durati ch'ubbu inseene. Yo akasi tahu baatani dallansuuni AABBO Waaqaa isanifi gosa teesani inqabatti. Ammo yo huji teesani guutani, wollaala inseentani.
Nami dubbi aada AABBO Waaqa muru qaallicha gudda Amaria jed'ani. Ammalle Zebadiani, ilmi Ishmaeli, ka gudda Yuda, dubbi gara hayyu ch'ufa isati mura. Worri Lawi isani jala hojate isanii ergata. Garaa jabaad'a, dubbi tana guuta, AABBO Waaqi nama d'uga gula deemu ha qajeelchu.

Eegi suni worri Moabutifi ka Amonitifi, ammalle worra Meuni ka gari woliini, lafa Yuda had'ani.
Qonqo Yehoshefathiti ergani waan jed'aniini: Duula muumme inqamne, ka worra Edomuti, galaana Sooda gama suni had'iisa keeti d'ufu jira. Worri suni dira Hasason-Tamari ya had'e dabsate. (Dira suni maqaani isaa d'ibiini Engedi.)
Yehoshefathini guddo sodaate qarqaarsa AABBO Waaqa kad'ate nama Yuda ch'ufaani, sagale inyaatina, ufi agabsa jed'e.
Dira Yuda ch'ufa keesaa biyyiti orite Yerusalemu d'ufte AABBO Waaqa qarqaarsa kad'ate,
worra sunifi ka Yerusalemuleeni naabo Mana Waaqa hareeti keesati wolti bahe. Yehoshefathini d'ufe worra dura eje,
Waaqa kad'ate waan jed'e, Ee AABBO, Waaqa ababoota teenna, atini gubbaa lafa ch'ufa imohatu? Atini irreefi jabeenna qabda, eenu dandae si dabsata?
Atini Waaqa keenna, ka gaafa worri kanke ka Israeli lafa tanati qubate, gosa qara lafa tana keesa jirtu gussite lafa tana ilmaani jaala kanke Abrahamuti, haga jiru jireenna kennite.
Worri sunini lafa tana keesa qubbate, mana keesati si kad'atani sii jaare waan jed'e,
Hojja wonti hamtuni nuti d'uftu — woraana, yokhaani ch'iisa d'ukuba, yokhaani oolafi beela — nu d'ufne, Mana keesati si kad'atani kana, si dura, ejina. Duuba hojja gaargali nuti d'ufe nu d'ufne si kad'annu atini nu baafta.
Galati worri amma nu kennu kana — d'ufani, lafa atini nu kennite tana keesaa nu gussani.
Atini Waaqa keenna, worra kana balleesi, nu irree duula muumme inqamne kanani haanu inqamnu. Nu waan taanu imbeennu, yo atini nu qarqaarte male.
Worri Yuda ch'ufti, nad'eenifi ijoolle worraa woliini, Mana Waaqa dura ejaanjani.
Lubbuuni AABBO Waaqa namicha gosa Lawi toko, ka gumi keesa eju, ira buute. Maqaani isaa Yahazieli, ilma Zekaria, ka ilma Benaiya, ka ilma Yeieli, ka ilma Matania; inni nama balbala gosa Asafu.
Inni waan jed'e, Ee hayyichaafi gumi Yudatifi ta Yerusalemu, AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, insodatina, duuli guddaani kunini isani imudamsisini, nami duula kana had'u isaaniniti, Waaquma.
Bori, hojja worri kaarra Sisitini olbahu, had'a. Isani fulla muumme bale ta lafa aloo ta d'aatu Yerueliti aantuti worraani baatani.
Isani worra inhad'ina, ammo kurfo eegad'a, aka Waaqi isani dabsachiisu inagartani. Isani worra Yudatifi ka Yerusalemu, sodaatani imudamina. Kaa, nyaapa fuula keesa yaa, AABBO Waaqi isani woliini jira.
Jennaani Yehoshefathini biyya durati gajed'e addaani lafa tuqe, gumileeni akasuma gajette, AABBO Waaqa guddifte.
Nami gosa Lawi ka balbala Kohathitifi ka Koraleeni olejanje lalabe AABBO Waaqa Israeli faarse.
Boriyyaate ganama biyyiti kaate gara lafa aloo, ta d'aatu Tekoa, d'at'e. Ato worri yau, Yehoshefathini waan worraani jed'e, Gumi Yudatifi ta Yerusalemu, na ch'aqasa! AABBO Waaqa keesani abdad'a, duuba nami isani chochoosu injiru. Waan raagooti isaa isaniti himtu d'ugeefad'a, indabsattani.
Eegi isaafi biyyiti mala woliini d'awate, hayyichi sirbitu wolti yaame, woya jila keyad'a, duula dura yaa sirba, AABBO Waaqa faarsa, Jaalalti isaa ta haga jiru jireenna jed'a, jed'eeni.
Worri sirba iti keeyate jennaani, AABBO Waaqi duula nyaapa kaani mudamsiise.
Worri Amonitifi ka Moabu worra gosa Edomu had'e hobaase, duuba wolti garagalani wolhobaasani.
Worri Yuda doofi lafa gamooji geennaani gara nyaapa isaani kaani laalani, worra ufuma hobae ch'iisu, ka tokoleeni inhafiini argani.
Yehoshefathifi jari isaa reefa kaani iraa wosaamu d'ufani jennaani looni heddu, woreega, woya, miha dadansa d'ibile ch'ufa argani. Guyya sadi waan suni ch'ufa saamani, hobaasu dad'abani.
Guyya afreeso bale Baraka keesati wolti bahani, waan AABBO Waaqi worraa tolche kana ch'ufafi isa guddisani. Wonti bale sunini Baraka jed'anifi suni.
Jennaani Yehoshefathini duula ufi kaani dura, waan AABBO Waaqi worra nyaapa dabsachiisefi, gammadaani kae Yerusalemuti gale.
Worri diraani bahe jennaani magalatafi kiraari d'aani, sirbaa gara Mana Waaqa d'aqani.
Gochiti ch'ufti ta aka AABBO Waaqi nyaapa Israeli dabsate d'ageete aka hama mudamte.
Duuba akanaani Yehoshefathini nagayaani lafa mohate, Waaqileeni nyaapa isaa ch'ufa ira d'owe.
Yehoshefathini ganna sodomi shaniti hayyu Yuda tahe, ganna diddami shani Yerusalemu keesa lafa mohate. Had'a isaa maqaani Azuba, isiini dubra Shilhi.
Akuma abba isaa Asa, inni waan AABBO Waaqi fed'u ch'alla, ka diqole iraa ingorini, tolche;
ammo fulla Waaqa d'ara iti kad'atani, ta gaareeni gubba, imballeesine. Biyyiti ammalle garaa tokooni Waaqa ababoota isaani inkad'anne.
Waan Yehoshefathini tolche ch'ufa, haguma geetunu, kitaaba Odu Yehu, ilma Hanani, ka Odu Hayyoota Israelile haga toko keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Gaafa toko hayyuuni Yuda Yehoshefathini, hayyu Israeli ka Ahazia jed'ani, Ka waan hamtu heddu duri tolche, goli woli tahani,
hobolo gugurdo bunaqa Esion-Geberiti mid'aafatani.
Ammo Eliezerini, ilmi Dodarahu, ka dira Morisha, waan Yehoshefathini jed'e, Waan atini goli Ahazia tateefi, waan atini jaarte kana AABBO Waaqi imballeesa. Duuba hobolooni sunini ch'ach'abt'e deemu dad'abdi.

Yehoshefathini due jennaani irreesa hayyoota ka dira Daudi keesati awaalani, duuba ilmi isaa Yehoramuni fulla isaa hayyu tahe.
Yehoramuni, ilmi Yehoshefathi, ka hayyu Yuda, oboleyaani d'iira jaa qaba: Azaria, Yehieli, Zekaria, Azariahu, Mikaili, Shefatia.
Abbaani worra worqifi qarsifi waan dadansa d'ibile guddise worraa kenne. Ammalle inni ilmaani suni tamu dira jabeesani jaarani ka lafa Yuda suniti galche mata iti tolche. Maro Yehoramuni angafa taheefi, Yehoshefathini fulla ufi hayyu isa tolche.
Yehoramuni hayyu tahe jennaani oboleyaani isaa taani ch'ufafi jaarole Israeli ta garile ch'ufa fit'e.
Yehoramuni ganna sodomi lamati hayyu tahe, ganna saddeeti Yerusalemu keesa lafa mohate.
Inni dubra Ahabu fuud'e akasiini hayyu Ahabufi hayyoota Israeli gula bahe, AABBO Waaqa durati ch'ubbu tolche.
Ammo AABBO Waaqi Yuda balleesu dide, wonti akanatiifi inni duri hojattu isaa Dauditi kakhate, aka d'alooti isaa haguma jiru jireenna lafa Yuda mohatu.
Jennaani Yehoramufi jari isaa ka lola gugurdaani gaari fardi hirkisu ch'ufa guuratani, lafa Edomu had'u d'aqani. Achiti askartini Edomu worra marsite, ammo halkani suni worri nyaapa suni ch'abse iraani baqate.
Worri Edomu haga arra finna worra Yuda jala injiru. Baruma suni worri Libnaleeni finna worra Yuda jalaa bahe, wonti akanatiifi Yehoramuni AABBO, Waaqa ababoota isaa, lakise.
Suni malele, inni fulla Waaqa d'ara iti kad'atani ta lafa Yuda gaareeni irati jaare, worra Yudatifi ka Yerusalemu ch'ubbu keesa buuse kara iraa gorse.
Raagi Eliya jed'ani tatabe Yehoramu t'aafe waan jed'eeni: AABBO, Waaqi abba kanke Daudi, waan sini jed'u, waan atini faana abba kanke Yehoshefathi yokhaani ta akhaakhu kanke Asa gula indeeminifi, anini wollaala siti mura.
Ammo atini faana hayyoota Israeli gula deemte, worra Yudatifi ka Yerusalemu Waaqa iraa gorsite ch'ubbu keesa buufte, akuma duri Ahabufi d'alooti isaa worra Israeli ch'ubbu keesa buuse. Suni malele, atini oboleyaani tante ta sira dadansa hobaafte.
Maro waan sunitifi AABBO Waaqi aka hama worra kanke, nad'eenifi ilmaani tante ch'ufa, gaargalche waan atini qabdu ch'ufa balleesa.
Atinileeni d'ukuba marumaani fuuta, ka guyya ch'ufa siti hammate eege marumaani si buani.
Duuba worri Filistitifi ka Arafti afaani baariini, fulla worri Kushi jiru, qubate. AABBO Waaqi worra suni Yehoramuti kaase, worri d'aqe isa had'e,
lafa Yuda seene had'e, mana hayyu saame, nad'eenifi ilmaani hayyu ch'ufa, ilma maand'a ka Ahazia jed'ani male, boojie.
Duuba eegi waan suni ch'ufa d'ukuba marumaani hama, ka infaayine, hayyutini d'ufe.
Ganna lama ch'ufa d'ukubi sunini iti hammate fayyu dide, eege marumaani buani due. Jari isaa ibida goole imbooneefi aka duri hayyoota worraati bohani.
Yehoramuni ganna sodomi lamati hayyu tahe ganna saddeeti lafa mohate. Inni due jennaani nami tokoleeni nahe imbooneefi. Isa diruma Daudi keesati awaalani, ammo awaala hayyoota keesati inawaalle.

Worri Arafti toko d'ufe, ilmaani Yehoramu, gurba maand'icha Ahazia jed'ani male, ch'ufa fit'e. Tanaafi worri Yerusalemu fulla abba isaa hayyu tolche.
Ahaziani ganna diddami lamati hayyu tahe, ganna toko Yerusalemu keesa lafa mohate. Maro haati isaa Ataliani, ta dubra Ahabu, ta akhaakhuni isii Omri, waan hamtu isa barsiifteefi, Ahaziani faana worra Ahabu gula bahe.
Inni AABBO Waaqa durati ch'ubbu tolche, wonti akanatiifi abbaani isaa doonaani, worri Ahabu ka gari mala hama isaa d'ae, isa balleese.
Ammalle inni mala worraa gula bahe, Yoramu, ilma Ahabu, ka hayyu Israelitini goli tahe. Duuba d'aqani, Hazaeli hayyu Shamu Ramothi ka Gileaditi had'ani, had'iisa suni keesati Yoramu madeesani.
Jennaani inni aka wollaanate fayyu dira Yezreeli d'aqe achi tae; ato inni achi jiru, Ahaziani isa argu d'aqe.
Imaltu Ahazini gara Yoramu d'aqe suni gula, Waaqi badi isatini d'ufe. Ato Ahaziani arti jiru, isaafi Yoramuni, namicha Yehu ilma Nimshi jed'ani toko, ka AABBO Waaqi aka inni worra Ahabu balleesu fohate, argu d'aqani.
Ato Yehuni jecha AABBO Waaqa gula worra Ahabu balleesu deemu, inni gumi jaarole Yudatifi ilmaani oboleesa Ahazia, ta Ahazia woliini yaatu, fuula keesa d'ufe ch'ufa hobaase.
Nama Ahazia barbaadule ergani, ato inni dira Samaria keesati d'okhachu jiru, isa argani, fuud'ani, Yehutini d'ufani ijeesani. Maro akhaakhu isaa Yehoshefathi ka garaa tokooni AABBO Waaqa hojateefi, isaa awaalani. Nami worra Ahazia, ka dandae lafa mohatu, inhamne.
Haati Ahazia akuma lubbu ilma isii d'ageeteni kaate, nama fiit'a hayyu Yuda ch'ufa fit'a jette.
Ahaziani oboleeti toko qaba, ta Yehosheba jed'ani, ta qaallichi Yehoyada jed'ani fuud'e. Isiini d'ossani Yoashi, ilma Ahazia, oboleyaani isaa ta fit'u fed'ani taani keesaa fuute, isaafi intala qabdu isaa d'iibu keesati d'ossite. Akanaani isiini isa harka Atalia jalaa baafte.
Duuba ganna jaa ch'ufa, Mana Waaqa keesati ka Ataliani lafa mohate isa d'ossani.

Ganna torbeeso, qaallichi Yehoiyadani garaa jabaate, jara shanani gugurda askarti kanaani woliini malatani; Azaria ilma Yehoramu, Ishmaeli ilma Yehohanani, Azaria ilma Obedi, Masseya ilma Adaya, Elishafathi ilma Zikri.
Worri sunini dira Yuda ch'ufa d'aqe, worra Lawitifi worra mata balbala gosa Israeli ch'ufa Yerusalemutini d'ufe.
Wonti isani taatani tana: hojja qaaloleefi worri Lawi guyya Sabato hujii d'ufe, worri hagi toko ha balbala fullo Mana Waaqa eege,
hagi toko mana hayyu eege, hagi tokoleeni ha balbala Yayaba jed'ani eegu. Nami ch'ufti ha naabo Mana Waaqa keesati wolti bahuti.
Nami tokoleeni Mana Waaqa inseenini, qaaloleefi worra Lawi ka huji hojattu male. Worri sunini qulqullo, ha seenuti, ammo gumiini taani ha aada AABBO Waaqa gula alati haftuti.
Worri Lawi ha goraade harkati qabate hayyu marse eege fulla inni deemu ch'ufa gula yauti. Nama Mana Waaqa seenu fed'u ch'ufa ha ijeesani.
Worri Lawitifi ka Yuda ch'ufti dubbi qaallicha Yehoiyada gula yae. Nama sila guyya Sabato huji ufi hojate galu ingalchine; akanaani, worri hujiti mata, nama huji d'ufufi ka huji keesaa bahule ch'ufa harkaa qaba.
Yehoiyadani worra gugurda suni, woraanafi wonte duri hayyu Daudini qabu, ta Mana Waaqa keesati olkayani, kenneefi.
Ammalle jara suni ch'ufa, ka goraade ufi harkaa qabu, Mana Waaqa duraani d'ufe, hayyu eega jed'eeni.
Jennaani Yehoiyadani Yoashi gabaase, sure hayyuma mata isaa ira kaye, kitaaba seera hayyuuni lafaani fidu keesati t'aafani iti kenne. Akanaani Yoashini hayyu tahe. Qaallichi Yehoiyadafi ilmaani isaaleeni Yoashi muudani, duuba nami ch'ufti lalabe waan jed'e, Lubbuuni hayyu ha d'eeratuti.
Hayyiti Ataliani aka biyyiti lalabdu d'ageenani utaalte, Mana Waaqa fulla biyyiti wolti baatu d'ufte.
Jennaani isiini ka balbala mana keesa fulla utaba hayyu mid'aasani eju, ka jara gugurdafi worri magalata d'au marse bira ejaanju, agarte. Biyyiti ch'ufti gammadde, lalabde, magalata d'oofte, worri sirbitu Mana Waaqa kaani miha ufi ka sirba d'ae jila owise. Isiini woya ufi tatarsaafte iyyite waan jette, ya mala nati d'aatani na balleesani! Ya na balleesani!
Yehoiyadani aka Atalia Mana Waaqa keesati ijeesani infed'u, tanaafi inni worra gugurda askarti yaame waan jed'eeni, Jiddu askarti tana keesaa alati baasa, nama lubbu isi baasu fed'u ch'ufa ijeese.
Duuba isi qabani, mana hayyu geesani, fulla fullo Fardaa jed'aniti isii ijeesani.
Yehoiyadani hayyufi biyyale ch'ufa wolti yaame, aka worri nama AABBO Waaqaa tahe isaani woli d'aqani woliini taani tolche.
Jennaani biyyiti ch'ufti mana Baali d'at'e ch'ach'absite. Worri fulla sorio irati baasanifi waan boch'ani kad'atanile ch'ufa ch'ach'abse balleese. Qaallicha Baali, ka Mataani jed'anile, fulla sorio irati baasani durati ijeesani.
Jennaani Yehoiyadani qaaloleefi worra Lawi huji Mana Waaqa harka worraa kenne. Hujiini worraa, aka huji Daudini duri worraa kenne guutani, Seera Musa gula sorio gubani AABBO Waaqaa baasani, ammalle huji sirbatifi ta jila mata iti tahani.
Ammalle Yehoiyadani nama balbala Mana Waaqa eegu tolche, aka worri nama qulqullo intahini Mana Waaqa seenu d'owu.
Worri askartiti matatifi worri gugurda diratifi jaaroleefi nami ch'ufti Yehoiyada woliini yaani, hayyu Mana Waaqati fuud'ani, mana hayyu geesani. Fullo guddooni olduudani hayyule barch'uma isaa ka hayyu ira teesisani.
Jennaani nami ch'ufti gammade, haguma Atalia ijeesani dirileeni nagaya argate.

Yoashini gaafa hayyu Yuda tahe ganni isaa torba; duuba ganna afurtama Yerusalemu keesa lafa mohate. Haad'a isaa maqaani Sibia, isiini dira Beersheba keesati d'alate.
Inni waan AABBO Waaqa gammachiisa, haga qaallichi Yehoiyadani jiru, tolche.
Yehoiyadani dubra lama fuusise, isiini ilmaani d'iiratifi ta dubrale d'alteefi.
Yoashini haga hayyu tahe diqo ture jennaani, Mana Waaqa, fulla ch'abt'e, aka mid'aase jaaru malate.
Duuba inni qaaloleefi worra Lawi wolti yaame waan jed'eeni, dira Yuda keesa yaa, biyya ch'ufa iraa beese guura, aka ganna ch'ufa Mana Waaqa fulla hammateni mid'aasani. Huji tana hurrisa tolcha. Ammo worri Lawi huji suniti injabaanne,
tanaafi inni Yehoiyada, gudda worraa, yaame waan jed'eeni, Atini maanifi worra Lawi kana, ka gibira hojattuuni Waaqa Musani biyya iraa guura, huji Waaro Woyyumatiini hojad'a, jed'e, Worra Yudatifi ka Yerusalemu iraa ingursisini?
(Jari niiti hamtu Atalia jed'ani gula yau kaani duri Mana Waaqa ch'ach'abse miha woyyuma heddu fuud'e huji waaqa Baali jed'anitini hojate.)
Hayyichi seera baase worra Lawitini, sanduqa beese keesa buusani mid'aasa, fulla balbala Mana Waaqa kaya jed'e,
Worri duuba qonqo lafa Yerusalemutifi ta Yudati erge, nama ch'ufaani, gibira AABBO Waaqa ka hojatuni Waaqa Musani duri lafa gamoojiti nama iraa guure, amma baasa jed'e.
Qonqooni tunini biyyaafi jaarole worrale gammachiifte, duuba gibira suni baasani sanduqa suni guutani.
Duuba guyya ch'ufa worri Lawi sanduqa suni fuud'e nama hayyuuni fohate, ka huji suni harkaa qabuti, kennani. Hojja sanduqa suni guutani ch'ufa, namicha tatabe hayyu t'aafufi namichi qaallichi guddaani fohateleni beese suni sanduqa keesaa fuud'ani, sanduqale fulla qarati deebisani. Duuba akanaani beese guddo wolti guurani.
Jennaani hayyichaafi Yehoiyadani beese suni nama jara Mana Waaqa mid'aasuti matati kennani, worri sunini hogeeyi d'akhatifi ta baotifi tumtule beese kenneefi hojachiise.
Nami achi hojattu ch'ufti aka dansaa hojate, Mana Waaqa mid'aasani, akuma qara kaaniti deebisani jabeesani.
Huji suni hobaasani jennaani beese ira hafte hayyufi Yehoiyadati deebisani, worri worqifi qarsi sunini qorifi miha mana Waaqa keesani hojatani ch'ufa mid'aase.
Haga Yehoiyadani jiru ch'ufa sorio akuma dansa guyya ch'ufa Mana AABBO Waaqa keesati baasani.
Inni jaare hobae ganna d'ibbafi sodoma geennaani dulloome.
Waan inni waan dansa worra Israelitiifi Waaqafi Mana Waaqale tolcheefi, irreesa hayyoota ka Dira Daudi keesati isaa awaalani.
Ammo Yehoiyadani due jennaani jaaroleeni gosa Yuda hayyuti d'ufte sosobde gama ufi gula isaa deebifte.
Duuba biyyiti Mana AABBO, Waaqa ababoota isaani, lakifte, Waaqa harkaani mid'aasanifi akheekha Ashera jed'ani kad'atte. Maro wollaala worra kanatifi dallansuuni AABBO Waaqa worra Yudatifi ka Yerusalemu ira buute.
AABBO Waaqi raagoota sila worra gorsite gara isaa deebiftu iti erge, ammo biyyiti raaga suni ch'aqasu didde.
Jennaani lubbuuni Waaqa Zekaria ilma qaallicha Yehoiyada ira buute, inni fulla biyyiti isa agartu eje waan worraani jed'e, Waaqi waan jed'u, Isani maanifi seera AABBO Waaqa ch'absitani ufi balleesitani? Waan isani isa lakiftanifi innileeni ya isani lakise!
Worri qonqo suni d'agaye kaani Zekariati malate, jecha hayyu gula, naabo Mana Waaqa keesati, d'akhaani d'aanaani isa ijeesani.
Akanaani hayyichi huji dansa Yehoiyadani abbaani Zekaria tolcheefi ded'e, ilma isaa ijeese. Zekariani ato lubbuuni keesaa imbahini, waan jed'e, AABBO Waaqi waan kana arge ha haalo na baasuti!
Eegi ganni ch'aame, duuli worra Shamu d'ufe Yudafi Yerusalemu had'e jaarole worrale ch'ufa fit'e waan heddu boojie Damaskitini gale.
Duuli worra Shamu nama diqa, ammo hataatuti, AABBO Waaqati duula gudda worra, Yuda, maro worri AABBO, Waaqa ababoota isaani, lakiseefi, harka worra Shamuti kenne worri worra dabsate. Akanaani hayyu Yoashini gati ch'ubbu ufi argate.
Had'iisa suni keesati isa aka hama madeesani; nyaapi kae gale jennaani jari hojattu isaa, nami lama, isati malate, ato inni sire ufi ira ch'iisu, ijeese, akasiini haalo gurba qaallicha Yehoiyada baase. Isa Dira Daudi keesati awaalani, ammo irreesa hayyoota keesati inawaalle.
(Jari isa ijeese sunini Zabadi, ilma niiti gosa Amoni, ta maqaani Shimeathi, ammalle kaani d'ibileeni Yehoizabadi, ilma niiti gosa Moabu ta Shimrithi jed'ani.)
Kitaaba Odu Hayyoota namaa diigu keesa, odu ilmaani Yoashitifi waan isaa ka faganifi, aka inni Mana Waaqa ka ch'ach'abe mid'aase jaareti jira. Ilmi isaa Amaziani fulla isaa hayyu tahe.

Gaafa Amaziani hayyu tahe ganni isaa diddami shani, duuba inni ganna diddami sagali Yerusalemu keesa lafa mohate. Haad'a isaa, maqaani Yehoadani, ta worra Yerusalemu.
Inni waan dansa tolche AABBO Waaqa gammachiise, ammo waan suni guddo garaa tokooni intolchine.
Inni akuma hayyu tahe jabeenna argateeni, jara abba isaa ijeese kaani fit'e.
Ammo tatule ijoolle worraa inhobaamne, akuma AABBO Waaqi, Seera Musa keesati, biyyati hime: Wollaala ijoolleeti jed'ani abba inijeesani, ka abbaale jed'ani ijoolle inijeesani; nama wollaaluma inni tolche ch'allaani ijeesani.
Jennaani Amaziani worra d'iira ka Yudatifi ka Benjamini wolti baase, balbala balbalaani, nama kuma kumafi d'ibba d'ibbaani qoode, askarti sunile jara gugurda mataa iti tolche. Jari huji tana fohatani nama ganna diddamati oli, ka ch'ufti wolti nama kuma d'ibba sadi. Jari kunini ch'ufti nama filani, ka huji woraana guutu ka ammalle wonteefi woraanani wo had'u beekhu.
Worra kana malele, inni askarti kuma d'ibba toko, worra Israeli ira qarsi kilo kuma saditifi d'ibba afuri baase kirefate.
Ammo raagi toko gara hayyu d'aqe waan jed'eeni, Ee hayyicha, askarti Israeli tana woliini iyyaaina, wonti akanatiifi AABBO Waaqi worra Efraimu, ka mirga d'ufe kana, woliini injiru.
Atini mala keeti, waan worri kunini qarqaarsa sii tahu seeta? Ammo nami nyaapa nama dabsachiise yokhaani dabsachu d'owu Waaquma, inni amma duuba harkuma nyaapa keetiti si kenna.
Jennaani Amaziani waan raaga sunini jed'e, Qarsi anini worra suniti baase suni maani tolcha?
Jennaani Amaziani askarti inni qarsiini kirefate taani ufira galche. Akanaani worri suni, ka aka hama worra Yudati dallane, kae gale.
Duuba Amaziani garaa jabaate, duula isaa bale soodati geese, achiti worra Edomutiini wolhad'ani, askarti worra suni nama kuma kud'ani keesa fit'ani,
kuma kud'ani d'ibile qaqabe boojie. Duuba worra boojiani suni fiit'e gaara geesani, arti iraa dadarbani d'akhaaye golba jirtu irati hobaasani.
Ammo askartini Amaziani galche taani, ta inni duula ufi gula yau d'owe taani, dira Yuda haga Samaria iti keeyate Beth-Horoniti d'aabde haate. Nama kuma sadi fitt'e waan heddu saamte.
Amaziani worra Edomu dabsate gale jennaani, Waaqa d'ara ka worri Seri kad'atu galeeni, Waaqa tolfate, kad'ate guddise hit'aana aarsefi.
Wonti kunini aka male AABBO Waaqa dallansiifte, inni raaga Amaziati erge waan jed'eeni, Atini maanifi Waaqa gosa d'ibi, ka ufiftu worra isaale harka kanke duraa imbaamne, kad'ate gula deemta?
Ato raagi tae dubbi suni dubbatu, hayyichi waan jed'eeni, Nu nama hayyu mala d'au yoomi si fohanne? Afaani qabad'i, yo duu infeene!
Jennaani raagi kaani diqo afaani qabate, ammo duuba eege waan jed'e, Anini imbeekha, aka Waaqi si ijeesu fed'u, waan atini waan kana ch'ufa tate gorsa kiyyale ch'aqasu diddeefi.
Jennaani hayyuuni Yuda ka Amazia, jed'anifi jari isaa mala d'au wolti d'ufani, mala worra Israeliti d'aatani, qonqo gara hayyu Israeli, ka Yoashi ilma Yehoazi, ka ilma Yehuti, erge waan jed'eeni, kooti, woli haana.
