Jennaani Yoashini, hayyuuni Israeli, qonqo gara hayyu Yuda, ka Amazia jed'ani, erge waan jed'eeni; gaafa toko mukhi qoraati toko; ka gaara Lebanoni, qonqo mukha hind'eesa tokoti erge waan jed'e: Intala tante gurba kiyyaa kenni, ka fuud'uti. Jennaanini bineensi toko mukha qorati kaani d'aatu bahe iti riiqate ch'abse, ira ejaanjate.
Amma tana Amazia, atini waan worra Edomu dabsateefi, akana kiyyibda. Amma waan atini taatu, garu indeemini, worruma kanke tai. Atini maanifi gaargala barbaadda, ka siifi worra kanke balleesu?
Ammo Amaziani ch'aqasu dide, wonti akanatiifi Waaqati isaa ch'aqasu d'owe, aka akasiini harka nyaapa isati isa kennu, waan inni Waaqa Edomu kad'ateefi.
Duuba hayyuuni Israeli, ka Yehoashi jed'ani, hayyu Yuda, ka Amazia jed'ani, had'u d'aqe, Beth-Shemeshi, ta lafa Yuda keesati, fuula keesa wold'ufani woli had'ani.
Duula Yuda dabsatani, nami ch'ufti worra ufiti baqate.
Yehoashini, hayyuuni Israeli, Amazia hayyu Yuda Beth-Shemeshiti dabsate, qabe, Yerusalemuti geese. Achiti, d'akha marsani dira sunini jaarani, haguma fullo Efraimutii fuud'e fullo Mogati d'aabe ch'ach'abse — d'akha suni d'eerinni d'und'uma d'ibba afuri.
Inni worqifi qarsi ch'ufa guurate, ammalle miha Mana Waaqa ka worri d'aloota Obed-Edomu qorqoratufi ka mana hayyule ch'ufa guurate, namale boojie, dira Samariatini galate.
Amaziani, hayyuuni Yuda, eegi Yoashini, hayyuuni Israeli, ka Yehoazini d'ale, due ganna kud'ani shani tae.
Waan Amaziani tolche ch'ufa haguma geetunu kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Yudatifi ta Israeli keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Haguma inni AABBO Waaqa iraa gorre, Yerusalemu keesati guddo mala ijeecha iti d'aatani. Duuba eege inni dira Lakishiti baqate, ammo isa hordofani achiti ijeesani.
Reefa isaa farda ira kayani Yerusalemuti geesani dira Daudi keesati fulla hayyoota iti awaalaniti awaalani.

Worri Yuda ch'ufti ilma Amazia, ka Uzia jed'ani, ka ganni isaa kud'ani jaa, fohate, fulla abba isaa hayyu tolche.
(Eegi Amaziani due inni dira Elathi qabe, fulla hammate mid'aase jaare.)
Uzia, gaafa inni hayyu tahe, ganni isaa kud'ani jaa, duuba inni ganna shantami lama Yerusalemu keesa lafa mohate. Haad'a isaa maqaani Yekolia, isiini worra Yerusalemuti.
Inni akuma abba isaa Amazia waan AABBO Waaqa gammachiisa tolche.
Inni, haguma Zekariani namichi kara Waaqa isaa barsiise kaani, jiru ch'alla, AABBO Waaqa hojate, Waaqileeni isa eebise.
Uziani kae duula d'aqe worra Filisti had'e, naabo d'akha ta dira Gathitifi Yamniatifi Ashdodi ch'abse, dira jajaba d'ibi d'aatu Ashdoditifi lafa Filisti keesa fulla d'ibileti jaare.
Waaqi isa qarqaare, duuba inni worra Filistitifi ka Arafti ka Gorbaali taufi, worra gosa Mennile dabsate.
Worri Amoni gibira Uzia baase, inni guddo jabaate, gurri isaa lafa Misirileni bahe.
Uziani doofi dira Yerusalemu keesati, fulla fullo Mogatifi fullo Baleetifi, fulla naaboni mokatuni jaare, akanaani dira suni jabeese.
Ammalle inni doofi lafa aloo keesati jaare, haroole heddule qote; wonti akanatiifi inni looni ule heddu qaba, golbaafi gaareeni ila adutifi lafa diida keesale. Waan inni oobru jaalatufi, inni biyya zabibu oobrisise, lafa gaareeni keesati; ammalle lafa dansale qotachiise.
Ammalle Uziani askarti heddu, ta yo ch'ufa lolaa kurfo jirtu, qaba. Kitaaba waan askarti suni keesati t'aafani worra tatabe isaa t'aafu, Yeielifi Maaseyati, harkaa qaba; worra suni Hananiati iti mata; inni hojattu hayyuu.
Askarti suni ch'ufa nama kuma lamafi d'ibba jaati iti mata.
Worra jala askarti nama kuma d'ibba sadiifi torbatiifi d'ibba shaniti jira, ka aka dansaa hayyu qarqaare, irreeni nyaapa had'u.
Uziani askarti ch'ufa wonte, woraana, koofia sibiilatifi kooti sibiilatifi t'iyaafi guube, d'akha gullubale qoodeefi.
Yerusalemu keesa hogeeyini isaa miha t'iyaafi d'akha gugurdaani darbani mid'aasite doofifi naabo ira nat'e, aka achi iraa darbani. Gurri isaa fagaate fulla ch'ufa gahe, maro qarqaarsa Waaqatifi inni guddo jabaate.
Ammo Uziani jabaate jennaani kiyyibe, akasiini baddi ufitini d'ufe. Inni fed'i AABBO Waaqa isaa dide, Mana Waaqa seene aka, fulla hit'aana irati aarsani irati hit'aana aarsu.
Ammo qaallichi Azariani, qaalole jajanna nama saddeetama woliini, faana yaani,
isa d'owani waan jed'aniini, Uzia, aki atini AABBO Waaqaa hit'aana aarsitu diqole fullaniti. Nami hit'aana aarsu ilmaani Haruni ch'alla, ta eebisani huji tana iti kennani. Fulla qulqullo tana keesaa bahi. Atini ya AABBO Waaqati wollaalte, amma deebite eeba isaa inargattu.
Uziani hojja suni Mana Waaqa keesa, fulla hit'aani iti aarsani, waan hit'aanaani aarsani harkati qabate eja. Inni qaaloleeti dallane jennaani hojuma suni d'ukubi hamani aka qomaat'a addaani bahe.
Qaallicha gudda Azaria jed'anifi qaaloleeni taani ch'ufti hayyu millate, d'ukuba hama aka qomaat'a adda isaa irati garte Mana Waaqa keesaa irreeni isa baafte. Innileeni akasuma hurrise bahu fed'a, wonti akanatiifi AABBO Waaqi ya d'ukuba hama isati buuse.
Duuba hayyu Uziani haga jiru ch'ufa d'ukubuma hama aka qomaat'a sunini tae. Maro inni dandae deebie Mana Waaqa inseenefi, inni koba manati gale, jennaani ilmi isaa Yothamuni worra isaa fide lafale mohate.
Waan Uziani tolche ch'ufa, haguma geetunu, raaga Isaya ilma Amoziti t'aafe.
Uziani doonaani irreesa hayyoota d'aatuti awaalani, wonti akanatiifi inni nama d'ukuba hama aka qomaat'a qabu. Ilmi isaa Yothamuni fulla isaa hayyu tahe.

Yothamuni, gaafa gaani isaa diddami shani, hayyu tahe, Yerusalemu keesa ganna kud'ani jaa lafa mohate. Haad'a isaa, maqaani Yerusha, isiini dubra Sadoki.
Akuma abbaani isaa Uziani tolche, inni waan AABBO Waaqa gammachiisa tolche. Ammo inni aka abba isaa Mana Waaqa seene hit'aana aarse ch'ubbu inseene. Ato akasile tate, biyyiti ch'ubbu illakimne.
Nami balbala Mana Waaqa ta mirga jaare naabo moga Yerusalemu ta Ofeli jed'anile mid'aase jaare Yothamu.
Gaareeni Yuda keesati inni dira jaare, badda keesati maneeni jajabduufi doofi jaare, ta nyaapa keesati ufiraa eegani.
Ammalle inni hayyu Amonitifi duula isaa had'e dabsate, ganna sadi ch'ufa gibira iraa guurate: qarsi kilo kuma saditifi d'ibba afuri, dargaye kilo kuma maro kuma toko; garbule ta kilo kuma maro kuma toko.
Wonti Yothamuni akasi jabaateefi waan inni kara AABBO Waaqa isaa gula baheefi.
Waan Yothamuni tolche ch'ufa, woraana inni loleefi finna inni nama fide, kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Yudafi ta Israeli keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Gaafa Yothamuni hayyu tahe, ganni isaa diddami shani, ammalle inni ganna kud'ani jaa Yerusalemu keesa lafa mohate.
Inni due jennaani dira Daudi keesati isa awaalani, ilmi isaa Ahazini fulla isaa hayyu tahe.

Gaafa Ahazini hayyu tahe, ganni isaa diddama, duuba inni ganna kud'ani jaa Yerusalemu keesa lafa mohate. Inni faana ababo isa Daudi gula bahu dide, faana hayyoota Israeli gula bahe, waan AABBO Waaqa ingammachiimne tolche. Inni akheekha waaqa d'ara, ka Baali jed'ani, sibiilani mid'aase,
bale Hinomu keesati hit'aana aarse, ilma ufile gube, waaqa d'araati sorio baase, akasiini aada hamtu worri duri AABBO Waaqi worra Israeli duraa gusse tolfate gula bahe.
Fulla waaqa d'ara iti kad'atanifi gaareeni gubbafi mukeeni gaadisaa gugurdo jalaleeti, Ahazini sorio baase hit'aana aarse.
Namichi Zikiri jed'ani, janni toko, ka gosa Efraimu, Maaseya ilma Ahazitifi Azrikamu ka gudda huji mana hayyutifi Elkana ka hayyuuti aanu fit'e.
Worri Israeli nad'eenifi ijoolle worra Yuda, ka oboleyaani isaani, nama kuma d'ibba lama boojie, ammalle waan heddu d'ibile ch'ufa boojie Samariatini galate.
Duuba raaga AABBO Waaqa tokoti jira, ka Odedi jed'ani, ka worri isaa Samaria. Inni duula Israeli ka Samariati galu jiru fuula keesa d'ufe waan jed'eeni, AABBO, Waaqi ababoota teesani, ya worra Yudati dallane worra harka keesaniti kenne, ammo amma tana inni aka isani worra qaqaltani suni layu d'agaye.
Amma isani nama Yerusalemutifi ka Yuda, d'iirafi nad'eenile, tisse tolfachu feetani. Isanileeni aka AABBO Waaqa keesani durati ch'ubbu tolchitani ufi ingartani?
Amma dubbi tiyya tana ch'aqasa! Worri isani boojitani kunini oboleyaani teesani. Worra galakisa, yokhaani AABBO Waaqi isaniti dallane isani balleesa.
Jaaroleeni Efraimu nami afuri, Azaria ilma Yehohananitifi Berekia ilma Meshilemothitifi Yehizkia ilma Shalumutifi Amasa ilmi Hadlaileni waan askartini suni tate didani,
waan jed'ani, Worra boojitani kana dira kanani ind'ufina! Nu qara AABBO Waaqati ch'ubbamne isa dallansiifne. Isani amma haga qarale ch'ubbu nuti dartani baddi nutiini d'ufu feetani.
Duuba askartini taani nama boojiteefi waan worraa ka guurate kaani ch'ufa, jaaroleefi gumi gosa isaaniti kennite,
jaaroleeni taani afraani worra boojiani suni ch'ufa, ka qulla yau, miha boojiani kaani keesa woya iti qoode, kobe iti nat'e, waan worri nyaate d'ugu kenniteefi, mada worrale d'ad'a ibsiiteefi. Worra yau indandeennele ch'ufa harre ira naqani, akasiini worra boojiani suni ch'ufa Yeriko, dira meet'i, ka lafa Yudati, galchani. Duuba worri Israeli kaani kae, Samariati deebie.
Worri gosa Edomu ammalle worra Yuda had'e nama heddu boojie, tanaafi hayyu Ahazini hayyu Ashuru ka Tiglath-Pilezeri jed'ani qarqaarsa kad'ate.
Gaafasi worri gosa Filisti dira golba gaareeni ilaadu jirufi ammalle dira Yuda bita jiru had'u jira. Worri dira Beth-Shemeshifa, Ayaloni fa, Gerothifa, Soko fa, Timna fa, Gimzo fa, ollowaani dira suni woliini, dabsate qabe, dira suni keesa qubate.
Waan Ahazini hayyuuni Yuda waan hamtu lafa keesati tahe AABBO Waaqa dideefi, AABBO Waaqi worra Yuda gaargala itiini d'ufe.
Hayyuuni Ashuru fulla sila Ahazi qarqaaru, qarqaarsa lakise gaargala itiini d'ufe.
Jennaani Ahazini worqi Mana Waaqatifi mana hayyutifi mana jaarole lafa suni keesaa guure, hayyicha Ashuruti kenne, ammo tunileeni isa inqarqaare.
Gaargali iti guddannaani hayyichi Ahazi jed'ani kaani haga qarale ira AABBO Waaqa durati ch'ubbu tolche.
Inni sorio Waaqa Damaskiti baase, ka ufiftu isa dabsate. Duuba waan jed'e, Waaqi Ashuru hayyoota Ashuru qarqaare, tanaafi yo anini sorio baasufi waaqi suni hegeri na qarqaara. Wonti kunini isaafi gosa isaa badi itiini d'ufte.
Ammalle inni miha Mana Waaqa ch'ufa guure ch'ach'abse, Mana Waaqa ch'ufe, Yerusalemu keesa moga ch'ufa waan sorio irati qalani mid'aafate.
Dira Yuda ch'ufa keesati inni fulla waaqa d'ara iti kad'atani hit'aana aarsanifi jaare. Duuba akanaani AABBO Waaqa ababoota isaa, dallansiise.
Waan inni tolche ch'ufa, haguma geetunu, kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Yudatifi ta Israeli keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Hayyu Ahazini due, Yerusalemuti awaalani, ammo irreesa hayyoota keesati inawaalle. Duuba ilmi isaa Hezekiani fulla isaa hayyu tahe.

Gaafa Hezekiani hayyu tahe, ganni isaa diddami shani duuba inni ganna diddami sagali Yerusalemu keesa lafa mohate. Haad'a isaa, maqaani Abiya, isiini dubra Zekaria.
Inni faana ababo isaa Daudi bahe, waan AABBO Waaqa gammachiisa tolche.
Jia qara ganna Hezekiani hayyu tahe, inni balbala Mana Waaqa ta qara ch'ufani bane fulla hammatele ch'ufa mid'aase.
Duuba qaaloleefi worra Lawi wolti yaame, naabo Mana Waaqa garaa keesa moga ilaboruti
iti dubbate waan jed'e, Isani worri Lawi ufi qulqulleesa, Mana AABBO Waaqa ababoota teesanile, qulqulleesa, waan mana suni t'ureesa ch'ufa keesaa baasa.
Ababooti teenna AABBO Waaqa keenna iraa gorte, waan hamtu inni infeene tolchite. Worri isa lakise, fulla inni iti galu fuula iraa deefate dudda iti gale.
Worri balbala Mana Waaqa ch'ufe, ifse d'aamfe, hit'aani aarsu dide, sorio gubani baasani, Mana Waaqa Israeli keesati, baasu dide.
Maro waan sunitifi AABBO Waaqi Yudafi Yerusalemuti dallane; wonti inni worra tolche suni nama ch'ufa aka male rifachiifte mudamsiifte akuma isani gartani kana.
Abbooti teenna woraanani fit'ani nad'eenifi ijoolle teenna boojiani.
Anini amma wold'aqisa AABBO Waaqa Israelitini tolfachu fed'a, aka inni deebie nuti indalanne.
Ilmaani tiyya, indidina, nami AABBO Waaqi fohate, ka hit'aana isaa aarse Mana isaa keesa isaa hojattu isani; hurrisa hojad'aafi.
Nami gosa Lawi ka hojja suni achi jiru worra kana:
Balbala Kohathi: Mahathi, ilma Amasaitifi Yoeli, ilma Asaria.
Balbala Merari: Kishi ilma Abditifi Azaria, ilma Yehaleli.
Balbala Gershoni: Yoa, ilma Zimatifi Edeni, ilma Yoa.
Balbala Elisafani: Shimrifi Yeueli.
Balbala Asafu: Zekariafi Matania.
Balbala Hemani: Yehuelifi Shimei.
Balbala Yeduthuni: Shemayafi Uzieli.
Jari kunini nama gosa isaani ka Lawi ch'ufa wolti baase, worri ch'ufti ufi qulqulleese. Duuba akuma hayyu Hezekiani worraani jed'e, Seera AABBO Waaqa gula Mana Waaqa qulqulleesani.
Qaaloleeni Mana Waaqa seente qulqulleesite, waan qulqullo intahini ch'ufa keesaa baafte, gara naabo geesite. Duuba worri Lawi d'ufe dira keesaa baase bale Kidroni keesati jisse.
Huji suni guyya qara ka jia qara iti keyatani, guyya saddeeteeso geennaani ch'ufa hobaasani, mana balbala guddoti aanule woliini. Jennaani guyya saddeeti d'ibile hojatani, guyya kud'ani jaeeso, ka jia suni, huji qulqulleesa Mana Waaqa suni hobaasani.
Jennaani worri Lawi fulla hayyu Hezekia d'ufe waan jed'eeni, Nu yayu Mana Waaqatifi waan sorio irati gubani baasanifi mesa qit'a qulqullootifi miha isaa ch'ufa qulqulleesine iraa deebine.
Ammalle miha duri hayyu Ahazini gaafa kara Waaqa iraa gore kaani gate, guure deebimne qulqulleesine. Mihi suni ch'ufti mesa AABBO Waaqa dura jira.
Boriyyaate hayyu Hezekiani ganama lafaa kae, jaarole Yerusalemu wolti yaame, Mana AABBO Waaqa woliini d'aqani.
Worri koromi looni torbaafi elemiye torbaafi ilmoole hoola torbaafi korbeeyyi torba d'ufeeni, maro daba worra hayyutifi worra Yudatifi, ammalle aka Mana Waaqa qulqulleesani sorio baasani. Jennaani hayyichi waan qaalole d'aloota Harunitini jed'e, Hori kana qala, mesa irati sorio baasa.
Jennaani qaaloleeni qara koromi suni qaqalte, elemiye iti aansite, eege ilmoole hoola qaqalte, d'iiga hori sorio suni waan mesa fakaata, ka sorio irati baasani kaaniti fifit'e.
Jennaani worri korbeeyyi suni hayyufi gumi taani duraani d'ufe, worri suni harirate.
Duuba eege qaaloleeni korbeeyyi suni qalte d'iiga isi sorio daba gumi ch'ufaatini baasani baafte, waan sorio irati baasani irati jissite. Wonti akanatiifi hayyichi qara waan jed'e, sorio gubanifi sorio dabaani ufi iraa baasani maro gumi Israeli ch'ufa ha baasani.
Hayyichi dubbi AABBO Waaqi duri raaga hayyu Daudi ka Gadi jed'anifi raaga Nathani jed'aniini Dauditi hime gula deeme; inni worra Lawi ka kiraarifi bilbila qabu,
miha duri miha hayyu Daudini qabu fakaatu huji Mana Waaqatii jed'e iti kenne. Qaaloleeni ta magalata qabduleeni achi jirti.
Jennaani Hezekiani, sorio gubani baasa, worraani jed'e, sorio suni baamnaani biyyiti AABBO Waaqa faarsite, siribduleeni magalatafi miha sirba kaanile ch'ufa d'oofte.
Nami achi jiru ch'ufti Waaqa faarse, faaruufi sirba suni haga sorio ch'ufa baasaniti illakimne.
Jennaani hayyu Hezekiafi gumiini ch'ufti gajette, AABBO Waaqa kad'atte.
Hayyufi jaaroleeni Yuda waan worra Lawitini jette, Faaru Daudifi raagi Asafuni t'aafani AABBO Waaqaani faarsa. Akanaani nami ch'ufti gammada guddaani sirbe jilbifate, Waaqa kad'ate.
Jennaani Hezekiani waan biyyaani jed'e, Isani amma tana ya ufi qulqulleesitani, koota, gad'iaad'a, sorio baasa, galata AABBO Waaqaa deebisa. Worri dubbi suni ee jed'e, hori gubani sorio AABBO Waaqaa baasanini d'ufe.
Horini worri d'ufeeni, koromi looni torbatama, elemiye d'ibba tokoti, ilmoole hoola ta d'ibba lama;
worri ammalle koromi looni d'ibba jaafi hooliye kuma sadi sorio qaqale biyya nyaachise.
Maro qaaloleeni hori kana ch'ufa ufiti qaallu indandeennefi, worri Lawi haga huji hobaasaniti worra qarqaare. Yo worri huji suni hobaase, qaaloleeni d'ibileeni ya ufi qulqulleesite. (Worri Lawi gara qulqulluma gula qaalole ira jira.)
Sorio gubani baasani male, qaaloleeni gabbinna hori fooni isaa nyaatani gubde, daad'i sorio gubani woliini baasani d'ibaayu baafte.
Akanaani huji eeba ta Mana Waaqa ta duri lakisani amma deebiani tolfatani.
Hezekiafi gumiini ch'ufti guddo gammadde, waan qarqaarsa Waaqatini hujiini tunini ch'ufti yoosu hobaateefi.

Hayyufi gumileeni qonqo suni maachani,
gosa Israeli, haguma Dani iti keyatani Beershebati d'aabani, nama ch'ufa Yerusalemuti wolti yaamani, haga duri kaanile ch'ufa iraa, aka aada gula jila Pasaka tolfatani.
Duuba jecha hayyutifi ka jaarole gula, nama lafa Yudatifi ta Israeli keesa qonqo tanani ergani:
Worra Israeli, isani ka lafa tana keesati harka worra Ashuru jalaa baatani, amma AABBO Waaqa Abrahamutifi ka Isaaqotifi ka Yakobooti deebia, innileeni isanumati deebia.
Aka ababoota teesanitifi oboleyaani teesani ta Israeli, ta AABBO Waaqa isaani durati ch'ubbu tolchite, intahina. Inni aka hama worra gaargalche, akuma isani gartani kana.
Aka worraa mata injabatina, ammo AABBO Waaqaa saalfad'a. Mana AABBO Waaqa keesani, ka inni haga jiru jireenna eebise ka Yerusalemu keesa jiruti koota, isa kad'ad'a, aka inni deebie isaniti indalanne.
Yo isani AABBO Waaqati deebitani, worri duri oboleyaanifi ilmaani teesani boojieleeni worraa nahe lafa tanati worra galcha. AABBO Waaqi keesani eebaafi naasu qaba, hojja isani isati deebitani inni isani indidu.
Jari ergani kaani dira ch'ufa ka lafa Efraimutifi ka Manase keesa jirufi haga lafa Zabulonile d'aqe, ammo biyyiti worra kofalte goyeesite.
Ammo hataatu, nami gari ka Asheritifi ka Manasetifi ka Zabulonileeni qonqo suni fud'ate, Yerusalemu d'ufe.
Waaqileeni worra Yudale qarqaare, worra ch'ufa garaa takaa tolche, aka worri fed'i isaa gula yae jecha jaaroleetifi ka hayyu guutu.
Nami hedduuni muumme inqamne jia lameeso d'ufe, Yerusalemuti wolti bahe, jila Qit'a bukho inqamne tolfate.
Waan mesa fakaata ka Yerusalemu keesati sorio irati baasanifi ka hit'aana irati aarsani ch'ufa fuud'ani, bale Kidroniti jissani.
Guyya kud'ani afreeso ka jia suni, ilmoole hoola ta jila Pasakati qalani, qaqalani. Qaaloleefi worri Lawi ka qara ufi inqulqulleesini, aka hama ch'eere, hojuma suni ufi qulqulleese sorio isaani ta gubani baasani Mana AABBO Waaqatini d'ufe.
Worri huji isaani ta Mana Waaqa, ta guyya ch'ufaa, ta Seera namicha Waaqa ka Musa jed'ani kaani gula worraa kennani, iti deebie hojate. Worri Lawi d'iiga sorio qaaloleeti kenne, qaaloleeni d'iiga suni waan sorio irati baasani kaaniti fifit'e.
Waan nami hedduuni gumi keesa qulqullo intahinifi, hooliye jila Pasaka qalu dad'abani, tanaafi worri Lawi worraa qale hooliye suni AABBO Waaqaa baase.
Tana malele, nami hedduuni ka gosa Efraimutifi Manasetifi Isakaritifi Zabuloni, ka ufi inqulqulleesini, aada male fooni sorio suni nyaate. Hayyichi Hezekiani Waaqa worraa kad'ate waan jed'e:
Ee AABBO, Waaqa ababoota teenna, dansuma teetiini nama garaa tokooni si kad'atu araaramifi, ato worri aada gula ufi qulqulleesu baatele.
AABBO Waaqi kad'acha Hezekia d'agaye, worraa araaramefi woma intolchine lakise.
Worri Yerusalemuti wolti bahe suni bulti torba jila qit'a bukho inqamne gammadaani tolfate, guyya ch'ufa worri Lawitifi qaaloleleeni aka jaba AABBO Waaqa faarsani.
Hezekiani worra Lawi huji worri aka dansa AABBO Waaqa hojate suni iraa gammade aka male owise.
Eegi worri guyya torba sorio qale AABBO, Waaqa ababoota isaani faarse,
worri ch'ufti woligale bulti torba d'ibi jila tolfate gammade.
Hayyu Hezekiani koromi kuma tokotifi hooliye kuma torba gumii baase, jaaroleleeni akasuma koromi kuma tokotifi hooliye kuma kud'ani baafteefi. Ammalle qaaloleeni hedduuni ufi qulqulleesite.
Duuba akanaani nami ch'ufti gammade — worra Yudati, qaalole, worra Lawiti, worra mirgaa d'ufe, ammalle worra gosa d'ibi ka Israelifi Yuda keesa qubatu.
Akanaani nami dira Yerusalemu keesa jiru ch'ufti gammade; wonti akanatiifi, haguma ilmi Daudi Solomonini lafa mohate asi, wonti akana taka intaane.
Jennaani qaaloleefi worri Lawi oli ejaanje gumi eebise; Waaqileeni gubbati kad'acha worraa d'agayeefi.

Eegi jilti sunini ch'ufti dabarte, worri Israeli ch'ufti dira Yuda ch'ufa d'aqe d'akhaaye old'ad'aabani ch'ach'abse, akheekha waaqa d'ara ka Ashera jed'ani ch'ire, fulla sorio iti qalanifi ta waaqa d'ara iti kad'atanile balleese. Akasuma lafa Yuda ch'ufafi ta Benjaminitifi ta Efraimutifi ta Manase keesati tolchani, kaani worra ufiti galani.
Hezekiani ammalle qaaloleefi worra Lawi huji worra ta qara bade deebise worra ch'ufa toko tokooni huji iti qoode. Hujiini suni tana: aka sorio gubanifi ta wold'ageeti Waaqaa baasani huji eeba ta Mana Waaqa tolchani, Mana suni keesati Waaqa faarsani, galata deebisani.
Hayyichi ree isaa keesa, hori galgalaafi diirama gubani Waaqaa baasanifi ka guyya Sabatotifi guyya jila baatitifi ka jila d'ibile, aada AABBO Waaqa gula baasani, baase.
Akuma qonqooni sunini worra geeteni, worri Israeli waan kana ch'ufa d'ufeeni: Mid'aani, daad'i, d'ad'a, damma, waan oobruuni baaftu d'ibi ch'ufa, ammalle worri qooda waan qabu ch'ufa guddise baase.
Worri Yudatifi ka Israeli ch'ufti, ka dira Yuda keesa jiru, qooda loonitifi ka ree Waaqaa baase ammalle waan heddu olkayani AABBO Waaqa isaaniti baasani d'ufaniini wolti tuulani.
Jia sadeeso waan kana woltiini d'ufani tuulani, haga jia torbeeso huji suni hojatani.
Hayyu Hezekiafi jaaroleeni waan baasani kana ch'ufa agarte jennaani AABBO Waaqa faarsite gumi isaa ta Israeli eebifte.
Hayyichi, waan waan wolti tuulani suni qaaloleefi worra Lawi gaafate jennaani,
qaallichi guddaani Azaria jed'ani, ka d'aloota Sadoki, waan jed'eeni, Hojuma biyyiti waan baafte kanani Mana Waaqa d'ufte, nu nyaanne quumne hambimne. Waan AABBO Waaqi nu eebiseefi wonti kunini ch'ufti nuraa hafte.
Jennaani Hezekiani waan biyyaani jed'e, Fulla miha iti olkayani, Mana Waaqa keesati, mid'aasa,
waan Waaqaa baasanifi qooda isaa baasani kana ch'ufa keesati olkaya; jennaani akasuma tolchani. Huji suni nami iti mata namicha Lawi toko, ka Konania jed'ani, nami isati aanuleeni oboleesa isaa, ka Shemei jed'ani.
Ammalle worra Lawi nama kud'aniti worra suni jala hojata: Yehieli, Azazia, Nahathi, Asaheli, Yerimothi, Yozabadi, Elieli, Ismakia, Mohathi, Benaiya. Waan kana ch'ufa mura hayyicha Hezekiatifi, qaallicha gudda Azaria jed'anitini tolchani.
Namichi worra Lawi toko, ka Kore ilma Imna jed'ani, ka fullo ilaboru eegu, waan AABBO Waaqa baasani nama iraa fuud'e biyyaa qooda.
Dira d'ibi qaaloleeni iti galtu keesa, worra Lawi kanati garaa tokooni huji isa qarqaare: Edeni, Minyamini, Yeshua, Shemaya, Amaria, Shekania. Worri sagale tana wolqit'e qoodeefi,
balbala worraa gulaniti, ammo huji worraa gula. Qooda suni nama d'iira, ka ganni isaa sodoma oli ch'ufa, ka aada gula Mana Waaqa keesa guyya ch'ufa huji hojattu akuma inni guddinna woli ira qabuuni kennaniifi.
Huji suni qaalole balbala gosa worraa gula qoodani, ammo worra Lawi ka ganna diddama oli qooda huji worraa gula huji iti qoodani.
Worra kana ch'ufa nad'eenifi ijoolleefi nama worra d'ibile ch'ufa woliini t'aafani, wonti akanatiifi worri hojja ch'ufa kurfo jiraachu male, aka hojja ch'ufa huji ufi ta woyyuma hojattu.
Qaalole dira d'aloota Haruniti kennani keesa teetu, yokhaani ta arda horini oolu ka dira suni keesa teetu keesaa nama fohatani. Nami fohatani kunini sagale suni nama d'iira ka qaalole ch'ufafi nama worra Lawi ka t'aafani ch'ufaa qooda.
Lafa Yuda ch'ufa keesa Hezekiani waan d'uga, ka AABBO Waaqa isaa gammachiisa, tolche.
Wonti hujiini isaa ch'ufti tolteefi waan inni garaa tokooni Waaqa isati hojate huji Mana Waaqatifi huji Seerale jabeese guuteefi.

Eegi bara hayyu Hezekiani garaa tokooni AABBO Waaqa hojate kaani, Senakeribuni, hayyuuni Ashuru, lafa Yuda had'e. Inni dira jabeesani, jaarani ch'ufa marse, askarti isatini, naabo isaa ch'ach'absa had'a jed'e.
Hezekiani aka Senakeribuni dira Yerusalemule had'u fed'e arginaani
isaafi hojattuuni isaa, aka bisaani maddaa ka dira suniti yaa, kutani woliini malatani; aka, akasiini hojja worri Ashuru Yerusalemuti d'iaatu, bisaani d'abu. Hojatuni taani nama heddu wolti baafte, madda bisaani kutani bisaani yau d'owani.
Hayyichi dira jabeese naabo jaare, doofile ch'ufa gubbati jaare, naabo sunini alalleti naabo d'ibi jaare. Ammalle inni dira Yerusalemu, gama dullachaani ilaboru, fulla jabeesani lafa duuchani taani irati jaarani, mid'aase jaare. Inni ammalle woraanafi wonte heddu mid'aase.
Nama d'iira ka dira suni ch'ufa nama mataa iti tolche, ballinna fulla fullo dira suniti wolti baase waan jed'eeni,
Ilaafina, garaa jabaad'a, hayyu Ashurutifi duula isaa gudda muumme inqamne suni insodatina. Irreeni teennafi ta isaa takaniti.
Irreeni isaa ta namaati, ammo teenna ta AABBO Waaqa keennati, ka nu qarqaare nyaapa keenna nuraa d'owu. Biyyiti dubbi hayyu tana d'ageete jennaani garaa jabaate.
Eegi suni ato Senakeribufi askartini isaa dira Lakishi haatu, inni qonqo tana gara Hezekiatifi worra Yuda, ka isa woliini Yerusalemu jiru, erge waan jed'eeni,
Senakeribuni, hayyuuni Ashuru, waan jed'u, Isani maani abdatani, ka dira Yerusalemu ka marsani had'ani, keesa ch'iiftani?
Hezekiani, AABBO Waaqa keesaniti harka keenna keesaa isani baasa isaniini jed'a, ammo inni ufuma isani sobe, beelafi d'eebuni isani hobaasa.
Nami fulla AABBO Waaqa iti kad'atani sorio baasanifi balleese, ka worra Yudatifi ka Yerusalemu waan sorio irati baasani toko ch'alla irati sorio baasisise isaniti?
Isani waan anaafi ababooti tiyya worra gosa d'ibi tolchine imbeetani? Waaqi hedduuni gosa d'ibi taka worra isaani ya harka hayyu Ashuru keesaa baase?
Waaqi lafa suni tokoleeni yoomi taka harka keenna keesaa worra baase? Duuba maaniti, aka Waaqi keesani isani baasu, isani heresisa?
Amma soba Hezekiani tae isaniini balleesu kana ee injed'ina. Isa ind'ugeefatina! Waaqi gosa d'ibi taka worra ufi harka hayyu Ashuru jalaa imbaamne. Tanaafi Waaqi keesani kuninileeni dandae isani imbaasu!
Hojattuuni Ashuru waan hagasi ira hamtule, waan AABBO Waaqatifi hojattu isaa Hezekia, dubbate.
Tatabeeni hayyichi t'aafe taani AABBO Waaqa Israeli aka hama gurra balleesite waan jette, Waaqi gochiti d'ibiini yaamatuleeni, taka gosa isa harka kiyya keesaa imbaamne, Waaqi Hezekialeeni akasuma dandae worra ufi harka kiyya keesaa imbaasu.
Jennaani hojatuni taani afaani Ebraniatini dubbi tana lalabde, aka worra Yerusalemu, ka naabo ira ch'iisu, sodaachise mudamsiisu aka akanaani dira suni yoosu dabsatani qabani.
Ammalle worri Waaqa Yerusalemu, akuma Waaqa gosa d'ibi, ka harkaani mid'aasani kaani, sehe miid'e.
Jennaani hayyu Hezekiafi raagi Isaya jed'ani, ka ilma Amozi, AABBO Waaqati bohani qarqaarsa kad'atani.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi malaika ufi erge malaikaani suni askarti Ashurutifi jara gugurda worrale hobaafte. Akanaani hayyichi Ashuru, ka ch'eeraani injirre, kae, lafa ufiti gale. Guyya toko, ato inni Mana Waaqa isaa keesa tau, ilmaani isaa hagi toko d'ufte goraadeeni isa ijeefte.
Akanaani AABBO Waaqi hayyu Hezekiafi worra Yerusalemu harka Senakeribu hayyu Ashurutifi nyaapa d'ibile jalaa baase lafa worraa, mirgaa bitaa ch'ufa, nagaya tolche.
Nami hedduuni Yerusalemu d'ufe, AABBO Waaqaa waan heddu baase Hezekiale wo kenne, duuba akanaani gochiti ch'ufti Hezekia ulfinna kenniteefi.
Bara suni Hezekiani fayyad'abe duud'ame, jennaani AABBO Waaqa kad'ate, AABBO Waaqi akheekha inni fayyuni isaa kenne.
Ammo Hezekiani aka hama kiyyibe, galata wollaale, waan AABBO Waaqi tolche ded'e, jennaani wollaali isaa suni Yudafi Yerusalemu badi itiini d'ufe.
Ammo eege Hezekiafi worri Yerusalemu kiyyiba suni lakise ufi diqeese, tanaafi AABBO Waaqi worra suni haga Hezekiani jiru imballeesine.
Hayyu Hezekiani aka male woi horate gurra baafate.
Inni mana worqifi qarsifi d'akhaaye ch'uch'ulut'ufi qumbifi wonteefi miha gati qabu d'ibile keesati olkayu jaarate. Ammalle mana d'ibile ka mid'aanifi daad'ifi d'ad'a keesati olkeyatu jaarate, mana looni iti galanifi ka reeni iti galtule jaarate.
Tana malele, Waaqi loonifi reefi waan heddu d'ibile kenneefi. Tanaafi inni dira heddu d'ibile jaare.
Nami maddo Gihoni duuche bisaani isii lafa iti fallanse gara dira Yerusalemu qajeelche, Hezekia. Wonti inni tolche ch'ufti eebifamte,
ammalle gaafa jari jaaroleeni Babiloni isati ergite d'ufe waan akheekha waaqi tolche isa odeefate, Waaqi Hezekia yalabahe, aka akasiini isaa ilaalate, waan garaa isaa keesa jira hubatu.
Waan Hezekiani tolche ch'ufafi aka inni AABBO Waaqa hojatele ch'ufa, kitaaba Daayya Raaga Isaya, ilma Amozitifi Odu Hayyoota Yudatifi ta Israeli keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Hezekiani due jennaani awaala hayyoota, gaara gubba, fulla ilmaani Daudi iti awaalaniti awaalani. Worri Yudatifi ka Yerusalemuleeni gaafa inni due guddo boheefi awaala mid'aase. Ilmi isaa Manaseeni fulla isaa hayyu tahe.

Ganni Manase kud'ani lama gaafa inni hayyu Yuda tahe, ammalle inni Yerusalemu keesa haga ganna shantami shani lafa mohate.
Akuma gosa AABBO Waaqi duri worra duraa gusse, ta waan hamtu tate isa durati ch'ubbu hamtu tolchite taani, Manaseleeni AABBO Waaqa durati ch'ubbu tolche.
Fulla waaqa d'ara iti kad'atani, ta gaara gubba, ta qara abbaani isaa Hezekiani ch'ach'abse, jaare, ammalle fulla Baali iti kad'atani sorio baasanifi mid'aase, fakeenna waaqa Ashera jed'anile boch'e, urjile ch'ufa gajed'e kad'ate.
Inni Mana AABBO Waaqa, ka Waaqi, na ch'alla keesati haga jiru jireenna yaamad'a jed'e, keesati waan sorio waaqa d'ara irati baasani jaare.
Ammalle naabo lamaani, Mana Waaqa garaa keesati, waan sorio irati baasani urji kad'atani, jaare.
Inni ilmaani isaa ta d'iira bale Henomu keesati gube sorio baase, ammalle nama wohimufi ka murma baafatufi worra ayyaanatifi falfatule d'ugeefate gula deeme. Inni ch'ubbu guddo hamtu tolche, akasiini AABBO Waaqa dallansiise.
Ammalle akheekha mid'aase, Mana Waaqa keesa kaye. Mani suni ka duri Waaqi waan isaa dubbate waan Daudifi Solomonini jed'e, Yerusalemu keesa, Mana kana keesati, fulla anini lafa gosa Israeli kud'ani lamaani taani keesaa fohad'e, iti na kad'ad'a.
Ammalle yo gumiini Israeli Seera kiyya guute, seera hojatuni tiyya Musani kenneefi ch'ufa gula yaate, anini aka lafa anini ababoota worraati kenne taani keesaa worra baasani ee injed'u jed'e,
Manaseeni worra Yuda ch'ubbu hamtu taka gochiti d'ibiini AABBO Waaqi duri gumi ufi dura gusseleeni intolchini tolchisise.
AABBO Waaqi Manaseefi gosa isaa gorse, ammo worri gorsa isaa ch'aqasu dide.
Tanaafi AABBO Waaqi worra gugurda askarti Ashuru worra Yudati had'iisa erge. Worri Manase qabe, sibiila hokichaani woraane, sansalatani hid'e, lafa Babiloni geese.
Gaargali sunini isa qabate jennaani kiyyiba qara kaani lakise, AABBO Waaqati deebie naasu kad'ate.
Waaqi kad'acha Manase d'agayeefi, Yerusalemuti galche, hayyuma isaati deebise. Suni gula, Manaseeni aka AABBOONI d'uguma Waaqa hubate.
Eegi suni Manaseeni naabo ala ta dira Daudi moga ilaboru haga qara kaani ira iti dare old'eerese jaare, inni gama mirga haguma bale d'aatu maddo Gihoniti iti keeyate fullo Qurt'umi ira qabe moga dira ta Ofeli jed'aniti d'aabe jaare. Inni ammalle jara gugurda askarti, dira Yuda ka jabeesani jaarani ch'ufa keesa, toko toko kaye.
Inni Waaqa d'ara ka gochiti d'ibiini kad'atuufi akheekha inni duri achi kaye Mana Waaqa keesaa baase, waan sorio irati baasani, ka gaara Mani Waaqa gubba jiru ira jirtuufi ammalle ta Yerusalemu keesa fulla d'ibi jirtule ch'ufa balleese; waan kana ch'ufa dira keesaa baase alati balleese.
Inni ammalle waan AABBO Waaqa sorio irati baasani, ta qara hammate, mid'aase jaare, sorio wold'ageetitifi ta galata irati baase; ammalle worra Yuda ch'ufaani, AABBO Waaqa Israeli kad'ad'a jed'e.
Biyyiti sorio fulla d'ibileti baafte, ammo hataatuti, AABBO Waaqa isaani ch'alla guddifte.
Waan Manaseeni tolche ch'ufa, kad'acha inni Waaqa isaa kad'ateefi dubbi raagooti maqa AABBO Waaqa Israelitini isaani dubbatele ch'ufa, kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Israeli keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Kad'acha isaatiifi aka Waaqi kad'acha suni d'agayeefi ch'ubbu inni ato qara iraa indeebiini tolcheefi — waan hamtu inni tahe, ka inni fulla waaqa d'ara iti kad'atani jaare, akheekha Ashera mid'aase Waaqa d'ara ka inni kad'atele — waan kana ch'ufa kitaaba odu raagoota keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.
Manase doonaani mana isaa keesati awaalani, ilmi isaa Amonini fulla isaa hayyu tahe.
Ganni Amoni diddami lama gaafa inni hayyu Yuda tahe, ammalle inni ganna lama Yerusalemu keesa lafa Yuda Mohate.
Akuma abba isaa Manase, innileeni AABBO Waaqa durati ch'ubbu tolche waaqa d'ara ka abbaani isaa kad'atele kad'ate.
Ammo inni, aka abba isaa, kiyyiba lakise, garaa laafe AABBO Waaqati indeebine; inni abba isale ira ch'ubbu tolche.
Hojattuuni Amoni isati malate, mana hayyu keesati isa ijeefte.
Jennaani worri Yuda jara isa ijeese kaani hobaase, ilma isa ka Yosia jed'ani hayyu tolche.

Inni waan AABBO Waaqi fed'u tolche, faanuma akhaakhu isaa Daudi, ka diqole iraa ingorini, bahe seera Waaqa ch'ufa jabeese guute.
Ganna saddeeteeso ka hayyuma Yosia, ka inni gaafasile ijoolluma qabu, inni Waaqa ababo isaa Daudi kad'ate arti asi gula deeme. Ganna kud'ani lameeso ka hayyuma isaa, inni fulla waaqa d'ara iti kad'atanifi akheekha waaqa Ashera jed'anitifi akheekha waaqa d'ara d'ibile ch'ufa lafa keesaa balleesiti iti kaye.
Jecha isaa gula, jari isaa waan Baali sorio irati baasani ch'ach'abse, waan hit'aana irati aarsani, ka d'aatu jirale ch'ufa, balleesani akheekha Asheratifi ka waaqa d'ara d'ibile ch'ufa balleesani, bulla isaa awaala worra Waaqa suni sorio baaseti firfirsani.
Inni ammalle lafele qaalole waaqa d'ara, fulla worri sorio irati baasu, irati gube, akanaani Yudafi Yerusalemu qulqulleese.
Ammalle dira Manasetifi ka Efraimutifi ka Simeonitifi ka Naftalitifi lafa dira suni d'aatu jirtu ta baddele akasuma tolche.
Lafa Israeli ch'ufa keesa inni waan sorio irati baasanifi akheekha waaqa Ashera jed'ani ch'ach'abse, akheekha ch'ufa bulleese, waan hit'aana irati aarsanile gargari ch'ach'abse balleese. Duuba kae Yerusalemuti deebie.
Ganna kud'ani saddeeteeso ka inni lafa mohate, eegi inni lafafi Mana Waaqale qulqulleese, inni Shafani, ilma Azaliatifi namicha gudda dira Yerusalemu ka Masseya jed'anifi, Yoa, ilma Yohaazi, ka hayyu wo t'aafu, erge, Beena, Mana AABBO Waaqa fulla ch'ach'abt'e mid'aasa jed'eeni.
Beese worri Lawi ka balbala eegu Mana Waaqa keesati guure, harka qaallicha gudda Hilkia jed'aniti kennani. (Beeseeni sunini beese worra Efraimutifi ka Manasetifi worra Israeli d'ibifi worra Yudatifi, ka Benjaminitifi ka Yerusalemule iraa guurani.)
Beese tana eege jara sadeeni huji mid'aasa Mana Waaqati mataa kaaniti kennani, worri
worra hogeeyi mukhaani wo jaartufi ta d'akhaani wojaartuuti kenne, aka d'akhaafi mukha maneeni hayyooti Yuda qorqorachu dide balleesiteni jaarani, bitu.
Worri huji suni hojate ch'ufti nama d'ugaati. Nami worra suni hojachiisu. Nama worra Lawi afuri: Yahathifi Obadia, ka balbala gosa Meraritifi Zekariafi Meshulamu, ka balbala gosa Kohathi. (Worri Lawi kaani ch'ufti hogeeyi sirbaati.)
Worri Lawi hagi toko worra wo baatufi worra huji d'ibi hojatule hojachiise; ammalle hagi toko wot'aafe yokhaani balbalfa eega.
Ato beese fulla iti olkayani keesa guuru jiranu, Hilkiani kitaaba Seera AABBO Waaqa, ka inni Musaa kenne, arge
waan shefanini jed'e, Anini yayu kitaaba Seera Mana Waaqa kana keesati arge. Duuba kitaaba suni Shefaniti kenne,
inni hayyuti geese waan jed'eeni, Nu waan atini tolcha nuni jette ch'ufa ya tolchine.
Ammalle beese Mana Waaqa keesati olkayani fuune, harka worra huji hojatufi worra worra hojachiisuleti kennine.
Ammalle inni, anini kuno kitaaba Hilkiani nati kenne harkaa qaba jed'e, hayyuu soome.
Hayyuuni kitaaba soomufiti jirani d'agaye jennaani woya ufira qabu tatarsaase,
duuba waan qaallicha Hilkiafi Ahikamu ilma Shafanitifi, Abdoni ilma Mikatifi Shafani ka tatabe hayyu t'aafufi Asaya ka hayyu hojatuni jed'e:
Beena, naafi gumi lafa Israelitiifi ta Yuda keesati haftule AABBO Waaqa wo, nu gaafad'a, waan kitaaba kana keesati t'aafani hubad'a. AABBO Waaqi yayu nuti dallane, maro ababooti teenna dubbi AABBO Waaqa ch'aqasu didde, waan kitaaba kana keesati t'aafani gula yau lakifteefi.
Jecha hayyu gula Hilkiafi jari kaani yae, niiti Hulda jed'ani, ta raaga, ta dira Yerusalemu moga hareeti galtu, d'aqe wogaafate. (D'iirsi isii Shalumuni, ilma Tikua, ka akhakhu Harhasi, ka woya Mana Waaqa qorqoratu.) Worri waan tahe kana ch'ufa iti hime
jennaani isiini waan jetteeni, AABBO Waaqi Israeli waan jed'u, Waan isani nama nati isani ergeeni jettani,
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Anini Yerusalemufi nama isii ch'ufa, abaarsa kitaaba hayyuu soomani keesati t'aafanini gaargalcha.
Worri ya na dide, sorio Waaqa d'ibii baase, akanaani huji sunini na dallansiise, tanaafi dallansuuni sunini ta anini Yerusalemuti dallane deebite naraa ingaltu.
Ammo gama hayyu, anini, AABBO Waaqi Israeli, waan jed'u: Atini waan kitaaba keesati t'aafani ch'aqafte.
Ch'ubbu iraa deebite, na durati ufi diqeesite, woya tante tatarsaafte boote, gaafa atini aka anini Yerusalemufi nama isii ch'ufa imballeesa jed'e sodaachise d'ageete. Anini kad'acha tante yayu d'agaye,
tanaafi haga atini dootuti anini Yerusalemu gaargalche woma intolchu. Atini ato nagayi jiru doota. Duuba jari deebie d'aamsa kana hayyu Yosiati hime.
Hayyu Yosiani jaarole gugurdo Yudatifi ta Yerusalemutifi
qaaloleefi worra Lawitifi ammalle nama d'ibi dureesafi hiyyeesale wolti yaame, jennaani worri ch'ufti kae woliini yae gara Mana Waaqa d'aqe. Duuba hayyuuni gumi ch'ufa dura eje, lalabe, kitaaba wold'aqisa, ka Mana Waaqa keesati argani kaani, soomeefi.
Hayyuuni d'aatu utuba hayyuu eje wold'aqisa AABBO Waaqa woliini tolfate, aka Waaqa gula deeme seerafi aadaafi waan inni fed'u ch'ufa gaarafi qalbi isatini tolche, amaa achii dubbi kitaaba wold'aqisa guutu.
Inni nama gosa Benjaminitifi nama Yerusalemu keesa jiru ch'ufa, aka worri wold'aqisa suni guutu, kakhachiise. Duuba akanaani worri Yerusalemu wold'aqisa Waaqa ababoota isaani woliini tolfatani suni guute.
Yosiani akheekha waaqa d'ara, ka lafa worra Israeli ch'ufa keesa jiru, balleese haga inni jiru gochiti isaa taka kara AABBO, Waaqa ababoota isaani, iraa ingorre.

Hayyu Yosiani jila Pasaka Yerusalemuti tolche AABBO Waaqa guddise; guyya kud'ani afreeso, ka jia qara, worri hori jila suni qalani qaqale.
Inni huji qaaloleeni Mana Waaqa keesati hojattu iti kenne, huji tana aka dansaa guuta jed'eeni.
Ammalle inni worra Lawi, ka worra Israeli barsiisu, ka eebisani AABBO Waaqa hojatuni waan jed'e. Sanduqa Wold'aqisa qulqullo, mana hayyu Solomonini, ilmi Daudi jaare, keesa kaya. Isani deebitani Sanduqa kanani deemu himmalle, ammo AABBO Waaqa keesanifi gumi isaa ta Israeliti hojachu maltani.
Mana Waaqa keesa balbala balbalaani woli qooda, huji duri hayyu Daudifi ilmi isaa Solomonini isanii kenne gula hojad'a.
Ammalle Mana Waaqa keesa hojja ch'ufa kurfo taa, aka dandeetani worra gosa Israeli ch'ufa ka achi d'ufu qarqaartani.
Ilmoole hoola ta jila Pasaka qaqala, ufi qulqulleesa, waan sorio kurfeesa, aka oboleyaani teesani ta Israeli dubbi AABBO Waaqi Musani jed'e gula yaatu.
Jennaani hayyu Yosiani hori isaa keesa ree kuma sodomatifi koromi looni ta kuma sadi biyyaa baase, Jila Pasakatini tolfad'a jed'e.
Jaaroleeni isaleeni, fed'i worra gula, hori ufi gumifi qaaloleefi worra Lawiti kennite. Ammalle worri gugurdaani Mana Waaqa keesa hojatuleeni — qaallicha gudda Hilkia jed'anifi, Zekariafi Yehielileeni — ree kuma lamatiifi d'ibba jaatiifi koromi d'iba sadi qaalolee kennite, jila Pasakatini tolfad'a jette.
Worri Lawi gugurdaani — Konania, Shemayafi oboleesa isaa Nethaneli, Hashabia, Yeieli, Yozabadi — ree kuma Shanitifi koromi looni d'ibba shani worra isaani ka Lawiti kenne, jila Pasakatini tolfad'a jed'e.
Waan jila Pasaka ch'ufa kurfeesani jennaani qaaloleefi worri Lawi, akuma hayyuuni jed'e, fulluma ufi ejaanjani.
Eegi ree Pasaka suni gogoraani, worri Lawi qaqale, qaaloleeni d'iiga isii fuute, waan sorio irati baasani kaaniti fifit'e.
Jennaani hori gubani sorio baasani, worra-worraani gumi qoodani, aka worri, aada kitaaba Musa keesati t'aafani gula, hori suni AABBO Waaqaa baasu.
Worri Lawi hori sorio Pasaka suni aada gula wot'ale, fooni qulqullo Waaqaa baasani okoteefi, eele didiqofi gugurdole keesati d'aabani, fooni suni fuud'ani hurrisani biyyaa qoodani.
Eegi waan kana ch'ufa hobaasani, worri Lawi qooda ufitifi qooda qaalole ilmaani Haruni d'aabe, wonti akanatiifi qaaloleeni, haga halkaniti asi hori gubani sorio baasanifi gabbinna gubani sorio baasani gubde hafuura baafaachu dad'abe.
Duuba, akuma hayyuuni Yosiani jed'e, waan kana ch'ufa maro kad'acha AABBO Waaqatifi huji jila Pasakatiifi hori gubani sorio waan mesa fakaata irati baasanifi guyya suni tolchani.
Haga bulti torba worri Israeli ch'ufti ka achi jiru, jila Pasakatiifi jila Qit'a bukho inqamne tolfate. Haguma gaafa bara raaga Samueliti asi jila Pasaka takaa akasi intolfanne.
Hayyooti duri lafa jirtu taka jila akasi suni, ta hayyu Yosiafi qaaloleefi worra Lawitifi worra Yudatifi ka Israelitiifi ka Yerusalemuleeni tolfate, intolfanne. Jila suni
ganna kud'ani saddeeteeso, ka Yosiani lafa mohate, tolfatani.
Eegi Yosiani waan kana ch'ufa Mana Waaqati tolche, hayyuuni Misiri, ka Neko jed'ani, duula d'ufe dira d'aatu galaana Efrati, ka Karkemeshi jed'aniini bahe. Yosiani fuula keesa deeme had'u fed'e,
ammo Nekoni qonqo tana Yosiati erge waan jed'e: Hayyu Yuda, nu maani woli ira qamna? Anini si had'u ind'umne, ammo nyaapa kiyya had'u deema, Waaqileeni Hurrisi naani jed'e. Inni gama kiyya jira, tanaafi had'iisa nati ingamini, hegeri inni si balleesa.
Ammo Yosiani iraa deebiu dide, waan Waaqi afaani hayyu Nekotini isani jed'e ch'aqasu dide, woya jijirate, diida Megido keesati isaa had'u d'aqe.
Ato woli had'anu, t'iyiti worra Misiri hayyu Yosia woraante. Jennaani inni waan hojattu isatini jed'e, Armaa na fuud'a, ya aka hama na madeesani!
Hojatuni isa gaari keesaa isa fuute, gaari d'ibi keesa keete, Yerusalemuti geesite. Inni achi due awaala hayyoota keesati awaalani, jennaani worri Yudatifi ka Yerusalemu ch'ufti aka male isaa bohe.
Raagi Yeremiaa jed'ani faarse isaa bohe arti asi sirbituni Israeli, d'iirafi nad'eenileeni, hojja isaa bootu faaru tanani bootifi. Faaruni sunini kitaaba Boha keesa jirti.
Waan Yosiani tolche ch'ufa — waan dansa inni AABBO Waaqa tolcheefi seera inni guuteefi
odu isaa haguma geetunu — kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Israelitiifi ta Yuda keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani.

Worri Yuda Yoahazi, ilma Yosia, fohate muude, Yerusalemu keesa hayyu tolfate.
Ganni isaa, gaafa inni hayyu Yuda tahe, diddami sadi, ammalle inni Yerusalemu keesa jia sadi lafa mohate.
Hayyuuni Misiri ka Neko jed'ani, isa qabe qarsi kilo kuma saditifi d'ibba afuritiifi worqi kilo sodomi afuri worra Yuda baasisise.
Nekoni oboleesa Yoahazi, ka Eliakimu jed'ani, hayyu Yuda tolche maqa isale Yehoiakimuti jijire, Yoahazi boojie lafa Misiri geese.
Hayyuuni Babiloni, ka Nebukadreza jed'ani, lafa Yuda had'e, Yehoiakimu qabe, sansalatani hid'e, lafa Babiloni geese.
Nebukadrezani miha Mana Waaqa ka gari boojie, mana isaa ka Babilonitini galate.
Waan Yehoiakimuni tolche ch'ufa, waan hamtu inni taheefi ch'ubbu inni tolchele, kitaaba Odu Hayyoota Israelitiifi Yuda keesati t'aafaniti t'aafani. Ilmi isaa Yekoniani fulla isaa hayyu tahe.
Yekonia, ganni isaa kud'ani saddeeti gaafa inni hayyu Yuda tahe, ammalle inni Yerusalemu keesa jia sadiifi bulti kud'ani lafa mohate. Innileeni AABBO Waaqa durati ch'ubbu tolche.
Ganni roobe jennaani hayyu Nebukadrezani Yekonia boojie, Babilonitini gale, miha Mana Waaqale ch'ufa boojie, abbuya Yekonia, ka Zedekia jed'ani, hayyu Yudatifi ka Yerusalemu tolche.
Ganni Zedekia diddami toko gaafa inni hayyu Yuda tahe, ammalle inni ganna kud'ani toko Yerusalemu keesa lafa mohate.
Inni AABBO Waaqa durati ch'ubbu tolche, dubbi AABBO Waaqa, ta raagi Yeremiani isaani jed'e, ch'aqasu dide.
Ammalle jaarole Yudatifi qaaloleefi gumiini ch'ufti faana gosa d'aatu jirtu gula yaate, akheekha waaqa d'ara kad'ate, akanaani Mana Waaqa, ka AABBO Waaqi qulqulleese, t'ureesani.
AABBO, Waaqi ababoota worra, maro heddu raagoota gumi isaa gorsitu, iti erge, wonti akanatiifi inni gumi sunifi Mana Waaqale baddi isaanii imfed'u.
Ammo gumiini sunini ergattu Waaqa goyeesite, dubbi isaa tufate, raagoota isaleti tabate, duuba eege AABBO Waaqi gumi suniti dallane, namu dallansu suni jalaa bahu dad'abe.
Inni Mana Waaqatifi miha isaatiifi waan dansa keesa jira ch'ufafi miha mana hayyutifi hojattu isaale ch'ufa boojie, lafa Babiloniti geese.
Ammalle Mana Waaqatifi dira maneeni isaatiifi waan maneeni suni keesa jira gube, naabo Yerusalemule ch'ach'abse.
Inni nama woraana jalaa bahe ch'ufa qaqabe, boojie Babiloni geese, duuba achiti worri suni isaafi d'aloota isaati tisse tahe, haga bara hayyuuni Ajemi finna lafa fud'ate.
Akanaani wonti AABBO Waaqi duri raaga Yeremiani jed'e ta: Lafti ganna torbatama duwa tate, maro aada Sabato guutu didanifi jettu, guutamte.
Ganna Koreshini hayyu Ajemi tahe, AABBO Waaqi dubbi duri Yeremiani jed'e guute. Inni herega kana Koreshitini d'ufe jennaani inni qonqo tana t'aafe, qonqo suni lafa inni mohatu ch'ufa lalabani keesati soomani.

Waaqi isani nama gumi isaa ch'ufa woliini jiraatinna kaa, Yerusalemu d'aqa, Mana AABBO Waaqa Israeli ka qara ch'ach'abe jaara — Waaqi dira suni isuma.
Yo nami gumi isaa tokoleeni, ka duri boojiani, waan galuni d'abe, nami olla isaa ha isa qarqaare, qarsifi worqifi woreegaafi geejibaafi ammalle waan Mana Waaqaa ka Yerusalemu keesati Waaqaa baasani kennuufi.
Jennaani jari balbala gosa Yudatifi ta Benjamini mata qaaloleefi worra Lawitifi nama ch'ufa ka Waaqi herega isaa qajeelcha woliini kaani, Mana Waaqa ka Yerusalemu jiru mid'aasani jaaru d'aqani.
Nami olla worraa ch'ufti worra qarqaare, miha qarsiti, worqi, woreega, geejiba, waan dadansa d'ibifi waan Mana Waaqa keesati Waaqa baasanile kennanifi.
Koreshini miha Mana Waaqa, ka duri Nebukadrezani Yerusalemu boojie Mana Waaqa isaati galche, deebise.
Inni miha kana Mithredathi, ka miha hayyu qorqoratuti kenne; innileeni hede, t'aafe, namicha gudda Yuda ka Sheshbaza jed'ani kenne.
Miha suni kana:
qorini worqi
30
qorini qarsi
1,000
qorini d'ibiini
29
d'amelani worqi
30
d'amelani qarsi
410
mihi d'ibiini
1,000
Mihi kuni ch'ufti wolti, qorifi mihi d'ibiini ka Sheshbazani, gaafa isaafi worri boojiani kaani lafa Babiloniti bahani Yerusalemu d'aqani, fuud'e deemeni 5,400.

Nami boojiani hedduuni lafa Babiloniti kae, Yerusalemufi Yuda d'aqe, namu dira ufiti gale. Worri isaani haguma duri Nebukadrezani worra boojieti lafuma Babiloni jira.
Jaaroleeni worraa gugurdoni tana: Zerubabeli, Yoshua, Nehemia, Seraya, Reelaya, Mordekai, Bilshani, Mispar-Bigwai, Rehumu, Baana. Kunini maqa balbala gosa Israelitiifi henna nama boojiani, ka eege lafa ufiti gale:
Paroshi — 2,172
Shefatia — 372
Ara — 775
Pahath-Moabu (d'aloota Yeshuafi Yoabu) — 2,812
Elamu — 1,254
Zatu — 945
Zakai — 760
Bani — 642
Bebai — 623
Azgadi — 1,222
Adonikamu — 666
Bigwai — 2,056
Adini — 454
Ateri (ka maqaani d'ibiini Hezekia) — 98
Besai — 323
Yora — 112
Hashumu — 223
Gibari — 95
Jari duri worri isaani dira kana keesaa d'ufeleeni hagana:
Bethlehemu — 123
Netofa — 56
Anathothi — 128
Azmawethi — 42
Kiriath-Yearimu, Kefira, Beerothi — 743
Ramafi Geba — 621
Mikimashi — 122
Bethelifi Ai — 223
Nebo — 52
Magbishi — 156
Worri Elamu kaani — 1,254
Harimu — 320
Lodi, Hadidi, Ono — 725
Yeriko — 345
Senaa — 3,630
Worri balbala qaalole, ka achii gale, kana:
Yedaya (ka d'aloota Yeshua) — 973
Imeri — 1,052
Pashuri — 1,247
Harimu — 1,017
Worri balbala Lawi, ka achii gale, kana:
Yeshuafi Kadmieli (ka d'aloota Hodafia) - 74
Sirbitu Mana Waaqa (ta d'aloota Asafu) - 128
Worra Mana Waaqa eegu (ka d'aloota Shalumutifi Ateritifi Talmonitifi Akubutifi Hatitatifi Shobai) - 139
Worri balbala worra Mana Waaqa hojattu, ka achii gale kana:
Siha, Hasufa, Tabaothi,
Kerosi, Siaha, Padoni,
Lebana, Hagaba, Hakubu,
Hagabu, Salmai, Hanani,
Gideli, Gahari, Reaya,
Resini, Nekoda, Gazamu,
Uza, Paseya, Besai,
Asna, Meunimu, Nefusimu,
Bakbaki, Hakufa, Harhuri,
Bashithi, Mehida, Harsha,
Barkosi, Sisera, Tema
Nesiafi, Hatifa.
Worri balbala hojattu Solomoni, ta achii gale, kana:
Sotai, Soferethi, Peruda,
Yaala, Darkoni, Gideli,
Shefatia, Hatili, Pokereth-Sebaimu, Amoni.
Nami balbala worra Mana Waaqa eegutifi ka hojattu Solomoni, ka achii gale, wolti nama 392.
Ammalle nama 652 ka balbala Delaiyafi Tobiafi Nekoda, ka dira Tel-mela, Tel-Harsha, Kerubu, Adani, Imeri keesaa galeti jira; ammo worri aka Israeli keesaa d'alate ufi beesisu dad'abe.
Worri balbala qaalole, ka aka balbala Suni keesaa d'alate ufi beesisu dad'abe kana: Habaya, Hakosi, Barzilai. (Namichi toko ka d'aloota balbala qaalole, ta Barzilai jed'ani, dubra Barzilai, worra Gileadi, fuud'e, balbala sodda isaa himate.) Waan worri aka balbala qaalole keesaa d'alate, ufi beesisu dad'abeefi, qaalole tahu d'owani.
Namichi guddaani Yahudi waan worraani jed'e, sagale Waaqaa baasani haga qaalluuni Urimufi Thumimuni wo himu d'ufuti inyaatina.
Nami boojiani ka gale ch'ufti wolti nama 42,360. Hojattuuni worraa uwafi d'iirtileeni nama 7,337. Sirbituni d'iirafi nad'eeni 200, fardoleeni 736, gaangeleeni 245, gaali 435, harreleeni 6,720.
Hojja worri boojiani kaani Mana AABBO Waaqa ka Yerusalemutini bahe, jaaroleeni balbala gosa ta gari, fed'i ufi gula wo baafte, aka Mana Waaqa fulluma inni duri eju taani irati mid'aasani jaarani.
Worri haga d'aqabu baase, wonti baasani suni ch'ufti wolti hagana taate: Worqiini kilo d'ibba shani, qarsiini kilo kuma lamatiifi d'ibba saddeeti, ammalle ubaara d'ibba toko ka qaaloleeni naqatu.

Jia torbeeso eegi nami Israeli ch'ufti dira ufiti qubate, Yerusalemuti wolti bahani.
Jennaani Yoshua ilmi Yosadakitifi qaalole wahela isaatiifi Zerubabeli ilma Shealtieltifi, fiit'a isaa woliini, waan Waaqa Israeliti sorio irati baasani mid'aasani jaarani, aka waan suni irati sorio gubani baasani, aada namichi Waaqa ka Musa jed'ani t'aafe gula.
Ato worri boojiani ka gale kaani nama lafa suni keesa tau sodaatele, worri waan sorio irati baasani suni fulluma isii ta duri taaniti jaare. Duuba akuma duri kaani galgalaafi diirama sorio irati gubani.
Ammalle jila Hoosale aaduma isii gula tolfatani; guyya ch'ufa sorio guyya suni baasuu malani baasani;
tana malele, sorio gubani guyya ch'ufa baasani taanifi ta guyya baati baasanifi ta guyya jila d'ibile AABBO Waaqa baasanifi waan fed'i gula AABBO Waaqa baasanile ch'ufa baasani.
Ato biyyiti qara mana Waaqa injaarini, guyya qara ka jia torbeeso, huji sorio gubani baasani iti keeyatani.
Biyyiti beese ogeeyi d'akhaatifi ta mukhati baafte, ammalle waan nyaatanifi ka d'uganifi d'ad'ale baafte, dira Tirotifi ka Sidoniti ergite, hind'eesa Lebanoni, ka bisaani Baariini gula dira Yafatini d'ufani, iraa bitate. Waan kana ch'ufa jecha hayyu Ajemi ka Koreshi jed'ani, gula tolchani.
Duuba akanaani worri huji ijaarsa Mana Waaqa jia lameeso, ka ganna lameeso, ka worri Yerusalemuti gale, jala qabate. Zerubabeli, Yoshua, nami gosa worraa ch'ufti, qaalole taanaani, worra gosa Lawi taanaani, nami boojiani gale ch'ufti haguma gaunu, wolti bahe huji suni hojatte. Nama gosa Lawi, ka ganna diddamaati oli ch'ufa, huji ijaarsa Mana AABBO Waaqa suni mataa iti tolchani.
Namicha gosa Lawi ka Yeshua jed'anifi ilmaanifi fiit'a isaatiifi Kedmielifi ilmaani isaaleeni (ta balbala Hodafia) takaa tahani huji ijaarsa Mana Waaqa iti mataa tahani woliini hojatani. (Worri Lawi, ka balbala gosa Henadadileni, worra qarqaare.)
galata isaa deebise waan jed'e, AABBO Waaqi waan dansa, jaalalti inni worra Israeli jaalatu waan d'umatatiniti. Waan Mana AABBO Waaqa yayabanifi nami ch'ufti, haga dandau, lalabe AABBO Waaqa faarse.
Jaaroleeni qaaloleetifi ta Lawitifi ta mata balbala gosa, ta Mana Waaqa ka duri kaani garte, Mana Waaqa ka yayabani arginaani mata qabate boote. Ammo worri achi jiru kaani ch'ufti aka male gammade qilit'ame.
Nami dandae iyyaana bohatifi ta gammada gargari beekhu injiru, wonti akanatiifi iyyanti worraa sunini aka male guddate, fagole ch'ufa d'agayani.

Nyaapi worra Yudatifi ka Benjamini, aka worri eegi boojiani gale kaani Mana AABBO Waaqa Israeli jaaru jiru, d'agaye jennaani.
Gara Zerubabelifi jara balbala gosati mataa d'aqani waan jed'aniini, koota, takaa taane, mana kana woliini jaara. Nu Waaqa takaa kad'anna, ammalle haguma duri Esar-Hadonini, hayyuuni Ashuru, armaani nu d'ufe, nu sorio Waaqa suni baasu jira.
Jennaani Zerubabelifi Yoshuafi jaaroleeni balbala gosati mataa waan jetteeni. Nu qarqaarsa keesani infeenu, aka Mana AABBO Waaqa keenna woliini jaaru. Nu mata keennati jaara, akuma koreshini, hayyuuni Ajemi nuni jed'e.
Jennaani worri gosa d'ibi ka lafa Yuda keesa tau, worra Yuda gayaa laafise, sodaachise ijaarsa Mana Waaqa lakisise.
Ammalle nama gugurda finna harkaa qabule gumbeesani, aka huji worraa balleesani waan kana bara koreshini lafa Mohate tolchani.
Bara qara hayyu Ahasueroni hayyu tahe, nyaapi suni worra Yudatifi ka Yuresalemu himate suni t'aafate.
Ammalle bara Artashastani, hayyuuni Ajemi lafa Mohate, Bislamuti Mithredathifi Tabeelifi waheli worraa tatabe hayyichati t'aafani, ammo hojja soomani afaani d'ibiti garagalchani.
Ammalle namicha gudda Rehumu jed'anifi Shimshai ka tatabe t'aafu tatabe tana waan finna lafa Yerusalemu iti t'aafani hayyu Artashastati ergani:
Worri tatabe tana t'aafe kana: Namicha gudda Rehumu jed'ani, namicha tatabe t'aafu ka Shimshai jed'ani, Wahela worraati, jaallaboota ammalle jaarole iraa hafte taani ch'ufa, ta duri lafa Erikiti, Babiloniti, Susa lafa Elami keessa d'ufte,
ammalle worra gosa d'ibi ka Asurbanipalini, namichi guddaani irre qabu godaansise dira Samariatifi fulla d'ibi lafa Efrati ta ila adubi qubsise.
Dubbin tatabe suni keesati t'aafani tana: Gara hayyu Artashasta: hojattuuni tante worri lafa Efrati ta ila adu nagaya sifuuti.
Ee hayyicha wonti nu si beesisu feenu, worri Yahudi ka gara keesani fulla teenna d'ufe, yayu Yerusalemu qubate, dira hama, dubbi hayyu didu suni, jaaru jirani. Worri naabo yayabe jaaru jira, d'iotu hobaasa.
Ee hayyicha, yo dira kana akuma duri kaani jaarani naabo oosa imbaaftu duuba akasiini horini hayyuuni lafa suni iraa argatu indiqaata.
Amma waan nu finna kanke jala jiruufi, ee hayyicha, nu waan akana kana argu infeenu; tanaafi wonti nu amma siraa feenu,
aka atini waan duri ababooti tante t'aafte olkeete ch'ufa laaltu. Yo laalte, atini aka diri kunini haguma duriti hayyufi worra gugurda lafa mohatu ch'ufa dide gaargalchu inagarta. Nami isaaleeni haguma duriti waan nami dandauniti, durile qara tanaafi dira kana balleesani.
Ee hayyicha, wonti amma nu si beesimnu, yo dira kana jaarani naabo isale ch'ufa hobaasani, atini deebite lafa Efrati ta ila adu imohatu.
Hayyichi qonqo tana worraa deebise waan jed'e. Namicha tatabe t'aafu ka Shimshai j ed'ani wahela worra, ka dira Samariatifi ka lafa Efraimu ila adu tau, nagaya isani fuud'a.
Tatabe isani nati ergitani tana yayu dubbi isii garagalchani naa soomani.
Aninileeni yayu seera baase waan duri t'aafani ch'ufa barbaada jed'e, duuba yayu argani aka diri Yerusalemu haguma duriti nama finna harkaa qabu ch'ufa dide, nami isaaleeni hayyoota ch'aqasu dide morkuni.
Hayyota guddo irre qabduti duri achi mohate lafa Efrati ta ila adu ch'ufa fide damoosafi gibira iraa guurate.
Tanaafi amma isani seera baasa, aka jari suni deebie dira injaare, haga anini qonqo d'ibi erguti.
Waan kana jabaad'a guuta, aka hameenni worra suri hiji tiyya iyyakine.
Akuma tatabe Artashastani t'aafe tana Rehumufi Shimshaifi wahela worraati soomanini, worri hurrise Yerusalemu d'ebe, irreeni worra Yahudi dira suni jaaru d'owe.
Hujini ijaarsa Mana Waaqa taani ejate akanumati hafte haga ganna lameeso ka mootuma Dario, hayyu Ajemi.

Gaafasi raagooti lama, Hagaifi Zekaria, ilma Ido, maqa Waaqa Israelitini Yahudi Yudatifi ta Yerusalemuti wo fadde.
Jennaani Zerubabeli, ilmi Shealtielitifi Yoshua ilmi Yosadaki kaani, Mana Waaqa ka Yerusasalemu keesa jiru ijaarsa jala qabatani, raagooti lamaani taanileeni worra qarqaarte.
Jennaani namichi guddaani lafa Efrati, ta ilaadu, ka Talenai jed'anifi Sherthar-Bozenaifi waheli worraleeni Yerusalemu d'ufani waan jed'ani, Eenuti, Mana kana mid'aasa jaara isanini jed'e?
Ammalle worri, Nami Mana kana jaaru eenufa? Jed'e gaafate.
Ammo Waaqi jaarole Yahudi suni qorqorate, worri kaani, ka woma worra intolchini kae biraa yae, tatabe gara hayyu Dario t'aafe, qonqo isaa eegate.
Qonqooni worri hayyuti erge tana:
Ee hayyicha, Dario, nu nagaya si fuuna.
Ee hayyicha, atini beekhu malte, aka nu lafa Yuda d'anne, Mana Waaqa gudda ka d'akhaa gugurdafi mukhaani jabeesani jaaru jirani argine. Huji suni guddo jabeesani dura deemsisu jirani.
Duuba nu jaarole suni, Eenuti Mana kana mid'aasa jaara isaniini jed'e? jenne gaafanne.
Nu ammalle maqa worra Mana suni jaara gaafanne, aka maqa huji suniti mataa t'aamne si beesimnu.
Worri waan nuni jed'e, Nu hojatu Waaqa lafafi gubba uumeti, nu Mana duri hayyuni jabaani Israeli toko jaare mid'aasine jaaru jira.
Ammo maro ababooti teenna Waaqa gubbaa dallansiifteefi, inni harka Nebukadreza hayyu Babiloni ka gosa kaldayoti, Mana kana balleese gosa teenna boojie lafa Babiloni geese.
Duuba eege, ganna qara ka Koreshini, hayyuuni Babiloni, lafa Mohate, inni seera baase, Mana Waaqa jaara jed'e.
Inni miha worqitiifi ka qarsi, ka duri Nebukadrezani mana Waaqa isaa ka Babiloni jiruti geese, deebise, miha suni gudda lafa Yuda tolcheti kenne.
Waaq jed'eeni, miha kana fuud'i, Mana Waaqa ka Yerusalemu jiruti geese, Mana Waaqa fulluma qara inni eju taaniti mid'aasi jaari.
Jennaani Sheshbazani d'ufe, Mana suni yayabe, Mana suni arti asi haga arra jarumati jirani ammo inhobaane.
Tanaafi amma tana, Ee hayyicha, fulla dubbi hayyoota t'aafani iti olkayani, ha keesa barbaadani, aka d'uguma dubbini ijaarsa Mana Waaqa ka Yerusalemu, ta hayyu Koreshini jed'e, jirtu laalani. Yo hubatani, qonqo nu ergi, waan nu tolchu malle nuti himi.

Jennaani hayyu Dario seera basse, Fulla dubbi hayyoota duri t'aafani lafa Babiloni keesati olkayani ch'ufa barbaada, sooma jed'e.
Jennaani dira Ekbatana, ka arda Media ke jiru waan wo irati t'aafani, ka dubbi tana irati t'aafani, argani:
Ganna qara ka Koreshini hayyu tahe, inni seera baase waan jed'e, Mana Waaqa ka Yerusalemu ha mid'aasani jaarani keesati Waaqa wo baasani, soriole gubaniti. Mana suni, d'eerinni isaa ha d'und'uma jaatama tahuti ballinnileeni ha hagasuma tahuti.
Girgida isaa ha d'akhaa sadi ch'ororsani wolgubba naqani, mukha gubba kayani, akasiini wolgubbati jaarani. Horini Mana sunini jaarani ch'ufti ha gubba hayyu tahuti.
Ammalle miha worqitiifi ka qarsi, ka Nebukadrezani duri boojie Babiloni geese, ha Mana Waaqa ka Yerusalemu jiru geesani, fulluma isaa ta duri taaniti deebisani.
Jennaani Darioni tatabe tana worrati erge waan jed'e: Gara Tatenai ka gudda lafa Efrati ta ila adutifi Shethar-Bozenaifi. Wahela keesani ka lafa Efrati ka ila adu: jiru, waan isani taatani: Mana Waaqa suni hanqad'a!
Huji ijaarsa isaa suni keesa imbuina, namicha gudda lafa Yudatifi jaaroleeni Yahudi ha Mana Waaqa fulla qara inni eju kaaniti jaartuti.
Anini amma seera baasa, aka isani jaarole Yahudi tana ijaarsa Mana Waaqa qarqaartani gibira hayyuuni lafa Efrati suni argatule ha hurrisani baasani Mana sunini jaaraniti, aka hujini suni dura deemtu.
Guyya ch'ufa waan qaaloleeni Yerusalemu feetu inhanqatina kennaafi: Jiboota looni taanaani, elemiye taanaani, ilmoole hoola ta gubani Waaqa gubbati sorio baasani taanaani, dargaye taanaani, sooda taanaani, daad'i taanaani, d'ad'ale taanaani, ch'ufa kennaafi.
Wonti isani waan suni tolchu maltanifi, aka worri sorio Waaqa gubbati malte isaa baase, anaafi ilmaani tiyya eeba Waaqa kad'atu.
Yo nami seera kana ch'abse, dareera mana isaa ha keesaa fuud'ani, gama toko qarani duuba isaani tumataniti; mana isale ha jissani huura tolchaniti.
Waaqi duri Yerusalemu fohate, Isi keesati na kad'ad'a jed'e, ha hayyufi yokhaani gosa dubbi tana didde mana isaa suni balleesu feetu ch'ufa balleesuti. Nami seera kana baase ana; Dario taanaafi guutu malani.
Jennaani namicha gudda Tatenai jed'ani kaanifi Shethar-Bozenaifi waheli worraa jecha hayyu kaani ch'ufa guutani akasuma tolchani.
Jaaroleeni Yahudi huji Mana Waaqa suni aka dansaa jabeesite dura deemsifte, gorsa raaga Hagaifi Zekaria gula. Worri jecha Waaqa Israelitiifi Koreshifi Dariofi Artashasta hayyoota Ajemi gula Mana Waaqa jaare hobaase.
Worri guyya sadeeso, ka jia Adari jed'ani, ganna jaeeso ka hayyu Darioni lafa mohate, Mana suni jaare hobaase.
Jennaani worri Israeli — qaalole, worra Lawiti, worri ka eegi boojiani gale kaani ch'ufti — gammade jila tolfate Mana suni eebise.
Gaafa Mana suni eebisani suni worri koromi d'ibba tokotifi elemiye d'ibba lamatiifi. Ilmoole hoola ta d'ibba afurile sorio baase ammalle korbeeyyi kud'ani lama henna gosa Israeli kud'ani lamaani taani gula, sorio dabaani ufi iraa baasani basse.
Ammalle aada kitaaba Musa keesati t'aafani gula, worri qaaloleefi worra Lawile huji Mana Waaqati gargari qoode.
Qaaloleefi worri Lawi ch'ufti qulqullo, wonti akanatiifi worri qara durati ufi qulqulleese. Worri Lawi hori sorio Pasaka ufifi qaaloleefi worra eegi boojiani gale kaani jed'e qale.
Nami sorio suni nyaate worra Israeli ka eegi boojiani gale kaanifi, nama aada hamtu gosa lafa suni keesa teetu lakise AABBO Waaqa Israeli kad'achu d'ufe.
Guyya torba ch'ufa worri jila Qit'a bukho inqamne gammadani tolfate. Wonti worri gammadeefi, waan AABBO Waaqi hayyu Ashuru worraa naasise, innileeni ijaarsa Mana Waaqa Israeli keesa worra qarqaareefi.

Eegi gamna heddu Artashastani hayyu Ajemi tahe. Gaafasi namicha tokoti jira, ka Ezra jed'ani inni, ilma Seraya, ka ilma Azaria, ka ilma Hilkia,
ka ilma Shalumu, ka ilma Sadoki, ka ilma Ahitubu,
ka ilma Amaria, ka ilma Asaria, ka ilma Merayothi,
ka ilma Zerahiya, ka ilma Uzi, ka ilma Buki,
ka ilma Abishua, ka ilma Finehasi, ka ilma Eleazari, ka ilma Haruni qaallicha gudda.
Ezrani guddo waan Seera AABBO Waaqa Israeli, ka inni Musaa kenne, soome barate. Maro inni eeba AABBO Waaqa isaa qabuufi, hayyichi waan inni kad'ate ch'ufa kenneefi. Ganna torbeeso ka Artashastani lafa mohate, Ezrani Babiloni kae, worra Israeli ka garitifi qaalole, worra Lawiti, Sirbitu, worra mana eegu, hojattu Mana Waaqa ta gari woliini Yerusalemu yaani.
Worri guyya qara, ka jia qara, lafa Babiloniti bahe qarqaarsa Waaqatini guyya qara ka jia shaneeso Yerusalemuni bahe.
Ezrani haga jiru ch'ufa Seera AABBO Waaqa soome barate guute, aadaafi waan keesati t'aafani ch'ufa gumi Israeli barsiise.
Artashastani tatabe tana t'aafe, qaallicha Ezra, ka waan seera nama barsiisu, ka aadaafi seera AABBO Waaqi worra Israeliti kenne aka dansaa barate iti, kenne. Dubbini tatabeeni sunini jettu tana:
Hayyichi Artashastani tatabe tana qaallicha Ezra ka waan Seera Waaqa gubba jiru nama barsiisuti t'aafe waan jed'e:
Woni anini jed'u tana: Nama Israeli ch'ufti, ka lafa tiyya keesa jiru, ka Yerusalemu d'aqu fed'u qaaloleefi worri Lawi taanaani ha siini woliini yauti.
Anaafi jari mala na d'au, nami torba, si ergina, aka atini Yerusalemu d'at'e, finna lafa Yuda hubatte, ammalle aka Seera AABBO Waaqa keeti jabeesani guutani laaltu.
Atini Worqifi qarsi, ta anaafi jari mala na d'au Waaqa Israeli, ka mani isaa Yerusalemu jiru, baasu feenu, fuute deemuuni malte.
Ammalle atini qarsifi worqi, lafa Babiloni ch'ufa keesaa guurtefi waan worri Israelitiifi qaaloleeni Mana Waaqa isaani, ka Yerusalemu keesati baaftule, fuute deemuuni malte.
Beese tana aka dansaa jabeesi, koromi loonitifi Elemiyeefi ilmoole hoolatifi mid'aanifi daad'iini biti, waan sorio irati baasani ka Mana Waaqa ka Yerusalemu keesa jiru irati sorio baasi.
Qarsifi worqi ta huji suni ira hafte siifi gochiti tante waan feetani tolfad'a, fed'i Waaqa keesani gula.
Miha Mana Waaqa keesani hojattani ka siti kennani, hojja Yerusalemuni baate Waaqa kenni.
Ammalle waan Mana suni d'ibi atini feetu ch'ufa, fulla beese hayyu iti olkayani keesaa sii kennani.
Anini nama hori hayyu olkayu ch'ufa, ka lafa Efrati ta ila adu jiru, waan jed'uuni: Waan qaallichi Ezrani, ka waan Seera Waaqa gubbaa ch'ufa beekhu, isani gaafatu ch'ufa hurrisa, iti keenna, ammo haga kana indabarsina:
qarsi kilo kuma saditifi d'ibba afuri, dargaye kilo kuma kud'ani, daad'iini d'ebbe d'ibba toko, d'ad'aleni d'ebbe d'ibba toko, sooda haguma worri fed'u.
Waan Mana Waaqa gubbaa ka inni fed'u ch'ufa jabaad'a baasa aka inni anaafi ilmaani tiyyati indallanne.
Ammalle qaalole worra Lawiti, sirbitu, worra balbala eegufi hojattu Mana Waaqa, yokhaani nama taatefu ka huji mana suni hojattu, gibira iraa infuud'ina.
Ezra, atileeni, qarooma Waaqi kanke sii keenne kanaani, jaarole lafa fidduufi jaallaboota, worra lafa Efrati ka Seera Waaqa kanketi keesati fidamu fiddu, fohad'i. Nama waan Seera suni imbeennele ch'ufa barsiisi.
Yo nami tokoleeni Seera Waaqa kanketi yokhaani seera hayyu ch'abse, hurrisi, hojuma suni waan kana iti muri: duisa yokhaani lafa keesaa baasiti yokhaani hori iraa saamiti, yokhaani hid'aansa.
Ezrani waan jed'e, AABBO, Waaqa ababoota teenna, ha faarsani inni yayu hayyicha waan dansa qaabachise, aka inni akanaani Mana Waaqa ka Yerusalemu mid'aasu.
Eeba Waaqatini anini yayu hayyichaafi jara isaa mala d'aufi jara isaa gugurdale naasu iraa argad'e; AABBO Waaqi kiyya yayu garaa na jabeese, anileeni worra balbala gosa Israeliti mataa heddu sobad'e ufi gula deebise woliini galle.

Kunini maqa worra balbala gosa worrati mata ka eegi boojiani Babiloni geesani Ezra woliini Yerusalemuti gale, bara Artashastani hayyu:
Gershomu, ka balbala Finehasi Danieli, ka balbala Ithamari Hatushi, ilma Shekania, ka balbala Daudi Zekaria, ka balbala Paroshi, isaafi nama d'ibbaafi shantama ka balbala isaa (wonti worra isaani ka t'aafani olkayani injirti) Eliehoenai, ilma Zerahiya ka balbala Pahath-Moabu, isaafi nama d'ibba sadi. Ebedi, ilma Yonathani, ka balbala Adini, isaafi nama shantama. Yeshaya, ilma Athalia, ka balbala Elamu, isaafi nama torbatama Zebadia, ilma Mikaeli, ka balbala Shefatia, isaafi nama saddeetama. Obadia, ilma Yehieli ka balbala Yoabu, isaafi nama d'ibba lamafi kud'ani saddeeti. Shelomithi, ilma Yosifia, ka balbala Bani, isaafi nama d'ibbaafi jaatama. Zekaria ilma Bebai, ka balbala Bebai, isaafi nama diddami saddeeti. Yohana, ilma Hakatani, ka balbala Hazgadi, isaafi nama d'ibbaafi kud'ani. Elifeleti, Yeuelifi Shemaya, ka balbala Adonikamu, worraafi nama jaatama (worri eege biyyaa gale) Uthaifi Zakuri, ka balbala Bigwai, worraafi nama torbatama.
Anini worra kana ch'ufa afaani galaana dira Ahavati yauti wolti baase duuba halkani sadi achi bulle. Anini worra suni keesa, qaalole male, worra Lawi d'abe.
Jennaani jaarole nama sagali yaame: Eliezeri, Arieli, Shemaya, Elnathani, Yaribu, Elnathani, Nathani, Zekaria, Nteshulamu ammalle jara wobarsiisu nama lama yaame: Yoyaribufi Elnathani.
Anini jara kana ch'ufa gara namicha gudda gumi Kasifia, ka maqaani isaa Ido, erge, aka isaafi wahela isaa, jara Mana Waaqa keesa hojatu, d'aqani nama Mana Waaqa keesa hojatu barbaadani.
Qarqaarsa Waaqatini worri sunini Sherebiya, nama gosa Lawi, ka balbala mali, ka guddo wo guutu nuu erge; ammalle ilmaani isaatiifi oboleyaani isaa nami kud'ani saddeeti isani woliini d'ufe.
Worri ammalle Hashabiafi Yeshaya, ka balbala gosa Merari, fiit'a worraa nama didaamatiini woliini nuu erge.
Worra kana malele, nama d'ibba lamafi diddama ka Mana Waaqa hojatuti jira, ka duri Daudifi jari isaa file, worra Lawi qarqaara jed'eeni. Jara kana ch'ufa maqa t'aafani.
Jennaani fulluma galaana Ahavati anini seera baase, aka nu ch'ufti ufi agabsine Waaqa kenna durati ufi diqeesine, inni nuufi ilmaani teennafi hori keenna kara nagaya qajeelchu.
Anini sila ch'eeraafu dandae hayyichaani, askartiti farda, ta karaati nu qorqorate, nyaapa nura d'owartu nuu kenni, injed'uuni; wonti akanatiifi anini qara hayyuuni, Waaqi nama isa barbaadu ch'ufa ineebisa, ammo nama isa iraa gore, inni jibbeti gaargalcha jed'eeni.
Tanaafi nu ufi agabsine, Ee Waaqa keenna, nuu qorqorad'i jenne, innileeni kad'acha nu d'agaye.
Jennaani anini qaalole gugurddo keesa jara kana fohad'e: Sherebiafi Hashabiafi jara kud'ani d'ibi.
Ammalle anini qarsifi worqifi miha ka, hayyichaafi jara mala isaa d'aufi hojattufi worri Israeli huji Mana Waaqati baase, ch'ufa biime, harka qaaloleeti kenne.
Wonti anini worrati kenne kana:
qarsiini — kilo kuma diddami lama
mihi d'ibba toko ka qarsi — kilo torbatama
worqiini — kilo kuma saditifi d'ibba afuri
qorini worqi diddama — kilo saddeetifi woi
qorini sibila diima lama, ta gatini isii haguma qori worqi.
Anini waan worraani jed'e, Isani AABBO, Waaqa ababoota teesaniti qulqullo, ammalle mihi qarsitiifi ka worqi, ka nami fed'i ufi gula isaa baaseleeni qulqullo.
Haga Mana Waaqatini baataniti aka dansaa jabeesa qorqorad'a. Duuba miha baasani kana ch'ufa mana qaalole keesati biima, qaalole gugurdofi worra Lawitifi jaarole gosa Israeli, ta Yerusalemutileti, kenna.
Tanaafi qaaloleefi worri Lawi qarsifi worqifi miha kaani fuud'ani, aka mana Waaqa ka Yerusalemuu geesani.
Guyya kud'ani lameeso ka jia qara, nu galaana Ahavatii kaane Yerusalemuti iti d'aabanne Waaqi keenna nu qarqaare, nyaapa keenna ka d'okhate kara keesati nu eegatu duraa nu baase,
Yerusalemuni baane jennaani guyya sadi hafuura baafanne,
jennaani guyya afreeso nu Mana Waaqa d'anne, qarsifi worqifi miha kaani biimine harka qaallicha Merimothi, ilma Uriati, kennine. Nami isa woliini jiru Eleazari ilma Finehasitifi jara lama ka gosa Lawi, ka Yozabadi ilma Yeshuatifi, Noadia ilma Binui, jed'ani.
Waan kana ch'ufa hedani biimani, hojuma suni kitaaba keesati t'aafani.
Jennaani worri eegi boojiani gale kaani ch'ufti waan gubani Waaqa Israeliti sorio baasanini d'ufe. Horini worri baase — koromi looni kud'ani lama ta maro gosa Israeliti baasanifi elemiye sagaltami jaatiifi ilmoole hoola ta torbatami torba; worri ammalle korbeeyyi kud'ani lama sorio dabaani ufi iraa baasani baase. Hori kana ch'ufa gubani sorio AABBO Waaqaa baasani.
Ammalle worri tatabe hayyichi iti kenne taani fuud'e jara gugurdafi jaarole lafa Efrati ta ila aduti kenne, akanaani worri sunini biyyaafi Mana Waaqale qarqaare.

Eegi waan suni ch'ufa tolchani, jaaroleeni hagi toko d'ufte waan nani jette, worra Israelitiifi qaaloleefi worri Lawi worra gosa Amonitifi Moabutifi Misiritiifi Kanaanitiifi Hititifi Perezitifi Yebusitifi Amori, ka d'aatu worraa jiru woli ilaganne. Waan hamtu worri sunini tolche ch'ufa worrileeni tolchu jira.
D'iirti Yahudi nad'eeni gosa d'ibi fuute, akanaani gumiini Waaqa qulqullooni gosa d'ibiini wolseente qulqullooma d'abde. Waan hamtu kana nami mataa iti tahe nama ch'ufa ira tolche, jaaroleefi worra gugurda.
Anini waan kana d'ageennaani aka hama laalefad'e woya tiyya tarsaase rifeensafi areeda ufiraa bubuqise gatae, aka hama mata qabad'e bohe.
Haga sorio galgala baasaniti anini achuma tae bohe. Duuba nami hedduuni nati bahe, worri sunini nama waan ch'ubbu worra eegi boojiani gale kaani ka AABBO Waaqi waan isaa dubbate d'agaye sodaate.
Hojaani sorio galgala baasani geennaani anini fulla qara tae bohu taani kae, kauma woya tatarsaate taani ufira qabu, jilbifad'e Waaqa kad'ad'e, harka AABBO Waaqa kiyyati olqabe
waan jed'e, Ee Waaqa, anini ch'eeraa dandae mata oliinqabad'u. Dabi keenna ya guddate lafa ira dabre fulla ch'ufa gae.
Haguma gaafa duri bara ababoota teennati asi, nu gumiini tante guddo ch'ubbamne. Maro ch'ubbu teennatifi, nuufi hayyoota teennafi qaaloleeni teennaleeni yayu harka hayyoota gosa d'ibi keesa seenne; nu hobaasani, nu saamani, nu boojiani, akuma arrale jirru kana aka hama nu ch'eersani.
Ammo amma tana, haga gabaaba toko, Ee AABBO Waaqa keenna, atini ya nuu naate, nu nama gari harka nyaapa nu boojie suni keesaa nu baafte, fulla qulqullo tana nuu teesifte. Ato nu duri tisse taanele atini yayu amma nuu jireesite.
Ato nu tisselele taane, atini tissooma suni keesati nu ilakimne. Atini hayyoota lafa Ajemi nuu naasifte, nu jireesite, aka nu mana kanke ka qara bade sii jaare, Yudafi Yerusalemu keesa bulti argannu.
Amma, Ee Waaqa, waan tahe kana maani dubbanna? Nu seera kanke,
ka atini afaani hojatu tante raagootaani nuu kennite, yayu ch'absine. Worri waan nuni jed'e, Lafti isani amma iti qubachuti jirtani tunini lafa t'uroofte badde, wonti akanatiifi worri keesa tau kunini yayu ch'ubbu ufitini t'ureese balleese.
Tanaafi dubra teesani ilmaani worraa infuud'ini, ilmaani teesanileeni dubra worraa infuud'ini - nagayaafi hormaata worraa imbarbadiina, yo isani lafa tana maachitani takaa tana ilmaani teesani - eti dabarsu feetani.
Eegi wonti kunini ch'ufti maro dabaafi ch'ubbu keennatifi nu d'aqabdele, nu imbeenna, Ee Waaqa, aka atini gaargala gudda nu sila argannu nuti diqeesite akanaani nu hambifte.
Duuba nu akami ammalle seera kanke ch'absine worra t'uricha kanaani wolfuuna? Yo akasi taane, atini nuti dallante lafa iraa nu ch'ufa imballeesitu?
Ee AABBO Waaqa Israeli, atini ka d'ugaati, gumi diqo toko ya hambifte. Nu wollaala keenna siti himanna; nu d'uga dandeenne fuula kanke duraani ejinu inqamnu.

Ato Ezrani mana Waaqa dura jilbifate bohe Waaqa kad'ate daba kana ch'fa himachu jiru, gumiini gosa Israeli ta muume inqamne d'iirafi nad'eenifi ijoolleeleni - aka hamtu boote fulla isaati wolti baate.
Jennaani Shekaniani, ilmi Yehieli, ka balbala gosa Elamu, waan Ezrani jed'e, Nu yayu dubra gosa d'ibi fuune akasiini Waaqa keennati wollaale: ammo hataatu worra Isrealiti wollaale: ammo hataatu worra Isrealiti abdiini diqo to inuma jirti.
Amma nu Waaqa keennati kakhanna, aka nu nad'eeni tanaafi ilmaani isii tanale galchinu. Nu waan siifi jari Seera Waaqa jabeese gula yau kaani nuni jed'u intolchina. Nu waan Seeri Waaqa jed'u intolchina.
Amma kai, nu gama kanke jirra, jabaad'i, waan suni guuti.
Duuba Ezrani kae, worra Lawitifi ka gumile kakhachise, aka worri waan Shekaniani jed'e suni guutu.
Jennaani Ezrani Mana Waaqa duraa kae, mana Yehohanani, ilma Eliashibu, seene, achi bule, sagaleefi bisaanile dide, ch'ubbu worra eegi boojiani gale kaani iraa laalefate.
Qonqo Yerusalemufi Yuda ch'ufa keesa ergani, worra eegi boojiani gale kaani ch'ufa yaamani, Yerusalemuti wolti baasani waan jed'ani
nama guyya saditi ind'ufini, seera jaarole gumi gula, waan inni qabu ch'ufa iraa saamani, duuba gosa keesaa kutani.
Guyya sadeeni suni keesati, guyya diddameeso ka jia sagaleeso, nami d'iira ch'ufti, ka Yudatifi ka Benjamini, Yerusalemu d'ufe diida Mana Waaqa durati wolti bahe. Maro dubbi jajabdu taatifi, ammalle maro guyya suni bokeeni tamni roobeefi, biyyiti guddo holate.
Qaallichi Ezra jed'ani kaani oleje waan worraani jed'e, Isani yayu seera Waaqa ch'absitani, dubra gosa d'ibi fuutani, akanaani ch'ubbu worra Israelitini d'uftani.
Amma tana daba keesani AABBO, Waaqa ababoota teesaniti himad'a, fed'i isaale tolcha.Nama gosa d'ibi, ka lafa teenna keesa tau, lagad'a nad'eeni gosa d'ibi ta qara fuutani ufi jalaa yaasa.
Jennaani biyyiti ch'ufti afaani takaa dubbate waan jette, Dubbini sunini d'uga, waan atini jette ya ee jenne, intolchina.
Ammo amma tana bokeenileeni guddo roobu jira, gumiini tunileeni muumme inqabdu tanaafi nu dandeenne diida kana keesa inejanjinu.Hujini tunini huji guyya tokofi lamati hojatani keesaa bahaniniti; wonti akanatiifi nu nami daba suni tolche nama heddu muumme inqamne.
Jaaroleeni teenna ha Yerusalemu keesati dubbi suni qorqoratu. Duuba nami nad'eeni gosa d'ibi fuud'e, yo yaamani, ha guyya qabatanifiti jaaroleeti jaallaboota dira isaa woliini d'ufuti. Akanaani Waaqi ka qara maro waan kanatifi nuti dallane dallansu ufi taani galfata.
Nami dubbi tana dide Yonathani, ilma Asahelifi, Yazeya ilma Tikwa, challa; ammalle Meshulamufi Shabethi ka gosa Lawileeni goli worraa tahani.
Worri eegi boojiani gale kaani dubbi tana ee jed'e fud'ate. Jennaani qaalichi Ezrani balbala gosa ch'ufa keesaa nama mataa fohate maqa t'aafe. Guyya qara, ka jia kud'anneeso, huji suni iti keeyatani,
jia sadi keesati nama nad'eeni gosa d'ibi qabu ch'ufa dubbi isaa ilaalani bufatani.
Kunini maqa jara nad'eeni gosa d'ibi qabuuti: Qaalole, balbala gosa isaani gula: Balbala Yoshuatifi oboleyaani isaa ta ilmaani Yehozadaki: Naseiya, Eliezeri, Yoribu, Gedalia.
Jari Kunini ch'ufti ee jed'e, nad'eeni worraa ufi jalaa yaase, ammalle maro daba worraa ka qara tolche elemiye qaqale sorio baase.
Balbala Imeri: Hananifi Zebadia.
Balbala Harimu: Maaseya, Eliya, Shemaya Yehieli, Uzia.
Balbala Pashuri: Elioenai, Maaseya, Ishamaeli, Nethaneli, Yozabadi, Elasa.
Worra Lawi: Yozabadi Shimei, Kelaya (ka maqaani d'ibiini Kelita), Pethaiya, Yuda, Eliezeri.
Sirbitu: Eliashibu. Jara Mana Waaqa Eegu: Shalumu, Telemu, Uri.
Jara d'ibi: Balbala Paroshi: Ramia, Izia, Malkia, Miyamini, Eleazari, Malkia, Benaiya.
Balbala Elamu: Matania, Zekaria, Yehieli, Abdi, Yeremothi, Eliya.
Balbala Zatu: Elioenaiani, Eliashibu, Matania, Yeremothi, Zabadi, Aziza.
Balbala Bebai: Yehohanani, Hanania, Zabai, Athlai.
Balbala Bani: Meshulamu, Maluki, Adaya, Yashubu, sheali, Yeremothi.
Balbala Pahath - Moabu: Adna, Kelali, Benaiya, Maaseya, Matania, Besaleli, Binui, Manase.
Balbala Harimu: Eliezeri, Ishiya, Malkia, Shemaya, Shemeoni, Benjamini, Maluki, Shemaria.
Balbala Hashumu: Matenai, Matata, Zabadi, Elifeleti, Yeremai, Manase, Shimei.
Balbala Bani: Maadai, Amramu, Uweli, Benaiya, Bedeya, Keluhi, Vania, Merimothi, Elishiabu, Matania, Matenai, Yaasu.
Balbala Binui: Shimei, Shelemia, Nathani, Adaya, Makanadebai, Shashai, Sharai, Azareli, Shelemia, Shemaria, Shalumu, Amaria, Yusufu.
Balbala Nebo: Yeieli, Matithia, Zabadi, Zebina, Yadai, Yoeli, Beneiya.
Jari kunini ch'ufti nad'eeni gosa d'ibi qaba. Duuba eege worri nad'eeni taani lakise, ilmaani isiile wolumaani galche.

Tunini odu Nehemia ilmi Hakalia t'aafe.
Jia Kisleu jed'ani, ganna diddameeso ka Artashartani hayyuuni Ajemi lafa mohate, anini Nehemiani gaafasi dira gudda Shushani jed'ani keesa jira.
Oboleesi kiyya toko ka Hanani jed'ani, jara d'ibi woliini Yudaa d'ufe, duuba anini waan Yerusalemutifi waan gosa Yahudi ta eegi boojiani lafa Babiloni geesani gagalte odeefad'e.
Jennaani worri waan nani jed'e, Jara eegi boojiani gale kaani guddo gochiti lafa worra keesa teetu taani gaargalchite ch'eersite. Ammalle naabo Yerusalemu ta ch'absanifi balbala Fullo isii ta gubani ammalle imid'aasine akuma duri jirti.
Anini qonqo tana d'agaye jennaani gatae bohe, haga guyya heddu laalefad'e sagale dide ufi agabse, Waaqa gubba kad'ad'e waan jed'eeni,
Ee AABBO Waaqa gubbaa, Waaqa gudda, ka dandae nami sodaa si dura inejine ka nama jaalate seera kanke guutu wold'aqisa woliini tolfatani jabeesitu;
AABBO, na ilaali, kad'acha tiyya, ta anini halkani guyya maro hojattu tante worra Israeliiti kad'ad'u, naa d'agayi. Anini ch'ubbu tiyyaafi ta worra Israeli siti hima; anaafi ababooti tiyya siti ch'ubbamne.
Nu si durati waan hamtu taane, aadaafi Seera atini Musa hojattu kanketini nuu kennite, guutu dinne.
Waan atini duri Musani jette qaabad'i: Yo isani worri Israeli naraa gore, anini gosa d'ibi keesa gargari isani firfirsa.
Ammo yo eege isani nati deebitani seera kiyya guutani, anini wolti isani deebise fulla anini fohad'e iti na kad'atanitini isani d'ufa, ato haga muumme lafa isani firfirsanile.
AABBO, worri sunini hojattufi gumi tanteeti, ta atini jabeennafi irre tante guddooni baafte.
Amma kad'acha tiyyaafi ta hojattu tanteeti, ta si sodaatu, ch'aqasi, arra naa eebisi, hayyicha naa naasisi. Anini gaafasi nama hayyicha daad'iini gololchu.

Guyya toko, jia Nisani jed'ani keesa, gannuma diddameeso ka hayyu Artashartani lafa mohate, anini daad'iini isa gololche. Inni taka ana gammada inqamne ingarre,
tanaafi waan nani jed'e, Atini maanifi diqole gammada inqamne? Atini gulana kuno fayya qabda, maanti fuula si yake? Jennaani anini ifad'e
waan jed'eeni, Ee hayyicha, Waaqi lubbu si d'eeresina, fuuli kiyya akami dandae mid'aaga, ka diri ababoota tiyya keesati awaalani jige bade, balbala Fullo isale ch'ufa ibidaani gubani?
Hayyichi waan nani jed'e, Maani feeta re? Jennaani anini Waaqa gubbaa kad'ad'e.
Waan hayyuuni jed'e, Ee hayyicha, yo atini na jaalatte waan anini si kad'ad'e ee jette, na gad'iisi, d'aqeti lafa Yuda, ta ababoota tiyya keesati awaalani, dira isi mid'aase jaara.
Hayyichi, ka hayyitiini d'aatu teetu, waan nani jed'e. Atini yo amma deemte, hagami bulte deebita? Akanaani hayyichi nati eebise na gad'iise, anileeni bulti haga iti hime.
Jennaani anini waan hayyichaani jed'e, Yo sii tate tatabe anini worra gugurda lafa Efrati ta ila aduti geesu, naa kenni, aka worri aka anini lafa worra keesaa bahe lafa Yudati taaku na gad'iisu.
