Wonti anini sodaad'u na d'aqabde,
ta anini ded'uleeni nati d'ufte.
Anini nagaya inqabu, hafuura imbaafad'u,
gaargali kiyya ind'umatu.

Jennaani Elifazini, ka worra Teemani, waan jed'e:
Abbo, yo nami sini dubbate indallanta?
Anini amma dandae inch'allisu.
Me ilaali, atini nama heddu barsiifte,
nama laalaafale jabeesite.
Dubbini tante nama gufate kibde
nama laafe jabeesite.
Amma gaargali si qabannaani obsu dad'abde
inni siti d'ufnaani ira hafu dad'abde.
Atini qara Waaqa sodaate, ch'ubbu lagatte;
tanaafi sila akana teete garaa hamachu himmalle.
Nami d'uga taka gaargala ya argate?
Me heregi, nama qajeela taka ya ijeesani?
Nami ch'ubbu qote hameenna fach'aasu woma suni murata.
Worra hafuura Waaqatini balleesani,
dallansu isaatini worra fit'ani.
Ch'ubbichi aka nyeench'a itane d'anga d'aa,
ammo Waaqi ch'allisise ilkaani ch'ach'absa.
Akuma nyeench'a waan ijeese nyaatu inqamne hobaani,
ilmaani isaani firfirfamti.
Duri qonqooni laato d'ufte,
gurri kiyya hasasa d'agaye.
hiriba na d'owarte.
Anini aka male mudame holad'e,
lafeleeni na chochoote.
Qilleensi fuula ira na bahe,
rifeensi mata kiyya shilkae olkakae.
Anini waan achi eja arge, millad'e hubachu dad'abe
lafti ch'aqali jette, jennaani qonqo d'agaye.
Qonqooni sunini waan jette:
Nami dandae Waaqa durati nama d'uga taha?
Yokhaani dandae nama isa uume durati qulqullo taha?
Waaqi hojattu isaa ind'ugeefatu,
malaika isaale wollaala iti mura.
Mala keeti, waan inni nama d'oqe iraa mid'aasani
ka dandaani aka billaacha ch'arasani d'ugeefatu seeta?
Namuma diirama lubbu qabuti,
ka nami quba inqamne, saafa ch'icha.
Waan inni qabu ch'ufa isa iraa fuud'ani,
ato inni qalbi inarganne ch'icha.

Yo feetu yaami, ammo eenuti sijala owaata?
Malaikaani atini qarqaarsa iraa argattu jirti?
Laalefachaani daalle ijeefti,
d'iibiini sirgo balleesiti.
Anini daalle qutuma dansa qabdu arginaani,
maro tokotu isa abaare.
Ilmaani isaa maro tokotu qarqaarsa d'abde,
gaadisa dubbiti nama worra dubbatu d'abani.
Nami beela qabu mid'aani daalle nyaata
mid'aani qoraati keesati baheele nami d'eebu qabuleeni horifi isa d'iibifata.
Hameenni biyye keesaa ind'ufu,
gaargalileeni lafa keesaa imbahu.
Akuma qaanqeeni ch'ech'eetu,
namileeni gaargalati d'alata.
Yo sila anini si taate, anini Waaqa yaamad'e,
gaargala kiyya iti himad'a.
Inni waan jabdu mama ka nami dandae inhubanne, tolcha.
Inni bokaya namaa roobe,
oobru namaa jiisa.
Ka nama irre inqamne olfuud'e
nama bohu gammachiisu Waaquma.
Inni mala malticha balleesa aka harki isaa woma inarganne.
herega worrale d'aanfa.
Worra suni guyyaani dukanti ira buute,
guyya guddaani aka nama halkani deemu jonjani.
Ammo Waaqi hiyyeesa dua keesaa baase,
harka nama worra dabsule keesaa baasa.
Akanaani hiyyeesi abdi argate
ch'ubbichale afaani qabachisani.
Yo Waaqi guddaani sii qajeelchu, intufatini.
inni wo si tolche harkuma ufiitini si fayyisa.
Inni maro heddu gaargala keesaa si baase,
duuba deebie gaargali si inqabatu.
Yo oolaani buute, inni duu si d'owe
guyya woraanale lubbu si baasa.
Inni nama si arabsu sira d'owe,
hojja badiini d'uftu duraa si baasa.
Atini yo woraanafi beelti d'uftu inkofaltta,
bineensa alaale insodaatu.
Oobruuni atini qotatuleeni d'akha inqabdu,
bineensi alalleni deebie si inhad'u.
Gaafasi atini nagayumani mana keetiti galta;
yo ree tante toatule tokole keesa ind'abdu.
Haguma buuyooni geetu,
ilmaani teetileeni lafa ira dabarte, hagasi geeti.
Akuma dargayeeni baate fulla geete billachaatu,
atinileeni jaarte fulla geete doota.
Nu jaarole waan kana ganna heddu teeneti baranne,
dubbini teenna d'uga, fud'ad'i.

Jennaani Ayubuni waan jed'e:
Hojja sila d'ipufi gaargala kiyya biimani,
isiini maansa galaanale ch'ufa ira ulfaati.
Tanaafi dubbini akanumati na keesaa yaatu tunini isani imamsisiini.
Waaqi guddaani ya t'iya ufiitini na woraane,
had'ani isii ya nafa ch'ufa na qabatte.
Waaqi ya waan nama mudamsiisa fuula nati deebise.
Harreeni diida, yo buuyo quuftu, imbaroodi?
Qotiyooni yo okhaya qabdu imarrati?
Ammo eenuti dandae sagale soodda inqamne soorata?
Eenuti dandae oota okhokaani mieefate nyaata?
Anini sagale akasi dandae insorad'u,
fayya na d'owarti.
Waaqi maanifi waan anini fed'u naa kennu dida?
Inni maafi kad'acha tiyya ind'ageenne?
Ato inni na ch'arase gargari na ch'ire, guddo dansa!
Ato sila aka inni akasi tolchu beekhe olch'ech'e gammada,
ato guddo d'ukubsachu jiraad'ele.
Anini imbeekha Waaqi qulqullo,
anileeni taka dubbi isatini imorkine.
Anini irree maani qaba ta jiraad'uuni?
Ka d'aabu womatu inqamne akami tae obsa?
Anini d'akhaa?
Nafa kiyya sibiilani mid'aasani?
Irreeni anini ufiini baasu na keesati inhamne;
fullaani anini qarqaarsa iraa argad'u injirtu.
Nami gaargala akana kana keesa jiru jaalani dansa fed'a,
ato inni Waaqa gudda sodaachu batele.
Ammo jaalani tiyya, isani laga fakaatani,
ka hojja bokaya inqamne gogogu.
Lagi suni qara bisaani qabanao qaba,
ammo yo boni d'ufu bisaani sunini fooqatani
lagi suni duwa tahe gogoga.
Nami karaa yau,
ka bisaani barbaadu,
karaa iraa gore bada;
worri lafa mare lafa aloo ta gamooji keesati hobaha.
Nami karaa yau, ka Shebafi Tema yau,
bisaani d'ugu abdata,
ammo abdiini sunini d'aatuma laga bisaani inqamneeti, worra ira baddi.
Isani laga suni nati fakaatani,
isani baddi tiyya agartani naraa rifattani.
Anini qara ya wo isani kad'ad'e?
Yokhaani nama naa gumbeesa ya isaniini jed'e?
Yokhaani harka nyaapatifi ka worra na dabsu ya,
keesaa na baasa isaniini jed'e?
Hayye, me na barsiisa, wollaala kiyya na garsiisa.
Anini ch'alliseti isani ch'aqasa.
Dubbini d'ugaa nama tut'i,
ammo dubbini teesani maani namaa baati?
Isani yo woma qilleensi na keesaa yau seetani,
maafi dubbi tiyya ta ufi jibbaata na jalaa qabdani?
Isani hit'a buufatani hiyyeeyi bitatani.
Jaala keesani ka isaniti aanule dabsitani
waan isaa nyaatani!
Me aka dansa fuula keesa na laala;
anini nama d'ara dubbatuuniti.
Dubbini teesani ya naa geete,
deebitani na indabsina, lakisa.
Anini d'uga qaba, wollaala nati imurina.
Araaba kiyyati ch'ubbu qaba?
Afaani kiyya d'araafi d'uga gargari imbeekhani?

Jireenni namaa lafa irati gaargaluma hamaaniti?
Bultiini isaa bulti tisse infakaatu?
Inni aka tisse boqota gaadisa boqotati d'arae,
garbicha beese ufii eegatu fakaata.
Anini jia ch'ufa abdi woma tokole inqabu,
halkani ch'ufa gaargalumati nati d'ufa.
Anini yo gadi ch'iisu lafti nati imbariitu,
halkani ch'ufa gaargalaa bule,
barii lafaa eega.
Nafi kiyya raammae ch'ich'ite,
malani mada keesa na yaa.
Guyyaani kiyya yoosu aka bubbe dabre,
abdi male hobaa.
Ee Waaqa, na qaabad'u,
jireenni kiyya hafuuruma,
ilti tiyya deebite gammada ingartu.
Amma tana male, deebite na ingartu.
Ato atini teete ilaaltu anini kae iti d'aabad'a.
Akuma dumansi gargari filfilae laanuma baddu,
akasuma nami due deebie inkau;
inni worra ufiiti ingalu,
nami isa beekhuleeni ch'ufti deebie isa inqaabatu.
Anini dandae inch'allisu,
laalala lubbu tiyyaatiifi dubbad'e
gaargala kiyyaafi gunguma.
Anini baariini yokhaani goorjama baariiniti,
ka atini nama na eegu nati tolchitu?
Hojja anini sire ira gach'iise,
laalala tiyya ira hafuura baafad'e
d'ukuba kiyya ira miira argad'a jed'u,
atini oobju na mudamsiiftu nati buufte,
daayya na sodaachiftu nati ergita;
tanaafi fulla nafa kanaani gaargalu,
hojja sila hud'ani na ijeesani ira naa jirti.
Anini ya ufi jibbaad'e, yo duu ira naa jirti.
Jireenni na keesati inhamne, na lakifte ho?
Atini waan inni tahu maani ira qabda?
Atini diirama ch'ufa isa qorqoratte
hojja ch'ufa isa ilaalata.
Atini haga anini hanch'ufa liqimsule,
ila nara indeefattu?
Atini ka na eeddu ch'ubbuuni tiyya wo si tolchiti?
Atini maanifi t'iya tante nati abirta?
Anini d'uguma guddo si d'iba,
atini maanifi ch'ubbu tiyya na inaraaramne,
yokhaani wolaalla kiyya biraa naa indeemne?
D'iotu na awaalani,
atini na barbaada, ammo na ingartu.

Jennaani Bildadiini, ka gosa Shuhi, waan jed'e:
Dubbini tante ta aka qilleensa si keesaa yaatu tunini yoomi buufatti!
Waaqi guddaani d'uga imballeesa?
Yokhaani qajeeluma iyyaka?
Hegeri waan ilmaani tante Waaqa durati ch'ubbu tolchiteefi
inni gati daba worra kenneefi.
Amma garagali, Waaqa gudda kad'ad'i;
yo atini d'uguma nama d'uga qajeela taate
Waaqi si qarqaaru indidu,
worra kanke ch'ufa sii deebisa.
Hormaata takaa tana atini horattu, yo agarte,
ka qara kaani intufatta.
Me, qarooma worra duri laali,
waan abbootini teenna baratte heregi.
Guyyaani keenna gabaaba,
nu woma tokole imbeennu;
nu lafa tana irati akuma gaadisa marraa.
Jaaroleeni duri qaqarooni ha si barsiiftu,
waan worri si barsiisu kana ch'aqasi.
Ilaaduuni dandeete fulla bisaani injirreeti imbaatu,
ch'affa male fulla d'ibiiti inargani.
Hojja bisaani fooqatani, wonti qara gogoga isi,
isiini ato ch'araqaatu,
ka woma imbaamne gogode baddi,
nami Waaqa imbeenne illaadu suni fakaata;
hojja Waaqa ded'ani abdiini worraa ya badde.
Worri liilana, abdata — sapupa orbobiisaa,
yo worri sapupaati hirkate,
inni dandae worra intind'isa?
Yo worri liilana qabate,
dandae liilana sunini olineja?
Worri hamaani aka marra adu keesaa bahe,
oobru ch'ufa qabata.
Ammalle hiddi isaa d'akhaati mamarate,
siida d'akha ch'ufa qaba.
Ammo yo buqisani,
aka inni duri achi jiru nami dandae imbeekhu,
Ee, gammadi worri ch'ubbuu argatu sunuma —
duuba worri d'ibiini d'ufe,
fulla isaani fud'ata.
Ammo Waaqi nama wollaala inqamne lafa imbuusu,
nama ch'ubbu qabule inqarqaaru.
Inni si gammachiise, duuba atini iyyite kofalta;
ammo inni nyaapa kanke ch'eerse,
mana worra ch'ubbuu balleesa.

Jennaani Ayubuni waan jed'eeni:
ammo nami akami dandae Waaqa durati d'uga qaba?
Nami akami dandae Waaqaani woi morma?
Inni dandae waan heddu muumme inqamne nama gaafata,
ammo nami dandae waan isii inhimu.
Waaqi guddo qaroomafi jabeenna qaba,
Eenuti dandae isa dura eje, isaani wo morma?
Akanumati, ka gaari woma quba inqamne, buqise,
dallansu ufiitini balleesa.
Waaqi lafa chochoose, utuba isii olqabu roraasa.
Inni dandae adu bahu d'owe,
urjile halkani ifsuu d'owa.
Isumati gubba ballise goorjama baariinile ira ejaanjata.
buusaanifi lamile mid'aase.
Nu waan mama jabdu inni tolchu dandeenne inhubannu
waan mama heddu ka henna inqamne.
Waaqa, ato inni na bira baheele anini dandae inargu,
ato inni na d'aatu deemele anini dandae inhubad'u.
Inni woma fed'u fud'ata,
nami dandae ind'owu;
nami tokoleeni ka, Atini maani tolchita?
jed'uuni injiru.
Waaqi dallansu isaa ingalfatu;
inni nyaapa ufii ka Rahabu,
gorjama baariini ka Waaqaani morku qarqaaru, inch'arasa.
Tanaafi anini akami dandae Waaqaani wo morma?
Ato anini woma yakule baad'e
anini woma tokole afaani isaa keesaa indeebisu,
yo jaallaba dubbi tiyya qoru wo kad'ad'u male.
Ammo ato akasile taate,
yo inni Dubbad'i naani jed'ele
waan inni na jalaa qabu insehu.
Inni bubbe akanumati na d'oofte
na dirmameesitu nati erga.
Inni hafuura na imbaafachisu,
ammo jireenna nati yaka.
Yo waan irree taate,
irreeni tama isaati!
Yo waan qorsuma taate,
eenuti qorsumati isa yaama?
Ato anini nama ch'ubbu inqamne taatele,
afaani kiyyati na balleesa;
yo anini wollaala qabaachu bad'ele
dubbuma tiyyati wollaala keesa na buusa.
Ato anini wollaala qabaachule baad'e,
anini amma woma iyyaalu, ya ufi jibbaad'e.
Wonti ch'ufti woma takaa;
tanaafi anini,
inni ch'ubbichafi ka ch'ubbu inqamnele imballeesa jed'a.
Yo nami d'uga maro tokotu duu
Waaqi nama suni goyeese kobla.
Waaqi lafa harka worra ch'ubbuti kenne
nama wo qoru ch'ufa balla tolche.
Yo isa intahiini eenuti tolche re?
Guyyaani kiyya yoosu dabra
ka sunileeni dansa intahiini,
akanumati barise iti d'aabata.
Inni aka hobolo illaaduuni mid'aasani utaale dabre
akuma risa wo butu barisa.
Yo anini, gaargala kiyya ded'e koble tabad'a jed'u,
gaargali kiyya deebie na mudamsiisa;
wonti akanatiifi siti ch'ubbu nati herega.
Eegi ch'ubbu nati murani,
anini maanifi tae ufi gaargalcha.
Ato anini saabunaleeni ufi d'iqe
harka kiyyale qulqulleese,
atini boola huura keesa na buufta
tanaafi woyaani tiyyaleeni na t'ureefatti.
Yo Waaqi nama taate, anini sila dandae wo jed'aani;
nu sila gaadisa kora woliini d'anne
jaaroleeti woli himanna.
Ammo nami jiddu teenna eje gargari nu d'owu injiru,
yokhaani nami anaafi Waaqa wolti qoru injiru.
Ee Waaqa, ule naani d'aantu tana naraa fuud'i!
Mudamsu tante tana naraa balleesi.
Anini amma woma insodaad'u, indubbad'a,
wonti akanatiifi onne tiyya haga beekha.

Anini ya amma ufi jibbaad'e,
tanaafi gungumsu tiyya ta laalala, ch'aqasi,
gaargala kiyya keesa inuma dubbad'a.
Ee Waaqa, wollaala nati imuriini;
ammo waan naani himatu nati himi.
Gaargali atini na gaargalchitu kunini fulluma?
Aki atini waan uumte tufatu kunini dansaa?
Aki atini herega worra ch'ubbicha jaalatu fulluma?
Ilti tante aka ila namaa jirti?
Atini aka nama wo garta?
Guyyaani kanketifi ganni kankeleeni,
akuma ka nama, gabaaba?
Maanifi ch'ubbu tiyya gula deemte
wollaala kiyya barbaada re?
Aka anini ch'ubbu inqamne,
ka nami d'ibileeni dandae sii dura na imbaamne,
atini imbeeta.
Harkuma keetiti supe na mid'aase,
duuba amma harkuma sunini garagalte na balleesita?
Qaabad'i, atini duri d'oqeeni na mid'aasite,
amma gargalte, bulleesite biyye na tolchita?
Atini aka aanani na jissite,
aka ititu na inirbine?
Atini nafa kiyya lafeefi maach'eraani mid'aasite,
lafe suni foonifi gogaani duuchite.
Atini jaalala na garsiifte jireenna naa kennite
lubbu tiyyale qorqoratte.
Ammo amma tana ya hubad'e aka atini mala nati d'aate,
d'ossaani na balleesu feetu.
Atini na gaade daba nara barbaada,
aka duuba akasiini naa araaramu diddu.
Yo anini ch'ubbu hojad'e, gaargala badi tiyya,
ammo ato waan dansa tolchele, d'uga inargad'u.
Anini ya ch'eeri na ijeese ufi jibbaad'e.
Yo anini diquma mata olfud'ad'ele,
atini aka nyeench'a na gaade,
waan mama tolchite na balleesita.
Atini hojja ch'ufa nama na himatu gadiini d'ufte,
dallansuuni tanteeleni nati guddati;
ammalle atini hojja ch'ufa nati malatte
kara d'ibiini na haata.
Atini maanifi garaa haad'a tiyya keesaa na baafte?
Ato sila ka nami na inargini due, guddo naa woyya.
Ato sila akuma anini garaa haad'a tiyya keesaa bueeni
na awaalani guddo ira naa jirti.
Guyyaani kiyya gabaabani dabru ingeenne?
Na lakifte ho?
Guyya naa hafe gammadu fed'a.
Anini d'iotu deema,
deebie gadi indeebiu.
Lafti anini deemu sunini bolgodu dukanooftu,
ta dukanti isii sipeeni gaandidoofte nama wo gassitu,
ta ifsaani isiileeni ch'ufti dukana fakaatu.

Jennaani Sofariini, ka gosa Naamathi, waan jed'eeni:
Nami tokoleeni ka dubbi hagana geetu tana si jalaa qabu injiru?
Nami akana dubbi d'eeresu kunini d'uga inargata?
Mala keeti, waan dubbini tante,
ta woma keesa injirre sunini,
nu ch'allisiftu seeta?
Yo atini nama goyeesite waan si ch'eersani inseetu?
Atini waan Waaqaani jettu,
D'ugefachaani tiyya aabo inqabdu,
ammalle anini si durati qulqullo.
Ato Waaqi siini dubbate anini akami gammada!
Inni aka qaroomi aka heddu jiru si barsiisa;
waan nami dandae inhubanne ka d'ossaati jira.
Hubad'u, gaargali kanke kunini
haga sila sii male ingahu.
Waan Waaqa ka d'ossani,
dandeete keesa imbeeta?
Atini dandeete guddinnaafi jabeenna Waaqaa muumme inhubata?
Wonti sunini muumme inqabdu,
gubbale ira olfago.
Atini maani dandeete taata re?
Ammo Waaqi fulla ekheraa imbeekha,
ammo atini imbeetu.
Guddinni Waaqaa lafa ira ballaa
baariile ira d'eera.
Yo Waaqi si qabe si hid'e
gaadisa koraati si geese eenuti jalaa si baasa?
Inni nama seseega woma keesa injirre imbeekha;
inni huji worraa hamtu ch'ufa inarga.
Yo harreeni diidaa matat'e worrati galtu,
daalleeni wo hubati.
Garaa toli, harka kanke Waaqati olqabad'i.
Ch'ubbu keesa jirtu ufi ira fageesi,
waan hamtu mana kanke keesaa baasi.
Duuba ch'eera male biyya dura ejite,
soda male garaa jabaate
biyya keesa deemta.
Duuba gaargala kanke ch'ufa, yo suni deete,
aka lola fooqateti heredda.
Jireenni kanke adu guyya gudda ira ifse,
dukantileeni barii siti fakaati.
Waan atini abdi guddo qabdufi,
soda male nagayaani teeta.
Waaqi si qorqorate hafuura sii baasa.
Bultiini tante soda womatu inqabdu,
nami hedduleeni qarqaarsa si kad'ata.
Ammo worri ch'ubbu qabu ufi jibbaate,
ufi d'aatu mimilate, kara bahuuni d'aba,
wonti worri abdatu duuma.

Jennaani Ayubuni waan jed'eeni:
Ee, qonqooni nama si;
hojja dootule qarooma wolumaani doota!
Ammo anini qalbi akuma kanke qaba,
waan tokoleeni si inhanqad'u;
nami waan kana imbeenne injira?
Jaalani tiyyaaleeni amma na kofalti,
ato anini nama d'uga,
ka wollaala inqamne tahele
jaalani tiyya, na kofalti,
duri Waaqi kad'acha tiyya naa d'agaya.
Atini ufii gaargala womatu inqabdu
ammo teete na goyeesita:
Nama ufiftu diquma inqaariini d'oofta.
Ammo shiftaafi nami Waaqa imbeenne nagayaani taa,
ato Waaqi worraa irre worraa taatele.
Bineensafi simpirrele gaafad'i,
worrati si barsiisa;
waan garaani lafa ira loatifi
simpirrele gaafad'i, worrati siti hima.
Wonti kunini ch'ufti aka AABBO Waaqi
harka ufiitini worra uume imbeetu?
Jireenni waan lubbu qabati ch'ufti harka isaa keesa jira,
hafuuri namaaleeni isa iraa baha.
Akuma arabi kanke sagale mieefatu,
gurri kankeleeni dubbi mieefata.
Qaroomi ka jaaroleetiiniti?
Hubachaani ta nama lafa buleetiiniti?
Qaroomafi jabeenni ka Waaqati,
inni hubachaafi irre woini tolchu qaba.
Eenuti waan inni ch'abse dandae jaara?
Ammalle eenuti dandae nama Waaqi hid'e hiikha?
Oolaani, hojja Waaqi roobu didu, d'ufti;
bisaani hojja inni bokaya roobu, lafati fach'aani.
Waaqi jaba, waan ch'ufa indabsata;
ka wo sobuufi ka sobanileeni ch'ufti
harkuma isaa keesa jira.
Inni qarooma worra lafa fidu iraa fuud'e
worra nama dura deemule daallesa.
Inni hayyootale hayyuma iraa fuud'e hid'aansa geesa;
inni qaalole huji qaalluma iraa fuud'e
worra jajabaale balleesa.
Inni nama d'ugeefatani ch'allisise,
qarooma jaarole iraa fuud'a.
Inni worra lafa fidu ch'eerse,
worra irre qabu irre isaani balleesa.
Inni dukana sipe balleese, ifsaani d'ufa.
Inni gosa jabeese irre kennaafi,
ammo eege gosa suni firfirse balleesa.
Inni worra nama dura deemu qalbi d'owe,
lafa kara inqamne keesa marsa.
Worri dukana keesa jinjimate,
aka nama machae dadaaqa.

Anini waan kana ch'ufa ya ila tiyyaani arge,
gurra kiyyaani d'agaye hubad'e.
Waan isaani beetani anini imbeekha,
waan tokoleeni anini isani inhanqad'u.
Ammo anini Waaqa guddaani dubbachu fed'a,
aka dubbi tiyya woliini qorru.
Isani daallumma teesani kiyyibaani d'ossitani,
isani ch'ufti ch'ireeyyi woma imbeenne fakaatani.
Afaani qabad'a,
hegeri worra qaro isani sehani!
Dubbi anini himad'u ch'aqasa!
Isani maafi d'ara dubbattani?
Waan d'arti teesani Waaqa wobaatu seetani?
Isani isaa dubbachu feetani?
Dubbi keesa isaa kalchu feetani?
Yo Waaqi isani ilaale,
inni waan dansa isani irati inarga?
Isani aka nama sobdani,
waan Waaqa sobu dandeetani seetani?
Ato isani d'ossaani nama gargari filtanile
inni wollaala isani garsiise,
irreefi guddinni isaa isani mudamsiisa.
Mammaasi keesani akuma daara woma keesa injirre,
moromani teesanileeni akuma d'oqe bulloofti.
Anati dubbata, me afaani qabad'a,
wonti taha ha taatuti.
Anini ya ufi jibbaad'e,
duale kurfo jira.
Anini abdi waan tokole inqabu,
tanaafi ato Waaqi na ijeese ho?
Anini insodaad'u amma ufi dubbad'a.
Hegeri garaa jabeenni kunini na baasa
wonti akanatiifi ch'ubbichi dandae Waaqa dura ineju.
Amma dubbini tiyya ha gurra isani seentu,
aka dansa ch'aqasa.
Anini kurfo jira aka ufii dubbad'u,
wonti akanatiifi aka kara d'ugaa keesa jiru imbeekha.
Ee Waaqa atini d'ufte na himatta?
Yo na himatte anini ch'allise dua.
Waan lama naa tolchi
duuba anini si ind'okhad'u;
na ingaargalchini na lakisi,
teete na imudamsiini.
Ee Waaqa, naani dubbad'i; si jalaa qaba;
yokhaani na dubbachiisi, na jalaa qabi.
Dabi kiyya maani?
Wollaali anini tolche maani?
Wonti naani himatani maani?
Atini maanifi na didde nyaapati na heredda?
Atini na sodaachisuu feeta?
Atini na mudamsiisu feeta?
Anini obeensa mukhati,
atini buuyo gogode qilleensi fuud'e ch'alla reebu jirta.
Atini waan jabduuni na himatta
waan duri gaafa kaima anini tahele illakiftu.
ejata kiyya ch'ufa ilaalte
faana tiyya d'oofta.
Tanaafi anini shame ch'ich'ite,
woya billaachi nyaate fakaad'a.

Nami d'alatu ch'ufa guyyaani isaa gabaaba,
sunileeni gaargaluma ch'alla.
Inni akuma daraara bahe, qanch'oorate bada;
akuma gaandidu yoosu dabra.
Atini nama aka kiyya kana ilaalte inqorta?
Nami waan qulqullo,
waan t'uri keesaa baasu, injira? Injiru.
Guyya namaatiifi bulti inni bulu qaraa mid'aasani.
Atini qaraa hereddeefi,
dandaani gara ingalchani.
Tanaafi amma ila ira deefad'i,
ufi iraa yalabahi;
aka inni, aka tisse, bulti ufi iraa gammadu.
Mukhi murani abdi qaba, aka deebie late bahu.
Ato hiidi isaa lafa keesati gogoge hundileeni goge,
yo bisaani argate mukhi suni late baha.
Ammo nami yo due ya hobae;
yo hafuuri keesaa bahe maanti hafa?
Akuma bisaani yaani laga keesa dabrani
galaanileeni gogu,
namileeni akasuma due dabra.
Inni haga lafafi gubbaani jirtu deebie inkau,
yokhaani nami isa kaasuleeni injiru.
Ato atini fulla ekherati na d'ossite,
guddo naa woyya;
haga dallansuuni tante siraa galuti na d'ossi.
Duuba guyya tolfad'i, ka na qaabatu.
Nami yo due dandae inkaa?
Ammo anini guyya gomitani nati d'ufte eegad'a,
haga gaargali kunini naraa hobauti.
Duuba atini gaafasi na yaamte,
anini si jala owaad'a.
Atinileeni ana, ka atini uumte, iraa gammadda.
Gaafasi ejata kiyya ch'ufa ilaalte,
ch'ubbu tiyya faana d'au lakifta.
ch'ubbu tiyya naa araaramte balleesita.
Wollaala kiyyale ch'ufa naraa d'it'a.
Guyyaani ind'ufa, ka gaareeni qaqaarite,
qarsa d'akha ch'ufa fulla isaati chochoosani.
Bisaanileeni d'akha luqisani,
bokai guddaleeni biyye lafa iraa diqa.
Akasuma atini abdi namaa balleesita.
Atini nama dabsate haga jiru jireenna balleesite,
fuula isale yakite ufi biraa gussita.
Ilmaani isaa ulfinna argatti, ammo inni quba inqabu;
yo worra ch'eersanile nami isati himu injiru.
Inni d'ukubsacha nafa isaatiifi laalala qalbi isaa ch'alla beekha.

Jennaani Elifazini, ka gosa Temani, waan jed'e:
Nami qarooni akami dubbi woma keesa injirre dubbate,
qilleensani garaa ufii guuta?
Inni akami dubbi woma intahiini dubbate,
dubbi akasiitini womorma?
Atini ufiftu Waaqa sodaachu dide
kad'acha isaale yala baate.
Ch'ubbuuni tante afaanuma kanke iraa baati,
atini malafi malteeni wo dubbata.
Dubbuma atini jettuti si ijeesa,
jechi atini jettu ch'ufti wollaala keesa si buusa.
Atini namaa qara d'alate ufuma seeta?
Atini, gaafa Waaqi gaareeni mid'aase,
d'alate lafa jirta?
Atini mala Waaqaa d'ageete quba qabda?
Atini nama qarooyu ch'ufa ufuma seeta?
Wonti atini beetu, ka nu imbeenne, maani?
Wonti atini hubattu, ka nu inhubanne, injirti?
Nu qarooma keenna jaarole mata arri iraa baranne,
ta abba kankele dura jirtu.
Waaqi sila kibe garaa si jabeesu fed'a.
Atini maafi teete didda?
Nu dubbi laana dansaani siti dubbanne.
Atini maafi garaa hammaate,
ila dallansutini nu ilaalta?
Atini ammalle maafi Waaqati dallante,
dubbini akana tunini afaani kanke keesa baati?
Nami uwii d'alu, ka dandae nama d'uga tahu, injiru?
Waaqi ka ufiftu malaika ufitu ind'ugeefanne,
ka isiini isa durati qulqullooma inqamne,
eesa dandae nama ch'ubbicha hama,
ch'ubbu aka bisaani d'ugu, d'ugeefata?
Amma na ch'aqasi, waan arge siti hima.
Worri qarooni ya waan abbooti
ufi iraa barate na barsiise,
worri woma tokole na ind'ossine.
Lafti worraa nyaapa inqabdu,
yokhaani nami, worra Waaqa iraa gorsu, injiru.
Nami daba, ka nama dabsu,
haga jiru aka hama gaargala.
Qonqooni nama mudamsiiftu gurra isaa duuchite,
hojja inni lafa nagaya sehu shiftani isa haati.
Inni aka dukana duraa bahu inheregatu,
wonti akanatiifi goraadeti isa eegata.
Allaatileni aka reefa isaa nyaatu teete eegatti.
Inni imbeekha, aka guyyaani dukana isati d'ufu.
Gaargalafi laalalati isa mudamsise,
aka hayyu lola kurfefate isa dabsata.
Waan inni Waaqaani morke sodaachu dide tufateefi.
Nami akasi sunini kiyyiba, ka Waaqaani morku.
Inni wonte ufii qabate, Waaqa d'agayuu dide,
had'iisa iti utaala.
Nama akasi suniti dira had'e dabsate,
mana abbaani keesaa baqate fud'ata,
ammo woraani kae dirafi maneeni balleesa.
Inni durooma ufiitini inturu,
wonti inni horate, ka inhobaane, injirtu,
gaandiduuni isaaleeni badde,
innileeni dukana duraa imbahu.
Inni mukha gubate, ka ibidi dameele gube
qilleensi obeensa isaa fuud'e fakaata.
Yo inni daallae hameenna d'ugeefate,
wonti inni argatuleeni hameennuma taati.
Ato guyyaani isaa ingahiini,
inni aka dame mukha goge ka dottachu lakise taha.
Inni mukha zabibu, ka mid'aani imbilchaatiini buufatu, fakaata.
Nami Waaqa imbeenne woma ind'alu, mana gumbooni jaaranile ibidati guba.
Nami ch'ubbu malate waan hamtu tolchu worruma kana;
garaani worra woma d'araati guuta.

Jennaani Ayubuni waan jed'eeni;
Anini dubbi akana tana qara d'agaye;
isani fulla na qarqaaru d'uftani,
gaargalaani nati d'uftani.
Dubbini aka qilleensa isani keesaa yaatu tunini
haguma jirtu isani keesaa ind'umatu?
Isani haguma jirtani wo moroma illakiftani?
Yo sila anini aka keesani jiraad'e,
isanileeni aka kiyya kana jiraattani,
anini waan isani jettani kana inuma jed'a.
Anini sila mata isaniti irbe
waan heddu isaniti haasaa.
Anini sila gorsaani isaani jabeese
dubbi dansaani isani kiba.
Ato anini dubbad'ele, woma naa ingoomani
yo anini afaani qabad'ele gaargali kiyya naraa imbahu.
Waaqa, atini yayu na dad'absiifte,
atini yayu worra kiyya ch'ufa hobaafte.
Atini ya nyaapa nati taate na qabde.
Anini yayu d'umad'e gogafi lafe ch'alla tahe.
Tanaafi biyyiti, inni wollaala qaba naani jetti.
Waaqi ya dallansuuni gargari na tatarsaase,
ila jibbaatiini na laale.
Biyyiti na goyeesite, na marsite,
fuula keesa na d'oofti.
Waaqi ya na lakise,
harka worra hamaati naa kenne.
Anini qara nagayumani taa,
ammo eege Waaqi lubbu na qabe,
na d'ae na ch'ach'abse.
Waaqi t'iya ufi nati abire,
gama ch'ufaa na had'a —
t'iyiti sunini na woraante na madeesiti;
ato akasile taate, inni diqole na innahu.
Inni ammalle maro heddu na mamadeese,
aka nama duula na had'a.
Anini bohe, ch'arqi naqad'e,
ufi jibbaad'e daara keesa ch'iisa.
Anini bohe, ilti na diidimate,
iiti ila tiyya ch'ufa na marsite,
ammo taatule anini harka kiyyaani waan hamtu intolchine,
kad'achaani tiyya ta d'ugaati.
Ee lafa, ch'ubbu nati tolchani ind'ossini,
iyyana anini d'ugaani barbaadu ha d'agayaniti.
Jaalani tiyya na tufate,
ilti tiyya imimaani Waaqati booti.
Anini nama Waaqati naa dubbatu fed'a
akuma nami jaala ufiiti dubbatu.
Ganni kiyya ya gabaabate,
anini yayu fulla d'uga d'aqu gahe.

Bultiini tiyya ya ala hobaate,
hafuurale bafachu dad'abe,
awaala male woma na inhaamne.
Nami na goyeesu na marse,
ilti tiyya jibba worri na jibbu agarti.
Ee Waaqa, anini d'uga dubbachuu jira,
dubbi tiyya d'ugeefad'i,
si male nami waan anini jed'u d'ugeefatu injiru.
Atini qalbi worraa ya hubachu d'owarte,
ammo aka worri na dabsatu iti illakisiini.
Nami hori jed'e jaalani ufii wo tolchu,
ilmaani ufii balleesa.
Amma biyyiti dubbi akana tana naani jette d'ufte
hanch'ufa fuulati na tufti.
Laalalti tiyya diquma ila na induuchini,
nafi kiyya ya hobae, gaandidu fakaata.
Nami d'ugaa akasi na arge, jennaani naraa rifata,
duuba nami ch'ufti aka waan anini Waaqa imbeenne wollaala nati mura.
Nami waan d'uga qabu ufi sehu,
haga qara ira waan d'uga qabu ufi seha.
Ammo yo sila worri ch'ufti d'ufe na dura ejaanjele,
nama qaro keesati inargu.
Guyyaani kiyya ya dabre, mali kiyya ya hammaate,
abdiini tiyyaleeni ya badde.
Ammo jaalani tiyya halkaniini guyya jette,
ifsaleni ya d'iaate jetti,
ammo anini dukanuma keesati hafa.
Abdiini tiyya fulluma ekhera ch'alla,
fulla anini gach'iise dukana keesa rafu.
Anini awaalani, Aabbo jed'e,
raamo na nyaatuni, ayyo,
yokhaani, oboleeti tiyya jed'aani.
Abdiini tiyya tokoleeni me re?
Nami tokoleeni ka argu injira?
Hojja anini due, na awaalani,
abdi woliini na awaalani?

Jennaani Bildadiini, ka gosa Shuhi, waan jed'eeni:
Nami aka keeti kunini yoomi afaani qabata?
Yo atini ch'allifte nu ch'aqafte,
nu wo siti himna.
Atini maanifi daalle aka looni nu seeta?
Atini maafi ufuma teete dallansuuni ufi d'ukubsita?
Lafti dallansu teeti jette duwa taati?
Waaqi sii jed'e gaara chochoosa?
ibidi isii deebie imbobau.
Ifsaani waaro isaa gaandidae,
ifseeni isaa bira ejitu d'aamti.
Ejati isaa qara jajaba,
ammo amma ingugufata;
maluma isaati isa balleese buusa.
Inni t'urura keesa seene,
t'ururaani miila isaa qaba;
qaampari hirba isaa qabe isa chochou d'owa.
Lafa irati t'urura d'ossani,
qaampara kara keesa kayaniifi.
Gama ch'ufa waan isa mudamsiisuti isa eegate,
fulla inni deemu ch'ufa gula deema.
Inni duri dureesa, ammo amma ya wo d'abe;
gaargali d'aatu tae isa eegata.
D'ukubi hamaani nafa isaa qabate,
harkaafi miila isaa shamse ajeesa.
Waaro inni nagayaani keesa tahu keesaa hirkisani,
boola Duati geesani.
Amma tana abbaani fed'u ha waaro isaati galuti
eegi dillo iti naqani qulqulleesanini.
Hiidi isaa jalati gogoge,
dameeni isaa gubbaati qanch'oorati.
Gurri isaa lafa keesaa badde,
maqa isaa lafa keesaa d'abani.
Isa lafa keesaa baasani,
ifsa keesa dukanati geesani.
Inni gosa isaa keesa ilmaani inqabu,
nami isaa ka hafe injiru.
Nami ilaborutiifi ka ila aduu ch'ufti baddi isaa
d'ageennaani mudame holata.
Sunini baddi worra ch'ubbichati worri Waaqa imbeenne fulla suni yaa.

Jennaani Ayubuni waan jed'eeni,
Isani yoomi dubbi teesani d'eertu tanaani na gaargalchu lakiftani?
Maro heddu na arabsitani,
araba na arabsitani iraa ch'eeru diddani.
Ato anini d'uguma wollaala tolchele
maanini isani gaargalcha?
Isani waan nara jirtani seetani,
maro anini gaargala argad'eefi ch'ubbicha naa seetani.
Isani aka nami waan kana naa tolche Waaqa ingartani?
Inni ya t'urura na hid'e, aka na qabu.
Yo anini, ya na dabsani jed'e iyyele,
nami na jalaa qabu injiru;
ato anini qarqaarsa kad'ad'ele,
d'uga inargad'u.
Waaqi yayu kara nati hid'e,
anini dandae indabru;
inni ya kara kiyya dukana keesati d'osse.
Inni hori kiyya ch'ufa naraa fuud'e,
gurra kiyyale balleese.
Inni gama ch'ufa na d'ae na ch'ach'abse;
inni abdi tiyya aka mukha buqise, lafati na lakise.
Waaqi aka hamtu gugubate nati dallane,
nyaapa ufiiti na herege.
Inni duula ufii had'iisa nati erge,
worri boola qotate waaro tiyya marsa.
Inni yayu oboleyaani tiyya naraa fageese;
worri duri na beekhu ya nyaapa nati tahe;
fiit'ani tiyya ya na lakifte,
jaalani tiyya ya na biraa yaate,
keessumaani tiyya ya na deete;
dubriti na hojattu aka keessumaafi nyaapa na hereddi.
Hojattuuni tiyya ato anini yaamele, na jalaa inowaatu,
ato anini sobad'ele na jalaa inqabdu.
Niitiini tiyyaleeni aja tiyyaafu nati ind'iaatu,
oboleyaani tiyyaleeni, ta nu woliini d'allanne,
na jibbite naraa fagaati.
Ijoolleleeni na goyeesite,
yo na gartu na tufati.
Jaalani tiyyaleeni ta anini guddo jaalad'u,
na jibbiti,
nami anini nama ch'ufa ira jaalad'u ya nati gaargale,
anini yayu gogafi lafe ch'alla tahe;
ammo hataatu lubbuuni ya arma gahe.
Jaalani tiyya, naa naha,
harki Waaqa ya na d'ae.
Isani maafi akuma Waaqi nyaate na fit'e
nyaatani na fit'ani?
Isani fooni kiyya inquuftani?
Ato nami sila dubbi tiyya tana qaabate,
kitaaba keesati t'aafe, anini akami fed'a!
Yokhaani ato inni dubbi tiyya,
aka isiini, haga jiru jireenna teetu,
d'akha irati sibiilani qore akami jaalad'a!
Anini imbeekha, aka nami naa kalchu gubbaa jiru,
ammalle aka inni guyya muumme d'ufe naa dubbatu.
Ato d'ukubi nafa kiyya balleesele,
anini nafuma kanaani Waaqa arga.
Anumati ila tiyyaani isa arga,
nama d'ibiiniti.
Waan isani, Nu akamiini isa gaargalchiine jettanifi garaani na laafe.
Isani waan naani haalattani barbaadani.
Ammo ammatana goraade sodaad'a;
wonti akanatiifi Waaqi gaafa dallane
goraadeeni nama balleesa,
duuba akasiini aka nama wollaala namati muruu jiru beetani.

Jennaani Sofariini, ka gosa Naamathi waan jed'eeni:
Abbo, atini ya na dallansiifte,
tanaafi anini amma hurrise wo siini jechuu fed'a.
Wonti atini naani jette araba, ammo qalbiini
tiyya waan sini jechuu malani ya na garsiifte.
D'uguma atini imbeeta,
haguma duri nama lafa irati uumani,
gammadi nama ch'ubbicha gabaaba,
gammachuuni nama Waaqa imbeenneleeni haguniti:
Ato inni d'eerate mataani waaqa tuqele,
akuma awaara bada.
Nami duri isa beekhu,
Inni me? jed'e gaafata.
Inni akuma oobju dabre,
akuma daayya halkani bada,
deebiani inargani.
Nami duri isaa arge deebie inargu.
Fulla duri inni iti galule ind'abani.
Ilmaani isaa waan inni hiyyeesa iraa hate deebisuu malte.
Nafi isaa gaafa inni duri kaima jabeenna qaba,
ammo amma d'iotu biyye taha.
Ato hameenni guddo afaani isaati miae,
inni afaani keesaa fud'achu dad'abele,
sagaleeni garaa isaa keesati had'oofte,
had'a bofaa iti taati.
Inni hori kara dabaatiini soorate diddifate,
Waaqumati waan suni isa diddisise.
Wonti ch'ubbichi liqimse had'a,
had'ani suni akuma had'a bofaa isa ijeefti.
Inni d'ad'a lafa ira dabre aka galaana yaufi;
laga aananifi dammi kee yaule inargu.
Inni waan hojate argate insooratu:
Yokhaani tirfi daldala ufi ira argate inyaatu;
wonti akanatiifi inni hiyyeesa dabse hiyyoomse,
ammalle mana nami d'ibiini jaaratele saame.
Inni sabdi, woma inquufu,
ammalle woma oli inkeeyatu.
Inni yo wo nyaatu woma inhambisu,
tanaafi horiini isaa hobaa.
Ato inni quufu, gaargali isa qabate,
badiini isa d'aqabdi.
Yo inni haga fed'u nyaate quufele,
Waaqi aka male isaati dallane,
tontomooni d'ae lafa buusa.
Hojja inni woraana dura baqachuni fed'u
t'iya sibiilaati isa woraana.
T'iyiti nafa isa keesa lit'e,
fiit'eeni isii
d'iiga isaa d'udde,
inni aka hama mudama.
Waan inni olkeyate ch'ufa balleesani;
ibidi nami harkaani imbobesiini
isaafi worra isaale ch'ufa gubba.
Gubbaani ch'ubbu isaa mulifte
laafteeni isa himati.
Hojja Waaqi iti dallanu,
mana isaatiifi waan inni qabu ch'ufa lolaani balleesani.
Aki Waaqi ch'ubbicha balleesu akasi,
sunini baddi Waaqi ch'ubbicha herege.

Jennaani Ayubuni waan jed'eeni:
Dubbi tiyya aka dansa ch'aqasa,
aki isaani garaa na jabeesitani ha hagasuma tahuti.
Qoomni anini dubbad'uuni naa kenna,
duuba eegi anini dubbad'e haga feetani na goyeesa.
Anini nama dubbi maani iraa qaba?
Yo anini obsuu baad'e maani nara qabdani?
Na dawaad'a mama, afaani qabad'a.
Hojja anini waan na tolchani heregu,
anini aka male nahe holad'a.
Ch'ubbichi maanifi lubbu bule jaare hori horata?
Worri ijoolleefi akhakhowani d'ale,
ilmaani suni ta olguddatu arga.
Waaqi mana worraa imballeesu,
worri soda womatu inqabu.
Koromini worraa bara ch'ufa goobde,
looni worraleeni, ka insaleesine,
aka dansa d'alani.
Ilmaani worraa buraat'e aka ilmoole hoola tabati,
kiraariifi fulludo d'oofte sirbiti.
Worri nagayaani tae,
gaargala male due, fulla ekheraa d'aqa.
Worri waan Waaqa guddaani jed'u,
Nu lakisi nu kara kanke beekhu imfeennu.
Atini qara maani, ka nu sii hojannu?
Yo nu si kad'annu, maani nu baata?
Worri waan jed'u, Nu irruma teennaani arganna,
ammo anini dandae herega worraa suni ee injed'u.
Ifse ch'ubbicha taka ya d'aamfani?
Worri akasi sunini tokoleeni taka gaargala ya argate?
Waaqi taka worra ch'ubbuti dallane,
aka buuyo qilleensi fuud'u fuud'e,
yokhaani aka awaara bubbeeni fuutu ya fuud'e?
Isani waan jettani, Waaqi maro wollaala abbaatifi ilmaani d'aana,
ammo dubbini sunini akasiniti.
Waaqi ha nama wollaala tolche wotolchuti;
nami wollaala tolchu ha aka maro wollaala ufiiti gaargala argatu beekhuti.
Nami wollaala tolchu ha gaargala ufii argate,
dallansu Waaqaa gudda arguuti.
Nami hojja guyyaani isaa gahe,
waan ilmaani isaa iyyaala?
Nami dandae Waaqa, ka hayyootale qoru, imbarsiisa?
Nami gari ato fayyaafi jabeenna qabu,
quufafi gammada keesa dua,
ka nafi isaa gabbinna qabu.
Ammo hagi toko gammada inqabu,
gaargalaani tae, gaargala keesa dua.
Ammo nami ch'ufti akuma taka due
awaalani raamooni nyaati.
Anini herega keesani,
ka isani mala hama natiini d'aatani, imbeekha.
Isani waan jettani,
mani namicha gudda kaani meeti,
ka duri hameenna tolche?
Isani ideemtuni woli inhaasoftani?
Isani odu worri d'ufuuni ind'ageenne?
Guyya Waaqi namati dallane nama d'aanu,
nami lubbu baasani ch'ubbicha ch'alla.
Nami ch'ubbicha himate,
waan inni tolche gula gati kennuufi injiru.
Hojja awaalati isa geesani,
awaala isaale aka dansa eegani,
nami hedduuni isa duraafi duubale yaa,
biyyeeni lafaleeni isati mioofti.
Ammo isani maafi dubbi woma keesa injirreeni
garaa na jabeesu feetani?
Dubbi isani naani jettani tana,
d'ara male d'ugaani keesa injirtu.

Jennaani Elifazini, ka gosa Temani, waan jed'eeni:
ka Waaqaa wo bahu, injiru?
Atini ato d'ugale gula deemte,
d'ugaani sunini Waaqa guddaa wobaati?
Yokhaani ato atini nama dansale taate,
dansumti sunini isaa qarqaarsa taati?
Waaqi waan atini isa sodaatufi
si gorse qorsumma si geesa?
Akasiniti inni waan atini ch'ubbu guddo tolchite,
hameenni kanke muumme d'abeefi akana si tolcha.
Siti duri oboleyaani tante iraa
woya qabdo fud'atte qulla lakise.
Atini nama dad'abi qabu bisaani d'owatte,
ka beela qabule sagale d'owatte.
Ato atini nama dureesa oobru guddo qabu
ka gurra qabule taate,
atini haad'a hiyyeesa qarqaaru didde,
ammalle ilmaani hiyyeeyile dabsite,
waan isii saamte.
Tanaafi amma tana t'ururaani moga ch'ufa si marse,
maro tokotu mudamsuuni si qabati.
Lafti siti dukanoofte,
woma argu dad'abde,
fach'ai bisaani sira deebie si liqimsa.
Waaqi achi olfago injiru?
Urjile, ato isiini olfago jiraatte,
ufi jalati ilaalu?
Ka atini teete, Waaqi maani beekha?
Isa dumansinu ind'ossa,
akami dandae nama qora? jettu.
Jaldooni dumansa lafa argu isa d'owarti,
ka inni jiddu lafafi gubba deemu.
Atini kara dullacha worri ch'ubbuu gula yau illakiftu?
Ato guyyaani worraa ingeenne bisaani fach'aani worra liqimsani.
Worri waan Waaqaani jed'e, Nu biraa deemi,
Waaqi guddaani, maani dandae nu tolcha?
Ammo nami worra horsiise Waaquma.
Anini herega worra ch'ubbuu dandae inhubad'u.
Nami dadansaani gammada qaba,
nami d'uga hojja nama ch'ubbicha ka d'aanani argu inkobla.
Waan ch'ubbichi qabu ch'ufa imballeesani,
waan hafele ch'ufa ibidati guba.
Amma tana Waaqaani wold'aqa,
nagayaani woliini taa;
yo atini akasi taate inni si eebisa.
Barsiisa inni si barsiisu fud'ad'i,
dubbi isaa garaa keesa keeyad'i.
Yo atini ufi diqeesite Waaqati deebite,
hameenna worra kanke keesa jiru ch'ufa keesaa baafte,
worqi tante lafati jissite,
worqi tante dandansa lagati gatte,
ammalle yo Waaqi guddaani worqifi qarsi sii tahe,
duuba atini hojja ch'ufa Waaqa gudda jaalate,
aka inni gammada sii kennu agarta.
Hojja atini isaa kad'attu, inni si d'agaye,
atinileeni kakhu tante guuta.
Waan tolchu feetu ch'ufa dabsate,
karaani kankeleeni ifsa sii taha.
Waaqi nama ufi guddisu diqeese,
nama ufi diqeesu baasa.
Yo atini ch'ubbu inqamne
waan d'uga tolchite, inni si baasa.

Jennaani Ayubuni waan jed'eeni:
Anini ammalle gungumsuufi morkiti Waaqaani morku yala imbahu,
yokhaani waachule illakisu.
Ato anini sila fulla inni jiru beekhe
fulla inni tahu d'aqe, akami dansa!
Anini waan kiyya ch'ufa iti himad'e,
aka dansa afaani kiyyaani ufii dubbad'a.
Anini waan inni naani jed'ufi
aka inni na jalaa qabu beekhuu fed'a.
Waaqi irre ufii ch'ufaani na dida?
Akasiniti, inni dubbi tiyya inch'aqasa.
Anini nama d'ugaati; dandae waan kiyya Waaqati himad'a;
inni dubbi tiyya qore, d'uga naa mura.
Yo anini barbaada isaa ilaboru deeme inni achi injiru
yo ila adu deemele achiti inargu.
Hojja inni mirgaafi bitaleti wo tolche
anini isa dandae inargu.
Ammo Waaqi ejata kiyya ch'ufa imbeekha.
Hojja inni na ilaalu anini aka worqi qulqulleesani iti fakaad'a.
Faanti tiyya ejata isa gula deemti,
anini kara isa taka ira ingorre.
Anini hojja ch'ufa seera isaa guute,
fed'i tiyya lakise ta isaa tolcha.
Inni injijiramu,
nami tokoleeni dandae waan inni fed'u imorkuuni.
Inni waan naa herege inguuta;
herega suni malele inni herega heddu d'ibi qaba.
Tanaafi anini hojja waan kana qaabad'u
isa durati mudama.
Waaqi guddaani ya garaa na laafise na mudamsise.
Nami na sodaachise sunini dukanaaniti,
Waaqa —
ato dukanti ila na d'owartele.

Waaqi guddaani maafi guyya qorsumma intolchini?
Nami isa beekhu maafi guyya suni barbaade d'aba?
Nami aka lafa ufi ballifatu d'akha seera guura;
ree biyyaa hatani ta ufiiti naqatani.
Harrele ilmaani hiyyeeyi iraa fud'atani,
sanga haad'a hiyyeesale qabdo fud'atani.
Hiyyeesa d'uga d'owani,
nama woma inqamnele baqachisani.
Tanaafi hiyyeeyiini akuma harre
diidaa lafa aloo keesa sagale barbaadati;
achi male dandaani fulla d'ibi ilmaani worraati sagale inargani.
Hiyyeeyiini oobru biyyaa murte
oobru ch'ubbicha keesa mid'aani zabibu guurti.
Halkanile woya male qulla bulani,
waan d'aamocha iraa d'owa d'abani.
Bokeeni gareeniti roobu worra jisse,
worri d'akha jalati baqate aka qobatu.
Ch'ubbichi daima abba inqamne tisse tolfate,
ilmaani hiyyeesaa qabdo fud'ata.
Ammo hiyyeeyiini woya d'abde qulla yaate,
ka woma garaa inqamne mid'aani biyya galchiti.
Worri mid'aani ejersa d'ad'a keesaa baase,
mid'aani zabibule daad'i keesa baasa,
ka ufiftu d'eebu injirre.
Dira keesati nami mada qabuufi
ka duu jiru iyye qarqaarsa kad'ata,
ammo Waaqi kad'acha suni ind'agayu.
Nama gariti jira ka ifsa didu;
worri ifsa inhubatu yokhaani gara inni deemu gula indeemu.
Ganama nami wo ijeesu lafaa kae
hiyyeesa ijeesu d'aqa;
halkani d'aqe wo hata.
Nami nad'eeni biyyaa d'aqu, d'ia adu eege,
namu na inargu jed'e d'okhate iti d'aabata.
Halkani hattuuni mana ch'absiti,
ammo guyya d'okhate, ifsa diddi.
Worri ifsa guyya sodaate,
dukana halkani jaalata.
Ati waan jettu,
Nama ch'ubbicha bisaaniti fach'ae fud'ata,
lafa isaale ya Waaqi abaare;
inni deebie oobru isa ta zabibu keesa inhojatu.
Akuma wonti qabanooftuuni hojja aduuni owite bat'u
akasuma ch'ubbichi due lafa iraa bada.
Haati isaaleeni deebite isa inqaabatu;
raamooni isa nyaate,
inni akuma mukhaa qaarie bada.
Wonti isa akasi tolchanifi waan inni nad'eeni hiyyeeyi dabse,
nad'eeni woma ind'aliinile nahu dideefi.
Waaqi irre isaatini worra jajaba balleese,
ch'ubbichale wo tolche hobaasa.
Waaqi yo fed'e, nagayaani isa teesise
ammo hojja ch'ufa ilaani isaa qorqorata.
Bulti diqo toko ch'ubbichi wo horata,
ammo eege aka raafu qanch'oorate
akuma guma badala ka buqisani, bada.
Nami waan kana mormu injira?
Nami dubbi tiyya tanaani d'ara jed'u injira?

Jennaani Bildadiini, ka gosa Shuhi, waan jed'eeni:
Waaqi jabeenna qaba;
nami ch'ufti isa sodaachu male;
inni gubba nagaya tolche, aka dansa fida.
Nami malaika isaa hojattu haga beekhu injira?
Fullaani ifsaani Waaqaa iti inifsiine injirti?
Nami akami dandae Waaqa durati d'uga qaba?
Nami uwii d'alu akami dandae qulqullo taha?
Isa durati jii kayyo inqabu,
urjileeni qulqullooniti.
Nami maani re, ka ufiftu raamofi buqata fakaatu?
Waaqa durati nami maani keesa jira?

Jennaani Ayubuni waan jed'eeni:
Qarqaarsi atini nama hiyyeesa laafa
aka kiyya kana kennitu kana?
Atini daalle aka kiyya kana akana gorsite,
qarooma kanke garsiifta?
Atini mala keeti,
waan nami dubbi tante tana ch'ufa d'agayu jiru seeta?
Eenuti dubbi tana si dubbisise?
(Bildadi)
Ekheraani bisaani lafa jala keesa jirtu holate,
fullaani Ekheraani teetu Waaqa durati imbanamti;
wonti tokoleeni ka fulla ekheraa suni Waaqa d'ossa injirtu.
Inni gubba gama mirga ballise,
lafa akanumati ka womati infannisiini raraase.
Nami dumansa bisaanini d'ud'ufeesu Waaqa,
inni dumansa ulfinna bisaanitini tarsauu d'owa.
Inni goobana dumansaani d'osse,
naanno baariini gubbaati mid'aase
akasiini ifsafi dukana gargari qoode.
Utubaani gubba chochoe holata,
hojja inni mudamsiisu.
Irreeni isaa baariini dabsate,
qalbiini isaa goorjama Rahabu jed'ani gargari ch'irte.
Hafuura isaati goorjama baariini ka baqatu ijeese.
Ammo tunini jabeenna isaa haguma diqa toko nu garsiifti;
wonti isaa ka nu ind'agiyiini, guddoti hafe!
Eenuti dandae d'uguma jabeenna Waaqa haga beekha?

Jennaani Ayubuni ammalle dubbi fuud'e waan jed'e:
Anini maqa Waaqa guddaa jirutiini kakhad'a,
ka d'uga na d'owe, jireenna nati had'eese —
haga Waaqi hafuura na keesaa infuud'ini,
afaani kiyya waan hamtu indubbatani,
arabi kiyyaleeni haga jiru d'ara indubaatu.
Anini haga jiru isani d'uga keesa jirtani injed'u.
Anini haga duuti wollaala qaba ufiini injed'u.
Anini dandae d'uga inqabu ufiini injed'u.
Garaani kiyya aka anini wollaala qabu inargu.
Nami had'e naani morku ch'ufti
ha aka nama ch'ubbicha d'uga inqamne hobauti.
Nami Waaqa imbeenne,
yo Waaqi lubbu iraa baase, abdiini isaa maani?
Yo gaargali iti d'ufe Waaqi boha isaa ind'agaya?
Inni Waaqa guddati ingammada?
Inni hojja ch'ufa Waaqa iyyaamata?
Anini waan jabeenna Waaqaa si barsiise,
waan Waaqi guddaani malate si garsiisa.
Amma isani eegi waan kana ch'ufa ila teesaniini agartani,
maafi teetani dubbi woma seesa injirre tana dubbatani?
(Sofari)
Aki Waaqi guddaani nama nama dabsu tolchu akana.
Inni ato ilmaani heddu d'alelle
ch'ufti woraanani hobaati;
ilmaani isaaleeni haga jirtu waan nyaatu inqabdu.
Nami isaa ka hafeleeni d'ukubaani hobaa.
Nad'eeni worraaleeni d'iirsoole isiiti imbootu.
Ato inni qarsi muumme inqamne oli keeyate,
woya aka biyye tana qabatele,
nami dadansaani d'ufe woya isaa suni naqate,
nami ch'ubbu inqamneleeni qarsi isaa suni qoodata.
Mani ch'ubbichi jaaru sapupa fakaata
yokhaani hoosa tisseeni
oobru keesati eeddu fakaata.
Guyya toko inni ato hori qabu gach'iise,
yo lafaa kau hori suni d'aba.
Mudamsuuni d'ufte aka lola isa fud'ate,
bubbeeni halkani isaani baddi;
bubbeeni ilaboruuti d'uftu isa olfuute
mana isaa keesaa fuute isaani baddi;
Bubbeeni sunini, ato isa lubbuuni d'ufte inni baqachuu fed'u,
naasu male isa d'oofti.
Bubbeeni ato inni baqatu bubbifte,
shawesa isiitiini isa mudamsiifte.

Fulla qarsi qotanifi boolati jira;
fullaani worqi iti qulqulleesanileeni injirti.
Sibiila guraacha, lafa keesaa qotani,
sibiila diimale d'akha iraa baasani.
Nami fulla guddo dukanootule keesa wobarbaade
qile boolale keesa d'akha qota.
Nami aka male fagaate,
fulla miili namaa taka ingahiini
ch'ufa d'aqe, lafa qote,
sibiila keesa barbaade,
achiti fulla namu injirre haada gula gadibue boola keesaa wo qota.
Sagaleeni lafa irati baate,
ammo lafuma suni, jala isii qotani garagalchani.
D'akhayeeni lafa dooqa qabdi,
awaarti isiileeni worqi qabdi.
Allaatiini kara d'ossa suni inagartu,
qoreleeni arti gubba imbariftu.
Nyeench'i, yokhaani bineensi janni aka isaaleeni,
kara ch'eekhicha suni maro tokole gula indeemu.
Nami d'akhaye jajabdu ch'ach'abse
gaareeni jala qote buqisa.
Inni ato d'akha qotu d'akhaye ch'uch'ulut'u arge.
Fulla galaani iraa bau qotani,
waan d'ossani ch'ufa mullisani.
Ammo qarooma Eesa argani?
Hubachaani eesati galti?
Qarooma dandaani nama keesati inargani?
Nami waan qaroomi namaa bahu beekhu injira?
D'immuuni bisaani qaroomi na keesa injiru jetti
baariinileeni inni na keesa injiru jed'a.
Dandaani qarsifi worqileeni imbitani.
Ammalle worqi dansaafi d'akhayeeni ch'ulut'uleeni
haga isa woma imbaatu.
Inni worqi ira jira,
dooqafi wonti worqiini mid'aasanileeni haga isa ingeetu.
Qaroomi d'akha adiifi d'akha ch'uluqafi,
d'akhaa diima ch'ulkichale ira jira.
D'akha had'ichafi worqi qulqulloole
dandaani qaroomani wolbira inqabani.
Qaroomi eesaa baha re?
Hubachaani eesati galti?
Wonti lubbu qaba ka dandae qarooma arga injirtu,
wonti gubba barisaleeni dandeete inargitu.
Badifi dootileeni, Odu isaa ch'alla d'ageenne jetti.
Waaqa ch'allati kara isaa hubate,
fulla inni bahufi beekha,
wonti akanatiifi inni muumme lafatifi
waan lafa gubba jira ch'ufa inarga.
Gaafa Waaqi bubbee irre kenne,
baariinile biime mid'aase,
gaafa inni seera bokaya kaye,
kara mandisuuni gula deemtule mid'aase,
gaafasi inni qarooma arge ilaalate,
dansuma isaa arge quufe.
sodaani Waaqaa qarooma,
ch'ubbu lakisitini hubacha.

Jennaani Ayubuni ammalle dubbi fuud'e waan jed'e:
Ato sila finni kiyya aka duri gaafa Waaqi na qorqoratu kaani jiraate, akami dansa!
Gaafasi Waaqi na woliini jira,
inni ato anini dukana keesa deemu ifsa naa kenne.
Gaafasi gaafa anini jabeenna qabu,
ka Waaqi jaala naa tahe worra kiyya eebise.
Waaqi guddaani gaafasi na woliini jira,
ilmaani tiyyale ch'ufa gaafasi wolumaani teenna.
Gaafasi anini aanani quufe,
qoda worra kiyya ch'ufa itituni guute;
mukeeni tiyya ta ejersaleeni
d'akhale ch'ufa gubbaati baati;
yo anini kora jaarolee dira d'aqe keesa tae,
nami diqaani ch'ufti olkae na dura gora,
jaaroleleeni na ulfeesite oli naa kaati.
Nami nama dura yauleni ch'allise afaani qabata;
nami gurra qabuleeni ch'ufti akanumati ch'allise ufuma ch'iisa.
Nami na d'agaye dansuma tiyya dubbate,
nami na argeleni quufa kiyya dubbate.
Yo hiyyeesi nati bohe anini inqarqaare,
ilmaani hiyyeeyile gaargala keesaa baase.
Nami duu jiruleeni na eebise,
anileeni haad'a hiyyeesale gammachiise.
Anini d'uga aka woya uyifad'e,
aka sure matati marad'e.
Anini ballaa ila tahe,
naafa miila tahe.
Anini hiyyeesa abba tahe,
nama fuula imbeennele ch'ufa qarqaare.
Anini irre nama nama dabsu balleese,
nama inni dabsule baase.
Anini waan guyyaani kiyya d'eerate
nagayaani worruma kiyya keesati duu sehe.
Anini aka mukha hiddi isaa bisaani quufe jira,
ka dameeni fit'eesoftu.
Nami ch'ufti hojja ch'ufa dansuma tiyya dubbate,
guyyaani toko ka anini jabeenna d'abe injiru.
Hojja anini biyya gorse,
biyyiti ch'allifte aka dansa
dubbi tiyya ch'aqafte;
yo anini dubbi buufad'e, nami deebie dubbatu injiru.
Dubbini tiyya akuma bokai lafa seenu qalbi namaa seente;
nami ch'ufti dubbi tiyya jaalate eege,
akuma nami oobru bokaya ganna eegatu.
Gaafa worri garaa laafe,
anini worrati qumaade garaa jabeese.
Anini gudda worraa tahe,
kara worri deemu fohad'e;
akuma hayyuuni duula ufitini deemu, worraani deeme,
hojja worri ufi jibbaate,
garaa worraa jabeese.

Ammo amma tana nama diqa hariya tiyya intahiiniti na goyeesa.
Anini worra suni duri abbooti worra tufad'e,
sare ree tiyya tissituleti indaru.
Worri sunini ufiftu ya hobae, maani na baha?
Worri hiyyoomate belae,
hidda gogeesa halkani lafa
alooti nyaachu fed'a.
Worri mukha lafa aloo bubuqise nyaate,
hidda gurbi ka imiomnele!
Nami ch'ufti worrati iye gusse,
akuma hattu iti iyyaani gussani.
Worri goda d'akhayetifi boola d'akhaye keesaa qotanile keesati gala.
Lafa aloo keesati aka harre baroodani,
gurbi jaalati wolti mamat'ane ch'iisa.
Worra woma imbeenne,
ka maqa inqamne,
lafa keesaa gussani!
Duuba amma ilmaani worra suni d'ufte na kofalti;
worri woma na insehu, tanaafi na goyeesa.
Worri na tufate,
nati d'iaachu dide hanch'ufa
fuulati na tufa.
Waan Waaqi na laafise irre na d'owefi,
worri aka male nati dallane.
Worri seseegi akana kunini na lakisu dide,
na gusse, lafa ira na balleesu fed'a.
Worri fiigu na d'owe na balleesu fed'a,
nami nara d'owu injiru.
Worri fulla ch'ufaani nati baafate,
nara bue na balleesa.
Anini aka male mudame,
gurri kiyya aka qilleensa bade,
duroomi aka dumansa ya naraa dabre.
Anini amma la duu gahe,
gaargali kiyya ya nati guddate na lakisu dide.
Halkani ch'ufa lafeeni na d'ukubde,
d'ukubi hojja ch'ufa tae na nyaatu, naraa badu dide.
Waaqi fiit'e woya na qabe,
woya tiyya mich'iire aka iraa gorse.
Darbe, d'oqe keesa na buuse,
anini awaarafi daara tahe.
Ee Waaqa, anini si yaamad'a,
ammo atini na jalaa didda;
yo anini si kad'ad'ule,
atini na jalaa inqabdu.
Atini aka hama naasu male na dabsita,
atini irree tante jabduuni na gaargalchita.
Atini bubbe nati ergite, isiini na butte,
bubbeeni sunini na d'oofte lafa na marsiti.
Anini imbeekha, atini duuisati na geesu jirta,
fulla nami ch'ufti d'aqu.
Atini nama bade, ufiftu tae naasu ch'alla kad'atu,
maafi teete haata?
Anini duri nama gaargala qabu woliini bohe,
hiyyeesaa innaane?
Hojja anini waan dansa barbaade, waan hamtu argad'e;
hojja anini ifsa eegad'e dukanati nati d'ufe.
D'ipufi heregi ya lafaa na hobaase;
guyya ch'ufa gaargalumati nati d'ufa.
Lafti nati dukanoofte, adu argu dad'abe;
anini gumi dura eje qarqaarsa kad'ad'a.
Waheli kiyya geedalaafi guchi.
Gogaani kiyya guraatae naraa luqae,
nafileeni ch'ufti na qand'ate.
Fulla duri sirba gammada iti d'agau,
amma tana oannafi boha d'agaya.

Anini yayu kakhad'e,
aka ato dubra argele ind'araanefi.
Waaqi guddaani maani nu tolcha?
Huji namati jed'e maani namaa kenna?
Inni nama waan hamtu tolche gaargalaani iti d'ufe imballeesu?
Inni kara kiyya arge ejata kiyya ch'ufa haga imbeekhu?
Yo anini ch'ubbu hojad'e,
kiyyibaani deeme nama sobe —
Waaqi ha d'ugaani qore,
aka anini ch'ubbu inqamne arguuti.
Yo anini kara iraa gore ilti tiyya ch'ubbu keesa na buufte,
yokhaani harki kiyya t'urae,
oobru tiyya ha balleesani, yokhaani nami d'ibiini
waan anini oobrad'e ha nyaatu.
Yo anini taka nad'eeni biyyaati d'arae,
balbala jalati d'okhad'e eege,
niitiini tiyya ha nama d'ibi sagale d'aabde
sire isaa ira woliini rafaniti.
Hameenni akasi sunini waan duati nama geesa.
Woni suni sila ibida wo balleesu,
ka fulla duati wo geesu,
ka hori kiyya ch'ufa gubu fakaati.
Yo anini hojattu tiyya ta uwatifi
ta d'iirale gaafa worri na himate dabse,
hojja Waaqi na gaafate anini maani taha?
Hojja Waaqi dubbi suni barbaade anini maani jed'aani?
Namuma na uumeeti worrale uumeniti?
Namuma takati nu d'aleeniti?
Anini taka hiyyeesa qarqaaru indinne,
yokhaani nad'eeni hiyyeeyile nahu indinne
yokhaani taka sagale tiyya koba nyaad'e
ilmaani haad'afi abba inqamne ind'owanne.
Haguma kaimoma kiyyati anini akuma abba
ilmaani suni guddise
nad'eeni hiyyeeyile qorqorad'e.
Hojja nama hiyyoomate woya bitachu dad'abe arge
anini woya liilani dabasa hooliye tiyya iraa mid'aasani kenneefi.
Duuba inni garaa isaa ch'ufaani na eebise.
Yo waan anini jaarole dubbi qortu beekhufi
anini ilmaani haad'afi abba inqamne dabse,
harka kiyya ha ch'absani,
gurmu tiyya ira ha buqisani,
waan Waaqa sodaad'ufi anini waan akana dandae intahu.
Anini taka worqi dugeefad'e abdi intolfanne,
yokhaani, hori gudda qaba jed'e taka inkiyyimne.
Anini taka ifsa adutifi mid'aaguma jia jaalad'e inkad'anne.
Anini taka soba nami na sobe aduufi jia harka iti
qabi d'ungad'i guddisi naani jed'e, gula imbaane.
Ch'ubbuuni akasi sunini waan nama ijeesaati,
ta Waaqa gudda mormatani.
Hojja nyaapi kiyya gaargala argate d'ipate bade,
anini taka ira ingammanne;
anini taka, Waaqi isani ijeesinna jed'e worra inabaare.
Nami na hojatu ch'ufti imbeekha,
aka anini keessuma gololchu.
Anini nama imaltu deemu taka ka mana kiyya imbulchini alaati illakimne.
Biyyiti daba ufi d'ossiti,
anini ammo taka kiyya ind'ossine.
Anini taka dubbi biyya sodaad'e
ch'allise manati inhamne
maro goyeesa worra sodaad'ufi.
Nami tokoleeni dubbi tiyya inch'aqasu?
Anini inkakhad'a, aka dubbini tiyya d'ugaa.
Waaqi guddaani ha naa himuuti.
Ato sila waan nyaapi kiyya naani himate t'aafani na garsiisani,
anini sila gurmu tiyya irati baad'e,
aka sure matati marad'e kiyyibaani.
Anini sila waan tolchu ch'ufa Waaqati hime,
aka nama guddaa isa dura eja.
Yo anini lafa qotad'u hate,
irreeni abba isii iraa fuud'e,
yokhaani yo anini sagale oobru suni keesaa baatu nyaad'e,
abba oobru suni beelaani ijeese,
fulla sila dargayefi garbu, buuyofi qoraatini
ha oobru suni keesati baatu.
Dubbini Ayubu asi buufatti.

Waan Ayubuni d'uga iraa bahu dide anini wollaala inqabu ufiini jed'eefi, jari sadeeni kaani iraa ch'allise.
Ammo namichi toko, ka Elihu jed'ani, ka d'aatu eju, aka Ayubuni ufi d'ugeese Waaqa himate d'ageennaani, dallansu d'owachu dad'abe. (Elihuni ilma Barakeli, ka worra Buzi, balbalti isaa Ramu.)
Inni jaalani Ayubu taani sadeenileeti dallane, waan worri dubbi isaa d'aareesu dad'abe, akasiini waan Waaqi wollaala qabu fakeesefi.
Inni waan worra kaani ch'ufa ira maand'atifi haga worri kaani dubbatu ch'ufa afaani qabate.
Inni aka jari kaani sadeeni dubbi Ayubu dad'abe arginaani dallane
waan jed'e:
Anini Kaima, ammo isani jaarole,
tanaafi herega kiyya isani garsiisu sodaad'e.
Anini eegi jaaroleeni tunini nama wobule
ha qarooma ufi garsiiftu jed'e.
Ammo lubbu Waaqa guddati d'ufe qarooma namaa kenna.
Nami wobeekhu jaarole ch'allaniti,
nami wohubatu nama wobule ch'allaniti.
Tanaafi amma na ch'aqasa,
waan anini herege isaniti hima.
Anini haga isani dubbatani
dubbi qajeeltu barbaadani ch'ufa,
ufuma obse isani ch'aqasa.
Anini aka dansa isani ch'aqase,
ammo isani waan jettani ya d'abdani;
isani dubbi Ayubu ya d'aareesu dad'abdani.
Nu qarooma qamna injed'ina;
dubbi isaa Waaqa male nami ind'aaresu.
Ayubuni naani indubbanne, isaniini dubbate male,
ammo anini aka isani jettaniini injed'uuni.
Ayubu, worri ya ufi jibbaate, waan jed'u d'abe.
Waan worri waan jed'u wollaale ufuma ejaanjufi
anileeni afaani qabachu male?
Akasiniti, anini amma wojed'e,
herega kiyya isani garsiisa.
Anini dandae afaani qabad'e inoobsu,
anini dandae inch'allisu,
woiti na dubbisa.
Yo anini qoomni dubbad'uuni d'abe,
anini aka gorjo d'aadiini hareetini miju tarsaa.
Anini dandae inoobsu,
afaani guutad'e dubbachu male,
anini dubbi tana keesa nama tokole ira inchiisu,
yokhaani nama ind'ugeesu.
Anini dubbi namaa kuru imbeekhu,
yo anini akasi tae Waaqi yoosu na balleesa.

Ayubu amma waan anini jed'u ch'ufa,
aka dansa ch'aqasi,
anini diquma wo indubbanne dubbini araba ira na teteeti.
Anini garaa tokooni dubbad'a,
dubbini tiyya ch'ufti ta d'ugaati.
Lubbuuni Waaqa na uumte,
hafuuri Waaqa gudda jireenna naa kenne.
Yo dandeete dubbi naa deebisi,
waan jechu feetu kurfefad'i.
Anaafi sii Waaqa durati haguma taka,
nuu lachu biyye ira mid'aasani,
tanaafi wonti atini na sodaatufi injirtu;
anini si indabsad'u.
Dubbini atini jette ta anini d'agaye tana:
Anini qulqullo, woma iyyakine,
ch'ubbule inqabu.
Ammo Waaqi nyaapa nati tahe,
kara naani had'u nati barbaada.
ejata kiyya ch'ufa keesa na eega, jetta.
Ammo anini waan sini jed'u,
Atini ya wollaalte,
Waaqi nama ch'ufa ira jira.
Atini maanifi teete Waaqaani,
Dubbi nama ind'ageetu jetta?
Ato Waaqi kara hedduuni dubbatele,
nami waan inni jed'u inch'aqasu.
Waaqi oobjufi daayya keesa namaani dubbata.
Inni gurra nama bane gorsaani nama mudamsiisa.
Wonti inni worraani dubbatufi,
aka worri daba iraa gore kiyyiba lakisu.
Inni worra badi d'owe, duisa hanqisa.
Waaqi nama d'ukuba iti erge
nafa d'ukubse, akasiini qajeelcha.
Duuba nami suni sagale jibba,
sagaleeni dansaleeni iti imioftu.
Nafa isaa ch'ufa fooni ira d'umatani,
lafeeni isaa diidati gayaati;
inni ya fulla ekhera deemu gahe.
Hegeri malaikaani d'ufte isa qarqaarti —
malaikaani toko ta gumi malaika Waaqa,
ta kara dansaati nama qajeelchitu.
Maro naasutifi malaikaani waan jettu,
Isa gad'iisi, isa fulla ekherati gabu d'owi.
Anini ya waan isaani baasu arge, kuno tana.
Nafi isaa deebie fooni baase jabaate kaima taha;
hojja inni Waaqa kad'atu inni isaa d'agaya;
inni Waaqa arge gammade,
Waaqileeni kara d'ugaati isa deebisa.
Duuba inni biyya dura d'ufe waan jed'u,
Anini ya daba tolche,
waan hamtu tahe, ammo Waaqi na baase.
Inni fulla ekhera d'aqu na d'owe,
tanaafi anini amma jira.
Waaqi waan kana maro lamafi sadi fa tolcha;
inni lubbu nama duu baase,
ifsa jireenna kennaafi.
Amma, Ayubu, dubbi tiyya ch'aqasi;
ch'allisi, waan anini jed'u d'agayi.
Ammo yo waan jettu qabaate jed'i;
yo atini d'uga dubbate sii d'ugeesa.
Ammo yo waan jettu qabaachu baate,
ch'allisi, na ch'aqasi,
anati qarooma si barsiisa.

Ammalle Elihuni waan jed'e,
Isani worri qarooni, ka guddo wo beekhu,
waan anini jed'u ch'aqasa.
ammo yo dubbi qaro d'ageetani waan isii inhubatani.
Waan d'uga fohanna,
waan dansa woliini baranna.
Ayubuni waan jed'u,
Anini ch'ubbu inqabu,
ufuma Waaqi d'uga na d'owe male.
Ato d'uga qabad'ele kiyyiba naani jed'ani;
ato ch'ubbu inqamnele,
madaani tiyya haguma jirtu infayyitu.
Isani nama aka Ayubu kana,
ka diqole Waaqaa inch'eere, taka gartani?
Inni goli worra ch'ubbu tahe,
nama dabaatiini woliini deema.
Inni waan jed'u,
Ato nami d'uga Waaqa gula deemele woma imbaatufi.
Me, isani worri hubacha, qabu na ch'aqasa!
Waaqi guddaani dandae ch'ubbu tolcha?
ammalle isi gula wo bahafi.
Waaqi guddaani ch'ubbu intolchu,
yokhaani nama indabsu,
Ee hayi, Waaqi jabeenna ufi nama ira argate?
Namati hayyu lafaa isa tolche?
Yo Waaqi hafuura jireenna nama keesa fuud'e,
nami ch'ufti hobae biyyeeti deebia.
Amma tana yo qalbi qabate, na ch'aqasi.
Atini Waaqa d'ugaa wollaala iti murta?
Atini waan inni d'uga jibbu seeta?
Waaqi, hayyuuni atini woma keesa injirtu jed'e
worra lafa fiduleeni, Isani worra ch'ubbu jed'a.
Inni worra lafa fidu ira ch'iise,
dureesa jaalate hiyyeesa injibu,
wonti akanatiifi nama ch'ufa isumati uume.
Nami halkani tassa dua.
Waaqumati d'ae isa ijeese,
nama irre qabule dubbi male hobaasa.
Inni ejata nama ch'ufa jabeese eega.
Dukanti sipeeni, ta ch'ubbicha Waaqa dura d'ossitu, injirtu.
Waaqi guyya nama wollaala iti muru
waan tolfatufi inqabu.
Inni, ka nama d'ibi ingaafanne, worra lafa fidu fuud'e,
nama d'ibi fulla isaani kaa.
Maro huji worra beekhufi,
inni halkani worra gaargalche balleesa.
Inni, ato nami ch'ufti argu,
worra ch'ubbu gaargalcha,
waan worri isa iraa gore
kara isaa yaalu dideefi.
Worri hiyyeeyi dabse,
maro sunifi isiini Waaqati boonnani
inni qarqaarsa worri kad'atu d'agayeefi.
Yo Waaqi ch'allise, eenuti dandae waan isa dubbata?
Yo inni fuula d'ofate, eenuti dandae isa arga?
Woni nami dandae tolchu injirtu,
aka nama Waaqa imbeenne ka nama dabse lafa fidu, ufi ira d'owu.
Ayubu, atini daba kanke Waaqati himate,
ch'ubbu iti indeebiu ya jetteeni?
Atini Waaqaani, wollaala kiyya na garsiisi ya jette?
Atini aka waan hamtu lakiftu ya ee jette?
Waan atini waan Waaqi tolche quufu diddeefi,
waan inni waan atini feetu tolchu seeta?
Dubbini gara kiyya injirtu, gara kanke jirti,
waan atini heredde nati himi.
Nami wo beekhu naa d'ugeesa;
nami qalbi qabu, ka na d'agayu, waan jed'u:
Ayubuni waan imbeenne dubbata,
dubbini isa woma keesa injirtu.
Waan Ayubuni jed'e ch'ufa herega;
aka inni aka nama ch'ubbu dubbatu inagartani.
Ch'ubbu inni qara hojate lakisi,
amma inni Waaqaani morku jira;
ila teenna ch'ufa durati tae,
harka d'aane, Waaqa goyeesa.

Jennaani Elihuni waan Ayubuni jed'e,
Jechi atini, Anini nama d'uga ufiini jettu kunini,
Waaqa durati dansa seeta?
Yokhaani yo atini Waaqaani,
ch'ubbuuni tiyya maani si tolchiti,
yokhaani yo anini ch'ubbu lakise maani argad'a jette, akasi dansa?
Anini ammatana siifi jaalani tante waan jed'uuni qaba.
Gubba millad'i, aka dumansi olfago ilaali!
Yo atini maro heddu ch'ubbu tolchitele
maani dandeete Waaqa tolchita?
Yo atini nama d'uga taate maanini Waaqa qarqaarta?
Wonti Waaqi sira fed'u injirti?
Nami maro ch'ubbu tanteetifi gaargala argatu
nama aka kanketi,
yo waan dansa tolchitele nami qarqaarsa argatu isuma.
Nami Hojja dabsani iniyya;
worri iyye nyaapa dura nu baasa namaani jed'a.
Ammo worri Waaqa worra uume,
ka gaargala keesale worra qarqaaru, qarqaarsa inkad'atu.
Worri Waaqa bineensafi simpirre ch'ufa
ira qalbi nuu kenne inkad'atu.
Worri iyye Nu qarqaari jed'a,
ammo Waaqi jalaa inqabu,
wonti akanatiifi worri ch'ubbicha,
ammalle kiyyiba qaba.
Wonti worri bohufi injirtu,
wonti akanatiifi Waaqi guddaani worra ind'agayu,
yokhaani worra inargu.
Ayubu, atini anini Waaqa dandae inargu jette;
obsi, waan inni sii tolchu eegi.
Atini waan Waaqi nama ingaargalchine seeta?
Yokhaani waan inni ch'ubbicha odu inkaamne seeta?
Atini waan jettu imbeetu,
tanaafi wonti atini teete dubbatufi injirtu.

Ammalle Elihuni waan jed'e,
Me, diqo obsi, anini Waaqaa dubbad'a, na ch'aqasi.
Anini guddo wo beekha;
anini beekhuma kiyyaani aka Waaqi na uume,
Waaqa d'ugaa si garsiisa.
Wonti anini jed'u tokoleeni d'ara inqabdu;
anini nami si dura eju kunini,
aka male wobeekha.
Waaqi guddo jabeenna qaba!
Inni nama tokole intufatu,
wonti inni imbeenne injirtu.
Inni worra ch'ubbu lubbu imbaasu,
ammo hiyyeesa waan maleefi kenna.
Inni nama d'uga qabu qorqorate,
fulla hayyooti teetu teesise,
haga jiru jireenna ulfinna kennaafi.
Ammo hojja maro hameenna isanitifi
worra sansalatani hid'ani,
Waaqi ch'ubbufi kiyyiba worraa garsiisa.
Inni gurra worra bane, worra gorse, Hameenna ira deebia jed'aani.
Yo worri Waaqa saalfate hojateefi,
worri hormatafi nagayaani taa.
Ammo yo worri saalfachufi dide,
worri beekha male woraanani dua.
Nami Waaqa imbeenne dallansu illakisu,
yo inni worra gaargalchule qarqaarsa inkad'atani.
Ato kaimaatu duani, ch'eeraani hobaani.
Ammo Waaqi gaargalaani wo nama barsiise,
d'ipuni ila namaa bana.
Waaqi gaargala keesaa si baase,
nagaya sii kenne si gammachiise;
ammalle sagale guddo si kenne si quubsa.
Ammo amma tana waan sii male, gaargala ya argate.
Ufi eegad'i gumbooni si sobde,
beeseeni kara d'uga iraa si imballeesini.
Ato atini qarqaarsa bootele woma inargattu,
irreeni tante ta duri amma si inqarqaartu.
Halkani ind'araini hojja gochiti hobaatu.
Eegad'i, aka garagalte ch'ubbu keesa inseene;
aka ch'ubbu ira si d'owanifi gaargala kana siti ergani.
Qabad'i aka irreeni Waaqa guddo.
Eenuti aka isaa dandae wo barsiisa?
Eenuti, Akana tahi isani jed'a?
Yokhaani eenuti ya woyakite jed'aani?
Maro huji isatifi guyya ch'ufa isa faarsani
atinileeni isa faarsu malte.
Nami ch'ufti waan inni tolchu ya arge,
ammo nami tokoleeni ka waan suni ch'ufa hubatu injiru.
Nu dandeenne guddinna Waaqa ch'ufa inhubannu,
yokhaani ganna isaa haga imbeennu.
Waaqati bisaani lafaa fuud'e bokaya tolcha.
Ammalle bokaya suni dumansa keesa roobe,
nama ch'ufa bisaanini bad'aasa.
Nami tokoleeni, ka aka dumansi deemufi aka mandisuuni
gubba gara Waaqati manditu, beekhu injiru.
Inni angaasu gubba ch'ufati angae,
ammo d'immuuni bisaani dukana keesati hafti.
Aki inni nama gololche,
sagaleeni nama quubsu akana.
Inni harka ufitini, angaasu qabate, qaweeni wo tarsaasa.
Mandisuuni bokaya d'ufu himti,
loonileeni aka inni roobu imbeekhani.

Bokeeni sunini onne tiyya chochoosa.
Isani ch'ufti qonqo Waaqa ch'aqasa,
mandisu afaani isaa keesa baatu.
Inni angaasu muumme lafa tana fuud'e,
taaniti d'aabe, gubbaati angaa.
Duuba eege, qonqo isaa ta manditu, d'agayani,
qonqo mandisu guddo, ta yo ch'ufa angaasuuni woliini jirtu.
Jecha Waaqaa gula wonti mama taati,
wonti taka inargini, ta nami dandae inhubanne.
Inni hagayyaani, roobi jed'e,
gannaani, gabad'i jed'a.
Inni huji nama ch'ufaa ejachise,
aka huji hojatu nama garsiisa.
Bineensileeni goda ufiti baqata.
Bubbeeni jabduuni bitaa d'ufte,
d'aamochi hamani mirgaa d'ufa,
hafuuri Waaqa bisaani qabaneese d'akha tolcha.
Angaasuuni dumansa keesa angaati,
ato dumansi fed'i Waaqa gula gubba deemu.
Dumansi suni fed'i Waaqa gula fulla ch'ufa yaa.
Waaqi bokaya lafati rooba;
bokeeni sunini gaargala namaatiini d'ufa,
yokhaani eeba namatini d'ufa.
Ayubu me miila d'abad'i,
waan mama ka Waaqi tolchu heregi.
Atini aka Waaqi dubbate angaasu dumansa keesa angau imbeeta?
Atini aka dumansi gubba deeme,
qalbi Waaqaa guddo garsiisu beeta?
Atini gaafa qilleensi bitaa lafa balleesu,
ufuma teete owani doota.
Atini dandeete Waaqa qarqaarte,
gubba ballifte jabdu aka sibiila diima tolchita?
Waan nu Waaqaani jechu male nu barsiisi:
nu dukanuma keesa jira waan jennu imbeennu.
Aka anini Waaqaani dubbachu fed'u iti himani?
Nami tokoleeni Waaqaani na balleesi injed'a?
Amma tana nami tokoleeni dandae adu ilaalu.
Isiini bibilit'eti ilati nama ejiti;
bubbeeleeni yayu gubba harte qulqulleesite.
Waan aka worqi bibiliqa mirgati argani,
guddinni Waaqa nu mamsiisa.
Nu dandeenne Waaqa gudda ind'aqamnu,
jabeenna isaa dandeenne iti ind'iaannu;
inni nama indabsu, d'uga gula nama qajeelcha.
Tanaafi aki nami ch'ufti isa sodaatu mama inqabdu,
wonti akanatiifi inni nama qaro ufi sehu woma ira inqabu.

Jennaani AABBO Waaqi bubbe keesa Ayubuni dubbate waan jed'e,
Atini Eenu, ka qarooma kiyya dubbi tante daalliti woma keesa injirreeni moromtu?
Amma aka d'iira kai, oli eji,
wo si gaafachu fed'a,
waan anini si gaafad'u naa deebisi.
Gaafa anini duri yayaba lafa jaare atini arti jirta?
Yo atini guddo wo beete, me naati himi.
Eenuti haga isiini gahu malte herege?
Eenuti ballinna isi haadani biime?
Atini waan kana ch'ufa imbeeta?
Maaniti utuba lafa tind'isu jabeesa?
Eenuti d'akha lafa ka yayaba kae?
Guyya suni bakalchi ganama woliini sirbe
malaikaleni gammadani iyyite.
ta bisaani baariini d'owartu, ch'ufe,
gaafa bisaani suni garaa lafa keesaa buani?
Nami baariini dumansaani d'osse dukanaani duuche anuma.
Anini baariini seera tolche,
balbala iti mid'aase qulfe.
Anini armaa tai, armaa garu indabriini,
d'awani tante jabduleeni ha armumati ejattu jed'eeni.
Ee Ayubu, atini taka lafaani, Barii ya jette?
Atini taka biiftuuni, lafa qabi,
ch'ubbicha fulla inni iti d'okhate gabaasi ya jette?
Guyyaani gaarafi baleele akuma dachaa woya mullisa,
akuma beesisa d'oqe faara irati mullatu.
Ifsaani guyyaa ch'ubbicha adaate waan d'iba hamtu ka inni sila tolchu d'owa.
Atini taka madda d'immu bisaani keesa jirtu ya d'at'e?
Atini taka bisaani baariini keesa lit'e,
lafa ira ya deemte?
Nami taka balbala fulla ekheratini d'aqani
ya si garsiise?
Yokhaani balbala dukana sipe taka agarte?
Atini haga lafti geetu diqole hubata?
Yo waan kana ch'ufa beete, nati himi.
Atini fulla ifsaani bahufi beeta?
Atini dandeete haga fageenna
worri deemu male ingarsiifta?
Yokhaani dandeete keesa indeebifta?
Anini imbeekha, inuma dandeeta,
wonti akanatiifi gaafa lafa uumanile achuma jirta!
Atini taka fulla anini iti wo olkeyad'u d'at'e,
qabanaafi bokaya ya agarte?
Anini guyya gaargala, ka woraanafi had'iisatifi,
waan suni olkaye.
Atini fulla aduuni baatufi
fulla bubbeeni ilaboru d'uftufi ya d'at'e?
Eenuti kara bokaya qote,
kara mandisuuni d'uftu hare?
Eenuti lafa aloo, fulla nami injirre,
bokaya iti rooba?
Eenuti lafa bonte gogode bokaya iti roobe
marra iti baasa?
Bokayafi fit'eesi abba qabani?
Haati ligidafi ta qabana eenu?
Bisaani ch'ufti jabaatani d'akhaa taani,
baariinileeni qabanae ligidae.
haada Arbagaadu wolti hid'u, dandeete gargari hiita?
Atini dandeete urji kara qajeelchite,
torbaanifi lamile dandeete kara garsiifta?
Atini seera gubbaa beeta?
Seera suni dandeete, ka lafaa intolchita?
Atini dandeete dumansaani lolte,
bisaani muumme inqamne gadi imbuufta?
Atini dandeete angaasu angaasifte,
isiini d'ufte, Anini kuno siini jetti?
Eenuti hojja galaani Nile fach'au dakhayeti hima?
Eenuti aka bokai roobu bararatooti hima?
Eenuti qalbi dumansaani hedu qaba?
Eenuti dandae butte gubbaa qaarise
bokaya biyye d'oqe tolchu keesaa jisse?
Atini sagale nyeench'i nyaatu imbarbaadafi?
Yokhaani kuble nyeench'a ta beela qabdu,
ta goda keesati d'okhate wo eegatu, inquubsita?
Eenuti haranqeesa beelaa lafa maru,
ka ilmaani isa sagale nati bootu, nyachisa?

Atini gaafa reeni abba inqamne,
ta gaareeni irati galtu, d'alate imbeeta?
Atini aka hiddini d'altu taka ya laalte?
Atini haga isiini ilme garaati baatu imbeeta?
Atini gaafa isiini d'altu imbeeta?
Atini hojja isiini gach'iifte ilmaani d'altu imbeeta?
Ilmaani isi alati jajabaate, guddate,
kaate iti d'aabati,
deebite haad'ati indeebitu.
Eenuti harre diida tikha male gad'iise?
Eenuti haada ira hiikhe gad'iise?
Anini lafa aloo diida soodda kenneefi
aka isiini iti galtu.
Harreeni suni iyyana dira iraa fagaate,
nami tokoleeni ka dandae worra lenjise hojachiifatu injiru.
Gaareeni fulla isiini tikhattu,
ta worri waan dotaatu ka nyaatu iraa barbaadu.
Gafarsi aka si hojatu ee injed'a?
Halkani tokole moona tante keesa imbula?
Atini dandeete haadani isa hiite lafaani inqotata?
Yokhaani dandeete isa oobru tante maarashaani inqochisifta.
Atini irre isaa abdate, huji tante jabdu iti illakifta?
Atini waan inni dandae mid'aani sii galche oobditi sii geesu seeta?
Guchini akami gammadani koola hargufati!
Ammo taatule guchini tokoleeni dandeete
aka baabo alloona imbariftu.
Isiini okhokaani isii biyye keesa nat'i,
aka biyyeeni owiftu.
Isiini aka miili woi ira ejate ch'arase, bineensi alalleni ch'ach'absu imbeetu.
Isiini aka waan okhokaani sunini ka isii intahiini taate,
aka hujiini isi lafati badu iyyaaltu.
Nami daallese qalbi d'owe anuma.
Yo isiini utaalchaa kaate,
fardafi yaabatu isale inkofalti.
Nami farda jabeenna kenneefi gama iti tolche sii?
Siti aka awaanisa isa kukuripachise,
imimsu isaatini nama sodaachisa?
Inni deema fed'afi tae,
bale keesa lafa haad'ate,
irre ufitini;
ch'ee had'iisati iti d'aabata.
Inni waan tokole insodaatu,
goraadele ind'eetu,
woraani nami isa yaabatu harkaa qabu
adu keesati qilise bibiliqa.
Ch'eisa malamale, kae barise iti d'aabata;
hojja magalata d'aani inni dandae ufuma ineju.
Hojja magalata d'aani ch'ufa inni inimimsa;
ato fago jiru inni had'iisa suufe,
lalaba abbaani duula lalabu d'agaya.
Qoreeni aka koola ballifte
bita bariftu sira baratti?
Risaani, dubbi tante gula,
gaara korre gubbaati mana jaarata?
Inni fiit'e gaara irati mana jaarate achi tae,
rarra d'akha worra tolfata.
Arti iraa fago laale waan ijeese nyaatu barbaada.

AABBO Waaqi waan Ayubuni jed'e,
Atini Waaqaani morkiti, amma illakifta mo?
Waan d'ibi jettu qabda?
Jennaani Ayubuni waan Aabbo Waaqaani jed'e,
AABBO Waaqa, anini qara aka daalle dubbad'e
amma maani dandae sini jed'a?
Anini qara waan jechu malani ch'ufa ira dabarse dubbad'e,
amma dubbi jed'u inqabu.
Jennaani bubbe keesa AABBO Waaqi ammalle Ayubuni dubbate.
Kai, aka d'iira oleji,
wo si gaafad'a, nati himi.
Atini aka anini d'uga inqamne garsiisu feeta?
Atini nama d'uga ufi tolchite
nama d'uga inqamne na tolchu feeta?
Atini aka kiyya jabaa?
Qonqooni tante aka tiyyaa imandiiti?
Yo akasi taate,
guddinnaafi ulfinna kanke sunini olkai;
guddinnaafi ulfinna kanke suni uyifad'i.
Worra kiyyiba ilaali,
guddisi iti dallani, tufad'i.
Worra suni ilaali, kiyyiba iraa galchi;
fulla ch'ubbichi eju isa bulleesi.
Biyye keesati worra ch'ufa awaali;
hid'i, fulla ekhera geesi.
Yo atini akasi taate, nami qaraa ka si faarse,
atini ya qofuma wodabsate sini jed'u, anuma.
Me, gorjama Behemothi jed'ani ilaali;
siifi isale anumati uume.
Inni aka looni marra nyaata,
ammo nafi isaa akami irree qaba,
fooni isaa akami jabaatani!
Eegeni isaa akuma ind'eesa oliqajeelti
fooni miila isaa akami jajabaatani!
Lafeeni isaa akuma sibiila diima jabaati,
miili isaa akuma ule sibiila jira.
Inni waan anini uume ch'ufa ira jaba!
Wonti isa dabsata anuma isa uume ch'alla
Marri inni nyaatu gaareeni gubbaati baha,
fulla bineensi tabatu.
Inni mukha qoraati jala boqote,
ch'affa illaaduu keesati d'okhata.
Mukha qoraatitiifi gaaleeni afaani laga
gaadisa isaa taati.
Inni laga yau insodaatu
yo bisaani galaana Yordani fuula
isaa d'aani inni woma intau.
Eenuti dandae ila isa duuche, akasiini isa qaba?
Eenuti dandae t'ururaani isa qabe,
funani isaa woraana?

qabde araba isaa haadani hiita?
Atini dandeete haada funani isaa keesa keete,
boqo isa hookoni woraanta?
Inni, Na gad'iisi jed'e si kad'ata?
Yokhaani naasu si kad'ata?
Inni wold'aqisa si woliini tolfate,
aka sii hojatu ee jed'a?
Atini aka simpirre dubarti si hojatuleeni tabatuni qabde woliini tabata?
Daldaltuleni gati isa irati wold'abdi? Nagaadeeni gargari ch'irte gurgurti?
Atini dandeete goga isaa maro heddu hooko qurt'umitini woraanta?
Yokhaani dandeete mata isa woraanani tumata?
Yo guyya toko tut'e, sodaa deebite iti indeebitu;
had'iisa inni si had'u haga jirtu indeetu!
Nami gorjama argu hojuma suni mudame lafa d'aa.
Inni yo dallane aka male hama;
nami tokoleeni dandae garaa jabaate isa dura ineju.
Eenuti dandae isa had'e duraa baha?
Nami dandae akasi tolchu tokoleeni injiru.
Me, waan miila goorjama siti hime,
aka inni jaba hama si barsiisa, ch'aqasi.
Eenuti dandae goga isaa jaba suni iraa baasa?
Yokhaani eenuti dandae goga isa yabbicha suni woraana.
Eenuti dandae boqo isaa ta ilkaani gagadeeni nama sodaachisani suni iti ejaanjani, bana?
Dudda isa waan aka wonte hedduuni mid'aasani,
ta hod'ani aka d'akhaa jabaatu.
Wonte suni ch'ufa aka jaba wolti hod'ani
qilleensi dandae jiddu inseenu.
Wonteeni sunini aka male wolti ejiti,
wonti dandae gargari baasi injirtu.
Hojja inni hat'ifatu, ifsaani iraa biliqe,
ilti isaa akuma adu diirama baatu ifsiti.
Afaani isaa keesaa ibidi bobae,
qaanqeeni isa keesa oriti.
Funani isaa aari keesaa bahe,
akuma aara buuyo jiitu
okote jalaafi gubbaani keesaa bahu.
Hafuuri isaa ibida bobeese;
bobai ibida afaani isaa keesa baha.
Lumeeni isa guddo jabdu,
nami isaa argu ch'ufti imudama.
Goga isaa fullaani toko laaftuni injirtu;
akuma sibiila jabaata, diqole ilalaafu.
Garaani isaa d'akhaa, woma insodaatu;
akuma d'akhaa daakhu jabaata, ka diqole illaamne.
Yo inni olkau, nami jajabaaleeni sodaate,
lubbuuni d'ufte waan tau wollaala.
Goraadeeni tokoleeni ta dandeete isa woraantu injirtu;
woraanafi t'iyiti ta isa woraantu injirtu.
Sibiili guraachi aka buuyo iti laafa,
sibiili diimaleeni hoofa mukha iti fakaata.
T'iyiti isa baqachiftu injirtu;
d'akhaani isani had'ani filiida buuyo iti fakaata.
Bokuuni buuyo iti fakaata,
hojja woraana iti darbani inni inkobla.
Gogaani garaa jala okote faara ta ch'ach'abt'e fakaata,
gogaani suni d'oqe fafalaansa aka mukha mid'aanini d'aanani.
Inni aka bisaani danfisani baariini woch'isisa,
akuma d'ad'a bassani dulooti naqani woch'isisa.
Inni hojja bisaani keesa deemu
kara bibiliqa ufi duubati lakisa
baariinile hoomacha adi tolcha.
Wonti lafa tana keesa jira ka isaani wolfakaata injirtu;
inni bineensa woma insodaanne,
inni bineensa kikiyyiba ch'ufa intufata,
inni hayyu bineensa ch'ufaati.

Jennaani Ayubuni waan AABBO Waaqaani jed'e,
AABBO, anini imbeekha, aka atini waan ch'ufa tolchu dandeetu;
nami waan atini tolchu feetu dandae d'owu injiru.
Na gaafate, ka anini ufiftu woma imbeenne.
Anini woma imbeenne,
waan mama ka dandae waan isii inhubanne dubbad'e.
waan anini si gaafad'u nati himi, naani jette.
Gaafasi, anini gurruma ch'allaani si d'agaye,
ammo amma ya iluma tiyyaani si arge.
Tanaafi anini amma waan jed'e kaani ch'ufa iraa ch'eere,
daarafi awaara keesa tae, ch'ubbu tiyya iraa deebia.
AABBO Waaqi dubbi tae Ayubuti dubbatu taani buufannani waan Elifazini jed'e, Anini sifi jaalani tante lamaaniti ya dallane, wonti akanatiifi isani aka hojattu tiyya Ayubu waan kiyya ka d'uga indubbanne.
Amma tana koromi torbafi Elemiya torba fuud'a, Ayubutini koota, maro wollaala keesanitifi sorio baasa. Hojattuuni tiyya Ayubuni Waaqa isanii kad'ate duuba anini kad'acha isaa d'agaye, ch'eera isani d'owe, waan sila isani tolchu lakisa. Isani aka Ayubuni waan kiyya d'uga dubbate indubbanne.
Duuba Elifazifi Bildadifi Sofarini, akuma AABBO Waaqi jed'eeni kaani tahani AABBO Waaqileeni kad'acha Ayubu d'agayeefi.
Jennaani eegi Ayubuni jaalani isa taani sadeeni Waaqa kad'ate. AABBO Waaqi ammalle isa horsiise, waan inni duri horate kaani ch'ufa ira harka lama kenneefi.
Oboleyaani isaa ta d'iiratifi ta dubraatifi jaalani isaa taani, ch'ufti gara isa d'ufte, mana isaa keesati sagale woliini sooratani. Worri isaa nahe, garaa jabeese, maro gaargala gudda AABBO Waaqi itiini d'ufe kaanitifi. Worri ch'ufti beesefi qube worqi isaa kenne.
AABBO Waaqi haga duri Ayubu eebise, kaanile ch'ufa ira isa eebise. Ayubuni hooliye kuma kud'ani afuritiifi gaala kuma jaatiifi looni kuma lamatiifi harre kuma toko horate.
Inni ilmaani d'iira torbafi dubra sadi d'ale.
Intala isa ta angafa maqa Yemima baase, ta iti aantu Kesia baase, maand'iti Keren-Hapuhu baaseefi.
Nad'eeni lafa suni ta aka dubra Ayubu mimid'aadu injirtu. Abbaani worra oboleyaani isaani ta d'iira woliini d'aala qood'efi.
Ayubuni eegi gaargala kaani keesaa bahe, ganna d'ibbafi afurtama tae, akhaakhufi ababoole ch'ufa arge,
jaare fulla gahe due.

Ayyaana isaati
ka mala worra ch'ubbutitifi
akheekha worra dabaatiifi
dubbi worra Waaqa tufatulle jibbe iti d'iaachu didu.
Ammo inni Seera AABBO Waaqaa
halkani guyya barate jaalate
guute gula deema.
ka bara mid'aani bahani ch'ufa mid'aani baase,
dameeleeni isaleeni ingonne.
Wonti inni tolchu ch'ufti ineebifamitiifi.
Ammo nami ch'ubbu diqole akasi injiru;
inni bua buuyo ta bubbeeni fuutu fakaata.
