worri waan jed'u, Eenuti nu d'agaya.
Ammo atini,
ee AABBO Waaqa worra kobluu jirta;
nama gosa si imbeenne ch'ufa goyeesuu jirta.
Ee Waaqa, anini jabeenna kanke abdad'a,
tanaafi siti baqad'a.
Waaqi kiyya na jaalata,
inni fulla tiyya d'ufa;
inni nyaapa kiyya ka dabsatani na garsiisa.
Ee Waaqa, worra inhobaasini,
aka worri kiyya worra indeene;
jabeenna keetiini worra dabsad'i,
gargari firfirsi,
ee AABBO Waaqa wonte, teenna.
Ch'ubbuuni araba worra ira teteeti;
dubbini worra ch'ufti ta ch'ubbuti;
worra ha kiyyiba worra keesati qabaniti!
Waan worri nama abaare d'ara dubbatufi,
dallansu tante keesa aka taka inargini
worra hafuu d'owi lafa iraa hobaasi.
Duuba akanaani
aka AABBO Waaqi lafa Israeli mohate,
mohachaani isaa muumme lafa ch'ufa geetu, beekhani.
Nyaapi kiyya galgala gadeebie,
aka sare gururia dira keesa yaa,
akuma sare sagale funaana yaate
hojja d'abdu gururitu.
Ammo anini waan jabeenna keeti sirbe,
jaalala tante ta ind'umanne
diirama ch'ufa faarsa.
Atini fulla anini iti baqad'uufi
ta hojja gaargala
anini iti d'okhad'u naa taate.
Ee irre tiyya anini si faarsa,
atini Waaqa kiyya ka anini iti baqad'u,
Waaqa hojja ch'ufa na jaalatu.

Ee Waaqa,
atini qara ya nu didde nu dabsate,
atini qara ya nuti dallante —
ammo amma nu deefad'i.
Atini qara yayu lafa
chochoofte gargari tarsaafte;
amma wolti deebisi gargari jiguu d'owi.
Atini yayu gaargala hama
gumi teetitiini d'ufte;
nu aka waan machoomne kaani dadaaqa yaana.
Atini nama si sodaatu ya gorsite,
aka worri wollaala keesa inseene.
Irre tanteetiini nu baasi,
kad'acha teenna nu d'agayi,
aka nami atini jaalatu lubbu bahu.
Mana isaa qulqullo keesa
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'e,
Gammada keesa anini Shekemu gargari qoode,
bale Sukothile gumi tiyyaa qooda.
Gileadiifi Manaseleeni tiyya;
Efraimuni sure duulaa tiyya,
Yudaleeni boku kiyya ka hayyuma.
Ammo Moabuni waan anini
keesati bisaani d'iqad'u,
ammalle anini kobe tiyya
Edomu gubba buuse,
akasiini aka isiini tiyya, garsiisa.
Worri Filisti waan na dabsate gammadu ufi seha?
Ee Waaqa eenuti dira jabeesani jaaraniti na geesa?
Eenuti Edomuti na geesa?
Atini d'uguma ya nu didde?
Atini duula keennaani induultu?
Nyaapa keenna nura d'owi, nu qarqaari;
qarqaarsi namaa woma keesa injiru.
Eegi Waaqi gama keenna jiraatte,
nu inuma dabsanna;
inni nyaapa keenna ira ejaanjate balleesa.

Ee Waaqa, boha tiyya d'agayi,
kad'acha tiyya ch'aqasi!
Anini hojja worra kiyya ira fago jiru,
ka ufi jibbad'e si yaamad'a!
Nami na qorqoratu,
ka harka nyaapa kiyya keesa na baasu si;
fulla anini iti baqad'u na geesi.
Mana kanke qulqullo keesa
haga jiru jireenna na teesisi;
gaadisa koola keeti jalati na tissi.
Ee Waaqa, atini kakhu anini siti kakhad'e ya d'ageete,
ammalle d'aala nami maqa kanke sodaatu argatu ya naa kennite.
Lubbu hayyu d'eeresi;
inni ha ganna heddu taauti!
Ee Waaqa, inni haga jiru jireenna
ha si durati lafa fidu;
jaalala tante ta ind'umanneefi
d'uga tanteetiini isa qorqorad'i.
Akanaani anini hojja ch'ufa maqa kanke faarse,
guyya ch'ufa kakhu anini siti kakhad'e guuta.

Anini obse baafama Waaqa eegad'a;
nami anini d'aabad'u isa.
Isuma ch'allati na qorqorate,
na baase na jabeesa;
duuba nami dandae na inchochoosu.
Isani nama akana kana,
ka naabo ch'ach'abdeele ira ingoomne,
haga yoomi had'u lakiftani?
Isani fulla isaa ta guddinna ch'allati
isaa gabuusu feetani;
isani d'ara jaalatani.
Afaani keesanini isa eebiftani,
ammo garaa keesati isaa abaartani.
Anini Waaquma ch'alla d'aabad'a,
abdiini tiyya isuma.
Isuma ch'allati na qorqorate,
na baase na jabeesa.
Duuba nami dandae na inchochoosu.
Baafamafi gurri kiyyaleeni
Waaqa iraa d'ufa;
inni nama na qorqoratu jaba,
ka anini iti baqad'u.
Ee gumi tiyya
hojja ch'ufa Waaqa d'uge fad'a,
gaargala keesani ch'ufa iti hima,
nami nu iti baqannu isa.
Nami hafuuruma baafatani fakaata;
diqaafi guddaleeni akuma taka jira,
woma keesa injiru.
Miisana gubba kai, biimi worri diqole inuulfatu,
hafuurale ingahu.
Saamicha nama saamtani inabdatiina,
yokhaani hori hannaani horatanile ind'aabatina;
ato horiini keesani isani horele,
guddo inheregatina.
irree tiyyafi jaalalti tiyyaaleeni
ind'umatu jed'u d'agaye.
Ee AABBO,
siumati nama ch'ufa huji isaa gula woi muraafi.

Ee Waaqa, atini Waaqa kiyya,
nami anini d'araefi guddo barbaadu si.
Lubbuuni tiyya, aka lafa ollani iti buute
bisaani d'abde gogodde, sii d'eeboti.
Mana kanke qulqullo keesati nati mullad'i,
jabeennaafi guddinna kanke na garsiisi.
Jaalalti tante ta ind'umanne jireennale ira jirti,
tanaafi anini si faarsa.
Anini haga jiru ch'ufa galata sii deebise,
harka si dura qabad'e si yaamad'a.
Lubbuuni tiyya d'uafi gabbinna soorate quufti,
ammalle anini gammade, sirbe maqa ke faarsa.
Anini ato sire keesa ch'iisu si qaabad'e,
halkani ch'ufa waan kanke herega;
wonti akanatiifi atini haguma duriti na qarqaarte,
tanaafi anini gaadisa koola keeti jalati gammadaani sirba.
Anini siti marad'e,
harki keetileeni jabeese na qaba.
Nami na ijeesuu fed'u boola ekherati deema.
Worri had'iisa keesati hobae
reefa worrale worabeesi nyaata.
Waan Waaqi isa dabsachiiseefi hayyuuni ingammada,
nami maqa Waaqatini woi kakhatu isa faarsa,
ammo kiyyiba afaani qabachiisani.

Ee Waaqa anini gaargala qaba,
kad'acha tiyya naa d'agayi
anini nyaapa kiyya ya sodaad'e,
lubbu naa baasi!
Mala gumi ch'ubbiti seseega yaatu jalaa na baasi.
Worri aka goraade araba ufii qare,
dubbi hamtu aka t'iya abbira.
Worri yoosu dubbi ch'eeraa ta kiyyiba dubbate,
nama dansale soda male arabse,
gurra isaa balleesa.
Worri mala worraa hama suni keesa woljabeese,
fulla t'urura ufi kayu malate waan jed'u,
Nami tokoleeni inargu.
Worri mala hama d'aate waan jed'u,
Nu yayu mala dansa namaani balleesinu malanne.
D'uguma heregaafi qalbiini namaa
waan nami beekhe hubatuniti.
Ammo Waaqi t'iya ufii darbe,
maro tokotu worra woraane madeesa.
Maro dubbi worraatifi inni worra balleesa;
nami worra argu ch'ufti mata gingilfata.
Duuba nami ch'ufti sodaate,
waan Waaqi tolche herege,
huji isaa odeesa.
Nami d'ugaa qajeelani ch'ufti
waan AABBO Waaqi tolche iraa gammada.
Worri dansaani ch'ufti fulla isaati baqate,
arti nagaya argate isaa faarsa.

Ee Waaqa, aki nu Sioni keesa si faarsine,
kakhu teenna si durati guunnu fullaa;
wonti akanatiifi atini kad'acha namaa d'ageeta.
Nami maro daba ufiitiifi
fulla ch'ufaa siti gad'ufu male.
Wollaali keenna nu dabsata,
ammo atini nuu araaramta.
Ayyaana isaniti, ka atini fohate
Mana kanke qulqullooti galchitu.
Nu waan dadansa mana kanketi guunne,
eeba Mana kanke qulqullo arganna.
Atini dabsacha nu kennite,
waan mama tolchite nu baafte,
akasiini kad'acha teenna nuu d'ageete.
Nama lafa keesa jiru ch'ufafi
ka galaana gama jiruleeni
ch'ufti si abdata.
Atini jabeenna keetiini
gaareeni fulla isii d'aabde,
akasiini irre tante garsiifta.
Atini d'awa baariini ch'allisifte,
dibbeesa d'awale ballisite,
gohanna namale ch'allisifte.
Waan atini tolchite arginaani
lafti ch'ufti mamte,
wonti atini tolchite
nama muumme lafaa jirule ch'ufa ingammachiifti.
Atini bokaya ergite akasiini lafa qorqorate,
sagale iti baafte mid'aasita.
Laga bisaanini guute,
lafale mid'aani iti baafte.
Aki atini waan kana tolchitu akana:
atini oobru qotani tamna bokayaa iti roobde
bisaani quubsite;
atini biyye ebeleeni lalaafifte,
mid'aani oobrani lafaa baafte.
Dansumti tante waan akami namaa kenniti!
Fulla atini deemtu ch'ufa quufati jira.
Lafa horiini tikhatu ch'ufa horiini keesa guute
lape gaareeni ch'ufa irati gammadani.
Fulla horiini oolu ch'ufa hooliyeeni keesa guute,
baleele ch'ufa dargayeeni keesa guuti.
Wonti ch'ufti gammade sirbiti.

Nami ch'ufti ha gammade,
sirbe waaqa faarsuti!
Isa faarsa maqa isa guddisa;
faaruni isa guddisa!
Waan isani Waaqaani jettani,
wonti atini hojattu ch'ufti waan mamaati!
Irreeni tante guddo jabdu
tanaafi nyaapi kanke mudame
si durati qanch'oorata.
Nami lafa keesa jiru ch'ufti si kad'ate,
si guddise sii faarse,
maqa kankele guddisa.
Koota, waan mama,
ka Waaqi nama ch'ufa durati tolche laala.
akasiini ababooti teenna galaana suni miilumaani taakite.
Duuba nu maro waan inni achiti tolcheefi gammanne.
Inni irre ufiitini haga jiru jireenna lafa fide,
gosa ch'ufa ila ufiitini qorqorata.
Nami tokoleeni isaani morku himmalle.
Gochiti ch'ufti ha Waaqa keenna faarsitu;
faaru isa faarsani ha d'agayani.
Inni ya lubbu nu baase,
miila keennale much'uch'aach'u d'owe.
Ee Waaqa, atini yayu akuma qarsi bassani
qulqulluma isii ilaalani nu ilaalte.
Atini t'urura keesa nu buufte,
ulfinna nu bachisifte.
Atini nyaapa keenna,
ka nu d'id'itu, nuti lakifte;
nu duri ibidaafi fach'aa bisaani keesa yaane,
ammo amma tana atini fulla dansaani nu d'ufte.
Anini sorio gubani mana kanketiini d'ufe
waan imbaasa jed'ele sii baasa.
Anini waan gaafa gaargala qabu,
sii baasa jed'e siumaa baasa.
Anini hooliye gubani sii baase,
koromifi elemiyele qale sorio sii baasa;
duuba aari sorioo suni ch'ufti oli deema.
Isani, nami Waaqa sodaatu ch'ufti koota ch'aqasa,
duuba anini waan inni naa tolche ch'ufa isaniti odeesa.
Anini bohe qarqaarsa isaa kad'ad'e,
sirbaani isa faarse.
Ato anini sila ch'ubbu tiyya garaati qabad'e lakisuu dide,
AABBO Waaqi na ind'agayu.
Ammo Waaqi yayu na ch'aqase,
kad'acha tiyyale d'agaye.
Anini Waaqaa faarsa
waan inni kad'acha tiyya d'agaye
jaalala isaa ta ind'umanne naa kenneefi.

Ee Waaqa nuu nahi, nu eebisi,
naasu teetiini nu ilaali,
aka lafti ch'ufti fed'i tante beete,
gochiti ch'ufti baafama kanke hubatu.
Ee Waaqa gosa ch'ufa keesa
nami ch'ufti ha si faarsuti!
Gochiti ch'ufti ha gammadde sirbitu,
waan atini d'uga gula nama qorte,
gosa lafa keesa jirtu ch'ufa qajeelchitufi.
Ee Waaqa, gosa ch'ufa keesa
nami ch'ufti ha si faarsuti!
Lafti yayu sagale baafte;
Waaqi keenna ya nu eebise.
Waaqi yayu nu eebise;
nami lafa keesa jiru ch'ufti ha isa sodaatu.

Waaqi ha kae nyaapa ufii gargari firfirsuti,
nami isaa jibbu ha isa duraa baqatuti.
Akuma aari lafaa kae baddu,
innileeni worra balleesa;
akuma ibidi haanch'aa bassu
akasuma Waaqi ch'ubbicha balleesa.
Ammo nami d'uga ha gammade
isa durati qilit'amu.
Waaqaa sirba, maqa isa faarsa;
ka dumansa yaabatu kara mid'aasaafi.
Maqaani isa AABBO Waaqa —
isa durati qilit'ama!
Waaqi ka mana ufii qulqullooti galu,
inni abba hiyyeeyi tahe haawaani isiile qorqorata.
Inni nama ch'eekho qabu worra kenneefi
nama hid'aansa keesa jirule hiikhe balchoomse,
ammo nama isa didu lafa aloo ta d'eebichati galcha.
Ee Waaqa, gaafa atini gumi teetiini deemte
lafa gamooji keesani godaante,
maro Waaqi Israeli
ka Sinaiti worrati mullate achi jiruufi.
Atini bokaya tamna roobde,
lafa godde bade jireesite.
Gumiini tante achi qubatte,
atileeni naasu tanteetiini
waan hiyyeesi fed'u kenniteefi.
Aabbooni dubbi dubbate
nad'eeni hedduuni dubbi suni namati odeesite:
Hayyootafi duuli worraa baqachu jira!
Nad'eeni worrati hafte waan boojiani gargari qoodate;
sabaliisa qarsiini mid'aasani,
ka kooli isa aka worqi bibiliqu.
Isani nami gari guyya woraana
maafi moona ree keesati haftani?
Gaafa Waaqi guddani
hayyoota gaara Salmoni gubbati gargari firfirse,
inni aka male roobe lafa qabaneese.
Gaareeni Bashani akami gugurdo!
Gaareeni tunini fiit'e heddu qabdi!
Isani maanifi fiit'e teesani d'ed'eertu ira,
gaara Waaqi fohate gubbaa tau,
tufini laaltani?
AABBO Waaqi haga jiru jireenna achi gubbaa taa.
AABBO Waaqi gaari isaa ka fardi hirkisu,
ka kunki heddutiini
gaara Sinai iraa d'ufe,
Fulla Qulqullo seena.
fiit'e gaaratiini kore,
nama isa didu iraa wofud'ata.
AABBO Waaqi achiti gala.
AABBO Waaqa, ka guyya ch'ufa
ulfinna nuraa fuud'u ha faarsani;
Waaqi nu baasu isuma.
Waaqi keenna Waaqa nama baasu;
inni AABBO, Aabbo keenna,
ka duisa keesaa nu baasu.
Waaqi mata nyaapa isa,
ka kara ufi hama lakisu didu, ch'ach'absa.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Anini nyaapa keesani
lafa Bashani keesaa gadeebisa;
ammalle d'immu Baariini keesaa fuud'a,
aka isani d'iiga worra keesa yaatani
sareeni teesanileeni haga dandeetu
d'iiga worra d'uddu.
Ee Waaqa, nami ch'ufti
aka atini dabsate gammadani galtu ya arge,
Ee Waaqa, Hayyu kiyya,
deema atini mana kanke qulqullooti galtu ya argani.
Nami woi sirbu dura yaa,
sirbituni eege yaati,
jiddu keesa dubra dibbe d'ooftuti yaa.
Gumi isaa guddo keesati Waaqa faarsa;
isani d'aloota Yakobo,
AABBO Waaqa faarsa.
Qara gosa Benjamini
ta ch'ufa ira diqooti d'ufa;
eege jaarole Yudatifi
worra isaaniti woliini d'ufa;
ammalle eegi worra suni
jaarole Zabulonitifi ta Naftaliti d'ufa.
Ee Waaqa, jabeenna kanke garsiisi,
ka atini Mana kanke ka Yerusalemu keesa
fulla hayyooti woini sii d'uftu,
ka atini nuu jette woini tolchite.
Lafa Misiri, bineensa hama ilaadu keesati galu suni,
fakeesi woi iti himi;
ammalle gosa d'ibi,
ta koromifi yabbiye fakaatu tana
jabeesi woi iti himi,
haga worri ch'ufti gajed'e qarsi sii baasuti.
Worra woraanani yau kana firfirsi
lafa ch'ufa keesaa balleesi!
Nama hayyuuni erguti lafa Misiriti d'ufa;
gochiti Kushileeni harka olqabate Waaqa kad'ati.
Gosa lafa ch'ufa, sirba
AABBO Waaqa, ka haguma duriti gubbaa tau, faarsa,
aka inni qonqo guddooni lalabe iyyu, ch'aqasa.
Jabeenna Waaqaa odeesa;
guddinni isaa Israeli gubba jira,
jabeenni isaa gubba taa.
Waaqi Israeli ka mana isaa qulqulloo d'ufu,
akami nama sodaachisa!
Inni jabeennaafi irre gumi isaati kenna,
Waaqa ha faarsani!

Ee Waaqa, na baasi!
Bisaani ya mormati naa ch'iisani;
anini d'oqe keesa lit'uu jira,
lafti godduuni ta anini ira ejad'u injirtu;
anini yayu bisaani qile keesa seene
d'awaani bisaani diquma na infud'atini.
Anini ya boha d'aqe ufi jibbaad'e,
qarqaarsale d'abe,
lubbuleeni ya na gogodde.
Anini ya sii barbaada d'aqe,
ilti na godde.
rifeensa mata kiyyale ira jira.
Nyaapi kiyya d'ara tiyya dubbate,
jabaate na ijeesu fed'a.
Worri waan anini inhatiini irreeni naraa fuud'e.
Ee Waaqa ch'ubbuuni tiyya si durati ind'okhatu.
Atini aka anini daalle imbeeta.
Ee AABBO Waaqa gudda,
aka anini nama si d'ugeefatu inch'eersine,
tahu na d'owi.
Ee Waaqa Israeli,
aka anini nama si kad'atu inch'eersine,
tahu nu d'owi!
Maro teetifi na arabsani na ch'eersani.
Anini oboleyaani tiyyati keessuma fakaad'a,
worra kiyyaleti nyaapa fakaad'a.
aka ibida na keesa bobeeti.
Arabi si arabsani ya nati deebie.
Anini ufi diqeese ufi agabse,
waan sunifi nami na arabse.
Anini ch'arqi naqad'e jennaani
sunile na koblani.
Fulla nami wolti bahu ch'ufati
waan kiyya hasaani,
nami machaeleeni waan kiyya sirba.
Ammo anini si kad'ad'a,
ee AABBO Waaqa;
atini hojja sii malte na d'agayi.
Maro jaalala tante guddotifi na ch'aqasi,
waan atini, si baasa jette kakhateefi.
D'oqe keesa lit'u na d'owi
harka nyaapa kiyyatiifi
bisaani qile keesaa na baasi.
Bisaani nati fach'aau d'owi;
dimmufi boola duaa keesa buu na d'owi.
Ee AABBO Waaqa,
maro dansuma jaalala tante ta ind'umanneeti jed'i, na d'agayi;
naasu tante guddooni nati deebii!
Fuula kanke hojattu tante ind'ofatiini
gaargali guddani ya na qabate hurrisi na d'agayi!
Nati d'iaad'i na baasi,
harka nyaapa kiyya keesaa na baasi.
Atini aka na arabsani na ch'eersani
gurra na balleesani imbeeta;
nyaapa kiyya ch'ufa atini inuma agarta.
Arabi na arabsani ya garaa na yake
ufi na jibbaachise.
Anini nama naa nahe,
garaa na jabeese na kibu,
barbaade d'abe,
had'aa na nyaachisani;
gaafa anini d'eebu qabu
waan kurooftu na obaasani.
isiini ha t'urura worraati taate worra balleesitu.
Ila worra duduchi aka worri woma ingarre!
Dudda worraa haga jiru jireenna gadigosi!
Dallansu tante hamtu worrati buusi
isiini ha worra balleesitu.
waaro worraa nama keesaa balleesi.
Worri nama atini d'oofte madeesite gaargalche,
nama atini woraantele gaargala isaa dubbata.
Daba worra ch'ufa t'aafad'i,
aka worri baafama kanke
keesaa fulla argatu tahu d'owi.
gumi tante keesale worra kuti.
Ammo anini guddo d'ukubsad'e gaargala kee jira;
ee Waaqa, oli na d'aabi, na baasi!
Anini maqa Waaqaa sirba keesati faarse,
galata isaa deebise,
guddinna isale odeesa.
Wonti kunini looni sorio baasanifi,
korma AABBO Waaqa baasanile
ch'ufa ira isa gammachiifti.
Hiyyeesi, hojja waan kana argu, ingammada;
nami Waaqa kad'atuleeni garaa jabaata.
AABBO Waaqi nama isaa ka gaaragala qabu d'agae,
gumi isaa ta hid'aansa keesa jirtule inded'u.
Lafafi gubbafi baariinifi wonti keesa jira ch'ufti,
AABBO Waaqa faarsa.
Inni Yerusalemu baase,
dira Yuda ka qara jigele jaara.
Gumiini isaa achi teete, lafa suni fud'atti;
nami d'aloota hojattu isaa lafa suni d'aala
ammalle nami isa jaalatuleeni qubate achi taa.

Ee AABBO Waaqa, na baasi,
hurrisi na qarqaari!
Nama na ijeesu fed'u
ha dabsatani balleesaniti.
Nama maro gaargala kiyyati gammadu,
ha dudda duubati deebisani ch'eersaniiti.
Nama na goyeesule
ha mudamsiisani ch'eersani.
Nami siti d'ufu ch'ufti
ha gammade qilit'amuti.
Nami baafama kanke jaalatu ch'ufti
ha guyya ch'ufa, AABBO Waaqi akami gudda jed'uuti!
Ee Waaqa, anini hiyyeesa laafa,
irre inqamne.
Ee Waaqa, hurrisi nati kooti.
Ee AABBO Waaqa, atini baafama kiyya,
hurrisi kooti na qarqaari!

Ee AABBO Waaqa, anini siti baqad'a,
ch'eeru na d'owi!
D'uga teetiini na qarqaari na baasi,
na d'agayi na baasi!
Siida anini iti baqad'uufi
fulla jabdu na baaftu naa tahi;
atini siida kiyya ka anini iti baqad'u.
Ee Waaqa kiyya, harka worra ch'ubbuu,
ka naasu inqamne,
ka hameenna gula yau, keesaa na baasi,
Ee AABBO Waaqa, anini si abdad'a.
haguma d'aloota kiyyati siuma d'ugeefad'a.
Anini haguma d'alad'e si d'aabad'e;
haguma d'aloota kiyyati asi
atini ya na qorqorate,
tanaafi anini guyya ch'ufa si faarsa.
Waan atini aka jaba na qorqorateefi,
jireenni kiyya yayu akheekha nama hedduu tahe.
Guyya ch'ufa anini si faarse,
guddinna kanke odeesa.
Anini amma ya jaare, na illakisiini;
anini amma ya irre d'abe,
lafa na imbuusini.
Nyaapi kiyya mala nati d'aate
waan kiyya dubbate na ijeesu fed'a.
Worri waan jed'u Waaqi ya lafa isa buuse;
koota, yaane isa qamna,
nami isa baasu injiru.
Ee Waaqa, naraa imfagaatini;
ee Waaqa kiyya,
hurrisi kooti, na qarqaari!
Nama na had'u ha dabsatani balleesani.
Nama na gaargalchu fed'ule
ha ch'eersani gurra balleesani.
Anini hojja ch'ufa si abdad'e,
haga qara ira si faarsa.
Anini dansuma tante odeese,
hojja ch'ufa waan baafama keeti dubbad'a,
ato dandae waan isii hubachu baad'ele.
Ee AABBO Waaqa gudda,
anini irre tante faarse,
dansuma tante ch'alla odeesa.
Haguma ijoolluma tiyyaati asi,
siumati na qarqaara,
anini arrale waan dansa atini naa tolchite odeesumati jira.
Anini amma ya jaare,
rifeensi kiyyaleeni ch'ufti ya arrae,
Ee Waaqa, na illakisiini!
Hojja anini jabeenna kanke
d'aloota ch'ufati odeesu naa wahelchi.
Ee Waaqa, atini yayu waan mama tolchite,
d'ugaani teetileeni guddo,
gubbale ind'aqabdi.
Nami aka keeti tokoleeni lafa keesa injiru.
Atini yayu d'ipufi gaargala nati ergite,
ammo siumati ammalle irre tiyya naa deebise,
boola duaa keesaa na fuud'a.
Atini haga duri ira guddinna naa kennite
ammalle na jabeesita.
Anini kiraari d'ae,
maro d'uga teetitiifi si faarsa,
Ee Waaqa kiyya.
Anini dibbe d'ae sirbe si faarsa,
Ee Qulqullo Israeli.
Anini hojja sii sirbu,
guddise gammadaani sirba;
garaafi qalbi tiyya ch'ufaani
anini waan atini na baafteefi sii sirba.
Anini waan d'uga teeti guyya ch'ufa dubbad'a,
wonti akanatiifi jara na balleesuu fed'u kaani
yayu dabsatani ch'eersani.

Ee Waaqa, d'uga teetiini hayyu barsiisi;
qajeeluma tante isalee qoodi,
aka inni gumi tante d'ugaani fide,
nama nami dabsu qajeelumani bulchu.
Gaareeni ha waan nami horatu baaftu
kubileeni ha d'ugaani namaa d'uftu.
Hayyichi ha hiyyeesa d'uga gula qore
nama woma inqamne qarqaare,
nama nama dabsule balleesu.
Gumiini tante haga aduufi jii jiru ch'ufa ha si kad'atuti,
haga jiru jireennale.
Hayyichi ha bokaya oobruti roobufi
ebele lafati roobdu fakaatuti.
Haga inni jiru d'ugaani ha jiraatu,
haga lafti ifsa jiaa qabdu
nami ha woi horatu.
lafa mohatuti,
haga galaana Efratifi muumme lafale.
Nami lafa gamooji tau isa durati gajejed'e,
nyaapi isaaleeni miila isaa jaalati jijiga.
Hayyooti Tarshishitifi ta lafa d'aatu bisaani jirtuleeni damoosa isaa baafti.
Hayyooti Araftitifi ta sidaama woi isaa baafti.
Hayyooti ch'ufti isaa durati jilbifate,
gochiti ch'ufti isaa hojatti.
Inni hiyyeesa isa yaamatufi nama qarqaarsa inqamne,
ka nami d'ibiini lakise, baasa.
Inni nama hiyyeesa laafa woma inqamnnee nahe,
gaargala keesaa baasa.
Inni harka nama worra d'aane dabsu keesaa baase,
lubbu worrale jabeesa.
Lubbuuni hayyu ha d'eeratuti!
Worqi lafa Arafti ha isaa kennaniti;
hojja ch'ufa ha Waaqa isaa kad'atani,
inni eeba Waaqale ha argatuti!
Mid'aani ha bahani lafa ira dabraniti;
mid'aani sunini ha kubilee ch'ufa ira guutani,
mid'aani Lebanoni fakaataniti.
Akuma buuyooni lafa guutte
dirale ha nami keesa guututi.
Maqaani hayyu haga jiru imbadiini;
guuri isaa haga aduuni jirtu ha jiraatuuti.
Gochiti ch'ufti ha isa faarsite,
Waaqa kad'ate, Nu eebisi jettuti,
worri hayyule ha eebisuti.
AABBO Waaqa Israeli ha faarsaniti!
Waan mama kana ch'ufa isuma ch'allati tolcha.
Maqa isaa dansa haga jiru jireenna ha faarsani!
Guddinni isaa ha lafa ch'ufa guututi.
Amini! Amini!
Kad'achaani Daudi ilma Yese armati hobaati.

Waaqi guddo worra Israeliti dansa,
worra garaani isaa qulqullo.
Ammo anini diquma ufi injibbaatini
d'ugefachaani tiyyaaleeni diquma imbadiini,
wonti akanatiifi gaafa anini
aka worri ch'ubbuu woi horate
waan sunini kooreeni arge,
anini worra d'iibifad'e.
Worri fayyaafi jabeenna qaba,
d'ukuba inqabu.
Worri aka nama d'ibi gaargala inqabu
aka biyyale ind'ipatu.
Tanaafi duuba worri
kiyyiba aka imu mormati keeyate,
woldidale aka woya uyyifata.
Garaani worraa hameennani guutame,
qalbiini worraaleeni waan hamtu ch'alla hereddi.
Worri nama d'ibi koble,
waan hamtu dubbate ufi saade,
mala nama d'ibiini dabsu d'aata.
Worri Waaqa ka gubbaa jiru hameenna isaa dubbate,
nama lafa gubbaa jiruleeti kiyyiba.
Akanaani gumiini Waaqaleeni worrati gargalte,
garaa tokooni waan worri jed'e d'ugeefate.
Worri waan jed'u, Waaqi akami waan kana beekha?
Waaqi guddayaani gubbaa jiru waan kana imbeekha?
Aki worri ch'ubbu jiru akana.
Worri guyya ch'ufa quufeti woi horata.
Duuba anini ufuma waan hamtu tolchu dide qulqulloomaani taa?
Ee Waaqa, atini hojja ch'ufa na gaargalchite,
diirama ch'ufa na d'aante.
Yo anini sila waan kana jed'e,
anini nama gumi te keesa jiru infaakad'u.
Anini tae waan kana herege hubachu dad'abe,
haga mana kanke oli inseenini.
Ammo seenani waan worri ch'ubbuu taka tana tahu hubad'e.
Atini fulla much'uch'atu worra keete badii keesa worra buufte!
Worra yoosu balleesani,
muummeeni worraaleeni hamtu.
Worri oobju fakaata ta diirama yo kaani
waan isii imbeenne;
ee AABBO, hojja atini lafaa kaatu worri imbada.
Gaafa anini aka male laalefad'e garaani na hamaate,
anini daallae woi wollaale,
bineensa fakaad'e si hubachu dad'abe.
Ammo anini hojja ch'ufa d'aatuma tante jira siuma woliini jira,
atinileeni harka qabde nani deemta.
Atini barsiifte na qajeelchite,
taka tanale ulfinnaani na fud'ata.
Anini gubbaa si male maani qaba?
Anini eegi si qabaad'e lafa ira maani fed'a?
Ato qalbiifi nafi kiyya laafele
jabeenni kiyya Waaqa,
isa male anini waan d'ibi infed'u.
Nami si lakisu inuma badda;
atini nama siraa gore imballeesita.
Ammo anini gama kiyyaani,
yo Waaqati d'iaad'e,
guddo ira naa jirti;
nami anini iti baqad'u AABBO Waaqa gudda;
waan atini tolchite anini biyyati odeesa.

Ee Waaqa, atini maafi akana nu lakifte?
Atini haga jiru jireenna gumi teeti dallanta?
Gumi atini duri fohate,
tissooma keesaa baafte,
gosa tante tolfate, qaabad'i.
Gaara Sioni, ka atini duri irati galtule, qaabad'i.
Maneeni ch'ach'absani ona tolchani tana gubba deemi,
wonti akanatiifi nyaapi keenna waan Mana Waaqa keesa jira ch'ufa ya balleese.
Nyaapi kanke yayu mana kanke keesati geerare;
worri yayu bandera d'aabate,
aka dabsate lafa fud'atu garsiise.
Worri nama badda seene
d'agaraani mukha ch'iru fakaata.
Worri d'agaraafi burisaani
mukha Mana Waaqa keesani barreesani ch'ach'abse.
Worri Mana kanke ch'ach'abse ibida iti kaye;
fulla iti si kad'atanile t'ureese.
Ammalle garaa ufii keesa waan jed'e,
Nu worra kana aka taka inargini balleesina,
worri Fulla Qulqullo Waaqa iti kad'atani,
ta lafa suni keesa jirtu, ch'ufa gube.
Akheekhi woi qulqullooni ka nu mid'aafanne tokoleeni inhamne,
raagi tokoleeni injiru,
nami tokoleeni ka haga wonti kunini turtu beekhu injiru.
Ee Waaqa, nyaapi keenna haga yoomi si kobla?
Worri maqa kanke haga jiru jireenna arabsa?
Atini maafi nu qarqaaru didde?
Atini maafi harka kanke ufi duubati qabata?
Ammo, ee Waaqa, atini haguma duriti hayyu keenna,
maro heddu nu baafte.
gorjama bisaani mata ira kute.
reefa isaa bineensa alaati kennite.
Atini lagaafi madda yaafte,
gaalana guddale gossite.
Atini halkanifi guyya uumte,
aduufi jiale mid'aasite fulla isi keete.
Atini lafa ch'ufa gargari qoode,
seera jiddu keete,
bonaafi roobale mid'aasite.
Ammo ee AABBO Waaqa,
aka nyaapi kanke si goyeesu qaabad'i.
Worri si imbeekhu, tanaafi si tufata.
Gumi tante laaftu harka nyaapa isiiti illakisiini;
gumi tante ta gaargalchani haga jirtu inded'ini!
Wold'aqisa atini nu woliini tolfate qaabad'i.
Moga lafa dukanooftu ch'ufa keesati nami wolijeesa.
Nama dabsani ch'eeru d'owi;
hiyyeesi qarqaarsa inqamne
ha maqa kanke faarsu.
Ee Waaqa, kai, ufi dubbad'i,
qaabad'i aka worri si imbeenne
hojja ch'ufa si koblu.
Iyyanna nyaapa keetitifi
lalaba worri guyya ch'ufa lalabule inded'ini.

Nu galata si deebimna,
ee Waaqa nu galata si galchina!
Nu guddinna kanke odeesine,
waan mama ka atini tolchite namati himna.
Waaqi waan jed'u, Anini guyya qorsuma ya fohad'e,
guyya sunile d'uguma gula namaa qora.
Ato wonti lubbu qaba ch'ufti holate,
laftileeni chochote,
anini yayaba isii injabeesa.
Anini ch'ubbichani, inkiyyibini,
kiyyiba kanke lakisi jed'aani.
Qorsumaani ilaborutiifi ila adutifi
mirgaafi bitale ind'uftu.
Nami dubbi qoru Waaqa,
ka nama gari wollaala iti mure
ka gariti d'ugaa muru.
AABBO Waaqi muduunu daad'i
ta dallansuuni isaa guute, harkaa qaba.
Inni daad'i suni keesaa buuse,
ch'ubbicha ch'ufa obaase, worri fooqisa.
Ammo anini haguma jiru
waan Waaqa Yakobo dubbad'e isa faarsa.
Inni irre ch'ubbicha ch'absa,
ammo irre nama d'ugaa iti daraafi.

Lafa Yuda keesati Waaqi ya beekhame;
Israeli keesati maqa isaa guddisani.
Diri inni iti galu Yerusalemu,
gaari inni gubba tau Sioni.
Achiti inni t'iyafi wonteefi goraadeefi
miha lola ka nyaapa isaa ch'ufa ch'absa.
Ee Waaqa, atini akami guddinna qabda!
Hojja atini nyaapa kanke dabsatte
gaareeni ira gabuutu atini akami mid'aada!
Askarti worra jajanna waan worri qabu ch'ufa
ya iraa boojiani,
worri ch'ufti amma ya dua gach'iise;
askartini sunini ch'ufti ya hobaate,
tokoleeni harkale oli infud'atu.
Yo atini worra mudamsiifte, ee Waaqa Yakobo,
fardooleefi nami yaabatuleeni akanumati jige raawate.
Ammo, Ee AABBO Waaqa, nami ch'ufti si sodaata.
Yo atini dallantu nami tokoleeni dandae si dura inejju.
Atini mura tante gubbuma nama beesifte;
gaafa atini olejite dubbi atini murte suni namati himte,
nama keesati dabsani ch'ufa baafte,
lafti ch'ufti sodaate, afaani qabate.
Dallansuuni namaa faaru guddooni sii d'ufti;
nami woraana jalaa bahe jila tante jabeesa.
Waan isani AABBO Waaqa keesani kakhatani isaa kenna,
gochiti isa d'aatu jirtu ch'ufti woi isaa kenna.
Waaqi nama sodaachise,
ilmaani hayyoota ta ufi gugudiftule, diqeese,
hayyoota gugurdole mudamsise.

Anini iyye Waaqati boha,
innileeni na d'agaya.
Hojja gaargala anini AABBO yaamad'a;
anini halkani ch'ufa harka isa dura qabad'e isa kad'ad'a.
Ammo waan garaa na jabeesa inargad'u.
Anini hojja waan Waaqa heregu,
hafuurati na ch'ita,
hojja anini isa qaabad'u ingagaba.
Inni halkani ch'ufa hiriba na d'owa;
heregi guddani na qabate dubbachu na d'owa.
Anini gannaafi guyya dabre qaabad'a.
Anini halkani ch'ufa herega guddaani bule waan ufiini jed'u:
AABBO Waaqi haga jiru jireenna nu dida?
Inni deebie nuti ingammadu?
Inni yayu nu jaalachu lakise?
Kakhuuni isaa haga jirtu inteetu?
Waaqi ya namaa nahu dide?
Inni dallansu keesa nuu nahu dide?
Jennaani anini waan jed'e,
Wonti guddo na d'iba tana —
Waaqi amma aka duri kaani irre inqabu.
Ee AABBO Waaqa,
anini huji tante guddo inqaabad'a;
waan mama ka atini duri tolchite ch'ufa ufi qaabsisa.
Anini waan atini tolchite ch'ufa herege,
waan jabdu atini tolchite ch'ufa qaabad'a.
Ee Waaqa,
wonti atini tolchitu ch'ufti qulqullo.
Waaqi d'ibiini, ka aka kanke guddaa,
lafa keesa injiru.
Waaqi waan mama tolchu sii;
atini gosa ch'ufa irre tante garsiifta.
Irre tanteetiini atini gumi tante,
d'aloota Yakobootiifi ka Yusufu, baafte.
Ee Waaqa, bisaani si arginaani sodaatani,
d'immuuni baariinileeni si durati hollate.
Dumansi bokaya ga roobe,
mandisuuni gubbaa d'ufte,
angaasuuni moga ch'ufaa bibilit'e.
Atini mandite, angaasuuni bilit'e
lafa ch'ufa guyyaasifte,
laftileeni chochote hollate.
Atini d'awa bisaani keesa deemte,
baariini qile taakite,
ammo faana tante nami ingarre.
Atini Musafi Haruni gudda gumii teeti tolchite,
tissitu worra taate worraani deemte.

Ee gumi tiyya,
barsiisa tiyya ch'aqasa,
dubbi tiyyale d'agaya.
waan duri d'ossani gabaasa —
waan nu duri d'ageenne baranne,
ka abbootini teenna nuti himte.
Nu ijoolle teenna ind'ossinu,
ammo d'aloota taka tanale,
irre AABBO Waaqatifi huji isaa jabdufi
waan mama ka inni tolche iti himna.
Inni aada gumi Israeliti kenne,
seera d'aloota Yakobo barsiise.
Inni waan abbooti teennaani jed'e,
seera kiyya ilmaani teesani barsiisa
aka d'alooti taka tanaleeni barate,
ilmaani ufile barsiisu.
Kara kanaani worrileeni Waaqa d'ugeefate,
waan inni tolche ch'ufa qaabate,
seera isaa guuta.
Akanaani worri ababoota ufi,
ta mata jabaate, Waaqa dide,
aka dansa garaa tokooni Waaqa d'ugeefate
gula iyyaaiini iraa gora.
Worri Efraimu, ka t'iyaafi guube qabu
woraani d'ufnaani kae baqate.
Worri wold'aqisa Waaqa woliini tolfate jabeesu dide,
Seera isale ch'abse,
waan mama ka inni duri tolche,
ka ila ufiitini arge, ded'e.
Waaqi diida Soani ka lafa Misiri keesati waan mama tolche.
bisaani aka girgida moga lamaani d'ad'aabe,
worra jiddu dabarse.
halkani ch'ufa goola ibidaa worra dura kaye.
akanaani bisaani lafa jalaa baase worra bisaani obaase.
Inni siida d'akha keesaa galaana yaase
bisaani aka laga gabaase.
Ammo worri daba tolchu illakimne,
lafa gamooji keesati AABBO Waaqa guddati garagale.
akasiini Waaqa ilaalate.
Worri Waaqati gungume waan jed'e,
D'uguma lafa aloo tana keesati
Waaqi dandae sagale nu inkenna?
D'uguma inni siida d'akhaa d'ae,
bisaani aka galaana keesaa yaase;
ammo inni dandae qit'afi fooni gumi isaati inkenna?
AABBO Waaqi dubbi tana d'ageennaani dallane,
dallansu isaa keesaa gumi isaa ibidaani balleese;
wonti akanatiifi worri isa d'ugefachu dide
jabeenna isaa ka inni dandae isaaniini baasule abdachu didde.
Ammo inni gubbaani dubbate balbala isiile bane.
sagale manna jed'ani toko worra nyaachise.
Duuba akanaani worri sagale malaikaani nyaatu nyaate
Waaqileeni waan worri fed'u ch'ufa kenneefi.
Inni ammalle bubbe ilaboruti d'ufeeni,
jabeenna ufiitini bitale bubbe kaase,
simpirre muumme inqamne,
ta aka maansa afaani galaana jirtu,
gumi isaati erge.
Simpirreeni sunini
olla worraa suni ch'ufa keesati jidde,
waaro ch'ufa jiddu guutte.
Akanaani Waaqi sagale worri fed'u ch'ufa kenneefi,
worri nyaate quufe.
Ammo ato worri tae ufuma nyaatu,
ka worri d'araa imbahini,
Waaqi worrati dallane,
nama worra Israeli,
ka kaima jajaba ch'ufa fit'e.
Waan kanale ch'ufa irrumaani
worri ammalle ch'ubbu tolche;
ato inni waan mama tolchele
isaa d'ugefachu dide.
Duuba akanaani inni lubbu worra aka hafuura kute,
jireenna worraa yoosu hobaase.
Hojja inni nama worra ka gari hobaasu,
worri iraa hafe kaani isati deebie,
ch'ubbu lakise, garaa tokooni isa kad'ata.
Worri aka Waaqi worra qorqorate,
Waaqi guddaani worra qarqaare qaabate.
Ammo hataatuti, dubbini
worri jed'e suni d'ugaaniti,
wonti worri jed'e suni kiyyiba.
Ammo worri garaa tokooni isa gulaa indeemne,
wold'aqisa isa woliini tolfatani kaani injabeesine.
Ato akasile taate Waaqi gumi isaati nahe,
ch'ubbu isaani araarameefi,
worra hobaasuu dide.
Maro heddu inni dallansu ufiitini
worra balleesu dide.
Inni waan jed'e, worri kunini namuma woma keesa na injiru,
worri qilleensuma d'ufe dabru ka keesa indeebine, fakaata.
Worri maro hagami lafa aloo
ta gamooji keesati isaati gargale,
isa dide garaa isaa yake!
Worri maro heddu Waaqa laallate,
Waaqa qulqullo Israelii dallansiise.
Worri irre isaa jabdufi
guyya inni harka nyaapa worraa dura worra baaseefi,
ka inni waan mama jabdu diida Soani keesa,
lafa Misiri keesati tolche, ded'e.
worri Misiri waan d'ugu d'abe.
raacha lafa worraa balleesuufi,
lafa worraa balleesu, iti erge.
odale bokayaani balleese.
Ammalle inni looni isaani
bokaya d'akhaani roobuuni hobaase,
ree worrale angaasuuni fit'e.
Inni aka taka inargini gugubate worrati dallane,
ergattu isaa, ta woi balleesitu worrati erge,
aka hama worra balleese.
Inni dallansu ufii galfachu dide,
lubbu worrale baasuu dide,
ch'iisa hama iti buuse worra hobaase.
ta worra Misiri ch'ufa, fit'e.
lafa aloo ta gamoojiti geese.
nagayaani worra gegeese,
ammo baariinini nyaapa worrati fach'aate balleesite.
gaareeni inni harka ufiitini dabsate.
gumi ufi duraa gusse,
lafa isaani gosa Israeliti gargari qoode,
maneeni worraale gumi isaati kenne.
isa dide seera isaale ch'abse,
isati garagale, akuma abbooti worraa isa dide,
akuma guubeeni dabde qonyatu tahe.
Worri fulla waaqa d'ara iti kad'atu jaare
waaqa d'ara suni harkani boch'ate,
akanaani isa dallansiise.
Waaqi waan kana arginaani guddo dallane
worra isaa ka Israeli dide.
fulla inni duri isi keesa nu woliini tae lakise,
biraa iti d'aabate.
ka jabeennaafi guddinna isaa nama garsiisu,
harka nyaapa keennati lakise.
Inni gumi ufiiti dallane,
harka nyaapa worraati worraa kenne.
Kaima worraa ka d'iira woraana keesati fit'ani,
dubarti worraaleeni d'iirsa d'abdi.
Qaaloleeni woraanaani doote,
nad'eeni worraale boohufi d'owani.
Jennaani duuba eege, AABBO Waaqi lafaa kae,
aka nama jaba daad'i d'uge iyye lafa gaargalche.
Inni nyaapa ufi gusse,
haga jiru jireenna ch'eerse.
Ammo inni d'aloota Yusufu dide,
gosa Efraimule fohachu dide.
Inni fulla worraa,
gosa Yudatifi gaara Sioni,
ka inni guddo jaalatu, fohate.
Achiti inni Mana ufi qulqullo,
ka akuma worra isaa ka gubba jiru jaare;
inni mana suni jaba aka d'akha tolche,
haga jiru jireenna qorqorate.
ree isaa ta inni tissu keesaa fuud'e,
hayyu Israeli, tissitu gumi Waaqa, isa tolche.
Duuba Daudini garaa tokooni worra qorqorate,
qalbi dansaani worra dura deeme.

lafa tante had'e,
Mana kanke qulqullo t'ureese,
dira Yerusalemu balleese ona tolche.
Worri reefa gumi teeti allaati kenne,
fooni hojattu teeti bineensa alaati lakise,
worri d'iiga gumi teeti akuma bisaani jisse;
d'iigi akuma bisaani dira Yerusalemu keesa yae,
nama reefa awaalule lafaa d'abani.
Gochiti nu d'aatu jirtu nu arabsite
nu kofalte nu goyeesite.
Ee AABBO Waaqa,
atini haga jiru jireenna nuti dallanta?
Dallansuuni tante aka ibida bobau illakiftu?
Dallansu tante gosa si inkad'anneefi
gumi maqa kanke iyyamanneti buusi.
Wonti akanatiifi worri gumi tante fit'e,
lafa tantele balleese.
Ch'ubbu ababoota teennati jette nu ingaargalchini.
Nu yayu ufi jibbaanne, amma nuu nahi.
Ee Waaqa, nu qarqaari, nu baasi,
maro maqa keetiti jed'i,
ch'ubbu teenna nu araarami nu baasi.
Gochiti d'ibiini maafi, Waaqi keesani me?
Jette nu gaafati.
Aka atini gosa d'iiga hojattu teeti
jissite gaargalchitu nu garsiisi.
Oanna nama hid'aansa keesa jiru ch'aqasi irre tante guddooni
nama ijeecha iti murani baasi.
Ee Aabbo Waaqa gosa arabsite si miite,
maro torba haalo baafad'i.
Duuba nu, gumiini tante,
hooliyeeni atini tissitu,
haga jiru jireenna galata si deebimne,
d'alooti keenna ch'ufti haga jiru si faarsa.

ee atini ka gumi tante tissitu, nu ch'aqasi.
Atini ka waan lubbu qaba ka koola gubbaa
barch'uma kanke ira teetu,
gosa Efraimutifi ta Benjaminitifi ta Manaseti ufi mullisi.
Irre tante nu garsiisi, kooti nu baasi!
Ee Waaqa ufiti nu deebisi,
naasu tante nu garsiisi,
aka nu baafamnu!
Ee AABBO, Waaqa gudda,
atini haga yoomi kad'acha gumi teeti iraa dallanta?
Atini yayu laalefacha
aka sagale nu soorachiifte,
imimaani muduunu guute nu obaafte.
Atini gosa d'aatu teenna jirtu
lafa teenna irati wolhaasifte,
nyaapi keenna nu goyeesa.
Ee Waaqa gudda, ufiti nu deebisi!
Naasu tante nu garsiisi, aka nu baafamnu!
Atini zabibu lafa Misiri keesaa baafte,
gosa d'ibile lafa suni keesaa gussite,
zabibu suni lafa worra keesati oobrite.
Atini aka isiini baatu lafa iti mid'aasite;
hiddi isii lafa seene, lafa ch'ufa gahe.
Isiini gaareeni gaadiseesite,
dameeni isiileeni hind'eesa gugurdale gaadiseesite.
Dameeni isii baate, Baariini Guddafi
galaana Efratiti ejite.
Atini maafi dalla isiini jaarani ch'absite?
Amma tana nami d'aatu bahu ch'ufti
dandae mid'aani isii hata;
booyyeeni isii ira ejaanjate,
bineensi alaaleni isi nyaata.
Ee Waaqa gudda, nuti deebi!
Gubbaa nu ilaali,
kooti gumi te baasi!
Kooti, zabibu atini oobrite,
jabeesite tana baasi!
Nyaapi keenna yayu isi ch'ire gube;
dalansuuni worra laali, worra balleesi!
Gumi atini fohate,
gosa atini jabeenna kenniteefi qorqorad'i, jabeesi.
Duuba nu deebine siraa gara ingallu;
nu jireesi, duuba nuleeni si faarsina.
Ee AABBO Waaqa gudda, ufiti nu deebisi,
naasu tante nu garsiisi, aka nu baafamnu.

Gammada, Waaqa jabeenna nuu kennu sirba,
Waaqa Yakobo faarsa!
Sirba, dibbeefi kiraari d'aa,
faaru dansa d'aad'a.
magalata d'aa, jila tolfad'a.
Kunini seera Israeliini guutu malte,
aada Waaqi Yakobo baase.
Aada suni inni gaafa worra Misiri had'e worraa kenne.
Anini qonqo imbeenne toko d'agaye ta akana jettu.
Anini ulfinna isani baatani dudda iraa isani fuud'e,
matofari isani baatani isani iraa lafa naqe.
jennaani anini d'ufe isani baase.
Anini fulla mandisu, ta iti d'okhad'u keesa,
isani jala owaad'e madda Meribati isani ilaalad'e.
Ee gumi tiyya, gorsa kiyya ch'aqasa;
ee worra Israeli, ato sila na ch'aqaftani anini akami fed'a!
diqole kad'achu himmalle.
Anini AABBO Waaqa keesani,
ka lafa Misiri keesaa isani baase.
Afaani keesani na dura qabad'a,
anini isani quubsa.
Ammo gumiini tiyya na ch'aqasu dide,
worri Israeli naa saalfachuu dide.
Tanaafi anini, aka worri mata jabaate,
waan fed'u tahu, iti lakise.
Anini sila, hojja gumiini tiyya naa saalfate
kara kiyya gula yaatu akami fed'a!
Anini sila maro tokotu nyaapa isaani balleese dabasad'a.
Nami na jibbu na sodaate na durati jilbifata;
gaargali worraa haga jiru jireenna inhobau.
Ammo anini dargaye dansa isani nyaachise,
dammani isani quubsa.

Waaqi ka abba kora gubba,
woldeenna Waaqa ch'ufa keesati dubbate waan jed'u.
Dubbi qortani keesa nama indabsina;
worra ch'ubbu dubbi keesa ira ch'iiftani,
gula imbahiina!
Hiyyeesafi ilmaani hiyyeeyi abbaafi haad'a inqamne
d'uga d'owartani indabsina;
d'ipatafi nama woma inqamne dubbad'afi qarqaara.
Worra irre inqamne kana
harka nama worra dabsu jalaa baasa.
Isani daalle woma imbeetani!
Isani ya hamatani waan
hamtu ch'alla tolchitani,
d'ugaani ya lafa keesaa bade.
ilmaani Waaqa guddaa.
Ammo isani akuma namaa dootani,
akuma nama lafa fidu raawatani.
Ee Waaqa, kooti lafa mohad'i;
gochiti ch'ufti teeti.

Ee Waaqa, afaani qabate, dubbachu dide,
ch'allifte ufuma intahini!
Me ilaali, nyaapi kanke ya siti kae,
worri si jibbu ya siti garagale.
Worri mala hama gumi teetiti d'aate,
nama atini qorqoratule balleesuu fed'a.
Worri waan jed'u,
Koota, gosa worraa balleesina,
aka worra Israeli deebiani inqaabanne.
Worri ch'ufti woli gale,
mala woliini d'aate,
goli taka woli tahe:
Worri Edomutifi ka Ishmaeli;
worra Moabutiifi ka Hagri;
worra Gebalitiifi ka Amonitifi ka Amalekitifi
ka Filistitifi ka Tiroleeni.
Worri Ashuruleeni yayu goli worraati darame,
akanaani worra d'aloota Lutu qarqaare irre taheefi.
galaana Kishoniti tolchite, worra tolchi.
Atini Endoriti worra hobaafte,
reefi worra lafati shame.
Orebufi Zeebu tolchite,
jaarole worraale tolchi.
Akuma atini jara kana lamaani Zebafi Zalmuna,
ka, Nu lafa Waaqaa ufuma fud'anna jed'e, dabsate,
hayyoota worraale dabsad'i.
Ee Waaqa, aka bubbeeni awaara firfirsitu worra firfirsi,
akuma bua buuyo ta bubbeeni fuutu.
Akuma ibida badda gubu
yokhaani arabi ibidaa ka gareeni gubu,
bubbe tanteetiini worra gussi,
hobombolati tanteetiini worra mudamsiisi.
Ee AABBO Waaqa, ch'eeraani worra balleesi,
aka worri jabeenna kanke argu.
Worra ha dabsatani,
haga jiru jireenna mudamsiisaniti;
worri ha aka male ch'eere hobauti.
Worri ha aka atini AABBO Waaqi ch'allaani
lafa ch'ufa mohate fidu, beekhuti.

Mani kanke akami dansa
ee AABBO Waaqa gudda.
Anini guddo Mana kanke seenu fed'a
anini guddo Mana AABBO Waaqa seeniiti d'araa.
Garaa kiyyafi qalbi tiyya ch'ufaani
anini gammade, Waaqa jiruu faarsa.
Buriyaleeni mana qabdi,
worraabatileeni fulla ilmaani keesati d'altu qabdi
d'aatu fulla sorio irati si baasani,
Ee AABBO Waaqa gudda, hayyu kiyyafi Waaqa kiyya.
Nami Mana kanke keesati galu,
ka hojja ch'ufa si faarsu,
ayyaana akami qaba!
Nami irre sira argatu,
ka gaara Sioni imaltu d'aqu fed'u,
gammada akami qaba.
Hojja worri bale Baka keesa dabru,
isiini garagalte madda bisaani taati;
bokaya hagayyati isi bisaanini guuta.
Worri ato deemu jajabaate,
Waaqa, waaqoota ch'ufa ira jiru,
Sioni gubbati arga.
Ee AABBO Waaqa gudda,
kad'acha tiyya naa d'agayi;
Ee Waaqa Yakobo, na ch'aqasi!
Ee Waaqa, hayyu keenna ka atini fohate, eebisi.
Guyyaani toko ka Mana kanke keesa olaani,
guyya kuma toko ka fulla d'ibi olaani ira jira;
fulla anini mana worra ch'ubbuti galu ira,
hojja anini balbala Mana Waaqa kiyya
keesa eju ira naa jirti.
AABBO Waaqi aka aduu nuu tahe,
aka wonte nu qorqorate, nu qarqaare,
guddinna nuu kenne, nu eebise.
Inni nama d'uga gula deemu
waan dansaa tokole ind'owu.
Ee Waaqa gudda,
nami si d'ugeefatu gammada akami qaba!

Ee AABBO Waaqa,
atini yayu lafa tanteeti naate;
ammalle atini yayu worra Israeli
hormaatati deebifte.
Atini ch'ubbu gumi teeti araaramteefi,
wollaala worraa ch'ufale biraa deemte.
Atini dallansu worrati dallante galfatte,
worrati dallanu dide.
Ee Waaqa, qarqaarsa keenna, ufiti nu deebisi,
deebitele, nu indidiini!
Atini haga jiru jireenna nuti dallanta?
Dallansuuni tante haga jiru jireenna sira ingaltu?
Nu jajabeesi, duuba, nu gumiini tante si faarsina.
Ee AABBO Waaqa,
jaalala tante ta ind'umanne nu garsiisi;
baafama kankele nuu kenni.
Anini waan AABBO Waaqi jed'u ch'aqasu jira;
inni nu gumi isaa qulqullo nagaya nuu kakhate,
yo nu kara keenna daallicha duri kaaniti deebiu baanne.
D'uguma baafami isaa
nama isaa sodaatu iraa fago injiru,
akasiini guddinni isaa
lafa teenna keesaa imbahu.
Jaalala ind'umanneefi d'ugaani wold'at'e,
qajeelumafi nageenni wold'ungate.
Qajeelumti namaa lafa ira kaate oldeemte,
d'ugaani Waaqaleeni gubbaa gadi ilaalti.
AABBO Waaqi hormaata nu kenna,
lafti teennaleeni sagale guddo baafti.
D'ugaani AABBO Waaqa dura deemte,
kara hartiifi.

Ee AABBO Waaqa,
na ch'aqasi na jala owaad'i;
anini hiyyeesa laafa qarqaarsa womatu inqamne.
Anini namuma keeti,
dua keesaa na baasi.
Anini hojattu tante ta si d'ugeefatu, na baasi.
Atini Waaqa kiyya,
naa nahi anini guyya ch'ufa siuma kad'ad'a.
Ee AABBO Waaqa, hojattu tante gammachiisi,
wonti akanatiifi kad'achaani tiyya gubbati si d'aqabdi.
Atini nuu dansa,
ch'ubbule nu araaramta.
Ammalle nama si kad'atu ch'ufa
jaalala tante ta ind'umanne garsiifta.
Ee AABBO Waaqa, kad'acha tiyya naa d'agayi,
qarqaarsa anini tae kad'ad'u ch'aqasi.
Waan atini kad'acha tiyya d'ageetuufi
anini hojja gaargala si yaamad'a.
Ee AABBO Waaqa, waaqi d'ibiini
ka aka keeti tokoleeni injiru,
ka waan atini hojatte taka hojate injiru.
si durati gajette,
maqa kanke guddifti.
Atini jaba, ammalle waan mama tolchita;
siuma ch'allati Waaqa.
Ee AABBO Waaqa, kara kanke na garsiisi,
duuba anini jabaad'e d'uga tante gula deema;
aka anini garaa tokooni si hojad'u
herega kiyya ch'ufa qajeelchi.
Ee AABBO Waaqa kiyya,
anini garaa kiyya ch'ufaani si faarse,
haga jiru jireenna maqa kanke guddisa.
Jaalalti tante, akami guddo!
Atini boola duale ya keesaa na baafte.
Ee Waaqa, nami kiyyibaani na had'uu jira,
nami naasu inqamne,
ka waan kanke iyyaale,
na ijeesuu fed'a.
Ammo atini, ee AABBO Waaqa,
Waaqa naasufi jaalala qabu,
ka hurrise indallanne,
ka hojja ch'ufa namaa nahe nama jaalatu.
Nati garagali, na nahi;
akuma haati tiyya si hojate
anileeni si hojad'a,
tanaafi na jabeesi, na baasi.
Ee AABBO Waaqa,
akheekha dansuma teeti na garsiisi,
aka nyaapi kiyya,
hojja atini na jabeesite na qarqaartu argu, ch'eeru.

AABBO Waaqi gaara isaa qulqullo irati
dira ufii jaarate;
inni lafa Israeli ch'ufa ira
dira Yerusalemu jaalata.
Ee dira Waaqaa,
waan kanke dansa inni dubbatu ch'aqasi:
Anini gaafa gosa naa saalfatu ch'ufa maqa t'aafu,
Misirifi Babiloni keesati t'aafa;
gosa ch'ufa worra Yerusalemuti herega,
worra Filistitifi ka Tirotifi ka Kushile.
Ammalle biyyiti waan Sioni dubbatte waan jettu,
Gochiti tunini ch'ufti achiti d'alate,
Waaqi guddaleeni isi jabeesa.
AABBO Waaqi maqa gosa ch'ufa t'aafe,
worra suni ch'ufaani worra Yerusalemu jed'a.
Worri sirbe, faaru d'aate waan jed'u;
eebiti teenna ch'ufti Sioni keesaa baati.

Ee AABBO Waaqa qarqaarsa kiyya,
anini guyya ch'ufa si yaamad'e,
halkani ch'ufa si dura
d'ufe si kad'ad'a.
Kad'achaani tiyya ha si geetuti;
boha tiyyale d'agayi, na qarqaari!
Gaargali guddaani ya na qabate,
diquma lubbuuni na keesaa imbahini.
Irreeni ch'ufti ya nara hobaate,
anini nama duu jiru fakaad'a.
Yayu reefa keesati na lakisani,
anini nama fit'ani awaala keesa ch'iisu fakaad'a,
ka atini deete,
qarqaarsa kanke ch'ufa iraa kute.
Atini yayu boola qile dukanooftu keesa na buufte.
Dallansuuni tante nati ulfaatte,
d'awaani isiileeni na ch'ach'absite.
Atini yayu jaalani tiyya na biraa fuute,
worra na jibbisifte.
Anini ya haada seene,
dandae imbaqad'u;
gaargali ya nara dabre,
lafale argu na d'owe.
Ee AABBO Waaqa,
anini guyya ch'ufa si yaamad'e,
harka si dura qabad'e si kad'ad'a.
Atini nama due jette,
waan mama intolchita?
Worri kae si infaarsa?
Waan jaalala tanteeti ta ind'umanne
awaala keesati indubbatani?
Yokhaani d'uga tante fulla irreesati indubbatani?
Fulla dukana suni keesati
waan mama ka atini tolchite imbeekhani?
Yokhaani worra waan isaani ded'ani,
lafa isaani keesati dansuma tante ini argani?
Ee AABBO Waaqa,
anini si yaamad'a, na qarqaari!
Diirama ch'ufa si kad'ad'a.
Ee AABBO Waaqa, atini maafi na lakifte,
fuula kanke na d'ofata?
Haguma gaafa ijoolluma tiyyaati asi anini gaargale,
lubbuuni qadadani na bira ejite;
gaargali atini na gaargalchite
ya nati ulfaate ufi na jibbaachise.
Atini ya aka male nati dallante,
na haate na balleesite.
Hojja ch'ufa aka fach'aa bisaani na marsani nati gasiqani.
Atini jaalani tiyya jabdu naraa fuute,
dukanti wahela na taate.

Ee AABBO Waaqa,
anini hojja ch'ufa jaalala tante ta ind'umanne faarse,
d'uga tante haga jiru jireenna odeesa.
Anini imbeekha, aka jaalalti tante haga hegeri teete
d'ugaani tanteeleni haga gubbani jirtu ch'ufa teetu.
Atini waan jette,
Anini nama anini fohad'e wold'aqisa woliini tolfad'e
hojattu tiyya Daudi waan jed'eeni,
hojja ch'ufa nama hayyu tahu ind'abani.
Anini hayyuma d'aloota keeti
haga jiru jireenna jabeesa.
Gubbaani maro waan mama
ka atini tolchitufi si faarsite,
Ee AABBO Waaqa, d'uga tante guddifti.
Nami gubbaa jiru, ka aka kanke jiru injira?
Worri gubbaa, nami si gahu, tokoleeni injiru.
Woldeenna worra qulqullo keesati si ulfeesani,
worri suni ch'ufti si sodaata.
Ee AABBO Waaqa gudda,
jabaani aka keeti tokoleeni injiru.
Ee AABBO Waaqa,
atini waan ch'ufa keesa d'uga tolchita.
Atini baariini ch'ufa mohate,
d'awa isale ch'allisifta.
Atini gorjama Rahabu jed'ani ch'ach'absite ijeefte,
irre tante guddooni nyaapa kanke dabsatte.
Gubbafi laftileeni teeti,
lafafi waan keesa jira ch'ufa siumati uume.
Atini mirgaafi bitale uumte,
gaari Taboritifi ka Hermoni gammade sii sirba.
Atini akami jabeenna qabda,
irreeni tante akami jabdu!
Finna kanke d'ugaafi
qajeeluma irati yayabani;
d'ugaafi jaalalti waan atini tolchitu ch'ufa keesati mullatti.
Nami si kad'ate si faarsu,
ka naasu tante ta ifsa keesa tau, akami gammada!
Maro teetifi worri hojja ch'ufa gammade,
dansuma tante faarsa.
Atini waan guddo nu dabsachiifte,
jaalala tante keesa nu jabeesita.
AABBO Waaqa, atini wonte teenna;
siuma Waaqa qulqullo Israeliti hayyu nuu kenne.
Duri daayya keesa waan atini hojattu tante
ta d'ugaatini jette;
anini namicha janna toko qarqaare,
nama anini gumi keesaa fohad'e
barch'uma hayyu kenneefi.
yayu d'ad'a qulqullooni muude hayyu tolche.
Irreeni tiyya hojja ch'ufa isa woliini jirti,
jabeenni kiyyaleeni isa jabeesa.
Nyaapi isaa dandae woma isa intolchu,
ch'ubbichileeni dandae isa indabsatu.
Anini nyaapa isaa balleese,
nama isa jibbule ijeesa,
isa jaalad'e, lakisu dide
hojja ch'ufa woi dabsachiisa.
Anini lafa inni mohatu Baariini gudda iraa fuud'e
galaana Efratiti d'aaba.
Inni waan nani jed'u,
Atini abba kiyyafi Waaqa kiyya,
siida kiyyafi qarqaarsa kiyya.
hayyu hayyu ch'ufa ira jiru, isa tolcha.
Anini waan isaati kakhad'e ch'ufa guute,
wold'aqisi anini isa woliini tolfad'e
haga jiru jireenna imbadu.
Barch'umaani hayyuma haguma jiru
worra isaa keesa imbahu,
nami inni d'ale haguma jiru jireenna hayyu taha.
Ammo yo nami d'aloota isaa seera kiyya ch'abse,
aada tiyya gula deemu dide.
Yo worri dubbi tiyya dide
jecha kiyya tufate,
anini maro ch'ubbu worraatifi
worra uleeni d'aane,
maro wollaala isaanitifi
worra lichooni gaargalcha.
Ammo anini Daudi jaalachu illakisu
yokhaani kakhu anini iti kakhad'e guutu male intau.
Anini wold'aqisa isa woliini tolfad'e inch'absu,
yokhaani dubbi afaani kiyya baate tokole garaingalchu.
Anini qara maqa kiyya qulqullooni Dauditi kakhad'e,
deebie d'ara siti indubbad'u.
D'aloota isaa haga jirani lafa keesa ind'abani,
haga aduuni gubba jirtu anini hayyuma isaa jabeesa.
Hayyumti isaa sunini,
akuma jia haga jiru jireenna teeti.
Ammo amma tana atini
hayyu atini fohateeti dallante,
dide lafa buufte.
Atini wold'aqisa hojattu tante
woliini tolfate ch'absite,
sure isaa ta hayyuma
biyye keesa buufte t'ureesite.
Atini naabo dira isaa ch'ach'absite,
maneeni isaa jajabdu ona tolchite.
Nami d'aatu bahu ch'ufti miha isaa saame,
ollani isaa ch'ufti isaa goyeesa.
Atini nyaapa isaa ch'ufa dabsachiifte gammachiifte.
Atini woraana isaa ch'ufa qara d'owarte,
akasiini had'iisa keesati isa dabsatani.
Atini boku isaa ka hayyuma iraa fuute,
barch'uma isaa ka hayyumale qaarifte.
Atini ato ingahiinu isaa jaarsite,
aka male isa ch'eersite.
Ee AABBO Waaqa,
atini haga jiru jireenna d'okhatta?
Dallansuuni tante haga yoomi
aka ibida bobau lakifti?
Aka guyyaani kiyya gabaaba qaabad'u!
Aka nami jiru jireenna inteenne qaabad'i.
Nami haga jiru indoone injira?
Eenuti dandae awaala dura ufi baasa?
Aabbo jaalalti tante ta duri meeti?
Wonti atini duri Dauditi kakhatte meeti?
Aka ana hojattu tante arabsani,
anini miid'a worra Waaqa imbeenne
suni ch'ufa obse, qaabad'i.
Ee AABBO Waaqa,
nyaapi kanke hayyu atini fohate muude miid'u jira,
fulla inni deemu ch'ufa isa arabsani.
AABBO Waaqa haga jiru jireenna ha faarsani,
Amini! Amini!

Ee AABBO Waaqa, atini haguma duriti,
fulla nu iti gallu nu taate.
Ato gaareenifi lafale inuumiini,
atini Waaquma,
ammalle haga jiru jireennale Waaqa.
Atini nama biyyeeti deebifte waan jettuuni,
isani biyyeeti deebia.
yokhaani akuma guyya kale ka dabre,
yokhaani akuma saati nami lafa eegu iti wolkaasu.
Atini aka fach'aa bisaani nu guurte,
nuu akuma oobju jira.
Nu harama mid'aani fakaanna,
ta diirama baate guddate daraarte,
ammo galgala qanch'oorate dootu.
Dallansuuni tante gubde nu balleesite,
nu mudamsiifti.
Atini ch'ubbu teenna ufi dura d'aabde,
hameenna nu d'ofanne diidati gabaafta.
Jireenna keenna ya dallansuuni tante kute gabaabsite;
inni akuma hafuura ch'ita.
Ganni nu teennu torbatama
ammo ya nu nama jaba taane saddeetamafa gaha;
ammo taatule wonti nu ira argannu
gaargalumafi laalala,
jireenni keenna gabaaba, yoosu dabra.
Eenuti aka dallansuuni tante jabdu beekha?
Eenuti soda dallansuuni tante
namaatiini d'uftu beekha?
Aka guyyaani keenna gabaaba nu garsiisi
aka akasiini nu qaro taanu.
Ee AABBO Waaqa,
dallansuuni tante yoomi nu lakifti?
Hojattu tante ch'ufaa nahi!
Diirama ch'ufa jaalala tante
ta ind'umanneeni nu quubsi,
aka nu gammanne haga jiru ch'ufa sirbinu.
Gammada haga atini duri
ganna heddu nu gaargalchite
nu laalefachiifte kana gahu nuu kenni.
Nu hojattu tante,
huji tante jabdu garsiisi;
d'alooti keennaleeni
ha guddinna kanke jaba argu.
Ee AABBO Waaqa keenna,
eeba tante nuu kenni
waan nu tolchinu ch'ufa keesati nu eebisi!

Nami AABBO Waaqati baqate,
qarqaarsa isa iraa fed'atu,
waan jed'uuni atini siida kiyya,
ka anini iti baqad'u;
Waaqa kiyya, ka anini abdad'u.
Inni t'urura si kayani ch'ufa duraa si baase,
ch'iisa d'ukuba ch'ufa jalaa si baasa.
Inni koola isaa jala si keeyate,
si d'osse, si qorqorata;
d'ugaani isaleeni woraanafi wonte si taati.
Atini waan halkani nama mudamsiisafi
t'iya guyya siini had'anifi.
Ch'iisa d'ukuba ka dukana keesa si qabatu,
yokhaani hameenna guyya ch'ufa si qabatu insodaatu.
Ato nami kuma toko si birati hobae
nami kuma kud'ani si birati raawatele
atini woma intaatu.
Atini aka ch'ubbicha gaargalchani
iluma tante ch'allaani garta.
Waan atini AABBO Waaqa gudda
qarqaarsafi siida atini iti baqatu tolfateefi,
gaargali tokoleeni si ind'aqabu,
wonti hamtuuni tokoleeni
mana keetiti ind'iaatu.
aka worri fulla atini deemtu ch'ufati si qorqoratu.
aka miila kanke d'akhaani ind'oomne.
gorjamaafi bofa had'aa hamtu qabu ch'ach'arasita.
Waaqi waan jed'u, Anini nama na jaalatu baase
nama aka anini AABBO Waaqa beekhu qorqorad'a.
Hojja worri na yaamatu anini jalaa owaad'a;
hojja worri gaargala keesa jiru
anini worraa wahelcha.
Anini worra baase ulfinna kennaafi.
Anini lubbu worraa d'eerese,
baafama kiyya garsiisa.

Ee AABBO Waaqa,
aki galata si deebisani akami dansa!
Ee Waaqa gudda,
aki maqa kanke faarsanileeni waan akami dansaa.
Hojja jaalala tante ta ind'umanne
guyya ch'ufa waan isii odeesani,
d'uga tante halkani ch'ufa kiraariifi
miha sirba d'ibi d'aani faarsani akami dansa.
Ee AABBO Waaqa, hujiini tante jabduuni ya na gammachiifte;
maro waan atini harka kanketiini tolchiteefi anini gammade sirba.
Ee AABBO Waaqa, hujiini tante akami jabdu!
Heregi kanke akami gudda!
Waan kana daalleeni imbeetu,
gowaani inhubatu:
ch'ubbichi, ato aka marra bahe,
nami hamaani woi horatele,
worra haga jiru jireenna balleesani,
ammo ee AABBO haga jiru jireenna si guddisani.
Nu imbeenna, nyaapi kanke ch'ufti inhobaa,
nama ch'ubbu tolche ch'ufa imballeesani.
Atini yayu jabeenna aka gafarsa naa kennite,
na eebifte na gammachiifte.
Anini yayu nyaapa kiyya ka dabsatani arge,
iyyanna worra ch'ubbule d'agaye.
Worri d'ugaa qajeelani aka meet'i bahe,
aka hind'eesa Lebanoni guddata.
Worri sunini mukha Mana AABBO Waaqa keesati bahu,
ka achiti bahe guddate,
hojja jaarelle mid'aani d'ale
hojja ch'ufa dotaate bahu fakaata.
Wonti kunini aka AABBO Waaqi,
Waaqa d'ugaa garsiifti;
inni siida kiyya,
ka wollaala womatu inqamne.

AABBO Waaqi hayyu.
Inni guddinnaafi jabeenna uyyifata.
Lafti fulluma ufii ejiti,
dandaani inchochoosani.
Ee AABBO Waaqa, barch'umaani kanke
haga duri d'aabani taka inchochone.
Atinileeni haguma duriti kanuma, inuma jirta.
Ee AABBO Waaqa,
d'immuuni baariini qonqo olfud'ate
iyyite dibbifti.
AABBO Waaqi gubbaa fida;
inni dibbeesa baariinitifi
jabeenna d'awa galaanale ch'ufa ira jira.
Ee AABBO Waaqa,
seeri kanke haga jiru injijiramu
ammalle Mani kanke
haga jiru jireenna qulqullo.

Ee AABBO Waaqa,
atini Waaqa nyaapa ufii haalo baafatu;
dallansu tante garsiisi!
Atini nama nama ch'ufa qoru;
kai, waan kiyyiba malle kennifi!
Ch'ubbichi haga yoomi gammada?
Ee AABBO Waaqa, haga yoomi qilit'ama?
Nami hamaani haga yoomi
hameenna ufi ka tolcheeni kooru lakisa?
Ee AABBO Waaqa,
worri gumi tante gaargalche,
nama kanke ch'ufa dabsa.
Worri hiyyeeyifi haad'a hiyyeesa fit'e,
nama gosa d'ibi,
ka lafa teenna keesa taule, hobaase.
Worri waan jed'u, AABBO Waaqi nu inargu,
Waaqi Israelileeni waan keenna inhubatu.
Gumi tiyya,
isani akami daallooftani woi wollaaltani?
Isani yoomi woi barattani?
Waaqi ka gurra nuu kenne, woi ind'agayu?
Inni ka ila nuu kenne lafa inargu?
Inni ka gosa ch'ufa harkaa qabu,
worra d'aane inqajeelchu?
Inni ka nama ch'ufa barsiisu, qalbi inqabu?
aka heregi namaa woma imbaanele inuma beekha.
Ee AABBO Waaqa nami atini qajeelchite
Seera kanke barsiiftu akami ayyaana qaba!
Atini gaargala jalaa isa baafta,
haga boola qotani ch'ubbicha keesa buusaniti.
AABBO Waaqi gumi ufii illakisu,
yokhaani nama ufii lafa imbuusu.
D'ugaani gaadisa korati deebite,
nami d'uga qajeelani
ch'ufti isi gula deema.
Eenuti ch'ubbicha dide wahela naa tahe?
Eenuti nama hama jibbe goli naa tahe?
Ato AABBO Waaqi na qarqaaru baate,
anini sila yoona dueti boola keesa jira.
Anini waan jed'e, much'uch'ad'eti jigu jira.
Ammo ee AABBO Waaqa,
jaalala tante ta ind'umanneeti oli naqaba.
Yo heregi na qabate,
qalbiini tiyya waan heddu yaadde,
atini na gammachiifte garaa na jabeesita.
Atini jaarole gumbo nyaate,
dubbi d'ara d'uga tolchite,
nama dansaati malate,
nama woma iyyakini ijeecha iti murtu,
diqole jaalate iwahelchituufi.
Ammo AABBO Waaqi ya na dubbate
Waaqi kiyya ya siida na tae na qorqorate.
Inni maro dabaafi ch'ubbu worraatifi
worra gaargalche balleesa;
AABBO Waaqi keenna lafa ira worra balleesa.

Koota, AABBO Waaqa faarsina!
Waaqa nu baase gammadaani sirbina!
Koota isa dura d'umne,
galata deebimneefi,
gammanne, sirbine isa faarsina.
Wonti akanatiifi AABBO Waaqi Waaqa gudda,
inni hayyu gudda,
ka waaqa d'ibi ch'ufa ira jiru.
Inni lafa ch'ufa fida,
godaafi gaareeni gugurdoni ch'ufti tama isaati.
Inni baariinifi lafale
harka ufiitini uume fida.
Koota, isa durati gajenne kad'anna,
AABBO Waaqa nu uume durati jilbifanna!
nuleeni gumi inni qorqoratu,
hooliye inni tisse nyaachisu.
Arra dubbi inni jed'u tana ch'aqasa:
lafa gamooji ta Massa keesa
Maribati taate taatani garaa injabatina.
Achiti worri nati game na ilaalate
ato waan anini worraa tolchu qara argele.
Ganna afurtama anini d'aloota suni
jibbe waan jed'eeni,
worri kunini mata jajaba,
seera kiyya inguutu.
kakhad'e waan jed'eeni,
worri kunini boqota anini worraa kurfeese
haguma jiru inargatu.

Sirba haareesa AABBO Waaqaa sirba!
Lafti ch'ufti ha AABBO Waaqa faarsitu!
AABBO Waaqaa sirba, isa faarsa!
Guyya ch'ufa, aka inni nu baase, ha odeesani.
Guddinna isaa gosa ch'ufati odeesa,
huji isaa ta mama gosa ch'ufati hima.
AABBO Waaqi gudda,
isa guddisani faarsuu malani;
waaqoota ch'ufa ira
isaa sodaachuu malani.
Waaqooti gosa d'ibi taani ch'ufti
waan harkaani mid'aasani,
ammo AABBOONI ka gubba uume.
Guddinnaafi ulfinni kama isaati,
jabeennaafi mid'aagumti fulla inni tau jirti.
guddinnaafi jabeenni ka AABBO Waaqa jed'a.
Guddinni waan maqa AABBO Waaqati malle jed'a;
waan baasu maltani baasafi,
Mana isaa keesa isaa duraani koota.
Hojja Waaqi qulqullooni d'ufu,
isa durati ga jed'a;
lafti ch'ufti ha isa durati hollatuuti!
AABBO Waaqi Hayyu jed'a,
gosa ch'ufaati odeesa!
Lafa fulla iti uumani jirtu dandani inch'oosani;
inni nama ch'ufa d'uga gula qora.
Lafafi gubbaleeni ha gammadu!
Bisaani baariinitifi
wonti iti gala ch'ufti ha dibbiftu;
oobrufi wonti keesa jira ch'ufti ha gammaduti!
Duuba mukeeni badda ch'ufti gammade,
AABBO Waaqa durati sirbiti,
gaafa inni lafa fidu d'ufu.
Inni nama lafa keesa jiru ch'ufa
d'ugaafi qajeelumani fida.

AABBO Waaqi lafa fida!
Laftileeni ha gammaddu!
Lafti afaani baariini jirtu ha gammaduti!
Dumansaafi dukanti isa marsiti;
inni d'ugaafi qajeelumani lafa fida.
Ibidi isa dura deeme,
nyaapa isaa ka isa marse guba.
Angaasuuni isaa angaate lafati ifsiti;
laftileeni isi agarte jennaani hollatte.
Gaareeni aka haanch'a
AABBO Waaqa abba lafa ch'ufa durati bat'i.
Gubbaani d'uga isaa odeesite,
akasiini gochiti ch'ufti guddinna isaa agarti.
Nama waaqoota d'ara kad'atu ch'ufa inch'eersani;
waaqooti ch'ufti d'ufte
AABBO Waaqa durati gajejeti.
Worri Sioni gammade,
diri Yudaleeni qilit'ama,
maro qorsuma tanteetitifi ee AABBO Waaqa,
Ee AABBO Waaqa gudda, atini lafa ch'ufa fida;
atini waaqoota d'ibi ch'ufa ira jirta.
AABBO Waaqi nama waan hamtu jibbu injaalata;
inni lubbu gumi isaa jabeese qorqorate,
harka worra ch'ubbuu jalaa baasa.
Ifsaani nama d'ugaati ifse,
nami qajeelaleeni gammada argata.
Maro waan AABBO Waaqi tolchetiifi,
isani worri d'ugaa gammada galata deebisaafi.

Sirba hareesa Waaqaa sirba,
maro inni waan mama tolcheefi!
Inni harka isaatiifi irre isaa qulqullooni
ya waan ch'ufa dabsate.
AABBO Waaqi aka nama dabsate biyyati odeese,
jabeenna inni namaani baasu gosa ch'ufaati hime.
Inni kakhu gumi Israeliti kakhate,
jaalala isaa ta ind'umanneeni jabeese guute.
Nami lafa keesa jiru ch'ufti
yayu aka Waaqi keenna woi dabsate arge.
Lafti ch'ufti ha gammade AABBO Waaqa sirbitu.
Sirbaafi faaru gammadatiini isa faarsitu!
AABBO Waaqa faarsa!
Kiraari d'aa, isa faarsa!
Fulludofi magalata d'aa,
AABBO Waaqa, hayyu keennaa, gammadaa sirba.
Baariinifi wonti keesa jira ch'ufti ha dibbiftuti;
lafafi nami keesa tauleeni ha sirbuti.
Galaana ch'ufa, harka d'aa,
kubile, gammada,
AABBO Waaqa durati woliini sirba.
Wonti akanatiifi inni d'ufe lafa fida,
inni gosa lafa keesa jirtu ch'ufa
d'ugaafi qajeelumani fida.

gochiti ch'ufti ha hollatuuti.
Inni waan lubbu qaba,
ka koola gubba barch'uma isaa ira tae,
jennaani lafti ch'ufti chochote.
AABBO Waaqi Sioni keesa guddinna qaba:
inni gosa ch'ufa ira jira.
Nami ch'ufti ha maqa isaa gudda jaba faarsuti;
inni qulqullo!
Ee Hayyu gudda, atini waan d'uga jaalate,
Israeli keesa d'uga suni jabeesita;
atini d'ugaafi qajeeluma lafaani d'ufte.
AABBO Waaqa keenna faarsa,
barch'uma isaa dura koota,
isaa kad'ad'a!
Isumati qulqullo!
Musafi Harunini qaalole isaati,
Samuelini nama maqa isaa yaamate;
worri AABBO Waaqa yaamate,
inni worra jalaa owaate.
worri aadaafi seera inni kenneefi guute.
Ee AABBO Waaqa keenna,
atini gumi tante jalaa owaate,
aka atini Waaqa woi namaa araaramu garsiifte,
ato maro ch'ubbu worraatifi
worra gaargalchitele.
AABBO Waaqa keenna faarsa,
gaara isaa qulqullo irati isa kad'ad'a!
AABBO Waaqi keenna qulqullo.

Lafti ch'ufti ha gammade
AABBO Waaqa faarsitu!
Gammadaani AABBO Waaqa kad'ad'a,
sirba, isa dura koota!
Aka AABBOONI Waaqa qaabad'a,
isaati nu uume, nu nama isaati;
nu gumi isaati,
hooliye inni tisse nyaachisu.
Balbala Mana Waaqaa seena,
galata isaa deebisa,
naabo isaa seena, isa faarsa.
Galata isaa deebisa,
maqa isaa faarsa.
jaalalti isaa ind'umatu
d'ugaani isaaleeni haguma
jiru jireenna jirti.

Anini waan d'ugaafi
jaalala teeti sirba,
ee AABBO Waaqa, sii sirba.
Anini ufi tissa,
waan hamtu keesa inseenu.
Atini yoomi nati d'ufta?
Anini garaa qulqullooni mana kiyya keesa taa,
waan hamtule inoobsu.
Anini adaba nama Waaqa iraa goru injibba;
worra akasi suni waan worri tahu iti ind'iad'u.
Anini d'ara dubbad'e,
nama sobe,
waan hamtu keesa inseenu.
Anini nama d'ossaani hameenna
nama d'ibi dubbatu imballeesa;
anini nama kiyyibe ufi guddisu inoobsu.
Anini nama jabaate Waaqa d'ugeefatu
eebiseefi mana kiyyati galcha.
Nami d'uga ch'alla gula deemu naa hojata.
Nami kiyyibaani mana kiyya keesa intahu,
d'artichi tokoleeni na dura inejju.
Guyya ch'ufa anini worra ch'ubbu lafa keesaa balleese,
nama hameenna tolchu ch'ufa
dira AABBO Waaqa keesaa gussa.

Ee AABBO Waaqa, kad'acha tiyya naa d'agayi,
qarqaarsa anini si kad'ad'u naa kenni!
Hojja anini gaargala qabu naraa garaingaliini!
Na ch'aqasi, hojja anini si yaamad'u
hurrisi na qarqaari!
Guyyaani kiyya akuma aara dabru jira,
nafi kiyya aka ibida bobaa.
Lubbuuni tiyya yayu aka buuyo gogodde ch'ach'abt'e;
anini sagale tokole nyaachu imfed'u.
Anini ya waacha d'aqe ufi jibbaad'e
gogafi lafe ch'alla tahe.
Anini allaati lafa aloo yokhaani urungu
onati galtu fakaad'a.
Anini rafu dad'abe,
simpirre koba mana gubba teetu fakaad'a.
Hojja ch'ufa nyaapi kiyya na miid'a,
nami na goyesuleeni
maqa kiyyaani woli abaara.
Maro dallansu tanteetifi
daaraani sagale naa taate,
imimaani kiyyaleeni
waan anini d'uguuni wolti makhamani.
Atini oli na fuute gadi na gatte.
Jireenni kiyya gaandidu galgalaa fakaata,
anini buyyo gogodde fakaad'a.
Ammo Ee AABBO Waaqa,
atini hayyu haga jiru jireennati!
Gurri kanke haguma jiru imbaddu.
Atini kaate, Sioni naata;
hojaani ya geete ta isii nahu malani;
hojaani suni tana.
Hojattuuni tante isi jaalati,
ato isi balleesanile;
ato isiini badda ona taatele
worri isii naha.
Gochiti ch'ufti AABBO Waaqa sodaate,
hayyooti lafa ch'ufaleeni
jabeenna isaa sodaati.
Hojja AABBO Waaqi dira Sioni
ka qara bade jaaru,
inni guddinna ufii nama garsiisa.
Inni gumi isaa ta lakisani ch'aqase,
kad'acha worraale d'agayaafi.
Waan AABBO Waaqi tolche
d'aloota takaa tanalee t'aafa,
aka akasiini nami qara ind'alatinileeni isaa faarsu.
AABBO Waaqi, ka fulla qulqullo gubbaa jiru,
Fulla Qulqullo suni gadi ilaale, lafa arge.
Inni waacha worra hid'aansa keesa jiru d'agaye,
nama duisa iti murani gad'iisa.
Duuba akasiini
maqa isaa Sioni keesati odeesani,
gaafa lafafi gochiti ch'ufti
wolti baate AABBO Waaqa kad'atu,
Yerusalemu keesati isaa faarsani.
Ato anini kaimatiyu
AABBO Waaqi yayu irre na d'owe,
guyya kiyya gabaabse.
Ee Waaqa, ka haga jiru jireenna teetu,
haga anini jaare hobauti na inijeesiini.
harka keetiini gubba mid'aasite.
Wonti sunini ch'ufti indabarti,
ammo atini haga jirtu inuma teeta;
wonti kunini ch'ufti akuma woya hobaati.
Atini aka woya isi jijirta,
isiini inuma badi.
Ammo atini sunuma,
ganni kankeleeni inhobau.
Ijoolleeni teenna nagayaani teete,
qorqorti tanteetiini
d'alooti isii nagaya argata.

Ee lubbu tiyya, AABBO Waaqa faarsi!
Ee nafa kiyya ch'ufa, maqa isaa qulqullo faarsi!
Ee lubbu tiyya, AABBO Waaqa faarsi,
dansuma isaa iwollaaliini.
Inni ch'ubbu tiyya ch'ufa naa araarame,
d'ukuba kiyya ch'ufa na fayyisa.
Inni boola awaala dura na baase,
naasufi jaalala naa kenne na eebisa.
Inni haga anini jiru ch'ufa
waan dansa naa kenne na quubse,
aka akasiini anini kaimuma tiyya keesa
aka risa jabaad'e taau.
AABBO Waaqi nama dabsani d'uga mure,
waan worraa malle kennaafi.
Inni mala ufii Musa garsiise,
waan jabdu ufi tolchele
worra Israeliti mullise.
hurre indallanu,
jaalalti isaaleeni ind'umatu.
Inni hojja ch'ufa lole nama ingorsu,
guyya ch'ufale namati indallanu.
Inni ch'ubbu teenna gula nu ingaargalchu,
yokhaani wollaala keenna gula
waan nu malle nu inkennu.
Jaalalti inni nama isa sodaatu jaalatu
haguma fageenna lafafi gubbaani wolhanqattu geeti!
Akuma ilti boru ila aduu iraa fago jirtu,
akasuma inni ch'ubbu teenna nuraa fageesa.
Akuma abbaani ilmaani ufiiti nahu,
akasuma AABBO Waaqi nama isa sodaatu naha.
Inni waan duri iraa nu uume imbeekha,
aka biyye iraa nu mid'aase inqaabata.
Jireenni namaa akuma buyyo jira
inni bahe aka buyyo daraara;
duuba bubbeeni d'ufte hafufte balleesiti
nami deebie inargu.
Ammo nama AABBO Waaqa sodaatu
jaalalti isaa haga jirtu
biraa indeemtu,
dansumti isaaleeni haga jirtu ch'ufa,
nama wold'aqisa isaa guute
seera isaa jabeesu ilakiftu.
AABBO Waaqi barch'uma ufii gubba d'aabe
duuba waan ch'ufa mohata.
Isani malaikaani jajabduni,
ta seera isaa guute dubbi isaa ch'aqaftu,
AABBO Waaqa faarsa.
Isani worri gubba jajabaani hojattu isaa
ta fed'i isaa tolchitu,
AABBO Waaqa faarsa!
Wonti AABBO Waaqi uume,
ta fulla inni fidu ch'ufa jirtu,
ha AABBO Waaqa faarsitu.
Lubbuuni tiyyaleeni ha AABBO Waaqa faarsitu!

Ee lubbu tiyya AABBO Waaqa faarsi!
Ee AABBO Waaqa kiyya, atini akami gudda!
Atini guddinnaafi ulfinna uyifate,
ifsa woyaa tolfate.
Atini gubba aka waaro ballifte,
mana kanke bisaani gubba irati jaarate.
Atini dumansa gaari tolfate,
koola bubbe yaabate.
angaasule hojattu tolfate.
Atini yayu yayaba lafaa jabeesite,
isiini deebite inchochootu.
Atini baariini aka woya isi gubba keete,
bisaani sunini gaareeni ch'ufa duuchani.
Atini bisaani suni d'owinaani
isaani si d'eetani:
Isani mandisu tante d'ageennaani baqatani.
Isaani gaara gubba baleeti ga buani,
fulla atini mid'aasitefiti yaani.
Atini seera bisaani suni keete,
aka isaani deebiani lafati infach'aamne.
Atini bale keesaa madda yaafte
jiddu kubile laga baafta.
Laga suni keesaa bineensi bisaani d'uge,
harreeni diidaleeni d'eebu baati.
Mukeeni d'aatu isa jiru irati
simpirreeni mana jaarate sirbiti.
Atini gubbaa gaareeniti ga roobde,
laftileeni eeba teetiini guutamti.
Atini marra horii baafte,
mukhale nama baafta;
aka akasiini inni mid'aanifi daad'i isa gammachiiftuufi;
d'aad'a inni ifsaatufi
qit'a jabeenna isaa kennule ira argatu.
Hind'eesi Lebanoni mukeeni AABBO Waaqi oobre,
bokaya gudda argata.
Mukeeni suni gubbati
simpirreeni mana jaarate,
mukeeni d'ed'eertu iraleti
baabo alloona mana jaarate.
Reeni alaa gaareeni d'ed'eertu gubbati galte,
osileleeni d'akhaa gubbati d'okhati.
Atini jia uumte,
akasiini bulti bonaafi rooba garsiifte;
aduleeni hojja d'iitu imbeeti.
Atini halkanile uumte
dukana keesa bineensi alaa ch'ufti gabaha.
Kubleeni nyeench'a ato adamsitu;
itante sagale Waaqi kennuufi barbaaddi.
Hojja lafti bariitu,
isiini deebite goda ufiti galte gach'iifti.
Duuba nami gabahe,
huji ufii haga aduuni d'iituti hojata.
Ee AABBO Waaqa,
atini waan heddu uumte!
Atini qarooma akamitiini
waan kana ch'ufa uumte.
Wonti atini uumte sunini ch'ufti
ya lafa guute.
Achi baariiniti jira —
inni guddo balla;
isa keesa bineensa hedduti gala,
didiqaafi gugurdaleeni.
gorjami Lewiathani jed'anileeni keesa tabata.
Wonti kunini ch'ufti
hojja sagale feetu sira barbaaddi.
Atini sagale kenniteefi
jennaani nyaatani quufani.
Atini dudda iti gaargalaani worri sodaate;
atini hafuura keesa funnaani
worri due biyye keesaa baheeti deebia.
Hafuura keetiini worri uumame;
atini jireenna haaraa lafaa kennita.
Guddinni AABBO Waaqaa
ha haga jiru jireenna tahuti!
AABBO Waaqi waan inni uume ira ha gammaduti!
Inni lafa millannaani isiini hollatte;
inni gaareeni tunnaani aari keesaa bahe.
Anini haga jiru ch'ufa AABBO Waaqaa sirba;
haga lubbuuni na keesa jirtu
anini Waaqa kiyya faarsa.
Sirbi kiyya ha isa gammachiisu,
wonti akanatiifi
gammadi kiyya isa iraa d'ufa.
Worra ch'ubbuu ha lafaa d'abani.
Lubbu tiyya AABBO Waaqa faarsi!
AABBO Waaqa faarsi!

Koota, AABBO Waaqaa galata deebisa,
isa yaamad'a;
waan inni tolche gosa ch'ufati hima.
Sirba isaa faarsa,
waan jabdu inni tolche odeesa.
Waan nu nama isaa taaneefi gammada;
nami isa yaamatu ch'ufti ha gammaduti.
AABBO Waaqa d'aqa, qarqaarsa kad'ad'a,
hojja ch'ufa isa yaamad'a.
Isani d'alooti Abrahamu, hojattu Waaqa,
d'aloota Yakobo ka Waaqi fohate,
waan mama ka Waaqi tolche qaabad'a.
Dubbi inni mure inded'ina.
AABBOONI Waaqa keenna,
jechi isa ka gosa lafa ch'ufaati.
Inni wold'aqisa ufii haga jiru jireenna guuta,
kakhu inni d'aloota kuma tokoti kakhate.
kakhu inni Isaaqoti kakhate guuta.
Yakobo woliini tolfate,
waan jed'eeni,
Anini lafa Kanaani sii kenna,
isiini hand'ura kanke taati.
Gumiini Waaqaa diqo,
lafa Kanaani keesaleti keessuma.
Worri fulla tau d'abe,
lafafi gosa d'ibi ch'ufa keesa mare.
maro worraatifi inni hayyoota gorse waan jed'eeni:
Gumi anini fohad'e woma intolchina
raagoota tiyyale intuqina.
sagale worri qabu ch'ufa balleese.
ka qara aka garbicha gurgurani,
worra dura erge.
morma isaa qaampara iti kayani,
haga wonti Yusufuuni fage guutamtuti.
Dubbini Waaqaa d'uga isaa murte.
nami lafa mohatu isa balchoomse.
finna lafa isa ch'ufa harka isaati deebise;
ammalle irreefi qarooma inni hojattu hayyuutifi
jaaroleeni barsiise qajeelchu isaa kenne.
nyaapa worraale ira jabeenna kenneefi.
Inni worra Misirii gumi isaa jibbisise,
worri hojattu isaa sobe mala iti d'aate.
Musafi Haruni fohate iti erge.
Worri waan Waaqaa ka mama jabdu
lafa Misiri keesati tolche.
ammo worri Misiri dubbi isaa dide.
qurt'umi worraale hobaase.
mana hayyule raachi guute.
biinniini lafa qabate.
bokaya d'akhaani roobufi
angaasu lafa worraati buuse;
inni zabibuufi oda balleese,
mukeeni ch'ufa ch'ach'abse.
muumme inqamne lafati baafate.
Awaanisi sunini mukhaafi
mid'aani lafa suni keesa jira ch'ufa nyaate fit'e.
lafa suni keesaa baase dura deeme;
worri ka qarsifi worqi baatu,
ka fayyaafi jabeenna qabu,
lafa suni keesaa bahe.
Worri Misiri worra sodaate,
deema worraa iraa gammade.
halkanile ibida ifsa worraa tahu kenneefi.
sagale gubbatiini worra quubse.
bisaani aka galaana yaa keesaa baase.
Inni kakhu qulqullo duri
hojattu isaa Abrahamuti kakhate qaabate.
Duuba akanaani inni gumi inni fohate
baase dura deeme worrileeni gammade sirbe.
oobru worra sunile worraa kenne,
aka gumiini isaa aadaafi
seera isaa jabeesite guutu.
AABBO Waaqa faarsa!

Maro dansuma isaatiifi
isaa galata deebisa;
jaalalti isaaleeni
ta jiru jireennaati.
Eenuti dandae waan jabdu
inni tolche ch'ufa hima?
Eenuti dandae faaru isaa ch'ufa
haga beekhe hima?
Ayyaana isaati ka d'uga tolche,
seera isaa hojja ch'ufa guutu.
Ee AABBO Waaqa,
hojja atini gumi tante eebiftu na qaabad'i;
hojja atini worra baaftu nale inded'ini.
Hormaata gumi teeti na garsiisi
gammada gosa tanteeti naa qoodi,
aka anini qooda suni argannaani,
gumi tante woliini sii faarsu.
Nu akuma ababoota teenna
yayu waan hamtu taane
siti ch'ubbamne daba tolchine.
waan mama ka Waaqi tolche inhubanne;
worri aka inni maro heddu
jaalala isaa ta ind'umanne garsiise ded'e,
Waaqa gudda galaana Diimati dide.
Ammo inni akuma qara kakhate kaani worra baase,
akanaani jabeenna isaa gudda nama garsiise.
gumi isaa lafa goddu ira taakisiise.
Inni harka worra worra jibbu keesaa baase,
nyaapa isaanile duraa baase.
Bisaani nyaapa worraa ch'ufa guuratani,
nama tokole bahu d'owani.
dubbi isaa d'ugeefate isaa faarsite.
Ammo worri yoosu waan inni tolcheefi suni ded'e,
ka mala womatu isa ingaafatini ch'ee,
waan d'ibi tahe.
Waaqa ilaalate;
tanaafi inni waan worri kad'ate kenneefi,
ammo d'ukuba hamale worrati buuse.
hojattu AABBO Waaqa qulqullo, d'ibifate,
jennaani lafti ch'itte Dathani liqimsite,
Abiramufi worra isale awaalte.
Ammalle ibidileeni goli worraa ira bue,
worra ch'ubbu kaani gube balleese.
waaqa sibiila ka tumani suni kad'ate.
Worri guddinna Waaqa jijire
akheekha sanga buuyo nyaatu tolche.
Worri Waaqa, ka lafa Misiri keesati waan jabdu tolche worra baase, ded'e,
inni achiti waan mama ka akami tolche!
Wonti inni galaana Diimati tolche waan akami mama!
Gaafa Waaqi gumi tiyya imballeesa jed'e,
hojattuuni isa Musani, ka inni fohate,
olkae Waaqa dura eje,
dallansu Waaqaa ta sila worra suni balleesitu,
ira d'owe.
lafa dansa sunile jibbe.
Waaro ufii keesati hafe gungume,
AABBO Waaqa ch'aqasu dide.
Tanaafi inni worrati kakhate,
harka olqabate waan jed'e;
anini lafa gamooji tana keesati isani fit'e,
duuba worri lafa d'ibi keesati hobaa.
waaqa d'ara ka Baali jed'ani kaani kad'ate,
sorio waaqa lubbu inqamne baasani nyaate.
Worri waan hamtu tahe,
akasiini AABBO Waaqa dallansiise,
d'ukubi hamaani worra qabate.
Ammo Finehasiini kae,
worra woyake kaani hobaase,
akanaani d'ukuba suni lafa keesaa baasani.
Isa waan inni tahe sunifi
qaabatani d'uga iti heregani,
haga jiru jireennale woma sunifi qaabatani.
worri AABBO Waaqa dallansiise,
maro worraatifi Musaleeni gaargala keesa seene.
Worri aka male garaa isa yake,
duuba inni herega male dubbate.
aka AABBO Waaqi worraani jed'e inhobaamne,
ammo dubra worraa fuud'e,
aada worra hamtu barate.
Gumiini Waaqaa waaqoota d'ara kad'ate,
akanaani badii ufiitini d'ufte.
waaqoota d'ara ka Kanaaniti sorio baase.
laftileeni worra harka d'iiga sunini t'uroofte.
Worri akanaani huji ufiitini ufi t'ureese,
waan ch'eera hamtu tahe Waaqati wollaale.
gumi ufiti dallane jibbe.
Inni harka gosa d'ibiiti worra kenne,
nyaapi worraaleeni worra mohate.
Nyaapi worraa worra dabse, ufi jalati bulche.
Maro heddu AABBO Waaqi gumi ufii baase,
ammo worri beekhaa isa dide,
haga qara irale ch'ubbu gula bade.
Ammo ha taatuti,
worri AABBO Waaqati boonnani
inni gaargala worra arge.
Maro worraatifi inni
wold'aqisa inni tolche qaabate,
maro jaalala ufii guddotifi worraa araarame,
nama worra dabsule ch'ufa worraa naasise.
gosa keesati nu firfirsani
keesaa nu deebisi,
aka nu galata sii deebimne
maqa kanke qulqullo faarsinu.
AABBO Waaqa Israeli ha faarsani!
Ammaafi hegerile ha faarsani!
Nami ch'ufti ha Amini jed'u!
AABBO Waaqa faarsa!

jaalalti isaa haguma jirtu ind'umatu!
Isani ka AABBO Waaqi baase,
dubbi tanaani isaa faarsa.
Inni harka nyaapa keesani keesaa isani baase.
Lafa nyaapa keesa isani deebise
ilaborutiifi ila adutii
mirgaafi bitaa woltiini isani d'ufe.
Nami gari lafa aloo, ta kara inqamne, keesa mare
dira iti qubatu fulla wollaale,
beelae d'eebote ufi jibbaate.
Jennaani worri gaargala ufii keesati
AABBO Waaqati bohe,
inni gaargala suni keesaa worra baase.
Kara qajeela garsiise,
dira worri iti qubatuuni worra gahe.
Worri AABBO Waaqa maro jaalala isaa ta ind'umanneetiifi
waan mama ka inni worra tolchele
galata deebisuu male.
Inni nama d'eebu qabu d'eebu baase,
ka beela qabule beela baase quubse.
Nami gari dukanae, dukana keesa taa,
worri nama hid'aansa keesa jiru
ka sansalatani hid'ani fakaata.
Maro dubbi Waaqa dide,
mala Waaqi guddaani worra d'ae tufate,
gula deemu dideefi,
worra ya hujiini hamtuuni ijeefte;
worri ya qarqaarsa d'abe jijige.
Jennaani worri gaargala ufii keesati
AABBO Waaqati bohe,
inni gaargala suni keesaa worra baase.
Inni gaargala dukana kaani keesaa worra baase,
sansalata worraani hid'anile ch'ach'abse.
Worri AABBO Waaqa maro jaalala isaa ta ind'umanneetiifi
waan mama ka inni worraa tolchele galata deebisuu male.
Inni balabala sibiila diimani mid'aasani ch'ach'abse,
sibiila gargari kute.
Worri ka gari daalle
tanaafi maro dabaafi ch'ubbu ufiitiifi
gaargali qabata:
worri sagalele agarta jibbe,
diquma lubbuuni keesaa imbahini.
Jennaani worri gaargala ufii keesati
AABBO Waaqati bohe,
inni gaargala suni keesaa worra baase.
Inni dubbi ufiitini worra fayyise,
boola duaa keesaa worra baase.
Worri AABBO Waaqa maro jaalala isaa ta ind'umanneetiifi
waan mama ka inni worraa tolchele galata deebisuu male.
Worri sorio baase galata isaa deebise,
gammade, sirba keesa waan inni tolche ch'ufa himuu male.
Nami gari hobolo duudde,
baariini keesa deeme daldala tolche,
akanaani waan nyaate d'ugu argate.
Worri waan AABBO Waaqi tolchufi
waan mama ka inni baariini gubbati tolchu arge.
Inni dubbannaani bubbeeni guddooni gad'ufte,
d'awa galaana chochoofte.
Duuba bubbeeni sunini hobolo olfuute,
bisaani keesati olch'ech'esifte.
Gaargala suni keesati jari sunini mumudame,
gugufate, aka nama farso d'uge dadaaqe,
ufi jibbaate waan tahuu d'abe.
Jennaani gaargala ufii keesati
worri AABBO Waaqati bohe,
inni gaargala suni keesaa worra baase.
Inni bubbe jabdu taani ch'allisise,
d'awani galaanaleeni d'au lakifte,
Worri maro bubbeeni sunini ch'allifteefi gammade,
innileeni fulla worri deemu fed'uuni worra gahe.
Worri AABBO Waaqa maro jaalala isaa ta ind'umanneetiifi
waan mama ka inni worraa tolchele
galata deebisuu male.
Worri guddinna isaa gumi keesati odeese,
kora jaarole keesaleti isaa faarsuu male.
AABBO Waaqi galaana gogose,
maddale yau d'owe.
Inni maro ch'ubbu worra achi tautiifi
lafa biyye dansa garagalche,
lafa aloo ta soodda ch'alla tolche.
Inni laafa gamooji garagalche lafa bisaani tolche
lafa gogoddule madda burqitu tolche.
Inni nama beela qabu achi quubsise,
