Ammo wonti Waaqi qulqullooni Israeli jed'u tana: Isani waan anini isaniini jed'u diddani nama dabsitani sobdani,
Tanaafi amma wollaala qabdani. Isani naabo d'akhaa ta old'eeresani jaarani ta ammalle jidduti gargari baqate, ta ato nami imbeenne tassa jiddu, fakaatani.
Akuma okote faara ta ch'ach'abt'e bulloofte, ch'abi isiileeni ch'ile ibida namaa fuud'u dad'abde, yokhaani bisaani bute keesaa namaa infuune fakaatani.
AABBO Waaqi guddaani qulqullooni Israeli, waan biyyaani jed'u, hojja ch'ubbu iraa deebitani na d'ugeefattani baafamafi jabeenna argattani, ammo isani akasi diddani,
Waan nani jettani, Hiyo! Akasiniti nu nyaapa keenna dura fardaani baqanna. Inuma baqattani! Mala keesani, fardi keesani guddo oria, ammo worri isani reebu fardooleeni worraa hagasi ira oriiti.
Isani nami kunki toko yo nyaapa keesani toko ch'alla agartani imbaqattani. Nyaapi keesani nami shani isani ch'ufa imbaqachisa. Duuba baandera keesani, ka gaara gubba ejaanju male, nami tokoleeni ka hafu injiru.
Ammo taatule, AABBO Waaqi guddo isani nahu fed'a, waan inni guyya ch'ufa waan d'uga tolchufi inni kurfo jira aka naasu ufi isani garsiisu. Ayyaana isaani, ka obse hojja ch'ufa AABBO Waaqa eegatu.
Isani, worri Yerusalemu keesa tau, deebitani imbootani. AABBO Waaqi naaso. Hojja qarqaarsa isa kad'atani inni isani qarqaara.
Aabbo Waaqi d'ipufi gaargala hama isanitini d'ufa, ammo isumati d'ufe isani barsiisa, isani waan deebitani isa barbaaddanifi inqabdani.
Hojja mirgaafi bita kara iraa gortani, qonqo isani duubaa dubbatu, ta karaani kana, gula deema, jettu d'ageetani.
Duuba waan isani harkaani boch'ani kad'atani, ta qarsifi worqiini mid'aasani, aka waan t'uri qabaati gadigatani waan jettani, Na biraa bada, nara fagaad'a!
Hojja mid'aani fach'aaftani, AABBO Waaqi bokaya isani erge mid'aani suni isanii baase sagale guddo isanii kenne, horiini keesanileeni marra guddo argata.
Qotiyofi harreeni ta oobru teesani qottu okhaya dansa ch'alla nyaati.
Guyya maneeni jajabdu nyaapa keesani ch'ach'absani worra suni hobaasani, lagi gaareenifi kubilele ch'ufa ufuma dibbise iraa yaa.
Jii akuma adu ifse, aduuleeni haga duri kaani ira maro torba ifsiti; akanaani ifsaani guyya toko ifsa guyya torba fakaata. Hojja AABBO Waaqi dirmamufi mada gumi isaa hid'e, fayyisu wonti kunini ch'ufti taati.
Me ilaala, jabeennaafi guddinni AABBO Waaqa fago mullachu jira. Ibidaafi aari dallansu isaa garsiise, hojja inni dubbatu dubbini isaa aka ibida wo gubdi.
Inni bubbe aka fach'aa bisaani, ka waan ch'ufa fud'atu, ufi dura erga. Ammalle inni gosa hafarse balleese bubbeeni sunini gosa ch'ufa wolti harte badi itiini d'ufte mala worraa hamale ch'ufa balleesiti.
Ammo isani gumiini Waaqa, akuma halkani hojja jila tolfattani gammadaani sirbitani gammadaani. Isani akuma nami hojja fulludo d'ae gammade Mana Waaqa jaba Israeli d'aqu tahu, gammadaani.
AABBO Waaqi qonqo jabdu nama d'ageesise, irre dallansu isaa nama garsiisa. Ibidaafi bokaya guddaafi bokaya d'akhaani roobufi bokaya muumme inqamneti d'ufa.
Worri Ashuru qonqo AABBO Waaqa d'ageennaani mudame harka isaatini gaargala argata.
Akuma AABBO Waaqi worra d'aanuni, gumiini isaa dibbeefi kiraari d'oofte sirbiti. Waaqumati worra Ashuru suni had'e balleesa.
Duri duri, fulla ibidi guddaani toko hayyu Ashuru iti gubu kurfeesani. Fullaani sunini gadi qile, ammalle ballo, qoraanileeni arti miju. Duuba AABBO Waaqati hafuura isaatini ibida gabaase guba.

Nama lafa Misiri qarqaarsa kad'achu d'aqu ya bade! Worri fardaafi gaari fardi hirkisufi askarti worraa heddu abdata. Ammo AABBO Waaqa Qulqullo Israeli, inabdatani, yokhaani qarqaarsa inkad'atani.
Inni waan tolchu jiru imbeekha, gaargala namati erge, worra ch'ubbu qabuufi worra worra qorqoratule illakisu.
Worri Misiri namuma, Waaqaniti; fardi worraleeni farduma, waan gubbaa gabueeniti. Hojja AABBO Waaqi wo tolchu, gochiti jabduuni irre d'abde gochiti laaftuni worri qarqaareleni badi. Worri lachu wolumaani d'umata.
AABBO Waaqi waan naani jed'e, Ato tissituuni haga feetu lalabde iyyitele, dandeete nyeench'a waan nyaate ira tau iraa inkaaftu. Akasuma wonti dandae ana, AABBO Waaqa gudda, ka d'ufe gaara Sioni nyaapa iraa d'owu d'owa injirtu.
Akuma simpirreeni mana isii keesati ilmaani isi gubbaa martu, akasuma anini, AABBO Waaqi guddaani, Yerusalemu qorqorad'e nyaapa iraa d'owa.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'e, Isani worri Israeli ya nati ch'ubbamtani na diddani, ammo ammatana nati deebia!
Guyyaani ind'ufa, ka isaniini ch'ufti waan qarsifi worqi ka isani harkaani mid'aasitani kad'atani ufira gattani.
Worra Ashuru woraanani balleesani, ammo taatule harka namaatiini imballeesani. Worri woraana duraa baqate, kaima worrale tisse tolchani.
Hayyuuni worraa mudamsuuni baqata, ammalle jari askarti isaa gugurdaleeni lubbu ufii sodaate baandera ufi biraa baqate. Dubbi tana AABBO Waaqati jed'e, ka Yerusalemu keesati guddisani, achiti sorio gubani baasanifi.

Takaa tana hayyuti d'ufa, ka d'ugaani lafa fidu, ammalle jari gugurdaani isa jala hojatuleeni qajeelumaani lafa fida.
Worri suni ch'ufti dao qilleensa nama ira d'owartufi fulla bubbe iti d'okhatani fakaata. Worri bisaani lafa gamooji keesa yaatifi gaadisa rabsu d'akhaa, ka lafa d'eebicha keesa tau, fakaata.
Ilaafi gurri worraleeni baname waan nami fed'u arge ch'aqasa.
Worri deebie obsa ind'abu, ammo worri qalbi hubacha qabduni wo tolche dubbi diideese dubbata.
Deebiani daalleleeni, nama d'uga injed'ani, yokhaani ch'ubbichaleeni, qajeela injed'ani.
Daalleeni dubbi daalliti dubbate, ch'ubbu ch'alla herega. Inni waan tolchufi ka jed'ule ch'ufa keesa kara iraa gore maqa Waaqa balleesa, ammalle inni nama beela qabu beela imbaasu, ka d'eebu qabule bisaani inobaasu.
Daalleeni ch'ubbiti, waan hamtu ch'alla tolchiti; isiini aka hiyyeesa sobde balleesite, d'uga sila worraa malte d'owitu, malatti.
Ammo nami d'uga waan d'uga tolche waan qajeeluma gula deema.
Isani nad'eeni machi keesa teetu, ta woma iyyane, waan anini jed'u kana ch'aqasa.
Amma quufa qabdani, ammo ganna d'ufu hojja tana, ufi jibbaattani, wonti akanatiifi gaafasi mid'aani zabibu inguuratani, yokhaani mid'aani tokole imuratani.
Isani qara machi keesa, ka woma iyyane, teetani, ammo ammatana mudama, holad'a! Woya baafad'a, ch'arqi hid'aanati marad'a.
Laalefad'a, mata qabad'a, oobru gumi tiyya ta zabibutifi ta mid'aani,
ta badde mukha qoraatitiifi mogoreeni iti baate, boha. Maneeni nami keesati gammadeefi dira keesati nami machi argate boha.
Mani hayyuleeni bade diri guddaleeni ona taha. Worraafi maneeni jajabduni dira worraatini qorqoratanileeni badde haga jirtu danqara taati. Harreeni diida achiti galte, hooliyeleni achi tikhati.
Ammo Waaqi deebie lubbu ufi nuu erga. Lafti badde taani wo baafte oobruleeni sagale baafti.
Lafa gamoojitifi ta oobrule keesa d'ugaafi qajeeluma tolchani.
Waan nami ch'ufti d'uga gula deemuufi, lafti nagayafi finna dansa argatte, wonti ch'ufti tolti.
Gumiini tiyya nagayaani teete, sodaani lafa keesaa badde, finni dansaani d'ufa.
(Ammo bokeeni d'akhaani roobu baddati roobe, dirale ch'abse balleesa.)
Nami ch'ufti gammade, bisaani lafa ira dabrani, fulla ch'ufati mid'aani fach'aasani, harreleefi looleeni fulluma ch'ufa tikhatani.

Nyaapa keenna ya badiini qabate! Worri yayu wo saame nama balleese, ka nami tokoleeni worra saame imballeesini. Ammo hojaani worri wo saame nama balleesu indabarti, namileeni waan worraa saame worra balleesa.
Ee AABBO Waaqa, nuu nahi, abdiini teenna siuma. Harka keetiini guyya ch'ufa nu qorqorad'i hojja gaargali nuti d'ufu nu baasi.
Yo atini dubbatte nuu kalchite, gochiti iyyana woraanaa d'ageennaani duraa baqatti.
Akuma awaanisi wo nyaatu, waan worraa ch'ufa saamani boojiani.
Guddinni Waaqaa hagami gaa! Inni waan ch'ufa imohata. Inni d'ugaafi qajeelumaani Yerusalemu guute, nama
isii jabeese qorqorata. Inni guyya ch'ufa gumi ufi baase, beekhumafi qarooma kennaafi. Wonti guddo worraa wo baha soda worri AABBO Waaqa sodaatu.
Worri nami jajanni qarqaarsa kad'ate, nami worri erge ka nagaya barbaadda yauleeni guddo bouti jira.
Karaani guddaani ya bade, nami imaltu gula deemuleeni injiru. Kakhu ch'absani wold'ageeti balleesani, nama tokole deebiani insaalfatani.
Lafti badde duwa taate, baddaani Lebanoni qanch'oorate gogodde, baleeni Sharonileeni lafa gamooji taate, Bashanifi gaara Karmeli ira mukhi baala buufata.
AABBO Waaqi waan gosa ch'ufaani jed'u, Anini amma kae wo hojad'e irre tiyya garsiisa.
Isani mala woma keesa injirre d'aatani, wonti isani tolchitani tokoleeni woma imbaatu. Lubbuuni tiyya ibida isani balleesu fakaati.
Isani aka haama gubani taatani, qoraati gubate daara taate fakaatani.
Nami d'iofi fago jiruleeni ha irre ani woini tolche d'agaye humna tiyya hubatu.
Worri ch'ubbichi Sioni sodaate aka hama mudame, waan jed'u, Eenuti dandae ibida wo balleesuni wolti gala? Nu nami dandae ibida suni ira hafu injira?
Nama d'uga tolche qajeela dubbatu, ka hiyyeesa indabsine, ka harka isaatini gumbo imfud'anne, ka gurra isaatini waan ijeecha d'agayu, didu, ka ila isaatini waan hamtu ilaalu didu,
ch'allati bahe, fulla jajabdu iti d'okhatani gaara gubbati tolfate nagayaani taa. Inni sagaleefi bisaanile argata.
Isani takaa hayyu miha isaa ka hayyuma dadansa naqate lafa ballo muumme inqamne fidu agartani.
Wonti isani duri sodaatani, nami damoosa nuraa guuru me? Nami doofi gubba eje nama eegu me? Jettani imbaddi.
Isani iti deebitani worra gosa d'ibi kiyyiba ka afaani isaani ind'ageenne dubbatu inagartani.
Sioni, dira nu keesati aada tolfannu, ilaala. Me d'iiro, Yerusalemu d'awad'a! Isiini lafa nagaya qabdu ta nami keesa qubachu male, isiini waaro haga jirtu arti inchochone ta d'isa isii imbuqimne ta yokhaani haada isiile inkunne fakaati.
AABBO Waaqi guddinna ufi nu garsiisa, nu galaanafi laga balla d'aatu qubanne, ammo hobolooni nyaapaa bisaani suni ira indeemtu.
Haadi hobolo suni woma keesa injiru, woya isiini deemsisani dandaani imbalisani! Nu hori nyaapa keenna boojine, horiini sunini lafa ira dabre qoodi isaa naafale ch'ufa gaha. AABBO Waaqati hayyu keenna tahe nu fide nu qorqorata.
Ammalle nami lafa teenna keesa tau deebie fayya d'aba inhimatu, ch'ubbu worrale ch'ufa inaraaramanifi.

Gosa ch'ufa koota, asi wolti baha, ch'aqasa. Lafa ch'ufafi nami keesa jiru ch'ufti ha arma d'ufe wo d'agayu.
AABBO Waaqi yayu gosa ch'ufafi duula worraleeti dallane baddi iti mure.
Reefa worraa inawaalani akanumati lakisani artumati ajae shame bada; gaareeni ira d'iigi worraa aka laga yaa.
Aduufi jiaafi urjileeni bulloofte awaara taati. Gubbaani aka woraqata wolti dachaasani wolti deebite baddi. Urjileeni akuma obeensa zabibutifi yokhaani ka oda jidde baddi.
Goraadeeni isaa d'iigaafi gabbinnaani ka d'iigaafi gabbinna ilmoole hoolaatifi elemiyeefi korbeeyyi ta sorio qalani fakaatuni ch'uubamti. AABBO Waaqi sorio tana dira Bosra keesati qale lafa Edomu keesaleti waan guddo qala.
Biyyiti akuma gafarsaatifi jiboota lafa dod'oofte laftileeni d'iigaani badde, biyyeleeni d'ad'ani fiilti.
Tunini hojja AABBO Waaqi worra Sioni baase nyaapa isaani balleese akasiini haalo baasufi.
Bisaani galaana Edomu garagalani gogogani, biyyeeni isiileeni garagalte dillo taate, lafti ch'ufti aka kosi gubani gubati.
Isiini halkani guyya ind'aamtu, aarileeni haga jiru jireenna keesaa yaa, bara ch'ufa lafti badde akanumati ona taate, deebie miili namaa keesa inejatu.
Urungufi haranqeesa male waan d'ibi keesati inargani. AABBO Waaqi lafa balleese duwa tolche akanumati lakisa.
Lafa keesa hayyu d'abani, jari gugurdaani isa jala hojatuleeni ch'ufti bada.
Qoraatifi goraani maneeni hayyuutifi dira gugurda jabeesani jaarani keesati bahe sare diidatifi urunguni iti galti.
Bineensa alaatifi worabeesi wolti bahe, jinnileeni woli yaamte goorjami halkani achi d'ufe fulla tau barbaada.
Urunguni achiti mana jaarate okhokaani d'alte, baqasite ilmaani isii guddifti. Allaatileeni achiti d'altufi kormani, wolti baati.
Kitaaba AABBO Waaqa ka waan bineensa keesati t'aafani barbaada sooma. Bineensa kana tokole keesa ind'abdani, inni ch'ufti d'alaafi korma qaba. Nami bineensa kana wolti baase AABBO Waaqa, isumati wolti yaame.
Nami lafa suni bineensa ch'ufaa gargari qoode kennuufi AABBO Waaqa. Bineensi sunini bara ch'ufa achiti gala lafti sunini haga jiru jireenna ta worraa taati.

Lafti gamooji gammade,
lafti aloo daraarti;
lafti gamooji gammade iyyite sirbiti;
isiini aka gaareeni Lebanoni mid'aade,
aka oobru lafa karmelitifi
Sharoni sagale baafti.
Nami ch'ufti mid'aagumafi guddinnaafi
jabeenna AABBO Waaqa arga.
nama garaa lafeeni waan jettani,
garaa jabaad'a, insodaatina,
Waaqi ya isani baasu d'ufe,
aka nyaapa keesani balleesu.
duudani wo d'agaye.
Naafi aka hiddii buraaqe,
dudaani woma indubbanneleeni gammadaani sirba.
Bisaani madda lafa gamooji keesaa yaani,
maansi aka ibida bobau kaani haro bisaani tahe,
lafti godduleeni madditi.
Fulla duri sareeni diida iti galtu
buuyofi ilaadufi meelati baha.
Kara gudda tokoti achi jira,
ka kara Qulqullooma jed'aniini.
Nami ch'ubbu qabu,
ka kara suni suni gula deemu injiru,
daalleleeni nama kara suni gula deemu iraa ingorsitu.
Nyeench'i tokoleeni achi injiru,
bineensi hamaleeni kara suni gula indeemu,
nama AABBO Waaqi baase ch'allati kara suni gula yaa.
Worri Waaqi baase sunini
sirbe gammade Yerusalemuti gala.
Worri haga jiru jireenna gammada,
laalefachaafi booti worra biraa baqatti.

Ganna kud'ani afreeso ka Hezekiani lafa Yuda mohate, Senakeribuni, hayyuuni Ashuru dira Yuda ka jabeesani jaarani ch'ufa had'e dabsate.
Jennaani inni namicha gudda askarti isaatini waan jed'e, Lakishi deemi, askarti heddu fud'ad'i, Yerusalemu d'aqi, hayyu Hezekiani booju kad'ad'i jed'i. Namichi kaani kara worri woya mid'aasu keesa tau, ka d'aatu fulla bisaani haro keesaa diratini yaani ejate.
Jennaani nami sadi ka gosa Yuda iti ga d'ufe: Eliakimuni ilma Hilkia, ka gudda mana hayyu; Shebna ka tatabe hayyu t'aafufi Yoa, ilma Asafu, ka waan t'aafani olikaayani ch'ufa harkaa qabu.
Namichi Ashuru guddaani kaani waan jed'eeni, waan isani Hezekiani jettani, Hayyuuni Ashuru waan jed'u, maanti akana garaa jabeese ufi si d'ugefachise.
Atini waan dubbi tanteetiini hoguma woraanaa dabsatu seeta? Amma eenuti si qarqaara, male keeti, ka atini hayyu Ashuru didde?
Atini, mala keeti, waan worri Misiri si qarqaaru seeta? Ammo mali sunini nama ilaadu ule sehe yo inni lafati d'aabu ch'abt'e harka woraantu fakaata. Aki hayyuuni Misiri nama isa abdatu tolchu akasi.
Ammo yo atini, AABBO Waaqa keenna abdanna nani jette; nami fulla Waaqa iti kad'atani sorio irati baasani balleese Hezekianiti? ka ammalle garagale worra Yerusalemutifi ka Yudatini, fulla sorio irati baasani ta Yerusalemu ch'allati Waaqa kad'ad'a jed'e.
Amma kooti, hayyu keenna ka Ashurutini waan taka woliini taha: Anini fardoole kuma lama sii kenna, yo atini dandeete nama hagasi ka Yubatu naa kennite.
Atini akami dandeete hojatu abba kiyya didiqo woma keesa injirale d'owarta, ka ufiftu waan worri Misiri gaarifi askarti farda sii kennu seetu?
Atini waan anini qarqaarsa AABBO Waaqa male lafa teesani had'e balleese seeta? AABBO Waaqati, Beeni, lafa suni had'i balleesi naani jed'e.
Jennaani Eliakimufi Shebnafi Yoani waan namicha gudda kaaniini jed'ani, AABBO afaani Aramutini nuti dubbad'i, ind'ageenna, afaani Ebrania nuti indubbatini, nami d'aatu teenna ch'iisu kunini ch'ufti nu d'agaya.
Inni waan jed'eeni, isani waan hayyichi Ashuru isanifi hayyu keesani ch'alla qonqo tana iti erge seetani? Hiyo akasiniti, anini gumi arma teteetu tana, ta eegi tana finch'aanifi udaani ufi akuma keesani sooratuti dubbachuu jira.
Jennaani namichi guddaani sunini afaani Ebraniatini lalabe waan jed'e, Dubbi hayyuuni Ashuru isaniini jed'u ch'aqasa!
Inni waan jed'u, Hezekiani isani insobini inni dandae harka kiyya keesaa isani imbaasu.
Inni, AABBO Waaqa abdad'a jed'e isani insobini. Waan AABBO Waaqi isani baase askarti Ashuru dira keesani iraa deebisu insehina.
Dubbi Hezekia inch'aqasina! Hayyuuni Ashuru waan isaniini jed'u, Nati koota, booju kad'ad'a. Duuba yo booju kad'attani, isaniini ch'ufti daad'i zabibu teesani d'uddani, mid'aani keesani ka oda nyaatani, madda teesani keesaa bisaani d'uddani,
haga anini lafa lafa teesani fakaatu, ta mid'aanifi daad'i qabdu ta qit'afi zabibu qabdu, keesati isani qufsisuuti.
Dubbi Hezekia ta inni, Waaqati nu baasa jed'e isani sobe suni ind'ugeefatina. Gochiti d'ibiini ta, waaqa kennati harka hayyu Ashuru jalaa nu baase jette injirti?
Waaqi Hamathitifi ka Arpadi me? Waaqi Sefarvaimu me? Waaqi suni tokoleeni ya Samaria harka kiyya jalaa baase?
Waaqi lafa suni tokoleeni yoomi lafa ufi harka kiyya keesaa baase? Isani akami, ka waan suni ch'ufa quba qabdani, Waaqi Yerusalemu imbaasa jettani re?
Ammo biyyiti, akuma hayyuuni Hezekiani worraani jed'e ch'ach'alifte akanumati teteete.
Jennaani Eliakimufi Shebnafi Yoani laalefatani, woya ufi tatarsaasani, deemani waan namichi Ashuru kaani jed'e hayyu Hezekiati himani.

Hayyu Hezekiani akuma qonqo worra kaani d'agayeeni laalefate woya ufi tatarsaase ch'arqi naqate Mana AABBO Waaqa d'aqe.
Inni Eliakimu, ka mana hayyuti guddatifi Shebna, ka tatabe hayyu t'aafufi qaalole gugurdole gara raaga Isaya, ilma Amozi, erge, worrileeni ch'ufti woya ch'arqi naqate.
D'aamsi inni, Isayati hima jed'e kana: Arriti guyya gaargalaati ka nu gaargalchani nu ch'eersani. Nu niiti dau jirtu ta ilme irre d'iibatuni d'abde fakaanna.
Hayyuuni Ashuru yayu namicha gudda hojatu isaa, Waaqa gudda arabsi jed'e erge. AABBO Waaqi kanke ha araba kana d'agaye worra isa arabsu kana gaargalchuti. Tanaafi atini amma worra keenna ka hafe Waaqa kad'ad'i.
Isayaani d'aamsa hayyu Hezekia d'agaye jennaani,
qonqo deebiseefi waan jed'e: AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Dubbi hojatu Ashuru, ta worri na arabse tana jettani insodaatina.
Anini hayyicha odu lafa isaati isa deebiftu d'ageesise duuba achiti isa ijeesa.
Namichi Ashuru guddaani kaani aka hayyichi isaani Lakishi bahe, dira Libna ka d'aatu suni jiru had'uu jiru d'agaye. Tanaafi inni achiti isa argu d'aqe.
Jennaani qonqooni worra Ashuruti d'ufte waan jette, Duuli Misiri, ka hayyu Tirhaka, ka worra Kushi iti abba, had'iisa keesani d'ufuti jira. Hayyuuni Ashuru dubbi suni d'agaye jennaani qonqo gara hayyu Yuda,
ka Hezekia jed'ani, erge waan jed'eeni, Waaqi isani d'ugeefatani, diri Yerusalemu harka hayyu Ashuru keesa inseenu jed'e isani insobini.
Waan hayyuuni Ashuru lafa inni balleesu fed'u ch'ufa tolchu ya d'ageetani isani mala keesani waan jalaa baatani seetani?
Ababooti tiyya dira Gosani fa, ka Harani fa, ammalle ka Resefu fa balleesite, worra Beth-Edeni ka lafa Telasari keesa jiru hobaafte waaqi worraa tokoleeni worra baasu dad'abe.
Hayyooti Hamathi, ta Arpadi, ta Sefarvaimu ta Henatifi ta Ivaleeni amma me?
Hezekiani tatabe worra suni iraa fuud'e soome mana AABBO Waaqa d'aqe, tatabe suni AABBO Waaqa dura kaye
Waaqa kad'ate waan jed'e,
Ee AABBO Waaqa, Waaqa Israeli ka barch'uma kanke ka waan lubbu qabu ka koola gubbaa jiru ira teetu, siuma ch'allati lafafi gubba uume lafafi nama ch'ufa fida.
Amma, ee AABBO Waaqa, nu d'agayi, waan harkaa nu qaba kana argi, araba Senakeribuni sii Waaqa gudda arabsu kana ch'ufa d'agayi.
D'uguma AABBO Waaqa, hayyooti Ashuru yayu gosa heddu hobaafte lafa worrale balleesite.
Waaqa worrale ch'ufa gubde waaqa woma keesa injirre, ka nami mukhaafi d'akha boch'e harkaani mid'aafatu.
Ammatana ee AABBO Waaqa keenna, harka worra Ashuru kana keesaa nu baasi, duuba akasiini gochiti lafa keesa jirtu ch'ufti aka atini ch'allaani AABBO Waaqa beeti.
Jennaani Isayaani, ilmi Amozi, qonqo gara Hezekia erge waan jed'e, AABBO Waaqi Israeli waan jed'u: Anini kad'acha atini waan Senakeribu, hayyu Ashuru, na kad'ate ya d'agaye.
Wonti isaa ka AABBO Waaqi dubbate tana: Ee Senakeribu, diri Yerusalemu si koble si goyeese si tufata.
Nama atini arabsite goyeesite kana eenu seeta? Nami atini tufate sunini anuma, Waaqa Israeli qulqullo.
Atini qonqo namaani ergite d'aade waan nani jette, Anini gaari kiyyaani fiit'e gaareeni Lebanoni ch'ufa kore dabsad'e. Ammalle anini yayu hind'eesa d'ed'eeraafi mukeeni haru ch'ufa ch'irad'e badda keesa lit'e fulla ch'ufa gahe.
Ammalle anini yayu lafa nyaapa ch'ufa d'aqe eela qotad'e bisaani keesaa d'uge, ammalle miili askarti tiyya ya galaana Misiri gosse.
Atini aka anini waan suni ch'ufa herege si tolchisise ind'ageenne? Anini amma waan suni ch'ufa ya tolche guute, nami irre atini dira jajabaani ch'absite bulleesite sii kenne anuma.
Worri dira suni keesa tauleeni irre d'abe mudame sodaate. Worri sunini buuyo diida yokhaani raafu mana gubbatu baatu, ta qilleensi owani ilaboruuti d'ufe balleesu, fakaata.
Ammo anini waan kanke ch'ufa imbeekha, waan atini tolchitufi fulla atini deemtule. D'aadufi kiyyiba kanke anini imbeekha.
Anini yayu kiyyiba kanke suni d'agaye tanaafi amma kiyyoofi lugama siti kaye si hirkise kara atini d'ufte kaani si deebisa.
Jennaani Isayaani waan hayyuuni jed'e, Waan kanati akheekha sii taha. Ganna kanafi ganna d'ufu, mid'aanuma ufumaani baha nyaata, ammo ganna sadeeso atini mid'aani fach'aafte murate zabibu oobrate mid'aani isii nyaata.
Worri Yuda ka hafu, akuma mukha hiddi isaa aka dansaa lafa keesa seene late mid'aani baasu jira.
Yerusalemufi gaara Sioni gubbati nami inuma hafa, wonti akanatiifi AABBO Waaqi waan suni tolchu male intau.
Wonti Waaqi jed'e tana: Inni dira kana seene, t'iya tokole indarbatu. Askartini wonte qabdu tokoleeni dira suniti ind'iaatu. Ammalle booliti qotani dira sunini marsani injirtu.
Inni ka dira inseene, karuma d'ufe deebia. Tunini dubbi AABBO Waaqi jed'e.
Anini dira kana nyaapa iraa d'owe baasa, maro guddinna kiyyatifi ammalle maro kakhu ta anini hojatu tiyya Dauditi kakhad'eefi.
Malaikani AABBO Waaqa fulla duuli Ashuru jiru d'at'e, askarti nama kuma d'ibbafi saddeetami shani hobaafte, boriyyaate lafti bariinaani nami reefa ufuma ch'iisu arge.
Jennaani hayyuuni Ashuru, ka Senakeribu jed'ani kaani, kae Ninawiti gale.
Guyya toko, ato inni mana waaqa isaa, ka Nizroki jed'ani, keesa tae waaqa kad'atu, ilmaani isaa lama, Adramelekifi Sharezani goraade ufitini isa ijeefte, lafa Araratiti baqatte. Duuba ilmi isaa ka Esar-Hadoni jed'ani fulla isaa hayyu tahe.

Bara suni Hezekiani fayya d'abe duu gahe. Raagi Isayaani, ilmi Amozi, isa argu d'aqe waan jed'eeni, AABBO Waaqi waan siini jed'u waan kanke ch'ufa mid'aafad'u, d'aamad'u atini d'ukuba kana iraa inhaftu, indoota.
Jennaani Hezekiani fuula manati deefate Waaqa kad'ate waan jed'e,
Ee AABBO Waaqa aka anini garaa tokooni si hojad'e si saalfad'e woma atini feetu ch'alla tolche qaabad'u akasi jed'e aka hama bohe.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi waan Isayaani jed'e,
Deebii, waan Hezekiani jettu, Anini, AABBO Waaqi, Waaqi ababo kanke Daudi, yayu kad'acha tante d'agaye imimaani kanke arge. Amma ganna kud'ani shani guyya kanketi sii dara.
Anini ammalle siifi dira Yerusalemu kana harka hayyu Ashuru keesaa baase, dira sunile jabeese, nyaapa iraa d'owa.
AABBO Waaqi akheekha kana sii kenne akanaani kakhu isaa guuta.
Faano hayyu Ahazini jaare gubbaa AABBO Waaqi gaandidu ejata kud'ani dudda duubati deebisa. Duuba gaandiduuni ejata kud'ani dudda duubati deebite.
Hezekiani fayya d'aba fayye jennaani faaru tana t'aafe waan jed'e,
Anini ch'imuma tiyya keesa ato jaare ufi injibbaatini
waan due fulla ekheraati deemu ufi sehe,
waan jed'e,
Lafa tana irati deebie AABBO Waaqafi
nama lubbu qabu inargu.
Akuma waaro buqisani fuud'ani
lubbu tiyya naraa fuud'ani,
akuma woya naraa kutani wolti dachaasani.
Anini waan Waaqi lubbu nara fuud'u sehe.
Anini halkani ch'ufa aka waan nyeench'i
lafe na ch'absu jiru d'ukubsad'e bohe,
waan Waaqi lubbu nara fuud'u sehe.
Qonqooni tiyya laafte
qallatte qonqo sabalisa fakaate.
Waan anini hojja ch'ufa tae Waaqa ilaalufi
ilti na aarte.
Aabbo, gaargala kana ch'ufa keesaa na baasi.
Ammo anini maani jechu dandaa?
AABBO Waaqati waan kana na tolche.
Garaani na hamate,
hiribi ila keesa na bade.
Aabbo, anini si male woma inqabu,
jireenni kiyya siuma;
na fayyisi, na jireesi.
Garaani kiyya ka qara hamate garagale,
amma nagaya horata.
Atini lubbu tiyya waan hamtu ch'ufa duraa baafte,
ch'ubbu tiyya dudda iti galte na araaramte.
Nami fulla Ekhera jiru
tokoleeni dandae si infaarsu,
ekheraani dandeete si d'ugeefatte si inabdattu.
Nama lubbu qabuti dandae si faarsa,
akuma anini amma tae si faarsu kana.
Abbootini d'uga tante ilmaani ufii barsiifti.
AABBO Waaqa, atini la na fayyifte.
Nu ammatana haga jiru kirari d'oofne
Mana kanke keesati si faarsina.
Duuba Isayaani qara waan jed'e, Mid'aani oda fuud'a, d'ulla isaati mat'ansa, duuba inni infayya.
Wonti inni akasi jed'eefi hayyu Hezekiani qara, Akheekhi anini Mana Waaqatini seenu kami? Jed'e isa gaafate.

Bara suni hayyuuni Babiloni, ka Merodaka — Baladani, ilma Baladani jed'ani, aka Hezekiani fayya d'abe d'agaye, tatabeefi waan d'ibi ergeefi.
Hezekiani worra ergaani d'ufe suni aka dansa d'ieese, durooma qabu ch'ufa worra garsiise — qarsi worqi, qumbifi qayya, ammalle miha isaa ka lola ch'ufa. Wonti inni olikaye ka mana isaa keesa jiraatiifi ka fulla d'ibi jiraleeni ka inni worra ingarsiisini injirtu.
Jennaani raagi Isayaani gara hayyu Hezekia d'aqe waan jed'eeni, Worri kunini eesaa d'ufe? Worri maani siini jed'e?
Hezekiani waan jed'eeni, worri lafa tanaa ind'umne, Babiloni d'ufe, lafa ind'iaanne.
Worri maani mana kanke keesati arge? Worri waan ch'ufa arge, wonti anini worra ingarsiisini injirtu.
Jennaani Isayaani waan hayyuuni jed'e, AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u,
Guyyaani ind'ufa, ka waan mana kanke keesa jira ch'ufafi waan ababooti tante olkeetele ch'ufa fuud'ani, lafa Babiloni geesani, wonti tokoleeni inhaftu.
Ilmaani atini d'altele haga toko boojiani, sasangisiisani, mana hayyu Babiloni keesa hojachiisani.
Jennaani Hezekiani waan Isayaani jed'e, Dubbini AABBO Waaqa ta atini nati himte tunini waan dansa. Wonti Hezekiani akasi jed'eefi, inni waan sehe waan haga inni lafa fidu lafti nagaya taatu sehe.

Waaqi keesani waan jed'u,
gumi tiyya garaa jabeesa,
garaa jabeesa!
Gumi Yerusalemu dubbi dansa iti dubbad'a.
Waan jettaniini,
gaargali keesani guddaani ya hobae,
daba keesani amma la isanii araaramani.
Anini maro daba keesanitifi
yayu guddo isani gaargalche.
lafa aloo keesati daandi
AABBO Waaqaa mid'aasa!
Lafa gamooji keesa
kara qajeela Waaqaa mid'aasa!
Bale ch'ufa duucha,
gaareeni ch'ufa diqeesa,
lafaani woli fakeesa;
duuba akanaani kubileeni ch'ufti diida taate,
lafti gooro qaqabdu ch'ufti dirirte qajeelti.
Duuba guddinni AABBO Waaqa mullate
nami ch'ufti arga.
Nami dubbi tana jed'e AABBO Waaqa.
Qonqo tana biyyati lalabi!
Qonqooni anini biyyati lalabu tami?
Qonqooni suni tana:
Nami ch'ufti aka buuyo jira,
mid'aagumti isaanileeni akuma daraara jirti.
Buuyooni gogodde, daraaraani bada,
hojja qilleensi AABBO Waaqa worra d'au.
D'uguma bultiini namaa haguma buuyoti,
yoosu hobaati!
Ee, d'uguma buuyooni gogodde,
daraaraleeni imbada,
ammo dubbini AABBO Waaqa keenna
haga jiru jireenna teeti.
Ee Sioni, gaara gubbaa kori,
odu dansa odeesi!
Ee Yerusalemu, qonqo guddooni lalabi,
odu dansa odeesi!
Dubbi insodaatini lalabi
waan dira Yudatini jettu,
Waaqi keesani kunooti!
AABBO Waaqi guddaani irreeni d'ufu jira,
aka lafa mohatu;
inni gumi harka nyaapa keesaa baaseni d'ufuu jira.
gumi ufi tissu jira;
ammalle ilmoole wolti guure
hampaare qomati qabata,
hawani isiile laanuma bobaasa.
Eenuti dandae bisaani baariini
guddinna isaani haga beekha?
Yokhaani eenuti dandae gubba harka ufitini d'und'uma d'aa?
Eenuti dandae biyye lafaa ch'ufa muduunu tokoti deebisa?
Yokhaani gaareenifi kubilele ch'ufa
miisana taka irati biima?
Eenuti dandae isaa barsiise
Yokhaani woi iti hima?
Waaqi beekhaafi hubachaafi mala woini
tolchani eenu ira fud'ata?
AABBO Waaqa durati gochiti ch'ufti
woma keesa injirtu, d'impu bisaani fakaati.
Lafti fago ta bisaani jiddu jirtuleeni
akuma awaara sablatti.
Bineensi badda Lebanoni keesa jiruleeni ch'ufti
sorio Waaqa keennaa baasani ingahu,
mukhi isiileeni qoraani ibidaa ingahu.
Gochitileeni isaa durati womaaniti,
yokhaani woma keesa injirtu.
Yokhaani eenuti dandae aka inni jiru namati hima?
Inni waan hogeesi harkaani mid'aaseeniti.
Yokhaani ka tumtuni Worqiini mid'aasite,
waan qarsiini mid'aasani jala dad'abdeeniti.
Nami irre qarsifi worqiini horatu inqamne
mukhu inhuroomne filate hogeesa dansati geese,
akheekha inqaarine mid'aafata.
Isani imbeetani?
Isani ind'ageenne?
Aka lafti duri uumamte ammalle imbaranne?
Nami uume nama barch'uma isaa ira
gubba waan ch'ufaa tau;
nami isa jalati didiqaate tut'i fakaata.
Inni gubba aka golla ballise,
aka waaro nami keesa tau tolche.
Inni nama irre qabu, ka lafa fidu, balleese,
nama woma keesa injirre tolcha.
Worri mukha diqaya d'io oobrani,
ka hidda imbaasini, fakaata.
Yo AABBO Waaqi bubbe gadi ergu,
gogoge aka bua buuyo bubbeeni fuuti.
Waaqa qulqullo, eenuni wolbira qabani?
Nami aka isaa lafa keesa injira?
Me gubba ilaala,
urji isani agartani tana eenuti uume?
Nami uume isuma,
ka isi tokotokooni gayaasu;
inni haga isii imbeekha ammalle ch'ufa maquma isiitiini yaama!
Irreeni isaa guddo jabdu, tanaafi urjini suni tokoleeni imbaddu!
Ee Yakobo, atini maanifi gungumte,
AABBO Waaqi gaargala kiyya imbeekhu
yokhaani yo na dabsanile, inni woma ira inqabu, jetta?
Isani imbeetani?
Isani ind'ageenne?
AABBO Waaqi Waaqa haga jiru jireenna jiru;
lafa ch'ufa haguma geetuuni isumati uume.
Inni dad'abe illaafu.
Nami tokoleeni herega isaa inhubatu.
Inni laafafi dad'aba jabeesa.
Ijoolleeni lalaafte,
kaimileeni gagagaba;
ammo nami AABBO Waaqa d'ugeefate isa eegatu
deebie irre argata.
Worri akuma risa barisaa, orie indad'abu;
yo miilaani yaule yae indad'abu.

Waaqi waan jed'u,
Isani worri lafa fago, ch'allisa, na ch'aqasa!
Waan dubbachuu feetani kurfefad'a; koota, dubbad'a.
Koota, wolwoldeenne, nama d'uga qabu ilaala.
Eenuti nama wo had'u ilaboruuti ga kaase
fulla inni bahe ch'ufa dabsacha keennafi?
Eenuti hayyootafi gosale ch'ufa isa dabsachiisa?
Inni goraade ufitini worra d'ae bulleese,
t'iya isaatini aka bua buuyo qilleensati firfirsa.
Inni hordofe reebe,
ka miili isaa aka waan barisu jiru nagayaani worra d'aqaba!
Eenuti waan kana tolchisise
d'aloota qara dabre ch'ufa ga yaama?
Anini, AABBO Waaqi, gaafa uumama injira,
ammalle gaafa muummele inuma jira.
Worri lafa fagoleeni waan anini tolche arginaani mudame holate,
wolti bahe ga d'ufe.
Hogeeyileeni wolqarqarte garaa woljabeesiti.
Hogeesi mukha boch'u nama worqi tumu garaa jabeese,
namichi burrisaani wo qulqulleesuleeni
nama tuubo irati wo tumu garaa jabeese waan jed'uuni,
saldaqaani baqu kunini dansa.
Duuba inni waan mid'aasani woltid'ise chochou d'owa.
gumi anini fohad'e,
ta d'aloota Abrahamu ka jaala kiyya.
Anini muumme lafati isaniini d'ufe
moga lafa fagooti isani yaame
waan isaniini jed'e,
Isani hojatu tiyya.
Anini isani indinne, ammo isani fohad'e.
Tanaafi insodaatina, anini isani woliini jira!
Anini Waaqa keesani wonti tokoleeni isani imudansisini!
Anini isani jabeese isani qarqaare,
irre isanii tahe harka kiyyaani isani baasa.
Nami dallansu teesani qabu ch'eeraani dua,
nami isaniini morku due lafa iraa bada.
Ato nyaapa keesani barbaadanile inagartani;
nami isani had'uleeni dandae woma isani intolchu.
Anini AABBO, Waaqa keesani;
harka mirgicha isani qabe, waan isaniini jed'u,
Insodaatina, isani qarqaara.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Israeli isani ato diqo muyole taatanile insodaatina;
anini isani qarqaara.
Nami isani baasu anuma, Waaqa qulqullo Israeli.
Anini waan woini daakhani,
ka ilkaani haareesa aka male qara qaba qabu, isani tolcha.
Duuba isani gaarale ch'ach'absitani balleesitani
kubile bulla tolchitani.
Duuba isani qilleensati oldarbitani,
qilleensi fuud'e, bubbeeni gargari firfirsiti.
Duuba isani waan anini Waaqa keesani tahefi
gammaddani ana, Waaqa qulqullo Israeli, faarsitani.
Hojja hiyyeesi d'ipu qabu bisaani barbaade d'abu,
ka lubbuuni isaa d'eebuuni gogodde,
anini, AABBO Waaqi, kad'acha worraa d'agaya;
anini Waaqi Israeli deebie worra illakisu.
Anini gaara gubbaani isaa adaala
ira galaana yaase, baleele maddisiisa,
anini lafa gamooji haro bisaani tolche,
lafa goddule madda bisaani tolche.
Anini hind'eesafi d'adachafi qilt'afi
ejersa lafa gamoojiti baasa.
Adaala lafati anini badda mukeeni dodoti d'ed'eertu gosa sadii qabdu baasa.
Nami waan kana arge imbeekha,
aka anini AABBO Waaqi akasi tolche.
Ammalle aka Waaqi qulqullooni Israeli
waan suni tolche inhubatani.
AABBO, Waaqi hayyuuni Israeli, waan kana jed'a.
Isani waaqoota gosa d'ibi,
dubbi qabdani dubbad'a.
Waan jechu feetani jed'a!
Arma koota, waan takaa tana taha nuti hima,
aka duuba yo isiini taate nu beennu,
waan duri tahe nu beesisa,
waan isiini jettu nuti hima.
Waan takaa tana nuti hima,
duuba aka isani waaqoota sunini beenna!
Waan dansa tolcha,
yokhaani waan hamtuuni gadi koota;
nu sodaachisa, nu mudamsiisa!
Isanifi wonti isani tolchitanileeni woma keesa injirtani;
nami isani kad'atuleeni kara badii keesa jira!
Anini namicha ilaboru tau toko fohad'e,
lafa mirgaa haasisa.
Inni hayyoota aka d'oqe ira ejaanjata,
aka nama okote faara mid'aasu
ka d'oqe d'id'itu.
Isani keesa, eenuti wonti sunini intaati jed'a,
aka nu dandeenne inni d'uga dubbate jennu?
Nami akasi jed'u injiru,
nami tokoleeni ka waan isani jettani d'agaye injiru!
Nami qara odu Sioniti odeese ana AABBO Waaqa;
anini qonqo Yerusalemuti erge waan jed'e,
worri kanke ya gale, kuno gad'ufu jira.
Anini waaqoota d'ara suni millad'e.
Worra, nama tokole ka wo jed'u, d'abe.
Worri nami tokoleeni ka waan anini gaafad'e
nati himu injiru.
Waaqooti akana kunini ch'ufti woma keesa injirtu;
isiini dandeete woma intolchitu —
irreefi jabeenna womatu tokole inqabdu.

Hojattuuni kiyya ka anini jabeesu kuno kana,
inni nama ani fohad'e, isumati na gammachiisa.
Anini ya lubbu tiyyaani isa guute
tanaafi gochiti ch'ufti maqa isaatini d'uga argatti.
Inni iyye lalabe kara keesati namati ingohu.
Inni ilaadu meelatu inch'absu,
yokhaani ifse lipiftu ind'aamsu.
Nami ch'ufti kara isaatini
d'uga haguma jiru jireenna jirtu argata.
Inni ufi jibbaate garaa ilaafu
haga lafa ch'ufa keesati d'uga jabeese guututi.
Lafti fagoleeni seera isaa guddo teete eegatti.
lafafi waan keesa jirale ch'ufa mid'aase,
hafuura jireenna nama keesa tau ch'ufaa kenne,
Duuba ammatana AABBO Waaqi waan hojatu isaatini jed'u,
aka akasiini lafti ch'ufti d'uga argattu.
Maro tanteetifi anini gosa ch'ufa wold'aqisa woliini tolfad'e,
ifsa gosa d'ibi ch'ufatini d'ufa.
Atini balla ila bante,
nama hid'aansa dukanaa keesa tau keesaa baafta.
Anini AABBO, maqaani kiyya sunuma!
Anini guddinna kiyya waaqa d'ibii inkennu.
Faaru nani faarsani waaqoota d'araatiini infaarsani.
Wonti anini fage yayu guutamte.
Ammatana waan haraa,
ato isiini intaane, isaniti hima.
Faaru hareetini AABBO Waaqa faarsa;
lafti ch'ufti ha isa faarsitu!
Isani worri baariini keesa yaufi
wonti baariini keesati gala isa faarsa!
Lafa fagootifi nami isi keesa tauleeni isa faarsa!
Lafti gamoojitifi diri isiileeni ha Waaqa faarsani!
Worri Kedarileeni ha isa faarsu!
Worri dira Sela keesa tauleeni
ha fiit'e gaara irati gammade sirbuti!
Worri lafa fago keesa tauleeni
ha AABBO Waaqa faarse guddisu!
AABBO Waaqi aka janna had'iisa d'aqa;
inni had'iisaa kurfefate guddo eegachuu jira.
Inni lalabe iyye nyaapa isale dabsata.
Waaqi waan jed'u,
Anini ganna heddu ch'allise,
gumi tiyya dubbi jalaa qabu dide.
Ammo amma tana akuma niiti d'alaa ch'ininfattu waad'a.
Anini kubileefi gaareeni ch'ufa balleese,
buuyofi mukha ch'ufa gogosa.
Anini galaana lafa gamooji tolche,
haro bisaani gogosa.
Anini gumi tiyya
balla kara worri imbeenne gulaani deema.
Anini dukana worraa ifsa tolche,
lafa gooro qabdu worraa dirirsa.
Waan kana anini tolchu male intau.
Nama waaqoota d'ara d'ugeefate,
waan harkaani boch'aniini waaqa keenna jed'u ch'ufa,
aka hama ch'eersani balleesani.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
worra gurra inqamne ch'aqasa!
Worra ila inqamne, aka dansaa ilaala!
Nami aka ergattu tiyya balla injira?
Nami aka ergattu tiyya duuda injira?
Ee worra Israeli, isani waan heddu agartani,
ammo gula iyaane,
isani gurra inqabdani ammo womaanu ind'ageetani.
AABBOONI Waaqa guddo nama baasu fed'u,
tanaafi inni seerafi barsiisa isaa guddise,
aka gumiini isaa beetu fed'e.
Ammo ammatana gumi isaa yayu saamani,
boolafi mana hid'aansa keesati naqani iti ch'ufaani.
Worra saamani boojiani,
nama worra baasule d'abani.
Isani nami tokoleeni,
ka waan kana ch'aqasu, jira?
Armaa achi aka dansaa ch'aqaftu?
Eenuti worra Israeli harka nama wosaamuti keenne?
Nami nu iti ch'ubbamne AABBO Waaqaniti?
Nu kara isaa gula yau dinne,
seera isale ch'absine.
Tanaafi inni gugubate nuti dallane
gaargala woraana keesa nu buuse.
Akuma ibida dallansuuni isaa Israeli keesati wo gubde,
ammo nu waan suni inhubanne, womale iraa imbaranne.

Ee Israeli, AABBO Waaqi ka isani uume,
waan isaaniini jed'u, insodaatina, anati isani baasa.
Anini maqumani isani yaama, isani kiyyuma.
Hojja isani bisaani qile keesa buutanile
anini isani woliini jira;
yo galaana keesa deemtanile bisaani isani illiqimsani.
Yo ibida keesa yaatanile ingubattani;
bobai ibidaa woma isani tolchu.
Wonti akanatiifi anini AABBO, Waaqa keesani,
Waaqa qulqullo Israeli, ka isani baasu.
Anini worra Misiritiini isani bite,
worra Kushitifi ka Sebatini isani balchoomsa.
Waan anini guddo isani maache, isani jaalad'e,
guddinna isanii kennu fed'eefi,
anini namaani lubbu teesani bita.
Insodaatina, anini isani woliini jira!
Lafa fagoo ta ilaborutiifi ta ila adu keesaa
gumi tante galcha.
Anini mirgaani, worra gad'iisi jed'e,
bitaleeni galakisi jed'a.
Ilmaani tiyya, ta lafa fagoo muumme lafa ch'ufa jirtu,
naa galcha.
Worri gumi tiyya,
ta anini uume akasiini guddinna ira argad'e.
Waaqi waan jed'u,
gumi tiyya gayaama,
worri ila qaba, ammo woma inargu,
gurra qaba, ammo woma ind'agau!
Gosa ch'ufa wolti yaama,
ha wolti baatu.
Waaqooti worraa ta dandeete waan takaa tana taha himtu, eenu?
Waaqooti worra sunii,
ka waan amma tahu jira kana himtu eenu?
waaqooti worraa sunini ha d'ugaa ufi gayaamte,
duuba d'ugaani isaani suni d'ufte
dubbi waaqoota isaani suni d'ugeesitu.
Gumi Israeli, isani d'uga tiyya;
anini isani fohad'e, aka na male waaqi d'ibiini injirre hubattani.
Na male waaqi d'ibiini injiru; durile injiru,
takaa tanale injiru.
AABBOONI anuma, ana male ka isani baasu injiru.
Anini waan taha hime, duuba isani qarqaaru d'ufe.
Waaqi d'ibiini taka waan akana kana intolchine,
isani naa d'uga.
Anini Waaqa, haga jiru jireennale Waaquma.
Nami tokoleeni, ka irre tiyya jalaa bahu injiru,
nami waan anini tolchu dandae jijiru injiru.
AABBO Waaqi, Qulqullooni Israeli ka isani baase, waan jed'u,
Anini duula Babiloniti erge akasiini isani baasa;
anini balbala fullo dira ch'abse,
iyyanti gumi isaa garagalte boha taati.
Anini AABBO, Waaqa keesani qulqullo.
Israeli, anumati isani uume,
hayyuuni keesanileeni anuma.
Duri AABBO Waaqi baariini keesati kara tolche
daandi bisaani ke baase.
Inni duula gudda baditi geese
duula gaarifi fardaani yau.
Worri jige, kau dad'abe,
akuma ifse d'aamfani d'aame.
Ammo AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
waan duri tahe ded'a,
waan dabre inheregina.
Waan hareeti anini tolchu eegad'a.
Wonti sunini tahuu jirti,
isani amma ingartani!
Anini lafa aloo kara ke baase,
madda bisaani achiti isanii kenna.
Bineensi alaaleni na guddise,
sare diidatifi guchileeni na faarsiti,
hojja anini galaana lafa gamooji ke baase
gumi anini fohad'e bisaani obaasu.
Worri sunini gumi anini uume tiyya tolfad'e,
tanaafi isiini na faarsiti.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Ee Israeli,
isani yayu na dad'abdani na yaamachu diddani.
Isani sorio hooliye teesani ta gubani na baasu diddani;
isani sorio teesanini na inguddimne.
Anini sorio naa baasa jed'e isani ingargalchine,
yokhaani hit'aana na aarsa jed'e isani indad'absiimne.
Isani hit'aana naa imbinne yokhaani gabbinna hori
keesanitini na inquufsine.
Ammo isani daba keesanini na gaargalchitani,
wollaala isani tolchitanini na dad'absiiftani.
Ammo hataatu, Waaqi daba isanii araaramu anuma,
anini fed'uma tiyyafi akasi tolche.
Anini deebie daba keesani isaniti inheregu.
Gaadisa koraa na geesa, na himad'a!
Dubbi himad'a, aka d'uga qabdani ufi agarsiisa.
Ababoota teesani ta duri isani d'alteti daba tolche;
nami isani dura deemu nati ch'ubbame,
hayyooti teesanileeni mana kiyya qulqullo t'ureesite.
Tanaafi anini badi Israelitini d'ufe,
gumi tiyya miid'aati lakise.

AABBO Waaqa waan jed'u,
Israeli hojatu tiyya, na ch'aqasa,
gumi anini fohad'e ta d'aloota Yakobo.
Anini AABBO Waaqa, ka isani uume;
haguma gaafa isani d'alattaniti
anini ya isani qarqaare.
Insodaatina isani hojatu tiyya,
gumi tiyya ta anini jaalad'e fohad'e.
Anini lafa d'eebicha bisaani iti buuse
lafa goddule laga yaasa.
Anini lubbu tiyya ijoolle teesani ira buuse,
d'aloota keesanile eebisa.
Worri aka buuyo ch'affa keesati baatu bahe,
akuma gale afaani laga bisaaniti baatu lata.
Nami toko, Anini ka AABBO Waaqa ufiini jed'e,
ka d'ibileeni, Anini ka Yakobo ufiini jed'a,
Ka d'ibileeni harka ufi irati,
Anini ka AABBO Waaqa jed'e t'aafe,
maqa Israelitini ufi yaama.
AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u,
Anini ka qarati, ammalle ke eegeti,
ana male waaqi d'ibiini tokoleeni injiru.
Eenuti dandae waan anini tolche tolcha?
Eenuti dandae aka kiyya waan qara tahefi
waan takaa tana taha fage hima?
Yo nami akasi jiraate ha himuti.
Insodaatina, imudamina, gumi tiyya.
Isani haga duritifi haga arrale
aka anini waan taha hime imbeetani?
Isanileeni amma d'uga tiyya.
Na male Waaqi d'ibiini injira?
Waaqi irre qabu d'ibiini,
ka anini imbeenne, injira?
Nami waan harkaani boch'ani waaqa tolfatu woma keesa injiru, wonti worri mid'aafate kad'atu sunileeni woma imbaatu. Nami waan akana kana kad'atuleeni balla, ammalle woma imbeekhu — worra inuma ch'eersani.
Eenuti waaqa ufi mid'aafate akheekha isaa tolfata, ka wonti sunini ufiftu woma isaa imbaane? Nama waaqa suni kad'atu ch'ufa inch'eersani.
Worri akheekha suni tolfatu namuma, waan d'ibiniti. Worri ch'ufti ha d'ufuti aka dubbi isaani qorani. Worra mudamsiisaniti ch'eersani.
Tumtuni sibiila fuute, ibida keesa keete tumti. Inni harka ufi jabaani burrisa fuud'e, sibiila suni tume mid'aasa; huji suni irati inni beelae d'eebote dad'aba.
Hogeesi mukhaleeni mukha biime, waan boch'u fed'u gangeese, aka dansaa qotooni boch'e, hoot'oni qulqulleese, akheekha namaa mid'aaga, ka mana keesa keeyatu, mid'aasa.
Inni hind'eesa badda keesaa ch'ire, yokhaani gaddafi harufa badda keesaa mura. Yokhaani hind'eesa bokayaani eege oobrafa.
Duuba nami mukha taka ira gama toko qoraani tolfate gama toko boch'e waaqa tolfata, ammalle gama toko ibidaani bobeese nafaani owifate qit'aani d'aabata; gama kaani d'ibi waaqa tolfate kad'ata.
Mukha suni haga toko qoraani tolfate ibidaani bobeesa; fooniini wot'alate nyaate quufa. Duuba ibida qanqamate waan jed'u, ahi badaa, owi ibida kunini akami dansa!
Inni kuta mukha ta hafte taani fuud'e boch'e, waaqa tolfate, durati ga jed'e kad'ate, waan jed'u, Atini Waaqa kiyya, na baasi!
Nami akana kunini ch'ufti raatu, waan tolchuu jiru imbeekhu, worri suni qalbiifi ila ch'ufate d'uga argu dida.
Inni qalbi qaabate, yokhaani nama wobeekhu taate, Anini mukha suni gama toko qoraani tolfad'e, ch'ile ibida irati qit'a d'aabad'e, fooni wot'alad'e nyaad'e, kuta mukha ta hafte taani waaqa tolfad'e badaa anini jirma mukha durati gajed'e kad'ad'a injed'u.
Nami akana kunini namuma daara nyaatu fakaata. Daallumti isaa isa balleesite qarqaarsa isa d'owarti. Inni aka wonti inni harkaani mid'aafate kad'atu sunini waan d'ara, ka waaqa intahini, ee injed'u.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, ee worra Israeli,
waan kama qaabad'a;
isani hojatu tiyya, inded'ina.
Anini isani uume hojatu tiyya isani tolche
haga jiru jireenna deebie isani inded'u.
Anini ch'ubbu teesani yayu aka dumansa dabarse;
nati deebia, nami isani baasu anuma.
Ee gubba gammadaani sirbi!
Ee lafa, lalabi!
Ee gaareeni, gammadaani sirba,
mukeeni baddaleni ch'ufti ha sirbitu!
Wonti akanatiifi AABBO Waaqi Yakobo baase,
Israeli keesa guddinna ufi garsiise.
Anini AABBO Waaqa, ka isani baase;
anumati isani uume.
Anini AABBO Waaqa, ka waan ch'ufa mid'aase
gubbale qofuma tiyya dirirse;
gaafa anini lafa mid'aase namu na inqarqaare.
dubbi nama ayyaana hedule balleesa.
Anini dubbi worra qaro lafa buuse,
qarooma worrale daallesa.
Ammo hojja hojattuuni tiyya woi faddu,
yokhaani hojja anini nama erge,
beeni, herega kiyya biyyati himi jed'uuni,
anini heregaafi fagisa suni inguuta.
Anini waan Yerusalemuni jed'u,
Nami deebie siti qubata;
ammalle waan dira lafa Yudatini jed'u,
Nami deebie isani jaara.
Diri sunini ch'ufa ka qara bade ona tahe
ammatana deebie dira dansaa taha.
Anini waan bisaani baariinitini jed'u, gogoga,
anini galaana keesanile ingogossa.
Atini tissitu tiyya,
waan anini fed'u ch'ufa naa tolchita;
atini Yerusalemu jaara,
Mana Waaqale yayaba jetta.

AABBO Waaqi yayu Koreshi fohate hayyu tolche!
Wonti inni fohateefi,
aka inni gosa ch'ufa dabsate,
hayyoota ch'ufa miha isii iraa fuud'u,
AABBO Waaqileeni balbala dira ch'ufa isa dura bana.
Ammalle inni waan Koreshini jed'u,
Anumati si dura deeme,
gaareenifi kubilele balleese,
lafaani woliqit'eesa.
Anini balbala fullo ta sibiila diimani mid'aasani ch'abse
sibiila isiile ch'ufa bulleesa.
Anini fulla d'ossa, ta dukana keesaa,
waan dansa sii kenna;
akanaani aka anini AABBO Waaqa beete,
aka Waaqi Israeli maqa keetiini si yaame hubata.
Maro hojatu tiyya Yakobo
yokhaani Israeli anini fohad'eefi
maqa keetiini si yaame guddinna sii kenna
ato atini na beekhu baatele.
Anini AABBO Waaqa,
ana male waaqi d'ibiini tokoleeni injiru.
Ato atini na beekhu baatele,
anini irre sii kenna.
Wonti anini akasi tolchufi,
aka nami lafa keesa jiru ch'ufti,
aka ana AABBO Waaqa male waaqi d'ibiini injirre, beekhu.
Anini ifsa mid'aase dukanale uume
gaargalaafi nagayale namaatiini d'ufa.
Waan kana ch'ufa ana AABBO Waaqa tolcha.
Ee gubba, d'uga aka bokaya ga roobi,
duumansi ha d'uga sunini d'ufu;
lafti ha banamte baafami gadi yauti;
d'ugaleeni ha woliini gadi baatu.
Nami waan kana tolchu ana AABBO Waaqa.
dandeete nama isi mid'aaseeni woi imoromti?
D'oqeeni faara nama isii mid'aasuni,
Atini maani hojata injetti?
Okoteeni faara nama isii mid'aasuni dandeete,
Atini woma mid'aasu imbeetu injetti?
Nami dandae abba ufitini, Atini maani d'alte?
Yokhaani haad'a ufitini,
maaniti garaa kanke keesaa si bahe injed'a?
AABBO Waaqi qulqullooni Israeli,
ka worra uume waan jed'u:
Isani waan ilmaani tiyya na gaafatani
yokhaani huji anini harka kiyyaani hojad'e nati himtani?
Nami lafa mid'aase nama isi irati uume anuma.
Harka kiyyaani anini gubba dirirse
aduufi jiaafi urjileeni harka kiyya keesa jirti.
Anumati Koreshi kaase,
aka inni fed'i tiyya guute wo mid'aasu.
Anini kara inni gula deemule ch'ufa inqajeelchaafi.
Duuba inni dira kiyya jaare,
gumi tiyya ta boojiani tisse tolchanile balchoomsa.
Nami aka inni waan kana tolchu hori isaa kenne
yokhaani isa gumbeese injiru.
AABBO Waaqi waan Israeliini jed'u,
Horiini lafa Misiritiifi ka lafa Kushi keesani tahe,
worri d'ed'eeraani lafa Seba tisse isanii taha:
worri suni ka sansalatani hid'aani isani gula yaa.
Worri isani durati jilbifate waan jed'u,
D'uguma Waaqi isani woliini jira,
isa male waaqi d'ibiini injiru.
Waaqi Israeli, ka gumi ufi baasu, Waaqa ufi d'ossu.
Worra akheekha boch'ani waaqa tolfatu ch'ufa ch'eersani, worri ch'ufti ch'eeraani bada.
Ammo AABBO Waaqati baafama haga jiru jireennatini
worra Israeli baase,
haga worri jiru ch'ufa ch'eeru d'owa.
AABBO Waaqi gubba uume — Waaqi isuma!
Inni lafa supe mid'aase,
jabeese waan ind'umanne tolche.
Inni lafa duwa imid'aasine,
ammo fulla nami iti galu tolche.
Ammalle inni waan jed'u,
Anini AABBO Waaqa,
waaqi d'ibiini injiru.
Anini d'ossani indubbanne,
yokhaani herega kiyya nama ind'ofanne.
Anini worra Israelitini,
lafa duwa keesa na barbaada injenne.
Anini AABBO Waaqa, ka d'uga dubbate
waan qajeela namati himu.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
gumi gosa ch'ufaa wolti koota,
isani ka nyaapa keesani jalaa baatani, wolti baha!
Worri mukha boch'e waaqa tolfate sunini yau,
ka waaqa dandae nama imbaamne kad'atu, worra wo beekhuniti!
Koota, dubbi teesani gaadisati himad'a;
nami dubbi qabu ha wolgaafatuti.
Eenuti waan taha kana duri fage?
Ana AABBO Waaqaniti?
Waaqi gumi ufi baase anuma, ka d'ibiini injiru.
Nati deebia, baafama argad'a,
isani gumiini lafa ch'ufa keesa jirtu!
Waaqi anuma, na male kad'ibini injiru.
dubbini tiyya gara ingaltu:
nami ch'ufti d'ufe, na durati jilbifate,
aka naa saalfatu nati kakhata.
Worri na baane,
AABBO Waaqa ch'alla keesa d'ugaafi jabeenni jira jed'a.
Nama isa jibbu ch'ufti yo isati d'ufu ch'eera argata.
Anini, AABBO Waaqi, d'aloota Yakobo ch'ufa baase,
duuba worrileeni na faarsa.

Muummeeni waaqoota Babiloni tana!
Belifi Nebo ka duri kad'atani
amma harreeti faani baa ulfa hori dad'absiiftu iti, tahani.
Wonti harkaani boch'ani suni dandeete ufi imbaaftu;
yayu guurani boojiani gara d'ibi geesani.
Muummeeni waaqoota Babiloni tana!
Isani d'alooti Yakobo, ka gumi tiyya iraa hafe, na ch'aqasa.
Haga isani d'alattani asi anumati isani qorqorate.
Anini Waaqa keesani,
ka haga isani jaartani arri baaftaniti isani qorqoratu.
Anumati isani uume, ammalle isani qorqorate
isani qarqaare isani baasa.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Isani anaafi eenu woli bira qabattani?
Nami aka kiyya d'ibiini injira?
Nami borsa ufi bane worqi ga jisse
miisana irati qarsi biima.
Tumtu worqitii hori baasani,
waaqa nu mid'aasi jed'aniini;
duuba durati gajed'ani kad'atani!
Jennaani gurmu ira keeyatani baatani, fulla iti
mid'aasani achi dad'abani,
duuba inni ka inchochone artuma eja.
Yo nami d'ufe kad'atele, inni indubbatu,
yokhaani gaargala keesaa isa imbaasu.
Isani worri ch'ubbu, waan kana qaabad'a,
waan anini tolchele herega.
Waan duri tahe qaabad'a,
Waaqi anuma, ka d'ibiini injiru.
Anini Waaqa, nami aka kiyya d'ibiini injiru.
Anini duriyu waan takaa tana taha fage;
haguma duriti waan lafti taatu hime.
Anini waan jed'e, mali kiyya inhanqatu
wonti anini herege guutamtu male inteetu.
Anini nama ilaboruuti gayaama,
ka aka qoree wo bute waan anini herege ch'ufa guutu.
Anini yayu jed'e, inuma guuta,
yayu herege, inuma tolcha.
Me na ch'aqasa, worra mata jajaba,
ka waan dabsachaani fago jirtu sehu.
Anini guyya dabsacha ya gad'ieese.
Guyyaani sunini fago injiru.
Baafami kiyya inturu.
Anini Yerusalemu baase,
achiti worra Israeli gurra iti tolcha.

Ee Babiloni, barch'uma kanke ka hayyuma iraa bui,
kooti, biyye keesa lafa tai.
Atini qara dubra infuud'ini
fakaata, dira ka takaa nami indabsatini, ammo armaa achi atini
deebite laafte irre ind'abdu.
D'akha daakhu fuud'i, mid'aani daakhi!
Hagogo mata iraa fud'ad'i!
Woya tante mimid'aadu baafad'i!
Woya tante soqolad'i, galaana taaki.
Biyyiti qulla tante agarte, ch'eeri kanke mullata.
Anini haalo baafad'a, nami na d'owa injiru.
Nami nu baasu Waaqa qulqullo Israeliti
maqaani isaa AABBO Waaqa guddaya.
AABBO Waaqi waan Babilonini jed'u,
Dukana keesati ch'allisi tai;
deebiani hayyiti lafa ch'ufa siini injed'ani!
Anini gumi tiyyati dallane,
isani deebitani na ind'aaltani jed'eeni.
Anini harka kanke keesa worra buuse
atini diqole worraa nahu didde;
atini jaaroleele aka hama gaargalchite.
Atini haga jirtu ch'ufa waan hayyiti taatu ufi seete
ammo waan taate suni aka dansaa garaa keesa inkeyanne,
yokhaani aka dansa inherenne.
atini ka machi jaalate waan nagaya qabdu ufi seete,
ana male nami aka kiyya injiru anini d'iirsa male intau,
yokhaani ilmaanile ind'abu ufiini jette.
Ammo d'iotu guyya tokotu, gaargali si qabate,
ato haga feetu falfala tolfattele
d'iirsafi ilmaanile d'abda.
Atini, Namu na inargu jette
ch'ubbu tante keesati ufi d'ugeefatte.
Qalbiifi beekhi kanke si sobe,
garaa kanke keesati,
Ana male nami aka kiyya injiru ufiini jette.
Ammo gaargali siti d'ufe falfala kanke ch'ufaani ufira d'owu dad'abda.
Ammalle badiini tassa siqabati —
ta atini taka waan isii inoobjatini!
Murmafi falfala kanke kana tolfachuma tolfad'i,
illakisini, ka atini haguma d'alate tolchuu jirtu.
Hegeri wonti sunini si qarqaarte
nyaapa kanke sodaachifti fa.
Gorsi si gorsanileeni, irre womatu si intaane.
Nami ayyaana hedu ka urji ilaalu,
ka baati d'alatuni wo fage waan taha namati himu
ha d'ufe sii baasuti.
Worri sunini jirma buuyo ka ibidi gubu fakaata!
Worri sunini dandae ibida suni jalaa ufi imbaasu,
ibidi sunini waan nami qanqamaatuniti.
Wonti worri haguma d'alattani isani gula yaatani wo gaafattani isani bahe sunuma.
Worri ch'ufti kae isani biraa deeme kara ufi yae,
duuba nama isani baasu d'abani.

Worra Yakobo, ka Israeli jed'aniini,
ka d'aloota Yuda, na ch'aqasa:
Isani maqa AABBO Waaqatini kakhatani
Waaqi Israeli Waaqa keenna jettani,
ammo dubbini sunini d'ugaaniti, garaa inqabdani.
Ammo ha taatu, isani kiyyibdani,
Nu worra dira qulqullo keesa tau,
ka AABBO Waaqa gudda Israeli d'aabbatu ufiini jettani.
AABBO Waaqi waan worra Israelitini jed'u,
Anini duriyu waan taha namati hime
duuba waan suni yoosu tassa tolche guute.
Anini aka isani mataa jabaatani aka sibiila taatani,
additi teesani aka sibiila jabaatu imbeekha.
Tanaafi anini duri waan isani takaa tana taatani isaniti hime,
ato isiini intahini isani beesise,
aka isani, waaqa nu harkaani boch'anne
akheekha tolfanneti waan suni tolche injenne.
Wonti anini qara hime taani ch'ufti yayu guutamte,
amma dandeetani moromtani?
Amma anini waan hareeti gad'ufa isaniti hima,
dubbi d'ossani ta qara isani imbeenne.
Wonti sunini waan anini amma tolchu ch'alla;
wonti akana takaa duraani intaane.
Ato sila taate isani, Nu waan isii qara ya beenne jettani.
Anini imbeekha, aka nami dandae isani ind'ugeefanne
yokhaani aka isani haguma duriti dubbi namaa diddani.
Wonti isani waan kana ind'agayinifi tana,
yokhaani wonti dubbini suni gurra keesa isani imbuinifi suni.
Anini dallansu ufi d'owe dallanu dide
isani balleesu lakisa
aka akasiini nami na faarsu.
Akuma qarsi ibida keesati bassani,
anini ibida keesa isani buuse isani ilaalad'e.
Ammo aka isani woma keesa injirre yayu arge.
Anini waan tolchu kana ufumaafi tolcha.
Anini akami dandae aka
maqa kiyya balleesani ee jed'a?
Anini akami guddinna kiyya nama d'ibiti dabarsa?
Ee Yakobo, na ch'aqasa, worra Israeli ka anini yaame!
Anini Waaqa, ka qaraatifi ka eegeleni anuma!
Anini harka kiyyaani lafa yayabe gubba dirirse.
Lafafi gubbaleeni hojja anini yaamu
maro tokotu d'ufte na dura ejiti.
Isani ch'ufti wolti baha, na ch'aqasa!
Waaqi tokoleeni, ka aka nami anini fohad'e kunini
Babiloni had'u fage injiru;
nami suni waan anini fed'u male waan d'ibi intolchu.
Nami isaani dubbate isa yaame anuma;
anumati isaani d'ufe waan ch'ufa isa dabsachiise.
Ammatana nati d'iaad'a, dubbi tiyya d'agaya.
Anini haguma duriti takaa d'ossaani indubbanne,
dubbi tiyyale ch'ufa la guute.
(Ammatana AABBO Waaqi guddaani yayu jabeenna ufi naa kenne na erge.)
Waaqi qulqullooni Israeli,
AABBOONI ka isani baasu, waan jed'u:
Anini AABBO Waaqa keesani
ka dansuma teesaniifi isani barsiise,
kara isani yau maltani isani qajeelchu.
Ato sila seera kiyya ch'aqaftani,
nageenni aka galaana haguma jiru inch'inne isaniti yae,
d'ugaani teesanileeni akuma d'awa galaana isaniti d'ufti.
Ilmaani teesani heddatte, akuma maansa galaana taate,
maqaani worrale haga jiru na duraa imbadu.
Odu tana gammadaani lalaba odeesa,
muumme lafale geesa;
AABBO Waaqi yayu hojatu isaa Israeli baase jed'a.
Gaafa inni gumi isaa lafa aloo ta gamooji keesani deeme worri ind'eebonne.
Inni siida d'akha keesaa bisaani baase,
d'akha falaansinaani bisaani gabaafatani.

Ato anini ind'alatini
AABBO Waaqi na fohate hojatu na tolfate.
harka ufitini jabeese na qorqorate.
Inni aka t'iya na tolche, katelati na galche,
kurfeese oli na kaye.
Duuba inni waan nani jed'e,
Ee Israeli, atini hojatu tiyya,
maro teetifi biyyiti na faarsiti.
Anini waan jed'e, Anini ya wo hojad'e,
ammo wonti sunini woma imbaane!
Anini irre tiyyaani wo tolche,
ammo isiini lafumati badde.
Ammo hataatu, anini d'uga gara AABBO Waaqati qaba;
inni maro woi anini isaa tolchufi galata naa kenna.
Ato anini ind'alatini, AABBO Waaqi na fohate,
hojatu ufi na tolche
aka anini worra Yakobo galche,
worra Israeli ch'ufa fuud'e isati deebisu.
AABBO Waaqi guddinna naa kenne,
irre naa tahe na jabeese.
Anini huji jabdu sii kennu qaba,
hojatu tiyya.
Atini worra Yakobo galchite,
worra Israeli ka hafe guddinnati deebifte;
ammo hagasi ch'allaniti, anini ifsa gosa ch'ufale si tolcha,
aka akasiini lafti ch'ufti baafama kiyya argattu.
Waaqi qulqullooni Israeli, ka worra baasu,
waan nama tufatani, ka gochiti ch'ufti jibbite hayyooti hojattu tolfateeni jed'u:
Hayyooti si agarte, si dura kaate, sii saalfati;
ilmaani hayyootaleeni akasi agarte si durati gajejette si guddifti.
Wonti woni kunini taatufi
waan AABBO Waaqi hojatu ufi fohate
Waaqi qulqullooni Israeli kakhu ufi guutufi.
hojja guyyaani isani baasani gahu,
anini isanii nahe, kad'acha teesani isanii d'agaye
isani tisse isani qorqorad'e,
kara keesanini gosa ch'ufa wold'aqisa woliini tolfad'a.
Lafa teesani ta amma badde ona taate tana keesa deebise isani qubachiisa.
Ammalle anini waan jara hid'aansa keesa jiruni jed'u,
Ga baha!
Worra dukana keesa jiruleeni waan jed'u,
Ifsaati ga baha!
Worri akuma hooliye gaareeni gubba oole,
adaala kubii ch'ufa ira d'eeda.
Aduufi owi lafa alooleeni worra woma intolchu.
Wonti akanatiifi nama worraa nahuti worraani deeme madda bisaaniti geesa.
Anini gaareeni gubbati kara gudda tolche,
kara gumiini tiyya gula yaatu mid'aasa.
Gumiini tiyya fago d'ufti,
mirgaafi gama ila adule, ammalle gara Aswani ta bitale d'ufti.
Ee gubba, sirbi, ee lafa gammadi, lalabi!
Gaareenileeni ha farqatte sirbitu!
AABBO Waaqi gumi ufi jabeese,
nama isaa ka gaargala qabu naha.
Ammo worri Yerusalemu waan jed'e,
AABBO Waaqi yayu lafa na buuse!
Inni yayu nu ded'e.
Duuba AABBO Waaqi waan jed'uuni,
Niitiini daima ufi ka d'alte indeeti?
Yokhaani ilmaani isiini d'alte nahu indiddi?
Ato isiini deetele
anini haga jiru isani inded'u.
Ee Yerusalemu, anini haga jiru dandae si inded'u!
Anini yayu maqa kanke gana harka kiyya irati t'aafad'e.
Nami deebie si jaaru d'ufu jira,
nami si balleesu si biraa deema.
Ufi d'aatu millad'i, waan tahuti jira ilaali!
Worri kanke ya wolti bahe, gara kanke d'ufuu jira!
Anini maqa Waaqa jirutini kakhad'a,
atini akuma intalti fuud'ani faaya isiitiini shoobdu
worra keetiini shoobda.
Lafti tante qara ya badde ona taate
ammo amma diqaate nama d'ufe iti qubatu fuud'u dad'abdi.
Ammalle worra si balleese ona si tolche kaani siraa fageesani balleesani.
Ilmaani tante ta gaafa worra kanke boojiani kaani d'alate, guyya toko waan siini jettu,
lafti tunini ya nuti d'ipate,
fulla ballo nu keesa teennu nuu kenni.
Duuba atini waan ufiini jettu,
Eenuti ilmaani tana ch'ufa naa d'ale?
Anini ilmaani tiyya ya d'abe,
ta d'ibile dandae ind'alu.
Na boojiani, lafa d'ibi na geesani —
ilmaani tana eenuti guddise?
Kobuma na lakisani —
ilmaani tunini eesa baate?
AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan gumi ufitini jed'u,
Anini gosa ch'ufa
akheekha agarsiise harkaani yaama,
duuba worri ilmaani teesani ta dubraatifi
ta d'iirale baate worraa keesani galcha.
Hayyooti abba isaanii taate, hayyitiini ch'ufti hawani isanii taati.
Worri isani durati jilbifate isani guddise
guddo isanii saalfata.
Duuba isani akasiini aka anini AABBO Waaqa beetani;
nami qarqaarsa kiyya eegatu ch'eera inargatu.
Dandaani waan askartini saamte iraa fuud'ani?
Nama nami hamani hid'e dandaani harka isaa keesaa imbaasani?
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'uuni, wonti taha sunuma.
Waan askartini saamte iraa fuud'ani
nama nami hamani qabe harka isaa keesaa baasani.
Anini nama isani had'u ch'ufa had'e ilmaani teesani baasa.
Anini nama isani dabsu ch'ufa woli ijeesise,
worri d'iiga woli aka farso d'uga.
Duuba akanaani nami ch'ufti,
aka anini AABBO Waaqa ka isani baase isani balchoomsu, beekhu.
Ammalle akanaani Waaqa Yakobo ka irre qabu hubatani.

AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Isani waan anini gumi tiyya,
aka niiti d'iirsi ufi jalaa baasu,
ufi jalaa baasu seetani?
Yo akasi taate tatabeeni anini ufi jalaa baaseni meeti?
Isani waan anini harka nama isani boojieti isani gurgure seetani?
Akuma nama ilmaani ufi tisoomaa gurguru.
Hiyo akasiniti, maro daba keesanitifi isani boojiani,
maro ch'ubbu teesaniifi ufi jalaa isani baasani.
Gaafa anini gumi tiyya baasu d'ufe,
worri maafi na jalaa dide?
Anini yaame jennaani worri maafi inowaatini?
Anini irre worraani baasu inqabu?
Anini dandae jechaani baariini gosse, galaana gamooji tolche,
qurt'umini keesati galtuleeni bisaani d'abde hobaati.
Anini dandae gubba dukaneese
akuma nama nama due bohu tolcha.
AABBO Waaqi guddaani yayu araba na qajeelche,
aka anini nama dad'abi qabu dubbi t'iyaani jabeesu.
Diirama ch'ufa inni na kaase,
aka anini waan inni na barsiisu fed'u ch'aqasu.
AABBO Waaqi yayu gurra kiyya bane
aninileeni isati garagale isa indinne.
nama na arabse, areeda na hirkise
hanchufa fuulati na tufe, ufira ind'owine.
Ammo arabi worraa woma na intolchu,
waan AABBO Waaqi guddaani na qarqaarufi.
Anini garaa ufi jabeese araba suni ch'ufaa obse.
Anini imbeekha, naa inch'eersani,
Nami dandae gaadisati na geese na himatu eenu?
Dubbini teenna ha jaarole dura d'at'u!
Inni ha himatuti!
AABBO Waaqa guddati na qarqaara
eenuti dandae wollaala nati mura?
Nami na himatu ch'ufti imbada,
akuma woya bilaachi nyaate balleesu.
Isani keesaa nami AABBO Waaqa sodaate
dubbi hojatu isaa saalfatu,
ka ifsa male dukanaani deemu,
ka maqa AABBO Waaqa abdate, Waaqa ufi d'aabbatu eenu?
Isani ch'ufti ka ibida bobeesitani
nama d'ibi balleesu feetani, karuma isani namati malatani suniini isani balleesani,
AABBUMA Waaqati waan kana tolcha;
isani badi hamtu argattani.

AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Isani ka baafama barbaada nati d'uftani, na ch'aqasa.
D'akha isani keesaa baatanifi
boola isani keesaa qotani qaabad'a.
Ababo keesani Abrahamufi Sara ta isani d'alte qaabad'a.
Gaafa anini Abrahamu yaame inni ijoolle inqabu,
ammo anini isa eebise,
ilmaani kenneefi daraarse.
Anini Yerusalemufi nama ona isii suni keesa taule, innaha.
Ato lafti isii badde raasa taatele anini oobru tolcha,
akuma oobru duri anini Edeniti oobre taani.
Gammadafi qilit'ama achiti argani
faaru na faarsani galata naa deebisani.
Gumi tiyya, na d'agaya, waan anini jed'u ch'aqasa.
Anini gosa ch'ufa barsiise seeri kiyyaleeni ifsa worraa taha.
Anini hurrise d'ufe worra baasa,
baafami kiyya d'io jira.
Amumati harka kiyyaani gosa ch'ufa fida.
Lafti fago na eedde irre tiyya abdatti.
Gubba millad'a, lafale ilaala!
Gubbaani aka aara badde, laftileeni aka woya ch'ich'ite, nami isii aka tiite hobaa.
Ammo baafami, kiyya haga jiru jireenna taa,
d'ugaani tiyya haguma jirtu imbaddu.
Isani worri d'uga beekhu ka seera kiyyaa qalbi keesaa qabu, na ch'aqasa.
Hojja nami arabse isani miid'e insodaatina,
worri akuma waan raamooni nyaatte bada.
Ammo d'ugaani tiyya haga jiru jireenna teete,
baafami kiyya haga d'aloota ch'ufa taa.
AABBO Waaqa, kai, nu qarqaari, harka keetiini nu baasi, akuma atini duri tolchite.
Nami goorjama Rahabu jed'ani gargari ch'ire siiniti?
Nami baariini gosse, kara bisaani ke baase,
worra atini baasuu jirtu taakisiise siiniti?
Nami atini baafte, gammadaani dira Yerusalemuti deebie sirbe qilit'ama.
Worri haga jiru gammada,
deebie bohe ilaalefatu.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Nami isani jabeesu anuma isani maanifi nama sodaattani,
ka inni buuyo ira ingoomne?
Isani AABBO Waaqa ka isani uume gubba dirirse,
lafale yayabe ya deetani?
Isani maanifi hojja ch'ufa dallansu nama isani dabse isani balleesu fed'u sodaatani?
Dallansuuni worraa ammatana
dandeete woma isani intolchitu.
Nama hid'aansa keesa jiru d'iotu gad'iisani,
worri lafa irati lubbu bule sagale quufa.
Anini AABBO Waaqa keesani, ka baariini chochoose,
d'awa isii dibbisise.
Maqaani kiyya AABBO Waaqa gudda!
Anini gubba dirirse lafale yayabe.
Waan anini worra Yerusalemutini jed'u,
Isani gumi tiyya!
Anini yayu isani barsiise harka
kiyyaani isani qorqorad'e.
Atini muduunu AABBO Waaqi dallansuuni sii kenne
ya d'udde fooqifte, machoofte dadat'eeni.
Nami siini deemu injiru,
worra kanke keesa nami harka sii qabu injiru.
Gaargali hamani yayu aka lama siti d'ufe:
lafa tante yayu woraani qabate beelti balleesite.
Nami sii nahu tokoleeni injiru.
Nami kanke kara ch'ufa keesati gagagabe
aka hiddi t'ururaani qabani taha.
AABBO Waaqi yayu worrati dallane worra balleese.
Worra Yerusalemu ka gaargali qabate,
aka waan farso d'uge dadaaqu,
AABBO Waaqi keesani isani kalche waan isaniini jed'u,
Anini muduunu dallansuuni isani kenne taani isani iraa fuud'a,
isani deebitani daad'i isani macheesite taani ind'uddani.
Anini muduunu suni worra isani dabse kara keesa isani
ch'iifsise, aka awaara isani ira ejaanjate kenna.

Ee dira qulqullo, woya mid'aadu keeyad'i!
Worri Waaqa imbeenne, ka aada inqamne,
deebie fullo teetiini oli inseenu.
Ee Yerusalemu, kai awaara gingilafad'i,
barch'uma kanke ka hayyuma ira tai.
Ee worra Sioni ka boojiani,
sansalata isaniini hid'ani ufiraa fura!
AABBO Waaqi waan gumi ufitini jed'u, gaafa tisse isani tolchani, beese male isani fud'atani, akasuma beese male gadi isani d'iisani isani balchoomsani.
Gaafa isani lafa Misiriti godaantani achi teetani kaani, isani fed'uma teesanini achi d'at'ani; ammo worri Ashuru, beese male, irreeni isani fud'ate.
Amma tana, AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, wonti tahe kunini maani? Isani nama boojiani, beese male isani fud'atani. Worri isani mohatu hojja ch'ufa ufi guddise kiyyibe na tufata.
Takaa tana isani aka anini Waaqa hubattani, ammalle aka anini isaniini dubbad'ele barattani.
Inni baafama odeese waan Sionini jed'u,
Waaqi kanke hayyu lafa mohatu!
Worri lafa eegu gammaddani wolti lalaba.
Worri iluma ufitini aka AABBO Waaqi Sioniti deebiu arga!
Lalabi, sirbi, ona Yerusalemu!
AABBO Waaqi dira ufi baase gumi ufi jabeesa.
AABBO Waaqi irre ufi qulqullooni gumi ufi baasa,
duuba waan suni lafti ch'ufti inargati.
Waan qulqullo intahini tokole intuqina;
ufi qulqulleesa, kaa, yaa.
Isani hurre yaatani imbaqatanile.
AABBO Waaqi keesani isa dura deeme,
moga ch'ufa isani qorqorata.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Hojatu tiyya hujiini isa ch'ufti ineebifamti
isa guddo ulfeesani guddinna iti kennani.
Nami hedduuni isa arge mame afaani qabata.
Fuuli isaa aka iraa gore namale infakaatu.
hayyootileeni waan dubbatu d'abde afaani qabatti.
Worri waan takaa imbeekhini arge hubata.

Eenuti d'aamsa keenna d'ugeefate?
Eenuti dandae waan AABBO Waaqi tolche waan kana keesati arga?
Inni AABBO Waaqa durati akuma mukha late,
hiddi isaa lafa goddu keesati bahu jira.
Inni guddinnaafi mid'aaguma nu isani millannu inqabu,
wonti nami millate isaani jaalatu tokoleeni injirtu.
Isa tufatani didani,
inni gaargalaafi d'ukubsachale obse.
Nami isa ilaalu injiru,
nuleeni isa tufanne womatu indarre.
laalefacha nu sila argannu fud'ate.
Ammo nu hojja ch'ufa waan Waaqi gaargala suni isatini d'ufe seene.
maro ch'ubbu teennatifi isaa d'aanani.
Maro gaargala isaatiifi nu nagaya arganne, maro d'aanicha isatifi nu fayyisani.
abbu kara ufi gula bahe.
Ammo AABBO Waaqi ch'ubbu teenna ch'ufa isa ira kaye.
ammo inni woma tokole indubbanne.
Inni akuma ilmaani hoola, ta qalma deemaninifi
akuma hoola rifeensa iraa ch'irani,
ch'allise ufumaa eje.
Isa qabani, wollaala iti murani,
ijeechaa geesani.
Nami tokoleeni waan isa tolchani suni iyyaalle.
Isa maro daba gumi teennatifi ijeesani.
worra ch'ubbu woliini isa awaalani
dureeyyi woliini isa irreesani.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Inni fed'i tiyya gula gaargale;
duisi isa sorio dabaani namaa araaramani.
Duuba akanaani inni lubbu bule ilmaani isa ch'ufa arge,
fed'iini tiyyaleeni isani guutamti.
Eegi guddo gaargale inni deebie gammada argate,
aka gaargali isaa sunini wo namaa bahu beekha.
Hojattuuni tiyya dansaani,
ta guddo na gammachiiftu, ch'ubbu nama heddu fud'ata,
aninileeni maro isaatiifi worraa araarama.
hayyooti gugurdoni irre qabdu teetu isaa kenna.
Waan inni fed'i ufitini jireenna ufi
baase worra ch'ubbu woliini duefi.
Inni ch'ubbu nama heddu fed'ate,
ammalle aka ch'ubbu worra suni araaramanifi
Waaqa kad'ate.

atini qara niiti maseena fakaata,
ammo ammatana gammadi, kobli sirbi.
Ammatana atini nad'eeni takaa d'iirsi
illakisini ira ijoolle heddu d'alta!
Waaro atini iti galtu ballisi;
haada isii d'eerisi, d'isa isii jabeesi!
Atini seera lafa teeti mirgaafi bitati hiifate,
nami keetileeni lafa gochiti d'ibiini amma keesa qubatu deefate,
dira amma bade ona tahe kana nami guuta.
Insodaatini deebiani si inch'eersani,
yokhaani si indabsani.
Ch'eera kanke ka gaafa atini kaimatifi
ch'eekho atini aka haad'a hiyyeesaa teete deebite inqaabatu.
AABBO Waaqi guddaani ka si uume d'iirsa si tahe,
Waaqi qulqullooni Israeli, ka lafa ch'ufa fidu, si baasa.
Atini niiti kaima, ta d'iirsi lakise gaargala argatte laalefattu fakaata.
Ammo AABBO Waaqi ufiti si yaame,
si deebise waan siini jed'u:
Haga diqa toko anini si lakise
ammo eege naasu guddooni si deefad'a.
Anini maro dallansutifi
haga diqa toko fuula siraa deefad'e,
duuba eege jaalala ind'umanneeni si jaalad'a.
AABBO Waaqi, ka si baasu, akana siini jed'a.
Anini deebie lafa bisaanini imballeesu,
ammatana anini aka deebie siti indallanne
yokhaani si ingaargalchine kakhad'a.
Ato gaareeni chochoosani kubilele balleesani,
jaalalti anini isi jaalad'u ind'umatu,
anini kakhu tiyya ta nagaya haga jiru jireenna jabeesa.
AABBO Waaqi ka sii nahu akana jed'a.
Ee Yerusalemu, dira qarqaarsa inqamne,
ka gaargala qabu,
ka nami tokoleeni ka garaa si jabeesu injirre,
anini yayaba kanke d'akha ch'uluqaani jaara.
Doofi tante d'akha diima ch'uluqaani jaare,
fullo tantele d'akha bibiliquuni jaare,
naabo tantele d'akhaye ch'ululut'uni jaara.
D'ugaani si jabeesani, nama si dabse si mudamsiisu jalaa si baasani.
Yo nami d'ufe si had'e anini quba inqabu;
nami si had'u ch'ufti imbada.
Anini tumtu ibida buufte woraana tumtu uume,
askarti woraana sunini nama ijeeftule uume.
Ammo woraani tokoleeni dandae woma si intolchu;
nama si himatu ch'ufa waan jettuuni qabda.
Anini hojatu tiyya ch'ufaa kalche, waan ch'ufa worra dabsachiisa.
Dubbi tana AABBO Waaqati jed'e.

Nami d'eebu qabu ch'ufti koota, bisaani kunooti!
Isani worri beese inqamne koota, mid'aani bitad'a, nyaad'a!
Koota, aananifi daad'i beese male fud'ad'a!
Isani maanifi waan isani inquufsine beese iti baaftani?
Isani maanifi ka beela imbaane beese teesani baaftani?
Na ch'aqasa, dubbi tiyya gula yaa,
sagale sagale ch'ufa ira dansa nyaad'a.
nati koota, jireenna argattani!
Anini wold'aqisa haguma jiru jireenna jiru
isani woliini tolfad'e
eeba duri Dauditi kakhad'e isanii kenna.
Anini hayyufi abba duula isa tolche,
irre tiyya isaani worra garsiise.
Isani gosa qara imbeenne yaamtani;
worri qara isani imbeekhu ammo amma tana
orie gara keesani d'ufa!
Waan kana ch'ufa ana, AABBO Waaqa keesani,
Waaqa qulqullo Israeliti, tolche,
anini ulfinnaafi guddinna isanii kenna.
AABBO Waaqa barbaada, hojja inni argamu,
Waaqa yaamad'a, yo inni d'io jiru.
Ch'ubbichi ha kara ufi lakisu,
nami hameenna gula deemu ha herega ufi garagalfatu.
Inni ha AABBO Waaqa keennati deebiu.
Duuba inni naheefi hurrise araaramaafi.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Heregi kiyya keesaniniti,
karaani kiyyaafi keesanileeni gargara.
Akuma gubbafi lafti gargari fago jirtu,
heregaafi karaani kiyyaleeni
keesani iraa fago jira.
ka mid'aani baase sanyi fach'aasanifi sagale nyaatani namaa baasu.
Akasuma dubbini afaani kiyya keesaa baatu taati —
isiini waan baateefi guutu male, lafati imbaddu;
ammo waan anini ergeefi ch'ufa intolchiti.
Isani gammadaani godaantani,
nagayaani iti d'aabattani,
gaareenifi kubileleeni gammadde sirba baafte,
mukhileeni gammade harka d'aa.
Fulla duri mogoreeni iti baatu, haruuni iti baate,
fulla duri mukhi qoraati iti bahu qilt'aani iti baha.
Tunini akheekha haga jiru jireenna tau taati,
qaabacha waan anini AABBO Waaqi tolche.

AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, D'ugaafi qajeeluma tolcha, wonti akanatiifi baafami kiyya ya d'iaate.
Anini nama guyya Sabato jabeese guute, akasiini t'ureesu didu, ka waan hamtu tolchu didu, ineebisaafi.
Nami gosa d'ibi ka gumi AABBO Waaqati darame, AABBO Waaqi gumi isati na inheregu injed'ini, nami sangisisanileeni, Anini deebie woma ind'alu akuma mukha gogoge jira ufiini injed'ini.
AABBO Waaqi waan nama akasi sunini jed'u: yo atini naa saalfate, guyya Sabato jabeesite waan na gammachiisa tolchite wold'aqisa kiyyale jabeesite,
maqa kanke mana kiyya keesafi gumi tiyya keesaleti inuma qaabatani, haga nama ilmaani d'iiratifi ta dubra qabule ira. Haga jiru jireenna si inded'ani.
Ammalle AABBO Waaqi nama gosa d'ibi ka gumi isati darame isaa jaalate isa hojate, guyya Sabato guute wold'aqisa isaa jabeesuni, waan jed'uuni,
Anini Sioni, gaara kiyya qulqullooti, isani geese, Mana kiyya ka iti na kad'ataniti isani gammachiise, sorio isani naa baaftanile isani iraa fud'ad'a. Mana kiyyaani, fulla gochiti ch'ufti Waaqa iti kad'atu jed'ani.
AABBO Waaqi guddaani ka gumi isaa ta Israeli ta boojiani galche, waan jed'u, Anini nama d'ibi ka boojianile galche, worra woliini teesisa.
Bineensa ala, koota, bineensa badda keesa jiru tokole inhafina, koota nyaad'a.
Jaaroleeni Israeli ch'ufti ta sila worra kiyya gorsitu balla! Worri woma imbeekhu, akuma sare wo eeddu ta indunne jira — ta ufumaa ch'iifte oobjatte iriiba ch'alla jaalattu!
Worri sare sabdi woma inquumne fakaata. Worri tissitu woma imbeenne, ta fed'i ufi ch'alla gula deemte waan horattu ch'alla barbaaddu fakaata.
Worri ch'ufti waan woliini jed'u, Koota, daad'i barbaanne, farso d'unne machoomna, guyyaani bori ka arrafa ira jira.

Nami d'ugaa indua, ammo nami waan isaa herege yokhaani yaalu injiru. Ammo ato innileeni due, badiini tokoleeni ta isa qabatu injirtu.
Nami d'ugaafi qajeelumaani deemu nagaya argate, yo duele lubbuuni isaa boqoti.
Arma fulla qorsumati koota, dabdoole! Isani falfaltufi nama nad'eeni biyya baratufi sharmut'a ira injirtani.
Isani eenu goyeesitani? Isani eenu miitani, teetani akana iti tabatani?
Isani mukha woyyu jaalati woli d'araatani woli bira raftani. Isani ijoolle teesani goda d'akhaatifi bale keesati sorio baaftani.
Isani d'akha qulqullicha achi fuutani, old'ad'aabdani, waaqa jettani kad'attani. Ammalle daad'i iti d'ibaafattani, mid'aani kennitaniifi. Isani waan anini waan kana ch'ufa iraa gammadu seetani?
Ammalle isani gaareeni d'ed'eertu d'at'ani sorio baaftani achiti woliini raftani.
Isani afaani balbala teesani yokhaani d'aatu mikhikila balabala akheekha waaqa keesani ka d'ara old'aabdani. Isani na lakiftani, woya yaafatani, sire teesani gugurdo kortani beese baaftani, nad'eeni woliini bultani, achiti waan d'araatanifi kaani ch'ufa quuftani.
Isani qayya naqattani d'ad'a ibsatani, waaqa keesani ka Moleki jed'ani kad'achu d'at'ani. Isani barbaada waaqoota nama fulla ch'ufaa ergitani, fulla ekheraani teetuleeni baatani.
Isani waaqoota d'ibi barbaaddani, ufi dad'absiiftani, jibbaachu dad'abdani. Ammalle waan irre isani qabdani tana waaqooti teesani ta d'ara suni isanii kennite seetani.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Waaqi isani sodaachise lubbu isani naqu kunini kami kana, ka isani d'ara nati dubbatani na deetani? Waan anini guyya heddu afaani qabad'eefi na sodaachu diddani?
Isani waan tau jirtani kana dansaa seetani, ammo anini ch'eera keesani mullisa, waaqooti teesani ta d'ara suni dandeete isani inqarqaartu.
Hojja isani qarqaarsa kad'attani, waaqooti teesani ta d'ara suni ha isani qarqaartu! Waaqooti suni ufiftu qilleensi diqaani tokoleeni afufe balleesa! Ammo worri na d'ugeefatu lafa tana keesa tae Mana kiyya keesati na kad'ata.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Gumiini tiyya ha naa galtu. Gufu ch'ufa duraa gorsa, kara ch'ira, kurfeesa!
Anini Waaqa gudda, qulqullo, haga jirule tau. Anini gubba fulla qulqullo taa, ammo nama ch'ubbu iraa deebie ufi diqeesule woliini taa, aka akasiini garaa worraa jabeese abdi kennuufi.
Anini duri gumi tiyya jireese duuba deebie worra inhimad'u, yokhaani haga jiru jireenna iti indallanu.
Maro ch'ubbufi sabdooma worraatifi anini worrati dallane, tanaafi worra gaargalche yaala bahe. Ammo worri mataa jabaate, kara ufi lakisu dide.
Anini waan worri tahe ya arge, ammo inuma fayyisa. Anini worra dura deeme qarqaare nama bohule garaa jabeesa.
Anini nama fagootifi ka d'iole nagaya isanii kenna jed'e worra fayyisa.
Ammo worri ch'ubbuu baariini wold'au fakaata, ka d'awani isaa ejachu dide t'uriifi d'oqeeni d'uftu.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, ch'ubbichi nagaya inqabu.

AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Lalabi, aka magalata iyyii! Worra kiyya ka Yakobo, wollaalafi ch'ubbu worri tolche iti himi!
Worri guyya ch'ufa na kad'ate waan jed'u, Nu kara kanke barbaanne, seera kanke guutu feena; nu seera d'uga siraa feena, ammalle sileeti d'iaachu feena.
Biyyiti waan jettu, Nu maafi ufi agabsina, ka AABBO Waaqi waan suni nuu ingarre? Nu maafi sagale nyaachu dinna, ka inni nu iyyaalle? AABBO Waaqi waan worraani jed'u, Wonti anini akasi tahefi, waan isani guyya ufi agabsitani suni, fed'i teesani gula yaatani nama isanii hojatu dabsitanifi.
Hojja isani ufi agabsitani suni, isani wolti kaatani harkaani woli geetani lafaa woli balleesitani. Isani waan, yo isani kara kanaani ufi agabsitani, anini kad'acha teesani d'agayu seetani?
Isani hojja ufi agabsitani, ufumaa mata keesani aka ilaadu dadabsitani ch'arqifi daara keesa ch'iiftani ufi gaargalchitani. Agabuuni d'ugaa ta isani baantani suni? Isani waan anini waan suni jaalad'u seetani?
Ufi agabsitini d'ugaa ta anini jaalad'u tana: sansalata isani namaani dabsitanifi qaampara isani namaani d'owartani balleesa, nama isani dabsitani gad'iisa.
Sagale teesani nama beela qabuu kenna, hiyyeesa mana inqamne mana keesani bana. Nama qulla yau woya kenna, fiit'a teesani qarqaaru indidina.
Duuba yo isani akasi taatani, eebiti tiyya aka adu ganama isanii ifsite mada teesanile yoosu fayyisani. Anini hojja ch'ufa isani woliini tae isani baase gama ch'ufa isani qorqorad'a.
Hojja isani na kad'attani isani d'agaye, hojja isani na yaamatani isani jalaa owaad'a. Yo isani dabsiti nama dabsitani lakiftani, quba namati qabdanifi tufi nama tufatanifi dubbi hamtu namaani jettani yaalabatani;
ammalle nama beela qabu quubsitani, nama gaargala qabu, gaargala keesaa baaftani, dukanti isani marsitu tunini garagagalte ifsa guyyaa taati.
Aninileeni hojja ch'ufa isani dura deeme waan dansa isani quubse isani jajabeese fayya isanii kenna. Isani aka oobru bisaani quufte taatani maddo haguma jirtu ingonne fakaatani.
Worri keesani dira bade ona tahe kaani yayabuma isa ka duri kaani irati jaara: duuba akanaani worra naabo ch'abt'eefi maneeni badde jaare isaniini jed'ani.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, yo isani guyya Sabato aka guyya qulqullo hereddani huji teesani guyya suni tolchu diddani guyya kiyya qulqullo sunini dansa jettani ulfeesitani imaltufi hujifi haasaa woma imbaane guyya suni lakiftani,
gammada nami na hojatu argatu argattani. Lafa ch'ufa keesa ulfinna isanii kenne, isanileeni lafa anini abba keesani Yakobo kenna taani maachitani. Dubbi tana ana AABBO Waaqati jed'e.

Waan harki AABBO Waaqa laafe nama baasu indandeenne insehina, yokhaani waan inni gurra d'abe kad'acha teesani ind'ageenne insehina!
Inni maro ch'ubbu teesanitifi isani d'agayu dida. Ch'ubbu teesaniti Waaqaani gargari isani baasa, hojja isani kad'attani.
Isani worra harka d'iigaati, ka afaani isaani d'ara dubbatani, ka harki isaani woma inhanqanne.
Isani gaadisa koraa d'at'ani, dubbi d'araatiini nama himatani. Isani d'ara gula yaatani kara sunini d'uga barbaadani. Hameenna hereddani waan hamtu nama tolchitani.
Mali isani d'aatani, aka okhokaani bofa had'aa qabu, nama ijeesa. Yo okhokaani suni ch'absani bofati gabaha! Ammo mali keesani woma isani imbahu, akuma woya sapupaani mid'aasani jira, ta woma keesaa injirre.
