Isani hojja ch'ufa hameenna malattani waan suni harifatani tolchu feetani. Isani nama woma iyyakini d'iiga jissitani, fulla yaatani ch'ufati nama gaargalchitani balleesitani.
Fulla isani baatani tokole lafti nagaya inqabdu. Wonti isani tolchitani tokoleeni d'uga inqabdu. Kara qajeela intahini gula yaatani, nami kara suni gula yau tokoleeni nagaya inqabu.
Gumiini waan jettu, d'ugaani nuti ind'iaatu, nuraa fago jirti; nu ifsa barbaanna ammo dukana ch'alla argina.
Aka balla jinjimanne guyya guddaani aka waan lafti halkani gugufanne, aka waan fulla Ekhera ta dukana jirru taana.
Nuni ch'ufti aka goorjama d'anga d'oomne aka sabalisa boonna. Nu d'uga barbaanne d'amne, nami nu baasu nura fago jira.
AABBO Waaqa, wollaali nu siti wollaale gudda; ch'ubbuuni teennaleeni nu himatti. Dabaafi ch'ubbuuni teenna guyya ch'ufa nu woliini jirti, dandeenne imormanu.
Nu siini morkine si dinne, dudda siti gale. Nu nama dabsine, sile iraa gorre. Heregi keenna d'articha, dubbini teenna d'uga inqabdu.
Akanaani qajeelumti badde d'ugaani fagaatte. D'ugaani gugufatte balchoomi fulla seenu d'abe.
D'ugaani lafa keesa injirtu, tanaafi nama ch'ubbu lagatu gaargalchani balleesani.
AABBO Waaqi waan kana arginaani, aka d'ugaani injirre hubate iraa laalefate.
Inni aka nami nama dabsani qarqaaru injirre arge mame laalefate. Tanaafi inni harka ufitini worra suni baase dabsachiisa.
Inni d'uga aka ubaara qomati keeyatte, baafama aka kofia sibiila matati keeyata. Inni herega waan hamtuuni balleesani aka woya uyifate. Nama nami dabse gaargalchale haalo baasa.
Inni nyaapa isaatiifi worra lafa fago taule waan worri tolche gula gaargalcha.
Ila borutiifi ila adule ch'ufa nami isa sodaate, nami ch'ufti maqa isaatiifi jabeenna isaale d'eeta. Inni akuma laga yau, ka qilleensi AABBO Waaqa yaasu, d'ufa.
Anini wold'aqisa isani woliini tolfad'a; anini yayu irre tiyya isanii kenne, dubbi tiyya isani barsiise; armaa achi isani naa saalfatani, ijoolle teesaniifi d'aloota worrale barsiiftani aka haga jiru jireenna worri naa saalfatu.

Yerusalemu, kai, aka adu ifsi;
guddinni AABBO Waaqa siti ifsuu jira!
Gosa d'ibi dukanti d'ossite,
ammo sii ifsa AABBO Waaqati ifsa;
si keesati guddinni isaa bibiliqe mullata.
Gochiti d'ibiini ifsa keetiti d'ufte,
hayyootileeni ifsa kanke ka bariiti yaati.
Me millad'a, waan taha kana ilaala:
worri kanke wolti bahe siti galuu jira.
Ilmaani tante ta d'iira lafa fagooti d'ufte,
dubra tantele hamparaani d'ufanini.
Atini waan kana arginaani gammade qilit'amta.
Hormaati gosa d'ibi siti d'ufe,
baariini gamale wonti worri qabu sii d'ufti.
Geejibi gaalaa hedduuni ka lafa Midianitifi Efa d'ufe,
worri Shebaleeni worqifi hit'aanaani d'ufe,
odu dansa ta waan AABBO Waaqi tolche odeesani!
Hooliye Kedaritifi ta Nebayothi ch'ufa sitiini d'ufani,
sorio qalani waan mesa fakaata irati baasani,
AABBO Waaqa gammachiisani.
AABBO Waaqi mana isaa haga qara kaani ira mid'aasa.
Hobolooni aka dumansaa yaate,
aka sabalisa worra ufiti
galu jirtu tunini maani?
Hobolooni sunini lafa fagooti gumi Waaqatini d'ufti. Isiini qarsifi
worqi maqa AABBO Waaqa qulqullo Israelitini guddisaniini d'ufti —
Waaqa ka gosa ch'ufa gumi isaa guddisisu.
AABBO Waaqi waan Yerusalemuni jed'u,
Nyaapi naabo te jaare
hayyooti worraleeni sii hojati.
Anini duri dallane isani gaargalche,
ammo ammatana isanii nahe eeba isanii kenna.
hayyooti gosa d'ibi hori ufitini isanii d'ufti.
Ammo gosa isani hojachu diddu lafaa iraa balleesani.
Mukeeni d'ed'eertu badda Lebanoni sitiini d'ufani,
mana kiyya qulqullooni barreesani dira kiyya mid'aasani.
si dura gajejette si guddifte,
worri duri si tufate kaani miilati jige si kad'ata.
Duuba dira AABBO Waaqa, Sioni, dira Waaqa qulqullo Israeli siini jed'ani.
Deebiani si jibbani aka dira bade ona tahe si biraa ingodaanani.
Anini dira gudda mid'aaga si tolcha,
ka hagu jiru jireenna nami keesati gammadu.
Gosa d'ibifi hayyooti worraleeni akuma niiti daima hoosiftu si qorqoratti.
Duuba atini akasiini aka anini, AABBO Waaqi si baase,
Waaqi guddaani Israeli si balchoomsu beeta.
Anini fulla sibiila diima worqiini sii d'ufe,
fulla mukhaafi sibiila guraacha qarsifi sibiila diimani sii d'ufe,
fulla d'akhaa sibiila guraachani sii d'ufa.
Nami si mohatu deebie si indabsu;
anati d'ugaafi nagaya worri namaani mohatu worraa kenna.
Woraana deebiani si keesati ind'agayani —
woni hamtuuni tokoleeni deebite si qabatte si imballeesitu.
Anini naabo si tahe si qorqorad'a
waan anini si baaseefi na faarsita.
halkanile ifsa jiale woma ira inqabdu;
ifsaani kanke ka jiru jireenna anuma, AABBO Waaqa,
ifsaani guddinna kiyyaleeni sii ifsa.
Guyyaani kanke ka laalala inhobaa.
Anini, AABBO Waaqi, ifsa jiru jireenna,
ka aduufi jiale ira sii ifsu, sii taha.
Gumiini tante ch'ufti waan d'uga tolchite,
haga jiru jireenna laftileeni ta worraa tati.
Anini worra oobre mid'aasa,
aka nami ch'ufti guddinna kiyya argu.
Worri kanke, ka nami isaa diqaa,
gosa guddo irre qabdu taha.
Hojja guyyaani gahe, anini waan kana hurrise tolcha;
anini AABBO Waaqa.

Inni yayu na muude na erge,
aka anini odu dansa hiyyeeyiti odeese,
nama guddo garaani laalala qabu fayyise,
nama hid'aansa keesa jiru ha hiikhaani jed'e,
nama hid'anile hiikha.
Inni ya na erge,
aka anini bara Waaqi gumi ufi baase
nyaapa worra dabsatu himu.
Inni ya na erge, aka anini nama
bohu ch'ufa kibe garaa jabeese,
nama Sioni keesati bohu jiru ch'ufa fulla laalala
gammadafi qilit'ama kenne,
fulla laalefacha faaru d'aachisu.
Worri mukeeni AABBO Waaqi oobre fakaata.
Worri ch'ufti waan dansa tolche,
Waaqale waan inni tolcheefi faarsani.
Worri dira bade ona tahe jaare,
dira bara heddu balleesani mid'aasa.
Gumi tiyya, nyaapi isanii hojate,
ree teesani tisse,
oobru teesani ta mid'aanitifi ta zabibu isanii fach'aase mura.
Qaalole AABBO Waaqa isaniini jed'ani,
hojatu Waaqa keenna jed'ani isani yaamani.
Isani waan gochii d'ibiini horate soorattani,
waan worraatini keenna jettani ufi saaddani.
Ch'eerafi fokoni teesani ya hobaate.
Lafa teesani keesa teetani
hormaata keesani maro lama isanii darani,
gammadi keesanileeni ka jiru jireennaa taha.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Anini d'uga jaalad'e dabaafi ch'ubbu jibba.
Anini d'uga gula gumi tiyyaa woi kenne
wold'aqisa jiru jireenna worra woliini tolfad'a.
D'alooti worraa gosa ch'ufa keesa gurra baafate,
nami worra argu ch'ufti,
aka worri gumi anini eebise, beekha.
waan Waaqi kiyya wo naa tolcheefi qilit'ama.
Inni yayu woya baafama nati uyise,
ubaara d'uga naa kaaye,
akuma worri wolfuud'u faaya dadansa naqate ufi mid'aasu.
akasuma AABBO Waaqi guddaani gumi ufi baase
gochiti ch'uftileeni isa faarsiti.

Anini maro Yerusalemu inuma dubbad'a,
haga Sioni baasani,
d'ugaani isii aka ifse halkaniini bibilit'uti,
afaani inqabad'u.
Ee Yerusalemu, gochiti ch'ufti d'uga tante agarte,
hayyooti worraa ch'ufti guddinna kanke argiti;
maqa hareesa AABBO Waaqi sii kennuni si yaamani.
Atini sure hayyu mid'aadu AABBO Waaqaa taata.
Deebiani ta lakisani siini injed'ani
yokhaani lafa tanteetileeni, Niiti d'iirsi baase injed'ani.
Maqaani kanke amma, Waaqi ya isi jaalate taha,
lafa tanteetileeni, Ta gammadaani fuud'ani jed'ani,
wonti akanatiifi AABBO Waaqati si jaalate,
lafa tanteeti d'iirsa taha.
Akuma kaimi dubra fuud'u,
ka si uumeleeni si fuud'a.
Akuma nami dubra fuud'a intala iraa gammadu,
akasuma Waaqi kanke siraa gammada.
Ee Yerusalemu, naabo tante gubbati anini yayu nama lafa
eegu kaye worri halkanifi guyyale afaani inqabatu.
Worri waan AABBO Waaqi kakhate qaabsise ded'u isaa d'owu male.
Ammalle worri isa hafuura baasu himmalle,
haga inni Yerusalemu mid'aase,
dira lafti ch'ufti faarsitu tolchuti.
AABBO Waaqi yayu kakhu jabdu kakhate,
jabeenna ufitini kakhu suni guuta:
nyaapi kanke deebie mid'aani kanke inyaatu,
nami gosa d'ibileeni deebie daad'i atini mid'aasite ind'ugu.
Ammo isani ka mid'aani fach'aaftani murtani,
qit'a nyaatani AABBO Waaqale faarsitani.
Isani ka mid'aani zabibu guurtani,
daad'i isii naabo Mana kiyya keesati d'uddani.
Worra Yerusalemu, dira keesaa baha,
worra keesani ka galu kara mid'aasa!
Kara balla ch'ira, d'akha keesaa guura!
Baandera oliqaba, gosa ch'ufa garsiisa.
AABBO Waaqi yayu dubbi tana muumme lafati hime waan jed'e.
Waan isani gumi Yerusalemutini jettani, me ilaala,
nami isani baasu d'ufuu jira!
Inni gumi baaseni d'ufuu jira.
Gumi Waaqi baase isaniini jed'ani.
Sileeni, Yerusalemu, dira Waaqi jaalatu,
ka inni illakimne jed'ani.

Woyaani isaa maanifi aka woya nama mid'aani zabibu ch'ach'arase daad'i mid'aasu diimati?
Wonti akanatiifi guyyaani anini gumi tiyya baasu ya d'ufe guyyaani anini nyaapa kiyya gaargalchu ya gahe.
Anini aka qarqaarsa nama iraa d'abe arginaani mame. Ammo dallansuuni garaa na jabeesite, kobuma tiyya worra suni dabsad'e.
Anini dallansuuni gosa heddu ch'ach'arase d'iiga worraa lafati jisse.
Anini naasufu jaalala AABBO Waaqa namati odeese waan inni nuu tolcheefi isa faarsa. Inni maro naasufi jaalala isaatiifi yayu gumi Israeli qarqaare guddo eebise.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'e, Worri kunini kiyya; na insobu. Tanaafi,
inni gaargala ch'ufa keesaa worra baase. Nami worra baase malaikaniti, AABBO Waaqa. Jaalalaafi naasu isaatini inni worra baase. Inni qara duri hojja ch'ufa worra qarqaare,
ammo worri isa dide, aka hama isa laalefachiise. Tanaafi AABBO Waaqi nyaapa worrati tahe worra had'e.
Ammo eege worri waan bara duri gaafa hojatuni AABBO Waaqa Musani lafa jiru qaabate waan jed'e, AABBO Waaqi, ka jaarole gumi isaa baariini taakisiise, me? AABBO Waaqi, ka lubbu isaa Musaa kenne, me?
AABBO Waaqi, ka irre isaa guddooni waan jabdu Musa tolchisise, bisaani baariini gargari kute, gumi isaa bisaani qile taakisiise, akasiini haga jiru jireenna gurra baafate, me? AABBO Waaqi worra dura deeme, worrileeni aka farda lafa aloo ka ingufanne yae.
Akuma looni bale marra qabduti bobaasani, akasuma AABBO Waaqi gumi ufi boqochiisa. Inni gumi isaatini deeme, akasiini gurra dansa argate.
Ee AABBO Waaqa, gubbaa fulla atini qulqulloomafi guddinna keetiini teetu, nu ilaali. Atini maanifi nu yaalu didda? Irreeni tante meeti? Naasufi jaalalti tante meeti? Nu inded'ini.
Atini abba keenna. Ababooti teenna Abrahamufi Yakoboni nu imbeekhani, ammo, ee AABBO Waaqa, atini abba keenna, ka guyya ch'ufa nu baase.
Atini maanifi kara kanke iraa nu gorsita? Atini maafi garaa nu jabeesite, ufi sodaachu nu d'owarta? Hojatu tante, gosa atini duri fohate, jed'i gadeebii.
Nu, gosa tante qulqullo, nyaapi d'ufe lafa teenna keesaa nu baase, mana kanke qulqullole seene t'ureese.
Atini aka waan taka hayyu keenna intahini nu tolchite, yokhaani aka waan nu takaa gumi tante intahini nu tolchita.

Atini maanifi gubba tarsaafte gadi imbuune? Sila gaareeni si garte, mudamte si durati holati.
Gaareeni suni holate, aka bisaani ibida irati owani okote keesati woch'ani taati. Kooti, nyaapa kanke guddinnaafi jabeenna ke garsiisi, gosa ch'ufa ufi durati mudamsiisi.
Gaafa toko atini d'ufte, waan nama mudamsiisa, ka nu insehatini, tolchite gaareenileeni mudamte holate.
Nami tokoleeni takaa Waaqa aka keeti, ka nama isa abdatu wo bahu, arge ind'ageenne.
Atini nama gammadaani d'uga gula deeme kara kanke jabeese qaabatu qarqaarta. Ato atini nuti dallantele, nu daba iraa indeebine, hojja ch'ufa inuma tolchina. Ato dallansuuni tante guddo taatele, nu haguma duriti ch'ubbuma gula yaane.
Nu ch'ufti nama dabaati, hujiini teenna dansaleeni ch'arqi t'uriti fakaati. Maro daba keennatifi nu baala mukha ka qanch'oorate, qilleensi fud'ate, fakaanna.
Nami tokoleeni si iyaamatu, tokoleeni qarqaarsa siraa imfed'atu. Atini ya fuula kanke nu d'ofate, maro ch'ubbu teennatifi nu balleesite.
Ee AABBO Waaqa, atini abba keenna. Nu d'oqe faara fakaanna, ammo atini nama isii supe mid'aasu fakaata. Atini harka keetiini nu uumte,
akana nuti indallanini yokhaani ch'ubbu teenna haga jiru jireenna nuti inheregini. Nu gumi teeti, nuu nahi.
Diri kanke qulqullooni ch'ufti ya bade lafa aloo tahe; Yerusalemuleeni ya badde ona taate,
ammalle mana keenna mid'aaga qulqullo, duri ababooti teenna keesati si faarsite, ya ibidaani gubani. Fullaani mimid'aaduni ch'ufti ya badde ona taate.
AABBO Waaqa, wonti kunini ch'ufti si ind'ibdu? Atini maafi afaani qabate gaargala hagana gahu kana nuti lakifte?

Anini haguma duriti harka balliseti, worra mata jabaate, na dide, kara ufi gula yau kana yaama.
Worri ch'ufti waan ch'eera tahe na dallansiise oobru woyyu keesati sorio baase, waaqa d'araati d'akhaye irati hit'aani aarse.
Halkani worri godaafi irreesa d'aqe ekhera wo gaafate. Worri fooni booyye nyaate fuuto fooni sorio waaqa d'araati baasani d'uga.
Duuba worri waan nama d'ibiini jed'u, Nuti ind'iaatiina, nuraa fagaad'a, nu intuqina, nu nama qulqullo! Worri seeruma hafuura ani baafad'u, woma keesa injiru dallansuuni anini worrati dallanu ibida haguma jiru ind'aamne fakaati.
Anini qara waan worra tolchu la herege t'aafe. Anini waan worri tolche suni argaa dandae afaani inqabad'u ammo
maro daba worraatifi ka ababoota worrale haalo baafad'a. Worri gaara irati sorio gubbaani baase kubile irati na arabse. Tanaafi anini waan worri tolche suni gula haalo baafad'a.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Nami mid'aani zabibu dansa balleesu injiru, ammo fulla balleesu daad'i mid'aasa. Aninileeni gumi tiyya ch'ufa imballeesu nama naa hojatu anini inuma baasa.
Anini worra Israeli ka gosa Yuda daraarse, d'alooti worraleeni lafa tiyya ta gaareeni d'aala. Ammalle gumiini anini fohad'e, ta naa hojatu, achi teeti.
Duuba worri na kad'ate, loonifi reeni worraaleeni diida Sharoni gama ila adutifi bale gaargala Akori gama ilaborule tikhati.
Ammo isani worri na lakise gaara qulqullo yaala bahe waaqoota milkifi ayyaana ta Gadifi Menini jed'ani kad'atu, aka d'ibi taha.
Waan anini isani yaame jennaani na jalaa didani dubbi tiyyale ch'aqasu diddaniifi, amma wonti anini isanii heregu, aka woraanani isani balleesani isani fit'ani. Isani seera kiyyale diddani hameenna fohatani gula baatani.
Tanaafi AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u: Worri na kad'ate seera kiyya guutu aka dansaa nyaata d'ugaati qaba ammo isani gaargala beelafi d'eebu qabdani. Worri ingammada, ammo isani inch'eersani.
Worri gammade sirba, ammo isani garaa hammaatani laalefatani bootani.
Gumiini anini fohad'e maqa keesanini nama abaarti. Ana, AABBO Waaqa guddati, isani fit'a; ammo nama naa saalfatu maqa haareesa kennaafi.
Nami lafa suni ka eeba nama ira fed'atu, maqa Waaqa d'ugaatini naa eebisi namaani jed'a. Nami kakhu kakhatuleeni maqa Waaqa d'ugaatini kakhata. Gaargali qara lafa jiru hobae deebie inqaabatani.
Maro waan anini uume sunifi, gammada, qilit'ama. Wonti akanatiifi Yerusalemu hareetiini anini uume fulla gammada taate, gumiini isiileeni gammadi.
Anini Yerusalemu iraa gammade, nama isiile maacha. Deebiani achiti imbohani yokhaani ilaalefatani.
Daimi ch'araqoni deebie indeebiu nami guddaleeni haga jaare hobauti lubbu ind'abu. Nama ganna d'ibba tokoti duu kaimati heregani; nama ganni d'ibba ingahiini ka due abaarsa qaba jed'ani.
Mana jaaratani ke taani, oobru zabibu oobratani iraa nyaatani.
Mana nami toko jaare nami d'ibiini iti ingalu; yokhaani oobru nami toko oobre nami d'ibiini inyaatu. Akuma mukhi lafa irati turu, gumiini tiyyaleeni lubbu bulte lafa irati turti, ammalle worri anini fohad'e waan hojate ch'ufa bara heddu iraa gammada.
Hujiini worraa ch'ufti tolte eebifamti, ijoolleeni worraleeni gaargala inargattu. Ammalle anini worraafi d'aloota worrale haga jiru jireenna eebisa.
Ato worri na iyyaamanne anini d'agayaafi, ato worri tae na kad'atu jalaa qaba.
Yaifi ilmaani hoola woliini d'eedde, nyeench'ileeni aka looni buuyo nyaate, bofileeni deebie nama inyaatu. Gaara kiyya qulqullo gubbati waan hamtu intolchani yokhaani woma inijeesani.

Nami lafafi gubba uume anumaniti? Nami anini iraa gammadu, nama ufi diqeese ch'ubbu lakise, na sodaate naa saalfatu.
Nami woma fed'u taha. Wonti ch'ufti worraa waan tokotu, ato jibicha korma sorio baasani, yokhaani nama sorio baasanile; ato ilmaani hoola qalani, yokhaani sare morma ch'absanile; ato mid'aani Waaqaa baasani, yokhaani d'iiga booyye d'ibaayu baasanile; ato hit'aana aarsani, yokhaani waan harkaani boch'ani kad'atanile. Worri aada hamtu akana, ta waaqaani kad'atani tana, tolfate iraa gammada.
Tanaafi anini badi worri sodaatu itiini d'ufa wonti akanatiifi hojja anini worra yaamu, nami na jalaa owaatu injiru, hojja anini dubbad'ele nami na ch'aqasu injiru. Worri waan hamtu tahe waan na ingammachiimne gula bahe.
Isani worri AABBO Waaqa saalfate isa sodaatu, waan inni jed'u ch'aqasa: Waan isani nama kiyya taatanifi, nami keesani ka gari isani jibbe, isani hanqata. Worri isani goyeese waan jed'u, AABBO Waaqi ha guddinna ufi isani agarsiise isani baasu, aka nu akasiini gammada keesani agarru. Ammo worruma akasi jed'u suni ch'eersani!
Ch'aqasa! Iyyanti dira keesaa d'uftu, yokhaani lalabi Mana Waaqa keesaa d'ufu sunini qonqo nyaapa AABBO Waaqi haalo baafatuti.
Nami taka waan kana arge d'agaye injira? Gochiti guyya tokooni d'alate injirti? Sionini akuma ilmeeni iti ejateeni yoosu d'alti.
Waan anini gumi tiyya fulla d'alaatini d'ufe d'alu d'owu seetu? Dubbibbi suni AABBO Waaqati jed'e.
Yerusalemu woliini gammada; isii jed'a, gammada, isani nami isii jaalatu ch'ufti! Ammatana woliini gammada isani worri qara isii bohe ch'ufti! Akuma daimi haad'a ufi hod'e quufu,
isanileeni waan isii keesaa baha d'uddani quuftani.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Anini hormaata haga jiru jireennatini isii d'ufe, hormaati gosa ch'ufaa akuma laga yae inch'inne isaniti yaa. Isani daima haati hoosifate hamparte ufirati sirbisiftu fakaatani.
Yerusalemu keesa, anini akuma haati ilmaani ufi tabsiifte bohu d'owartu, isani tolcha.
Hojja waan kana ka tahe gartani, gammaddani fayyaafi jabeenna argattani. Duuba aka anini, AABBO Waaqi, nama naa saalfatu qarqaare nyaapa kiyyati dallanu, beetani.
AABBO Waaqi ibidaani d'ufe, gaarini inni yaabatu aka bubbe utaale, inni nama iti dallane gaargalcha.
Inni ibidaafi goraadeeni nama lafa ch'ufa keesa jiru, ka wollaala qabu, gaargalcha — nama heddule infit'ani.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, worra ufi qulqulleese, aada hamtu waaqoota d'ara tolfate, oobru woyyuti wolgula yae, booyyeefi hantutafi sagale t'uri d'ibi nyaate, muummeeni worra ya d'iaate.
Anini heregaafi huji worra imbeekha. Duuba anini d'ufe nama gosa ch'ufa wolti baasa. Worri yo wolti d'ufe, waan irreeni tiyya tolchu dandeetu arge,
aka nami worra gaargalchu anuma beekha. Ammo anini worra nama haga gari lakise, gosafi lafa fago, ta gurra kiyyaafi jabeennaafi guddinna kiyya ind'aagayiniti erga: lafti suni Tarshishi, Libia, Ludi ta nami isii t'iyole ammalle Tubalifi Yavani. Duuba gosa tana keesa worri guddinna kiyya odeesa.
Worri nama gosa teesani ch'ufa gosa d'ibi keesaa galche naa kenna. Duuba fardaafi gaangeefi gaalafi gaarini gaara kiyya qulqullo Yerusalemutini d'ufani, akuma worri Israeli mid'aani Waaqaa baasani miha woyyuti naqe mana Waaqatini d'ufu.
Anini worra suni haga gari qaaloleefi worra Lawi tolcha.
Jila baatitiifi ta Sabato ch'ufa nami gosa ch'ufaa wolti bahe arma Yerusalemu keesati na kad'ata.
Worri hojja galu, reefa worra na dide arga. Raamooni worra nyaatu haguma jirtu indootu, ibidi worra gubu haguma jiru ind'aamu. Reefa suni nami ch'ufti ilaani jibba.

Tunini dubbi Yeremia, ilma Hilkia, qaallicha toko, ka dira Anathothi, lafa Benjamini keesa.
Bara Yosiani, ilmi Amoni, hayyu Yuda, ganna kud'ani sadeeso ka mootuma isaa AABBO Waaqi Yeremiani dubbate.
Ammalle gaafa Yehoiakimuni, ilmi Yosia, hayyu Yudale dubbateeni. Eegi sunile AABBO Waaqi maro heddu isaani dubbate, haga ganna kud'ani tokeeso, ka Sedekia, ilmi Yosia, lafa mohate. Jia shaneeso ka ganna suni, worra Yerusalemu boojiani.
AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e,
Anini ato si inuuminu si fohad'e, ato atini ind'alatinu koba si baase, raaga gosa ch'ufaa si tolche.
Jennaani anini waan jed'eeni, AABBO Waaqa gudda, me ilaali, anini ijoolle, dubbi imbeekhu.
Ammo AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e, Anini ijoolle injed'ini beeni, nama anini iti si ergu ch'ufa d'aqi, waan anini jed'i siini jed'u ch'ufa iti himi.
Anini si woliini jira, woma insodaatini, anumati si qorqorata. Nami waan kana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa!
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi harka d'eerefate, afaani na tuqe waan nani jed'e, me ilaali, anini dubbi afaani keesa si kaya.
Anini arra lafafi gosa keesa teetu ch'ufa harka keetiti kenna, aka atini buqifte qaarifte, balleesite, dabsatte, ijaarte oobruti.
AABBO Waaqi, Yeremia, atini maani agarta? Jed'e na gaafate. Anini waan jed'eeni, Anini dame qolaati arge.
AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e, D'uguma baanta, Anini dubbi tiyya eeguu jira aka isiini guutamtu.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi ammalle naani dubbate waan jed'e, Waan kana male maani d'ibi agarta? Anini waan jed'eeni okote mirga ejitu, ta bisaani keesaa woch'ani, ta diquma garana inqariini arge.
Inni waan nani jed'e, Badiini mirgaa gabaafate nama lafa tana keesa jiru ch'ufa qabati;
wonti akanatiifi anini gosa mirga teetu ch'ufa, koota jed'e yaamuu jira. Hayyooti worraa barch'uma isi fullo Yerusalemutifi d'aatu naabo isaatifi d'aatu dira Yuda d'ibile ch'ufa d'ad'aabatti.
Anini gumi tiyya ingaargalcha, waan worri nati ch'ubbamefi. Worri na lakise, waaqa d'ibii sorio baase, waaqa harkaani boch'ani mid'aafate kad'ate.
Ammo atini mart'ifad'i, kurfefad'i, beeni, waan anini, Jed'i siini jed'u ch'ufa worrati himi. Amma worra insodaatini, yokhaani anini gaafa atini worra woliini jirtu hagasi ira si sodaachisa.
Yeremia, ch'aqasi! Nama lafa tana keesa jiru ch'ufti — hayyoota Yuda taanaani, jaarole taanaani, qaalole taanaani, gumile taanaani — ch'ufti siini morka. Ammo arra jabeenna atini worraani dabsatu sii kenna. Atini dira jabeesani jaaranifi utuba sibiilatifi naabo sibiila diimani mid'aasani fakaata. Worri si indabsatu, wonti akanatiifi anati si qorqorata. Nami dubbi tana jed'e, ana AABBO Waaqa.

AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e,
Beeni, Yerusalemu d'aqi, waan nama isii ch'ufaani jettu, AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Anini imbeekha, aka atini gaafa kaima na d'ugeefatte,
gaafa anini si fuud'e na jaalatte.
Atini lafa gamooji keesa na gula deemte,
lafa nami takaa infach'aasini.
Ee Israeli, atini gaafasi tiyyuma
worra qulqullo anini qara d'ale.
Anini gaargalafi badi nami siti game ch'ufatini d'ufa.
Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Dubbi AABBO Waaqa d'agaya, isani d'alooti Yakobo, ka gosa Israeli.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Ababooti teesani wollaala maani narati garteefi
naraa fagaate waan woma intahini gula yaate ufile akasuma taate?
Worri, ato anini lafa Misiri keesaa baase
lafa aloo ta gamooji
lafa d'eebicha ta maansa qabdu,
lafa goddu gaargala heddu qabdu,
ta nami tokoleeni iti qubate
yokhaani imaltule keesa indeemne,
keesa worraani deemele, diqole na iyyaalle.
Anini lafa gabbo wo qabduni d'ufe,
aka worri mid'aani isiitiifi
waan dansa d'ibi isiini baaftu nyaate gammadu.
Ammo fulla suni worri lafa tiyya balleese,
lafa anini d'aalaa worraa kenne t'ureese.
Qaaloleeni, AABBO Waaqi me?
Jette ingaafanne.
Qaaloleeni tiyyaleeni na imbeenne.
Jaaroleeni na didde,
raagootileeni maqa Baalitini wo fadde,
waan woma keesa injirre gula yaate kad'atte.
Tanaafi anini, AABBO Waaqi,
gumi tiyya ammalle himad'a d'aloota worrale ch'ufa.
Lafa Kitimu jed'ani ta ila aduu d'aqaa,
lafa Kedari ta ilaborule nama iti erga.
Duuba inagartani, aka wonti akana kunini takaa lafa keesati intahini.
Gochiti d'ibiini ta taka waaqa ufi jijirate injirti?
(Ato inni waaqa woma keesa injirre tahele.)
Ammo gumiini tiyya yayu naa jijiratte,
ana, Waaqa gurra worraa kenne, lakifte,
waaqa woma keesa injirre gula yaate,
Tanaafi anini gubbaani, mudami holad'i,
mami, maadefad'i jed'eeni.
Wonti akanatiifi gumiini tiyya yayu
kara lamaani ch'ubbu tolchite:
Worri yayu ana madda inch'inne lakise, qaba bisaani,
ta babaqat'e bisaani keesa inteenne heddu qotate.
Worri Israeli tisse?
Tissooma keesa d'alate?
Maafi nyaapi had'e balleesa re?
Nyaapi sunini aka nyeench'a worrati itane,
lafa worraa balleese,
diri worraleeni bade,
ona tahe lafati hafa.
Ammalle, worri Nofutifi ka Tahapanesi
ya d'ufe buqe mata worraa ch'abse.
Ee Israeli, waan kana isanumati ufitini d'ufeeniti?
Ka AABBO Waaqa keesani,
gaafa duri inni isaniini godaane lakiftani.
Mala keesaani, isani yo lafa Misiri d'at'ani,
bisaani galaana isii d'uddani,
waan woi keesaa argatani seetani?
Mala keesaani, isani yo lafa Ashuru d'at'ani,
bisaani galaana Frati d'uddani,
waan woi keesaa argatani seetani?
Hameenni keesani isani gaargalche,
badiini isani naraa baddani wollaala isaniti murti.
Aka hojja isani na lakiftani na gula deemu diddani,
wonti sunini hamtu, herega, arga.
Nami dubbi suni jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa gudda.
AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u,
Ee Israeli, isani duri dubbi tiyya lakiftani
naa saalfachu diddani,
waaqa d'ibi kad'atani
kubilee d'ed'eertu ch'ufafi mukeeni gugurdo ch'ufa jalati waaqa d'araa kad'atani,
huji sharmut'oma tolchitani.
Anini duri aka sanyi zabibu dansaa isani oobre,
amma waan isani taatani laala.
Isani mukha zabibu,
ka shame woma imbaamne, fakaatani.
Ato isani sabuna beekhaanileeni ufi d'it'ani,
t'urini ch'ubbu teesani isani iraa imbaatu,
anini inuma arga.
Isani akami, Anini t'uri inqabu,
anini takaa waaqa Baali jed'ani inkad'anne jettani?
Ch'ubbu isani bale keesati tolchitani,
ilaala, hubad'a.
Isani aka hala gaala ta ufuma badde,
lafa gamooji keesa lafa martu fakaatani.
Yo isiini daarimte korma feetu,
eenuti d'owu dandaa?
Kormi isii barbaadu gaargala womatu inqabu;
isiini yo kormi yaabu ch'ufa kurfo jirti.
Ee Israeli,
ufumaa teetani miila keesani indad'absisina,
yokhaani waaqa d'ibi gula deemtani
lubbu teesani ingogosina.
Ammo isani waan jettani, Hiyo, nu dandeenne illakimnu,
nu yayu waaqa d'ibi jaalane,
isuma gula baana.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Akuma hattuuni hojja qabani ch'eertu, isanileeni gumi Israeli akasuma ch'eertani — hayyootafi jaarole teesanifi qaaloleefi raagooti teesanileeni.
Isani ch'ufa inch'eersani, ka mukhaani, Aabbo jettani, D'akhaani, siti na d'ale jettani. Wonti akasi isani tolchanifi waan isani dudda nati galtani, fuula naraa deefattaniifi. Ammo hojja gaargali isaniti d'ufu, nati d'uftani, kooti, nu baasi jettani.
Waaqi isani mid'aafattani meeti? Yo isani gaargala qabaatani ha isani baasuti, yo dandae! Yuda, waaqi kanke akuma dira keeti heddu.
Gungumsuni te maani? Maafi nati garagalte na didda?
Ato anini isani gaargalchele, wonti sunini woma isanii imbaane. Isani wollaala keesani iraa deebiu diddani. Isani ya akuma nyeench'a dallane, raagoota teesani hobaaftani.
Worra Israeli, dubbi tiyya ch'aqasa. Anini yayu aka lafa aloo ta gamooji, yokhaani aka lafa dukanooftu soda qabdu, isaniti tahe? Isani duuba maanifi, Nu waan feenu taana deebine siti indeebinu nani jettani?
Niitiini d'io fuud'ani, faaya isii indeeti? Intalti fuud'a indeeti? Ammo gumiini tiyya yayu guyya heddu muumme inqamne na deete.
Isani d'uguma jaala barbaadu beetani. Nad'eeni nad'eeni ch'ufa ira hamtuleeni dandeete isani iraa wo baratti!
Woyaani teesanileeni d'iiga hiyyeesatiifi nama woma iyyakini qabdi, ammo d'iiga nama mana ch'abse nama saamu inqabdu. Ammo taatule,
isani, Nu woma iyyakine; Waaqileeni deebie nuti indallanu jettani. Ammo anini, AABBO Waaqi, wollaala isaniti mura, waan isani, Nu daba intolcheni jettanifi.
Isani maanifi akana finna keesani jijirtani, waaqa gosa d'ibi gula yaatani? Akuma worri Ashuruu isani sobe, worri Misirileeni isani soba.
Isani ch'eertani, mata lafa buuftani, worra Misiri biraa yaatani. Anini, AABBO Waaqi, worra isani d'aabattani suni ya dide; isani worra suni woma iraa inargattani.

AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Yo nami niiti ufi jalaa baase, nami d'ibiini isii fuud'e, inni dandae deefata? Lafti suni yo akasi int'urooftu? Ammo isani worri Israeli ka jaalani heddu qabdani, nati deebiu feetani?
Fiit'e gaareeni laala. Fullaani isani aka sharmut'a iti intahini injirti? Isani d'aatu kara teetani, jaallowaani teesani eeddani, akuma Araftini lafa gamooji keesati nama ijeeftu eegatu. Isani lafa yayu Sharmut'oma keesanini t'ureesitani.
Tanaafi furmaata d'abdani gannileeni isanii roobu dida. Isani sharmut'uma d'uga fakaatani, diqole ch'eera inqabdani.
Ammatana waan nani jettani, Atini abba keenna, haguma ijoolluma teennati asi nu jaalata.
Atini haga jirtu nuti indallanta? Dallansuuni tante haga jirtu nu jalaa ingaltu? Ee Israeli, dubbini teesani tanuma, ammo haga dandeetani hameenna tolchitani.
Anini waan jed'e, Hegeri isiini, eegi waan kana ch'ufa taate, nati deebiti. Ammo isiini nati indeebine, oboleetini isii ta Yuda jed'ani hamtuni taanileeni waan kana ya agarte.
Yudaleeni oboleetini isii hamtuni suni aka anini worra Israeli ufi biraa gusse agarte. Ammo taatule isiini na sodaachu didde, ufile sharmut'a taate,
ch'eera d'abde. Isiini lafa t'ureesite, d'akhaafi mukhaa kad'atte, akasiini sharmut'a taate.
Eegi waan kana ch'ufale, Yudaani, oboleetini Israeli hamtuni taani, garaa tokooni nati indeebine, ammo na sosobde. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e, Ato Israeliini na lakiftele, worri worra Yuda hama kaani iraa gooma.
Beeni, worra Israelitini waan atini jettu, Worra Israeli ka na didu, nati deebia. Anini naaso deebie isaniti indallanu,
nami wollaala qabu nu, yayu AABBO Waaqa keennati ch'ubbamne ch'alla jed'a. Nu mukeeni gugurdo ch'ufa jalati waaqa d'ibi jaalane, gula yaane, seera kanke yakinele jed'a. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Worra na didu kana, nati deebia, isani kiyyuma. Anini nama toko dira ch'ufa keesaa fuud'e lamale balbala gosa ch'ufa keesaa fuud'e, gaara Sioniti isani deebisa.
Anini jara naa saalfatu, ka isani fidu, isanii kenne, worri qaroomafi qalbiini isani fida.
Duuba yo isani lafa suni keesati hortani daraartani, nami deebie waan Sanduqa Wold'aqisa kiyya indubbatu, deebiani odu inkasani yokhaani inqaabatani; worri deebie woma ira inqabu, yokhaani ka d'ibile imid'aasani.
Hojja bari sunini d'ufu, Yerusalemuni barch'uma AABBO Waaqa jed'ani ammalle gochiti ch'uftileeni achiti wolti baate na kad'atti. Worri deebie waan garaani worra jajabaani ch'ubbichi yaadu gula iyyaau.
Israelifi Yudaani takaa taate, wolumaani lafa qara worra iti boojiani, ta mirgati d'ufani, lafa anini duri ababoota isaniti d'aala kenneti galani.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Israeli anini ilma isani tolfad'e,
lafa dansa lafa ch'ufa iraa mid'aadu
isanii kennu fed'e.
Ammalle waan isani aabbo nani jettanifi
waan isani deebitani naraa gortani inseenne.
Ammo akuma niiti hamtu isani nati hammaattani.
Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Iyyanna fiit'e gaareeni gubbati d'agayani;
iyyanti suni bohafi kad'acha worra Israeliti,
waan worri kara d'uga lakise
AABBO Waaqa isaanii ded'eefi.
Isani ch'ufti ka AABBO Waaqa iraa gortani,
isati deebia;
inni isani fayyise nama d'uga isani tolcha.
Isani waan jettani, nu AABBO Waaqati deebina, inni Waaqa keenna.
Kad'achaani gaara irati nu waaqa d'ara kad'annu woma nu imbaane, qarqaarsi Israeli garuma AABBO Waaqa keenna ch'allaa d'ufa.
Ammo kad'achaani waaqa Baali jed'ani, ka ch'eeraani nama balleesu yayu loonifi reefi dubrafi d'iirale nu d'owarte — waan ababooti teenna haguma duriti hojate horate ch'ufa.
Nu ch'eeraani gach'iimne, ch'eeri sunini nu ukaamsu male. Nufi ababooti teenna haguma duriti yayu AABBO Waaqa keennati ch'ubbamne; nu takaa seera isaa inguunne jettani.

AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Isani, worri Israeli, yo deebiu feetani, nati deebia. Yo isani waaqa harkaani mid'aafatani, ka anini jibbu gadi gatani naraa goru diddani,
d'uga qabdani aka maqa kiyyaani kad'attani. Duuba gochiti ch'ufti, Nuu eebisi nani jette na faarsiti.
Wold'aqisa keesani ka AABBO Waaqaani woliini tolfatani, jabeesa, garaa keesani AABBO Waaqati kennad'a, isani worri Yudatifi ka Yerusalemuleeni. Yo isani akasi tolchu diddani, maro isani waan hamtu tolchitanifi dallansuuni tiyya aka ibida isani gubdi nami tokoleeni ka dandae d'aamfu injiru.
Lafa teesani ch'ufa keesa magalata d'aa,
aka male iyya lalaba.
Ammalle waan worra Yudatifi ka Yerusalemutini jettani,
wolti baha, dira jabeesani jaaraniti nu yaasa.
Kara Sioni woli akheekha!
Hurrisa, achiti baqad'a,
lubbu teesani baasa!
AABBO Waaqi hameennaafi badi gara mirgati d'ufuuni jira.
Akuma nyeench'i goda isaa keesaa bahu,
akasuma nami gosa ch'ufa balleesu ya gabahe.
Inni lafa Yuda balleesu d'ufe.
Diri Yuda bade ona taha,
nami iti galu injiru.
Tanaafi ch'arqi naqad'a, lalaba, boha;
wonti akanatiifi dallansuuni AABBO Waaqaa hamtuni
worra Yuda iraa ingalle.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Guyya suni hayyootafi jaaroleeni garaa laafte, qaaloleeni rifate, raagootileeni mamti.
Jennaani anini waan jed'e, Ee AABBO Waaqa gudda, atini yayu worra Yerusalemu aka male sobde balleesite! Atini lafti nagaya jette ka goraadeeni lubbu worraati ejitu.
Guyyaani ind'ufa, ka worra Yerusalemu dubbi tana iti himani: bubbe owituti lafa aloo keesa isaniti gad'ufa. Bubbeeni sunini qilleensa laanuma woi afufuniti —
bubbeeni AABBO Waaqi d'ufuuni hagasi ira jabdu! AABBO Waaqumati gumi isaa badiini iti d'ufuu jira.
Me ilaala, nyaapi aka baaldo dumansaa d'aabate d'ufuu jira. Gaarini isaa ka fardi hirkisu bubbe fakaata, fardooleeni worraleeni risa ira barifti. Nu ya banne, badiini ya nu qabate!
Ee Yerusalemu, t'uri ch'ubbu garaa kanke keesaa d'iqi, aka baafamtu. Yomi herega daba kana heregu lakifta?
Qonqooni gara dira Danitifi gaareeni Efraimuti odu hamtuni d'ufte
waan jette, waan isani gosa ch'ufafi worra Yerusalemutileeni jettani, Nyaapi lafa fagooti isaniti d'ufuu jira, ka dira Yudati lalabe,
Yerusalemu aka nama oobru tissu marsu, waan gumiini isii AABBO Waaqa diddeefi. Nami dubbi tana jed'e AABBO Waaqa.
Yuda, adabuma keetifi woma atini taateti waan kana sitini d'ufe. Ch'ubbuma teetiti badii tana sitini d'ufe — isiini ya onne si d'oofte si ijeefte.
Anini waan kana aka takaa inargini laalefad'e,
dandae inoobsu!
Onneeni tiyya teete na keesati buubdi,
dandae afaani inqabad'u!
Anini magalata d'aanifi
iyyanna worra woli had'u d'agaya.
Badiini woluma gula d'ufte,
lafti ch'ufti badde ona taati,
maro tokotu waaro teenna balleesani,
golla isiile gargari tarsaasani.
Anini haga yomi duula wolti kau kana argu lakisa?
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Gumiini tiyya raatu, nale imbeetu,
worri ijoolle woma imbeenne,
ta woma inhubanne, fakaata.
Worri aka waan hamtu tolchu guddo iti qaro,
ammo aka waan dansaa tolchu guddo iti daalle.
Anini lafa ilaale — isiini duwa, aka injirtu;
gubbale millad'e — ifsa d'abe.
Anini gaareeni ilaale — isiini chochou jirti,
kubileleeni ufumaa teete hargufamti.
Anini millad'e nama d'abe,
simpirreleeni ch'ufti ya barifte iti d'aabatte.
Ammalle anini millad'e,
lafti gabboni duri wo baaftu gamooji taate;
maro dallansu AABBO Waaqatifi
diri isiileeni ya bade ona tahe.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Lafti ch'ufti badde raasa taati,
ammo taatule ch'ufa imballeesu.
Lafti boote,
gubbaleeni dukanoofti.
AABBO Waaqi ya jed'e,
dubbi ufi gara ingalchu;
inni ya buufate, ufi ira indeebiu.
Iyyanna worra farda yaabatutifi worra t'iyaani wo had'u,
yo d'agayani nami dira keesa jiru ch'ufti imbaqata.
Nami gari baddati baqate,
ka gari d'akhaye kora.
Dira ch'ufa duwa lakisani,
nami deebie keesa intau.
Ee Yerusalemu! Atini ya badde!
Atini maafi woya diimtu uyifatte,
faaya worqi naqatte, ila kuulatta?
Atini ufumaa ufi ch'ota!
Jaalani tante ya si jibbite si ijeesu feeti.
Anini iyyanna niiti ch'ininfatu d'agaye
waacha niiti takaa ind'aalini.
Iyyanti suni ta Yerusalemu,
ta yo isiini hafuura baafachu dad'abde, harka olqabate,
anini ya bade,
nyaapi na ijeesu fed'a jettu!

Worra Yerusalemu kara keesani gula oria!
Ilaala, hubad'a! gabaya keesa barbaada!
Nama tokole ka waan dansa tolche
d'uga gula deemu ingartani?
Yo isani agartani,
AABBO Waaqi Yerusalemuu inaraarama.
Ato isani, AABBO Waaqa kad'anna jettanile,
dubbini sunini d'ara.
Ee AABBO Waaqa,
ilti tante d'uga imbarbaadu?
Atini worra d'oofte
ammo worri ind'ukubsanne,
atini worra ch'arasite
ammo worri mata jabaate ch'ubbu iraa deebiu dide.
Jennaani anini herege waan jed'e,
worri kunini hiyyeeyi woma imbeenne,
worri waan daalluma taha,
kara AABBO Waaqaa imbeekhu.
Anini worra gugurda d'aqe dubbad'aani.
Worri suni kara AABBO Waaqa inuma beekha,
waan Waaqi fed'ule inuma beekha.
Ammo worri ch'ufti woligale
dubbi AABBO Waaqa lakise
isaa saalfachu dide.
Tanaafi nyeench'i badda keesaa yae, worra had'e,
yayini lafa gamoojiti baate worra tatarsaafte,
qeeramsileeni dira keesati nama gaada.
Yo worri sunini mana ufitii gabahe,
gargari worra tatarsaasani;
wonti akanatiifi dabi worraa gudda,
bara ch'ufa worri Waaqa lakise iraa gore.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'e,
Anini maafi ch'ubbu gumi tiyya araaramaafi?
Worri na lakise waaqa waaqa intahini kad'ata.
Anini worra quubse,
ammo worri jaala d'ibi gula bade,
maneeni sharmut'ati orie.
Worri korma farda ka quufe fakaata;
namu nad'eeni biyyaati d'arae gula bada.
Anini maro waan kanatifi worra gaargalchu himmalle?
Yokhaani gosa akana tana haalo baafachu himmalle?
Anini nyaapa oobru zabibu ta worra kiyya muru erga;
ammo, ch'ufa imballeesina hambisa jed'aani.
Ammalle dameele ch'ira,
dameeleeni isani kutani sunini tiyyaaniti jed'aani.
Worri Israelitiifi ka Yuda
ya woli gale naraa gore.
Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Gumiini AABBO Waaqa isa didde waan jette, inni woma intolchu. Wonti hamtuni nuti ind'uftu, woraanafi beelale inagaru.
Worri waan jed'e, Raagooti womaniti, qilleensuma, dubbi AABBO Waaqa indubbatu. AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan nani jed'e, Yeremia, waan gumiini tunini dubbi tana jetteefi, Anini dubbi tiyya afaani kanke keesati aka ibida tolcha. Gumiini tunini qoraani fakaati, ibidi gube worra balleesa.
Ee gumi Israeli, AABBO Waaqi gosa fago jirtu had'iisa isanitini d'ufa. Gochiti suni duru lafa jirti, ammalle guddo jabdu, afaani worraale nami keesani tokoleeni imbeekhu.
T'iyoleeni worraaleeni askarti jajabdu, ta naasu male nama ijeeftu.
Worri sunini sagale teesani nyaate fit'e, ilmaani teesani ta d'iiratifi ta dubrale hobaasa. Worri loonifi ree teesani qaqale nyaate, mukeeni teesani ta zabibutifi ta odale balleesa. Worri woraana ufiitini dira jabeesani jaarani, ka isani abdatani, balleesa.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Bara sunile anini gumi tiyya ch'ufa inhobaasu.
Hojja biyyiti si gaafate, AABBO Waaqi maafi akana nu tolche? jette, waan jettuuni, Akuma isani na lakiftani, lafa teesani keesati waaqa d'ibi hojatani, akasuma isani nama gosa teesani intahini, lafa d'ibi keesati hojatani.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Worra Yakobotiifi ka Yudati dubbi tana hima, waan jettaniini:
Me ch'aqasa, gumi daalle woma imbeenne, ta ila qabdu womaani ingarre, gurra qabdu womanu ind'ageenne.
Anini AABBO Waaqa; isani maafi na insodaanne? Maafi na durati inholanne? Anini seera baariini maansa tolche lafaani gargari baase seera jiru jireenna ka bisaani indabarre. D'awani ato baariini chochooftele bisaani dandaani seera suni intaakani. D'awani ato dibbiftele dandeete inch'absitu.
Ammo gumi tana, mataani keesani jajaba, waan didani male waan d'ibi imbeetani; isani ya naraa gortani, kara d'ibi iti d'abatani.
Ato anini hagayyafi gannale isani roobe bara isani mid'aani muratanile isani tolchele isani taka na sodaatani na inguddimne.
Ammo fulla suni, ch'ubbuuni teesani waan dansa kana isani d'owarte.
Nama ch'ubbu qabuti gumi tiyya keesa jira; worri aka waan nama simpirre t'ururaani qabu wo gaada, ammo t'urura suni namaa mid'aasa.
Akuma nami adamo simpirre subba ufi guutatu, akasuma worri maneeni isaani waan saamanini guute.
Tanaafi worri irre baase, guddinna argate wo horate, gabbate moora baase — ch'ubbuuni worraa haga inqabdu; hiyyeeyi d'uga d'owani, nama woma inqamnele dabsani.
Ammo anini, AABBO Waaqi, maro waan kanatifi worra gaargalche gosa tana haalo baafad'a.
Wonti daba hamtuni ya lafa keesati taate;
raagooti dubbi d'ara ch'alla fadde; qaaloleeni dubbi worraa gula yaate, gumiini tiyyaleeni waan suni iti quufte. Ammo guyya muumme maani tahani?

Worra Benjamini, baqad'a, lubbu ufi baasa! Yerusalemu keesaa baqad'a! Tekoa keesa magalata d'aa, Beth-Hekeremu keesa goola ibidaa old'aaba. Waan hamtufi badiini gara mirgati d'ufuu jirti.
Diri Sioni mid'aaga, ammo imballeesani,
hayyooti achiti waaro d'aabati, duula ufi woliini. Worri dira marse fulla, fed'uti waaro d'abate,
waan jed'u, Yerusalemu had'iisa kurfaa! Kurfefad'a, nu guyya guddaani haana! Ammo duuba eege waan jed'ani, ya ture, lafti ya galgaloofte, gaadisi galgalaleeni ya d'eerate.
Nu halkaniini haane, fulla dira suni jajabdu balleesina.
AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u, Mukha ch'ira, waan ira ejaanjitani dira Yerusalemutini haatani jaarad'a, Dira kana balleesu malani, waan nami isa keesati guddo woli dabseefi.
Akuma eeli bisaani qullo maddu akasuma Yerusalemuni hameenna isii hama madditi. Dira suni keesati waan nama woldide woli balleesu d'agayani — wonti anini keesati argu madaafi d'ukuba.
Worra Yerusalemu, wonti kunini ha gorsa isanii taatu, yokhaani anini isani biraa deeme dira keesani lafa gamooji ta nami keesa inteenne, tolcha.
AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan nani jed'e, Akuma oobru zabibu mid'aani ch'ufa iraa guurani, akasuma Israeli waan isiini qabdu ch'ufa iraa guurani. Akasuma isanileeni, ato qoomni qabdanu, haga dandeetani nama baasu maltani.
Anini waan jed'eeni, Eenuti na jalaa qaba, yo anini worraani dubbad'e gorse? Worri mata jabaate, dubbi tante ch'aqasu didde; worri dubbi tante goyeese kobla.
Dallansuuni atini worrati dallantu nale gubde, obsa na d'owarte, ee AABBO Waaqa.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi waan nani ned'e, Anini dallansu tiyya ijoolle kara keesa teteetufi kaima wolti bahuti buusa. D'iirsaafi niiti fuud'ani, jaarole hobaatele itiini d'aabatani.
Maneeni worraa nama d'ibii kennani, oobrufi nad'eeni worrale akasuma kennani. Anini worra lafa tanaa gaargalchu fed'a.
Nami ch'ufti, diqaafi guddaleeni kara dabaatini beese horachu fed'a; raagootafi qaaloleleeni sobde biyya dabsiti.
Worri aka waan madaani worra kiyya tararo woi taate, lafa nageenni bad'aad'a jed'a, ka ufiftu nageenni injirre.
Worri waan hamtu kana tolche jennaani ya ch'eere? Hiyo, worri diqole inch'eere, fuuli worraa diqole ingolgolomne. Tanaafi akuma nami duri bade, worrileeni bada; gaafa anini worra gaargalche, muummeeni worraa suni. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
AABBO Waaqi waan gumi isaatini jed'e, Fulla woldeenna karaa ejaanja wo ilaala kara dullachaafi kara iraa dansa gaafad'a! kara suni gula yaa, nagaya argattani. Ammo worri waan jed'e, Hiyo nu kara suni gula iyyaanu.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi nama qonqo magalata eegu tolche. Ammo worri waan jed'e, Nu inch'aqamnu.
Tanaafi AABBO Waaqi waan jed'e, Gosa ch'ufa, ch'aqasa, waan gumiini tiyya taatu arga.
Ee lafa ch'aqasi! Waan worri woi malateefi anini badi itiini d'ufa; wonti akanatiifi worri dubbi tiyya dide seera kiyya ch'abse.
Anini hit'aana worri lafa Shebati fuud'e naa d'ufunifi qayya lafa fago ka worri naa d'ufuuni maani iraa qaba? Anini waan worri naa baasu dide, sorio worrale jibba.
Tanaafi anini worra kana gufachiise buusa. Abbootifi ilmaani gugufatte, jaalanifi nami alaaleni hobaa.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Me ilaala, duuli mirgaa d'ufuu jira; gochiti jabduuni fago teetu lola kurfefachuu jirti.
Worri t'iyaafi woraana ufi fud'ate, ka hameenna male diqole naasu inqamne d'ufuu jira. Worri aka d'awa baariini dibbisa; yo farda isani yaabate ga d'ufu. Worri ya lola kurfae, Yerusalemu had'u d'ufe.
Worri Yerusalemu waan jed'u, Nu odu worraa ya d'ageenne. Naasuuni ya harka nuraa jissite, woma fuud'u nu d'owarte; lalalaafi d'ukubsachani ya nu qabate, aka niiti d'aluu jirtu.
Nu kara gula, yokhaani ala keesa deemu sodaanna; wonti akanatiifi nyaapi keenna woraana harkaa qaba, moga ch'ufa nu mudamsiisa.
AABBO Waaqi waan gumi isaatini jed'u, ch'arqi naqad'a, daara keesa gangalad'a. Akuma ilma tokocha bohani, laalefad'a, boha, wonti akanatiifi nami isani balleesu fed'u tassa isaniti d'ufe isani had'a.
Ee Yeremia, akuma sibiila ilaalani gumi tiyya ilaali, waan isiini keesa jirtu hubad'i.
Worri ch'ufti ya mata jabaate, na dide; mata jabeenni worraa akuma sibiila diimatifi guraacha jira. Worri ch'ufti nama waan hamtu tolche, fulla ch'ufaa yae nama nyaatu.
Buufaani guddo ibida buufa aka akasiini sibiila gubani, ammo worra kiyya qulqulleesitini woma imbaatu, wonti akanatiifi ch'ubbuuni worra keesaa imbaamne.
Worra sunini, booru woma keesa injirre jed'aniini, wonti akanatiifi anini, AABBO Waaqi, ya worra dide.

AABBO Waaqi Fulla fullo Mana Waaqa, ta worri Yuda ch'ufti kad'acha oliini seenuti, na erge waan nani jed'e, Achi eji, waan AABBO Waaqi guddaani Israeli jed'u biyyati himi: Kara isani keesati fidamtanifi huji teesanile jijira, duuba anini lafa tana keesa isani teesisa.
Dubbi d'ara tana, ta nami deemu ch'ufti kunini Mana AABBO Waaqa, kunini Mana AABBO Waaqa jed'u, ind'ugeefatina.
Finna keesa jirtani kana jijirad'a, waan tau jirtani kanale lakisa. Woli indabsina, waan dansaa woli tolcha.
Nama gosa teesani intahinifi ilmaani hiyyeetifi nad'eeni hiyyeeyi indabsina. Nama woma iyyakini inijeesiina; Waaqa d'ibile inkad'atiina, wonti sunini isani balleesiti.
Duuba yo isani waan kana taatani, anini lafa duri ababoota teesani d'aala kenneefi keesa isani teesisa.
Me ilaala, isani dubbi d'ara d'ugeefatani gula yaatani.
Isani wohattani, nama ijeeftani, huji sharmut'oma hojatani dubbi woi kakhatani, waaqa Baali jed'ani hit'aana aarsitani, Waaqa duri imbeenne gula yaatani.
Isani waan anini jibbu kana tolchitani d'uftani Mana kiyya keesa na dura ejitani duuba waan naani jettani, Nu nagaya qamna!
Isani Mana kiyya goda hattuuni iti galtu seetani? Anini waan isani tolchitani arguu jira.
Gara Shilo, fulla anini qara fohad'e iti na kad'ad'a jed'e, d'aqa, waan anini maro ch'ubbu gumi tiyya ta Israeliti isi tolche laala.
Isani waan kana ch'ufa tolchitani, ato anini maro heddu isani gorsele na ch'aqasu diddani, anini isani yaamnanile na jalaa owaachu diddani.
Tanaafi waan anini qara Shilo tolche amma Mana kiyya kana, ka isani d'ugeefatani tolcha. Arma fulla tana ta anini ababoota teesanifi isanile kenne, akuma qara Shilo tolche tolcha.
Anini ila tiyya duraa isani gusse, akuma oboleyaani teesani ta Israeli tolche, isani tolcha. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'e, Yeremia, gumi tanaa inkad'atiini. Worraa jette boote Waaqa inkad'atiini; worraa jette na insobatiini, anini si inch'aqasu.
Atini waan worri kunini dira Yudatifi kara Yerusalemu keesati tolchu ingartu?
Ijoolleeni qoraani guurte, abootini ibida bobeesite, nad'eeni qit'a bukheesiti, aka waaqa worri hayyiti gubba jed'uu kennani. Ammalle worri daad'i waaqa d'ibii d'ibaayu baase, na dallansiise.
Nami worri wo tolchu jira d'uguma ana? Hiyo, worri ufuma wo tolche ufi ch'eersu jira.
Tanaafi anini, AABBO Waaqi guddaani, dallansuuni mana kana balleese, namaafi saale, mukhaafi mid'aanile, gube balleesa.
Gumi tiyya, isani sorio gari gubbdani hobaaftani, ammo ta gari dandeetani nyaatani. Ammo anini, AABBO Waaqi, waan jed'u, Ato ch'ufa nyaatinile womaniti.
Anini gaafa duri lafa Misiri keesaa ababoota teesani baase, waan sorio gubanitifi sorio d'ibile seera womatu worraa inkennine.
Ammo seera kana kenneefi: Dubbi tiyya guuta, duuba anini Waaqa keesani tahe, isani gumi tiyya taatani. Kara anini isani garsiise gula deema, duuba wonti ch'ufti isanii tolti.
Taatule worri dubbi tiyya inguunne, yokhaani nale inch'aqamne, ammo worri mata jabeenna ufitifi herega ufi hama gula bahe, fulla sila goomu iraa hamatani.
Haguma gaafa duri ababooti teesani lafa Misiritii baate haga arrale, anini takaa raaga isaniti ergu illakimne.
Taatule nami tokoleeni ch'aqase na jalaa inqamne. Isani ababoota teesanile ira mata jabaatani na ch'aqasu diddani.
Tanaafi Yeremia, dubbi tana ch'ufa gumi tiyya iti himi, ammo ato himtele worri si inch'aqasu; atini worra yaamta ammo worri si jalaa inowaatu.
Duuba atini waan worraani jettu, Isani gosa dubbi AABBO Waaqatifi gorsa isale diddu; d'ugaani ya lafa keesaa badde, nami waan isii dubbatu injiru, deebianile inqaabatani.
Rifeensa keesani haada gata;
gaareeni gubbati faaru boha d'awad'a,
wonti akanatiifi anini AABBO Waaqi
ya dallane gumi tiyya lakise lafa buuse.
Worri Yuda ya waan hamtu na durati tolche, worri waaqa isaani ka harkaani boch'ani, ka anini jibbu, mana kiyya keesa kaye akasiini t'ureese.
Bale Hinomu keesa waan sorio irati baasani ka Tofethi jed'ani jaare, aka ilmaani worraa ta d'iiratifi ta dubraa gubani sorio baasani. Anini waan kana tolcha worraani injenne, yokhaani herega akasile takaa inqabaanne.
Tanaafi eegad'a, guyyaani ind'ufa ka deebiani Tofethi yokhaani Bale Hinomu deebiani injenne, ammo bale goraasu jed'aniini. Worri achiti nama awaala, wonti akanatiifi fullaani iti nama awaalani d'ibiini injirtu.
Reefi sunini sagale allaatitifi bineensa ala taha, nami iraa d'owuleeni injiru.
Anini dira Yudatifi kara Yerusalemu keesa, qonqo gammadaatifi ta qilit'ama, yokhaani gammada guyya fuud'a balleese, lafale duwa tolcha.

Bara suni lafele hayyootatifi ta jaarole Yudatifi qaaloleetifi ta raagootatifi ta nama Yerusalemu keesati galu ch'ufa awaala keesaa alaati guurani.
Fulla sila wolti guurani awaalani, lafeeni sunini akuma huura ufimaa lafa ch'iifti, aduufi jiaafi urji worri kunini jaalate hojate gula yae kad'atu durati afani.
Ammo gochiti hamtuni tunini, nami hafu ka lafa anini iti firfirse keesa qubatu, jireenna ira dua jaalata. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa gudda.
AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e, Waan atini gumi tiyyaani jettu, nami yo jige inkau? Nami yo kara iraa gore iti indeebiu?
Isani gumiini tiyya maafi naraa gortani, nati deebiu diddani re? Isani waan d'ara jabeesitani nati deebiu diddani.
Anini aka dansaa ch'aqase, ammo isani d'uga indubbanne, nami tokoleeni isani keesa ka ch'ubbu ufi iraa deebiti yokhaani anini maani yake? jed'e injiru. Nami ch'ufti karuma ufi deema, akuma farda duulaa ka aka male oriu.
Baboaloonaleeni woga deebiu imbeekha; sabaliisaafi worrabatafi hagayyoleeni hojja godaanuu malte imbeeti. Ammo gumi tiyya, isani seera anini isaniini fidu imbeetani.
Isani akami, Nuu wo beena seera AABBO Waaqale inqamna jettani? Ka ufuftu worri wo t'aafu dubbi seera garagalche balleese.
Jara keesani qarootale yayu ch'eersani; worri ya waan tahu wollaale t'urura keesa seene. Worri ya dubbi tiyya dide; qaroomi worri qabu maani?
Tanaafi anini oobru worraatifi nad'eeni worraale nama d'ibii kenna. Nami ch'ufti, diqaafi guddaleeni; kara ch'ubbutini beese horata. Raagootafi qaaloleeni biyya sobde balleesiti.
Worri gumi tiyyaani madaani teesani woma keesa injirtu, Inuma fayyitani, lafaleeni, Nagaya, nagaya jed'e, ka ufiftu nageenni injirre.
Gumi tiyya, isani waan waan hamtu kana taatanifi inch'eertani? Hiyo, isani diqole inch'eere, fuuli keesanileeni diqole ingolgolomne! Tanaafi akuma nami duri bade, isanileeni baddani. Gaafa anini isani gaargalchu, muummeeni teesani suni. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Anini gumi tiyya, akuma nami mid'aani ufi wolti guurru, guurru fed'e, ammo worri zabibu mid'aani inqamneefi oda mid'aani inqamne fakaata; obeensileeni ya qanch'oorate. Tanaafi anini nama gosa d'ibi lafa teesani fud'ach'iisa.
Gumiini Waaqa waan jettu, Nu maafi arma ch'iimna? Koota, dira jabeesani jaarani d'anne, achiti hobaana. AABBO Waaqi keenna ya duisa nuti mure, had'aa nu obaase, waan nu isati ch'ubbamneefi.
Nu nagaya barbaanne, ammo d'amne, fayyale barbaanne, ammo mudamsuuni nu qabate.
Nyaapi keenna dira Dani yayu seene; nu hafuura farda isaani ya d'ageenne. Hojja fardi worraa imimsu lafti ch'ufti inchochooti. Nyaapi keenna d'ufe, lafa teenna ch'ufafi waan keesa jiru ch'ufafi dira keennafi nama keesa taule ch'ufa balleesu fed'a,
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Ufi eegad'a, anini bofa had'aa qabu ka nami dandae imbobaamne, siti erge, inni si nyaata.
Laalala tiyya dandaani inqabaneesani;
garaani kiyya ya hamaate,
Me ch'aqasa!
Lafa ch'ufa keesa anini qonqo gumi tiyya ta,
AABBO Waaqi Sioni keesa injiru?
Hayyuuni Sioni achi injiru? jettu d'agaya.
AABBO Waaqi, hayyuuni worraa, waan jed'u,
Isani maafi na dallansiiftani
waaqa harkaani boch'ani kad'attani
akheekha woma keesa injirre durati gajettani?
Biyyiti iyyite waan jettu,
Adolesi ya dabre,
mid'aani ya muratani,
ammo nami d'ufe nu imbaamne.
Maro gumi tiyya madeesanifi,
garaani kiyyaleeni ya madae;
anini ya bohe ufi jibbaad'e.
Qorsi Gileadi keesa injiru?
Ch'ireeyyini achi injirtu?
Gumi tiyya maanifi infayyisini re?

Ato sila mataani kiyya madda bisaani tahe,
ilti tiyya laga imimaani taate akami fed'a!
Sila anini dandae halkani guyya
gumi tiyya ta fit'ani boha.
Ato sila anini lafa gamooji keesa fulla bulu qaabad'e,
aka anini gumi tiyya iraa fagaad'u,
akami gammada!
Worri ch'ufti nama d'uga gula iyyaane,
ka dabse nama balleesu.
Worri worra afaani gorani
ka arabi isaani yo ch'ufa d'ara dubbatu.
Fulla d'uga d'arati lafa mohata.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Gumiini tiyya guyya ch'ufa woluma gula ch'ubbu tolchite,
ammalle aka anini Waaqa worraa inhereddu.
Nami ch'ufti ha jaala ufi ufira eegu,
nami tokoleeni oboleesa ufi ind'ugeefatini;
wonti akanatiifi oboleesi ch'ufti
akuma Yakobo nama sobe,
nami ch'ufti jaala ufi arabsa.
Nami ch'ufti jaala ufi sobe,
tokoleeni d'uga wolti indubbatu;
worri araba ufi d'ara barsiise,
ch'ubbu gula yae iraa deebiu dide.
Worri waan hamtu guyya ch'ufa woluma gula
tolche guyya ch'ufa woli soba.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
gumiini tiyya ya na didde.
Maro waan kanatifi
AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u,
Gumi tiyya aka sibiila basse qulqulleese ilaalad'a.
Gumiini tiyya yayu waan hamtu tolchite —
wonti d'ibiini anini worra tolchu maani re?
Arabi worra aka t'iya nama ijeeftu jira;
hojja ch'ufa d'ara dubbata.
Nami ch'ufti dubbi dansa nagaya woliini dubbata,
ammo garaa ufi keesa t'urura woli kayu malata.
Anini waan kana jed'e worra ingaargalchu?
Gosa akana tana haalo imbaafad'u?
Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Anini waan jed'e,
Gaareenifi, lafa horini oolule imboha,
wonti akanatiifi isiini ya gogodde,
nama keesa deemule d'abde.
Marra looni keesati ind'agayani,
simpirreefi bineensileeni yayu keesa baqate.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Anini Yerusalemu balleese
ona sareni diidaa iti galtu tolcha;
diri Yuda ch'ufti gamooji fulla nami injirre taha.
Duuba anini waan jed'e, AABBO Waaqa, lafti maalifi onte gogodde lafa gamooji ta nami keesa injirre taati? Eenuti qalbi waan kanaani hubatu qaba? Atini eenuti himte. Aka inni nama d'ibi barsiisu?
AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e, Wonti woni kunini taateefi waan gumiini tiyya anaafi barsiisa anini worraa kenne lakifteefi. Worri naa insaalfanne, yokhaani seera kiyyale inguunne.
Fulla suni worri mata jabaate waan harkaani boch'ani, ka Baali jed'ani, kad'ate, barsiisa abbooti worraa gula.
Tanaafi duuba waan anini, AABBO Waaqi guddaani, Waaqi Israeli, tolchu ch'aqasa: Anini gumi tiyya mukha had'aa nyaachise bisaani had'ao obaasa.
Anini gosa worraafi abbootini worraleeni takaa ind'agayini keesati worra firfirse, duula iti kaase, lafa iraa worra hobaasa.
AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'e,
Me, waan taha kana herega!
Worra bohu gayaama,
nad'eeni faaru boha d'aatu.
Biyyiti waan jette,
Worri ha arifate d'ufe,
faaru boha nuu d'auti,
haga imimaani ila teenna guutani,
rifeensa ilale ch'ufa jiisaniti.
Qonqo nama Sioni keesa bohu ch'aqasa,
ta teete nu ya banne!
Ya guddo nu ch'eersani!
Nu lafa teenna keesa godaanu male,
maneeni teenna ya ch'ach'absani jettu.
Duuba anini waan jed'e,
Isani nad'eeni, dubbi AABBO Waaqa ch'aqasa,
waan inni jed'u ch'ufa d'agaya!
Dubra teesani faaru boha barsiisa,
jaalaani teesanile sirba namaani awaalani d'aafi.
Dooti yayu deresha manatini nuti seente
maneeni teenna jajabdu duudde;
isiini yayu ijoolle kara keesa teteetufi
kaima gabaya keesa jirule qabate fit'e.
Reefi worraa ka fulla ch'ufa ch'iisu
kosi oobruti naqani fakaata.
Yokhaani mid'aani murani lafati d'abbani fakaata,
ka nami wolti guuru injirre.
Tuni ch'ufti waan AABBOONI Waaqi jed'i naani jed'e.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Qarooni qarooma ufitini kooru himmalle,
jabaaleeni jabeenna ufitini kooru himmalle,
dureesileeni durooma ufitini kooru himmalle.
ha waan na beekhe na hubatufi kooruti;
anini d'ugaafi qaajeeluma tolcha.
Woni na gammachiisa kana.
Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Guyyaani ind'ufa, ka anini worra gosa Misiritiifi ka Yudatifi ka Edomutifi ka Amonitifi ka Moabutifi worra lafa gamooji ka mata ufi gababse ch'iratu gaargalchu. Worri kunini ch'ufti aada gula qabanqaba qabata, ammo waan aadaani suni malteefi inguunne. Worra kanafi worri Israeli tokoleeni wold'aqisa kiyya injabeesine.

Gumi Israeli,
waan AABBO Waaqi isaniini jed'u, ch'aqasa.
Wonti inni jed'u tana:
Aada gochiti d'ibiini fidamtu gula iyyaaina;
wonti mama ka isani gubbati gartani
isani insodaachisini,
ato gochiti d'ibiini mudamtele.
Aadaani gosa d'ibi tunini woma isanii imbaatu
mukha badda keesa ch'irani,
mukha suni ogeesi harka ufitini qotooni boch'e,
qarsifi worqiini ch'okhani.
Duuba musubaara fuud'ani,
burrisaani iti d'awani, qaariu d'owani.
Wonti akasi sunini akheekhuma oobru bododa keesa kayani haranqeesani d'owani;
wonti sunini dandeete indubbatu,
baatani male dandeete ufiini indeemtu.
Waan akana kana insodaatina;
dandeete waan dansaafi hamtule si intolchitu.
Ee AABBO Waaqa,
nami aka keeti lafa keesa injiru;
atini gudda, maqaani kankeleeni gudda,
ammalle jabeenna qaba.
Guddinni waan sii male.
Nami aka keeti tokoleeni lafa keesa injiru,
nama qaqaro lafa ch'ufaatifi hayyootale keesa.
Worri ch'ufti raatu, woma imbeekhu,
worri dandae mukha boch'ani iraa maani barata?
Waaqa worri kad'atu suni
qarsi Tarshishi baateeni ch'okhani
worqi Ufazi baateeni barreesani,
ch'ufti waan hogeesi harka ufitini tolche;
woya diimtufi woya bule diimtu
hogeeyini d'oofte iti naqani.
Ammo AABBO Waaqa,
atini Waaqa d'ugaa,
atini Waaqa jirufi
hayyu haga jiru jireenna jiru.
Hojja atini dallantu, lafti inchochooti,
gochitileeni dallansu tante dandeete inoobsitu,
(Waan isani worra sunini jettani: Waaqa keesani ka lafafi gubba inuumini kana imballeesani. Deebiani lafa keesa fulla tokoleti inargani.)
AABBO Waaqi jabeenna isatini lafa uume;
qalbi ufitini inni lafa uume gubbale dirirse.
Dubbi isa gula bisaani gubbaa dibbisani;
inni dumansa muumme lafati d'ufaani.
Inni angaasu bokaya keesa angae,
mana isaa keesaa qilleensa gabaase.
Waan kana arginaani nami mame,
daalle woma imbeenne ufi sehe.
Nami waaqa harkaani boch'atu ufumaa ch'eera,
wonti akanatiifi waaqi inni mid'aasu sunini
woma d'araati, lubbu inqabu.
Ammalle woma keesa injiru,
inni woma tufii, ka tufatani;
gaafa Waaqi worrati kau, imballeesani.
Waaqi Yakobo aka worraa injiru;
isumati waan ch'ufa uume,
ammalle worra Israelile isumati
fohate gumi ufi tolfate
maqaani isaa AABBO Waaqa gudda.
Worra Yerusalemu, yayu isani marsani! Miha keesani wolti guurad'a
AABBO Waaqi lafa tana keesaa isani balleesu fed'a; inni isani ch'ach'arase hafto isani d'owa. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Worri Yerusalemu bohe waan jed'e,
ya aka hamtu nu woraanani,
madaani teenna infayyitu.
Nu qara waan kana woma oobsu dandeennu seene!
Waaro teenna ya balleesani,
haada isiile ch'ufa ya ch'irani.
Ilmaani teenna ya nu biraa deemte,
nami waaro teenna nuu jaaru injiru,
yokhaani ka golla isii iti fafannisu.
Anini waan jed'eeni,
Jaaroleeni teenna daalle,
AABBO Waaqale gorsa ira infud'atu.
Tanaafi wonti worraa ch'ufti hamaate,
gumi teennale gargari firfirsani.
Ch'aqasa! Oduuni ya d'ufte!
Hafuura nama guddati gara gosa mirga teetuti d'ufuu jira;
duuli worraa dira Yuda ch'ufa balleese
lafa aloo fulla sareni diida iti galtu tolcha.
Ee AABBO Waaqa,
aka nami tokoleeni lubbu ufi harka inqamne,
yokhaani dandae karati ufi inqajeelchine,
anini imbeekha.
Ee AABBO Waaqa,
gumi tante dallansuniti d'ugaani qajeelchi,
aka worri siini imbanne.
Dallansu tante gosa si imbeenne,
ta maqa kanke iyyaamaneti ergi.
Worri yayu gumi tante fit'e;
nule hobaase, lafa teenna balleese ona tolche.

AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e,
Dubbi wold'aqisa tana ch'aqasi, waan worra Yudatifi ka Yerusalemutini jettu;
AABBO Waaqi Israeli waan jed'u, Anini nama dubbi wold'aqisa tana jabeesu didu inabaara.
Wold'aqisa kunini ka anini duri ababoota teesani woliini tolfad'e, gaafa anini worra lafa Misiri, ta ibida bobau worrati fakaatu, keesaa baase. Anini gaafasi waan worraani jed'e, Na ch'aqasa, waan anini isaniini jed'u ch'ufa guuta; duuba isani nama kiyya taatani, aninileeni Waaqa keesani taha.
Yo isani akasi taatani, anini kakhu duri ababoota teesani kakhad'e guute, lafa aananifi dammi aka lola yau kennaafi lafa amma isani keesa teetani tana. Jennaani anini, Ee AABBO Waaqa, Ha taatu jed'eeni.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e, Dira Yuda d'aqi, kara Yerusalemu keesa deemi, waan biyyaani jettu, Dubbi wold'aqisa tana ch'aqasa, gula yaa.
Gaafa anini ababoota isani lafa Misiri keesa baaseefi, haga arrale anini worra gorse, Naa saalfad'a jechuuni illakimne.
Ammo worri na inch'aqamne, yokhaani naa insaalfanne. Fulla suni worri mata jabaate, hameenna lakisu dide. Anini qara, wold'aqisa guuta, worraani jed'e, ammo worri guutu dide; tanaafi anini abaarsa wold'aqisa suni keesati maqa d'aani ch'ufa worratiini d'ufe.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e, Worri Yudatifi ka Yerusalemuleeni ya mala nati d'aate.
Worri yayu ch'ubbu duri ababooti worra tolchiteti deebie; ababoota worra ta na ch'aqasu didde; worri yayu waaqa d'ibi gula bahe hojateefi. Worri Israelitiifi ka Yudaleeni wold'aqisa anini duri ababoota worraa woliini tolfad'e ya ch'abse.
Tanaafi anini, AABBO Waaqi, worra gorsa, aka anini badi worri jalaa imbaane worratini d'ufu. Yo worri qarqaarsa na kad'atele, anini worra inch'aqasu.
Jennaani worri Yudatifi ka Yerusalemu waaqoota worri sorio baasufi d'aqe, qarqaarsa kad'ata. Ammo waaqooti sunini dandeete worra imbaaftu, hojja badiini suni d'ufte.
Worri Yuda akuma diri worraa heddu, waaqooti worraleeni heddu. Ammalle worri Yerusalemuleeni akuma karaani dira worraa heddu, akasuma fulla heddu ta waaqoota worraa, ka d'ara, ka Baali jed'ani, ka isa durati nami waan ch'eera tahu, fulla sorio irati isaa baasani jaare.
Yeremia, worra kana jette na inkad'atiini. Yo worri gaargala seene na kad'atele, anini worra inch'aqasu.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Gumiini anini jaalad'u ya waan hamtu taate. D'ugaani worri Mana kiyyaani seenu tami? Worri waan kakhu woi kakhate sorio baaseefi waan kara suni badi jalaa bahu ufi seha? Wonti sunini worra ingammachifti?
Anini duri ejersa galma mid'aani dansa qabu worraani jed'e; ammo ammatana anini bubbe jabduuni obeensa isaa ibadati d'abbe, dameele isaa ch'ach'ach'absa.
Anini, AABBO Waaqi guddaani, qara worra Israelitiifi ka Yuda akuma mukha oobre; ammo amma badiini iti d'ufu fed'a. Worri yayu ch'ubbu tolche, akasiini badi ufitini d'ufe; ammalle Baali sorio baase akasiini na dallansiise.
AABBO Waaqa mala nyaapi kiyya nati d'aachu jiru na beesise.
Anini ilme hoola ta laanuma nama qaallu gula deemtu fakaad'a aka nami, worri tae iti malatu ana, imbeekanne. Worri waan jed'e, Koota, mukha ato inni jiid'aatu murra; ammalle namicha kana lafa keesaa balleesina, aka nami deebie isa inqaabanne.
Jennaani anini kad'ad'e waan jed'e, AABBO Waaqa gudda, atini ka d'uga gula dubbi qortu, ka ammalle heregaafi qalbi namaa ilaaltu, anini dubbi tiyya ya siti kennad'e; haalo atini worra kana baafatu na garsiisi.
Duuba wonti AABBO Waaqi waan worra Anathothi, ka si ijeesu fed'e, maqa AABBO Waaqaatini, Nuu infagini, si ijeemna siini jed'eeni jed'u tana —
AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u, Anini worra gaargalcha kaima worraa woraanani fit'ani, ilmaani worraleeni beelaani hobaati:
Anini yayu guyya tolfad'e ka worra Anathothi balleesu; hojja guyyaani suni gahu worra suni nami tokoleeni inhafu.

Ee AABBO Waaqa,
yo anini si quufa d'abe si himad'ele,
d'ugaani teetuma.
Ammo taatule, aka d'ugaani jirtu si gaafachu fed'a.
Ch'ubbichi maafi wo horata?
Nami hamaani maafi wo argata?
Atini worra aka mukha oobrite,
duuba worri hidda baase,
guddate, ammalle mid'aani baasa.
Worri guyya ch'ufa afaanini dansuma tante dubbata,
ammo garaani siraa fagaata.
Ammo AABBO Waaqa, atini na beeta,
waan anini tolchufi aka anini si jaalad'u inagarta.
Worra hamama kana aka hooliye qalmaa geesani hirkisi,
haga worra qaqalaniti qorqorad'u.
Lafti teenna haga yoomi qanch'oorate,
buuyooni fulla ch'ufa gogoddi?
Bineensafi simpirreleeni maro ch'ubbu gumi teenna, ta teete,
Waaqi waan nu taanu inargu jettu tana amma duu jirti.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'e,
Yeremia, atini ufiftu
ka namaani woliini utaalu dad'abde,
dandeete farda woliini utaalta?
Yo lafa diidatu keesa eju dad'abde,
akami dandeete danqara Yordani keesa ejita?
Oboleyaani tante ta woliini d'alatanileeni
yayu siti malatte,
faani tante yaate si balleesu feeti.
Ato worri afaani dansa siti dubbatele ind'ugeefatini.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Anini yayu Israeli lakise,
gumi anini fohad'e lafa buuse.
Ammalle worra anini jaalad'u
ya harka nyaapa worrati kenne.
Gumiini anini fohad'e yayu nati garagalte;
akuma nyeench'a badda keesa, worri nati itane,
tanaafi anini worra jibba.
Gumiini anini fohad'e sunini
simpirre qoreeni gama ch'ufaa butte fakaati.
Bineensa ala wolti yaama, ha d'ufe nyaatuti!
Hayyooti gosa d'ibi hedduuni
yayu oobru tiyya ta zabibu balleesite;
worri yayu oobru tiyya ira ejaanjate balleese
lafa tiyya dansa ona tolche.
Worri lafa tiyya adaala tolche,
isiini badde badiini isii ya nati mullatte.
Lafti ch'ufti yayu badde adaalte.
Gaareeni lafa gamooji ch'ufa gubbaa
nami d'ufe wo saama.
Anini yayu woraana kaase,
ka lafa ch'ufa balleesu;
nami tokoleeni nagayaani intau.
Gumiini tiyya dargaye fach'aafte
raafufi qoraati muratti;
worri guddo hojate ammo woma inarganne.
Maro dallansu tiyya guddotifi
worri waan muratu d'abe.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Anini gosa d'aatu Israeli teetu, ta lafa anini gumi tiyya ta Israeliti kenne balleesite, dubbi iraa qaba. Anini worra hamama suni lafa isaani keesaa aka mukha buqise, Yudale harka worraa jalaa baasa.
Ammo eegi worra akasi tolche, deebie worraa nahe, gosa ch'ufa lafa isaanitiifi arda isaaniti deebisa.
Yo worri garaa tokooni aada gumi tiyya barate maqa AABBO Waaqatini wo kakhate — akuma duri worri gumi tiyya aka Baalini kakhatani barsiise — duuba worri gumi tiyya keesa fulla argate wo horata.
Ammo yo gochiti tokoleeni ch'aqasu didde, anini gosa suni aka mukha buqise balleesa. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.

AABBO Waaqa waan nani jed'e, Beeni hid'a boofta bitad'i keeyad'i,
ammo imich'ini. Duuba anini dubbi AABBO Waaqa gula bitad'e keeyad'e.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi ammalle waan nani jed'e,
Galaana Frati d'aqi, hid'a suni goda d'akhaa keesati d'ossi.
Duuba anini kae deeme, d'aatu galaana Frati, akuma AABBO Waaqi nani jed'e d'osse.
Eegi bulti heddu, galaana Fratiti deebii, hid'a taani fud'ad'i.
Jennaani anini kae iti d'aabad'e, fulla anini iti d'osse taanini bahe, hid'a taani ta ch'ich'ite hobaate arge.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi ammalle nani dubbate waan nani jed'e,
wonti AABBO Waaqi jed'u tana, Anini karuma kanaani kiyyiba worra Yudatifi kiyyiba gudda worra Yerusalemu iraa galcha.
Gumiini hamtuni tunini, mataa jabaatte dubbi tiyya ch'aqasu didde, waaqa d'ibi gula yaate hojate, aka hid'a ch'ich'ite badde tana taati.
Akuma hid'aani nama qabdu, akasuma anini worra Israelitiifi ka Yuda ka jabeese na qabu fed'a. Wonti anini akasi tolcheefi, aka worri gumi tiyya tahe gurra dansaafi ulfinna natiini d'ufu; ammo worri na inch'aqamne.
AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e, Yeremia, waan atini worra Israelitini jettu, gorjo daad'i ch'ufa daad'iini guuta jed'i. Yo worri nu imbeenna aka gorjo ch'ufa daad'iini guutu malani siini jed'e,
atini waan jettuuni, AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u: Anini nama lafa tanaa ch'ufa daad'i iti guure macheesa — hayyoota d'aloota Dauditifi qaaloleefi raagootafi gumi Yerusalemu ch'ufa.
Duuba anini worra woliini d'ae ch'ach'abse butucha abbaafi ilmale. Anini worraa ind'iigu, diqole innahufi, inuma balleesa.
Ee gumi Israeli,
AABBO Waaqi ya wo jed'e,
kiyyiba lakisa, ch'aqasa.
AABBO Waaqa keesani guddisa,
ato inni dukanaani d'ufe
gaareeniti isani ingugufachiimne;
ammalle ato inni ifsa isani abdatani
dukana sipe intolchine.
Yo isani ch'aqasu diddani,
anini maro kiyyiba keesanitifi d'ofad'e boha;
anini aka male, ka imimaani
ila tiyya keesaa yaani,
boha waan gumi AABBO Waaqa boojianifi.
AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e, waan atini hayyichaafi haad'a isaatini jettu: Barch'uma keesani ka guddinna iraa bua. Wonti akanatiifi sureeni teesani mid'aaduni ta hayyuma ya mata keesani iraa buute.
Dira Yuda ch'ufa ka bitaa jiru ya marsani, nami tokoleeni dandae inseenu. Worra Yuda ch'ufa ya boojiani lafa d'ibi geesani.
Ee Yerusalemu, laali! Nyaapi kanke mirgaa ga d'ufu jira! Worri harka keetiti kennani ka atini kiyyibdeeni meeti?
Hojja nami atini jaala kanke seete, si had'e si dabsate si mohate, atini maani jetta? Atini hojja suni aka nad'eeni ch'ininfatu d'ukubsatta.
Yo atini ufi gaafatte, Isi maafi akana na tolchani? jette — wonti akasi si tolchanifi waan dabi kanke heddatefi; tanaafi ubaara kanke tarsaasani si buufatani.
Nami guraachi lafa Kushi dandae goga ufi garaingalcha? Yokhaani qeeramsileeni dandae barru ufira imballeesa? Yo worri dandae waan suni tolche isanileeni ka waan hamtu barattani, dandeetani waan dansaa tolchitani.
AABBO Waaqi akuma bua buuyo, ta bubbeeni gamooji fuute, isani firfirsa.
Inni waan jed'u, Tunini milki teesani, qooda waan anini isanii kennu fed'e, waan isani na deetani waaqa d'ara d'ugeefattanifi.
Anumati ubaara keesani isani iraa baase, ch'eera keesani diidati mullisa.
Anini waan hamtu isani taatani ch'ufa ya arge — aka isani waaqa d'ara gaara gubbati gula baddani, akuma nama niiti biyyaati d'arae gula badu, yokhaani farda korma ka d'ala gula badu. Worra Yerusalemu, isani ya baddani, yoomi t'uri keesaa baatani?

AABBO Waaqi waan oola tana dubbate waan nani jed'e,
Yudaani bohuti jirti,
diri isi badu jira;
worri dira suni laalefate ufuma lafa ch'ich'iisa
worri Yerusalemuleeni iyye qarqaarsa kad'ata.
Dureeyyiini hojattu isaani bisaani ergite,
hojattuuni sunini eelaani baate,
bisaani keesaa d'abde,
buute duwani galti.
Worri ufi jibbaate,
ch'eere mata qabata.
Waan bokaya d'abani lafti gogoddeefi,
nami oobruleeni waan tahu wollaale laalefate mata qabata.
Hidini d'altuni, raasa isiini keesa oltu,
ilme isii ta d'io d'alate,
maro marrii injirreefi biraa deemti.
Harreeni diidaa gaareeni gubbaa ejaanjite,
aka sare diida harganti,
isiini sagale d'abde, ilti keesati ch'iti.
Gumiini tiyya nati iyyite waan jettu,
Ato ch'ubbu teenna gula
gaargali kunini nuti d'ufeele,
ee AABBO Waaqa, maro maqa keetiti jed'i nu qarqaari.
Nu maro heddu dudda siti galle, si biraa yaane siti ch'ubbamne.
Abdiini Israeli siuma;
nami gaargala keesaa nu baasu si male injiru.
Atini maafi lafa teenna keesati keessuma karaa deemtu,
ta halkani toko ch'alla worra namaa bulte, fakaata?
Atini maafi nama nami tassa iti d'ufe fakaatte,
aka askarti nama qarqaaru indandeenne taate?
Ee AABBO Waaqa, atini numa woliini jirta!
Nu gumi teeti, nu illakisini!
AABBO Waaqi waan gumi tana waan jed'u, Worri naraa baqachu fed'a, ufi d'owu indandau. Tanaafi anini worra inquufini; anini wollaala worri tolche qaabad'e maro ch'ubbu isaanitifi gaargalcha.
AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e, Worra kana qarqaari nani injed'ini.
Ato worri ufi agabsele anini kad'acha worraa ind'agayufi; ammalle yo worri sorio gubanifi mid'aani naa baasele, anini waan suni iraa ingammadu. Ammo fulla suni anini worra woraanafi beelafi d'ukubaani balleesa.
Jennaani anini waan jed'e, Ee AABBO Waaqa gudda, raagooti hojja ch'ufa maqa kanketini waan woraani jettu, isani woraana ingartani yokhaani imbeeloftanile; ammalle worri waan jed'u, Atini fulla tanati nagaya jiru jireenna worraa kenna, jette jed'ani.
Ammo AABBO Waaqi waan jed'eeni, Raagooti maqa kiyyaani waan d'ara faguu jirti, anini worra inergine, yokhaani womale faga injenneeni yokhaani womale iti inhimne. Daayyani worri hime sunini naraa imbaane; wonti worri faguleeni hereguma worraa male, waan woma keesa jiraatiniti.
Tanaafi AABBO Waaqi waan raagoota maqa isaatini faddu tana akana jed'a: Anini worra inergine, ammo worri waan jed'u woraanafi beelti lafa tana inqabattu. Ammo anini waan jed'u raagootuma suniti woraanafi beelaani hobaa.
Ammalle worra raagooti sunini fadduufi kara dira Yerusalemu keesati d'abbani; nami worraafi nad'eeni worraatifi ilmaani worrale awaalu injiru. Anini ch'ubbu worraa worrumati deebise akasiini worra balleesa.
AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e,
Waan atini worraani jettu,
Ilti tiyya ha halkanifi guyya
imimaanini guutamte boote lakisu diddu;
wonti akanatiifi gumi tiyya
ya aka hama madeesani aka takaa inargini d'ukubsachisani.
Yo anini alaati gabahu
reefa nama woraanani fit'ani arga;
yo anini dira d'aqule
nama beelaani hobau arga.
Raagootafi qaaloleeni akuma ufi huji hojati,
ammo waan tau jirani imbeekhani.
Ee AABBO Waaqa, atini d'uguma yayu Yuda jibbaatte lafa buufte?
Atini worra Sioni ya jibbite?
Atini maafi akana nu gaargalchite
nu fayyu dad'amna?
Nu nagaya barbaanne
ammo waan dansa tokole lafaa d'amne;
nu waan fayyinu ufi seene
ammo mudamsuuni nu qabatte.
AABBO Waaqa, nu yayu siti ch'ubbamne;
nu amma ch'ubbu teennafi ta ababoota teenna siti himanna.
Maro maqa keetiti jed'i,
nu intufatini;
fulla barch'umani kanke
ka hayyuma jiru inch'eersini.
Wold'aqisa atini nu woliini tolfatte
qaabad'i, inch'absini.
Waaqi harkaani boch'ani ka gochiti d'ibiini qabdu
dandae bokayaani d'ufa?
Gubbaleeni dandeete ebele iroobdi?
Hiyo, ka namaa roobu siuma AABBO Waaqa keenna.
Nami waan kana ch'ufa tolchu sii,
abdiini teennaleeni gamuma kee jirti.

Hojja worri eesa yaana? Siini jed'e, waan atini jettuuni, AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Nami d'ukubaani hobau ha gara d'ukuba yau!
Nami woraanani hobau ha gara woraana yau!
Nami beelaani hobau ha gara beela yau!
Nami boojiani ha gara iti boojiani yau!
Ammalle AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Anini waan afuri ka worra balleesa worrati erga: Woraana nama hobaasufi sare reefa hirkiftufi allaati goblola nyaatufi bineensa ala ka waan hafe hobaasu.
Anini gumi tana waan nama lafa ch'ufaa rifachiisa tolcha, maro waan duri Manaseeni, ilmi Hezekia, gaafa inni hayyu Yuda, Yerusalemu keesati tolcheetifi.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Ee Yerusalemu,
eenuti nahe sii boha?
Eenuti siti gore, nagaya si fuud'e,
waan atini keesa jirtu si gaafata.
Gumi tana, isani ya na diddani dudda nati galtani,
tanaafi anini waan anini isani obsu dad'abeefi harka kiyya d'eerefad'e isani balleesa.
Dira lafa tana ch'ufa keesa anini
aka ch'idi qilleensati hafarsani isani hafarse,
gumi tiyya, anini isani balleese,
ilmaani teesanile hobaase
waan isani hameenna keesani lakisu diddanifi.
Lafa teesani keesa nad'eeni hiyyeeyini
maansa baariini ira jirti.
Anini nama keesani, ato worri kaimaatu, hobaase,
haawani worraa gaargalcha.
Anini tassa gaargalafi mudamsu worraatini d'ufe.
Niitiini ilmaani torba d'abde
gagabde hafuura baafachu dad'abde.
Guyyaani ya iti dukanae,
isii ya tufatani ch'eersani,
anini nama keesani ka hafele
harka nyaapa keesaniti kenna.
Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana AABBO Waaqa.
Anini ayyaana hama qaba! Ayyoni maafi na d'alte? Anini nama lafa keesa jiru ch'ufaani wolmoromne wold'amne. Ato anini beese nama illiqeesini yokhaani ira iliqefatinile nami ch'ufti na abaara.
Ee AABBO Waaqa, abaarsi worri na abaaru ha na qabatu, yo anini aka dansaa sii inhojatiini, ammalle yo anini nyaapa kiyya, ka gaargalafi d'ipu keesa jiru, jed'e si inkad'atiini.
(Nami dandae sibiila guraacha, keesuma sibiila guraacha mirgaa d'ufu, ka sibiila diima wolti darani inch'absa?)
AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e, Anini nyaapa horifi waan worri kiyya qabu ch'ufa boojiu worrati erga, aka maro ch'ubbu worri lafa tana keesati tolcheefi gaargalchu.
Anini lafa worri waan isii imbeenneti geese harka nyaapa worrati kenna, wonti akanatiifi dallansuuni tiyya ibida fakaati, haga jiru jireenna wo gubdi.
Jennaani anini waan jed'e, Ee AABBO Waaqa, atini waan ch'ufa imbeeta, na qaabad'i, na qarqaari, nama na gaargalchu haalo na baafachisi worra obsite nati illakisini. Qaabad'i, maro tanteetifi na arabsani.
Atini naani dubbannaani anini dubbi tante ch'ufa ch'aqase fud'ad'e. Ee AABBO Waaqa gudda, anini keetuma, tanaafi garaani kiyya dubbi tante maache iraa gammade.
Anini takaa qoomni tiyya fulla namaati balleese, kobla gula bahe waan hamtu intolchine. Jecha kanke gula anini guddo dallane koba hafe.
Wonti na d'ukubsa kunini maafi na illakimne? Nami tokoleeni maafi mada tiyya infayyimne? Madaani tiyya maafi fayyu diddi? Atini madda bonani goddu, ta nama sobdu nati tahu feeta?
Dubbi suni gula AABBO Waaqi waan jed'e, Yo atini iraa deebite, anini si fuud'e deebise hojatu tiyya si tolcha. Yo atini dubbi woma keesa injirre lakifte dubbi d'uga dubbate, deebiteti raaga naa taata. Biyyiti siti deebiti, wonti atini worra barbaadufi injirtu.
Anini worra kana durati aka naabo sibiila diimani jabeesani jaarani si tolcha. Worri si had'a, ammo si indabsatu. Anini wahela si tahe si qorqorad'e si baasa.
Anini harka nama hamaatifi harka nama woyaku jalaa si baasa. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.

Ammalle AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e:
Lafa akana tana keesa, nad'eeni fuute ilmaani ind'aliini.
Anini waan ilmaani lafa tanati d'alatufi waan abbootini isii taatu siti hima.
Worri d'ukuba hamaani hobaa, nami tokoleeni worraa bohe inawaalu. Reefi worraa akuma kosi wolirati tuulame lafa ch'iisa. Worri yokhaani woraanaani hobae yokhaani beelaani hobaa. Ammalle reefa worraale allaatifi bineensa alaati nyaata.
Atini mana bohaa inseeniini, nama duele imbohini. Anini deebie gumi tiyya nagaya inkennu, yokhaani jaalalafi naasu ingarsiisu.
Nami diqaafi guddaani lafuma tana keesati hobaa, ammo nami worra awaalu yokhaani ka worraa bohu injiru. Nami worraa jed'e ufi mure yokhaani mata haadatu injiru.
Nami tokoleeni ka deeme, nama nami iraa due d'aqe, sagale woliini nyaate lubbu iraa hambisu injiru. Nami tokoleeni ka woli nahu injiru, ato abbaafi haati namaa dootele.
Mana jila seente sagale nyaatte woma ind'ugini.
Waan anini AABBO Waaqi guddaani Israeli jed'u ch'aqasi. Anini qonqo gammadaatifi ta qilit'amatifi sirba guyya fuud'ale ch'allisisa. Nami arma tau kunini waan kana ka taha iluma ufitini arga.
Hojja atini dubbi tana worra kanati himte, worrileeni AABBO Waaqi maafi badi akana tana nutiini d'ufe? Yokhaani nu maal yakini. Yokhaani ch'ubbuuni nu AABBO Waaqa keennati tolchine tami? Jed'e si gaafate,
atini waan jettuuni, AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, waan abbootini teesani na lakifte waaqa d'ibi gula yaate hojateefi, ammalle na lakifte seera kiyya ch'absitefi. Isani akasi taatani.
Ammo isani yayu abbooti teesanile ira waan hamtu tolchitani. Isani ch'ufti mata jabaatani, hameenna gula yaatani, naa saalfachu diddani.
Tanaafi anini amma lafa tana keesaa irreeni isani baase, lafa isanifi abbootini teesani imbeenneti isani galcha. Duuba achiti halkanifi guyya waaqa d'ibi hojatani, aninileeni diqole isanii innahu.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Guyyaani ind'ufa, ka nami deebie, Nu maqa AABBO Waaqa ka lafa Misiri keesa gumi Israeli baaseni kakhanna injenne.
Ammo fulla suni worri waan jed'u, Nu maqa AABBO Waaqa ka worra Israeli lafa mirgatifi lafa inni iti firfirse ch'ufa keesaa galcheeni kakhanna jed'u. Anini lafa duri ababoota worraati kenneti worra deebisa. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Anini worra qurt'umi guuru heddu ga yaama, ka d'ufe worra kana guuru. Duuba eegi suni nama adamo ka gaareenifi kubileefi goda d'akha keesa ch'ufa worra barbaadu gadini d'ufa.
Anini waan worri tolchu ch'ufa inarga. Wonti na duraa d'okhata tokoleeni injirtu; ch'ubbuuni worraleeni na dura ind'okhatu.
Anini maro dabaafi ch'ubbu worraatifi gati waan suni maro lama iraa fuud'a, waan worri lafa tiyya, waan harkaani boch'ani ka lubbu inqamneeni t'ureese, waaqa d'ara sunini lafa tiyya guutefi.
Ee AABBO Waaqa, atini irre tiyyafi jabeenna kiyya; nami guyya gaargala na qarqaaru siuma. Gochiti muumme lafati d'ufte waan siini jettu, Ababooti teenna waaqa d'ara, ka harkaani boch'ani, ka woma nama imbaane ch'alla gula yaate.
