Nami dandae waaqa ufi imid'aafata? Ee, ato mid'aafatele wonti sunini waaqa intaatu.
Tanaafi AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Amma tana gosa ch'ufa irre tiyyafi jabeenna kiyya garsiisa. Duuba akasiini aka anini AABBO Waaqa deebiani iwollaalani.

AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Worra Yuda, ch'ubbu teesani yayu qalamu sibiilatini t'aafani; d'akha qara qabu jajabaani onne teesani irati qorani, fulla isani sorio irati baaftanile moga ch'ufa irati barreesani.
Worri keesani fulla sorio waaqa Ashera jed'ani iti qalanifi fulla akheekha isaa old'aabani, ka mukeeni gugurdofi kubileefi.
Gaareenifi diida lafaleti kad'atani, achiti waaqa suni kad'ata. Anini nyaapa keesanini d'ufe, worri hori keesani, waan isani qabdani ch'ufa, boojia, maro ch'ubbu heddu isani lafa teesani keesati tolchitanifi.
Isani lafa anini isanii kenne jibbaatani keesa bahu maltani; ammalle lafa isani imbeenne isani kenna, wonti akanatiifi dallansuuni tiyya ibida fakaati, isiini haga jiru jireenna bobeeti.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Anini nama na lakise abdi isaa nama ira keeyatu,
ka yokhaani jabeenna namaa d'aabatu inabaara.
Inni gurbi raasa keesa ejitu fakaata,
ta lafa aloo ta gamooji ta,
biyye kurooftu woma iti imbaane keesati baatu.
Wonti dansaani inni argu tokoleeni injirtu.
Ammo nama na d'ugeefatu ch'ufa ineebisa.
ka hiddi isaaleeni gara bisaani bahu fakaata.
Inni yo lafti bontele woma insodaatu,
wonti akanatiifi baali isaa yo ch'ufa doti;
yo bokeeni injirrele woma ind'eetu,
mid'aanile baasu illakisu.
Eenuti garaa namaa hubata?
Wonti aka garaa namaa nama soba injirtu,
waan nami dandae fayyisuniti.
qalbi nama ch'ufa laale,
garaa namale ilaalad'a.
Anini nama ch'ufa adabuma isaa gula waan male kennaafi,
waan inni tolchu gula.
Nami kara ch'ubbutini hori argate
simpirre okhokaani isiini ind'aliini
ira teete baqasitu fakaata.
Gaafa inni guddate ch'ime, inni hori suni d'abe,
duuba eege daallae akanumati taa.
Mani nu Waaqa iti kad'annu barch'uma guddinna,
ka haguma duriti gaara d'eera gubba eju, fakaata.
Ee AABBO Waaqa, nami Israeliini abdatu sii,
nama si lakisu ch'ufa inch'eersani.
Worri akuma maqa d'uke keesati t'aafani bada,
waan si AABBO Waaqa,
bisaani madda jireenna lakiseefi.
Ee AABBO Waaqa, na fayyisi, yo suni anini inuma fayya; na baasi, yo suni anini inuma baha. Nami anini faarsu si!
Biyyiti waan nani jettu, Dubbini AABBO Waaqi qara jed'e me? Amma ha guutamtuti!
Ee AABBO Waaqa, anini takaa, worra kana balleesi siini injenne. Anini takaa aka worri badu infeene. AABBO Waaqa, atini imbeeta, waan anini jed'ele ch'ufa imbeeta.
Na imudamsiisini; hojja gaargali nati d'ufu nami anini iti baqad'u sii.
Nama na gaargalchu ch'eersi, ammo ch'eera suni na hanqisi. Worra mudamsiisi, ammo na imudamsiisini. Gaargala worratiini kooti aka hama worra hobaasi.
AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e, Yeremia, kai, gara fullo, fullo Biyya jed'ani, ta hayyooti Yuda diraani seente keesaa baatu, d'aqi; duuba fullo Yerusalemu d'ibile ch'ufa d'aqi,
waan biyyaani jettu, Isani hayyootafi worra Yudatifi nami Yerusalemu keesa tau, ka fullo tanaani oli seenu, dubbi AABBO Waaqa ch'aqasa.
Hojja duu infeene guyya Sabato wo baatani fullo Yerusalemutini oli inseenina.
Maneeni teesani keesale woma fuutani imbaatina, yokhaani guyya Sabatole huji tokole inhojatiina; ammo guyya Sabato qulqullo tolcha, akuma anini duri ababoota teesaniti hime.
Ammo ababooti teesani na inch'aqamne, yokhaani dubbi tiyyale inguunne. Ammo worri fulla suni mata jabaate naa saalfachu dide, womale naraa barachu dide.
Ammo AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, yo isani seera kiyya guutani, guyya Sabato woma baatani fullo dira kanatini olseenu baatani, ammalle Sabato guyya qulqullo tolchitani guyya suni huji hojachu diddani;
hayyooti barch'uma Daudi ira tetetu fullo dira kanatini olduuddi. Worra Yudatifi ka Yerusalemu woliini, gaarifi farda yaabatani ammalle dira Yerusalemule guyya ch'ufa namati guuta.
Nami dira Yudatifi ollowaani d'aatu Yerusalemutiiti bahe, ammalle lafa Benjaminitifi golba gaaratifi gaareenifi lafa Yuda ta bitatile baha. Duuba sorio gubanifi sorio d'ibifi mid'aani Waaqa baasanifi hit'aana isaa aarsani, waan maro galatatifi Waaqa baasanile ch'ufa Mana kiyyatiini d'ufani.
Ammo worri sunini naa saalfate, guyya Sabato guyya qulqullo ha tolfatuti. Worri guyya suni wo baate fullo Yerusalemutini seenu himmalle; yo sila worri akasi tahe, anini fullo Yerusalemu suni inguba. Ibidi suni maneeni hayyu ch'ufa inguba ammalle nami tokoleeni ka dandae d'aanfu injiru.

AABBO Waaqi waan nami jed'e,
Beeni, mana nama faara kuuch'u d'aqi, duuba anini achiti waan siini jechu fed'u siti hima.
Duuba anini kae, mana namicha faaru kuuch'u d'aqe, isa tae d'oqe wo mid'aasu arge.
Hojja d'oqeeni inni d'auti jiru sunini diqo hamaate inni d'oqe suni fuud'e. Garagalche waan d'ibi mid'aasa.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi waan nami jed'e,
Akuma, namichi faara kuuch'u tolche, anini yo worra Israeli akasi tolche d'uga inqabu? Akuma namicha faara kuuch'u d'oqeeni harka isaa keesa jirtu, isanileeni akasuma harka kiyya keesa jirtani.
Hojja anini, gosa toko yokhaani lafa toko hidda buqise ch'ach'abse balleesa jed'u,
ammo yo duuba gochiti sunini eege Hameenna ufi iraa deebite, anini waan qara intolche jed'e illakisa.
Ammo taatule, yo anini gosa toko yokhaani lafa toko aka mukha oobre jabeesa jed'u,
Ammo yo duuba gochiti sunini eege naa saalfachu didde, waan hamtu tolchite, anini waan qara intolcha jed'e illakisa.
Amma waan atini worra Yudatifi ka Yerusalemutini jettu, AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Anini isaniti malachuu jira, aka isani gaargalche isani balleesu. Tanaafi isaniini ch'ufti kara keesani hama lakisa, amalafi adaba keesani jijirad'a.
Ammo worri waan siini jed'u, Hiyo, akasi intaanu, nu akuma keenna kaani mata jabaanne, akuma feenu taana.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'e,
Gosa ch'ufa waan kana gaafad'a;
waan akana kana eenuti taka arge d'agaye?
Worri Israeli ya waan taka inargini tahe!
D'aamochi hamaani guyya tokole
ch'alalaqa gaara Lebanoni iraa imbada?
Bisaani qabanaooni gaara suni iraa yaani
guyya tokole inch'itani?
Ammo gumiini tiyya ya na deete;
worri waaqa d'araati hit'aana aarsa.
Worri kara gula deemu ch'ufati gugufate,
kara duri kaani gula iyyaau,
ammo kara gudda lakise, daandi gula yaa.
Worri yayu lafa tana waan jibbani tolche,
duuba isiini akasiini
waan nami haga jiru jireenna tufatu taate.
Nami d'aatu bahe dabru ch'ufti
rifate mata gingilfate madeefata.
Anini gumi tiyya nyaapa isaani durati firfirsa,
akuma awaara bubbeeni ila boriti d'uftuni.
Guyya gaargali worrati d'ufu
anini dudda worrati gala.
Jennaani biyyiti waan jette, Koota, mala d'awanna aka Yeremia balleesinu! Nu qaalole nu barsiiftufi jaarole qaqaro mala nu d'ooftufi raagoota dubbi Waaqa nu faddu lafa teenna keesa haguma jirule ind'amnu. Koota, dubbi isaa dinne isa himanna.
Tanaafi anini Waaqa kad'ad'e waan jed'e, Ee AABBO Waaqa, na ch'aqasi, waan nyaapi kiyya dubbatu d'agayi.
Waan dansa waan hamtuni baasani? Ammo worri yayu boola naa qote. Qaabad'u aka anini siti d'ufe worraa jed'e dubbad'e, aka dallansu tante worra ira d'owu.
Ammo amma tana, ee AABBO Waaqa ijoolleeni worraa ha garaachafi woraanani hobaatu. Nad'eeni ha d'iirsaafi ilmaanile d'abduti. D'iirti ha d'ukubaani hobaate, kaimileeni ha woraanani hobauti.
Nyaapa iti ergi ka d'ufe mana worraa tassa saamu, worri ha mudame iyyuti. Worri yayu boola anini keesa buu naa qote t'urura anini seenule naa kaaye.
Ammo ee AABBO Waaqa, atini mala worri nani ijeesu fed'e ch'ufa imbeeta. Ch'ubbu worraa inaraaraminiifi, daba worraale biraa indeeminifi. Worra dabsi, lafa buusi dallansu keesa balleesi.

AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e, Beeni, okote faara nama faara kuuch'u ira bitad'i, duuba jaarole gumitifi qaalole gugurdo yaami,
fullo ch'ach'aba Faaratini dira keesa baha bale Hinomu d'aqa. Achiti dubbi anini siti himu tana biyyati himi,
waan jettuuni, Dubbi AABBO Waaqa d'agaya, hayyoota Yudatifi worra Yerusalemu dubbi AABBO Waaqi guddaani, Waaqi Israeli, jed'u ch'aqasa. Anini badi hamtu lafa tanatini d'ufa, ta nami d'agaye ch'ufti rifate maadefate, akanumati afaani qabatu.
Wonti anini akasi tolchufi waan worri kunini na lakise, waaqa d'araati sorio baase, waaqa d'ibi ka worraafi abbooti worraatifi hayyooti Yuda haga d'alate waan isaa imbeenne, sorio baasani, akanaani lafa tana t'ureesani. Worri yayu lafa tana d'iiga nama woma iyyakiniti balleese.
Fulla sorio irati qalani waaqa Baali jed'ani jaare, ilmaani isaani arti irati gube sorio baase. Anini waan kana tolcha injenne, yokhaani inherennele.
Duuba guyyaani ind'ufa ka fulla tanaani deebiani Tofethi yokhaani Bale Hinomu injenne, ammo Bale Qalma jed'ani.
Fulla tanati anini mala worra Yudatifi ka Yerusalemu balleese, harka nyaapa keesa buuse, nyaapi sunini worra had'e dabsate, aninileeni reefa worraa allaatifi bineensa ala nyaachisa.
Anini dira kana aka takaa inargini balleese, duuba nami d'aatu bahe dabru ch'ufti rifate maadefate afaani qabata.
Nyaapi dira marse, nama keesa jiru hobaasu fed'a. Duuba worri dira suni keesa jiru maro gaargala sunitifi fooni woli nyaate ilmaani ufile nyaata.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi, ato jari si woliini jiru sunini argu, okote suni ch'absi naani jed'e.
Duuba waan worraani jettu, AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u, Anini gumi tanaafi dira kana, akuma okote faara ta eegi ch'absani dandaani imid'aasine, ch'ach'absa. Tofethi keesaleti woli awaalani, wonti akanatiifi fullaani worra iti awaalani d'ibiini injirtu.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, anini dira kanafi nama keesa taule akuma Tofethi tolcha.
Maneeni Yerusalemutifi ta hayyoota Yudatifi yokhaani maneeni gubba isiiti urjii hit'aana aarsanifi daad'iini waaqa d'ibii buusanileeni ch'ufti akuma Tofethi t'uroofti.
Jennaani Yeremiani fulla AABBO Waaqi iti fagi jed'eeni, ta Tofethi jed'ani bahe, d'aqe naabo Mana Waaqa keesa eje, waan biyyaani jed'e,
AABBO Waaqi guddaani, Waaqi Israeli, waan jed'e; Anini dira kanafi ollowaani d'aatu jirtu ch'ufa gaargala anini ind'ufaani jed'eeni ch'ufa itiini d'ufa; wonti akanatiifi worri yayu mata jabaate, dubbi tiyya ch'aqasu dide.

Qaallichi Pashuri jed'ani, ka ilma Imeri, ka huji Mana Waaqati gudda, dubbi anini dubbad'e suni d'agaye jennaani,
nama yaame, Namicha kana d'aana, d'aatu fullo Benjamini ta Mana Waaqatini olisenaniti jabeesa hid'a jed'e.
Boriyya diirama eegi Pashurini hid'aansa suni naraa hiikhe, anini waan isani jed'e, AABBO Waaqi maqa Pashuri suni si inkennine, maqaani inni sii kenne, Mudamsu fulla ch'ufa.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, anini maquma sunini siifi jaallani teetile mudamsiisa. Duuba atini iluma teetiini agarta, aka jaalani tante woraana nyaapa isanitini hobaatu. Anini worra Yuda ch'ufa harka hayyu Babiloniti kenna — inni worra gari boojie lafa ufi geese, ka gari hobaasa.
Ammalle anini waan diri kuni qabu ch'ufa, horifi mihaafi waan hayyuuni Yuda qabu ch'ufale, harka nyaapa isaniti kenne, nyaapi sunini boojie lafa ufi geesa.
Pashuri, sifi worra kankele ch'ufa boojiani lafa Babiloni geesani. Achiti atini doote, sifi jaalani tante ta atini waan d'ara heddu iti odeesite awaalani.
Ee AABBO Waaqa,
atini na sobde jennaani anini ya sobame.
Atini irre nara qabda,
tanaafi na dabsate.
Nami ch'ufti na goyeese
hojja ch'ufa na miid'a.

waan gaargalafi badii hima.

dubbini tante aka ibida na keesati bobeeti.
Anini guddo iti game,
aka waan isii indubbanne;
ammo ufi d'owu dad'abe.
Anini nama fulla ch'ufati,
mudamsuuni ya lafa qabate!

badii tiyya feete waan jettu,

waan tokole dabsachu dad'aba.

taate awaali kiyya saabuma haad'a tiyyati.

Hayyuuni Yuda, ka Sedekia jed'ani, Pashuri ilma Malkiyafi qaallicha Sefania ilma Maaseya nati erge, waan nani jed'e:
Aabbo, AABBO Waaqa nu kad'ad'i, wonti akanatiifi hayyuuni Babiloni ka Nebukadreza jed'anifi duuli isaa yayu dira marse. Hegeri AABBO Waaqi, waan mama fa tolche, Nebukadreza nuraa deebisa.
Duuba AABBO Waaqi nani dubbate, jennaani anini waan worra sunini jed'e, waan Sedekiani jettani,
AABBO Waaqi Israeli waan jed'u: Sedekia, anini askarti tante ta hayyu Babilonitifi duula isatini woli haatu imballeesa. Anini woraana askarti teeti wod'aka dirati tuula.
Anini irre tiyyafi jabeenna kiyya ch'ufaani aka hama gugubad'e dallane si had'a.
Anini nama dira kana keesa jiru ch'ufa inhobaasa; namaafi horileeni d'ukubuma hamaani aka takaa hobaa.
Ammo siifi jaarole teetifi nama woraanafi beelafi d'ukuba ira hafe ch'ufa harka hayyu Nebukadrezatifi nyaapa keesani ka isani ijeesu fed'uti kenna. Duuba Nebukadrezani naasu male isani ch'ufa hobaase nama tokole hafu d'owa. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Ammalle waan atini gumi tanaani jettu, AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Me ilaala, anini kara lama isani garsiisa, kara duisatifi ka jireenna. Nami dira keesati hafu yokhaani woraanani dua yokhaani beelaani dua yokhaani d'ukubaani dua.
Ammo nami dira keesaa bahe, worra Babiloni ka tae dira kana had'uti jiru booju kad'atu induu, lubbu baha.
Anini ya kutad'e, aka dira kana balleesu male inteenne. Dira kana harka hayyu Babiloniti kennani, inni gube balleesa. Nami waan kana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Ammalle waan atini worra hayyu Yudatini jettu, Dubbi AABBO Waaqa d'agaya,
worra d'aloota Daudi! AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Guyya ch'ufa waan tolchitani ch'ufa d'uga gula tolcha. Nama dabsani harka nama dabse jalaa baasa. Yo baasu baatani, wonti hamtuni isani tolchitani kuni dallansu tiyya aka ibida nami dandae ind'aafine bobeesiti.
Ee Yerusalemu, atini rabsu d'akhaa ka rarraa bale gubba olfago tau, ka diidale argani fakaata. Ammo anini si had'e, si balleesa. Atini, Nami tokoleeni dandae na inhad'u, yokhaani na indabsatu, jetta.
Ammo anini maro waan atini taateefi, si gaargalche badda teesani gube, ibidi sunini waan d'aatu jira ch'ufa guba. Nami Dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.

AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u: Mana hayyu Yuda d'aqi dubbi tana iti himi,
waan jettuuni, Dubbi AABBO Waaqa d'agaya, Ee hayyu Yuda, ka barch'uma Daudi ira tau siifi jaarole teetifi nama kanke ka fullo tanaani olseenu ch'ufti.
Wonti AABBO Waaqi jed'u tana, waan d'ugaatifi ka qajeela tolcha; nama dabsani harka nama dabsu jalaa baasa. Nama gosa d'ibitifi hiyyeeyifi nad'eeni hiyyeeyile gaargalchitani indabsina; ammalle fulla qulqullo tanati nama woma iyyakini infit'ina.
Yo isani d'uguma waan anini jed'e kana tolchitani, duuba nami d'aloota Daudi, yo ch'ufa hayyu tahe, jaarole ufitifi gumi worra woliini, fullo mana hayyu tana gaarifi farda yaabate olseena.
Ammo yo isani waan anini tolchu diddani, anini inkakhad'a aka mani kunini ona tahu. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ona AABBO Waaqa.
Mani hayyu Yuda, aka lafa Gileaditifi gaareeni Lebanoni nati mid'aaga. Ammo anini ona nami keesa injirre isa tolcha.
Anini nama isa balleesu, ka d'agara ufii harkaa qabu, siti erga. Duuba worri utuba hind'eesa mimid'aaga ch'ire ibida keesati d'abba.
Eegi suni nami gosa d'ibii hedduuni d'aatu bahe dabre wolgaafate waan jed'u, AABBO Waaqi dira gudda kana akana tolche?
Duuba worri waan jed'u, Waan worri Wold'aqisa AABBO Waaqa isaani lakise waaqa d'ibi gula yae hojateefi akasi tolchani.
Worra Yuda, hayyu Yosia jettani imbohina;
duisa isaale imbohina.
Amma ilma isaa Yohazi boha,
ka nyaapi boojie itiini d'aabatu,
ka deebie lafa iti d'alate tana ingarre.
Inni lafa iti boojiani keesati dua, deebie lafa tana inargu.
Nami mana ufi kara ch'ubbutini jaarate,
ammalle kara hameennatini mana d'ibi iti dare jaare,
ka nama lafa ufi hojachiise hori d'owate, ya bade!
Nami, anini mana gudda jaarad'e,
gubbale mana d'ibi iti dare
ballisa jed'u, ya bade!
Duuba inni deresha gugurda iti mid'aase
mukha hind'eesatini barreese,
hallu diimtuni ch'okha.
Yo atini mukha hind'eesatini mana jaarate,
waan hayyoota ch'ufa ira jirtu ufi seeta?
Abbaani kanke nyaate d'uge waan d'ugaatifi
ka qajeela gula indeemne?
Tanaafi inni waan tolchu ch'ufa keesa eeba argate.
Inni dubbi hiyyeesa d'uga gula qore,
tanaafi waan tolche ch'ufa keesati eeba argate.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Waaqa beekhitini waan akanatiniiti?
Ammo atini ufo dabaati,
woma ke ch'alla feeta;
atini nama woma iyyakini ijeefte,
irrumani gosa te dabsite.
Nami dubbi tana jed'e, AABBO Waaqa.
Nami tokoleeni ka isaa bohu injiru,
yokhaani oboleesi kiyya ya bade;
eesa arga? jed'e injiru!
Nami tokoleeni ka boheefi,
Aabbo kiyya, hayyu kiyya jed'u injiru.
Akuma harre doote dira Yerusalemu keesa alaati hirkisani gatani.
Worra Yerusalemu waan goli teesani dabsatanifi,
Lebanoni d'aqa iyya,
lafa Bashanile d'aqa, arrifad'a;
gaareeni Moabule keesa arrifad'a.
Gaafa isani quufa qabdani,
ka isani nagayaani teetani,
AABBO Waaqi isaniini dubbate
ammo ch'aqasu diddani.
Karaani haguma duriti isani keesati fidamtani sunuma;
isani takaa AABBO Waaqaa insaalfanne.
Jaarole teesani bubbeeni fud'atte,
goli teesani ch'ufa boojiani,
nama dira keesani maro ch'ubbu teesanitifi
ch'eersani balleesani.
Isani mana hind'eesa Lebanonitini jaaratani
nagayaani keesa teetani;
ammo hojja gaargali
aka nad'eeni d'alaa ch'ininfatu isaniti d'ufu,
aka male mudamtani.
harka nama atini sodaatu ka si ijeesu fed'uti sii kenna. Anini harka hayyu Babiloni, ka Nebukadreza jed'anitifi askarti isati si kenna.
Anini siifi haatetile, lafa d'ibi isani geese, harka nyaapati isani kenne, achiti dootani.
Isani aka lafa tanati deebitani d'araatani, ammo dandeetani indeebitani.

aka inni ilmaani d'abe,

ammalle nama d'aloota isaa
ka barch'uma Daudi ira tae lafa Yuda fidule d'abu.

Gaargali AABBO Waaqi nama nama fidu, ka gumi isaa balleese gargari firfirsutini d'ufu, akami hama!
Wonti AABBO Waaqi Israeli waan nama nama fidu, ka sila gumi isaa qorqoratuni jed'u, tana: Isani gumi tiyya qorqorachu diddani gargari firfirsitani d'id'imati d'ooftani. Anini amma tana maro isani waan hamtu suni tolchitanifi isani gaargalcha.
Anini gumi tiyya ta hafte lafa iti firfirse keesaa guure, lafa worra ta qaraa taaniti galcha. Achiti worri ilmaani heddu d'ale lafa ira dabra.
Anini nama worra fidu, ka worra qorqoratu, iti tolche, duuba worri deebie woma sodaate imudamu, aninileeni deebie worra ingaargalchu. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Guyyaani ind'ufa, ka anini d'aloota Daudi keesa nama d'uga toko fohad'e hayyu tolchu. Hayyichi sunini kara dansaani nama fidde, waan d'ugaatifi ka qajeela lafa ch'ufa keesati tolcha.
Gaafa inni hayyu tahu, worri Yuda soda nyaapa jalaa bahe, worri Israelileeni nagayaani taa. Maqaani isaani yaamani AABBO Waaqi d'uga keenna.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Guyyaani ind'ufa, ka nami deebie maqa AABBO Waaqa jiru, ka gumi Israeli lafa Misiri keesa baaseni, inkakhanne.
Ammo fulla suni wonti worri kakhatuni maqa AABBO Waaqa jiru, ka gumi Israeli lafa mirgaatifi lafa inni iti firfirse ch'ufa keesaa galche. Duuba worri lafa isaani keesa taa.
Maro AABBO Waaqatifi
maro dubbi isaa qulqullootifi
onneeni na ch'ite,
nafi na hollate,
akuma nama guddo daad'iini machae
daad'iini dabsatte fakaad'e.
Nami waan hamtu tolche Waaqa lakisu
ya lafa ira dabre;
worri hameenna gula yae
irreeni nama dabse.
Maro Waaqi worra abaareefi, lafti boote marrileeni gogoge.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'e,
Raagootafi qaaloleeni Waaqa imbeetu;
Mana Waaqa keesaleti
aka worri waan hamtu tolchu ya arge.
Daandini worri gula yau worra jalaa much'uch'ate, lafti worrati dukanoofti;
anini worra gufachiise worra buusa.
Anini badi worratiini d'ufa,
guyyaani worra gaargalchani ya gahe.
Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Raagoota lafa Samaria keesa jirtu
anini waan hamtu toko irati arge:
Worri maqa waaqa Baali jed'anitini fage
gumi tiyya kara iraa gorse.
ta waan hagasi ira hamtu tolchitu, arge:
Worri huji sharmut'oma hojate,
d'ara dubbate,
nama waan hamtu tolchule wahelche;
duuba akanaani nami tokoleeni
hameenna ufi iraa deebiu dide.
Aka kiyyati worri yayu worra Sodomatifi ka Gomora fakaate.
Tanaafi duuba wonti raagoota Yerusalemu suni, ka anini AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'u, tana:

anini mukhi had'aa nyaachise bisaani had'ao obaasa.
AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan worraa Yerusalemutini jed'e, Waan raagooti isaniini jettu inch'aqasina; worri waan d'ara isani abdachisuu jira. Worri daayya nara ind'ufini hereguma ufitini gabaase isaniti himu jira.
Ammalle worri worra dubbi Waaqa tufatuni waan jed'u, Woma insodaatina, lafti naguma. Ammalle nama mata jabaate, herega ufi ch'alla gula deemuni waan jed'u, Isani gaargala inargattani.
Anini waan jed'e, Raagoota tana keesa eenuti herega AABBO Waaqa beekha? Worra keesa eenuti taka dubbi isaa d'agaye hubate, yokhaani waan inni jed'u ch'aqase jalaa qaba?
Dallansuuni isaa aka bubbe jirti, ta irrumani mata worra ch'ubbu roraaftu.
Dallansuuni sunini isa iraa ingaltu, haga inni waan fed'u ch'ufa tolchuti. Takaa tana dubbini tunini aka dansaa gumi isaati galti.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'e, Anini raagoota tana inergine, ammo worrumati ufiini yae. Anini waan tokole worrati inhimne, worri dubbuma ufitini woi fage.
Worri sila, ato herega kiyya beekhe, yayu dubbi tiyya biyyati haasae, kara hamafi waan hamtu worri tolche iraa gorse.
Anini Waaqa fulla toko ch'alla tauniti, ammo fulluma ch'ufa jira.
Nami tokoleeni dandae fulla tokoleti na duraa ind'okhatu. Isani aka anini fulla ch'ufa lafafi gubbale jiru imbeetani?
Anini waan raagooti maqa kiyyaani waan d'ara dubbate, Anini ya oobjad'e, anini ya oobjad'e jettu imbeekha.
Haga yoomi raagooti d'ara tunini gumi tiyya herega worraa ka d'araatiini sobde balleesiti?
Worri waan oobjuuni amma, worri wolti himu tunini gumi tiyya na wollaalchiftu seha, akuma abbootini worraa na lakifte Baali gula yaate.
Raagi oobju oobjate ha waan oobju isaa himuti, ammo raagi dubbi tiyya d'agaye ha dubbi suni kara d'ugaatini himu. Ch'idiifi dargayeeni maanini woli fakaati?
Dubbini tiyya aka ibida jirti, ammalle burrisa d'akha ch'ach'absu fakaati.
Anini raagoota dubbi woli jala fud'atte, AABBO Waaqati akana jed'e jettu, infed'u.
Ammalle raagoota dubbuma ufi dubbatte, Waaqati akana jed'e jettule, infed'u.
Waan anini, AABBO Waaqi jed'u, D'agaya! Anini raagoota oobjatte d'ara odeesitu infed'u. Worri waan oobju suni odeese, d'araafi kiyyiba worratiini gumi tiyya kara iraa gorsa. Anini worra suni infohanne yokhaani inergine, tanaafi worri diqole qarqaarsa gumi tana intahu. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e, Yo gumi tiyya keesa nami toko, yokhaani raagi toko, yokhaani qaallichi toko d'aamsi AABBO Waaqa maani? Jed'e si gaafate, atini waan jettuuni, Atini yayu baa ulfo AABBO Waaqati taate, tanaafi inni amma si balleesa.
Ammalle gumi tiyya nami toko, yokhaani raagi toko, yokhaani qaallichi toko, dubbi baa ulfo AABBO Waaqa maqale d'ae, anini isaafi worra isaa ch'ufa balleesa.
Fulla suni nami ch'ufti sila ha jaalani ufitifi fiit'a ufile gaafate, AABBO Waaqi maani siini jed'e? Dubbini inni jed'e maani? jed'u.
Tanaafi nami deebie, baa ulfo AABBO Waaqa maqa d'au himmalle; wonti akanatiifi yo nami akasi jed'e, Anini d'aamsa kiyya baa ulfo iti tolcha. Nami yayu dubbi Waaqa jiru, AABBO Waaqa guddaa, garagalche balleese.
Yeremia, waan atini raagootaani jettu, AABBO Waaqi maani isaniini jed'a? Dubbini inni jed'e maani?

anini isani fuud'e ufira isani fageesa, isanifi dira anini ababoota teesani kennele.

Wonti AABBO Waaqi Israeli jed'u tana, worri lafa Yudati boojiani lafa Babiloni geesani mid'aani odaa dadansa kana nati fakaata, duuba aninileeni worraa innaha.
Anini worra qorqorad'e lafa tanati deebise, aka mana jabeese worra jaare, ch'abbu d'owe, ammalle aka mukha worra oobre, buqau d'owa.
Anini herega worri aka anini AABBO Waaqa beekhuni worraa kenna, duuba worri gumi tiyya tahe, aninileeni Waaqa worraa taha; wonti akanatiifi worri garaa tokooni nati deebia.
Ammo hayyu Yuda ka Sedekia jed'anifi jaarole isaatifi nama Yerusalemu ka lafa tana keesati hafefi ka lafa Misiriti godaanele — anini AABBO Waaqi akuma mid'aani odaa hamo nami dandae inyaanne kaani tolcha.
Anini badii hamtu akana tana worratiini d'ufe, gosa lafa keesa jirtu ch'ufa mudamsiisa. Nami worrati tabate, worra goyeese tufate, fulla anini worra iti firfirsu ch'ufa maqa worraatini nama abaara.
Anini woraanafi beelafi d'ukuba worraatini d'ufe, akasiini lafa anini worraafi ababoota worraati kenne keesaa worra balleesani.

Jennaani anini waan worra Yerusalemutifi ka Yudatini jed'e.
Ganna diddami sadi haguma ganna kud'ani sadeeso ka Yosiani, ilmi Amoni, hayyu Yuda tahe asi haga arrale Waaqi nani dubbachu illakimne, aninileeni maro ch'ufa dubbi suni ya isaniti hime; ammo isani ch'aqasu diddani.
Ato AABBO Waaqi raagoota hojattu isaa isaniti bara ch'ufa ergele, isani inch'aqamne yokhaani dubbi suni womatu indarre.
Worri waan jed'e, Isani nami ch'ufti kara hama kanafi waan hamtu tahuti, jirtani kana iraa deebia, duuba akanaani lafa AABBO Waaqi isanifi ababoota teesani haga jiru jireenna d'aalaa kenne keesa teetani.
Waaqoota d'ibi gula yaatani hojattani inkad'atiina, waan harkaani boch'atani kad'attani AABBO Waaqa indallansisina. Yo isani akasi taatani Waaqi woma isani intolchu.
Ammo AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Isani na ch'aqasu diddani, waan harkaani boch'ani kad'attanini na dallansiiftani, duuba akanaani badi ufitini d'uftani.
Tanaafi AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u, Waan isani dubbi tiyya ch'aqasu diddanifi,
anini gosa mirga teetu ch'ufafi hojatu tiyya Nebukadreza hayyu Babiloni yaame, lafa tanaafi nama isi keesa taufi lafa d'aatu jirtu ch'ufa haasisa. Anini gosa Yuda tanaafi gosa worra d'aatu teetule balleese lafa worrale haga jiru jireenna onse waan nami hojja qaabatu ch'ufa iraa rifatu tolcha. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Anini qonqo gammadaatifi ta qilit'amatifi gammada guyya fuud'a, ch'allisise worri d'ad'a ifsaani bobeesani d'abe mid'aani d'akha irati daakhani d'aba.
Lafti tunini ch'ufti badde ona taate, gochiti tunini ch'ufti ganna torbatama harka hayyu Babiloni jalati bulti.
Ammo eegi ganni torbatama hobae, anini hayyu Babilonitifi lafa isaa ta Babiloni jed'ani maro ch'ubbu worraatifi balleese, haga jiru jireenna ona tolcha.
Anini lafa Babiloni badi anini qara waan isii hime, ta kitaaba kana keesati t'aafani Yeremiani fage gosa ch'ufati odeese, itiini d'ufa.
Anini worra Babiloni, waan worri tahe, gula, worra gaargalche, gosa heddufi hayyooti gugurdoni tisse worraa tolfatti.
AABBO Waaqi Israeli waan nani jed'e, Muduunu daad'i, ta dallansuuni tiyya keesa jirtu tana, naraa fuud'i, gosa anini iti si erge tana ch'ufa obaasi.
Worri yo d'uge dadaaqe mamaraata, maro woraana anini worrati erguufi.
Duuba anini muduunu suni AABBO Waaqa iraa fuud'e, gosa inni iti na erge ch'ufa obaase.
Yerusalemufi dira Yuda ch'ufafi hayyoota isiitiifi jaarole isii ch'ufale inobaasani, duuba lafti worraa badde ona taate, hojja qaabatani ch'ufa nami waan isii iraa rifata, maqa isiitiini woli abaara — akuma arrale woli tolchani.
Kunini maqa worra muduunu suni keesaa wo d'uge: Hayyu Misiritiifi jara hojattu isaa gugurdafi jaarole isaatifi nama lafa isaa ch'ufafi nama gosa d'ibi ka lafa isaani keesa godaanule; hayyoota lafa Uzi: Hayyoota dira Filisti, ka Ashkelonifi Gazafi Ekroni, ammalle dira Ashdodi gama hafele; worra gosa Edomufi Moabufi Amonile; hayyoota Tirotifi ta Sidonile; hayyoota lafa afaani baariini ch'ufa; dira Dedanitifi Temafi Buzi; worra mata gabaabse ch'iratu ch'ufa; hayyoota Arafti; hayyoota gosa lafa gamooji keesa teetu ch'ufa; hayyoota lafa Zimritifi ta Elamutifi ta Medi ch'ufa; hayyoota lafa mirga ta fago teetufi ta d'io teetule woluma gulaani; gosa lafa gubba jirtu ch'ufa haguma isiini geetunu inobaasani. Duuba eege qit'isu hayyu Babilonile obaasani.

akuma anini dubbi AABBO Waaqi jed'i nani jed'e taani buufad'eeni worri sunini ch'ufti na qabe, iyye waan jed'e, Atini maro dubbi tana jetteefi duu malte!

(Namichi toko ka Uria, ilma Shemaya jed'ani, ka Kiriath-Yearimu bahe, innileeni akuma Yeremia kana maqa AABBO Waaqatini badi dira kanatifi gosa tana hime.
Hayyichi Yehoiakimu jed'anifi askarti isaatifi jaaroleeni isaaleeni waan Uriani jed'e d'ageennaani, hayyichi aka isa ijeesu malate. Ammo Uriani waan suni d'ageennaani mudame, lafa Misiriti baqate.
Ammo hayyichi Yehoiakimuni Elnathani ilma Akboritifi nama d'ibi lafa Misiriti erge, Uria barbaada kootani jed'e.
Duuba worri isa qabe, hayyicha Yehoiakimu duraani d'umnaani inni isa ijeese, reefa isaa fulla nama ch'ufa iti awaalani buuse.)

Qaampara gogafi mukhaani mid'aafad'i, morma ira keeyad'i.
Duuba gara hayyu Edomutifi ka Moabutifi ka Amonitifi ka Tirotifi ka Sidoni, jara worri gara Sedekia hayyu Yuda ka Yerusalemu jiruti ergeeni qonqo ergi.
Qonqooni atini worraani, hayyoota keesaniti d'aama jettuuni tana: Wonti AABBO Waaqi guddaani, Waaqi Israeli, jed'u tana:
Irreefi jabeenna kiyya guddaani anini lafafi namaafi bineensa lafa keesa jiru ch'ufa uume, lafa suni nama anini jaalad'u kenna.
Nami gosa tana ch'ufa harka hojattu tiyya Nebukadreza hayyu Babiloniti kenne anuma, anini bineensa alalle ch'ufa isa jalati bulche.
Gochiti ch'ufti isaafi ilma isaatifi akhaakhu isale jalati bulti, haga guyyaani lafti isaa baddu gahuti. Duuba gaafasi gochiti isaa gosa jabduufi hayyoota gugurdo jalati bulti.
Ammo yo lafafi gochiti toko isa jalati bulu didde, anini gosa suni woraanafi beelafi d'ukubaani balleesa, haga Nebukadrezani jabeenna ufitini gosa suni balleesuti.
Tanaafi raagoota teesanifi nama wo himuufi nama oobju qabuufi nama ekhera wo gaafatufi falfatu, hayyu Babiloni jalati imbulina isaniini jettule inch'aqasina.
Worri isani sobe aka boojiani lafa teesani ira isani fageesani isani tolcha. Anini lafa teesani keesaa isani baase, duuba akasiini isani balleesani.
Ammo yo gochiti tokoleeni ee jette hayyu Babiloni jalati bulte, Anini gosa suni lafa isaani keesati lakise, Worri oobru qotate achuma taa. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa,
Anini woma suni Sedekia hayyu Yudati hime waan jed'e. Ee jed'aa, hayyu Babilonitifi nama isa ch'ufa jalati bula, duuba injiraattani.
Siifi worri kanke maafi woraana yokhaani beela yokhaani d'ukubaani dootani? Wonti AABBO Waaqi gosa ee jette hayyu Babiloni jalati bulu diddu tolchu suni.
Raagoota, hayyu Babiloni jalati imbulina jettu, inch'aqasina. Worri isani sobuu jira.
AABBO Waaqumati, Anini raagoota suni inergine, worri maqa kiyyaani waan d'ara faguu jira jed'a. Tanaafi inni isani gusse, isanifi raagoota waan d'ara kana isaniti himtu tanale ijeesani.
Jennaani anini waan qaaloleefi gumi ch'ufaani jed'e, AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, raagoota, miha Mana Waaqa ka boojiani lafa Babiloni geesani d'iotu indeebisani jettu, inch'aqasina. Worri isaniti kiyyibuu jira.
Worra inch'aqasina, hayyu Babiloni jalati bula, injiraattani! Diri kunini maafi bade ona taha?
Yo worri d'uguma raaga tahe dubbi AABBO Waaqatini dubbate, worri ha ana, AABBO Waaqa gudda gaafatuti, aka miha Mana Waaqa keesati hafufi miha d'ibi ka mana hayyu keesa jirule Babiloni ingeesine.
(Gaafa hayyichi Nebukadrezani Yehoiakini, ilma Yehoiakimu hayyu Yudatifi jaarole Yudatifi ta Yerusalemu boojie lafa Babiloni geese, inni utuba Mana Waaqatifi haro sibiila diimatifi gaarifi miha Mana Waaqa d'ibile achumati hambise.)
Waan miha suni ka Mana Waaqatifi mana hayyu ka Yerusalemuti hafe ka anini, AABBO Waaqa guddaani Israeli jed'u, ch'aqasi:
Miha suni lafa Babiloni geesani, haga anini barbaada d'ufuti achumati lakisani. Duuba eegi suni anini guure, fulla tanati deebisa. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.

Wonti AABBO Waaqi guddaani Israeli jed'u tana: Anini irre hayyu Babiloni ya ch'abse.
Anini ganna lama keesati, miha Mana Waaqa ch'ufa, ka hayyichi Nebukadreza jed'ani boojie Babiloni geese, fulla tanati deebisa.
Ammalle anini hayyu Yuda, ka Yehoiakini ilma Yehoiakimu jed'anifi, worra Yuda ka boojiani lafa Babiloni geesani wolumaani ch'ufa deebisa. D'uguma anini irre hayyu Babiloni inch'absa. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Jennaani qaaloleefi gumi Mana Waaqa keesa jirtu ch'ufa durati anini waan Hananiani jed'e:
Hayye, hataatu AABBO Waaqi tolchinna. Dubbi atini jette tana inni sii d'ugeese, miha Mana Waaqatifi nama boojiani Babiloni geesani ch'ufa deebisinna.
Ammo waan anini biyyaafi sileeni jed'u ch'aqasi.
Raagooti duri nu durati lafa jirtu, woraanafi beelafi d'ukuba gosa heddutifi lafa jajabdu irre qabduti d'ufu fadde.
Ammo raaga nagaya dubbatu hojja dubbini isaa guutamtu ch'alla aka d'uguma Waaqi isa erge beekhani.
Jennaani raagi Hananiani qaampara kaani morma iraa na baase ch'ach'abse,
gumi ch'ufa durati waan jed'e, AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Akuma atini qaampara kana ch'absite kana, anini qaampara hayyuuni Babiloni Nebukadrezani, morma gosa ch'ufa ira kaye ganna lama keesati ch'absa. Jennaani anini kae iti d'aabad'e.
Duuba eegi anini diqo tae, AABBO Waaqi waan naani jed'e,
Gara Hanania d'aqi waan jettuuni, AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Atini qaampara mukhaa ya ch'absite, ammo fulla isaa anini qaampara sibiila kaya.
Wonti AABBO Waaqi guddaani Israeli jed'u: Anini qaampara sibiila morma gosa tana ch'ufa ira kaye, worra hayyu Babiloni ka Nebukadreza jed'ani jalati bulche, worri isa jalati bula. Ammalle anini bineensa alalle ch'ufa isa jalati bulcha.
Jennaani anini waan Hananiani jed'e, Hanania, na ch'aqasi! AABBO Waaqi si inergine, atini jara kana sobde dubbi d'ara dugefachisuu jirta.
Tanaafi AABBO Waaqi waan siini jed'u, Amma lafa keesaa si balleesa. Gannuma kana keesati doota, waan atini biyyaani, Dubbi Waaqa dida jetteefi.
Duuba gannuma suni keesa, jia torbeeso, raagi Hanania jed'ani suni lubbu d'abe.

Anini eegi hayyu Yehoiakinifi haad'a isaatifi hojattu mana hayyutifi jaarole Yudatifi ta Yerusalemutifi ogeeyifi nama huji harkaa beekhu ch'ufa boojiani tatabe tana t'aafe.
Duuba anini tatabe tana harka Elasa, ilma Shafanitifi Gemaria ilma Hilkia. Ka, Sedekiani hayyuuni Yuda Nebukadreza hayyu Babiloniti erguti kenne. Tatabeeni suni akana jetti:
AABBO Waaqi, guddaani Israeli, waan nama ch'ufa ka Nebukadrezani Yerusalemu keesaa fuud'e Babiloni geesaani jed'u:
Mana jaarad'a iti gala; oobru oobrad'a, waan isiini baaftu nyaad'a.
Wolfuud'a ilmaani d'ala; ilmaani teesanile wolfusisa, worrileeni ha ilmaani d'aluti indiqaatina, hora, lafa ira dabra.
Dira anini iti isani geese suni keesati nagayafi hormaata barbaada. Worra dira suniiti jed'a, Waaqa kad'ad'a, wonti akanatiifi yo worri hore isanileeni ya hortani.
Anini AABBO Waaqi Israeli waan isaniini jed'u, Raagootafi worri wo himu, ka isani woliini tau, isani insobini. Oobju worrale inch'aqasina.
Worri maqa kiyyaani waan d'araa isanii faguu jira, anini worra inergine. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Anumati herega anini isanii qabu beekha, aka hormaatani isanii d'ufe badii isani d'owu, ammalle aka waan dansa isani abdatani ch'ufa isanii kennu.
Duuba isani na yaamattani d'uftani na kad'atani, aninileeni kad'acha teesani isanii d'agaya.
Isani na barbaadani, waan garaa tokooni na barbaadaniifi na agartani.
Ee, isani na agartani, aninileeni lafa teesaniti isani deebisa. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Isani hegeri waan nani jettani, AABBO Waaqi lafa Babiloni keesa yayu raaga nuu kenne.
Waan hayyu dira Daudini duri fidetifi waan worra dira kana keesa tau, fiit'a teesani ta isani woliini imboojiini ka AABBO Waaqi jed'u ch'aqasa.
AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u, Anini woraanafi beelafi d'ukuba worratiini d'ufe oda shame ka nami nyaachu indandeenne worra tolcha.
Anini worra lakisu dide, woraanafi beelafi d'ukuba worratiini d'ufa, gochiti lafa keesa jirtu ch'ufti waan agarte suni iraa rifati. Fulla anini worra iti firfirse ch'ufa, nami waan worri tahe iraa rifate mudame. Worra goyeesani maqa worraatini, nama abaarani.
Wonti woni kunini ch'ufti worrati d'uftufi, waan worri qonqo anini bara ch'ufa raagoota hojattu tiyyaatini worrati erge ch'aqasu dideefi.
Isaniini ch'ufti, ka anini lafa Babiloni geese, waan anini, AABBO Waaqi jed'u, ch'aqasa.
Wonti AABBO Waaqi, guddaani Israeli, waan Ahabu ilma Kolayatifi Sedekia ilma Maaseya, ka maqa kiyyaani dubbi d'ara isani faguuni jed'u tana; anini harka hayyu Babiloni ka Nebukadreza jed'aniti worra kenne, inni ila teesani durati worra fit'a.
Hojja worri Yerusalemu keesaa boojiani lafa Babiloni geesani nama abaaru fed'u. Worri waan jed'u, AABBO Waaqi aka Sedekiafi Ahabu, ka hayyuuni Babiloni ibidaani gube hobaase si tolchinna!
Wonti worri gaargala suni argatuufi worrati Israeli keesati waan dabaa tahe: Worri nad'eeni biyya barate, ammalle maqa AABBO Waaqatini d'ara dubbate. Wonti worri tolchu kunini waan Waaqi fed'uniti; inni waan worri tolche beekhe ila ufitini arge. Nami dubbi tana jed'e AABBO Waaqa.
AABBO Waaqi, guddaani Israeli, waan nani jed'e, waan atini Shemaya ka gosa Nehelamitini jettu: Atini maqa kanketini tatabe gara worra Yerusalemutifi qaallicha Sefania ilma Maaseyatifi qaalole taani ch'ufati t'aafte. Tatabe suni keesa atini waan Sefaniani jette,
AABBO Waaqi yayu fulla Yehoyada qaallu si tolche, inni amma yayu gudda Mana Waaqa si tolche. Atini nama marata, ka raaga ufiini jed'u ch'ufa, sansalatani hid'i, haada sibiila mormati kayi.
Atini maanifi Yeremia, ka worra Anathothi, ka raaga ufi tolche biyyati woi himuti inkayini?
Inni nu worra Babiloni jiru qonqo tana nuti erge waan jed'u; isani guddo achiti turtani, mana jaarad'a iti gala oobru oobrad'a, waan isiini baaftu nyaad'a jed'a.
Ammo qaallichi Sefaniani tatabe suni naa soome.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e,
Qonqo tana gara worra boojiani Babiloni geesaniti ergi waan jettuuni: Wonti Shemaya ka AABBO Waaqi jed'u tana: Anini, AABBO Waaqi, Shemayaafi d'aloota isaa ch'ufa ingaargalcha. Anini isa inergine, ammo inni raaga ufi tolche, isanii fage, dubbi d'ara isani d'ugefachise. Inni gosa teesani keesaa bada, ilmaani inhoratu, yokhaani waan dansa ka anini gumi tiyya tolchu inargu; wonti akanatiifi inni worraani, Waaqa dida jed'e barsiise. Nami dubbi suni jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.

AABBO Waaqi Israeli waan nani jed'e:
Waan anini siini jed'e ch'ufa kitaaba keesati t'aafi;
wonti akanatiifi guyyaani ind'ufa, ka anini gumi tiyya worra Israelitiifi ka Yuda lafa worra iti boojiani keesaa galche, lafa anini duri ababoota worrati d'aala kenneti deebisu. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
AABBO Waaqi waan worra Israelitiifi ka Yudatini jed'u,
Anini qonqo mudamsu yokhaani ta soda,
ta nagaya intahini, d'agaye.
Me heregi,
nami d'iira dandae d'iibate ilmaani ind'ala?
Anini maafi nama d'iira ch'ufa, ka garaa qabate,
aka nad'eeni garaacha ta ch'ininfatu ejaanju arga re?
Nama ch'ufa maafi fuuli golgolaa:
Guyyaani hamaani d'ufuu jira,
ka nami takaa arge ind'agayini —
guyya gumiini tiyya ta Yakobo gaargaltu,
ammo ha taatu worri inuma baha.
AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u: Hojja guyyaani suni d'ufu, anini qaampara morma isaaniti jiru ch'abse sansalata iraa baasa, duuba worri ituma deebie tisse gosa d'ibi intahu.
Ammo worri ana, AABBO Waaqa isaaniti hojate, nama d'aloota Daudi ka anini hayyu tolchule hojata.
worra Israeli, imudamina.
Anini lafa fago suni, ta qara boojiani iti isani geesani,
keesaa isani baase,
isani galtani nagayaani teetani,
nami tokoleeni deebie isani insodaachisu.
Anini d'ufe isani baase,
gosa anini keesati isani firfirse ch'ufa imballeesa,
ammo isani imballeesu.
Anini yo isani gaargalchele
d'uga gula isani gaargalcha.
Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
AABBO Waaqi waan gumi isaatini jed'u,
Madaani teesani infayyitu
fulla isani woraanani dandaani infayyisani.
Nami isani qorqoratu injiru,
qorsi mada teesani fayyisu injiru,
isani haga jirtani infayyitani.
Jaalani teesani ch'ufti ya isani deete,
worri diqole waan keesani iyyaalu.
Waan dabi keesani heddate,
ch'ubbuuni teesani lafa ira dabarteefi,
anini aka nyaapa isani had'e
gaargala gudda isanitini d'ufe.
Isani maafi mada teesani ta infayyine jettani
teetani bootani?
Waan dabi keesani heddate
ch'ubbuuni teesani lafa ira dabarteefi,
anini akana isani gaargalcha.
Ammo amma tana nama isani hobaasu ch'ufa inhobaasani,
nyaapa keesani ch'ufale imboojiani.
Nama isani dabsu ch'ufa dabsani,
nama isani saamu ch'ufa saamani.
Anini isani fayyise,
mada teesanile qorsa ira kaaya,
ato nyaapi keesani,
Sionini waan jibbani,
nami tokoleeni waan isii iyyaalu jed'ele.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Anini gumi tiyya lafa isaaniti deebise
worra isaani ch'ufaa naha;
dira Yerusalemu jaarani,
mana hayyule mid'aasani.
Nama achi tau faaru d'awate gammade sirba.
Anini worra daraarse, worri heddate lafa ira dabra;
anini worra ulfeese deebiani worra intufatani.
Ilmaani worraa akuma duri taate,
worrileeni gumi jabdu taha;
ammalle nama worra dabsu ch'ufa imballeesa.
Nama worraani deemuti
gosa worraa keesaa d'alata,
nami worra fiduleeni worruma keesa d'alata.
Nama suni hojja anini yaamu, inni nati ga d'ufa,
wonti akanatiifi nami yaamicha male d'ufu injiru
worri gumi tiyya tahe,
aninileeni Waaqa worraa taha.
Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Dallansuuni AABBO Waaqa aka bubbe jirti, ta d'ufte mata worra ch'ubbu qabu roraaftu.
Isiini haga waan inni herege ch'ufa guututi iraa ingaltu. Takaa tana waan kana inuma hubattani.

AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Guyyaani ind'ufa, ka anini gosa Israeli ch'ufaa Waaqa tahe, worrileeni gumi tiyya tahu.
Wonti AABBO Waaqi jed'u tana: Nama woraana jalaa bahe anini lafa gamoojiti naheefi. Gaafa gumiini Israeli guddo boqochu feete,
anini fago worrati mullad'e waan jed'e, Worra Israeli, anini haguma duriti isani jaalad'e, tanaafi hojja ch'ufa jaalala tiyya ta muumme inqamne isani agarsiisa.
Anini deebie ammalle isani jaare, isani ammalle dibbe teesani fud'attani gammaddani sirbitani.
Isani ammalle gaareeni Samaria irati oobru zabibu oobrattani, nami oobruleeni woma isiini baaftu nyaata.
Ee, guyyaani ind'ufa, ka nami woi eegu gaareeni Efraimu iraa iyye waan jed'u, koota gara AABBO Waaqa keenna, Sioniti nu yaasa.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Maro Yakobotiifi gammadani sirba,
maro gosa gosa ch'ufa ira guddotifi lalaba,
faaru teesani d'aad'a.
AABBO Waaqi ya gumi ufi baase,
nama hafele ch'ufa ya baase jed'a.
Anini mirgaa worraani d'ufe
muumme lafale worra guure galcha.
Naafafi ballaleeni worra woliini d'ufe,
nad'eeni garaacha qabdufi,
ta diquma ind'alinileeni worra woliini d'ufti,
worra gumi heddu muumme inqamneti gala.
Gumiini tiyya boote na kad'atti,
ato anini worra galchuu jiru.
Anini afaani galaana daandi qajeeltu
worri keesati ingufanne gula worraani godaana.
Anini abba Israeliti,
ilmi kiyya ka angafa Efraimu.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Gosa ch'ufa, na ch'aqasa,
dubbi tiyya lafa fago ta afaani galaana ch'ufati haasaa.
Anini gumi tiyya ta Israeli gargari firfirse,
duuba eege wolti deebise,
akuma tissituuni hooliye ufi qorqoratu qorqorad'a.
Anini yayu gumi Yakobo baase,
harka gosa irre qabdu keesaa fuud'e.
Worri d'ufe gaara Sioni irati sirbe,
waan anini kenneefi maache iraa gammada —
mid'aani, daad'i d'ad'a,
loonifi reele.
Worri oobru bisaani quufte fakaata,
waan fed'u ch'ufa argata.
Dubarti gammade sirbite,
d'iirti kaimafi jaaroleeni qilit'amti.
Anini boha worraa garagalche gammada tolche,
garaa worra jabeese laalala worraa garagalche qilit'ama tolcha.
Anini qaalole sagale dansaani quubse,
gumi tiyyale waan isiini feetu ch'ufa kennafi.
Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Qonqo Rama keesa d'agayani,
ta laalalafi boha guddo.
Raheliini ilmaani ufiti boote
iraa hafu dad'abdi,
waan isiini ch'ufti raawateefi.
Bohu lakisi imimaani ufi ira haaqi.
Hujiini atini ilmaani teeti tolchite
tokoleeni lafati inhaftu;
worri lafa nyaapa keesaa gala.
Abdiini injirti,
aka takaa tana ilmaani tante worra ufiti galtu.
Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Anini worra Efraimu ka laalefate akana jed'u d'agaye:
AABBO Waaqa, nu hori mandiida fakaanna,
ammo atini nu lenjifte.
Nu galchi, nu kurfo jira,
aka AABBO Waaqa keennati deebinu.
Nu siraa gorre ammo eege siti deebiu feene,
eegi atini nu gorsite nu qajeelchite,
nu aka male ch'eere lafa lalale;
wonti akanatiifi nu gaafa ijoolle ch'ubbu hojanne.
Ee Efraimu atini ilma kiyya dansa anini guddo jaalad'uniti?
Anini yo maqa kanke d'au ch'ufa,
aka si jaalad'u qaabad'a
garaani kiyya sii d'arae,
sii naha.
Akheekha kara isani garsiisu mid'aasa,
kara duri isani gula yaatani qaabad'a.
Ee worra Israeli kaa gala,
dira duri lakiftaniti dachaa.
Worra d'ugefacha inqamne kana,
isani haga yoomi garaa lama qabaachu lakiftani?
Anini yayu waan takaa inargini lafaani d'ufe —
nami d'iira harka nama uwati bula.
AABBO Waaqi, guddaani Israeli, waan jed'u, Gaafa anini gumi tana lafa isiiti deebisu, isiini deebiteti lafa Yudatifi dira isii keesati waan jettu, AABBO Waaqi gaara qulqullo Yerusalemu fulla inni tau eebisinna.
Nami lafa Yudatifi dira isii ch'ufa keesa tae, nami oobru qotufi ka ree tissuleeni woliini taa.
Anini nama dad'abi qabu hafuura baase, nama beelti ijeefte sagale quubsa.
Duuba gaafasi nami, Anini rafe, ka dad'abi inqamne lafaa kae jed'a.
Anini, AABBO Waaqi, waan jed'u, Guyyaani ind'ufa, ka anini lafa Israelitiifi ta Yudale namaafi saani guutu.
Ammalle akuma duri anumani aka mukha worra buqise qaarise, garagalche, bulleese butuche, akasuma anini amma tana aka mukhaa worra oobre, aka mana jaara.
Hojja guyyaani sunini gahu nami deebie, Abbootini mid'aani zabibu kurao nyaate, ammo ilmaani ilkaani diilalaani injed'u.
Ammo nami ch'ufti daba isatini dua, ammalle nami zabibu kurooftu nyaatu ilkaanti diilalaa.
Wold'aqisi sunini wold'aqisa duri anini ababoota worraa gaafa anini harka kiyyaani worra fuud'e lafa Misiri keesaa baase woliini tolfad'eeni takaaniti. Ato anini d'iirsa worra fakaad'ele, worri wold'aqisa suni injabeesine.
Wold'aqisi haraai anini worra Israeli woliini tolfad'u kana; anini seera kiyya qalbi worra keesa kaye, garaa worraa keesati t'aafa. Anini Waaqa worraa tahe, worrileeni gumi tiyya taha.
Nami tokoleeni deebie nama gosa isaa yokhaani oboleesa isatini, AABBO Waaqa beekhi jed'e, imbarsiisu; wonti akanatiifi worri ch'ufti, diqaafi guddaleeni, na beekha. Anini daba worraa araarameefi ch'ubbu worraale deebie inqaabad'u. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
AABBO Waaqi adu ifsa guyya tolche,
halkani jiaafi urji ifsaa tolcha.
Inni baariini chochoose roraasa;
maqaani isaa AABBO Waaqa gudda.
Inni waan jed'u, Haga lafafi gubbaani jirtu,
Israeliini gosuma taati.
Yo sila guyya toko ballinna gubbaa biimani,
yayaba lafale dandaani, laalani,
yo suni ch'alla anini gumi Israeli
maro huji worraatifi dida.
Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Guyyaani ind'ufa, ka dira Yerusalemu ch'ufa deebiani naa jaarani, haguma doofi Hananeliti iti keeyatani Fullo mogaati d'aabani.
Biimani isaa arti baate, ila aduu qajeelte, gaara Garebuti ejite, ammalle Goati deebite.
Bale reefa iti awaalani huura iti jissani ch'ufafi oobru galaana Kidroni gubbale haga Fullo Farda, ta ilaboru ch'ufa, naa jed'ani, qulqulleesani olkayani. Dira suni deebiani ch'absani imballeesani.

Gaafasi duuli hayyu Babiloni Yerusalemu had'uuti jira, ammalle naabo mana hayyu Yuda keesati na hid'aani.
Hayyu Sedekiati achiti na hid'e, waan nani jed'e, Atini maafi AABBO Waaqati akana jed'e jette dubbi akana tana fadda? Anati dira kana harka hayyu Babiloniti kenne, inni isa dabsate
hayyu Sedekiale bahu d'owa. Isa qabani harka hayyu Babiloniti kennani, duuba inni isa dura d'ufe afaanuma ufiitini isaani dubbata.
Ammalle Sedekia lafa Babiloni geesani, haga anini waan fed'u isa tolchuti inni achuma taa. Yo inni worra Babiloni had'ele indabsatu. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e,
Hanamelini ilmi abuyya kanke Shalamu, siti d'ufe waan siini jed'u, oobru tiyya ta Anathothi jirtu bitad'i, miilooni tiyya aantini ta bitachuu malte sii.
Jennaani akuma AABBO Waaqi nani jed'e, oboleesi kiyya Hanameli naabo suni keesati nati d'ufe waan nani jed'e, Oobru tiyya ta Anathothi, ta lafa Benjamini keesa jirtu, bitad'i. Miilooni tiyya aantini ta bitachuu malte sii. Duuba akasiini anini aka AABBO Waaqi nani dubbate hubad'e.
Jennaani anini oobru Anathothi jirtu taani Hanameli iraa bite, beese hede kenneefi; gatini isii qarsi kud'ani torba taate.
Duuba anini tatabe bitanini maqa kiyya irati t'aafad'e d'uga iti yaamad'e beesisa ira keeyad'e beese taani hede kenneefi.
Jennaani anini tatabe lamaani bitanini taani, ta aadaafi seera bitii irati t'aafani beesisa ira kayanifi ta beesisa inqamne fuud'e,
Baruku, ilma Neria, ka ilma Maaseyati kenne, ka Hanamelifi jari tatabe suni beesisa ira keeyatefi jara Yahudi ka achi keesa tau achi jiru.
Jara suni ch'ufa durati anini waan Barukuni jed'e,
AABBO Waaqi guddaani Israeli, waan siini jed'u: Tatabe tana ta beesisa ira kayaanifi ta beesisa inqamnele fuud'i, aka isiini inhamanne ganna heddu teetu okote faara ke kai.
AABBO Waaqi, guddaani Israeli, waan jed'u: Lafa tana keesati nami deebie maneenifi oobrufi oobru zabibu bitata.
Eegi anini tatabe oobruuni bitani Baruku kenne, anini Waaqa kad'ad'e waan jed'e,
Ee AABBO Waaqa gudda, atini irreefi jabeenna kanke guddaani lafafi gubba mid'aasite. Wonti atini indandeenne tokoleeni injirtu.
Atini nama kunki kunki jaalala garsiifte, ammo maro ch'ubbu abbooti isiitiifi ijoolle gaargalchita. Atini Waaqa guddaa, ka guddo jabeenna qabu: Waaqi guddayaani si.
Atini heregaafi mala jaba qabda, waan jabdule siumati tolcha; atini waan nami tolchu ch'ufa agarte huji isaa gula woi kennitaafi.
Atini duri lafa Misiri keesati waan mamatiifi akheekha woi tolchite, ammalle haga arrale Israelifi gosa d'ibi keesati waan akana kana tolchite, akasiini gurra baafate.
Waan mamatiifi akheekha woitini nyaapa keenna mudamsiifte, jabeennafi irre teetiini gumi tante ta Israeli lafa Misiri keesaa baafte.
Atini lafa aananifi dammi aka lola yau tana worraa kennite, akuma atini duri ababoota worrati kakhate.
Ammo gaafa worri lafa tana seene fud'ate, worri seera kanke inguunne yokhaani barsiisa tante gula iyyaane; waan atini Tolcha jetteeni tokole worri intolchine. Duuba akanaani atini badii tana worra kanatini d'ufte.
Worri Babiloni boola qote dira kana marse had'uu jira. Maro woraanafi beelafi d'ukubatifi diri kunini harka worraa kanati mara. Atini aka wonti ati duri jette guutamte ingarta.
Ammo, ee AABBO Waaqa gudda, nami oobru suni gumi durati bitad'i nani jed'e sii, ka ufiftu dira kana diquma worri Babiloni inqabini.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e,
Anini AABBO, Waaqa nama ch'ufati. Wonti tokoleeni ka anini tolchu indandeenne injirtu.
Anini dira kana harka hayyu Babiloni ka Nebukadreza jed'anitifi duula isaati kenna. Worri dira kana dabsate,
ibida iti kaye maneeni nami gubba isaati hit'aana Baali aarse, daad'i waaqa d'ibi d'ibaayu baasani akasiini na dallansisanile guba.
Haguma duriti worri Israelitiifi ka Yudaleeni waan tolchani ch'ufaani ya garaa na yake na dallansiise.
Nami dira kana haguma gaafa duri isa jaaraniti haga arrale yayu na hiifachise na dallansiise. Tanaafi
maro worra Yudatifi ka Yerusalemutifi hayyootafi jaaroleefi qaaloleefi raagooti worraa hameenna tolchiteefi, anini dira suni fuula kiyya duraa balleesu fed'a.
Worri dudda nati garagale, ammalle ato anini guyya ch'ufa barsiisele, worri na ch'aqase woma naraa imbaranne.
Worri waan hamtu harkaani boch'ani kad'ate mana maqa kiyyaani jaarani keesa kaye, akasiini t'ureese.
Ammalle Bale Hinomu keesa fulla sorio iti qalani Baalii jaarani ilmaani isani waaqa Moleki jed'ani sorio baasani. Anini, waan kana tolcha worrani injenne, yokhaani aka worri waan akana kana tolche worra Yuda ch'ubbu keesa buusu diqole inherenne.
AABBO, Waaqi Israeli, waan nani jed'e Yeremia, Biyyiti waan jettu, woraanafi beelafi d'ukubati dira kana harka hayyu Babiloniti marsa. Amma dubbi d'ibi anini jed'u ch'aqasi.
Anini worra ch'ufa lafa anini dallansu tiyyaani worra iti firfirse keesaa wolti guure fulla tanati deebise nagayaani teesisa.
Duuba worri gumi tiyya tahe aninileeni Waaqa worraa taha.
Anini herega toko ch'alla worraa kenne: aka hojja ch'ufa dansuma ufitifi ta ilmaani isaaniti jed'ani na sodaatani.
Anini wold'aqisa jiru jireenna worra woliini tolfad'a. Waan dansa worraa tolchu illakisu, ammalle ufi sodaachisa, aka worri garaa tokooni na gula yae haga jiru naraa ingorre.
Anini waan dansa worraa tolche, lafa tana keesati garaa tokooni teeso dansa worraa kenne huji sunile iraa gammada.
Akuma anini badii worra kanatini d'ufe, akasuma waan dansa worraa kakhad'e ch'ufa kennaafi.
Biyyiti, lafti tunini lafa aloo ta namaafi bineensi keesa inteenne taate, worra gosa Babiloniti kennani jetti. Ammo lafa tana keesati deebiani oobru bitatani.
Biyyiti oobru bitate, hojja bitani suni tatabe bitani d'uga durati t'aafani beesisa ira kayani. Wonti kunini lafa Benjaminitifi ollowaani d'aatu Yerusalemutifi dira Yudatifi dira lafa gaareenitifi lafa golbootifi lafa Yuda ta bitale ch'ufa keesati taati. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.

Ato anini ammalle hid'aansa naabo kaani keesa jiru, ammalle AABBO Waaqi naani dubbate.
AABBO Waaqi ka lafa uume mid'aase jabeese, ka maqaani isaa AABBO Waaqa, waan nani jed'e,
Na yaami si, jalaa owaad'a, duuba waan mama dansa ka atini waan isii imbeenne siti hima.
Anini, AABBO Waaqi Israeli, waan jed'u, maneeni Yerusalemutifi mana hayyu ka Yudale imballeesani. Yo nami bahe worra Babiloni ka biyye tuule dira kanaani marse had'ele hujiini sunini woma imbaatu. Ammo wonti isiini d'uftuni, reefuma nama anini dallansu tiyya keesa hobaase, ka dira kana keesa guute ch'alla. Anini yayu dira kana fuula iraa deefad'e, maro nami isa keesa tau waan hamtu tolcheefi.
Ammo anini dira kanafi nama isa keesa tau, d'ukuba iraa d'owe fayya kenneefi nagayafi hormaatale kennafi.
Anini worra Yudatifi ka Israeli eebise, finna duri worri keesa jiruti deebisa.
Anini ch'ubbu worri duri nati ch'ubbame ch'ufa iraa qulqulleese, wollaala worri na dide keesa seene ch'ufa araaramaafi.
Diri kunini gammadafi ulfinnaafi gurraani naa d'ufa; ammalle gochiti ch'ufti sodaate mudamti, hojja waan dansa anini worra Yerusalemuti tolcheefi hormaata anini dira sunitini d'ufu d'ageetu.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Biyyiti waan jettu, fullaani tunini lafa aloo ta namafi saa inqamne fakaati. Worri d'uga dubbate; diri Yudatifi karaani Yerusalemuleeni duwa, namaafi saaileeni keesa injiru. Ammo fulla tanati, ammalle
qonqo gammadaatifi ta qilit'amatifi qonqo gammada ta guyya fuud'a, d'agayani. Qonqo nama waan galata baasani Mana kiyyaani d'ufe sirbule d'agayani. Worri waan jed'u, AABBO Waaqa gudda galata deebisa, inni dansa, jaalalti isaaleeni haga jiru jireenna teeti. Anini lafa tana eebise finna duri isiini qabdu kaani deebisaafi. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u, lafa aloo fakaatu ta namaafi saa inqamne tana keesa takaa tana marri dansaani iti bahe, tissituuni achiti hori tissiti.
Diri lafa gaareenitifi ka lafa golbootifi ka lafa bitaa ta Yudatifi ka lafa Benjaminitifi ollowaani d'aatu Yerusalemutifi dira Yuda keesale, tissituuni akuma duri deebite ree tohati. Nami dubbi tana jed'e, ana AABBO Waaqa.
Gaafasi anini d'aloota Daudi keesa nama d'ugaa toko fohad'e, hayyu tolcha. Inni waan d'ugaatifi ka qajeela lafa suni keesati tolcha.
Worra Yudatifi ka Yerusalemu lubbu baasani nagayaani teesisani. Dira sunile maqa iti baasani, AABBO Waaqi D'uga teenna jed'ani.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Nama d'aloota Daudi, ka hayyu Israeli tahu ind'abani,
ammalle qaalole gosa Lawi ta naa hojate, sorio gubanifi mid'aani Waaqa baasanifi sorio d'ibile baaftu ind'abani.
AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e,
Anini yayu halkanifi guyyale wold'aqisa woliini tolfad'e, aka worri hojja ch'ufa hojuma malte gula d'ufu; wold'aqisa suni dandaani inch'absani.
Akasuma anini hojattu tiyya Daudi wold'aqisa woliini tolfad'e, aka d'aloota isaa keesaa nama hayyu tahu ind'amne. Ammalle anini qaalole gosa Lawi wold'aqisa woliini tolfad'e, aka isiini hojja ch'ufa; naa hojatu; wold'aqisa suni lachu dandaani inch'absani.
Anini d'aloota hojattu tiyya Dauditifi qaalole gosa Lawi daraarse lafa ira dabarsa duuba akanaani worri lafa ira dabre, akuma urji gubbatiifi maansa afaani galaanale dandaani inhenne worrale akasuma dandaani inhenne.
AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e,
Atini biyyiti teete, AABBO Waaqi Israelifi Yuda, worra lamaani inni fohate ya lakise jettu ind'ageenne? Tanaafi worri gumi tiyya tufate, gosati worra heregu dide.
Ammo anini, AABBO Waaqi, yayu halkanifi guyyale wold'aqisa woliini tolfad'e seera lafafi gubbaani gula deemtule tolche.
Duuba akuma anini waan kana tolche, akasuma anini wold'aqisa kiyya, ka anini d'aloota Yakobotiifi hojattu tiyya Daudi woliini tolfad'e jabeesa. Anini d'aloota Daudi keesaa nama toko, ka d'aloota Abrahamutifi Isaaqofi Yakobo fidu fohad'a. Anini gumi tiyyaa nahe, worrileeni deebie wo horata.

Wonti AABBO Waaqi Israeli jed'e tana: Gara Sedekia hayyu Yuda, d'aqi waan jettuuni, AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u: Anini dira kana harka hayyu Babiloniti kenne, duuba inni gube balleesa.
Atinileeni duraa imbaatu; si qabani, harka isaati si keennani. Atini iluma teetiini hayyu Babiloni agarte inni afaanuma ufitini siini dubbata; duuba lafa Babiloni deemta.
Sedekia, waan anini siini jed'u ch'aqasi. Atini woraana keesati indootu,
ammo kama nagaya qabdu doota. Ammalle biyyiti akuma gaafa ababoota tante ta si durati hayyu taate, awaalte hit'aana aarsitefi akasuma sile hit'aana aarsani. Duuba hayyuuni keenna ya due jed'ani sii bohani. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Jennaani anini d'aamsa kana hayyu Sedekia ka Yerusalemu jiruti hime,
ka duuli hayyu Babiloni dira suni had'uu jiru. Duuli sunini Lakishifi Azekale had'uu jira. Dira jabeesani jaarani, ka Yuda keesati hafe, dira lamaani suni ch'alla.
Hayyu Sedekiafi worri Yerusalemuleeni wold'agani, aka
nami ch'ufti tisse ufi ta gosa Ebrania, ta d'iiratifi ta uwale, gad'iisu, aka nami tokoleeni nama gosa Israeli tisse tolfate manati ingalfanne.
Gumi ch'ufafi jaaroleeni ee jette, aka tisse ufi gad'iisani, deebiani tisse intolfanne. Worra akasuma gad'iisani,
ammo eege garagalani tisse suni deefatani irreeni hojachiifatini.
Jennaani AABBO,
Waaqi Israeli waan nani jed'e, Waan atini gumi tanaani jettu: gaafa anini ababoota teesani lafa Misiri keesaa baase tissooma keesaa galakise, anini wold'aqisa worra woliini tolfad'e. Anini waan worraani jed'e,
Eegi ganni torba dabre ch'ufa nama gosa teesani ka Ebrania, ka isaniti gurgurani, ka ganna jaa isani hojate, galakisa. Ammo ababooti teesani na ch'aqasu didde dubbi anini jed'eenile na jalaa qabu dide.
D'iuma tana isani waan na gammachiisa tolchitani, isaniini ch'ufti ee jettani, aka nama gosa teesani ch'ufa galakiftani. Ammalle isani mana kiyya ka keesati na kad'atani keesati wold'aqisa na durati tolfatani.
Ammo eegi suni isani ammalle garagaltani na ch'eersitani. Isaniini ch'ufti tissele isani ga d'iiftani taani deefatani irreeni hojachiiftani.
Tanaafi wonti amma AABBO Waaqi jed'u tana: Isani yayu seera kiyya ch'absitani; isani nama gosa teesani balchuma kennuufi diddani. Hayye hataatu, aninileeni balchooma isanii kenna: balchoomi kunini ka woraanafi beelafi d'ukubaani isani hobaasu. Gochiti lafa keesa jirtu ch'ufti, yo waan anini isani tolchu agartu, irifati.
Jaaroleeni Yudatifi ta Yerusalemutifi qaaloleefi jari worraa gugurdaani ch'ufti wold'aqisa na woliini tolfatani, korma looni ka worri gargari falaanse jiddu keesa yaani. Ammo worri wold'aqisa suni ch'abse, seera isaa jabeesu dide. Tanaafi anini worra kana waan worri sunini korma suni tolche tolcha.
Anini worra harka nyaapa isaani, ka worra ijeesu fed'uti kenne, reefi worraa sagale allaatitifi ta bineensa ala taha.
Ammalle anini Sedekia hayyu Yudatifi hojattu isaale nyaapa isaani ka worra ijeesu fed'uti kenna. Anini worra suni harka duula hayyu Babiloni, ka amma had'iisa keesani lakiseti kenna.
Anini qonqo iti erge, duuba worri dira kanati deebie, dabsate gube balleesa. Anini dira Yuda ch'ufa balleese lafa aloo ta nami keesa injirre tolcha. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.

Gara worra gosa Rekabu d'aqi waan jettuuni, koota, Mana Waaqa keesa mana d'aatu toko duuda, daad'i d'uga.
Duuba anini Yaazania, ilma Yeremia, ka ilma Habaseniatifi oboleyaanifi ilmaani isa ch'ufa, (worra gosa Rekabu ch'ufa) fuud'e,
Mana Waaqatini d'ufe, fulla jari raaga Hanani, ka ilma Igdalia, jiru geese. Fullaani sunini fulla Maaseyaani, ilmi Shaluma, ka Mana Waaqa keesa huji jabdu qabu, iti galu d'aatu jirti, ammalle isiini d'aatu fulla hojattuuni d'ibiini iti galtu.
Jennaani anini muduunufi qori ta daad'iini miju worra Rekabu dura kaye, Daad'i d'uga jed'eeni.
Ammo worri waan nani jed'e, Nu daad'i ind'unnu. Ababooni keenna Yonadabuni ilmi Rekabu, nu gorse waan nuni jed'e, isanifi d'alooti keesanileeni daad'i ind'ugina.
Ammalle mana injaaratina, oobru mid'aanitifi ta zabibu inqotatina, yokhaani imbitatinale; waan akana kana tokole intolfatina, waaro keesa qubad'a. Duuba akasiini lafa keesa gogodaantani tana keesati turtani.
Nu dubbi Yonadabuni, ilmi Rekabu, nuni gorse ch'ufa ya guunne. Nu ufi daad'i ind'unnu, nad'eeni teennafi ilmaani teennaleeni ind'uddu.
Nu mana injaaranu ammo waaro keesa teenna; ammalle oobru zabibutifi ta mid'aanile inhorannu. Nu waan ababooni keenna Yonadabuni nu seera ch'ufa ya guunne.
Ammo gaafa Nebukadrezani, hayyuuni Babiloni lafa teenna had'u d'ufe, nu waan jenne, koota, Yerusalemu yaana, aka duula Babilonitifi ka worra Shamu duraa baanu. Duuba nu akasiini Yerusalemuti hamne.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi guddaani Israeli, waan nani jed'e, wonti anini siini jed'u tana: Kai, gara worra Yudatifi ka Yerusalemu d'aqi waan jettuuni, Isani woma imbarattani ka dubbi tiyya gula deemu diddani.
Nami Yonadabuni d'ale yayu dubbi isaa guute daad'i d'ugu dide haga arrale worri nami tokoleeni ka daad'i d'ugu injiru. Anini yayu guyya ch'ufa isani gorse ammo isani na inch'aqamne.
Anini maro heddu raagoota hojattu tiyya isaniti erge worrileeni isani gorse waan jed'e, Isani nami ch'ufti hameenna lakisa, waan d'uga gula yaa. Waaqa d'ibi gula yaatani inhojatinafi. Duuba yo suni, lafa anini ababoota teesani kenne nagayaani keesa teetani. Ammo isani dubbi tiyya ind'ageenne yokhaani na jalaa inqamne.
Nami Yonadabuni d'ale yayu dubbi ababo worraa gula yae, ammo isani dubbi tiyya gula yau diddani.
Tanaafi amma tana, anini AABBO Waaqi, guddaani Israeli, waan jed'u: ch'aqasa, anini worra Yudatifi nama Yerusalemu keesa tau ch'ufa badii anini hime ch'ufa worratiini d'ufa. Anini qara isani gorse ammo d'agayu diddani, isani yaame ammo owaachu diddani.
Jennaani anini waan worra gosa Rekabutini jed'e AABBO Waaqi, guddaani Israeli, qara waan isaniini jed'e, Isani gorsa ababooni keesani Yonadabuni isaniini gorse guutani dubbi isa gula yaatani waan inni isani seere ch'ufa ya jabeesitani.
Tanaafi wonti AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'u tana: Yonadabuni, ilmi Rekabu, d'aloota isaa keesa nama d'iira ka na hojatu ind'abu.

Woraqata fuud'i, waan Israelitiifi ka Yudatifi ka gosa d'ibi ch'ufa, ka anini siti hime, irati t'aafi. Yo t'aaftu, waan anini qara gaafa duri, ka Yosiani lafa mohateti asi haga arra siini jed'e, ch'ufa, irati t'aafi.
Hegeri hojja worri Yuda badi anini itiini d'ufu fed'u d'agaye, worri hameenna isaani iraa deebiafa. Duuba anini dabaafi ch'ubbu isaani inaraaramafi.
Jennaani Baruku ilma Neria yaame, waan AABBO Waaqi nani jed'e, ch'ufa iti hime, jennaani Barukuni woraqata irati t'aafe.
Duuba anini waan Barukuni jed'e, anini dandae Mana Waaqa indeemu, ya na d'owani.
Ammo guyya worri ufi agabsu achi d'aqi, dubbi AABBO Waaqi nani jed'e, ta atini woraqatati t'aafte, biyyaa soomi. Nama Yuda, ka dira isaani keesaa d'ufe, ch'ufaa soomi.
Hegeri worri AABBO Waaqa kad'ate hameenna duri iraa deebiafa, wonti akanatiifi AABBO Waaqi yayu worra kana aka male iti dallane.
Jennaani Barukuni dubbi AABBO Waaqi jed'e taani, akuma anini iti hime kaani, Mana Waaqa keesati soome.
Jia sagaleeso, ka ganna shaneeso, ka Yehoiakimuni lafa Yuda mohate keesa, biyyiti AABBO Waaqaa jette ufi agabsite. Nami ufi agabse sunini worra Yerusalemu keesa taufi worra dira Yuda keesaa d'ufe.
Duuba ato nami ch'ufti tae ch'aqasu, Barukuni dubbi anini jed'e taani woraqata iraa soome. Inni hojja woraqata suni biyyaa soomu fulla mana Gemaria ilmi Shafani, ka tatabe t'aafu iti galu, ka d'aatu Mana Waaqa jiru jira. Mani inni iti galu sunini naabo oli keesa jira, d'aatu Fullo Hareeti Mana Waaqatini seenani.
Mikayaani, ilmi Gemaria, ka ilma Shafani, waan AABBO Waaqi jed'e, ka woraqata suni keesati t'aafani, d'agaye.
Duuba kae mana hayyu, fulla nami woi t'aafu tau, ka hojattuuni ch'ufti arti jirtu, d'aqe. Jari hojattu suni ka arti jiru kana: Elishama, ka tatabe t'aafu, Delaya ilma Shemaya, Elnathani, ilma Akbori, Gemeri, ilma Shafani, Sedekia, ilma Hanania, ammalle hojattu taani d'ibi ch'ufale.
Mikayaani waan Barukuni biyyaa soome d'ageennaani, jara suniti hime.
Jennaani jari hojattu sunini Yehudi, ilma Nethania, ka ilma Shelemia, ka ilma Kushi, Barukuti erge waan jed'e, Woraqata atini biyyaa soomte fuud'i kootiini. Jennaani Barukuni woraqata kaani fuud'e d'ufeeni.
Worri waan jed'eeni, Tai, nuu soomi. Duuba Barukuni tae worraa soome.
Worri dubbi suni d'ageennaani sodaate, woli mimilate waan Barukuni jed'e, Nuu waan kana hayyuti himu male.
Jennaani worri isaa gaafate waan jed'eeni, Waan kana ch'ufa eenu iraa d'ageete t'aafte? Yeremiati siti hime?
Barukuni waan jed'eeni, Ee, inni dubbi tana ch'ufa nati hime jennaani anini kalamu wino fuud'e woraqata kana irati t'aafe.
Duuba worri waan isani jed'e, siifi Yeremiani beena, d'okhad'a. Nami tokoleeni fulla isani jirtani imbeekhini.
Jari hojattu kaani woraqata fuud'e, mana Elishama namicha tatabe t'aafu keesa kaye, gara naabo hayyu d'aqani waan ch'ufa hayyuti himani.
Jennaani hayyichi Yehudi erge, beeni, woraqata suni fuud'i jed'eeni. Inni mana Elishama keesaa fuud'e, hayyufi hojattu d'aatu isaa jirtu ch'ufaa soome.
Gaafasi adolesa, hayyuleeni mana ufi keesa tae ibida qanqamata.
Akuma Yehudini dubbi lamafi sadi soome hobaasuni hayyichi haaduni ch'ire ibida keesa buusa. Akasiini woraqata ch'ufa gube hobaase.
Ammo hayyichaafi hojattuuni isaa, ta waan kana d'ageeteleeni, nami tokoleeni insodaanne yokhaani woya tarsaase laalala ingarsiimne.
Ato Elnathanifi Delayaafi Gemariani hayyichaani woraqata ingubini jed'ani kad'atanile inni worra inch'aqamne.
Jennaani hayyichi ilma isaa Yeremaeelifi Seraya ilma Azrielitifi Shelemia, ilma Adbeeli, yaame, Yeremiafi Baruku ka tatabe t'aafu qaba jed'e. Ammo AABBO Waaqi worra d'osse.
Hayyichi woraqata anini Barukuni T'aafi jed'e gube jennaani AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e:
Woraqata d'ibi fuud'i, dubbi woraqata qara, ka hayyuuni gube taani irati t'aafte, irati t'aafi.
Ammalle waan atini Yehoiakimu hayyu Yudatini jettu, AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u: Atini woraqata suni gubde waan jette, Yeremia, atini maafi, Hayyuuni Babiloni d'ufe, lafa tana balleese, namaafi saale hobaasa jette dubbi suni irati t'aafta?
Duuba amma tana waan kanke ka AABBO Waaqi jed'u d'agayi: Nami d'aloota keeti barch'uma hayyuma ka Daudi haga jiru ira intau. Reefa kanke gatani, guyya aduuni gubde, halkani qabanti balleesiti.
Anini siifi ilmaani teetifi ammalle hojattu tante, maro ch'ubbu isaniini ch'ufti hojattanifi garagalcha, Si taanaani, worra Yerusalemu taanaani, worra Yuda taanaani, nami tokoleeni gorsa kiyya inch'aqamna, tanaafi anini badii waan isii hime taani isaniitini d'ufa.
Jennaani anini woraqata d'ibi fuud'e, namicha Baruku jed'ani ka tatabe naa t'aafuti kenne, inni dubbi anini iti hime ch'ufa t'aafe. Inni dubbi woraqata qara ka gubani kaanifi dubbi dubbi suni fakaatu, ta anini iti hime, ch'ufa t'aafe.

Ammo Sedekiafi hojattu isaatifi biyyiti d'ibileeni dubbi AABBO Waaqi nani jed'e inch'aqamne.
Hayyichi Sedekiani Yehukali ilma Shelemiatifi qaallicha Sefania, ilma Maaseya, nati erge waan nani jed'e, gosa teenna tana ch'ufaa jed'i, AABBO Waaqa keenna nuu kad'ad'i.
Angaafasi qara mana hid'aansa keesa na inkeenne, akuma fed'u biyya keesa deema.
Duuli Babiloni qara dira Yerusalemu marse achi taa; ammo aka duuli Farao Misiri bahe d'ageennaani kae biraa yae.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi Israeli, waan nani jed'e:
Waan atini Sedekia ka gara kiyya si ergeeni jettu, Duuli Farao, ka si qarqaara karaa jiru, lafa ufiti dachaa.
Duuba worri Babiloni dachae dira kana had'e dabsate, gube balleesa.
Wonti AABBO Waaqi jed'e tana: Worri Babiloni ya nu biraa yae jettani ufi insobina worri inuma dachaa.
Ato isani duula Babiloni ch'ufa dabsatani nama madae ch'alla waaro keesati hambiftanile worruma suniti kakae dira kana gube balleesa.
Duula Farao ka gad'ufuu jiru d'ageennaani duuli Babiloni Yerusalemu biraa yae.
Tanaafi anini Yerusalemu keesaa deemaa kae, aka lafa Benjamini d'aqe lafa worra keenna d'alaa kennani qooda kiyya fud'ad'u.
Anini Fullo Benjamini geennaani guddaani askarti, ka lafa eegu, ka Iriya, ilma Shelemia, ka ilma Hanania jed'ani, na qabe waan nani jed'e, Atini goli worra Babiloniti, tanaafi gara worra suni baqachuu jirta!
Anini waan jed'eeni, Askasiniti, anini gara worra Babiloni baqachuti injiru. Ammo Iriyaani na ch'aqasu dide, na qabe, gara jaarole na geese.
Worri aka male nati dallane, na d'aanani, mana Yonathani, ka tatabe t'aafu, ka mana isa mana hid'aansa tolchaniti na hid'ani.
Boola aka mana jirtuti na galchani, guyya heddu achi na bulchani.
Jennaani eegi suni hayyu Sedekiani na yaame, duuba mana hayyutini na d'ufani, hayyuuni kobati woi na gaafate waan jed'e, Dubbini gara Waaqati d'ufte jirti?
Anini Ee injirti, harka hayyu Babiloniti si kennani jed'eeni.
Duuba, anini waan jed'eeni siifi jara hojattu teeti kanafi gumi tana durati mali yakeefi hid'aansa keesa na keeta?
Raagooti tante, ta, hayyuuni Babiloni siifi lafa tante inhad'u siini jette, meeti?
Amma tana ee hayyicha, anini si kad'ad'a, na d'agayi, mana Yonathani, ka hid'aansa suniti na indeebisiini yo atini achiti na deebifte anini indua.
Jennaani hayyu Sedekiani, naabo mana hayyu keesati hid'a jed'e, achiti na hid'ani. Duuba anini achi tae, guyya ch'ufa qit'a toko fulla iti d'aabani fuud'ani naa kennani, haga qit'aani dira suni keesaa inhobaini.

Shefatia ilma Matanitifi, Gedalia ilma Pashuritifi Yukali ilma Shelemiatifi Pashuri ilmi Melikia waan anini biyyaani jed'u d'agayani, wonti anini biyyaani jed'e sunini tana:
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Nami dira kana keesati hafu, woraanafi yokhaani beelafi yokhaani d'ukubaani dua. Ammo nami d'ufe booju worra Babiloni kad'atu induu, Lubbu baha. Ammalle anini waan worraani jed'e,
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Anini dira kana harka worra Babiloniti kenne, worri dabsate qaba.
Jennaani jari hojattu kaani gara hayyu d'aqe waan jed'e, Namicha kana ijeesu malani, dubbini isaa tunini askarti dira keesati haftele garaa laafifti, ammalle nama d'ibi ka dira keesati hafele, akasuma garaa laafifti. Inni diqole nama qarqaaruti injiru, ammo balleesuu jira.
Jennaani hayyu Sedekiani waan jed'e, Hayye, waan feetani tolfad'a, anini isani ind'owu.
Duuba worri na fuud'e, haadaani eela Malkiya, ka ilma hayyu, ka naabo mana hayyu keesaa, keesa na buuse. Ammo eeli sunini d'oqe male bisaani inqabu, duuba anini d'oqe suni keesa lit'e.
Ammo namichi sangaani toko, ka Ebedmeleki jed'ani, ka gosa Kushi, ka mana hayyu keesa hojatu, aka worri eela keesa na buuse d'agaye. Hayyichi hojja suni tae fulla Fullo Benjaminiti dubbi qoruu jira.
Jennaani Ebedmelekini achi d'aqe waan hayyichaani jed'e,
Ee hayyicha, worri kunini ya waan hamtu tahe, raaga Yeremia dabse, eela keesa buuse. Maro sagaleeni dira kana keesa injirreefi inni amma garaachumani dua.
Jennaani hayyichi waan Ebedmelekini jed'e Nama sadii fuud'i, ato inni indoone Yeremia eela keesaa fuud'a.
Duuba Ebedmelekini jara suni fuud'e, mana miha keesati olkayani d'aqe, woya ch'ich'ite fuud'e, haadaani nati gabuuse.
Duuba inni waan nani jed'e, woya ch'ich'ite tana bobaa jala keeyad'i, aka haadi siirinne. Jennaani anini akuma inni nani jed'e, suni tolche,
worri eela suni keesaa hirkise na fuud'e. Duuba eegi suni naabo keesati na hid'ani.
Guyya d'ibi hayyichi Sedekiani na yaame, balbala sadeeso ta Mana Waaqatini seenani na geesani. Duuba inni waan nani jed'e, Wo si gaafad'a, waan tokole na ind'ossini, dubbi d'ugaa nati himi.
Anini waan jed'eeni, Yo anini d'uga dubbad'e atini na inijeeftu? Ato anini si gorsele atini na inch'aqaftu.
Jennaani hayyu Sedekiani d'ossaani nati kakhate waan jed'e, Anini maqa Waaqa nama uumetini kakhad'a, si inijeesu, yokhaani nama si ijeesule siti illakisu.
Jennaani anini waan Sedekiani jed'e, AABBO Waaqi, guddaani Israeli, waan jed'u, Yo atini askarti hayyu Babiloni booju kad'ate, lubbu tante baasani dira kanale gubu didani. Siifi worri kanketileeni inuma baha.
Ammo yo atini booju kad'achu didde, dira kana harka worra Babiloniti kennani worri gube balleesa, atinileeni harka worra jalaa imbaatu.
Ammo hayyichi waan nani jed'e, Anini gosa teenna ta qara worra Babiloniti harka kennate sodaad'a. Hegeri harka worra suniti na kennani na gaargalchani.
Anini waan jed'eeni, Harka worra suniti si inkennani, waan AABBO Waaqi fed'u guuti, duuba wonti ch'ufti sii tolte, lubbule si baasani.
Ammo yo atini booju kad'achu didde, AABBO Waaqi yayu waan si tolchani daayya keesa na garsiise.
Daayya suni keesa anini nad'eeni mana hayyu Yuda keesati hafte, ta hojattu hayyu Babiloniti geesani arge. Waan ato yau worri jed'e ch'aqasi: Jaalani hayyu, ta inni d'ugeefatte, ya isa sobde dabsate. Amma miili isaa ya d'oqe keesa bade, jaalani isaleeni ya biraa yaate.
Jennaani anini waan jed'eeni, Nad'eenifi ijoolle teetile worra Babiloniti geesani, atinileeni dandeete duraa imbaatu. Hayyichi Babiloni siqabe, dira kanale gubani balleesani.
Sedekiani waan nani jed'e, Haasaa keenna kana d'ossi, nama tokoleti inhimini, duuba woma si intolchani.
Yo jari hojattu tiyya kaani, aka nu wolhaasomne d'agaye hegeri worri d'ufe waan nu woliini jenne si gaafata. Hegeri worri waan siini jed'u, yo atini waan ch'ufa nuti himte si inijeemnu.
Duuba atini waan jettuuni, Anini hayyicha mana Yonathani ka nama iti hid'ani geesite achiti na inijeesiini jed'e kad'ad'e.
Jennaani jari hojattu kaani ch'ufti d'ufe woi na gaafate; aninileeni waan hayyuuni jed'i nani jed'e kaani akasuma iti hime. Wonti worri tahu d'ibiini injiru.
Duuba haga guyyaani dira Yerusalemu dabsatani qabani gahuti, achuma naabo mana hayyu keesati na lakisani.

Jia kud'anneeso, ka ganna sagaleeso ka Sedekiani lafa Yuda mohate hayyuuni Babiloni Nebukadrezani duula isaa ch'ufaani d'ufe, Yerusalemu had'e.
Guyya sagaleeso, ka jia afreeso ka ganna kud'ani tokeeso, ka Sedekiani lafa mohate, naabo dira ch'ach'absani.
(Gaafa Yerusalemu dabsatani qabani, hojattuuni gugurdoni hayyu Babiloni ch'ufti d'ufte, Fullo jidu diraa keesa teteette. Jara hojattu suni haga toko maqaani worraa kana: Nergal-Shareza, Sangar-Nebo, Sarsekimu, ammalle Nergal-Shareza d'ibi.)
Hayyu Sedekiafi askartini isaa ch'ufti waan tahe kana arginaani halkaniini dira keesaa baqachaa kaani. Worri kara oobru hayyu yae, Fullo naabo lamaani jiddu jirtu keesa dabre, qajeela bale Yordani baqate.
Ammo duuli Babiloni worra reebe, d'aatu Yerikoti diida keesati Sedekia qabe. Duuba hayyu Nebukadreza, ka dira Ribla lafa Hamathi, keesa jiruti geesani, achiti Nebukadrezani, isa qore waan tolchuu malani iti mure.
Ribla keesati inni ilmaani Sedekia, ka Sedekiani tae ilaalu, fit'e, jaarole gugurdo Yudale ch'ufa hobaase.
Duuba eege Sedekia ila lachu keesa baase, sansalatani hid'e aka lafa Babiloni geesani.
Worri Babiloni mana hayyutifi maneeni biyya gube, naabo Yerusalemu ch'ach'abse.
Duuba eege Nebusaradanini, ka abba duula, nama dira keesati hafe ch'ufa boojie, Babiloni geese, worra booju isa kad'ate woliini.
Lafa Yuda keesa inni nama hiyyeeyi woma inqamne hambise, oobru zabibutifi oobru mid'aani d'ibi kenneefi.
Hayyu Nebukadrezani Nebusaradani abba duula yaame waan jed'eeni, Nama ergi,
waan jettuuni Yeremia barbaada, jabeesa, qorqorad'a, woma intolchina, ammo waan inni fed'u ch'ufa tolchaafi.
Jennaani Nebusaradanifi jara gugurda, Nebushazabani jed'anifi, Nergal-Sharezafi, jari gugurdaani hojattu ka hayyu Babiloni ch'ufti
naabo mana hayyu keesaa na fuud'e. Duuba harka Gedalia, ilma Ahikamu, ka ilma Shafaniti na kennani, aka inni na jabeese na qorqorate worraani na gahu. Akanaani anini gosuma teenna keesa tae.
Ato anini ammalle naabo mana hayyu keesa fulla iti na hid'aani taani jiru, AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e,
Beeni, gara namicha gosa Kushi, ka Ebedmeleki jed'ani, d'aqi, waan jettuuni, AABBO Waaqi, guddaani Israeli, waan jed'u: Akuma anini duri jed'e anini dira kana eebaniti, badii itiini d'ufa. Gaafa wonti kunini taatu atini iluma teetiini garta.
Ammo anini, AABBO Waaqi, si qorqorad'a, harka worra atini sodaatuti, si inkennani.
Anini si baase woraanaani, duu si d'owa. Waan atini na d'ugeefateefi atini lubbu baata. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.

Eegi abbaani duula Nebusaradanini Ramati na gad'iise, AABBO Waaqi nani dubbate. Qara duri sansalatani na hid'aani, worra Yerusalemutifi ka Yuda ka boojiani Babiloni geesani kaani ch'ufa woliini achi na geesani.
Abbaani duula koba na yaame waan nani jed'e, AABBO Waaqi kanke duri lafa tana imballeesa jed'e,
duuba amma tana inni waan jed'e, suni ya guute. Wonti waan kana ch'ufa tolchanifi, waan worri gosa teesani AABBO Waaqati ch'ubbame, dubbi isaa ch'aqasu dideefi.
Ammo amma tana anini sansalata harka kanke iraa hiikhe si gad'iisuu jira yo atini lafa Babiloni na woliini deemu feete nu yaasi, anini si qorqorad'a. Ammo yo infeene ufira tai. Lafti ch'ufti ta si duraa mullatu tana, fulla feetu deemi.
Anini ch'allise ufumaa tae jennaani Nebusaradanini waan nani jed'e, Gedalia, ilma Ahikamu, ka ilma Shafani, ka hayyuuni Babiloni gudda dira Yuda tolchufa tolcheti deebii. Yo feete isa woliini biyya keesa taa, yokhaani fulla feetu deemi. Jennaani inni woreegaafi waan d'ibile ch'ufa naa kenne na gad'iise.
Anini gara Gedalia Mispa d'aqe, biyya achiti hafte woliini tae.
Jennaani Ishmaeli ilma Nethaniatifi Yohana ilma Kareatifi Seraya ilma Tanhumetatifi ilmaani Efai, ta worra Netofatifi Yezaniani ka worra Maaka, askarti isaani woliini gara Gedalia Mispa d'aqani.
Gedaliani kakhate waan worraani jed'e, Yo isani worra Babiloniti harka kennattani booju kad'atani woma intaatani. Lafa tanati qubad'a, hayyu Babiloniti hojad'a, wonti ch'ufti isanii tolti.
Anileeni Mispa keesa tae, hojja worri Babiloni d'ufu isanii dubbad'a. Ammo isani daad'ifi mid'aani mukhaatifi d'aad'a olikeyad'a, ollowaani isani iti qubatani tana keesa taa.
Duuba worri Israeli ka lafa Moabutifi lafa Amonitifi lafa Edomutifi lafa d'ibile keesa jiru, aka hayyuuni Babiloni worra Israeli ka gari lafa Yuda keesati hambise, Gedalia gudda worraa tolche, d'agaye.
Tanaafi worri lafa iti firfirsani taani keesaa deebie, lafa Yuda d'ufe gara, Gedalia ka Mispa jiru d'aqe, daad'ifi mid'aani mukha ka muumme inqamne galfate.
Eegi suni Yohananifi jari gugurdaani askarti ka booju inkad'atiini Gedalia ka Mispa jiruti d'ufani,
waan jed'aniini, Atini aka hayyuuni Amoni ka Baalisi jed'ani, Ishmaeli siti ijeecha erge imbeetu? Ammo Gedaliani jecha worra suni ind'ugeefanne.
Jennaani Yohanaani d'ossani isa yaame waan jed'eeni, Ani deeme, Ishmaeli ka nami tokoleeni quba inqamne ijeesa, na gad'iisi. Inni maafi si ijeese, Yahudi fulla tante jirtu ch'ufa gargari firfirse worra Yuda ka hafe hobaasa?
Ammo Gedaliani waan jed'eeni, Lakisi, akasi intolchini, wonti Ishmaeli ka atini jettu d'ugaaniti!

Ishmaelifi jari kud'annaani isa woliini jiru kaani goraade guuratani Gedalia ijeesani.
Ammalle Ishmaelini worra Yahudi ka Gedalia woliini Mispa jirufi askarti Babiloni ta achi jirtule hobaase.
Boriyyaate, ato nami tokoleeni aka Gedalia ijeesani ind'agayini,
nami saddeetama Shekemufi Shilofi Samariaa bahe Mispa d'ufe. Worri areeda haadate woya ufi tatarsaase, ufi mamadeese, mid'aanifi hit'aana fuud'e, mana Waaqa geesu jira.
Jennaani Ishmaeli ka bohaa deemu, Mispaa bahe, worra fuula keesa deeme. Worra fuula keesa d'ufe jennaani waan jed'eeni, D'iiro, koota olduuda Gedalia arga.
Akuma worri dira duudeeni, Ishmaelifi jari isaa worra hobaase reefa worraa eela guure.
Ammo worra suni keesa nami kud'ani waan Ishmaelini jed'e, Aabbo nu inhobaasini, nu dargayefi garbuufi d'ad'afi damma yayu oobru keesati d'ossine. Tanaafi inni worra, worra kaani woliini inhobaamne, lubbu baase.
Eeli Ishmaelini reefa worra hobaase suni iti guure eela gudda toko, ka duri hayyu Asani qot'e, gaafa hayyuuni Israeli, ka Baasha jed'ani, isa had'uu jiru. Ishmaelini eela suni reefa worra sunitini guute.
