Duuba inni dubra hayyu ch'ufafi nama Mispa keesa jiru ch'ufa, ka Nebusaradanini, abbaani duula, harka Gedaliati lakise, boojie. Worra boojie jennaani Ishmaelini kae, gara lafa Amoni iti d'aabate.
Yohananifi jari gugurda askarti ka isa woliini jiru ch'ufti ch'ubbu Ishmaelini tolche d'ageennaani,
jara ufi fud'ate, faana iti d'aabate, haro Gibeoniti d'aqabe.
Worri Ishmaelini boojie kaani Yohananifi jara gugurda askarti, ka isa woliini jirule, arginaani gammade,
garagale fuula keesa orie.
Ammo Ishmaelifi jari isaa, nami saddeeti, Yohanaani duraa baqate lafa Amonitini bahe.
Jennaani Yohananifi jari gugurdaa askarti, ka isa woliini jiru, worra Ishmaelini Mispa keesaa boojie, eegi Gedalia ijeese, fuud'e itiini d'aabate — askartifa, nad'eenifa, ijoollefa, jara sasangisiisani mana hayyu keesa hojatu fa.
Worri waan Ishmaelini, Gedalia ka hayyichi Babiloni gudda lafa suni tolche ijeesefi, worra Babiloni sodaate. Tanaafi kaani gara lafa Misiri iti d'aabatani, aka akasiini worra Babiloni duraa bahani. Duuba karati dira Kimhamu, ka d'aatu Bethlehemuti, miila d'aabatani.

Jennaani jari gugurdaani askarti ch'ufti Yoanani ilma Kareatifi Azaria ilma Heshayatifi nama diqaafi guddaale ch'ufa woliini d'ufani,
waan nani jed'ani, Aabbo, woi si kad'anna, waan suni nuu guuti! AABBO Waaqa keenna nu kad'ad'i, nuu nama hafe kana ch'ufaa jed'i, kad'ad'i. Nu duri nama heddu, ammo amma tana aka atini agarte kana nama diqa tokoti hafe.
AABBO Waaqa keenna nuu kad'ad'i, aka inni waan nu taanufi gara nu deemnu nuti himu.
Anini waan jed'eeni, Hayye, hataatuti; anini AABBO Waaqa keenna isanii kad'ad'a, akuma isani jettani; waan inni jed'u ch'ufa isaniti hima, tokole isani ind'ossu.
Jennaani worri waan nani jed'e, AABBO Waaqi ha nu balleesuti yo nu waan tahu male, ka AABBO Waaqi siti hime, tahu, dinne.
Yo isiini waan dansaafi hamtule taate, nu waan AABBO Waaqi keenna, ka iti si erginu, jed'u intolchina. Yo nu waan inni jed'u tolchinu wonti ch'ufti nuu tolti.
Eegi bulti kud'ani, AABBO Waaqi nani dubbate;
jennaani anini Yohananifi jara gugurda askarti, ka isa woliini jirufi jara kaani ch'ufa wolti yaame
waan jed'eeni, AABBO Waaqi, guddaani Israeli ka isani iti na ergitani waan jed'u,
Yo isani ka lafa tana keesa teetani taatani, anini isani imballeesu ammo isani jabeesa; anini aka mukha isani oobra, isani imbuqisu. Badiini anini isanitini d'ufu ya aka male garaa na yakite.
Hayyu Babiloni deebitani insodaatina, anini isani woliini jira, harka isaa keesaa isani baasa.
Maro anini naasu qabuufi, isa isanii naasise, lafa teesaniti isani deebisa. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Ammo isani ka lafa Yuda keesati haftani, AABBO Waaqa keesani diddani lafa tanale keesa tau indidina. Ammalle, hiyo nu lafa Misiri d'anne, achi fulla woraana ingarre, ka magalata womatu ind'ageenne, ka beelti womatu injirre, teenna injed'ina. Yo isani akasi jettani, AABBO Waaqi, guddaani Israeli, waan isaniini jed'u yo isani, Nu lafa Misiri d'anne achi teenna jettani,
woraani isani sodaatani isani qabate, beelti isani d'eetanileeni isani d'aqabde achuma lafa Misiri keesati hobaatani.
Nami lafa Misiri d'aqe achi qubachu fed'u ch'ufti yokhaani woraanaani dua, yokhaani beelaani dua, yokhaani d'ukubaani dua. Worri nami tokoleeni, ka badi anini worratiini d'ufu, iraa hafe duraa bahu injiru.
AABBO Waaqi Israeli waan jed'u, Akuma anini worra Yerusalemuti gugubad'e dallane, akasuma isanileti dallana, yo isani lafa Misiri d'at'ani. Nami yo isani argu, isani iraa rifate isani goyeese, maqa keesanini woli abaara; ammalle isani deebitani fulla tana ingartani.
Ammalle anini waan jed'e, Ee worra Yuda ka hafe, AABBO Waaqi waan isaniini jed'u, lafa Misiri ind'aqina. Aninileeni amma tana waan kana isaniti hima:
Isani guddo wollaala tolchuu jirtani. Isani waan nani jettani, AABBO Waaqa keenna nu kad'ad'a; waan inni jed'u ch'ufa nuti himi inguunna.
Anini arra ya isaniti hime, ammo isani waan AABBO Waaqi, Beeni worra kanati himi naani jed'e, ch'ufa guutu diddani.
Tanaafi waan kana qaabad'a: Lafa isani iti qubachu feetani keesati woraanafi yokhaani beelafi yokhaani d'ukubaani raawattani.

Anini dubbi AABBO Waaqi isaani, worrati himi nani jed'e, buufannani
Azaria, ilma Hoshayatifi Yohanaani, ilma Kereatifi jari kikiyyibaani kaanileeni ch'ufti, Atini d'ara dubbachuu jirta naani jed'e. AABBO Waaqi keenna si nuti inergine, inni lafa Misiriti ingodaanina injenne.
Ammo Baraku, ilma Neriati si nuti kaase, aka atini harka worra Babiloniti nu kennite, worri yokhaani nu ijeese yokhaani nu boojie lafa Babiloni nu geesu.
Tanaafi Yohananifi jara gugurda askartitifi yokhaani nami kaani ch'ufti jecha AABBO Waaqa, ka inni lafa Yuda keesa taa jed'eeni, ch'aqasu diddani.
Jennaani Yohananifi jari gugurdaani askarti ch'ufti, nama lafa Yuda keesati hafe fuud'ani, lafa Misiri geesani. Ammalle worra suni woliini worra lafa qara iti firfirsani keesaa gale,
d'iira taanaani, uwa taanaani ijoolle taanaani, dubra hayyule taanaani ch'ufa, achi geesani. Worri nama Nebusaradanini, namichi abba duula kaani, harka Gedaliati lakise, naafi Barukule, achi geese.
Worri dubbi AABBO Waaqa dide, akanaani kae lafa Misiri seene, dira Tahapenesitini bahe.
Achiti AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e,
D'akhaye gugurdo guuri ch'icha mana Faraoti d'ossii mid'aasi lafa naqi, ammo worri Israeli hagi toko ha huji suni arguuti.
Duuba waan jettuuni, AABBO Waaqi, guddaani Israeli, waan jed'u, Anini hojattu tiyya Nebukadreza hayyu Babiloni fulla taanaani d'ufe, inni barch'uma isaa d'akhaye atini arma nat'e tana gubba d'aabate, waaro hayyu gubbati jaara.
Inni d'ufe lafa Misiri had'e dabsata. Nami d'ukubaa qoodani d'ukubaani due, Nama booju qoodani boojiani ammalle nami duisa woraanati qoodani woraanaani dua.
Anini maneeni waaqoota Misiri gube, hayyuuni lafa Babilonileeni waaqoota worraa gube yokhaani boojia. Akuma tissituuni woya ufi injirani iraa guurte qulqulleesitu akasuma hayyuuni Babiloni lafa Misiri daara baase, qulqulleese, biraa deema.
Inni d'akhaye woyyu, ta old'ad'aabani, ta dira Heliopolisi keesa jirtu ch'ach'abse maneeni waaqoota worra Misiri gube balleesa.

AABBO Waaqi waan Yahudi lafa Misiri keesa jirtu ta dira Migdolitiifi ka Tahapenesitifi ka Nofu keesa teetufi ta lafa suni keesa bitaa teetule nati hime.
AABBO Waaqi, guddaani Israeli, waan jed'u, Isani badi hamtu anini Yerusalemufi dira Yuda ch'ufatini d'ufe ya agartani. Arrale diri sunini ona fakaata, nami tokoleeni keesa intau;
wonti akanatiifi worri dira suni waan hamtu tolche na dallansiise. Worri waaqoota d'ibi sorio baase, waaqoota isanifi ababooti teesani waan isii imbeenne, hojate.
Anini maro heddu raagoota hojattu tiyya isaniiti erge, ta waan hamtu anini jibbu tana intolchina isaniini jette.
Ammo isani dubbi suni inch'aqamne yokhaani inguunne. Ammalle aada hamtu waaqoota d'ibi sorio baaftanile lakisu diddani.
Tanaafi anini nama dira Yudatifi nama kara Yerusalemu gula yau ch'ufa iti dallane ibida iti tahe. Duuba dirafi karaani sunini bade ona tahe, haga arrale nami argu irruma rifata.
Tanaafi AABBO Waaqi, guddaani Israeli, waan jed'u, Isani maafi waan hamtu akana tana ufitini d'uftani d'iirafi nad'eenifi ijoolleefi daimale balleesitani, daara ufi d'owartani?
Isani maafi waan harkaani boch'ani kad'attani, lafa Misiri ta isani iti qubatani tana keesati waaqa d'ibi hit'aana aarsitani na dallansiiftani? Isani ufi balleesu feetanifi waan suni tolchitani? Aka nami lafa keesa jiru ch'ufti isani goyeese maqa keesanini woli abaaru.
Isani waan hamtu duri dira Yudatifi kara Yerusalemu keesaleti, hayyooti Yudatifi nad'eeni worraatifi isanifi nad'eeni teesanileeni tolchitani ya deetani?
Haga arrale isani waan suni illakimne yokhaani na inulfeesine, yokhaani seerafi aada tiyya, ta anini isanifi ababoota teesani kenne jabeesitani gula iyyaane.
Tanaafi AABBO Waaqi, guddaani Israeli, waan jed'u, Anini badi isanitini d'ufe, worra Yuda ch'ufa balleesu male intau.
Worri Yuda ka hafe, ka amma lafa Misiri d'aqe achi tau fed'u ch'ufa imballeesa. Worri sunini ch'ufti, diqaafi guddaleeni lafa Misiri keesati woraanafi yokhaani garaachani hobaa. Nami worra arge iraa rifate worra tufate maqa worratiini woli abaara.
Anini akuma worra Yerusalemu gaargalche akasuma worra lafa Misiri keesa jirule gaargalcha — woraanafi beelafi d'ukubaani.
Nami Yuda ka hafe ka amma d'ufe lafa Misiri tau, tokoleeni baqate duraa imbahu. Nami tokoleeni lafa Yuda, ta guddo iti deebiu fed'uti, indeebiu, nama tatake toko ka baqate male.
Jennaani nami d'iira, ka aka nad'eeni isaani waaqoota d'ibi hit'aana aarsitu beekhu, ammalle nad'eeni arti ejaanjitufi worri Israeli, ka lafa Misiri bitaa tauleeni ka gumiini sunini nama muumme inqamne waan nani jette,
Nu waan atini maqa AABBO Waaqatini nuni jette kana inch'aqamnu.
Nu waan, intolchina jenne kaani ch'ufa intolchina. Nu hit'aana waaqoota teenna hayyiti gubbati aarsine, daad'ile d'ibaayu baamnaafi, akuma nuufi ababoota teennafi hayyoota teennafi jaaroleeni teenna duri dira Yudatifi kara Yerusalemu keesati tolchine. Gaafasi nu guddo sagale qamna, horile guddo qamna, gaargali injiru.
Ammo haga nu hit'aana hayyiti gubbati aarsu lakimne, daad'ile d'ibaayu baasufi lakimne, ya wod'amne, ammalle nami keenna ya woraanafi beelaani hobae.
Ammalle nad'eeni suni waan jette, Gaafa nu qit'a hayyiti gubbaa fakeesine mid'aasine, hit'aana aarsineefi daad'i d'ibaayu baafneefi, d'iirsooti teennaleeni huji teenna imaachite.
Jennaani anini nama d'iiratifi ka uwa, ka akasi nani jed'e
waan jed'eeni, Hit'aana isanifi ababoota teesanifi jaaroleeni teesani aarsitanifi ka nami lafa sunileeni dira Yudatifi kara Yerusalemu keesaleti aarsele — isani waan AABBO Waaqi quba inqamne yokhaani waan inni ded'e seetani?
Guyyuma kana lafti teesani badde ona taate, nama keesaa d'abani. Isii, nami yo arge iraa rifate, maqa isiitiini woli abaara; wonti akanatiifi AABBO Waaqi hameennaafi ch'ubbu isani tolchitani tana ya obsu dad'abe.
Wonti badiini tunini isani qabateefi, waan isani waaqoota d'ibi hit'aana aarsitani, aadaafi seera AABBO Waaqa lakiftani, akasiini ch'ubbu ke buutani.
Jennaani anini waan nad'eeni sunifi nama ch'ufaani jed'e, Isani, worri Yuda, ka lafa Misiri keesa tau, dubbi AABBO Waaqa ch'aqasa.
Wonti AABBO Waaqi, guddaani Israeli, jed'u tana; isanifi nad'eeni teesanileeni kakhu jabdu hayyiti gubbati kakhatani waan jettaniini, Hit'aana sii aarsine, daad'i d'ibaayu sii baamna. Haga arraa isani kakhu suni ya guutani. Hayye, illakisina, guutuma guuta.
Ammo amma tana kakhu anini, AABBO Waaqi, maqa kiyya jabaani isani worra Yahudi, ka lafa Misiri keesa jirtuti kakhad'e ch'aqasa. Anini iti deebie ee injed'u, aka isani nami tokoleeni maqa kiyyaani kakhate, anini Waaqa jiruni kakhad'a injenne.
Anini hormaata isani d'owe, badiini isaniti d'ufa. Isani ch'ufti woraanaafi yokhaani d'ukubaani raawattani, nama tokole ka hafe d'abani.
Ammo isani nami takeeni iraa hafe lafa Misiri keesaa lafa Yudati deebia. Duuba akanaani jari hafe suni dubbi tiyyafi ta worra, ta d'ugaa taate, gargari beekha.
Anini, AABBO Waaqi, lafa tana keesati isani gaargalche; duuba akanaani aka dubbini, Anini isani balleese jed'e taani guutamtu beetani.
Anini hayyu Hofra jed'ani, ka lafa Misiri, harka nyaapa isaa ka isa ijeesu fed'uti kenna, akuma anini duri Sedekia hayyu Yuda harka nyaapa isaa Nebukadreza, hayyu Babiloni, ka isaa ijeesu fed'eti kenne.

AABBO, Waaqi Israeli, waan siini jed'u, Baruku,
Atini, anini ya ufi jibbaad'e! AABBO Waaqi yayu gaargala kiyya nati guddise na laalefachiise, anini ya ooa d'aqe ufi jibbad'e boqota inqabu ufiini jetta.
Ammo anini, AABBO Waaqi, waan jaare ch'ach'abse, waan oobrele buqisuu jira, waan kana anini lafa ch'ufa keesati tolcha.
Atini waan guddo barbaadachuu jirta? Imbarbaadatini. Anini badii nama ch'ufati d'ufuniti jira. Ammo atini fulla baatu ch'ufa lubbu teetiini inuma baata. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.

Tunini waan gosa d'ibii, ka AABBO Waaqi Yeremiati hime.
Misiri, waan askarti hayyu Misiri, ka Neko jed'ani, ka hayyuuni Babiloni, ka Nebukadreza jed'ani, Karkemeshi d'aatu galaana Fratiti dabsate, ganna afreeso ka Yehoiakimuni, ilmi Yosia, hayyu Yuda tahe. Inni akana jed'e:
Askartini Misiri lalabde waan jettu kurfefad'a,
wonte teesani guurad'a,
had'iisa d'aqe!
Fardoole teesani koora ira keeyad'a, yaabad'a!
Kofia teesani ta sibiila naqad'a,
ch'orora ejaanja!
Woraana keesani qarad'a,
miiha keesani ka lola naqad'a!
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Wonti anini argu kunini maani?
Worri ya mudame baqate,
askarti worrale ya dabsatani;
worri akamale nahe,
haga dandau ch'ufa baqate,
ufira millachu dad'abe.
Nami qolchaleeni dandae duraa imbahu,
askartileeni infiiddu.
Mirgaa, gara galaana Fratiti,
worri gugufate jijiga.
Eenu kunini, ka aka galaana nile olbahe,
galaana afaani ufi ch'ufati fach'au fakaatu?
Inni Misiri, ka aka Nile olbahe,
galaana afaani ufi ch'ufati fach'au fakaatu.
Worri Misiri waan jed'e,
Nu kaane lafa ch'ufa qabanne
dirafi nama keesa taule ch'ufa balleesina.
Fardoole teesani gussa,
gaarile keesanini oria!
Askarti teesani erga:
Worra Kushitifi ka Libya ka wonte qabu,
worra Ludi, ka t'iyaani wohad'u beekhu.
Kunini guyya AABBO Waaqa guddaa,
ka inni haalo baafate,
nyaapa isaa balleesu.
Goraadeeni isaa worra nyaatte,
d'iiga worraa d'udde quufti.
Arra AABBO Waaqi guddaani
sorio mirga d'aatu galaana Fratiti qaqala.
Isani worri Misiri, Gileadi d'aqa,
qorsa barbaada!
Qorsi keesani ch'ufti ya woi isanii bahu dad'abe,
wonti isani fayyisa injirtu.
Gochiti hedduuni ya ch'eera keesani d'ageete,
nami ch'ufti yayu boha teesani d'agaye.
Askartini wolti gufatte woliini jijiddi.
Misirifi Migdolifi Nofufi Tahapenesi keesati dubbi tana lalaba:
Kurfefad'a, nyaapa ufiraa d'owa;
waan isani qabdani ch'ufa woraanati balleesa!
Waaqi keesani jabaani Apisi jed'ani,
maafi jige seetani?
AABBO Waaqati d'ae isa buuse!
Askartini teesani gugufatte jijidde
waan woliini jette,
Hurrisa, nu yaasa,
worra keennati nu galcha,
aka woraana nyaapaa jalaa baanu.
Hayyu Misiri maqa d'ibi baasafi:
kiyyibaa iyyaa deemu, ka qoomni ufi balleesu.
Anini, AABBO Waaqi guddaani,
hayyu, Waaqa jiru.
Akuma gaari Tabori, gaareeni ch'ufa iraa d'eerate,
gaari Karmeli galaana ch'ufa iraani mullatu,
akasuma nami isani had'u nama irre qabu taha.
Isani worri Misiri,
aka isani boojiani kurfefad'a,
miiha wolti hid'ad'a?
Dira Nofu balleesani,
ona nami keesa inteenne tolchani.
Misiriini goromsa looni mid'aaga
sorondisi mirgaa d'ufe nyaatu fakaati.
Askartini worri beeseeni bitateleeni
yabbiye gagabbo fakaati.
Worri nyaapa dura eje inhaane,
ammo dudda iti gale baqate.
Guyyaani badi worraa ya d'ufe,
ka worra balleesani.
Worri Misiri akuma bofaa lohe baqata,
yo duuli nyaapaa worrati d'iaatu.
Worri akuma nami badda guddo
d'agaraani ch'ire balleesu,
worra ch'ire balleesa.
Worri nama heddu, ka henna inqamne,
ka tuuta awaanisale ira jiru.
Worra Misiri ya ch'eersani;
worri mirgaa d'ufeti had'e worra dabsate.
Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
AABBO Waaqi guddaani, Waaqi Israeli, waan jed'u, Anini Amoni, waaqa Thebesitifi Misirifi waaqoota isiitiifi hayyoota isiile ch'ufa ingaargalcha. Anini hayyu Misiritiifi nama isa abdatu ch'ufa fuud'e,
harka nama worra fit'u fed'uti kenna — hayyu Babiloni ka Nebukadreza jed'anifi duula isaa. Ammo eege nami akuma duri kaani lafa Misiriti deebie keesa taa. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
worra Israeli, imudamina.
Anini lafa fago suni ta boojiani
iti isani geesani keesaa isani baasa.
Isani lafa teesaniti galtani,
nagayaani teetani,
ch'alleesumani teetani,
nami isani mudamsiisu injiru.
Anini isaniti d'ufe isani baasa,
isani male,
gosa anini keesati isani firfirse
taani ch'ufa imballeesa.
Anini ato diqo tateele isanuma gaargalcha,
ammo yo tateele d'uguma gula isani gaargalcha,
Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.

waan nani jed'e:
Laali, lagi ya mirgaa d'ufe,
bisaani lafa ch'ufati fach'aani.
Bisaani suni lafafi waan keesa jiratifi
dirafi nama keesa taule ch'ufa fud'atani.
Nami qarqaarsa kad'ate,
nami lafa keesa jiru ch'ufti
aka hama boha.
Worri kotte fardatifi
dibbeesa gaaritiifi
girreesa miila isale d'agaya.
Abootini garagalte ilmaani ufi infud'attu;
harki worraa akanumati naasuuni iraa jiga.
Hojaani Filistia balleesani ya geete,
ta Tirofi Sidoni qarqaarsa hafe iraa kutani.
Ana, AABBO Waaqati, worra Filistia,
ka duri lafa Krete ta bisaani jidduuti d'ufe, balleesa.
Gaargali hamaani ya worra Gaza qabate,
worri Ashkeloni ya ch'allise.
Worri Filistia kaani haga yoomi bohu lakisa?
Isani bootani waan jettani,
goraade AABBO Waaqa!
Atini yoomi woi hobaasu lakifta?
Qalqala teeti deebii, tai,
hafuura baafad'i!
Ammo isiini akami hafuura baafati,
ka anini huji isiini hojattu kenneefi?
Anini yayu Ashkelonifi worra afaani galaana taule,
had'i jed'eeni.

Worra Neboti naha,
dira worra ya balleesani!
Kiriathaimu, dira worra jaba ya qabani balleesani,
nama isale ch'ufa ya ch'eersani.
Mid'aagumti Moabu ya badde,
nyaapi yayu Heshboni qabe,
aka gosa Moabu balleesule malate.
Dira worra marata inch'alisisani;
duulati d'ufe had'a.
Worri Horonaimu iyye waan jed'u,
Woraani ya d'ufe!
Lafti ya bade!
Moabu ya balleesani,
aka ijoolleeni teete bootu ch'aqasa.
Qonqo isii ta boha
yo kara Luhithi yaatani d'agaya,
qonqo laalala isi,
hojja Horonaimu d'at'ani d'agaya.
Hurrisa, baqad'a, lubbu ufi baasa;
aka harre diida oria! jed'ani.
Moabu, atini irre teetifi
hori kanke d'aabatte,
ammo amma tana sile indabsatani;
waaqi kanke ka Kemoshi jed'ani
ilmaani hayyutifi qaalole woliini boojiani.
Diri tokoleeni ka badi duraa bahu injiru;
baleefi diidale imballeesani.
Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
D'akha awaalaa Moabu guura;
d'iotu isii balleesani.
Dira isii balleesani ona tolchani,
deebiani keesa intaani.
(Nama huji AABBO Waaqa garaa tokooni inhojanne abaara! Nama goraadeeni isaa woma inijeemnele abaara!)
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'e Moabuni haguma duriti nagayumani teeti, taka nami imboojine. Moabuni daad'i taka inchochoosini, ta gorjo toko keesaa gorjo d'ibiti taka innaqini, fakaati. Miaa isii taka iyyakine, akuma duri kaani mioofti.
Duuba amma guyyaani ind'ufa, ka anini nama erge Moabu aka daad'i lafati jissu. Worri d'ufe gorjo worraa ta daad'i duwa tolche tatarsaasa.
Duuba worri Moabu waaqa worraa, ka Kemoshi jed'ani tufate jibbe yalabaha, akuma duri worri Israeli Betheli, waaqa worri duri abdate, tufate yalabahe.
Worra Moabu, isani maafi nu janna, guddo had'iisa beenna ufiini jettani?
Moabufi dira isii ya balleesani,
kaima isii dadansa ch'ufa ya qaqalani.
Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana,
hayyicha, AABBO Waaqa gudda.
Badiini Moabu ya d'iaatte,
balleesani isii fago injirtu.
Isani nami d'aatu tau,
ka gurra isii beekhu ch'ufti,
gosa suni boha;
waan jettani, Irreeni worri namaani fidu ya ch'ach'abt'e
guddinnaafi jabeenna isi deebiani lafati inargani.
Isani nami lafa Diboni tau,
fulla teesani ta guddinnaati gabua,
awaara keesa tataa;
nami Moabu balleesu arma jira,
dira isii jajaba ya balleese.
Isani nami Aroeri keesa tau,
kara d'aatu ejaanja, eega;
worra baqatu odu iraa fuud'a,
waan hamaate gaafad'a.
Worri waan jed'u,
Moabu ya balleesani bohafi;
isii ya ch'eersani.
D'aatu galaana Arnoniti lalaba,
aka Moabu balleesani hima!
Dira dirra lafa gubbaa jiru ya badi iti himani diri sunini kana: Holoni, Yasa, Mefaathi,
Diboni, Nebo, Beth-Diblathanu,
Kiriathaimu, Bethgamuli, Beth-Meoni,
Keriothi, Bozra. Badi yayu dira Moabu ka fagootifi ka d'ioleti himani.
Irre Moabu ya ch'ach'absani, jabeenna isiile ya balleesani. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'e, Worra Moabu farso iti guura, macheesa, wonti akanatiifi worri yayu na dide. Worri Moabu diddiga ufi keesati gangalate, nami d'ibileeni worra kobla.
Worra Moabu isani aka worra Israeli duri goyeesitani qaabatu? Isani aka waan worri ato hatuu woliini jiru qabani worra hereddani.
Isani worri lafa Moabu keesa tau, dira keesani keesaa baha! Beena d'akha gubbati gala! Aka sabaliisa ka mana ufi rarra bale irati jaaratu tahe.
Worri Moabu guddo kiyyiba! Anini aka worri kiyyibe ufi saade ufi guddisu ya d'agaye, yokhaani aka worri ufi koorsu.
Anini AABBO Waaqi aka worri ufi saadu imbeekha. Ufi saaduni worraa woma keesa injirtu, wonti worri tolchuleeni waan turatiniti.
Tanaafi anini worra lafa Moabu keesa taufi worra Kia-Heresi keesa taule boha.
Dira Sibma, atini mukha zabibu ka dameeni isaa galaana soodda ira baate Yazeri geetu fakaata. Ammo amma mid'aani kanke ka gannatifi mid'aani zabibule ya balleesani.
Gammadafi qilit'ama yayu lafa Moabu dansa wo baaftu keesaa fuud'ani. Anini yayu daad'i fulla isi iti miich'ani keesaa yau d'owe; nami daad'i mid'aase, koble gammadu injiru.
Worri Heshbonitifi ka Eleale iniyya. Iyyanna worraa Yahasiti d'agayani iyyanna suni Zoarifi Horonaimufi Eglath-Shelishiati d'agayani. Maddooni Nimrimuleni ya gogodde.
Anini worra Moabu ka fulla kad'achati sorio gube waaqa isaniti baase hit'aanale aarsufi, huji suni ind'owa. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Tanaafi garaani kiyya Moabufi worra Kia-Heresiiti boha, akuma nama faaru boha fulludooni d'aatu. Wonti akanatiifi waan worri qabu ch'ufa ya iraa fuud'ani.
Worri ch'ufti yayu matafi areedale haadate. Worri ch'ufti yayu harka ufi mamadeese ch'arqi naqate.
Maneeni Moabu gubbafi ballinna dira ch'ufa keesale boha male woma injirani, wonti akanatiifi anini yayu Moabu aka okote faara ta nami jibbe ch'abse.
Moabu yayu bulleesani! lalaba, iyya! Moabu yayu ch'eersani isi yayu balleesani ona tolchani, gochiti d'aatu jirtu ch'ufti isi goyeesiti. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u: Gochiti toko aka risa koola ballifte d'ufte Moabuti buuti.
Dirafi maneeni jajabdu isale inqabani. Guyya suni askartini Moabu mudamte, lubbuuni d'ufte, niiti dauu jirtu fakaati.
Moabule imballeesani deebiani gosa injed'anini, waan worri na dideefi.
Sodaafi boolafi t'ururati worra Moabu eegata. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Nami soda duraa baqachu fed'u boola suni keesa bua, ammalle nami boola suni keesaa oli bahu t'urura keesa seena; wonti akanatiifi AABBO Waaqi yayu guyya worra Moabu balleesani tolche.
Nami irre inqamne, ka baqaa yau, Heshboniti goru fed'a, dira hayyuuni Sioni duri mohate. Ammo dira sunile yayu gubani. Ibidi yayu diidafi gaareeni Moabu, ka worri isi guddo had'iisa fed'ule, gube.
Worra Moabuti naha! Worra Kemoshi kad'atu ya balleesani, ilmaani worrale ya boojiani.
Ammo takaa tana AABBO Waaqi finna dansa worraa deebisa. Wonti kunini ch'ufti waan AABBO Waaqi Moabuti ind'ufti jed'e.

Ammo guyyaani ind'ufa, ka anini worra dira Raba keesa tau iyyanna woraanaa d'ageesisu. Duuba dira suni ona tolchani, ollowaani isaale gubani balleesani. Jennaani worri Israeli lafa isaani ta qara iraa fud'atani deefata.
Worra Heshboni, iyya! Dira Ai ya balleesani! Nad'eeni dira Raba, boha, ch'arqi naqad'a, waan taatani wollaala, gara ch'ufa oria. Waaqa keesani ka Milkomu jed'anifi qaalole isaatifi ilmaani worrale imboojiani.
Isani worri d'ugefacha inqamne kunini maafi ufi guddiftani? Humniti teesani hobauu jirti. Isani maanifi irre teesani abdatani, Nami nu had'u injiru jettani?
Anini gama ch'ufa waan isani mudamsiisa isaniti erga, duuba isani ch'ufti imbaqattani. Nami ch'ufti aka lubbu ufi baasu baqate, nama nama baqate suni wolti deebisu d'abani.
Ammo takaa tana anini finna dansa worra Amoniti deebisa. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Worra Dedani garagala, baqad'a, d'okhad'a! Anini d'aloota Esau ingaargalcha, wonti akanatiifi guyyaani anini worra gaargalchu ya gahe.
Hojja nami mid'aani zabibu guuru, hagi toko irumati hafani, ammalle hojja hattuuni halkaniini d'uftu woma feetu ch'alla guuratti.
Ammo anini d'aloota Esau ya waan ch'ufa iraa sosse fulla inni iti d'okhatule diidati baase, aka akasiini worri dandae deebie ind'okhanne. Worra Edomu ch'ufa ya balleesani, tokoleeni inhamne.
Ilmaani teesani hiyyeeyi na birati lakisa, inqorqorad'a, nad'eeni teesani ta d'iirsa inqamneleeni ha na abdatuti.
Yo nami gaargala argachu himmalini muduunu gaargalatini d'uge, isani waan gaargala inarganne seetani? Hiyo akasiniti, d'uddani male inteetani!
Anini ya kakhad'e, aka diri Bozra bade ona tahu; nami isa goyeese maqa isaatini woli abaara. Ollowaani d'aatu isaa jirtuleeni haga jiru jireenna badde ona taati. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Anini waan jed'e, Edomu, anini yayu qonqo AABBO Waaqa iraa argad'e inni nama erge waan jed'e, waan atini gosa ch'ufaani jettu wolti baha, duula keesani wolti baasa, kurfefad'a, worra had'a.
AABBO Waaqi irre isani d'owe, nami ch'ufti isani tufata.
Kiyyibi keesani ya isani sobe, nami tokoleeni ka isani waan inni isani sodaatu seetani, ka isani sodaatu, injiru. Isani d'akha fiit'e gaara gubbati galtani; ammo ato isani akuma risa fit'e d'akha gubbati galtanile AABBO Waaqi gaduma isani buusa. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'e, Badiini Edomuti d'uftu aka male hamtu, tanaafi nami d'aatu dabru ch'ufti rifate mudama.
Woma duri Sodomafi Gomorafi diri d'aatu jiru ch'ufti, gaafa balleesani tahe, Edomuleeni taati. Nami deebie achi intau. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Akuma nyeench'i badda galaana Yordani keesaa bahe lafa doti marra qabdu d'ufu, aninileeni akasuma d'ufe, worra Edomu lafa isaani keesaa tassa baqachiisa. Duuba nama anini fohad'eti lafa mohata. Nami na gahu lafa keesa jira? Nami woi na gaafatu jira? Nami lafa fidu, ka dandae nani morku, jira?
Tanaafi mala anini worra Edomuti malad'eefi waan anini worra dira Temani tolchu fed'u ch'aqasa. Ijoolle worra alati hirkisani, nami ch'ufti rifata.
Gaafa Edomu balleesani, dibbeesi isii lafa ch'ufa chochoosa; qonqo iyyanna galaana Diimati d'agayani.
Nyaapi akuma risaa koola ballise gabue dira Bozra had'a. Guyya suni askartini Edomu akuma niiti d'alaa ch'ininfatu mudamti.
Worri Damaski irre inqabu, tanaafi mudame baqate. Akuma niiti d'alaa ch'ininfatu, worri laalefate d'ukubsata.
Diri gurra qabu, ka duri gammada qabu, ya ona tahe.
Guyya suni nama isaa ka kaima ch'ufa kara diraa keesati fit'ani, askarti isaa ch'ufa balleesani.
Anini naabo Damaski gube, maneeni hayyu Benhadadile ibidaani balleesa. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa gudda.
Wonti gosa Kedaritifi lafa finna Hazori jala jirtu, ta Nebukadrezani hayyuuni Babiloni had'e dabsate, ta AABBO Waaqi jed'e tana: Worra kedari had'a, worra ilaboru suni balleesa!
Waaro worraatifi ree worraatifi golla waaro worraatifi waan waaro worraa keesa jira ch'ufa qaba. Duuba waan worraani jettani, sodaani ya gama ch'ufaani isani marsite.
Worra Hazori, anini, AABBO Waaqi waan isaniini jed'u, Baqad'a, d'okhad'a. Nebukadrezani, hayyuuni Babiloni, ya isaniti malate, inni waan jed'u,
koota, worra nagayaani tau suni haana! Diri worraa Fullofi ch'ufanale inqabu, kobaa jira.
Gaala worraatifi looni worraale ch'ufa fuud'a! Duuba anini worra rifeensa ufi gabaabse ch'iratu ch'ufa lafa ch'ufati firfirse, gama ch'ufa badi itiini d'ufa.
Diri Hazori haga jiru jireenna one, fulla sareni diidaa iti galtu taha. Nami deebie achi intau. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Akuma Sedekiani hayyu Yuda taheeni, AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan lafti Elamu taatu nati hime.
Inni waan nani jed'e, Nama t'iyaani woi had'u beekhu, ka jabeenna gudda kana worra Elamuti kenne ch'ufa inhobaasa.
Anini moga ch'ufa bubbe Elamutini d'ufe nama isii lafa ch'ufati firfirsa. Duuba akanaani fullaani nami Elamu iti imbaqatini injirtu.
Anini worra Elamu aka worri nyaapa worraa fit'u fed'u sodaatu tolcha. Dallansu tiyya guddooni anini worra Elamu balleese duula iti erge worra hobaasa.
Anini hayyufi jaarole worraale balleese, barch'uma kiyya ka hayyuma achi d'aaba.
Ammo takaa tana anini worra Elamu finna dansaati deebisa. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.

Odu tana gosa ch'ufati hima, odeesa!
Akheekha woi garsiisa,
odu tana odeesa, ind'ossina,
Babiloni ya balleesani!
Waaqa isii, ka Merodaki jed'ani,
ya fafalaansani!
Waaqoota Babiloni ya ch'eersani,
akheekha hama worri kad'atu ya ch'ach'absani!
Gochiti mirgaa baate
ya d'ufte Babiloni haate balleesite ona tolchite.
Namaafi bineensi keesaa baqate,
wonti tokoleeni ka iti gala injirtu.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Yo guyyaani sunini gahu, worri Israelitiifi ka Yuda bohaa d'ufe, ana Waaqa isaani barbaada.
Worri kara Sioni gaafate achi yaa. Duuba worri wold'aqisa jiru jireenna ka na woliini tolfate kaani, deebie inch'absu.
Gumiini tiyya hooliye tissituuni kara iraa gorsite gaara irati balleesite fakaati. Worri gaareeni ch'ufa ira yayae, worra ufi gara wollaala.
Nami worra argu ch'ufti worra had'a. Nyaapi isaani waan jed'u, Worri kunini AABBO Waaqati ch'ubbame, tanaafi wonti nu worra tolchine hamtuniti. Ababooti worraa AABBO Waaqa abdate, worrileeni sila AABBO Waaqa iraa goru himmalle.
Anini gosa jajabdu mirgaa jirtu kaase, Babiloni haasisa. Worri had'iisaa ejaanje, lafa had'e dabsata. Worri sunini guddo t'iyaani woi had'u beekha, yo darbatu woma ind'abu.
Babiloni insaamani, nami saamuleeni waan jed'u ch'ufa guurata. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Worra Babiloni, isani gosa tiyya saamtani, tanaafi gammadani qilit'amtani, akuma looni mid'aani biilatini d'aanani yokhaani akuma farda imimsu yaatani.
Ammo dira keesani gudda kana balleesani ch'eersani. Babilonini gadii lafa ch'ufa taati, isiini lafa gamooji ta bisaani inqamne taati.
Maro dallansu tiyyatifi nami tokoleeni Babiloni keesa intau; isii ona tolchani, nami d'aatu dabru ch'ufti rifate maadefata.
T'iyole ch'orora ejaanja, had'iisa Babiloniti kurfefad'a, dira marsa. Waan Babilonini ana AABBO Waaqati ch'ubbamteefi t'iya teesani ch'ufaani had'a.
Gama ch'ufaa iti iyya! Babilonini amma ya harka kennate. Naabo isa ya ch'absani balleesani. Anini worra Babiloni haalo baafachuu jira, tanaafi isanileeni haalo baafad'a, akuma worri nama d'ibi tolche, worrale tolcha.
Lafa suni keesati mid'aani fach'aasanifi ka muratanile d'owa. Nami gosa d'ibi ka achi keesa tauleeni nyaapa dira suni had'u sodaate lafa ufiti gala.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Worri Israeli hooliye nyeench'i had'e gargari firfirse fakaata. Qara hayyu Ashuruti worra had'e, eege hayyu Babiloni ka Nebukadreza jed'aniti lafele worraa annifata.
Tanaafi anini, AABBO Waaqi guddaani Waaqi Israeli, Nebukadrezafi lafa isale gaargalcha, akuma anini qara hayyu Ashuru gaaragalche.
Anini worra Israeli lafa isaniti deebisa. Worri sagale gaara Karmeli irati baatefi ta lafa Bashani keesati baatele nyaate. Ammalle mid'aani lafa Efraimutifi ta Gileadi keesati bahale haga fed'u nyaata,
hojja guyyaani sunini gahu, Israeli keesati ch'ubbu tokole inargani, Yuda keesale hameenni injiru; wonti akanatiifi anini worra hambise kana ch'ubbu isani inaraaramafi, nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u worra Merathaimutifi worra Pekodi had'a, fit'a, hobaasa. Waan anini isaniini jed'u ch'ufa tolcha. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Iyyanna lolaatifi balleesa nama balleesani lafa keesati d'agayani.
Babilonini qara lafa ch'ufa burrisaani tumte, ammo amma tana burrisa suni ya ch'absani! Waan lafa suni tolchani arginaani gochiti ch'ufti iraa rifate.
Babiloni, atini na haate, ammo amma ya t'urura anini si kaye ato imbeekhini keesa seente.
Anini fulla miha kiyya ka lola iti olkayani bane, dallansu tiyya keesa alati baase; wonti akanatiifi anini, AABBO Waaqi guddaani Babiloni keesa huji qaba.
Moga ch'ufaa had'a fulla mid'aani isii iti olkayani ch'ufa ch'absa bana! Waan saamtani aka mid'aani wolti tuula! Lafa balleesa! Woma inhambisina!
Askarti worraa ch'ufa qaqala, hobaasa! Worra Babiloni ya badiini qabatte! guyyaani worra gaargalchani ya gahe.
(Nami Babiloni keesaa baqate Yerusalemu d'ufe waan jed'u, AABBO Waaqi keenna ya worra Babiloni haalo baafate, waan worri nama Waaqa qulqullo balleesefi.)
Tanaafi nama isi ka kaima ch'ufa kara dira keesati fit'ani, askarti isii ch'ufale guyya suni fit'ani. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Babiloni, kiyyibi ya sira dabre, tanaafi anini, AABBO Waaqi guddaani, nyaapa siti tahe! Hojaani anini si gaargalchu ya geete.
Gochiti teesani kiyyibduuni gugufate jidde, nama tokole ka olfud'u d'abdi. Anini dira keesani ch'ufa ibida iti kaye, waan d'aatu jira ch'ufa balleesani.
AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u, Worra Israelitiifi ka Yuda ya dabsani. Nami worra qabe ch'ufti guddo worra tisse gad'iisu dide.
Ammo nami worra baasu jaba; maqaani isaa AABBO Waaqa gudda. Isumati worraa dubbate nagaya lafatini d'ufe, ammo gaargala worra Babilonitini d'ufa.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Dooti ha lafa Babiloni qabatu!
Dooti ha nama isiitiifi nama isi mohatufi
worra isii qaqaro qabatuuti.
Dooti ha raagoota isii kiyyibdole qabatuuti
worri akami daalle!
Dooti ha askarti isii qabatuti
worri akami mumudama!
Fardoole isiitiifi gaari fardi hirkisule balleesa!
Dooti ha askarti worri beeseeni bitatele qabatu
worri akami lalaafa.
Waan worri qabu ch'ufa saama, balleesa.
Oolaani ha iti buute,
galaani isii ch'ufti gogoguti.
Babilonini lafa akheekha waaqoota d'ara
ka nama mudamsiisa qabdu,
ka biyya daallese.
Akuma anini duri Sodomafi Gomorafi dira d'aatu ch'ufa balleese, Babilonile balleesa. Nami deebie iti ingalu. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana; AABBO Waaqa.
Nami lafa mirgati d'ufuu jira,
gochiti jabduuni fago teetu;
hayyooti hedduuni lola kurfefachuu jirti.
Worri t'iyaafi goraade fud'ate d'ufuu jira,
worri hamama naasu inqamne.
Worri hojja farda isaani yaabate gulufu
aka d'awa galaana dibbisa.
Ammalle worri kurfo jira, aka Babiloni had'u.
Hayyuuni Babiloni odu suni d'ageennaani
nahe harki iraa jige.
Isa ya laalalafi d'ukubsachani
aka niiti ch'ininfatu qabate.
Akuma nyeench'a badda Yordani keesaa bahe lafa doti marra qabdu d'ufu, anini AABBO Waaqi d'ufe, worra Babiloni tassa dira isaani keesaa baqachiisa. Duuba nama anini fohad'eti lafa mohata. Nami na gahu lafa keesa injira? Nami woi na gaafatu injira? Nami lafa fidu, ka dandae nani morku injira?
Tanaafi mala anini dira Babiloniti malad'eefi waan anini nama isaa tolchu fed'u ch'aqasa. Ijoolle worraale alati hirkisani, nami ch'ufti iraa rifata.
Gaafa Babiloni balleesani dibbeesi isii lafa ch'ufa chochoose. Qonqo iyyanna gosa d'ibiti d'agayani.

AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Anini bubbe woi balleesitu lafa Babilonitifi worra isiitiini d'ufa.
Anini nama gosa d'ibi, ka aka bubbeeni bua buuyo fuutu, Babiloni fuud'e balleesu, iti erga. Hojja guyyaani badi sunini d'ufu, worri moga ch'ufaani had'e lafa duwa tolcha.
Askarti worraa t'iya darbachu d'owa, miha lolaale keeyachu d'owa. Kaima inhambisina, duula worraa ch'ufa hobaasa!
Worri mamadae, kara dira keesati hobaa.
Anini AABBO Waaqi guddaani worra Israelitiifi ka Yuda illakimne, Ato worri, ana qulqullo Israeliti ch'ubbamele.
Babiloni keesaa baqad'a, lubbu teesani baasa! Maro ch'ubbu Babilonitifi induina. Anini amma haalo baafad'e, akuma isii male gaargalchuu jira.
Babilonini muduunu worqi, ta harka kiyya keesa jirtu, ta lafa ch'ufa macheesitu. Gochiti ch'ufti daad'i isi d'udde maraati.
Diri Babiloni tassa jige bade! Bohafi! Maddaa isaa qorsa iti barbaada, hegeri infayyiti.
Nami gosa d'ibi ka achi tau waan jed'u, nu dira Babiloni qarqaaru feene, ammo wonti sunini ya dabarte. Koota, amma lakimne kaane biraa galla. Waaqi yayu Babiloni irre isaa ch'ufaani gaargalche aka male balleese.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, gumiini tiyya lalabde waan jettu, AABBO Waaqi yayu d'uga nuu galche, koota, worra Yerusalemu d'anne, waan Waaqi keenna nuu tolche iti himna.
AABBO Waaqi yayu hayyoota Medi kaase, waan inni Babiloni balleesu fed'ufi. Aki inni waan worri mana isani qulqullo balleesefi haalo baafatu akasi.
Worri lafa had'u waan jed'u. T'iya teesani qarad'a! Wonte teesani kurfeesa!
Akheekha naabo Babilonitini ch'absitani garsiisa! Nama lafa eegu heddeesa! Nama lafa tissu tolfad'a! Nama woi gaadu kurfeesa!
AABBO Waaqi waan worra Babiloni, Intolcha jed'e ya tolche.
Lafti suni galaanafi hori gudda qabdi, ammo guyyaani isii ya alaa hobae, isiini ya badu geete.
AABBO Waaqi guddaani maqa ufiitini kakhate waan jed'e, Anini duula guddaani d'ufa ka aka awaanisa d'ufe isani had'e dabsate, geerara galu.
AABBO Waaqi jabeenna ufitini lafa uume;
qarooma ufitini mid'aase,
gubbale ballise;
jecha isatini bisaaleeni gubba dibbisani,
duumansileeni muumme lafale d'ufe.
Inni bokaya keesa angae,
bubbele goda isii keesaa gayaase.
Nami waan kana arge ch'ufti,
daalle woma imbeenne ufi sehe;
nami waan harkaani boch'ani kad'atuleeni,
maro wonti worri kad'atu suni waan d'ara,
ka lubbu inqamne taateefi
waan tahu wollaale ufi d'aareefata.
Wonti worri mid'aasu sunini
waan woma keesa jiraatiniti,
waan tufatani miid'u malani;
guyya Waaqi qorsumaa d'ufu, imballeesani.
Waaqi Yakobo waaqa akasi suniniti
isumati waan ch'ufa uume
Israeli fohate gumi ufi tolfate.
Maqaani isa AABBO Waaqa gudda.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Babiloni atini burrisa kiyya,
miha kiyya ka lola ka anini namaani had'u,
anini siini lafafi namale balleese,
fardoole nama yaabatule hobaase,
gaari fardi hirkisufi nama oofule balleese.
D'iirafi nad'eenile fit'e,
jaarsafi kaimale hobaase,
ijoolle d'iiratifi ta dubrale gate.
Ammalle tissitufi reele qaqale,
worra lafa qotufi fardoole worrale gogorae,
nama lafa mohatufi jaarole gugurdole hobaasa.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Isani inagartani waan anini Babilonifi, nama isii tolchu, maro waan hamtu worri Yerusalemu tolcheefi.
Babiloni, atini gaara lafa ch'ufa balleesu fakaata, ammo ato akasi taatele, anini, AABBO Waaqi, nyaapa keeti. Anini si qabe, si ch'ach'abse, sii bulleese daara si tolcha.
Deebiani d'akha ona keetile manani injaarani. Atini haga jiru jireenna lafa aloo taata. Nami dubbi suni jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Akheekha diraani haatani garsiisa! Magalata aka gochiti ch'ufti d'ageetu d'aa. Gosa ch'ufa had'iisa Babiloniti kurfeesa! Worra lafa Araratitifi Minitifi ka Ashkenazitini, Had'a jed'a. Worra suni abba duula iti tolcha. Fardoole aka tuuta awaanisaa gabaasa.
Gosa ch'ufa had'iisa Babiloniti kurfeesa, hayyoota Meditifi jaaroleefi jara worraa gugurdafi askarti lafa worri mohatu keesa jirtule woliini baasa.
Waan AABBO Waaqi aka Babiloni balleese ona nami keesa inteenne tolchu malateefi, lafti hollatte chochoote.
Askartini Babiloni yayu had'iisa lakifte maneeni worraa jajabduti hafte. Worri ya ufi jibbaate waan tahu wollaale, irre d'abe, nad'eeni fakaate. Ch'ufana fullo dira ya ch'ach'absani, maneenile ch'ufa ibida iti kayani.
Nami qonqo iyyanna woluma duubani d'ufe waan hayyu Babilonitini jed'u, Nyaapi ya dira kanke moga ch'ufaani d'ufe iti ch'abse had'e.
Ammalle nyaapi yayu malka galaana qabate, maneeni jajabdu taanile ibida iti naqe, askarti tante mudamsiise.
D'iotu nyaapa worra ch'ire akuma mid'aani oobdi keesati d'aanani ira ejaanjata. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa gudda, Waaqa Israeli.
Hayyuuni Babiloni dira Yerusalemu had'e,
nama isaa nyaate fit'e,
akuma okhole aanani fooqise,
akuma gorjama liqimse,
waan fed'u ch'ufa fud'ate,
ka iraa hafele ch'ufa gadigate.
Worri Sioni ha akana jed'u:
D'iigi keenna gubbaa worra Babiloni ha tahu.
Worri Yerusalemuleeni akana ha jed'u,
gaargali keenna worra Babiloni ha qabatu.
Tanaafi AABBO Waaqi waan worra Yerusalemutini jed'e, Anini d'iba keesani ya arge, amma isanii dubbad'e, nyaapa keesanile haalo isanii baasa. Anini madda bisaani Babiloni gosse galaana worraale kuta.
Lafti sunini badde, ona bineensi ala iti galu ka ilti namaa jibbitu taati. Nami tokoleeni ka iti galu injiru, nami arguleeni nahe mudama.
Worri Babiloni ch'ufti akuma nyeench'a itane, akuma kuble nyeench'a gururia.
Worri sabdii? Yoosi anini jila worraa tolche, sagale d'aabeefi macheese gammachiisa. Duuba worri d'aqe rafa itumaa deebie lafaa inkau.
Anini worra qalmati geesa, aka ilmaani hoolatifi laleesafi Elemiye. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
AABBO Waaqi waan Babiloni dubbate waan jed'e, Dira gochiti lafa keesa jirti ch'ufti duri faarsite ya had'ani qabani! Babilonini akami waan ilti gosa ch'ufa jibbitu taate!
Bisaani baariini yayu Babiloni gubbati fach'aani, d'awani isaanileeni isii ira deebite mullachu d'owarte.
Diri isiileeni yayu bade, ona bisaani inqamne ka nami keesa injirre yokhaani ka keesale imbaane tahe.
Anini waaqa Babiloni ka Beli, jed'ani balleese waan inni saame guurate ch'ufa iraa buuse, aka gochiti tokoleeni deebite isa iyyaamanne tolcha.
Naaboni Babiloni ya ch'ach'abt'e.
Gumi Israeli, arti baqad'a! Dallansu tiyya hamtu duraa baqad'a, lubbu ufi baasa.
Waan d'ageetani kana jettani, garaa laaftani insodaatina. Ganna ch'ufa woma hareeti d'ageetani — odu had'iisa lafatifi aka hayyooti lafa lafaani woli haatu.
Duuba amma hojaani ya geete, ta anini waaqoota Babiloni, ta d'ara, balleese, lafa ch'ufa ch'eerse nama ch'ufa hobaasu.
Wonti lafafi gubba jira ch'ufti gammade qilit'amti; hojja worri mirgaa d'ufu Babiloni dabsate balleesu.
Babilonini, waan duri lafa ch'ufa keesa nama hobaafteefi, ammo isiileeni badu malte, ammalle maro nama Israeli heddu hobaafteefi balleesu malani. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
AABBO Waaqi waan gumi isaa ta Babiloni jirtuuni jed'e. Isani ya lubbu duraa baatani! Woma ineegina, amma kaa, yaa! Ato isani worra keesani ira fago jiraatanile, ana AABBO Waaqafi Yerusalemu qaabad'a.
Isani waan jettani, yayu nu arabsani, nu ch'eersani lafaa nu balleesani waan nyaapi fulla qulqullo mana Waaqa keesaa jirtu ch'ufa fud'ateefi nu qarqaarsa d'amne.
Tanaafi waan anini jed'u, Guyyaani ind'ufa, ka anini waan harkaani boch'ani, ka worri Babiloni kad'atu, ch'ufa balleese nami madaleeni ch'ufti lafa suni keesa waachaa yau.
Ato Babilonini gubba yaabatte achiti mana jajaba jaarattele, anini inuma nama isi balleesu iti erga. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u,
Waan lafa Babiloni balleesanifi,
aka nami bahe iyyu d'agaya.
Anini Babiloni balleese,
iyyanna isii ch'allisisa.
Duuli nyaapaa akuma d'awa baariini worrati baafate,
aka male iyye worra had'a.
Worri ya Babiloni balleesu d'ufe;
askarti isii yayu qabani
guube worrale ch'ach'absani.
Anini Waaqa waan hamtu balleesu,
tanaafi Babiloni waan isii male tolchaafi.
Anini nama isii mohatu,
jara qaqaroofi jaaroleefi askarti worraale
ch'ufa farso iti guure macheesa,
worri d'aqe rafa, itumaa deebie lafaa inkau.
Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana hayyicha AABBO Waaqa gudda.
Naabo jabdu Babiloni butuchani,
ch'ufana fullo isii gugurda kaanile gubani,
akasiini wonti ch'ufti gubate,
hujiini duri gochiti hedduuni hojate taani lafati badi.
Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa gudda.
Serayani, ilmi Neria, ka ilma Maaseya, makala hayyu Sedekia. Duuba ganna afreeso ka Sedekiani lafa Yuda mohate, ka Serayani isa woliini Babiloni deemuu jiru, anini dubbi woi iti d'aame.
Anini badi Babiloniti gad'uftufi waan Babilonini taatu d'ibile kitaaba keesati t'aafe.
Anini waan Serayani jed'e, Yoyu Babilonini baate, waan kitaaba kana keesa jira ch'ufa lalabi, biyyaa soomi.
Duuba Waaqa kad'ad'i, waan jettu, Ee AABBO Waaqa, atini qara, anini fulla tana imballeesa jette, aka wonti lubbu qaba, namaafi bineensale taanaani iti ingalle, ammo haga jiru jireenna ona taatu.
Seraya, duuba yo kitaaba kana biyyaa soomte hobaafte, d'akhati hid'i, galaana Frati keesa buusi.
Waan jettu, Tunini waan Babiloniti d'ufaati — isiini akana lit'i, deebite oli imbaatu waan AABBO Waaqi badi itiini d'ufufi, isiini akasi taati. Dubbini Yeremia asi buufatti.

Ganni Sedekia diddami toko, gaafa inni hayyu Yuda tahe, ammalle inni ganna kud'ani toko Yerusalemu keesa lafa mohate. Haad'a isaa maqaani Hamutali, isiini dubra Yeremia, ka dira Libna.
Hayyu Sedekiani akuma hayyu Yekoniani tahe kaani, AABBO Waaqa durati ch'ubbu tolche.
AABBO Waaqi guddo worra Yerusalemutifi ka Yudaleti dallane ila ufi dura balleese.
Sedekiani hayyu Nebukadreza, ka Babiloniti, garagale jennaani,
hayyu Nebukadrezani askarti isaa ch'ufaani d'ufe, guyya kud'anneeso, jia kud'anneeso, ganna sagaleeso ka mootuma Sedekia, Yerusalemu had'e. Worri d'aatu isiiti qubate, boola qote marseeni,
haga ganna kud'ani tokeeso ka mohacha Sedekia artuma tae had'e.
Guyya sagaleeso, ka jia afreeso, ka ganna suni, ka beelti dira suni keesati guddatte, nami sagale nyaatule d'abe,
naabo dira suni ch'absani. Halkaniini askartini fullo naabo lamaani jiddu, jirtu, ta d'aatu oobru hayyutini baqate, ato askartini Babiloni dira marsitu. Duuba worri gara bale Yordani baqate.
Ammo askartini Babiloni hayyu Sedekia reebde, diida Yerikoti d'aqabde jennaani askartini isaa ch'ufti biraa baqate.
Duuba isa qabani, hayyu Babiloni, ka Ribla lafa Hamathi jiruti geesani. Duuba achiti hayyu Nebukadrezani ijeecha iti mure.
Ammalle Riblati inni ilmaani Sedekia iluma isaa durati fit'e, jaarole Yudale ch'ufa artumati hobaase.
Eegi suni isale ila keesaa guure, sansalatani hid'e Babiloniti geese. Sedekiani haga jiru ch'ufa hid'aansa keesa lafa Babiloni tae.
Guyya kud'anneeso, ka jia shaneeso, ganna kud'ani sagaleeso, ka hayyu Nebukadrezani lafa Babiloni mohate, Nebusaradanini, ka makala hayyuu, ka ammalle inni gudda askarti isaa, Yerusalemu seene.
Inni Mana Waaqatifi mana hayyutifi maneeni nama gugurda ka Yerusalemu ch'ufa gube,
askartini isaaleeni naabo diraani marsani jaarani ch'ach'absite.
Jennaani Nebusaradanini worra dira Yerusalemu keesati hafefi ogeeyifi worra worra isaani lakise hayyu Babiloniti harka kennate, guure Babilonitini gale.
Ammo inni hiyyeeyi woma inqamne lafa Yudati lakise, aka worri zabibu tisse oobrule qotu.
Ammalle worri daboolafi eele daara iti haranifi miha ifseeni qorqoratanifi qori d'iiga sorio iti naqanifi qori hit'aana iti aarsanifi miha Mana Waaqatini hojatani, ka sibiila diimani mid'aasani ch'ufa, guure itiini d'aabate.
Ammalle worri waan worqifi qarsiini mid'aasani ch'ufa guure itiini d'aabate: qori didiqofi daboola ch'ile ibidatini fuud'anifi qori d'iiga sorio iti naqanifi eele daara iti haranifi waan ifse ira d'ad'aabanifi eele hit'aanatifi qori daad'iini d'ibaayu baasanile.
Miha Solomonini sibiila diimani Mana Waaqati mid'aase — utuba lamaanifi waan aka gaari kaanifi haro gingiti taanifi waan aka koromi looni ta sibiila diimani mid'aasani, ta isiini ira ejitule, dandaani ulfinna isii haga imbeekhani.
Utubaani lamaani haguma taka: Old'eerinni isaa d'und'uma kud'ani saddeeti, ballinni mata isaa d'und'uma kud'ani lama. Utubaani sibiila mid'aasani suni lachu aka d'uyuma jira, furdinni afaani isaa haga gana harkaa. Utuba suni lachu gubbaa waan aka sure ka sibiila diimani mid'aasaniti jira, ta kamu d'eerinni isii d'und'uma shani, ammalle waan aka okhoku ka sibiila diimani mid'aasanini marsani barreesani ch'okhani. Waan kana ch'ufa sibiila diimani mid'aasani.
Barru utuba suni lamaani ch'ufa irati waan aka okhoku ka d'ibba tokoti jira; nami jala eju waan suni sagaltami jaa ilaani inarga.
Tana male Nebusaradanini, ka gudda askarti, qaallicha gudda Seraya jed'anifi Sefania ka isati aanufiufi ammalle jara gugurda Mana Waaqa keesa hojatu nama sadi qaqabe Babiloni geese.
Dira keesa inni nama askarti ch'ufaa matatiifi nama torba ka makala hayyu, ka dira keesati hafefi namicha nama askartiti mataati aanu, ka waan askarti lafa suni ch'ufa t'aafufi, ammalle nama jaatama d'ibii, ka gurra qabu, ch'ufa woliini qabe geese.
Nebusaradanini, ka gudda askarti, worra kana ch'ufa guure, hayyu Babiloni, ka dira Ribla jiruti geese.
Achiti lafa Hamathiti, hayyichi worra gaargalche d'aane hobaase.
Duuba akanaani worra Yuda lafa worra keesaa boojiani, lafa d'ibii geesani.
Kunini henna worra Yuda ka Nebukadrezani boojie: ganna torbeeso ka mohacha isaa, inni nama kuma saditifi diddami sadi boojie;
ganna kud'ani saddeeteeso nama d'ibba saddeettifi sodomi lama Yerusalemu keesaa boojie;
ammalle ganna diddami sadeeso keesa, nama d'ibba torbatiifi afurtami shani Nebusaradanini boojie. Nami worri boojie ch'ufti wolti nama kuma afurtifi d'ibba jaa.
Ganna sodomi torbeeso, ka hayyu Yekonia boojiani guyya diddami shaneeso, ka jia kud'ani lameeso Evil-Merodakini hayyu Babiloni tahe, duuba inni Yekonia hayyu Yudati nahe, hid'aansa keesaa baase.
Akasiini inni Yekonia dubbi dansa iti dubbatte, hayyoota isa woliini boojiani taani ch'ufa ira isa ulfeese.
Tanaafi Yekoniani woya gaafa isa hid'aani taani keeyachiisani taani baafate, mana hayyu keesa hayyu woliini gololfate.
Haga inni jiru ch'ufa guyya ch'ufa beese waan isaa male kennanifi.

Akami Yerusalemuni ta duri nama qabdu
amma ch'eekhoofte ona taate badde!
Isiini duri guddo gurra qabdi,
ammo amma ya haad'a hiyyeesa fakaatte;
isiini ta duri hayyiti dira ch'ufa amma ya tisse taate.
Halkani ch'ufa boote,
imimaani boqo ira yaani.
Jaallowaani duri isiini qabdu ta d'ufte.
Iraa hafi jettuuni tokoleeni injirtu.
Golini isi ch'ufti yayu iti gargalte nyaapa iti taate.
Worri Yuda ch'ufti tissele woma ufi imbane,
ta worra isii keesaa irreeni fuud'ani,
lafa d'ibitini galani;
ta fulla tanati teenna keesaa inqamne —
nyaapi worra marse fulla worri bahuni d'owe.
Amma nami tokoleeni ka guyya jila d'ufe Mana Waaqati kad'atu injiru.
Dubriti ta duri achiti sirbitu gaargalte,
qaaloleni ufumaa waati.
Fullooni dira ch'ufti duwa teteeti,
Sionileni gaargala hama qabdi.
Nyaapi isi dabsate qabe taeni.
AABBO Waaqi maro dabi isii heddateefi yayu isi gaargalche;
ijoolle isiile ya qabani boojiani.
Mid'agumti Yerusalemu haguma dabre.
Worri gugurdaani isi hiddi maraa d'abde haalate fakaata,
ta humniti isii ch'ufti d'eeta nama adamootiini hobaate.
Amma tana Yerusalemuni ona hot'ae bade,
isiini dansuma, ufi ka duri ch'alla qaabati.
Gaafa nyaapi isi had'e dabsate isiini
qarqaarsa tokole inargamne.
Worri isi dabsate suleeni badi isi agarraani aka sesaa koble.
Amma gurri isi ya bade;
isiini ya qulla buute ch'eerati hafte.
Isiini waate ch'eeraafi fuula ufi d'ofatte.
Yerusalemu ya daba hamani ufi t'ureesite.
T'urini isi iti marate,
ammo isiini waan iti deemtu iyyaalle.
Isiini gaafa jidde aka hama lafa d'oofte;
nami tokoleeni ka iraa hafi jed'eeni injiru.
Nyaapi yayu isi dabsate,
duuba isiini naasu AABBO Waaqaati booti.
Nyaapi isi waan isiini olkeeyate ch'ufa yayu iraa saame.
Isiini worra Mana Waaqa ka AABBO Waaqi
gosa d'ibi ch'ufa seerate seenu agarte.
Nami isi keesa jiru waate
waan nyaatu barbaade;
worri hori qara olkeeyate
waan nyaatuni aka indoone jijirate waan jed'e,
Ee AABBO, badi teenna ilaali.
Ammalle nama d'aatu dabru ch'ufa dubbifte
waan jette na ilaala!
Nami tokoleeni ka aka kiyya kana gaargale d'ukubsate injiru,
d'ukubi suni ka AABBO Waaqi gaafa nati dallane natiini d'ufe.
Inni ibida na gubu gubbaa nati gabuse.
T'urura naa hid'e lafaani na d'ae,
jennaani d'ukubsacha taani nara infuune
keesati na lakise na bira deeme.
Inni ch'ubbu tiyya ch'ufa hubate wolti qabe,
morma kiyyati kae jennaani ulfinni isi na lellese.
AABBO Waaqaati askarti nyaapa kiyyati na kenne,
tanaafi anini waan tau d'abe.
AABBO Waaqi askarti tiyya ta ira jajanna miid'e,
duula d'ibi ka kaima kiyya balleesu nati gadi erge.
Inni nama kiyya aka mid'aani zabibu ka daad'i tolchani ch'ach'arase.
Tanaafi imimaani ila na guutani.
Nami garaa na jabeese ira na hambisu tokoleeni injiru.
Nyaapi yayu na had'e,
wonti toko ka worra kiyyaa hafe injirtu.
Anini kad'aa harka oliqabad'e nama na qarqaaru d'abe.
AABBO Waaqi garuma ch'ufani ya nyaapa nati bane,
aka waan t'urae badeti na heregani.
Ammo AABBO Waaqi ka d'ugaati,
ato anini isa didele.
Nami lafa ch'ufa na ch'aqasa, gaargala kiyya kana arga,
kaima kiyya ka d'iiratifi ka uwale yayu boojiani.
Anini goli tiyya yaamad'e,
ammo worri na qarqaaru dide.
Qaaloleefi jari gugurdaleni ato waan liqimsu ka ufiini jireesu
barbaadu kara dira keesati raawate.
Ee AABBO Waaqa gaargala kiyya laali,
d'ipu lubbu tiyya argi!
Maro daba kiyyatiifi garaani kiyya yayu aka hamtu laalefate:
Alalleti yayu nama fit'ani;
mana keesaleti nami ya hobae.
Waacha tiyya ch'aqasi;
nami tokoleeni ka, iraa hafi nani jed'u injiru.
Nyaapi kiyya badi atini natiini d'ufte tana ira guddo gammada.
Guyya atini, si qarqaara jette kaaniini kooti,
aka anini amma gaargala kana, nyaapa kiyya gaargalchi.
Ch'ubbu worra inded'ini;
akuma maro ch'ubbu tiyyaatiifi na gaargalchite kana worrale gaargalchi.
Anini gaargale laafe onneeni na ch'ite waan tahu wollaale.

AABBO Waaqi dallansu isaa keesa Sioni dukaneese.
Inni yayu mid'aguma isi ta gubba gadi buuse balleese ona tolche.
Guyya dallansu isaa suni inni mana isale inqaabanne.
AABBO Waaqi naasu male ollowani Yakobo ch'ufa balleese
maneeni jajabdu Yuda ch'ufa ch'ach'abse jisse,
ammalle lafafi hayyoota isiile ch'eerse.
Dallansu isaa guddo suni keesa inni irre Israeli ch'abse,
gaafa nyaapi nuti d'ufeele nu qarqaaru dide,
aka ibida nuti bobae waan ch'ufa balleese.
Inni aka nyaapa keenna t'iya nuti qabe,
nama keenna ka nu jaalanne d'aabbanne ch'ufa fit'e.
Arma Yerusalemu keesaleti dallansuni isaa ta aka ibida boobetu nu d'aqabde.
AABBO Waaqi ya Israeli aka nyaapa balleese;
maneeni jajabdufi ka hayyootale ch'ufa ona tolche,
ammalle, laalala ind'umanne worra Yudatini d'ufe.
Inni mana nu isa keesati kad'anne ya ch'abse butuche;
guyya jilatifi ka Sabato ya balleese,
ammalle hayyufi qaallule aka hama iti dallane, akuma takaa.
Aabbo Waaqi waan sorio isaa irati baasani,
lakise Mana isaa qulqullo dide biraa deeme,
aka nyaapi maneeni Yerusalemu gugurdo ch'ach'absule iti lakise.
Fulla nu duri keesati jila tolfannu worri sunini keesati geerara.
AABBO Waaqi aka naabo Sioni jissani ya herege buufate;
inni aka naabo suni tokole inhamne ch'ufa balleesani d'und'umna d'ae.
Doofi d'ed'eertufi naaboni d'akha ka diraani jaaranileeni ya woliini ch'abe butute.
Balbalti fullo diraleni ya lafa lit'e,
danqaro isiileeni ch'ach'abt'e buloofte.
Hayyu worratifi jaarole worra gugurdole ya boojiani.
Seerileni bade duuba raagootileeni deebite d'uga AABBO Waaqaa ingartu.
Jaaroleeni Yerusalemu biyye matati ufi nanat'e woya ch'arqi uyifate ch'allifte,
akuma nama dooti iti galte teteeti;
dubarti Israelileeni naate mataa lafati gajejete teteeti.
Ilti ya bohaani na luluqaate,
garaani kiyyaleni ya aka male gaargale,
ammalle waan gosa tiyya balleesanifi laalalti ya garaa na yakite.
Ijoolleefi daimi didiqaleeni gagagabe kara dira keesati jijige.
Ijoolleeni tuni beelaa d'eebuu haawani worraa boote,
kara keesati aka waan madeesani jijidde,
harka haawani worraa keesati laanuma hobaati.
Ee Yerusalemu, bad'aaso tiyya ta anini jaalad'u, ani maani dubbad'a,
yokhaani akamini garaa si jabeesa?
Nami tokoleeni aka kanke kana taka ingaargale.
Badiini tante guddo aka bisaani baariini.
Eentu dandae badi si d'owa?
Raagooti tanteleeni daayya ufi keesa waan d'ara male; waan
d'uga maani siti himte?
Barsiisani worraleeni si sobde,
daba kanke akanaani diidati imbaamne;
tanaafi atini waan ira deebiufi inqabu jetta.
Nami si d'aatu bahu ch'uftinu si goyeese,
si tufate mata
gingilfate badi tante koble waan jed'u,
Tunini d'uguma dira mid'aaga Yerusalemu kaani?
Diri dira ch'ufa mohu ka baanani kana?
Nyaapi kanke ch'ufti si goyeese ila hamtuni si laale ilkani qare waan jed'u,
Nu si imballeesine ree?
Qaraa guyyaani nu eegannu kana!
AABBO Waaqi waan qara malate ya tolche;
inni yayu naasu male nu hobaase, akuma duri nuuni jed'e.
Inni harka nyaapa keennati nuu kenne badi teennaani worra gammachiise.
Ee Yerusalemu, maneeni tanteleeni ha AABBO Waaqati bootu,
imimaani kankeleeni ha aka
galaana halkani guyya yaani;
bohafi laalala halkani guyya ilakisini akasiini ufi dad'absiisi.
Halkani kana ch'ufa kakaa,
AABBO Waaqati boha;
AABBO Waaqa durati garaa kanke laafisi aka bisaani tolchi;
ilmaani tante ta garaachani mogaa dira ch'ufati hobau jirtu jed'a, naasu isaa kad'ad'a!
Ee AABBO Waaqa, worra atini gaargalchite kana laali!
Nad'eeni ilmaani ufi ta d'alte fooni nyaachu ya malte?
Qaaloleefi raagootale Mana Waaqa keesati ya fit'u malani?
Reefi nama, diqaafi guddaani ka d'iiratifi ka uwaleeni,
lola keesa woliini ch'iisa ka goraade nyaapa worratiini fit'ani.
Atini naasu male guyya dallansu tanteeti worra fit'e.
Akuma nama jilati yaamtu atini nyaapa kiyya nati yaamte,
worri na marse lubbu na keesaa baase.
Duuba guyya dallansu tante suni worri tokoleeni dandae duraa imbahu.
Worri ijoolle tiyya ta jaalalaani anini guddise naraa fit'e.

Anuma ch'allati d'aanicha ule Waaqa beekha.
Inni na fuud'e dukana sipe keesa na buuse.
Maro heddu naasu male na d'aane na ijeese.
Inni fooni diimo diidati na baase lafe na ch'ach'abse.
Inni na qabe gaargalafi d'ipu hamtu keesa na buuse.
Ammalle irrumani dukana sipe dua keesa na teesise.
Inni sansalatani na hid'e aka nama
qabani ka abdi baqatuni inqamne na tolche.
Yo anini qarqaarsa kad'ad'a lalabe iti bohule,
Waaqi na ch'aqasu dide.
Ato anini daaqa deemu,
naaboni d'akhaani jaarani na marsite deemu na d'owarte.
Aka gorjama na gaade aka nyeench'a nati kurupate,
kara iraa na gorse gargari na ch'ire lafa na buuse.
Guube ufi ta t'iya fud'ate t'iya ufitini na had'e.
Inni t'iya ufitini na woraane na fufulaanse.
Halkani guyya na koblani sirba keesati na goyeesani.
Bisaani had'ao laagati na naqe sagale had'ooftu irreeni nati guure.
Fuula lafati na rige ilkani ch'irachaani na ch'ach'abse.
Anini waan fayyaafi nagayafi gammadi qabu ya wollaale.
Tanaafi anini waan jed'e,
Guyyaani kiyya ya hobae,
gara Waaqale d'aabu inqabu.
Qaabachani d'ukubsacha tiyyaatiifi ka worra kiyya ka anini d'abe,
yayu had'a nati taate.
Anini hojja ch'ufa waan suni qabad'e garaani kiyya iraa hamaate.
Ammo hojja waan kana qaabad'e waan heregad'u qaba:
Jaalalaafi naasuuni AABBO Waaqa,
ta ind'umne guyya ch'ufa inuma jirti.
Jaalalaafi naasuuni sunini diirama ch'ufa hareeti,
ammalle guyya ch'ufa injirti aka bari diirama.
AABBO Waaqa male woma inqabu,
tanaafi isa heregad'a.
AABBO Waaqi nama isa d'ugeefate ch'ufati dansa,
tanaafi yo obsani baafama isaa eegatani ira namaa jirti.
Ammalle obsa kana yo ijoollumani barattani guddo dansa.
Yo gaargali namati d'ufe,
ch'allisani obsani koba ufira tau malani.
Waaqa durati ufi diqeesu malani,
d'aabuuni inuma jirtifa.
Ato d'aanani arabsanile nami waan kana ch'ufa ee jed'e fud'achu male.
AABBO Waaqi naaso,
haga jiru jireenna nama indidu.
Inni dandae laalala namatiini d'ufa,
ammo jaalalti isaa ta inni nu jaalatu jaalala d'ugaati, ammalle jabdu.
Inni laalefachafi d'ukubsacha namatiini d'ufu iraa ingammadu.
Hojja hid'ansa keesati nama ch'ach'arasani AABBO Waaqi imbeekha.
Hojja d'uga inni nu kenne nu d'owani, inni imbeekha.
Hojja gaadisati nu dabsani, inni imbeekha.
Fed'i AABBO Waaqa ch'allati guyya ch'ufa guutama.
Wonti dansaafi hamtuleeni jechuma isaa gula taati.
Nu maanifi gungumna, yo wollaala keenna jed'ani nu d'aanani?
Koota me, aka dansa ufi qorre AABBO Waaqati deebina.
Nu garaa keenna banne Waaqa keenna ka gubba jiru kad'anne waan jennu,
Nu yayu ch'ubbamne si dinne AABBO Waaqa,
atileeni nu inaraamne.
Atini nu reebde nu fit'e,
dallansuni tanteleeni naasu tante nuraa d'ossite;
dallansuni tante suni ta aka dumansa siti gollite,
kad'a teenna siti dabru d'owarte.
Atini yayu huura wolti harani ka lafa ch'ufa nu tolchite.
Nyaapi keenna ch'ufti yayu nu arabse nu miid'e.
Gaargala hamafi badileeni nu qabate.
Arrale soda lubbuti imbulu.
Imimaani aka galaana ila keesaa na yaani waan gosa tiyya balleesanifi.
Imimaani kiyya akuma laga yau yaani.
Haga AABBO Waaqi nu ilaale nu arguti.
Hojja anini waan nad'eeni dira kana tolchani argu,
garaani kiyya guddo laalefata.
Nyaapi kiyya ka womafu na injibbine
akuma simpire t'ururaani qabani na qabe.
Ato anini jiru boola keesa na buuse d'akhaani nati timfe.
Bisaaleeni na liqimsani,
ufi sodaad'e waan lubbuuni na keesaa baatu ufi sehe.
Ka hunda boola suni jiru,
ee AABBO Waaqa, anini siti bohe si kad'ad'e.
Na d'agayi siini jed'e jennaani na d'ageete,
na jalaa owaate, insodatini nani jette.
Ee AABBO Waaqa,
atini na qarqaaru d'ufte lubbu na baafte.
Daba nati hojattani imbeeta, d'uga naa laali.
Atini haalo nyaapi kiyya naa qabuufi aka worri nati malatu imbeeta.
Atini aka worri na arabse nati malate imbeeta,
ee AABBO Waaqa.
Guyya gudda kana ch'ufa worri waan kiyya dubbate mala nati d'aata.
D'ia bari ch'ufa na goyeesani.
Ee AABBO Waaqa kiyya,
akuma worri kunini na tolche kana worrale tolchi.
Worra abaari ufi jibbisisi!
Fulla ch'ufa barbaadi lafa ira hat'ai!

Worqiini teenna bibilit'uni ya boorajofte;
d'akhaani Mana Waaqatini duri jaaranile firfirfame
fulla ch'ufa kara keesa ch'iisa.
Ilmaani Sioni duri nuti waan jabdu, worqi nuti fakaatti,
amma tana yayu aka okote faarati heregani.
Yayileeni ilmaani ufi qorqorate hosifate,
ammo worri kiyya akuma guchi ilmaani ufiti naasu inqamne jira.
Ilmaani worra garaachafi d'eebuuni duati lakisani;
duuba ijoolleeni sagale kad'atti,
ammo namu nahe inkennufi.
Nami duri nama ch'ufa ira sagale dadansa nyaatu ch'ufti garaachani,
dira keesati hobau jira;
worri duri machi keesa guddate,
ch'ufti fulla huura sagale iti jissani keesa bubua qote barbadata.
worri imbeekatini harka Waaqatini bade ira gaargale.
Ilmaani hayyoota teennaleeni duri qulqullo adi
ch'aama aka aananiti,
gagabbo jajabdu, nafi fayya qabu.
Ammo amma kara dira keesa goblooli worraa,
ka nami gargari imbenne,
dooti guratesite gogafi lafeeni
aka mukha wolti gogodde ufuma ch'iisaa.
Nami woraanani due, nama eegi suni,
garaachani gaargale hobae ira gooma.
waan hamtu taka inarginiti worra kiyyati bue,
haawani ilmaani ufi d'alte naasu d'abde,
d'aabate nyaate.
AABBO Waaqi aka male dallane,
gugubate, dallansu sunini d'ufe Sioni,
ibida iti bobeese gube hobaase.
Nami lafa gubba jiru tokoleeni,
yokhaani hayyooti lafa d'ibileeni,
aka nyaapi dandae fullo Yerusalemu,
ch'abse seennu qara insehatu.
Ammo wonti woni sunini taatefi maro raagooti isi ch'ubbu tolchite,
ammalle qaaloleni isiileeni nama wollaala inqamne d'iiga buufteefi.
Jaaroleeni worra gugurdoni aka balla kara gula jonjiti;
ammalle nani tokoleeni botole d'iigati jed'e worrati d'iachu dide.
Biyyiti iti iyyite waan jetteni,
Nura fagaad'a! Isani ya t'urooftani,
nu intuqina!
Jennaani worri kae lafa ch'ufa keesa mare,
ka keessumoma nama tokole ira inargatini.
AABBO Waaqi worra firfirse, deebie qaabachu dide.
Ammalle dubbi qaaloleefi
raagoota, tufate.
Nu qarqaarsa eganne guyya ch'ufa iluma baamne gara inni d'ufufi laale.
Ammo nu ufuftu gosa qarqaarsa womatu ka nu kennitu inqamne iraa wo eeganne.
Nyaapi nu eegate,
nu karale gula worraa jenne yau dad'amne.
Guyyaani keenna ya gabaabate, muummeeni teenna ya geete.
Worri risa waaqa ira barisu ira oriuti nu reeba.
Gareeni irati faana nu d'ae lafa alooti ka nu imbeekatini tassa na qabe.
Worri, hayyu AABBO Waaqi fohate, ka jireenna keenna,
ka nu waan inni nyaapa ch'ufa nuraa d'owu seenne abdane qabe,
Isani worri Edomufi Usi amma haga dandeetani kobla gammada;
badiini teesanileeni fago injirtu ya isani d'aqabu geete;
isanileni amuma d'iotu ch'eeraani dadaaqa qulla yaatani.
Sionini ya gati daba ufi baafte tanaafi,
AABBO Waaqi harka worra nu boojie keesaa gadi nu d'iisa.
Ammo ee Edomu, AABBO Waaqi si gaargalche wollaala kanke diidati baasa.

Ee AABBO, waan nu tolchani qaabad'i,
nu ilaali, ch'eera keenna argi.
Horini keenna ch'ufti harka nyaapa jira,
nama gosa d'ibiiti worra keennati gala.
Nyaapi yayu abbooti teenna fit'e,
amma hawani teennaleeni hiyyeeyi.
Bisaani d'unnu bitachu malle,
qorani ibidale beese male inargannu.
Qaampara mormati nu kayani nu gaargalchani,
hafuura baafachu nu d'owani.
Nu gara lafa Misiritifi ta Ashuru sagale kad'achu d'anne
aka beelaani indoone jiranu.
Ababooti teenna ta duri ch'ubbamte amma ya raawatte,
amma nuti ch'ubbu worraa sunini gaargalu jira.
Nama tisse fakatuti nu mohachu jira,
nami tokoleeni ka harka worra keesa nu baasu injiru.
Algali nama fit'u lafa keesa mara,
tanaafi sagale barbaaditini nuu lubbu.
Beelti ya nu qannachiifte haga gogaani keenna aka ibida owuti.
Nad'eeni teenna gaara Sioni irati yayu buufatani.
Ollowaani Yudea ch'ufa keesaleti dubra teenna irreeni buufatani.
Worra keenna gugurdale yayu fafannisani,
jaarole teennale yayu ch'eeraafi foko d'abanifi.
Kaima keenna yayu irreeni mid'aani d'aansisani;
ijoolleeni teenna ta d'iiraleeni ulfinna qorani jaalati lelet'i.
Jaaroleeni aka duri kaani fullo dira keesa inteteetu,
kaimileeni deebie insirbu.
Gammachuuni yayu jireenna keenna keesa badde,
sirbi keenna ka durileeni ya boha tahe.
Wonti nu qara hereganne tokoleeni nu inhamne.
Nu waan ch'ubbu hojanneefi amma badiini nu qabatte.
Wonti garaani keenna hamaate ilti teenna duudefi,
maro gaari Sioni ch'eekhaye koba hafe,
sareeni diida ch'allaani gubba martufi.
Ammo atini, ee AABBO Waaqa,
hayyu haga jiru jireenna tau,
ammalle haga d'aloota ch'ufa namuma fidda.
Atini maanifi hagana ch'ufa nu lakifte?
Atini d'uguma deebite nu inqaabata?
Ee AABBO Waaqa, ufi gula nu deebisi,
ee ee Waaqa nu deefad'u.
Jireenna keenna ka duriti nu deebisi.
Yokhaani atini haga jiru jireenna nu dida?
Dallansuni tante haga inqabdu?

(Gaafi suni ganna shaneeso ka haga hayyu Yekonia boojiani.)
Artiti, lafa Babiloni keesa, ka anini d'aatu galaana Kedari jiru, anini qonqo AABBO Waaqa d'agaye jabeenna isaa argad'e.
Jennaani anini oli millad'e, dumansa bokaya gudda mirgaa d'ufu arge. Dumansa suni keesa angaasuuni bibilit'e, lafti ch'ufti guyyaate. Fulla angaasuuni suni baatefi waan toko ka aka sibiila diima bibiliqati jira.
Duuba jiddu dumansa bokaya suni keesa anini waan lubbu qaba, afuri, ka nama fakaata, arge.
Wonti suni ch'ufti fuula afurifi koola afuri qabdi.
Miili worraa qaqajeela, qeench'i worraaleeni aka qeench'a looni jira, ammalle aka sibiila diima ka rigani mid'aasani bibiliqa.
Fuula afurifi koola afraani suni male, worri ch'ufti harka afuri, ka aka harka nama jiru koola ch'ufa jalaa qaba.
Wonti sunini afraanu koola lama babalifate, koola suni fiit'eeni woltut'e marte wolti deebite. Wonti sunini, yo yaatu, ka gargari imbaane aka waan takaa woliini yaati.
Wonti sunini ch'ufti koola lama olfud'ate, aka akanaani kooli waan toko koola waan iti aanati gama gamaa fiit'eeni woli tuqu. Ammalle waan suni ch'ufa kooli isii ka hafe kaani lamaani nafati mamat'ana.
Wonti sunini kama, waan gara afuri fuula deefatufi, ka garaingalle garuma feete yaati.
Jiddu waan afraani suni araba ibida gudda gara ch'ufa deemtuti jira. Ibidi sunini balalie bobae, araba aka angaasu oldarba.
Wonti lubbu qaba sunini ch'ufti aka angaasu oli gadi bilit'e oriti.
Miili suni afraani ch'ufti aka takaa jira; ch'ufti akuma d'akha ch'ululuqa bibiliqa. Ammalle miili suni kama miila d'ibiti wod'aka keesaani iti ejaanja,
aka akanaani miili sunini afraanu gamuma fuula deefatu yau.
Girangira miila suni ch'ufa marse, ilati iti ejaanja.
Yo wonti lubbu qabu suni yaatu ch'ufa, miililleeni wolumaani deema, ammalle yo wonti sunini oli kaate ch'ufa miililleeni olkaa.
Wonti sunini garuma feetu yaati miililleeni woma isiini taatu taha, wonti akanatiifi irreeni miila suni waan suni iraa baati.
Tanaafi yo wonti sunini yaate, yokhaani ejate, yokhaani olbarifte, miililleeni akasuma taha.
Waan aka gasare suni jalaa wonti kaani afraani ejaanjite, wonti sunini kama koola isii lama moga mogaani ballifatte, koola waan iti aanati tut'i, ammo kooli lama nafa d'ossa.
Wonti sunini barimnaani qonqooni koola isii shawesa d'awa galaanatifi dibbeesa duula guddatifi qonqo Waaqa gudda nati fakaate. Wonti sunini barifte teteete jennaani koola dachaafate,
ammo waan aka gasare ka mata isii ira jira kaani qonqumati keesaa d'ufa.
Wonti sunini aka sibiila diima wod'aka ibida keesa tau bilit'i. Ammalle wonti nama fakaata sunini
ifsa bifa ule Waaqaa ch'ufa qabuuni fulla ch'ufati ifsite. Kunini ifsa bibiliqu, ka aka AABBO Waaqi arti jiru, garsiisu.
Anini waan suni ch'ufa arginaani isa durati lafaani ufi d'ae qonqo nami dubbatu d'agaye.

Qonqooni suni waan nani jette, Namicha, kai, oli eji, anini woi sini jechu fed'a.
Ato anini tae qonqo suni waan isiini jettu ch'aqasu, lubbuuni Waaqa naa seente oli na kaafte, jennaani qonqo akana jette na yaamtu d'agaye.
Namicha, anini gara gumi Israeli si erga. Worri ya nati garagale nyaapa nati tae, akuma ababooti worraa duri taate.
Worri mata jajaba, diqole naa insaalfatu, tanaafi anini amma si erga, aka atini waan anini, AABBO Waaqi guddaani, jed'u worrati himtu.
Worri na dide sunini yo si ch'aqaseefi yo si ch'aqasule baate, aka raagi worrati d'ufe imbeekha.
Ammo, namicha, atini worraafi dubbi worrale insodatini. Ato worri aka mogoreetifi qoraati si marse, qanjibu siti tahele, worraafi waan worri jed'ule ind'eetini. Worra mata jaba, ka na dide suni, insodatini.
Ato worri si ch'aqase si ch'aqasule baate, waan anini sini jed'u kana worrati himi. Beekhi worri worra mata jajaba ka nami waan isaa dandauniti.
Namicha, waan anini sini jed'u ch'aqasi, mata jabaatte aka worraa na jalaa indidini. Afaani banad'i, waan anini siti kennu kana nyaad'i.
Jennaani anini harka woraqata na dura qabu jiru arge.
Harki kaani woraqata kaani gargari saaqe, jennaani aka gama isaa lachu t'aafani barreesani arge — gama lachutu dubbi laalalaatifi bohafi owanna t'aafani.

Duuba anini afaani bane, inni woraqata nyaad'i nani jed'e kaani naa kenne
waan nani jed'e, Namicha, woraqata anini sii kenne kana nyaad'i, garaa guutad'i yo anini nyaad'e, woraqati kaani aka damma miaa.
Jennaani Waaqi waan jed'e, Namicha, gara worra Israeli d'aqi waan anini sini jed'e ch'ufa worrati himi.
Anini gosa d'ibi afaani jajabo nami ind'ageenneti si inergu, ammo gara gosa Israeli si erga.
Yo anini sila gosa jajabdu, afaani jajabo, atini ind'ageenne dubbatuti si erge worri si d'agaya.
Ammo worri Israeli tokoleeni si ind'agayu, nale ind'agayu. Worri ch'ufti mata jajaba, waan nami dandauniti.
Anini amma sile aka worraa mata jabeese, nama nami indandeenne tolcha.
Anini adda tante aka d'akha jabeese aka sibiila si tolcha; worra na dide nyaapa nati tae kana insodatini.
Ammalle Waaqi waan jed'e, Namicha waan anini siti hime kana aka dansaa mid'aafad'i, qalbeefad'i.
Duuba worra gosa tanteeti, ka boojiani lafa d'ibi jiru, d'aqi, waan anini, AABBO Waaqi, worraani jed'u iti himi, yo worri si ch'aqaseefi ch'aqasu baatele.
Duuba lubbuuni Waaqa oli na fuute. Jennaani qonqo guddo toko ta, guddinna AABBO Waaqa gubba jiru faarsa, jettu ufi duubati d'agaye.
Wobbeesa koolatifi girreesa miila kaani, ka aka lafa chochootu dibbisu, d'agaye.
Irreeni AABBO Waaqa humna guddoni nati d'ufte, ato lubbuuni isaa oliini na deemtu anini aka male dallane garaa hammaad'e.
Duuba akanaani anini Telabibu, ta d'aatu galaana Kebari jirtu, fulla worri boojiani kaani jiruni bahe. Duuba bulti torba arti bule, wonti anini arge d'agaye sunini na mamsiifte, akanumati na bakhasite.
Bultini torbaani taani dabarte jennaani AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e,
Namicha, anini nama gosa Israeli eegu si tolcha. Gorsa anini siti himu kana jabeesi himi.
Yo anini ch'ubbicha yaame, Atini indoota jed'eeni, ka atileeni isa yaamte, kara kanke hama kana iraa deebii, hegeri indoota jette ingorsini, inni dabuma suni keesa dua, duuba anini duisa isaa suni si qabad'a.
Ammo yo atini ch'ubbicha suni gorsite, inni daba lakisu dide, inni dabuma suni keesati dua, ammo atini lubbu tante imbaafta.
Yo nami d'ugaa d'uga lakise waan hamtu gula bahe aninileeni waan hamtu isa tolche, inni yo atini ingorsini indua. Inni waan hameenna tolcheefi dua — dansuma duri inni tolche tokole inhereganifi, duuba anini duisa isaa kanale si qabad'a.
Yo atini nama dansa daba intolchini jette gorsite duuba inni si d'agae daba tolchu dide inni induu, sile iniijeesani.
Anini jabeenna AABBO Waaqa arge isa kai, bale d'aqi, achiti siini dubbad'a jed'u d'agaye.
Jennaani anini bale suni d'aqe, achiti guddinna AABBO Waaqaa, akuma anini qara d'aatu galaana Kebariti arge kaani arge. Duuba anini jige addaani lafa d'ae,
jennaani lubbuuni Waaqa na seente oli na fuute, AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e, Namicha, beeni gali mana seeni, ufiti ch'ufi.
Duuba achiti haadani si hid'aani biyyati gabahu si d'owani.
Anini araba si hid'e, atini worra na dide kana gorsu dad'abda.
Duuba hojja anini ammalle sini dubbad'e araba si hiikhe, waan anini, AABBO Waaqi guddaani, jed'u worrati himta. Nami ch'aqasu ha ch'aqasu, nami inch'aqamne ha tauti.

Waaqi waan jed'e, Namicha, matofaara fuud'i, ufi dura kayi, akheekha dira Yerusalemu irati tatarari.
Duuba fakeenna boolatiifi biyye olbaasanifi, bultofi waan balbala diratini ch'absanile ka aka dira sunini marsani garsiiftu, irati tatarari.
Daboola sibiila fuud'i, siifi dira jiddu aka dalla, old'aabi. Duuba fuula dira suniti deefad'i, dira suni ya marsani, nami marsu jiruleeni siuma. Wonti kunini ch'ufti worra Israeliti akheekha taati.
Duuba gama kanke ka bitaati ch'iisi, anini ch'ubbu worra Israeli ch'ufa sira kaya. Atini bulti d'ibba sadiifi sagaltama artuma ch'iifte, maro daba worrati jette gaargalta. Akuma worri ganna d'ibba saditifi sagaltama gaargala keesa tau, atinileeni bulti d'ibba saditifi sagaltama gaargala keesa teeta.
Yo tana hobaaftele akuma worri Yuda ganna afurtama gaargala agarte, gama mirgaati garagali, bulti afurtama garagali, ch'iisi.
Dira Yerusalemu ka marsani ila iti qabi qubale iti irbi badi isaa fagi.
Haga marsitini dira kana marsani tunini dabartuti aka atini gama tokoleti gara ingalle anini haadani si hid'a.
Duuba amma dargaye, garbu, halquqa, d'engo, misinga, t'aafi daakhi, wolti makhi, qit'a d'aabad'i. Wonti atini bulti d'ibba saditifi sagaltama, ka atini gama bitaati ch'iiftu, nyaatu tana.
Duuba sagale tana wonti atini guyya toko nyaachu malte waan aka moqa gudda shanii; tana male bori asi sagaleeni atini argatu d'ibiini injirtu.
Ammalle bisaani wonti atini guyyaati d'ugu malte muduunu lama ch'alla.
Ibidale, wonti atini bobeefatuni kosi udaani namaa; duuba ibida sunini qit'a d'aabad'i, fulla nami ch'ufti si argu tai nyaad'i.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'e, Akuma kana worri Israeli sagale sila nyaachu himmalini, gaafa boojiani lafa d'ibi geesani, nyaata.
Ammo anini waan jed'eeni, ee AABBO Waaqa gudda, akasi intau, anini takaa ufi int'ureesine, haguma d'alad'ele takaa fooni waan ufiini due yokhaani ka bineensi d'ibiini nyaate inyaanne. Anini taka sagale nami lagatu insooranne.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi waan jed'e, Hayye dansa, yoosi fulla suni kosi loonitini qit'a d'abad'u.
Ammalle inni waan jed'e, Namicha, anini sagale worri Yerusalemu argatu iraa kuta. Nami achi keesa tau, ato sagaleefi bisaani qusatu, yaadae gaargala.
Duuba worri sagaleefi bisaanile d'abe, maro daba ufitifi ufi jibbaate, akanumati raawata.

AABBO Waaqi waan jed'e, Namicha, haadu qara qabdu fud'ad'i areedaafi mata keetile ch'ufa haadi. Duuba rifeensa suni misana irati biimi, fulla saditi gargari qoodi?
Qooda toko, eegi nyaapi dira marse kaani kae gale, dira keesati gubi, tokole, ato dira keesaa baate lafa martu, goraadeeni ch'iri. Ka hafe kaanile qilleensa keesati firfirsi, anati goraade tiyyaani faana deeme ch'ira.
Rifeensa diqa toko hambisi, handaara woyaati hid'ad'i.
Duuba diqa toko keesaa fuud'i, ibida keesa buusi, ha gubatuti. Duuba rifeensa suni ira ibidi bahe gosa Israeli ch'ufa qabata.
AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'e, Yerusalemu ta anini jiddu lafa ch'ufa kae, lafti d'ibiini marsite laali.
Ammo worri Israeli ch'ufti seera kiyya dide, gosa d'ibi ta lafa worraa d'aatu jirtu ch'ufa ira ch'ubbame, dubbi tiyya dide. Worri akanaani seera kiyya ch'abse dubbi tiyyale gula deemu dide.
Ammo worra Yerusalemu waan anini, AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'u ch'aqasa. Waan isani aadaafi seera kiyya guutu diddaniifi isani gosa d'aatu teesani teetu ch'ufa ira woi yakitani, ammalle aada gosa d'ibi gula yaatani.
Tanaafi anini, AABBO Waaqi guddaani, waan isaniini jed'u, Anini amma nyaapa keesani. Anini ato gochiti ch'ufti agartu gaargala isanitini d'ufa.
Waan isani waan anini jibbu tolchitaniifi, anini dira Yerusalemu waan taka intolchinifi waan deebie intolchinele tolcha.
Maro waan kanatifi worri Yerusalemu ilmaani ufi nyaate, ilmaanileeni worra isaani nyaati. Anini isani gaargalche, nama keesani ka lubbuuni baheele lafa ch'ufa keesa gara ch'ufa firfirsa.
Tanaafi anini, AABBO Waaqi guddaani, kakhad'e waan jed'u, waan isani mana kiyya qulqullo waan hamtu keesati tolchitani t'ureesitanifi, naasu male isani balleesa.
Nami keesani hagi toko beelafi d'ukubaani dira keesati hobaa; hagi toko dira keesaa bahe alati goraadeeni gatani; duuba ka hafele gara ch'ufa gargari firfirse, gula deeme goraadeeni balleesa.
Akasiini eegi haalo baafad'e, dallansuuni naraa galte. Duuba eegi wonti kunini ch'ufti taate, aka anini, AABBO Waaqi, isaniini dubbad'e beetani, waan anini maro ch'ubbu teesanitifi guddo isaniti dallaneefi.
Nami gosa d'ibi, ka d'aatu teesani bahu ch'ufti, isani goyeese isani ira fagaata.
Hojja anini aka male isaniti dallane isani gaargalchu, gochiti d'aatu teesani jirtu ch'ufti mudamte, isani tufate isani goyeesiti.
Anini sagale isani iraa kute, garaachani isani hobaasa. Beelti suni aka t'iya isani fit'i.
Anini beelafi bineensa ala ka ijoolle teesani fit'u isaniti erge, d'ukuba hamafi woraani isaniti d'ufe isani balleesa, Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.

AABBO Waaqi na yaame waan nani jed'e,
Namicha, fuula kanke gara gaara Israeli deefad'i, dubbi tiyya tana iti himi,
waan jettuuni, Isani gaareeni Israeli, waan AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'u, d'agaya. AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan kubileefi gaareenifi godaafi baleeni jed'u, Dubbi tiyya d'agaya. Anini fulla nami waaqoota d'ara iti kad'atu woraana iti erga.
Aka waan sorio irati baasanifi fulla hit'aana keesati aarsanile ch'ach'absani butuchani. Ammalle nama achi jiru suni ch'ufa Waaqoota worra suni durati fit'ani.
Anini reefa worra Israelille firfirse, lafele worrale d'aatu waan sorio irati baasaniti jissa.
Dira Israeli ch'ufa balleesani, fulla worri sorio irati baasufi waaqoota worrale ch'ufa tumani butuchani, waan worri hit'aana iti aarfatule ch'ach'absani, waan worri mid'aafatu ch'ufa d'id'iimati d'aani.
Nama fulla ch'ufati fit'ani, nami waan suni jalaa bahu aka anini AABBO Waaqaa beekha.
Anini nama gari woraana jalaa baase, duuba worra suni lafa ch'ufa keesa firfirsani,
worri achuma taa. Achiti worri na qaabate aka anini worra gaargalche ch'eerse beekha; wonti akanatiifi worri na lakise Waaqoota d'ara gula bahe Waaqa suni nara jaalate. Ammalle worri maro ch'eera d'abe waan hamtu taheefi ufi jibba.
Duuba worri aka anini AABBO Waaqaa beekhe, ammalle aka gorsi anini worra gorseleeni d'uga arga.
AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'e, Harka raraasa, lafa d'id'iita, maro waan ch'eera hamtu worri Israeli taheeti jed'a boha. Worri woraanafi beelafi d'ukubaani raawata.
Nami fago jiru fayyad'abe raawata; ka d'io jiru woraanaani hobaa; ka waan suni jalaa bahuleeni garaachani hobaa. Akanaani worri aka dallansuuni tiyya hamtu arga.
Reefa worra fulla worri waaqoota isaani iti kad'atuufi fulla sorio irati baasanifi kubileefi gaareeni ch'ufa gubbaa, mukeeni dodotifi mukeeni gugurdole ch'ufa jalati firfirsani, fulla worri Waaqoota ufiiti sorio iti qalu ch'ufati. Duuba akanaani nami ch'ufti aka anini AABBO Waaqa beekha.
Ee, anini harka kiyya olfud'ad'e, lafa worrale ch'ufa balleese, lafa gamooji ta bitaati fuud'e, dira Ribla ka mirgati d'aabe, ona tolche, ammalle nama Israeli ka keesa jiru ch'ufa bahu d'owa. Duuba akanaani nami ch'ufti aka anini AABBO Waaqa beekha.

AABBO Waaqi na yaame waan nani jed'e,
Namicha, wonti anini, AABBO Waaqi guddaani, lafa Israeli ch'ufani jed'u, tana: Tunini muumme lafa tana ch'ufa.
Worra Israeli, muummeeni teesani ya geete, dallansu tiyya, waan isiini isani tolchitu, inagartani, anini waan isani tolchitani gula wollaala isaniti mura. Anini maro huji hamtu isani tolchitaniifi isani gaargalcha.
Ammalle biraa isani indeemu yokhaani diqole isani innahu. Maro waan hamtu isani tolchitaniifi, anini isani gaargalcha, aka akanaani isani aka anini AABBO Waaqa beetani.
Wonti AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'u tana, Badiini teesani woluma duubani d'ufti.
Muummeeni ya geete, muummeeni ya geete, isani ya hobaatani.
Isani, nama lafa tana keesa jiru, muummeeni teesani ya geete. Guyyaani ya ala hobae, ka deebiani gaareeni gubbati jila intolfanne, ammo dadallaani waan tahani wollaalani.
D'iotu isaniini ch'ufti aka dallansuuni tiyya hamtu agartani. Maro waan isani tolchitanitiifi wollaala isaniti mure, maro waan hamtu isani tolchitanitiifi waan isanii male isanii kenna.
