Ammalle anini biraa isanii indeemu, yokhaani isanii innahu. Maro waan hamtu isani tolchitanitiifi, anini isani gaargalcha, aka akanaani isani aka anini AABBO Waaqa, ka isani gaargalchu beetani.
Guyyaani Israeliini badu d'ufuu jira, had'iisi fulla ch'ufa kau jira, ufi saaditileeni ya lafa ira dabarte.
Had'iisi sunini ch'ubbu d'ibi lafatini d'ufa. Wonti tokoleeni worrati inhaftu, hori taanaani, hormaata taanaani, guddinnale taanaani.
Guyyaani ind'ufa, ya d'iaate, ka wo bitisafi wo gurgurileeni badu, wonti akanatiifi dallansuuni AABBO Waaqa nama ch'ufa wolqit'eesite geeti.
Nami woi gurguru tokoleeni lubbu bule waan iraa bade indeefatu, wonti akanatiifi dallansuuni Waaqaa ya nama ch'ufa geete. Nami ch'ubbu qabu waan kana duraa imbahu.
Magalaata ya d'aani, nami ch'ufti ya kurfae, ammo nami duulu injiru, wonti akanatiifi dallansuuni Waaqa ya nama ch'ufa qit'eesite geete.
Dira keesati woli had'ani, fayyad'abafi beeltileeni mana keesati nama qabati. Ammalle nama diidati hafu woraanati ijeesa, ka dira keesa jiruleeni d'ukubafi beelaani raawata.
Hagiini aka sabaliisa bale keesaa rifatu rifate gaareeniti baqata. Nami ch'ufti ch'ubbu ufitifi laalefate boha.
Harki nama ch'ufa darrate, miili worraleeni holata.
Ammalle worri ch'arqi naqate, nafi isaani ch'ufti holate, mata haadate, worra ch'ufa ch'eeri balleesa.
Worri worqifi qarsi ufi akuma huura kara keesati jissa, wonti akanatiifi qarsifi worqiini worraa dandeete dallansu AABBO Waaqa dura worra imbaaftu. Worri dandae qarsifi worqi suni soorate beelaani imbahu, wonti worra ch'ubbu keesa buuse waan suni.
Worri duri faaya ch'uch'uluqa naqatu kanani guddo koore, Waaqoota worrale woma suniini mid'aafate. Wonti AABBO Waaqi hori worraa worrati had'eesefi suni.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Anini gosa d'ibi worrati erga, ta worra saamtu, ammalle nami wo yaku ch'ufti waan worri qabu ch'ufa fud'ate t'ureesa.
Ammalle hojja hattuuni mana kiyya qulqullo duude t'ureesitu, anini woma iraa inqabu.
Wonti ch'ufti ya aka iraa gorte — lafa ch'ufa keesati nami wolfit'e dira ch'ufa keesaleti wolballeesa.
Anini gosa hamtu ch'ufa armaani d'ufe, worri maneeni teesani ch'ufa boojia. Nami keesani jajabaani ch'ufti waan tahu wollaale ufi jibbaata, hojja anini fulla isani Waaqa iti kad'atani taani gosa d'ibi iti lakise, worri t'ureesu.
Mudamtani ufi jibbaattani nagaya barbaaddani, ammo inargatani.
Badiini woluma duubani isani qabatte, oduuni hamtuni gargari inch'inne gurra isani guuti. Isani raaga kad'atani, maaniti ga d'ufa? jettani gaafattani. Qaaloleeni waan biyya barsiiftu d'abde, jaaroleleni waan namaani gorsitu d'abdi.
Hayyuuni bohe, ilmi isa ufi jibbaate, biyyitileeni naasuni holatti. Anini waan isani tolchitani gula isani gaargalche, akuma isani wollaala namati murtani isanile wollaala iti mura. Duuba isani akanaani aka anini AABBO Waaqa beetani.

Guyya shaneeso, jia jaeeso, ka ganna jaeeso ka eegi nu boojiani, ka anaafi jaaroleeni Yuda mana kiyya keesa woliini jiru, anini akanumati aka jabeenni Waaqa na seene ufi arge.
Jennaani anini olmilad'e, waan aka namaa jira arge. Nafi isaa hid'aanaa gadi, ibida fakaata, ammalle hid'aanaa oli aka sibiila diima, ka rigani qulqulleesani, bibiliqa.
Inni waan aka harkaa jira d'eerefate rifeensa mata na qabe. Jennaani daayya tana keesa lubbuuni AABBO Waaqa oli na fuute, Yerusalemu na geesite, naabo Mana Waaqa garaa keesa fulla fullooni mirga fuula deefatutini na d'ufte. Fulla fullo suni waan harkaani boch'ani kad'atani, ka AABBO Waaqi aka male jibbuti jira.
Waaqi waan nani jed'e, Namicha, mirga millad'i. Anini millad'e jennaani d'aatu waan sorio irati qalani, ta fulla balbala fullo jirtu, waan harkaani boch'ani kad'atani, ta Waaqi aka male jibbu arge.
Waaqi waan nani jed'e, Namicha, waan worri tae kana garta? Waan hamtu worri Israeli armati tolchu kana ilaali, ka fulla tiyya qulqullo tana iraa na fageesu. Ammo atini waan waan kana ira hamtu inagarta.
Jennaani inni balbala naabo ala na geese, fulla isiini qooftuuni na garsiise
waan jed'e, Namicha d'akha naabo tanaani jaarani kana ch'ach'absi. Anini ch'abse jennaani balbala arge.
Inni waan nani jed'e, me, balbala tanaani olseeni, waan ch'eera hamtu worri kunini tolchu jiru laali.
Duuba anini olseene, fulla inni na gaarsiise taani ilaale, jennaani akheekha bofatifi ka bineensa qulqullo intahinitifi waan d'ibi worri Israeli kad'atule, ka irati barreesani, arge.
Fulla suni jaarole Israeli nama torbatama jira worra suni keesa Yaazania ilma Shafaniti jira. Worri sunini ch'ufti waan hit'aana iti aarsani, ka aari keesaa yauti jiru harkaa qaba.
Waaqi waan nani jed'e, Namicha, waan jaaroleeni Israeli tunini d'ossaani tahu jirtu garta? Worri mana akheekhi waan hamtu guute keesati kad'achuu jira. Worri waan jed'u, AABBO Waaqi ya lafa tana lakise, waan nu taanu kanale inargu.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e, Atini waan hagana ira ch'eera, ka worri kunini tolchu, agarta.
Jennaani inni balbala mirga ta Mana Waaqa na geese, nad'eeni waaqa worraa, ka Tamuzi jed'ani, ka lubbu d'abe, bootu na garsiise.
Duuba inni, Namicha, waan kana garta? Waan hagana ira hamtule inagarta nani jed'e.
Jennaani inni ch'icha Mana Waaqa na geese; anini d'aatu balbala Mana Waaqaa, waan sorio irati baasanifi kara jiddu keesa, nama d'iira diddami shani arge. Worri Mana Waaqa dudda iti gale ilaboruti fuula deefate, gajejed'e, biiftu baatu kad'ate.
AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e, Namicha, waan kana garta? Worri Yuda kunini waan hamtu atini gartu kanafi had'iisa lafa tana ch'ufa keesati baasani kunileeni worraa ingahu. Ammo worri fulla Mana Waaqa tana d'ufe waan kana tolche haga qarale ira na dallansiisa. Aka worri aka male na tufate, ch'eeraa foko naa d'abe ilaali!
Tanaafi worri dallansu tiyya duraa imbahu. Anini worraa biraa indeemu, yokhaani innahufi. Ammalle yo worri haga dandau iyye na kad'atule inch'aqasu.

Jennaani anini qonqo Waaqa ta, Isani nami dira kana balleesu woraana guurad'a koota, jettu d'agaye.
Hojuma suni nami jaa, ka woraana qabu, balbala mirga ta Mana Waaqa ta alaatini gabahe. Worra suni woliini nama toko, ka waan woini t'aafufi waan irati t'aafule harkaa qabu, ka woya boofta keeyatuti jira. Worri kunini ch'ufti d'ufe d'aatu waan sorio irati qalani, ka sibiila diimani mid'aasani, ejaanje.
Jennaani ifsaani bibiliqu, ka aka Waaqi Israeli arti jiru garsiisu kaani, waan lubbu qaba ka koola kaani fulla qara jiru taani iraa kae, gara balbala Mana Waaqaa deeme. AABBO Waaqi namicha woya boofta keeyatu kaani yaame waan jed'eeni,
Beeni, dira Yerusalemu kana ch'ufa keesa deemi, nama waan hamtu dira kana keesati tolchani ch'ufaa jed'e laalefate bohu, adda isaani beesisa ira kayi.
Ammalle anini Waaqa, worra suniini, nama kana gula yaa, dira kana keesa fulla ch'ufa baha, nama tokole naataanifi illakisina, ch'ufa hobaasa jed'u d'agaye. Ammalle inni waan jed'e,
Jaaroleefi kaimafi dubrafi haawanifi ijoollele ch'ufa fit'a, ammo nama beesisa adda iraa qabu tokole intuqina. Huji suni manuma kiyya kanani iti keeyad'a. Duuba worri jaaroluma fulla Mana Waaqa jirtu taanini iti keeyate.
Jennaani Waaqi waan worraani jed'e, Mana kiyya kana t'ureesa, ch'icha isale reefani guuta. Amma kaa hojad'a! Duuba akasiini worri kaani kae, nama dira keesa jiru hobaase.
Haga worri tae nama fit'u, anini koba achiti hafe; jennaani lafaani ufi d'ae, iyye waan jed'e, Ee, AABBO Waaqa gudda, atini nama Yerusalemu keesa jiru akana iti dallante, nama Israeli keesa jiru ch'ufa hobaafta?
Waaqi waan nani jed'e, Worri Israelitiifi ka Yuda ya ch'ubbu hamtu tolche. Worri yayu lafa ch'ufa keesati nama fit'e Yerusalemu ch'ubbuuni guute. Worri waan jed'u, AABBO Waaqi ya lafa teenna lakise. Inni amma nu inargu.
Ammo anini diqole worraa innahu; woma worri nama tolche aninileeni worra tolcha.
Jennaani namichi woya boofta keeyatu, ka waan woini t'aafufi waan irati t'aafu harkaa qabu, ga deebie waan AABBO Waaqaani jed'e, waan atini tolchi nani jette ch'ufa anini ya guute.

Jennaani Waaqi waan namicha woya boofta keeyatu kaaniini jed'e, Beeni, waan miila gaari fakaata kaani, ka waan koola ka lubbu qaba kaani jala jiru, jiddu deemi, ch'ile ibida harka guutad'i, duuba ch'ile suni dira gubbati firfirsi.
Ato anini laalu, inni kae deeme.
Yo inni miila waan koola suni jala seene, wonti koola, ka lubbu qaba suni Mana Waaqa gama bitaa ejaanjiti, duuba hurrileeni ch'icha Mana Waaqa d'ossite.
Ifsaani bibiliqu, ka aka AABBO Waaqi achi jiru garsiisu kaani, waan koola qaba suni ira bahe, balbala Mana Waaqa d'aqe. Jennaani hurrini taani Mana Waaqa keesa seente duuchite, ifsaani kaani ch'ich'aati ifse, lafa ch'ufa guyyaase.
Wobbeesa koola waan lubbu qaba suni Mana Waaqa alalleti ind'agayani. Wobbeesi sunini qonqo Waaqa gudda fakaata.
AABBO Waaqi namicha woya boofta keeyatu kaaniini, ibida waan miila gaari fakaata kaani jiddu fuud'i jed'eeni, jennaani namichi d'aatu miila toko eje.
Wonti koola qaba kaani toko harka ufi ibida jiddu miila worraa jiru kaani keesa keete ch'ile ibida fuute harka namicha woya boofta keeyatu nat'e. Jennaani namichi ch'ile taani fuud'e, kae deeme.
Wonti koola suni ch'ufti koola ufi jala waan aka harka namaa jira qabdi.
Ammalle anini waan aka miila gaari afuri, ka ch'ufa wolfakaatu ka waan koola kaani toko tokooni bira eju arge. Miili sunini ch'ufti aka d'akhaye ch'uch'ulut'u bibiliqa, miila suni kamu miila d'ibiti wod'aka keesani iti ejaanja.
Wonti koola kunini yo yaatu ka garu garaingalle garuma fuula deefatu yaati. Wonti suni ch'ufti ka gargari imbaane, yokhaani garaingalle, fulla feetu ch'ufa yaati.
Nafa worraa, dudda, harka, koola, miila miila gaari fakaatu kaanile, ch'ufa, ilati marse iti ejaanja.
Miili sunini ch'ufti miila anini daayya qara taani keesati argeeni wolfakaata.
(Wonti kunini ch'ufti woma anini d'aatu galaana Kebariti arge.) Yo wonti kunini chochoote olkaatule,
wonti miila gaari fakaata kaanileeni worruma woliini yaati. Ammalle yo worri koola ballise babarisule worruma woliini deemti.
Hojja wonti koola kunini ejaanjitu, miililleeni inejanja; yo wonti kunini bariftu, miililleeni imbarisa; wonti akanatiifi irreeni miila suni waan koola qaba suni iraa baati.
Jennaani ifsaani bibiliqu, ka aka AABBO Waaqi achi jiru garsiisu balbala Mana Waaqa keesaa bahe, waan koola qaba kaani gubbaa tae.
Duuba wonti koola qaba suni, ato anini ilaalu, olkaate koola ballifte barifte. Jennaani miili kaanileeni isii woliini iti d'aabate. Wonti koola sunini balbala Mana Waaqa ta ilaboru geennaani diqo miila d'aabate, hojja suni ifsaani bibiliqu kaanileeni worruma gubba jira.
Anini waan koola qaba suni arginaani, aka wonti kunini waan Waaqa Israeli jala jira, ka anini d'aatu galaana Kebariti arge kaani, hubad'e.
Wonti kunini ch'ufti fuula afurifi koola afurifi waan harka namaa fakaata koola ch'ufa jalaa qabdi.
Fuuli worraa fuuluma waan anini d'aatu galaana Kebariti arge kaani fakaata. Wonti sunini ch'ufti gamuma fuula deefatu qajeelte yaati.

Lubbuuni Waaqa oli na fuute, gara balbala Mana Waaqa, ta ilaboru, na geesite. D'aatu balbala suni anini d'iira diddami shani arge; jara suni keesa Yaazania ilma Azurutifi Pelatia ilma Benaiya, ka jari lachu gosa isaniti mataa, jira.
Waaqi waan nani jed'e, Namicha, jari kunini waan hamtu herege dira kana keesati mala hama namaa d'aa.
Worri waan jed'u, Nu d'iotu ammalle mana jaarrana; diri kunini aka okote faara jira, nuleeni fooni isiini d'aabani fakaanna.
Tanaafi duuba, Namicha, worri kana badi isaani himi.
Lubbuuni AABBO Waaqa nara buute, jennaani inni waan nani jed'e, waan atini jettu, AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Isani worra Israeli, waan isani dubbattanifi waan isani malatanile ch'ufa anini imbeekha.
Isani dira kana keesati nama heddu fitt'ani, kara isaa keesa reefi namaa fulla ch'ufa guute.
Tanaafi amma wonti anini, AABBO Waaqi guddaani, isaniini jed'u tana: D'uguma diri kunini akuma okote jira; ammo fooni keesati d'aabani maani? Reefa nama isani fit'ani kanaati! Isani gaafasi; arma injirtani, anini dira kana keesaa boolati, isani d'aa.
Isani goraade d'eetani? Anini namaa goraadeeni d'ufe isani fit'u isaniti erga.
Anini dira kana keesaa isani baase harka nama gosa d'ibiti isani kenna. Anini ya dua isaniti mure.
Isaniini ch'ufti lafuma teesani keesati woraanaani hobaatani, duuba akanaani nami ch'ufti aka anini AABBO Waaqaa beekha.
Diri kunini okote faara isani intahu, isani fooni isiiti d'aabani intaatani wonti isani baasa injirtu. Ato isani lafa Israeli keesa fulla feetani jiraatanile, anini isani gaargalcha.
Duuba akanaani, aka anini AABBO Waaqaa, beetani, ammalle aka gaafa isani seera gosa d'ibi jabeesitani kaani seera kiyya ch'absitani dubbi tiyya iraa gortanile beetani.
Ato anini tae dubbi tana fagu, Pelatiani lafaa d'ae ch'iche. Jennaani anini lafaani ufi d'ae iyye waan jed'e, Ee AABBO Waaqa gudda, atini nama Israeli keesati hafe ch'ufa fit'u feeta?
AABBO Waaqi na yaame
waan nani jed'e, Namicha, nami Yerusalemu keesa tau waan keetifi waan worra Israeli ka si woliini boojiani dubbate waan jed'u, worri boojiani sunini ya fagaate, tanaafi worri dandae AABBO Waaqa inkad'atu; inni lafa tana ya nuu lakise.
Amma tana waan anini sini jed'u, Kana worra sii woliini boojianiti himi. Nami lafa suni worra achiti gargari firfirse anuma. Ammo hataatuti, haga worri achi lafa suni keesa tau anini worra woliini taa.
Tanaafi waan jettuuni, wonti AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'u, Anini lafa isani iti firfirse keesaa isani baase lafa Israeliti isani deebisa.
Worri hojja deebiu waan ch'eera hamtu achiti argu imballeesa.
Anini garaa haareesafi qalbi hareeti worraa kenna. Anini garaa worraa jajaba aka d'akha suni jijire, garaa laafa ka Waaqaa saalfatu kennafi.
Duuba worri seerafi aada tiyya ch'ufa gula deeme guuta. Worri gumi tiyya tae, aninileeni Waaqa worraa taha.
Anini worra waan ch'eera hamtu gula deemu ingaargalcha, maro huji worraa hamtu sunitifi. Nami dubbi tana jed'e, AABBO Waaqa gudda.
Duuba ifsaani kaani dira keesaa bahe gaara diraani ilaboru d'aqe.
Duuba daayya keesa lubbuuni AABBO Waaqa oli naa fuute, gara worra boojiani lafa Babiloni jiru kaani na deebifte. Daayyani taani nara banaani
anini waan AABBO Waaqi na garsiise worra boojiani suniti hime.

AABBO Waaqi na yaame
waan nani jed'e, Namicha, atini gumi nati garagalte na diddeeni woliini teetani. Worri ila qaba, ammo woma inargu, gurralee inqaba, ammo woma ind'agayu; wonti akanatiifi worri nama wo didu.
Amma tana, Namicha, akuma nama lafa d'ibiti baqatu, miha wolti guurad'i, kai, ato lafti ingalgaloomne, aka hojja atini kaate deemtu nami ch'ufti si argu. Hegeri tana gula worri na didu sunini si argafa.
Duuba ato lafti guyyatu, aka waan baqaa deemtu, miha kanke wolti hid'ad'i, ka worri si argu. Ammalle galgala suni, yo atini aka baqaa deemtu, worri ha si argu.
Ato worri tae si laalu, mana kanke uri, miha kanke ka woltu hiite kaani artini alati baasi.
Duuba worri ha sii, miha kanke gurmu ira keeyate ila hid'ate dukana keesa, ka gara imbeenne deemtu, si argu, wonti atini taatu kunini akheekha worra Israeliti taati.
Anini akuma AABBO Waaqi Tolchi nani jed'e suni tolche. Guyya suni anini akuma nama baqatu miha kiyya wolti hid'ad'e, ato lafti dukanooftu, mana kiyya harkuma kiyyaani ure, kae alati bahe. Ato nami ch'ufti tae na ilaalu, miha kiyya gurmu ira keeyad'e, kae iti d'aabad'e.
Boriyyaate AABBO Waaqi na yaame waan nani jed'e.
Namicha, waan worri Israeli ka na dide kunini tae waan atini tahu jirtu sigaafatufi,
Waan jettuuni, AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u, D'aamsi kunini ka hayyutifi nama inni Yerusalemu keesati mohatuti.
Waan jettuuni, wonti anini amma tahu jiru kunini akheekha waan hegeri isaniti d'ufaati, isani boojiani lafa d'ibi isani geesani.
Hayyuuni worrale dukana keesa miha ufi wolti hid'ate, gurmu ira keeyate, mana qaa ka isaa uranini baqata. Inni ila hid'ate gara deemule wollaala.
Ammo anini t'urura isaa kaye, isa qabe, dira Babiloni ka inni haga duuti ila ufiitini ingarre geesa.
Ammalle anini jara gugurda isa jala hojatufi makalafi jaallabootafi nama isa tissule gara ch'ufa firfirse nama worra fit'u iti erga.
Yo anini gosa d'ibifi lafa d'ibileti worra firfirse, worri aka anini AABBO Waaqa beekha.
Anini worra nama diqa toko woraanafi beelafi d'ukuba jalaa baasa, aka worri fulla jiru suniti wollaala ufi arge aka anini AABBO Waaqa isaanii hubatu.
AABBO Waaqi na yaame waan nani jed'e,
Namicha, yo wo nyaatufi yo woi d'uddule, mudami holad'i.
Waan atini gosa lafa tana keesa jirtu ch'ufaani jettu, waan worra Yerusalemu keesa tau AABBO Waaqi guddaani akana jed'a: Yo woi nyaatanifi yo wod'uganile mudamani holatani. Lafti worraa badde adaala taate, waan nami achi keesa tau suni ch'ufti hammaate aada d'aabeefi.
Dira amma tana nami keesa guute kana ch'ufa balleesani ona tolchani. Duuba akanaani aka anini AABBO Waaqa beekhani.
AABBO Waaqi na yaame waan nani jed'e,
Namicha, worri Israeli maanifi mammaasa kana — guyyaani indabra ammo himaansi inguutamu jed'e hojja ch'ufa mammakha?
Duuba amma waan jettuuni, wonti AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'u tana: Anini mammaasa kana imballeesa, aka nami deebie Israeli keesati imammaane. Ammo waan worraani jettu, Amma guyyaani ya gahe, ka mammaasileeni ch'ufti guutamu!
Worra Israeli keesa deebiani daayya d'ara inargani, yokhaani waan d'ara infagani.
Anini, AABBO Waaqi guddaani, worraani dubbad'e jechi kiyyaleeni guutama. Worra woi didu kana, dubbini tunini amma inturtu, ato isani jirtanu wonti anini, intolcha jed'e, kunini guutamti. Nami dubbi tana jed'e, ana, AABBO Waaqa gudda.
Ammalle AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e,
Namicha, worri Israeli daayyafi himana kanke fago seha.
Duuba waan atini worraani jettu AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u, Amma wonti kunini deebite inturtu. Wonti anini jed'e, inuma guutamti. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.

AABBO Waaqi na yaame waan nani jed'e,
Namicha, raagoota Israeli ta woma qalbiini isii hereddu faddu, dubbi worraa, d'aareesi waan jettuuni, Dubbi AABBO Waaqa ch'aqasa.
AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u, Raagooti daalloti tunini imbaddi! Worri qalbuma ufitini woi faga, ammo daayya womatu inargu.
Worra Israeli, raagooti teesani geedala onati galtu fakaati.
Worri fulla naaboni ch'abt'eeni inqorqoratu, yokhaani injaaru, tanaafi guyya AABBO Waaqi woraanaani d'ufu nami Israeli tokoleeni dandae duraa imbahu.
Daayyani worraa d'ara, himaansi worraleeni kiyyiba. Worri waan kana AABBO Waaqati jed'a, nuni jed'e, jed'a, ka anini worra inergini. Ato waan suni beekhu worri dubbi worraa ta d'ugooftu eega.
Ammo anini waan worraani jed'u, Daayyani isani gartani d'ara, wonti isani himtanileeni kiyyiba. Dubbini tunini ta AABBO Waaqa jettani, ammo anini woma isaniini injenne.
Tanaafi AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan worraani jed'u, Waan isani kiyyiba dubbattani daayya d'ara gartanifi, anini ya isani jibbe.
Anini raagoota daayya d'ara argitufi ta waan d'ara faddu ingaargalcha. Gaafa hegeri gumiini tiyya wolti baate koratu, isani kora suni keesa injirtani, maqa keesanile worra Israeliti indarani. Haguma jirtani lafa teesaniti indeebitani. Duuba akasiini aka anini AABBO Waaqa gudda beetani.
Waan atini raagootaani jettu, Naaboni teesani injiddi, anini tamna bokayatifi d'akhaani roobe, bubbe jabduleeni d'ufe,
naabo suni d'ae balleese duuba nami ch'ufti, Boojini adini naabo tanaani mid'aasani taani eesa baati? jed'e gaafata.
Tanaafi amma tana AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u: Dallansu tiyya keesa anini bubbe jabdufi bokaya gudda d'akhaani roobu, ka naabo tana balleesu, gadi erga.
Anini naabo worri booji adi ibse tana ch'ach'abse bulleese, d'akha isiini yayabani diidati ga yaasa. Naaboni sunini hojja jiddu isani ch'ufa inhobaafti. Duuba akanaani nami ch'ufti aka anini AABBO Waaqa hubata.
Naabo sunifi nami isi booji adi ibseelini waan dallansuuni tiyya worra tolchitu inarga. Duuba anini waan isaniini jed'u, Naabofi nami isi booji adi dibeleeni ch'ufti ya woliini bade —
raagoota lafa Yerusalemuni, lafti nagaya jettu, ta ufiftu lafti suni nagaya inqamne. Nami dubbi tana jed'e AABBO Waaqa gudda.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'e, Namicha, amma nad'eeni gosa teeti ta woi himtu laali, dubbi worraa d'aareesi.
Waan AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'u iti himi, waan jettuuni.
Nad'eeni tana, isani ya baddani! Isani qud'aama harkaa namaa hod'itani hagogo falfalaa mata ira namaa keetani, aka akasiini t'urura keesa nama buuftani nama balleesitani. Isani irre gumi tiyyaani ijeeftani jireesitani argu feetani, aka kara sunini woi argatani.
Isani gumi tiyya durati na tufatani, aka garbufi qit'a diqa toko argatani. Isani nama duu himmalini ijeeftani, nama sila duu male lakiftani. Duuba isani dubbi d'ara gumi tiyyati himtani, worri isani d'ugeefata.
Wonti AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'u tana: Anini qud'aama isani hod'itani, akasiini dua jireenna nama ch'ufa harkati deefachu feetani, diqole infed'u. Anini qud'aama suni harka keesani iraa ch'ire, gumi isani dua jireenna isii harkati deefachu feetani tana ga lakisa.
Anini hagogo mata keesani iraa fuud'e gumi tiyya harka keesani jalaa baasa, aka isiini deebite isaniti indeebine. Duuba akanaani aka anini AABBO Waaqa beetani.
Kiyyiba keesanini isani nama dadansa anini balleesu infeene sodachiiftani, worra hamamale ka sila hameenna ufi lakise lubbu ufi baasu fed'u d'owartani.
Tanaafi amma daayya teesani ta d'araatifi wonti d'ara ka isani faddani ya muumme baate. Anini gumi tiyya harka keesani keesaa baasa, duuba akanaani aka anini AABBO Waaqa beetani.

Jennaani jaaroleeni Israeli hagi toko d'ufte woi na gaafate.
Duuba AABBO Waaqi na yaame waan nani jed'e,
Namicha, jari kunini yayu Waaqa d'ara, ka harkaani boch'ani kana jaalate gula yae, akanaani ch'ubbu keesa ufi buuse. Worri waan anini dubbi worra jalaa qabu seha.
Duuba amma waan worraani jettu, wonti AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'u tana: Nami Israeli ch'ufti, ka waan harkaani boch'ani kana jaalate, gula deeme akanaani ch'ubbu keesa ufi buuse, duuba eege raaga woi gaafachu d'ufu, anumati waan harkaani boch'ani, ka inni gula deemu suni gula, waan isa male kennafi!
Wonti harkaani boch'ani sunini ch'ufti yayu worra Israeli naraa garagalchite, ammo anini dubbuma tiyya tanaani worra ufi gula deebisa.
Tanaafi waan atini worra Israelitini jettu, wonti AABBO Waaqi jed'u tana: Kara hama qara keesa jirtani suni iraa deebia, waan harkaani boch'ani kana lakisa.
Hojja nami Israeli toko, yokhaani nami gosa d'ibi, ka lafa Israeli keesa godaanu, naraa garagale, waan harkaani boch'ani kad'ate d'aqe raaga woi gaafatu, ana, AABBO Waaqati, jecha isaa male jed'ani!
Anini isati kae, gumi tiyya keesaa isa balleese, akanaani inni akheekha worraa taha. Duuba akasiini aka anini AABBO Waaqa beetani.
Yo raagi sobame dubbi d'ara fage, nami isa sobe ana, AABBO Waaqa. Duuba anini isati kae, gumi Israeli keesaa isa baasa.
Raagafi nama isa wo gaafatule woma takaati qabata.
Akanaani anini worra Israeli ufiraa garagalu d'owe, ch'ubbu hamtu worra t'ureesitu iraa deebisa. Duuba akanaani worri gumi tiyya tae aninileeni Waaqa worraa taha. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa gudda.
AABBO Waaqi na yaame waan nani jed'e,
Namicha, yo lafti toko ch'ubbu tolchite naraa gorte, anini harka kiyya d'eereefad'e sagale iraa kute, oola iti buuse, namafi saa isiile ch'ufa fit'a.
Ato Nuhufi Danielifi Ayubu, jari kunini saaddeeni achi jiraatele, dansumti worraa worruma ch'alla baafti. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Yokhaani anini bineensa ala, ka worra suni fit'u iti erge, bineensi sunini lafa suni ch'ufa balleese, namileeni sodaa keesaa bahu dad'aba.
Ammalle ato worri sunini sadeenu arti jiraatele haga anini AABBO Waaqi guddaani jiru imbaasu. Worri lubbu ufi ch'alla baasa, ammo laftileeni badde ona taati.
Yokhaani anini had'iisa lafa sunitini d'ufe woraana hama namaafi saa hobaasu iti erga.
Ammalle ato worri sunini sadeeni arti jiraatele haga anini AABBO Waaqi guddaani jiru — jari kunini dandae ilmaani ufi imbaasu, lubbu ufi male.
Yo ammalle anini ch'iisa d'ukuba hama lafa sunitini d'ufe dallansu keesa namaafi saala hobaase,
ato Nuhufi Danielifi Ayubuleni arti jiraatanile — jari kunileeni dandae ilmaani worrale imbaasu. Dansumti worraa lubbuma worra ch'allaa baafti.
Yo nami bahe ilmaani ufile baasu jiraate, yo worri siti gad'ufe worra laali. Aka worri ch'ubbicha ilaali, ammalle aka gaargali anini worra Israelitini d'ufe suni worraa male, tanaani beekhi;
duuba aka anini waan kana ch'ufa d'uga gula tolche beeta. Nami dubbi tana jed'e AABBO Waaqa gudda.

AABBO Waaqi na yaame waan nani jed'e,
Namicha, zabibufi mukhi d'ibiini maanini wolfakaata? Dameeni zabibu maanini mukeeni badda keesa ira jirti?
Dandaani isi woma ira imid'aasani? Waan d'ibi lakisi dandaani fannole intolfatani?
Wonti isiini malteefi qoraanuma ibidati. Yo hunda isii gubaani jiddu keesale t'at'aelchani, dandeete woi ira imid'aasita?
Isiini qara woma keesa injirtu, ammo amma, ka ibidi t'at'aelche gube hagasile ingeetu.
Tanaafi wonti AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'u tana: Akuma zabibu badda keesa ch'irani gubani akasuma anini nama Yerusalemu keesa jiru tolcha.
Worri qara ibida toko ya duraa bahe, ammo amma ibida d'ibiti d'ufe worra balleesa. Gaafa anini d'ufe worra balleesu suni aka anini AABBO Waaqa beetani.
Waan worri na dideefi, aninileeni lafa worraa balleese ona tolcha. Nami dubbi tana jed'e AABBO Waaqa gudda.

Ammalle AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e,
Namicha, Yerusalemu waan hamtu isiini taate kana garsiisi
waan jettuuni, AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u:
Atini duri lafa kanaaniti d'alatte, abbaani kanke gosa Amori haati tante gosa Hiti.
Gaafa atini d'alate suni nami tokoleeni ka hand'ure bisaanini si d'iqe, yokhaani sooda si dibe woya siti uyise injiru.
Nami tokoleeni ka si nahe, waan kana tokole si tolche injiru, ammalle gaafasi nami si jaalate injiru, alati sigatani.
Anini si d'aatu baanaani sii ufumaa teete d'iiga keesa gangalatu si arge ch'ichu si d'owe.
Duuba anini si guddise atini aka mukha latte baate guddate d'eerate, aka intala gaaltama taate, guntutafi rifeensale baafte, ammo woya male qulla ejita.
Ammalle guyya d'ibi anini si d'aatu banaani, aka atini guddatte fuud'aa geete si arge. Duuba anini woya tiyya siti uyise qulla te d'osse, fuud'e niiti si tolfad'e. Tunini waan AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'e.
Jennaani anini bisaani fuud'e, d'iiga siraa d'iqe, d'ad'a si ibse.
Anini woya barreesani ch'okhanifi kope machala dansaafi hagogo booftatifi woya laasa ta uyifatanile sii kenne.
Anini faaya ch'uch'uluqa — mirgaafi imu siti naqe.
Anini qube funnaanifi guraati si kaye, hagogo mid'aadu hayyiti mata ira sii kaye.
Atini faaya worqitifi ka qarsi qabda, ammalle guyya ch'ufa woya booftatifi woya laasa ta barreesani ch'okhani keeyate. Qit'a dargaye dansa ira mid'aasanifi dammafi d'ad'a soorate. Atini aka male mid'aade, qaalliti fakaate.
Atini mid'aaguma anini sii kenne sunini lafa ch'ufa keesa gurra baafte. Tunini waan AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'e.
Ammo atini mid'aaguma tante ta gurraani baafte suni d'aabbatte, nami deemu ch'ufa si bira rafe.
Atini fulla Waaqa iti kad'attu woya teetiini ch'ote akuma sharmut'a nama siti d'ufu ch'ufa bulchite.
Atini faaya qarsitiifi ka worqi, ka anini sii kenne fuute, fakeenna d'iira mid'aasite ufi keesa nat'e.
Atini woya barreesani ch'okhani ta anini sii kenne taani fuute fakeenna d'iira ka mid'aasite kaaniti keete, d'ad'afi hit'aana anini si kennele baafteefi.
Anini sagale sii kenne dargaye daakhani dansaafi dammafi d'ad'ale. Ammo atini waan kana ch'ufa fuute, fakeenna kaani sorio baafte. Tunini waan AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'e.
Duuba eege atini ilmaani d'iiratifi ta dubra ta naa d'alte fuute, fakeenna suni sorio baafte. Diddaani atini naa didde suni diqo seete,
ka ilmaani tiyya fuute fakeenna suni sorio baafte?
Gaafa atini hammaate sharmut'a taate, atini taka waan ijoollumaa taate inqaabanne — ka qulla teete, d'iiga d'aloota keesa gangalate.
AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u, Atini ya badde! Ya badde! Atini hameenna suni ch'ufa tolchite duuba,
kara ch'ufa d'aatuti fulla waaqa d'ara iti kad'atanifi huji sharmut'oma keesati tolchani jaarte.
Atini ufi busheesite, nama si d'aatu bahe ch'ufati ufi kennite, sharmut'omte keesa dabarte.
Atini gosa Misiri, ta d'aatu teesani teetu, ta nad'eeniini daalte jala rafte, sharmut'oma keetiini na dallansiifte.
Anini amma yayu harka siti olfud'ad'e aka si balleese eeba tiyya ta qara si qoode sira fud'ad'u. Anini yayu harka worra Filisti, ka si jibbe dabaafi ch'ubbu tanteetifi si tufateti si kenne.
Waan atini worra kaani inquufiniifi, amma maraate worra Ashuru gula fiidde. Atini worrale sharmut'a taate, ammo worrileeni si inquufsine.
Atini ammalle sharmut'a worra Babiloni ka daldaltu taate, ammo worrileeni si inquufsine.
Wonti AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'u tana: Atini huji tana ch'ufa akuma sharmut'a ch'eera foko inqamne hojatte.
Kara ch'ufa keesati fulla Waaqa d'ara iti kad'atanifi ta sharmut'oma keesati hojatani jaarte, ammo atini aka sharmut'a d'ibi hori nama iraa infud'anne.
Atini akuma niiti d'iirsa ufi lakifte nama d'ibi bulchite jirta.
Sharmut'a hori baasani, ammo atini gaarayoota tante ch'ufaa woi kennite, akasiini worra gumbeesite, gara ch'ufa ufiti ga fuute ufi bira bulchite.
Atini sharmut'a d'ibi iraa gorta. Nami tokoleeni sharmut'a si intolchine yokhaani hori si imbaanne, siti baaseefi male, kara kanani atini sharmut'a kaani d'ibi ch'ufa iraa gorta.
Yerusalemu sharmut'iti, amma waan AABBO Waaqi jed'u d'agayi.
Wonti AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'u tana: Atini woya baafatte qulla ufi d'aabde, duuba akuma sharmut'a gaarayoota teetifi waan hamtu atini waaqa tolfate kad'atuleti ufi kennite, ilmaani tante waaqa d'ara suni sorio baafte.
Maro waan kanatifi anini gaarayoota tante ta atini jaalatufi ta atini jibbitule ch'ufa wolti baase, ila worraa durati qunch'ise woya siraa baase qulla si d'aaba.
Anini aka nad'eeni huji sharmut'a hojate d'iiga nama jissitu wollaala iti murani, wollaala siti mura. Duuba anini, ka dallansu qabu, si gaargalche dua siti mura.
Anini harka gaarayoota teetiti si kenne, worri fulla atini waaqa d'ara iti kad'atuufi huji sharmut'oma iti tolfatule ch'ach'abse balleese, woya tanteetifi faaya kankele siraa guurate, qulla akuma atini d'alate si lakisa.
Worri nama d'akhaani si had'u siti baase, worri sunini goraade ufitini gargari si ch'ira.
Worri maneeni tante ch'ufa gube nad'eeni heddu durati gaargala kanke mullisa. Anini huji sharmut'oma iraa si deebise, gaarayoota teetile hori baasu si d'owa.
Duuba akasiini dallansu galfad'e ch'allise, ka si inhinaafne ufira taa, deebiele indallanu.
Atini waan gaafa atini kaima anini sii tae, deete, waan hamtu tolchite kana ch'ufaani na dallansiifte. Waan sunifi anini amma d'iba kana sitini d'ufa. Atini maanifi waan hamtu qaraa taate kaanile huji sharmut'oma iti darta? Nami dubbi tana jed'e AABBO Waaqa gudda.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'e, Ee Yerusalemu, waan kanke nami mammaasa kanani mammaakha: Haad'a laali intala fuud'i.
Atini d'uguma akuma haad'a teeti d'alate; ta d'iirsafi ilmaani ufi jibbite. Ammalle atini akuma oboleyaani tante ta dubra, ta d'iirsafi ilmaani ufi jibbite jirta. Siifi oboleyaani tantele haati teesani gosa Hiti, abbaani keesanileeni gosa Amori.
Oboleetini tante guddoni Samaria, ta ilmaani isii woliini mirga kanke teetu; oboleetini tante maand'itini sodoma, ta ilmaani isii woliini bita tante teetu.
Atini faana worraa gula deemte, waan hamtu worri tahele taate, ammo sunileeni sii ingeenne; bultuma diqo tokoti atini kara ch'ufaani worra suni ira hammaate.
AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u, Haga anini jiru, oboleetini tante sodomafi ilmaani isii hameenna siifi ilmaani tante tolchite intolchine.
Isiifi ilmaani isiileeni, waan sagale quufani nagayaani taanifi, ufi saadani ufi guddisani, ammo worri hiyyeesafi d'ipata inqarqaarre.
Worri kiyyibe mata jabaate, waan anini jibbu ch'ufa tolchinaani akuma atini beetu kaani worra balleese.
Samariani haga atini ch'ubbamte kana inch'ubbamne. Hameenna keetifi ka oboleyaani teeti, yo wolbira qabani, worri sii waan woma iyyakini fakaata.
Amma tana atini ch'eera kanke kara jalaa baatuni inqabdu. Ch'ubbuuni tante ta oboleyaani tanteeti iraa guddatte, worri sii nama woma iyyakini fakaata. Waan atini oboleyaani tante ira ch'ubbu tolchite, worri sii nama woma iyyakini fakaateefi, atini amma ch'eerafi foko irati hafta.
AABBO Waaqi waan Yerusalemuni jed'e, Anini Sodomafi ollowaani isiitiifi Samariafi ollowaani isiile deebie horsiise deebansa. Ee, anini sile horsiise deebansa.
Duuba akanaani atini ufirati ch'eerte, oboleyaani teetileeni akanaani sira woi barate si gula deebiti.
Worri woi horate, siifi ollowaani teetileeni woi horattani.
Bara atini duri kiyyibde, ka ch'ubbuuni atini tolchite taani diidati imbahini, atini Sodoma tufate ingoyeesine? Me, amma laali, atinileeni akuma isiiti ka worri Edomutifi ka Filistitifi ka d'aatu tante jiru ch'ufti si jibbe si goyeesu.
Ammo atini maro waan ch'eera hamtu aka injirre tolchiteefi gaargalu malte. Nami dubbi tana jed'e, AABBO Waaqa.
AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u, Waan atini kakhu khakhate deete, wold'aqisa nu woliini tolfanne ch'absiteefi, anini amma woma si male si tolcha.
Ammo anini wold'aqisa gaafa atini ijoolle woliini tolfanne jabeese, wold'aqisa haga jiru jireenna tau tolcha.
Atini waan taate kana qaabate iraa ch'eerta, hojja oboleetini tante guddofi diqoleeni siti deebite. Anini worra lachu aka ilmaani teeti tolcha, ato wonti kunini duri wold'aqisa kenna keesa jiraachule baate.
Anini wold'aqisa si woliini tolfad'e kana jabeese, duuba atinileeni akanaani aka anini AABBO Waaqa beeta.
Anini wollaala atini tolchite ch'ufa sii araarama, ammo atini wollaala suni qaabate ch'eerte afaani qabata. Nami waan kana jed'e, AABBO Waaqa gudda.

AABBO Waaqi na yaame waan nani jed'e,
Namicha, mammaasa kana worra Israeliti himi waan jettuuni,
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u: Duri risa gudda tokoti jira, ka koola baricha mid'aaga qabu. Inni gara gaareeni Lebanoni barise, fiit'e dame hind'eesa ch'abse,
lafa daldaltuni jirtuti geese, dira daldaltu keesa buuse.
Jennaani inni latta mukhaa lafa Israeli keesaa hundaani buqise, lafa bisaani, ta biyye dansa qabdu, keesa d'aabe.
Mukhi kaani latte bahe, mukha zabibu gabaaba banticha tae. Dameeni isii baate, olqajeelte, gara risa kaani laalte, hiddileeni bahe ga fagaate. Zabibuni sunini aka dansaa baate bosonte.
Ammalle risa gudda dabasicha, kooli haga woi gahu, tokoti jira. Duuba zabibu taani hiddaafi dameeni isiileeni gara risa kaani qajeelte baate, aka sila akanaani isiini risa suni ira bisaani qara isiini oobru keesaa argatu kaani ira argatu.
Ammo zabibu tana qarumayu yayu lafa bisaani ta biyye dansa qabdu keesati oobrani, aka isiini baate bosonte mid'aani guddo baaftu.
Duuba anini, AABBO Waaqi guddaani, waan jed'u, mukhi zabibu kunini bahe inuma guddata? Risani qara kaani hiddaafi dame buqise mid'aani ch'ufa ira guure ingogosu? Buqisiti mukha suni irre guddofi gosa guddo iti imbarbaadani,
d'uguma mukha suni yayu d'aabani, ammo inni bahe inguddata? Yo bubbeeni ilaboruti d'uftu isa d'ooftu, inni ingogogu? Fulluma isa iti d'abaniti ingogogu?
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e,
Worra na didu kanani, Isani waan mammaasa kana beetani? jed'i gaafad'i. Ammalle waan jettuuni, Hayyuuni Babiloni Yerusalemu d'aqe, hayyu Yerusalemutifi jaarole isaa gugurdo boojie Babilonitini gale.
Inni worra hayyu keesa nama toko fuud'e, namichi suni woldubbatani dubbi suni iti wold'aqani, jennaani inni isaa kakhachiise. Ammalle inni jara gugurda boojie suni fuud'e,
aka gochiti Israeli kakhu suni guute isati gara ingalle.
Ammo hayyichi Yuda dubbi suni dide, nama Misiriti erge, fardooleefi askarti heddu kad'ate. Inni waan suni inargata? Dandae duraa imbaha? Inni yo wold'aqisa suni ch'abse, dandae duraa imbaha?
AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u, Anini iti kakhad'a, aka hayyuuni kunini lafa Babiloni keesati duu, waan inni kakhufi wold'aqisa inni hayyu Babiloni ka isa hayyu tolche, woliini tolfate, ch'abseefi.
Yo worri Babiloni boola marse qote, ammalle aka nama heddu fit'u biyye olbaasu, askartini hayyu Misiri hedduleeni dandeete lola suni keesa isaa qarqaarsa intaatu.
Inni ka kakhufi wold'aqisa worri woliini tolfate ch'abse waan kana ch'ufa tolche, amma tana dandae duraa imbahu.
Tanaafi AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u, Anini inkakhad'a, aka nama kana, waan inni wold'aqisa qara na durati inguuta jed'e, ch'abseefi, balleesu.
Anini t'urura isaa kaye isa qabe lafa Babiloni isa geesa, waan inni na d'agayu dideefi.
Askarti isaa jajanna ch'ufa lola keesati fit'ani, ta baateleeni ch'ufti lafa ch'ufa keesati bitinoofti. Duuba akanaani, aka dubbi tana anini AABBO Waaqi jed'e, beetani.
Wonti AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'u tana: Anini fiit'e hind'eesa d'eerati dame latta buqise, gaara Israeli ka
gaara ch'ufa ira d'eerati d'aaba. Duuba dameeni suni latte baate, bosonte mid'aani baafte hind'eesa gudda mid'aaga taati. Simpirreeni gosa ch'ufa irati mana jaaratte gaadisa isale boqotti.
Akanaani mukhi lafa keesa jiru ch'ufti aka anini AABBO Waaqa beekha. Nami mukha d'ed'eera mure gabaaba baase d'ed'eereersu anuma. Ammalle anumati mukha doti gogose gogale dotteesa. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa. Anini waan jed'u inuma guuta.

AABBO Waaqi na yaame waan nani jed'e,
Mammaasi lafa Israeli keesati nami tae mammaakhu kunini maani? Ka, mid'aani zabibu kurao abbootini nyaatte, ammo ilmaani ilkaani dilalaani, jed'u.
AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u, Anini iti kakhad'e, aka isani iti deebitani lafa Israeli keesati mammaasa kana imammaane.
Lubbu nama ch'ufaa anumati harkaa qaba, ta abbootitifi ta ilmaanile. Abbuma ch'ubbamuti dua.
Yo nami qajeelani d'uga gula deemu jiraate,
nami sunini waaqoota Israeli ka harkaani boch'ani inkad'atu, yokhaani sorio gaara gubbati qalani inyaatu. Nad'eeni nama d'ibile infaarau, yokhaani nad'eeni aada uwa qabdule bira irafu.
Inni nama indabsu, yokhaani nama insaamu. Inni qabdo nami hori isa iraa fud'ate iti kenne deebise, beelaa beela baase, ka daara qabu daara baasa.
Inni beese namaa liqeese tirfi iraa ibarbaadu. Inni waan hamtu intolchu, yo nami wold'abule d'uga gula dubbi mura.
Nami akana kunini aadaafi seera kiyya jabeese guuta. Maro inni nama d'uga gula deemuufi, injiraata. Nami dubbi tana jed'e AABBO Waaqa.
Yo duuba nami kunini ilma namaa saame ijeesu, ka waan
abbaani intahini kana ch'ufa tolchu qabaate, ka gurbaani sunini sorio gaara gubbati qalani nyaate, nad'eeni biyyale farae,
hiyyeesa dabse saame, qabdo nami iti kennele deebisu dide, ammalle Waaqa d'ara kad'ate, artiti waan ch'eera hamtule tolche,
beese namaa liqeesele tirfi ira barbaade, nami kunini injiraata? Hiyo, injiraatu. waan inni waan ch'eera hamtu kana taheefi, inni inuma dua, d'iigi isaaleeni gubbuma isati.
Yo ilmi akana kunileeni ilma qabaate, ka ilmi sunini ch'ubbu abbaani isaa tolche ch'ufa arge, gula deemu baate,
Waaqa Israeli ka harkaani boch'ani kad'achu dide, yokhaani sorio gaara gubbati qalanile nyaachu dide, nad'eeni nama d'ibile farau dide,
yokhaani nama dabse saamu baate, ammo qabdo nami hori isa ira fud'ate iti kenne deebiseefi, beelaa beela baase, ka daara qabu daara baase.
Waan hamtu tolchu dide, hori namaa liqeesule tirfi ira barbaadu dide, aadaafi seera kiyya jabeese guute, inni induu, ammo injiraata.
Ammo abbaani isaa, ka nama dabse saame, ka hojja ch'ufa waan hamtu nama tolche kaani, ch'ubbuma ufi suniini dua.
Ammo isani na gaafatani waan jettani, Ilmi maafi ch'ubbu abbaani tolche jed'e ingaargalle? Wonti inni akasi intaaneefi waan inni waan d'uga qajeela gula bahe, aadaafi seera kiyya guuteefi tanaafi inni lubbu bula.
Abbuma ch'ubbu tolcheti dua — abbaaleeni ch'ubbu ilmati jed'e ingaargalu, ilmileeni ta abbaati jed'e ingaargalu. Nami d'uga d'uguma ufitini baha, ch'ubbichileeni ch'ubbuma ufitini bada.
Yo ch'ubbichi ch'ubbu iraa deebie, seera kiyya guute, waan d'ugaatifi ka qajeela tolche, inni induu, injiraata.
Ch'ubbu inni tolche ch'ufa araaramanifi waan inni d'uga gula deemefi jireesani,
AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u, isani waan hojja nami ch'ubbu qabu duu anini gammadu seetani? Hiyo, anini ingammadu, Isa sila ch'ubbu suni iraa deebie jiraatu fed'a.
Ammo yo nami d'ugaa qajeelani waan d'uga lakise, waan ch'eera hamtu nami hamani tolchu tolche, inni d'uguma injiraata? Injiraatu! Dansuma duri inni tolche tokole inqaabatani. Inni waan d'uga qara gula deemu taani lakise ch'ubbu tolcheefi dua.
Ammo isani waan jettani, Wonti Aabbo Waaqi tolchu kunini qajeeltuniti. Worra Israeli, me na ch'aqasa! Isani karaani anini woini tolchu qajeelaniti jettani? Keesanumati qajeela intahini.
Hojja nami d'ugaa qajeelani qajeeluma ufi lakise, ch'ubbu gula bahe, duu, inni woma ch'ubbu tolcheefi dua.
Hojja ch'ubbichi daba lakise waan d'uga qajeeltu tolchu, inni lubbu ufi baasa.
Inni hameenna tolchu jiru arge iraa deebia, tanaafi inni induu, lubbu bula.
Ammo isani worri Israeli waan jettani, wonti Aabbo Waaqi tolchu kunini qajeeltuniti. Isani kara kiyyaani qajeelaniti jettani, akasumayu? Keesanumati qajeela intahini.
Amma anini, AABBO Waaqi guddaani, waan isani worra Israelitini jed'u, Anini isani namu woma inni tahuni qora. Tanaafi ch'ubbu tolchitani tana ch'ufa iraa deebia; ch'ubbuuni teesani tunini isani imballeesini ufi eegad'a.
Hameenna isani tolchitani kana ch'ufa yaala baha, qalbiifi garaa hareesa horad'a. Isani worri Israeli, maafi badu feetani?
Anini, AABBO Waaqi guddaani, nama tokole ka duu infed'u, ch'ubbu teesani iraa deebia, jireennati baha, jed'a.

Waaqi waan nani jed'e, Hayyoota Israeli akana faarsi bohi:
Haati tante nyeench'a akami!
Isiini kuble isii jiddu koromto nyeench'ati guddifti.
Isiini kuble isii aka dansaa guddifte adamo barsiifte,
jennaani kubleeni suni guddate, goorjama taate.
Gochiti lafaa waan isaa d'ageete, boola keesati t'ururaani qabde,
hookooni lafa Misiriti hirkifte.
Isiini eegaa d'at'e ufi jibbannaani, kuble isii d'ibi guddifte,
kubleeni suni guddate, nyeench'a hama taate.
Inni guddannaani nyeench'a d'ibiini woliini woi gaade,
innileeni waan adamo barate goorjama tae, nama nyaate.
Inni maneeni jajabdu ch'ach'abse dira ch'ufa balleese.
Nami lafa suni keesa tau ch'ufti itansu isaa d'ageennaani mumudame.
Jennaani gochiti ch'ufti gara ch'ufaa wolti d'ufte isa haate;
worri t'urura isaani isaa kaye boola keesati isa qabe.
Isa goomooni qabani hayyu Babiloniti geesani.
Achiti isa hid'ani,
aka gaareeni Israeli gubbati deebiani itansu isaa ind'ageenne.
Haate mukha zabibu ka d'aatu yaato bisaani eju fakaati.
Waan guddo bisaani argatuufi mukhi sunini bahe, bosone mid'aani baasa.
Dameeni isaa jajabdu, isiini baate boku hayyootaa taate.
Mukhi sunini d'eerate dumansa tuqe,
nami ch'ufti aka inni d'eerate bosone arge.
Ammo dallansuuni hundaani buqisani lafa buusani,
bubbeeni ilaboruti d'ufte, mid'aani isaa gogositi,
dameele isale ch'ach'absani gogosani gubani.
Ammalle lafa gamooji owitu d'eebichati d'aabani.
Ibidi hunda zabibu taani qabate, dameeleefi mid'aanile gube.
Dameeleeni isiileeni deebite jabaatte boku hayyu intaatu.
Tunini faaru bohati, ta hojja ch'ufa d'aatani.

Guyya kud'anneeso, ka jia shaneeso, ganna torbeeso, ka nu haga nu boojiani teenne, jaaroleeni gumi Israeli hagi toko d'ufte na dura teteete, Waan Waaqi si garsiise nuti himi nani jette.
Jennaani AABBO Waaqi na yaame waan nani jed'e,
Namicha, jaarole Israeli tanaani waan jettu, AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u, Isani woi na gaafachu d'uftani? Anini aka isani woi na gaafatani haga jiru ee injed'u, nami dubbi tana jed'e AABBO Waaqa gudda.
Namicha, atini kurfo jirta, aka jara kana wollaala iti murtu? Yoosi iti muri, waan hamtu abbootini worraa duri tolchite qaabsisi,
waan jettuuni, wonti AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'u tana: Anini gaafa worri Israeli fohad'e; Worrati kakhad'e, lafa Misiri keesati ufi agarsiise waan jed'eeni: Anini AABBO, Waaqa keesani.
Anini gaafasi worrati kakhad'e waan jed'eeni, Anini lafa Misiri keesaa isani baase lafa lafa ch'ufa ira dansaa, ta aananifi dammi aka lola yautini isani d'ufa.
Duuba waan jed'eeni, Isani ch'ufti waan ch'eera hamtu isani waaqa tolfatani kana boolati d'aa, waaqa d'ara ka Misiri kana gula yaatani akanaani ufi int'ureesina. Anini AABBO, Waaqa keesani.
Ammo worri nati garagale, na ch'aqasu dide, waaqa worra hamama harkaani mid'aasani kaanile boolati d'au dide. Waaqa worra Misirile lakisu dide, tanaafi anini aka male worrati dallane, lafa Misiri keesaa imballeesa jed'e.
Ammo aka gurra kiyya imballeesine worra balleesu dide; wonti akanatiifi anini qara worra worri woliini tau durati, lafa Misiri keesaa isani baasa worraani jed'e.
Duuba akanaani worra lafa Misiri keesaa baase, lafa aloo ta gamoojiti geese.
Anini aadaafi seera kiyya, ka nama gula deemu jireesu, barsiise kenneefi.
Anini guyya Sabato akheekha wold'ageeti teenna tolche, aka akanaani aka anini, AABBO Waaqi, worra qulqulleesu qaabatani.
Ammo lafa gamooji suni keesaleti worri na dide, aadaafi seera kiyya, ka nama isa guutu ch'ufa jireesu, dide. Ammalle worri guyya Sabatole t'ureese balleese; tanaafi anini worrati dallane, lafa aloo keesati worra balleesa, jed'e.
Ammo anini worra imballeesine; wonti akasitifi yo gochiti anini ila worra durati worra Israeli lafa Misiri keesaa baase taani na agarte ya gurri na bade.
Tanaafi anini lafa gamooji suni keesati worrati kakhad'e waan jed'eeni, Anini lafa lafa ch'ufa ira mid'aadu, ta aananifi dammi aka lola yauti isani ingeesu.
Wonti anini akasi kakhad'eefi waan worri aada tiyya dide, seera kiyya ch'abse, guyya Sabatole t'ureese, waaqoota harkaani boch'ani nara jaalateefi.
Duuba eege anini worraa nahe, lafa gamooji suni keesati hobaasu dide,
waan ijoolle worraatini jed'e: Seera ababooti teesani baafte inguutina, aada worrale gula iyyaina, yokhaani waan worri harkaani boch'ele kad'attani ufi int'ureesina.
Anini AABBO, Waaqa keesani, aadaafi seera kiyya jabeesa guuta, gula deema.
Ammalle guyya Sabato guyya jila jaba tolcha, aka guyyaani kunini akheekha wold'aqisa nu woliini tolfanne tae, aka anini AABBO, Waaqa keesani, isani qaabsisu.
Ammo ijoolleeni worra sunileeni na didde, seera kiyya ch'absite, aada tiyya, ta nama isii gula deemule jireenna kennitule, guutu didde guyya kiyya ka Sabatole t'ureesite. Tanaafi anini worrati dallane, worra ch'ufa lafa aloo keesati infit'a jed'e.
Ammo anini worra imballeesine — wonti akanatiifi yo gochiti anini ila worraa durati worra Israeli lafa Misiri keesaa baase taani na agarte ya gurri na bade.
Tanaafi anini lafa gamooji suni keesati worrati kakhad'e waan jed'eeni, Anini lafa ch'ufa keesa isani firfirsa.
Wonti anini akasi worraani jed'eefi, waan worri seera kiyya ch'abse, aada tiyya guutu didde, guyya Sabato t'ureese, waan harkaani boch'ani, ka ababooti worraa kad'ate, kad'ateefi.
Jennaani anini seera dansa intahinifi aada nama injirreesine worraa kenne.
Anini aka worri ilmaani isaani ta angafa sorio baase akasiini ufi t'ureesu, iti lakise. Wonti anini akasi tolcheefi, aka worri gaargala argate, akasiini aka anini AABBO Waaqa beekhu.
Duuba amma, Namicha, waan atini worra Israelitini jettu, AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u, kunini kara d'ibi, ka abbootini teesani ta saala d'abde, naani arabsite.
Anini lafa duri worraa kakhad'e taanini d'umnaani, worri gaareeni d'ed'eertufi mukeeni dodoti lafa suni ch'ufa sorio iti qale. Worri sorio gubanifi daad'i d'ibaafatanini na dallansiise.
Anini worra gaafad'e waan jed'eeni, Gaareeni d'ed'eertuuni isani sorio gubbati qaltani tunini maani? Tanaafi arti asi waan sunini Bamah jed'aniini, akasi jechaani gaareeni d'ed'eertu jechu.
Amma tana waan worra Israelitini jettu, AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u: Isani maafi ch'ubbuma abbootini teesani tolchite tolchitani, waan hamtu worri kad'ate kaani kad'atani ufi t'ureesitani?
Arrale isani woma worri baase suni baaftani, waan harkaani boch'ani kad'atani ilmaani teesani gubdani, sorio baaftani, akanaani ufi t'ureesitani. Duuba isani worri Israeli, eegi waan kana ch'ufa taatani, amma d'uftani woi na gaafattani? Anini inkakhad'a, haga anini AABBO Waaqi guddaani jiru, isani itumaa deebitani woma na ingaafatani.
Isani waan jettani, Nu aka gosa d'ibi, ta lafa d'ibi keesa teete mukhaafi d'akha kad'atu tahu feena. Ammo wonti sunini isanii intaatu.
Anini inkakhad'a haga anini AABBO Waaqi guddaani jiru, aka anini isaniti dallane irreeni isani bulchu.
Anini lafa isani iti firfirfamtani keesa wolti isani guure, dallansufi irre tiyya isani garsiisa.
Anini lafa aloo ta d'eebichaa ta gosa d'ibitini isani d'ufe, achiti diideese wollaala isaniti mure isani ch'eersa.
Anini amma tana, akuma duri ababoota teesani lafa gamooji ta Sinai keesati wollaala iti mure, isanileti mura. Nami dubbi tana jed'e AABBO Waaqa gudda.
Anini harka kiyya keesa isani keeyad'e, akasiini isani wold'aqisa kiyya guutani.
Anini nama ch'ubbicha na didu ch'ufa isani keesaa fuud'e, lafa worri amma keesa jiru keesaa baase, lafa Israelileeti deebiu d'owa. Duuba akasiini aka anini AABBO Waaqa beetani.
AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'e, Amma tana isani worri Israeli waan mataani keesani maddu taha! Waaquma keesani ka harkaani boch'atani gula yaa! Ammo beekha, armaa achi isani ufumani daachatani na gula yaatani, deebitani waan harkaani boch'ani woi baaftani akasiini maqa kiyya qulqullo int'ureesitani.
Achiti isaani worri Israeli ch'ufti gaara kiyya d'eera qulqullo Israeli gubbati na kad'attani. Duuba aninileeni: huji teesani maache, sorioofi d'ibaayufi waan isani naa baaftani qulqullo ch'ufa isani iraa eegad'e isani iraa fud'ad'a.
Eegi anini lafa isani iti firfirfamtani keesaa isani fuud'e, fulla tokoti wolti isani deebise, gochiti ch'ufti aka anini qulqullo hubati.
Hojja anini lafa Israeli ta ababoota teesani kakhad'eti isani galche aka anini AABBO Waaqa beetani.
Duuba isani akasiini, aka waan hamtu taatani ufi t'ureesitani qaabatani. Ammalle maro waan hamtu akasi suni taatanifi ufi jibbitani.
Yo anini gurra kiyya jed'e woi isani tolchu, isani worri Israeli aka anini AABBO Waaqa beetani; wonti akanatiifi anini waan sila isani gati wollaala keesani gula isani argachu maltani isani intolchu; Nami dubbi tana jed'e AABBO Waaqa gudda.
AABBO Waaqi na yaame waan nani jed'e,
Namicha bita, millad'i, waan isii dubbad'i, badii badda isii fagi.
Waan atini badda Negebutini jettu, waan AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'u d'agayi. Laali, anini ibida mukha kanke gogafi jiid'ale ch'ufa gube balleesu siti kaya, ka nami dandae ind'aamfine. Ibidi sunini bitaa bahe, mirgati eje, owi isaa waan lafa suni jira ch'ufa guba.
Nami ch'ufti aka anini, AABBO Waaqi, ibida nami dandae ind'aamfine badda suniti kaye, inarga.
Ammo anini, AABBO Waaqa gudda kad'ad'e, waan kana intolchini jed'eeni. Wonti anini akasi jed'eefi nami ch'ufti guyya ch'ufa atini mammaasaani dubbata nani jed'a.

AABBO Waaqi na yaame waan nani jed'e,
Namicha, Yerusalemufi fulla woyyu ta nami woi iti kad'atule ch'ufa abaari.
Waan lafa Israelitini jettu, AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, Anini ya siti nyaape. Anini goraade tiyya qalqala keesaa fud'ad'e, nama kanke hamafi dansale ch'ufa fit'a.
Anini mirgaa fuud'e bitaati d'aabe, nama lafa keesa jiru ch'ufa goraade tiyyaani fit'a.
Nami ch'ufti aka anini, AABBO Waaqi, eegi goraade tiyya qalqala keesaa baase iti indeefanne beekha.
Namicha, aka waan laalefate onneeni si ch'ite waad'i. Fulla nami ch'ufa sii argu ch'iisi, laalefad'i, waad'i.
Yo worri si gaafate, Atini maafi teete waata sini jed'e, waan jettuuni, waan isaniti gadeematifi tae waad'a, jed'i. Gaafa wonti sunini worrati d'uftu, worri nahe holate, harki worra, iraa jige, lubbuuni worra d'ufte, jilbi worraleeni kakise wold'aa. Guyyaani ya ala hobae, kuno kana. Nami dubbi tana jed'e AABBO Waaqa gudda.
AABBO Waaqi waan nani jed'e,
Namicha fagi, waan biyya tanaani jettu, Waaqi waan jed'u,
Goraade, goraade qarani bibilisani.
Isi qarani, namaani ijeesani, qarti isii aka angaasu bilit'i.
Gammadi injiru, waan gumiini tiyya gorsaafi ule tiyya d'agayu diddeefi.
Goraade yayu qarani addeesani hujii kurfeesani,
isi yayu qarani addeesani, harka nama nama ijeesuti kennani.
Namicha, bohi, ooi;
goraadeeni tunini ta gumi tiyyaafi jaarole Israeli ch'ufaani balleesani.
Jaarole sunifi gumi tiyya woliini fit'ani.
Laalefad'i, mata qabad'i!
Anini gumi tiyya ilaalachu jira,
yo worri iraa deebiu dide wonti kunini ch'ufti worra qabati.
Namicha, amma woi fagi, harka d'ai, duuba goraadeeti maro heddu nama ch'ira. Isiini nama ijeefte, nama mudamsiifte, namale qaqalti.
Duuba akasiini gumiini tiyya ufi jibbaate gugufati. Anini dira worraa goraade aka angaasu bibilit'u, ta nama ijeeftuni, mudamsiisa.
Ee goraade qara qabdu, mirgaafi bita d'ai, gara fuula deefatu nama gargari ch'iri.
Duuba aninileeni harka d'ae, akasiini dallansuuni naraa galti. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
AABBO Waaqi na yaame waan nani jed'e,
Namicha, kara lama, ka hayyuuni Babiloni goraade ufi fud'ate gula d'ufu, akheekhaani garsisi. Karaani sunini lachu ha lafa taka keesaa bahuti. Fulla karaani iti gargari bahu mukha lama muri kara suni lachu d'ad'aabi.
Mukhi sunini toko kara dira Amoni ka Raba jed'ani hayyu garsiisa, kaani dira Yerusalemu ka jabeesani jaarani, ka lafa Yuda keesa jiru, garsiisa.
Hayyuuni Babiloni fulla mukha d'ad'aabani ka karaani iti gargari bahu taani eje, t'iya argufe, waaqa isaa ka d'ara kaani kad'ate, tiru hori sorio qalani laala, aka akasiini kara gula deemu male beekhu.
Jennaani harki isaa mirgichi t'iya Yerusalemu garsiiftu fuud'e. T'iyiti sunini, wonti isiini isa garsiiftu, aka inni waan balbala fullo diratini ch'absu mid'aase, hobaati duula labse, waan balbalaani ch'absani kaani d'aatu balbala kaye, boola qote biyye olbaase diraani marsu.
Ammo worri Yerusalemu waan kana ind'ugefatu wonti akanatiifi worri qara worraani wolti kakhate aka nagayaani woliini taani. Ammo wonti fagani kunini ch'ubbu worraa worra qaabsifte, aka worra qabanile beesifti.
Duuba wonti anini, AABBO Waaqi guddaani, jed'u tana: ch'ubbu teesani ya mullisani, nami ch'ufti ya wollaala keesani arge; isani ch'ubbu teesani waan hojattani ch'ufaani la garsiiftani. Tanaafi wollaali keesani ya mullate, aninileeni amma harka nyaapa keesaniti isani kenna.
Hayyu ch'ubbicha hama Israeli, guyyaani si balleesani ya alaa hobae,
Dubbini anini, AABBO Waaqi guddaani, jed'u tana: Sureefi ruufa hayyule baafad'i, wonti ch'ufti gara galte aka d'ibi taati. Nama irre inqamne guddisa, ka irre qabu qanch'arsa.
La bade, la bade! Ee, anini dira kana imballeesa. Ammo wonti kunini haga anini nama toko ka dira kana balleesu fohad'uti intaatu. Duuba anini dira kana isaa kenna.
Goraade namaani fit'ani, ta qarani addeesani aka angaasu bibilit'u, ya kurfeesani.
Daayyani isani agartani tunini d'ara, wonti isani agartani kunileeni kiyyiba. Guyyaani isani balleesani ya alaa hobae. Goraadeeni d'iotu d'ufte mata isani iraa ch'irti.
Goraade qalqalti deefad'a! Fulla iti isani uumani lafa isani keesati d'alatani keesati wollaala isaniti mura.
Yo anini aka ibida isaniti bobae, dallansu tiyya agartani. Ammalle anini harka nama naasu inqamne, ka aka male nama fit'uti isani kenna.
Ibidaani isani balleesani, lafa teesani keesati d'iiga keesani jissani, nami tokoleeni deebie isani inqaabatu, Nami dubbi tana jed'e AABBO Waaqa.

AABBO Waaqi na yaame waan nani jed'e,
Namicha, dira kana, ka nami nama fit'u keesa guute, wollaala iti imurtu? Yoosi waan hamtu inni tae ch'ufa diideesi iti himi.
Waan atini dira kanani jettu, AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u: Waan atini nama kanke heddu fit'e, waan harkaani boch'ani kad'ate ufi t'ureesiteefi, amma guyyaani kanke ya alaa hobae,
wonti guyyaani kanke gabaabate ala hobaeefi, waan atini nama fit'e Waaqa d'ara kad'ate ufi t'ureesiteefi! Tanaafi anini gosa d'ibi si tufachise, nami lafa d'ibileeni si goyeesa.
Nami fago jiruufi ka d'io jiruleeni si tufateti si goyeesa, maro hameenna keetitifi.
Nami Israeli gugurdaani nama dura yau, ka siti galu ch'ufti, humna ufi, d'aabate nama fit'a.
Nami si keesa jiru tokoleeni, ka worra ufiiti saalfatu, injiru. Atini nama gosa d'ibi, ka si keesa tau dabsite, nad'eeni hiyyeeyifi ilmaani hiyyeeyile saamte.
Atini fulla qulqulloole ch'eeru didde, guyya Sabatole jabeesu didde.
Nami kanke hagi toko d'ara waan nama d'ibi odeese akasiini dua keesa worra buuse. Hagi toko sorio waaqa d'araati baasani nyaate, hagiini waan hamtuni d'araa ufi baasa.
Ammalle hagi gari nad'eeni abbooti worraa bira rafe, hagi garileeni nad'eeni aada uwa qabdu buufata.
Hagi tokoleeni nad'eeni biyya barate ka d'ibileeni soddowaani ufi yokhaani oboleyaani isaani ta dubra ta haati d'ibiini d'alte faraani.
Nami kanke ka d'ibileeni gumbo fud'ate nama fit'a. Hagi garileeni gati gosa ufiti kenne, tirfi jala fed'ate, akasiini nama dabse ufi duroomsa. Worri kunini ch'ufti ya na ded'e. Nami dubbi tana jed'e AABBO Waaqa gudda.
Anini hanna keesanifi ijeecha teesani ya obsu dad'abe d'ajjifad'e.
Atini mala keeti eegi anini waan si tolchu fed'u ch'ufa hobaase, waan jannoomi si keesati hafe irre qabaate, harka dandeete olfud'attu seeta? Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa. Anini dubbi tiyya guutu male intau.
Anini nama kanke gosa ch'ufafi lafa ch'ufa keesa firfirse, huji tante hamtu ch'ufa hobaasa.
Duuba akanaani gochiti taani d'ibiini si tufate, ammalle atini aka anini AABBO Waaqa beeta.
AABBO Waaqi na yaame waan nani jed'e,
Namicha, worri Israeli kunini woma naa imbahu, worri akuma udaani sibiila jira, sibiila diima taanaani, saldaqa taanaani, sibiila guraacha taanaani, sibiila qalai qawe ira mid'aasani taanaani — ka eegi qarsi bassani ibida keesati hafu.
Tanaafi amma tana anini, AABBO Waaqi guddaani, waan worraani jed'u, Isani akuma udaani sibiila suni jirtani, ka woma imbaane. Anini Yerusalemu keesa wolti isani bassa,
akuma qarsifi sibiila diimafi sibiila guraachafi sibiila qalaitifi saldaqa, ka wolti guurani bassani. Akuma ibidi sibiila suni bassu, dallansuuni tiyya isani bassiti.
Ee, anini Yerusalemuti wolti isani baase, ibida isani jalati bobeese, dallansu tiyyaani isani bassa.
Akuma qarsi ibidaani bassani, Yerusalemu keesati isani bassa, duuba akanaani isani, aka AABBO Waaqi isaniti dallane, beetani.
Ammalle AABBO Waaqi na yaame waan naani jed'e,
Namicha, waan atini worra Israelitini jettu, Lafti teesani ya t'uroofte badde, taanaafi anini dallansu tiyya keesa isani balleesu fed'a.
Jaaroleeni worraa tunini aka nyeench'a bineensa ijeese ira tae itanu jirti. Worri nama fit'e beesefi horile haga dandau ch'ufa fud'ate, akanaani nad'eeni heddule hiyyeeyi tolcha.
Qaaloleeni worraa seera kiyya ch'absite, miha kiyya ka woyyu ch'ufa t'ureesiti. Worri waan qulqulloofi ka qulqullo intahini tokole gargari imbaasu, ammalle waan t'uri qabatifi ka t'uri inqamnele akuma waan taka barsiise, guyya Sabatole yaalu dide, waan worri tae kanafi worri Israeli ch'ufti na tufate.
Jari lafa mohatuleeni aka yai bineensa nyaatu gargari hero d'ooftu jira. Worri nama ijeese akanaani ufi duroomsa.
Raagooti worraleeni akuma nami booji adii mana dibe, t'uri isa d'ossu, ch'ubbu worraa d'ossiti. Worri daayya d'ara arge, dubbi kiyyiba fage, Nu dubbi AABBO Waaqa gudda dubbanna jed'ani, ka anini, AABBO Waaqi guddaani, worraani indubbatini.
Dureeyyiini nama sobde, nama saamte, hiyyeesafi nama gosa d'ibi, ka lafa worraa keesa taule, waan hamtu tolchite balleesiti.
Anini nama naabo d'akhaani jaare, fulla isiini ch'ach'abt'eeni eje, hojja anini dallansu tiyya keesa isi balleesu d'ufu worraa kalchu tokole ilaani barbaade d'abe.
Tanaafi anini aka taka inargini worrati dallane waan hamtu worri tae kana gula aka ibida worra gube balleese. Nami dubbi tana jed'e AABBO Waaqa gudda.

AABBO Waaqi na yaame waan nani jed'e,
Namicha, duri dubra lamati jira, ta woliini d'alate.
Dubarti tunini gaafa lafa Misiri keesa jirtu, ato didiqootu, dubrooma d'abde sharmut'a taate.
Ta angafa maqaani Oholi (isiini Samaria), maand'iti maqaani Oholiba (isiini Yerusalemu). Anini worra lachu fuud'e, ilmaani iraa d'ad'ale.
Ato na jala jirtu, Oholaani huji sharmut'oma taani lakisu didde jaallowani isii, ta worra Ashuru taani, aka male d'araateefi iraa tau didde.
Jaallowani isii tunini askarti woya bule didiimtu naqatufi worra gugurda askarti, ka worri ch'ufti kaima mimid'aaga teeto farda ka guddo farda gulubsisu beekhu.
Isiini sharmut'a, ta worri gugurda Ashuru ch'ufti iti yau. D'araa nafa isii gula isiini Waaqa worra Ashuru kad'ate akasiini ufi t'ureesite.
Isiini huji isi ta sharmut'oma, ta gaafa lafa Misiri keesati dubrooma d'abde taani, hojatte lakisu didde. Haguma gaafa isiini dubrati asi, d'iirti isi bira rafte sharmut'a tolchite.
Tanaafi anini isi harka jaallowani isii ta Ashuru, ta isiini guddo d'araatufi, taaniti kenne.
Worri woya isi iraa hiikhe, qulla diidati baase, ilmaani isii ta d'iiratifi ta dubrale qabe, goraadeeni isi ijeese. Nad'eenileeni fulla ch'ufa waan isii tolchani wolti hasasite.
Ato oboleetini isii Oholibani waan kana agartele, isiini ufiftu isiile ira sharmut'omte badde.
Isiileeni akasuma jara gugurdafi jara askarti Ashuruti mataa, ka woya mimid'aadu naqatufi askarti farda, ta ch'ufti kaima mimid'aaga, d'araateefi gula badde.
Anini aka isiini ch'eeraa foko inqamne, akuma oboleeti isii taate, arge jibbaad'e.
Isiini haga qarale ira sharmut'a taate, ch'eeraa foko d'abde, akheekha worra Babiloni, ka girgida mana irati barreesani hallu diimtuni ch'okhani gurda iti naqani, sure shooba matati marani, gula badde.
Isiini akuma worra agarteeni iti d'araate, lafa Babiloni keesati qonqo iti ergate, ufiti gayaamte.
Worri Babiloni d'ufe isi bira rafe, t'ureese iti tabate, duuba eege isiini worra quufte, tufate jibbite.
Isiini gumi durati qulla ufi mullifte, sharmut'oma ufi lalabde. Jennaani anini akuma oboleeti isii jibbe jibbaad'e biraa deeme kaani, isiile biraa deeme.
Isiini haga qara kaani ira sharmut'a taate, akuma gaafa dubra, ka lafa Misiri keesa jirtu kaani, taate.
Ammalle isiini jaallowani isii, ta waan aka harreetini yaate, aka farda korma d'ala d'araau jaalate.
(Oholiba, atini waan lafa misiri keesati taate, ka nami d'iira guntuta keetiti tabate dubrooma si d'oweti deebiu feeta.)
Duuba amma, Oholiba, wonti anini, AABBO Waaqi, sini jed'u tana: Atini jaallowani tante taani ya quufte lakifte, ammo anini worra siti kaase, worri d'ufe gama ch'ufaa si marsaa:
worri lafa Babilonitifi ka Kaldayotifi ka Pekoditifi ka Shoatifi ka Koatifi ka Ashuruleeni. Anini worra kaima, ka gurra qabu, mimid'aaga kana ch'ufafi worra askarti fardati gugurda ch'ufa wolti baase,
duuba worra duula gudda gaari fardi hirkisufi ka sagale baatu qabuti mirgaa d'ufe si had'a. Worri kofia sibiila naqate, wonte guurate si marsaa. Duuba anini harka worrati si kenne, worri aada ufi gula waan fed'u si tolcha.
Anini siti dallane. Worra siti lakise worri dallansu ufi keesa waan fed'u si tolcha. Funnaanifi gurra siraa ch'irani, ilmaani tante fit'ani. Ee, ilmaani tante ta d'iiratifi ta dubrale siraa fuud'ani ato jirtu gubani.
Woya irreeni siraa hiikhani faaya atini naqatu ch'ufa siraa yaafatani.
Anini d'araa atini d'iira d'araatu siraa balleese, sharmut'oma atini lafa Misiriti barate kaani si d'owa. Atini deebite waan harkaani boch'ani kad'atani d'araate, yokhaani lafa Misirile inqaabattu.
Wonti AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'u tana, Anini harka worra atini jibbite garaa iti hammaateti si kenna,
ammalle waan worri si jibbufi, worri waan atini hojatte horate ch'ufa siraa fuud'e, qulla si d'aabe, sharmut'oma kanke diidati baasa. Waan kana d'araa teetifi sharmut'oma keetiti
sitini d'ufa. Atini gosa ch'ufaa sharmut'a taate, waan worri harkaani boch'e kad'atuni ufi t'ureesite.
Waan atini faanuma oboleeti teeti baatefi, anini muduunu gaargala, ta isiini keesaa woi d'uddeeni, woi si baasa.
AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u, Atini muduunu guddo keesa qabdu ta oboleeti teeti keesaa woi d'udda. Nami ch'ufti si tufate si goyeesa; muduununi ya guutamte.
Isiini si yaadesite si macheesiti; muduununi oboleeti tante Samaria, ta sodaafi badiini siti d'uftu.
Atini keesaa woi d'udde, fooqifte, ch'ach'aba isiitiini harma ufi tatarsaafta. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa gudda.
Duuba amma, wonti AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'u tana: Waan atini na deete dudda nati galteefi, d'araafi sharmut'oma keetifi gaargalta.
AABBO Waaqi na yaame waan nani jed'e, Namicha, atini aka Oholafi Oholiba dubbi qortu kurfo jirta? Waan hamtu worri tae worrati himi.
Worri yayu nama barate namale fit'e — waaqoota d'araa kad'ate ilmaani naa d'ale fit'e. Ammalle ilmaani tiyya qaqalani waaqa isaaniti sorio baasani.
Wonti worri tae tana ch'allaniti, worri mana kiyya t'ureese, seera guyya Sabato, ka anini tolchele, yake.
Worri guyyuma ijoolle tiyya waaqoota d'ara taani sorio baase, Mana kiyya d'ufe t'ureese!
Maro heddu nama fago jiru nama iti ergani yaamani, duuba nami sunini d'ufe. Duuba yo worri sunini d'ufe, oboleyaani lamaani taani nafa diqate, ila kuulate, faaya naqate,
barch'uma dadansa ira teteete, mesa waan dadansa irati massani, qayyafi d'ad'a anini kenneefi gubba nat'e, ufi dura d'aabde.
Worri jaallowani isii, ka lafa gamoojiti d'ufe, ka woma iyyaalle, iyyaa d'ufe iti olduude. Worri sunini d'ufe, harka worraa mirga iti naqe waan mid'aadule mata worrati naqe.
Jennaani anini herege waan jed'e, worri kunini niiti qara sharmut'omani jaarte hobaateti yau jira.
Worri halkani guyya nad'eenuma babadole sharmut'a, ta Oholafi Oholiba jed'ani, tanati yaa.
Nami d'ugaa qajeelani nad'eeni tanaani, isiini sharmut'a harka d'iiga jed'e wollaala iti mura. Wonti akanatiifi isiini sharmut'oma gula yaate, namale ijeefte.
Wonti AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'u tana: Tuuta namaa, ta d'ufte worra mudamsiifte saamtu, iti yaami.
Tuuti sunini ha d'akhaani worra haate, goraadeeni worra ch'irte, ilmaani worraa fit'e, mana worrale gubduti.
Anini lafa tana keesa fulla ch'ufati huji sharmut'oma balleesa, aka nad'eeni d'ibiini waan kana arginaani worra gula baate sharmut'a intaane.
Ammalle isani, oboleyaani dubra tana lamaani — anini maro sharmut'oma keesanitifi ch'ubbu teesani, ta isani Waaqa d'ara kadat'anile, isani gaargalcha. Duuba akanaani aka anini AABBO Waaqa gudda beetani.

Guyya kud'anneeso, ka jia kud'anneeso, ka ganna sagaleeso, ka nu haga nu boojiani teenne, AABBO Waaqi na yaame waan nani jed'e,
Namicha ayyana arra kana t'aafi, wonti akanatiifi hayyuuni Babiloni guyya kana dira Yerusalemu marse had'u jira.
Gumi mata jajabdu, ta na diddu tana mammaasa kana iti himi waan jettuuni, wonti AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'u tana:
Okote bisaani guuti, ibida ira d'aabi.
Fooni fulla dansa —
baleensufi lukhale okote keesa buusi,
fooni lafe dadansale iti dari.
Fooni hooliye dadansale fuud'i;
qoraani okote jalati tuuli,
bisaani ha danfani lafefi fooni suni d'aabani.
Wonti AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'u tana: Diri worra harka d'iiga ya bade! Inni okote dandoofte, ta taka ind'iqini fakaata. Fooni kaani toko tokooni keesaa fuud'ani, okote taani gossani.
Dira keesati nama fit'ani, ammo d'iigi worraa lafa fulla awarti d'ossituti injinne, qarsa d'akha gubbati jige male.
Anini d'iiga suni fulla nami ch'ufa arguti lakisa, aka akasiini nami garaani hammaate haalo baafatu.
Wonti AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'u tana: Diri worra harka d'iigaa ya bade! Anumati qoraani wolti tuula.
Qoraani d'ibiini kooti! Ibida jalati gooli! Fooni aka dansaa d'aabi! Fuuto jalaa gossi, lafele gubi.
Duuba okote sibiila diima kaani ibida ira d'aabi, ha diimate aka ch'ile ibida taatu, duuba akasiini okote suni dandiini iraa baate qulqulloofti,
ato dandiini sunini ch'ufti ibida keesati iraa badu baatele.
Ee Yerusalemu, hameenni kanke ya si t'ureese ato anini si qulqulleesu fed'ele, t'urini siraa imbaatu, Haga dallansuuni tiyya naraa galtuti, atini deebite qulqullo intaatu.
Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa. Hojaani anini woi tolchu ya geete. Anini ch'ubbu tante yaalaa bahe si illakisu. Waan atini tolchite gula wollaala siti murani. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa gudda.
AABBO Waaqi na yaame waan nani jed'e,
Namicha, anini d'aicha tokooni nama atini nama ch'ufa ira jaalatu si duraa fuud'a. Atini gungumte boote imimaani imbuisini.
Nami si ind'agayini, Boha tante d'ofad'i aka nama nami iraa due taate sureefi miila duwa indeemini; yokhaani fuula d'ofate, sagale nami boha nyaatu inyaatini.
Anini diirama biyyaani haasae, lafti galgalomnaani niitiini naraa doote. Boriyyaate anini akuma nani jed'ani kaani tolche.
Biyyiti waan nani jette, Isi abbo, wonti atini taatu kunini maani?
Jennaani anini waan worraani jed'e, AABBO Waaqi na yaame waan nani jed'e,
Waan atini worra Israelitini jettu, wonti AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'u tana: Isani ijaarsa jajaba Mana Waaqa kanani guddo kortani. Isani mid'aaguma isaa laaltani jaalattani maro ch'ufa iti yaatani. Ammo anini t'ureese balleesa.
Duuba isani woma anini tae kana taatani. Isani mata inhagogatani yokhaani sagale nami bohaa nyaatule inyaatani.
Isani matafi miila duwa yaatani yokhaani laalefatani imbootani. Maro ch'ubbu teesanitifi d'umatani wolti bootani.
Duuba anini akheekha isanii taha, isani waan anini tae kana ch'ufa intaatani. AABBO Waaqi waan jed'u, yo wonti kunini taate, aka anini AABBO Waaqaa gudda beetani.
AABBO Waaqi waan jed'e, Namicha, anini Mana kiyya ka jabeesani jaarani, ka worri jaalate koreeni, mid'aaguma isaa jaalate maro ch'ufa iti yau kana, worra biraa fuud'a. Ammalle anini ilmaani worra ta d'iiratifi ta dubrale iraa fuud'a.
Guyya anini waan kana tolchu, nama baqa deemuti d'ufe siti hima.
Duuba guyyuma suni afaani qara si duude kaani si banamani, isaani dubbata. Kara kanani atini akheekha worra kanaa taate, worrileeni aka anini AABBO Waaqaa beekha.

Namicha, fuula kanke lafa Amoniti deefad'i abaari waan jettuuni,
Dubbi AABBO Waaqa gudda d'agaya, wonti inni jed'u tana: Isani Mana kiyya ka t'ureesanifi lafa Israeli ta balleesanifi gumi Yuda ta boojiani agarraani gammaddani.
Waan isani waan suni jettani gammaddanifi, anini harka gosa lafa gamooji ta ilaboru keesaa d'uftuti isani kenne, worri isani dabsata. Worri bulto jaarate achi qubata, mid'aanifi aanani isani sila nyaatani d'uddani nyaate d'uga.
Anini dira Raba balleese, lafa gaali keesaa oolu tolche, lafa Amoni ch'ufa fulla hooliyeeni ooltu tolcha, duuba akanaani aka anini AABBO Waaqaa beetani.
Wonti AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'u tana: Isani gammaddani, harka d'ooftani sirbitani lafa Israeli tufattani.
Waan isani waan kana taatanifi, anini harka gosa d'ibi ka waan keesani hatte isani saamtuti isani kenna. Anini aka takaa inargini isani balleese fiiga isani d'owe, aka isani itumaa deebitani gosa intaane yokhaani lafa inhoranne isani tolcha. Duuba akanaani aka anini AABBO Waaqaa beetani.
anini dira seera lafa Moabu nyaapa ira d'owu nyaapa iti erge haasisa. Dira, Beth-Yeshmothitifi, Baal-Meonitifi Kirathamule.
Ammalle anini gosa lafa gamooji, ta ilaboru teetu, Moabufi Amoni dabsachiisa, aka Moabuni deebite gosa intaane.
Anini worra Moabu balleesa, duuba worri akanaani aka anini AABBO Waaqaa beekha.
Tanaafi amma AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u, Anini worra suniti kae namafi saa worrale balleesa. Anini dira Tamariti fuud'e, dira Dedaniti d'aabe, lafa ch'ufa balleese ona tolche, achiti nami hedduleeni woraanaani hobaa.
Gumiini tiyya ta Israeli worra Edomu haate haalo naa baafti, ammalle waan dallansuuni tiyya nama tolchitule worra garsiifti. Duuba akanaani worri Edomu aka anini haalo baafad'e arga. Nami dubbi tana jed'e AABBO Waaqa gudda.
Tanaafi AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u, Anini worra Filisti had'e hobaase, daara d'owe, nama diida Filisti keesa tau tokole bahu d'owa.
Anini aka male worrati dallane, worra hobaase haalo baafad'a. Duuba akanaani worri aka anini AABBO Waaqa beekha.

Namicha, wonti worri Tiro gammadufi tana. Worri iyye waan jed'u, Yerusalemuni ya badde balbala isii ch'ufa ya ch'absani, daldali isii ya ch'ite. Eegi isiini badde, nu amma woi horanna!
Amma wonti AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'u tana: Ee dira Tiro, anini ya siti nyaape. Anini gosa heddu ta aka d'awa galaana woli d'oofte, d'ufte si haatu sitini d'ufa.
Worri naabo dira suni ch'ach'abse doofi isaale ch'ufa butucha. Duuba anini biyyele ch'ufa hare, d'akha diidati gabaasa.
Worri qurt'umi guuruleeni d'akhuma suni ka afaani galaana ch'iisu irati t'urura goffata. Nami dubbi tana jed'u ana, AABBO Waaqa gudda. Gochiti d'ibiini Tiro saamte,
ammalle goraadeeni worraatini nama dira afaani baariini keesa jiru ch'ufa fit'i. Duuba akanaani worri Tiro aka anini AABBO Waaqa beekha.
AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u, Anini hayyu Babiloni ka Nebukadreza jed'ani, ka hayyu ch'ufa ira jiru, Tironi d'ufe haasisa. Inni duula gudda fardafi gaari fardi hirkisufi askarti miilaani yaatu qabuuni mirgaa d'ufa.
Nama dira afaani Baariini keesa tau woraanaani hobaasani. Nyaapi d'ufe, boola dira sunini marse qote, biyye olbaase wonte ufitini ch'ibra keeyata.
Worri naabo teesani jigeesa mukhatini butuche, doofi teesanile konfi sibiilatini ch'absa.
Awarti fardi worraa kaasu lafa isaniti duuchite, iyyanti farda worraa, ka gaarini hirkise balbala dira ta ch'absanini olduudu, lafafi naabo dirale ch'ufa isaniti chochoofti.
Jari worraa ka farda yabatuleeni dira keesaniti baafate, nama keesani goraadeeni kara keesati fit'e, utuba keesani gugurddale ch'ufa qaqarisani.
Nyaapi keesani suni hori keesani ka daldala ch'ufa saame boojie, naabo teesani ch'ufa ch'ach'abse maneeni teesani dadansa ch'ufa bulleese, d'akhaafi mukhaafi ch'abdo maneeni suni ch'ufa fuud'e baariini keesati jissa.
Anini faaru teesani imballeesa, duuba deebiani qonqo kirari teesani ind'agayani.
Anini d'akha t'urura qurt'umi irati afatani ch'alla lakisa. Dira kana deebiani injaarani. Nami dubbi tana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa.
Wonti AABBO Waaqi dira Tirotini jed'u tana: Hojja nyaapi isani had'u, nami afaani baariini tau iyyanna nama hobaasanitiifi gurra qabata.
Hayyooti lafa afaani galaana ch'ufti ta hobolo qabdu, woya isii mimid'aadufi ubaara babaricha yaafate mudamte holate ga teteete. Lubbuuni worra d'ufte worri aka male holate waan tahu d'aba.
Duuba faaru boha tanaani si faarsani: Diri gurra gudda qabu ya bade! Hobolo tante yayu baariini keesaa balleesani. Nami dira kana duri baariini mohate, nama d'aatu jiru ch'ufale mudamsiise.
Amma tana, guyya dira kana balleesani, lafti bisaani marsanileeni ch'ufti holatte, nami keesa tauleeni badi teesani arginaani guddo naha.
Wonti AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'u tana: Anini aka dira bade ona tae nami keesa injirre si tolche, bisaani baariini siti fach'aase si liqimsiisa.
Anini boola ekhera keesa si buuse, worra haguma duriti achi jiruti si dara. Worra gadi ka due, ona worra suni keesa woliini teetani, deebie nami siti inqubatu, yokhaani atinileeni lafa nama jiru deebite keesa inteetu.
Anini aka hama si balleese, deebiani si inargani. Si barbaadani, ammo deebiani si inargani. Nami dubbi tana jed'e AABBO Waaqa.

AABBO Waaqi na yaame waan nani jed'e,
Namicha, dira Tiro, ka afaani baariini jiru, ka nama afaani baariini jiru ch'ufa daldala woliini tolchu faarsi bohi waan jettuuni, AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u,
Ee Tiro, atini mid'aaguma teetiini koorta.
Worri kanke baariini, ijaartuni tanteleeni aka hobolo mid'aadu si jaarte.
Worri gaara Hermoni d'aqe, mukha dadansa ch'ire,
hind'eesa Lebanoni ch'ire utuba sii tolche.
Ejersa Bashani ch'ire mukha hobolooni oofani tolche,
worri mukha d'ed'eera Kipro d'ufeeni,
nafa kanke jaare ilka arbaatini ch'okhe.
Woya sini deemsisani ta boofta barriti,
ta lafa Misiriti d'ufte fagootu beekhani.
Darbaala kanke woya bule diimtu lafa Kiproti d'uftuni mid'aasani.
Nami si oofulleni worra dira Sidonitifi ka Arvadi keesaa d'ufe.
Nami hobolo teesani keesa hojatu ch'ufti hogeeyi.
Nami hobolo mid'aasuleeni hogeeyi Gebali d'ufte.
Hobolo ch'ufafi nami keesa hojatuleeni fulla tante d'ufe daldala tolche.
Askartini lafa Ajemitifi ta Luditifi ta Putu sii duulte. Worri wonteefi kofia sibiila maneeni tante keesa oli keeyate, Nami gurra siti tolcheleeni worruma.
Askartini Arvadi naabo tante eedde, nami dira Gamadileeni doofi tante eege. Worri wonte ufi maneeni tanteeti fafannifate. Nami mid'aaguma tana sitini d'ufeleeni worruma.
Atini daldala lafa Tarshishitini woliini tolchite qarsifi sibiila guraachafi saldaqafi sibiila qalai qawe iraa mid'aasani fuute miha kanke guddaani woljijirate.
Atini lafa Girikitifi ta Tubalitifi ta Mesheki keesa daldalte, miha kanke tissefi waan sibiila diimani mid'aasanini jijiratte.
Atini miha kanke fardo miha baatufi ka nama baatufi gaangele lafa Beth-Togarma d'ufteenini jijiratte.
Worri Rodi si woliini daldale, ammalle worri lafa afaani baariini tauleeni ilka arbaatifi mukha jaba aka ch'anatini woli jijirate.
Worri Shamu miha kanketifi waan heddu lafa tante keesaa baha bitate ammalle worri d'akha ch'uluqa dotifi woya bule diimtufi waan barreesani ch'okhani heddufi woya booftatifi d'akha baariini ka booji fakaatufi d'akha diima ch'uluqale ch'ufa guure miha keetiini woljijirate.
Worri Yudatifi ka Israelileeni dargayefi damma, d'ad'a, waan sagaleeni urgeesanini d'ufe waan kanketini siraa bitate.
Worri Damaski miha kanketifi waan lafa tante keesati baha bitate, daad'i Helboni d'ufteefi woya shuufa ta Sahari d'ufteeni d'ufe miha kanke sunini siraa jijirate. Ammalle worri sibiila guraacha ka bassanifi waan sagaleeni urgeesanini d'ufe miha kanketini jijirate.
Worri Dedani raro fardatini d'ufe, miha kanketini jijirate.
Araftifi worri lafa Kedari mohatuleeni ilmoole hoolatifi elemiyeefi laleesani d'ufe, miha kanketini jijirate.
Daldaltuni Shebatifi ta Raama d'akhaye ch'uch'ulut'ufi worqifi qayyaani d'ufte, miha kanketini jijiratte.
Dira Haranitifi ka Kannetifi ka Edenitifi, ka Ashurutifi ka Kilmatiifi, daldaltu Shebaleeni ch'ufti si woliini daldalte.
Worri woya mimid'aadufi bubule didiimtufi woya barreesani ch'okhanifi makheka barritifi haadafi mseensa aka dansaa fohani siti gurgure.
Miha kanke ka daldala hobolo gugurdoti baata.
Atinileeni akuma hobolo bisaani keesa deemtu jirta,
ta miha daldala gudda baatu.
Nami si oofu baariinini si baamnaani,
qilleensi ilaboruti d'ufe, d'ae si ch'abse, gara si galche.
Miha atini baatu ch'ufafi nama si keesa hojatufi hogeeyi teetifi
daldaltu teetifi askartini si gubba jirtu ch'ufti
atini ch'ach'abt'e gaargalte jennaani bisaani keesati jige, bisaani liqimsani.
Haga iyyanna nama si keesa hojatu,
ka bisaani liqimsani, afaani baariini suni ch'ufati d'agayani.
Hobolo ch'ufa nami ya keesaa bahe,
nami keesa hojatuleeni ya kae yae lafa godduti taake.
Worri ch'ufti laalefate sii bohe,
biyye matati ufi naqe, daara keesa gangalata.
Worri dua tanteeti mata haadate,
ch'arqi naqate, garaa hammaate boha.
Bohani si faarsani waan jed'ani,
Dira kamiti Tiro gahe, ka amma bisaani baariini liqimsani ch'allisisani?
Gaafa duri daldala miha kanke lafa d'ibi geesani,
gochiti hedduuni gammadde siraa quufte.
Ammalle hayyooti hedduleeni mihuma kanke sunini duroomte.
Ammo amma tana atini ya ch'ach'abt'e,
baariini keesati garagalte, d'immu galaana lit'e.
Miha kanketifi nama si keesa hojatule ch'ufa
ya si woliini baariinini liqimsite.
Nami d'aatu baariini jiru ch'ufti, waan atini taate suni arginaani rifate, hayyoota worrale lubbuuni d'ufte, mudamsuuni fuula worraa iraa mullate.
Atini yayu badde! Deebiani si inargani, daldaltuni lafa ch'ufaleeni rifate holate, waan wonti sunini worra qabatu seete mudamti.

AABBO Waaqi na yaame waan nani jed'e,
Namicha, waan atini hayyu Tirotini jettu, Atini ufi guddifte, kiyyibde keesa dabarte, waaqa ufiini jette. Ammalle atini, Anini waaqa ka barch'uma guddinna ira jiddu baariini tau jetta. Ato waaqa ufi tolchitele atini waaqaniti, namuma.
Atini waan Danieli ira qaro ufi seeta waan wonti tokoleeni dandeete si duraa d'okhatu inseetu.
Qaroomafi beekhi kanke worqifi qarsiini si duroomse.
Atini daldala keesa jabaatte, akasiini guddo woi horatte, duuba hori sunini kiyyibde!
Duuba amma wonti AABBO Waaqi guddaani jed'u tana: waan atini qaro aka Waaqa ufi seetufi,
anini nyaapa naasu inqamne si haasise, worri hori kanke dansa ka atini beekhafi qaroomani horatte siraa balleesa.
Worri si ijeese boola bisaani keesati si awaala.
Yo worri si ijeesu d'ufu, atini hojja sunile Waaquma ufiini jetta? Atini Waaqaniti, namuma, yo si ijeesu d'ufani inuma doota.
Atini akuma sare harka worra Waaqa imbeennetini doota. Nami waan kana jed'e ana, AABBO Waaqa gudda.
AABBO Waaqi na yaame waan nani jed'e,
Namicha, dira Tiro faarsi bohi waan jettuuni AABBO Waaqi guddaani waan jed'u, Atini duri nama d'ugaa qajeela, ka nama ch'ufaa akheekha dansaa tae. Ee, atini akami qaro, ammalle akami mid'aada!
